igbo: Msoki (Hibru מסוקי) bụ ofe ndị Juu ọdịnala ndị Juu Algeria na Tunisia, a na-erikarị ya n'oge oriri na n'ọtụtụ, ma kachasịa n'oge mmemme Ista
Mtawarira bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Muaaz Abdelraheem Gesmallah Abdelrahman (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Sudan na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka Khartoum NC na ndị otu bọọlụ mba Sudan
Muaid Ellafi ( Arabic ; a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1996) bụ onye Libya na-agba bọọlụ na-agbara Wydad AC bọọlụ
Ọ na-agba bọọlụ n'akụkụ aka ekpe na ọrụ nke n'ime-n'ihu

N'ụbọchị 15 Disemba 2018, Muaid Ellafi sonyeere USM Alger ruo afọ abụọ na ọkara, mgbe nkwekọrịta ya na Saudi Club Al-Shabab kwụsịrị, ọ gwara ndị mgbasa ozi na ọ natara ọtụtụ onyinye site n'aka ndị klọb ndị Egypt, Morocco, Tunisia na ọbụna ndị Algeria, mana ọ họọrọ USM Alger n'ihi na Ọ bụ nnukwu klọb ma nwee nnukwu ndị na-akwado ya ma ọ na-achọ ka ya merie utu aha, E kenyere ya uwe iri
Ellafi mere nke mbụ ya maka USM Alger na Ligue 1 megide DRB Tadjenanet dị ka onye nnọchi anya Oualid Ardji merụrụ ahụ na 1–0 Loss

N'ụbọchị 15 Jenụwarị n'afọ 2019, Ellafi banyere ọzọ dị ka onye nnọchi anya na nkeji iri isii na asaa maka Mohamed Benyahia na Derby megide NA Hussein Dey, ọ dịkwa naanị nkeji atọ iji nweta goolu mbụ ya na nke ikpeazụ na egwuregwu ahụ site na Direct free kick na mmeri 4-1

Ellafi kwuru mgbe emechara egwuregwu ahụ na obi dị ya ụtọ na mmeri a na ihe mgbaru ọsọ mbụ ya ma kwuo na mmalite m gara nke ọma karịsịa ka m laghachiri asọmpi mgbe ọnwa anọ gasịrị ma ọ ga-arụ ọrụ ka ọ dị mma n'ọdịnihu
Na 26 Jenụwarị 2019, mgbe egwuregwu anọ gasịrị dị ka onye nnọchi anya, o mere nke mbụ ya dị ka onye mbido na Ligue 1 megide JS Saoura na mmeri 2-0
Ọ hapụrụ ubi na nkeji iri isii na asaa n'ihi na ọ dịbeghị njikere igwu egwu maka nkeji iri itoolu
Na 26 Mee 2019, Na egwuregwu ikpeazụ megide CS Constantine, Ellafi nyere aka abụọ maka Abderrahmane Meziane na Prince Ibara n'otu n'otu iji nyere ha aka imeri 3–1 ma nwetakwa aha mbụ ya na USM Alger

Tupu mmalite nke oge ọhụrụ Ellafi laghachiri ọzụzụ ruo ngwụsị ọnwa Julaị na ndị USM Alger na-azụ na Tunisia iji kwụsị esemokwu banyere ịlanarị ya n'ihi nsogbu ego nke klọb ahụ, mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gwara ndị mgbasa ozi Algeria na ọ nwere ike ịhapụ klọb ahụ n'ụzọ dị mfe dị ka onye egwuregwu mba ọzọ n'ihi na ọ natabeghị ụgwọ ọrụ ya ruo ọnwa ise, mana o kwuru na ịhụnanya ya maka klọb a mere ka o kpebie ịnọ
Na 25 Ọgọstụ 2019, Ellafi nyere goolu mbụ ya na CAF Champions League megide AS Sonidep na mmeri 3-1 n'ụlọ
Ellafi mere egwuregwu izizi ya na mba Libya na 2014 Na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Morocco
Na 6 June 2015, na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Mali, o nyere goolu mbụ ya na mba ụwa na 2–2
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'oge asọmpi asọmpi mba Afrịka nke afọ 2018 megide Algeria, o nyere goolu ugboro abụọ iji duru mba ya ruo eru maka asọmpi ahụ
Kpọpụta njehie tag was found
Mubarak Muyika (amụrụ na Mee 31, 1994, Western Province, Kenya), bụ onye isi azụmahịa nke Kenya America, onye mmemme kọmputa na onye ọchụnta ego n'ịntanetị nke dị na Silicon Valley
Ọ bụ nwa mgbei mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Muyika hiwere Hype Century, ụlọ ọrụ na-elekọta weebụ nke ọ rere afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị maka ọnụ ọgụgụ isii
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi nke Zagace, ụlọ ọrụ nke na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ ahịa ngwa maka azụmahịa iji nweta ngwanrọ maka ndekọ ego, njikwa akụ mmadụ, ahịa, n'etiti ojiji ndị ọzọ
Forbes depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime Forbes Africa's 30 under 30 ma na 2015 na 2017, ọ bụkwa onye kacha nta na ndepụta Business Insider nke ndị ọchụnta ego na-eto eto kachasị elu gburugburu ụwa
A mụrụ Mubarak Muyika na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ, Kenya
Nna ya bụ kọmishọna mpaghara nke Siaya, onye isi ọrụ obodo, onye nwụrụ mgbe Mubarak dị afọ abụọ, nne ya bụ onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
Muyika bụ nwanne nne ya na di ya zụlitere na mpaghara Nairobi
Mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Friends School Kamusinga, Muyika ritere ihe nrite abụọ na ngosi sayensị mba Kenya, Kenya Students Congress on Science and Technology kwa afọ
Na mbipụta nke iri anọ na asatọ nke ngosi ahụ n'afọ 2010, o meriri maka akwụkwọ ọcha nke akpọrọ 'Kahunic infra-photo surveyor', nke e gosipụtara dị ka okwu kọmputa, ma bụrụ onye mbụ na ngalaba ahụ

Mpempe akwụkwọ ọcha nke Muyika dabeere na Java, MySQL na C ++ dependencies, infra-red na laser rays, na ndị na-emepụta ray ahaziri iche iji chọpụta ihe ndị zoro ezo n'azụ konkiri na osisi, n'etiti ojiji ndị ọzọ, site na iji ntụgharị uche na ntụgharị
Na mbipụta nke iri anọ na itoolu nke ngosi ahụ n'afọ sochirinụ, Muyika meriri maka nchekwa data o mepụtara iji jikwaa mmanụ ụgbọala na njem nke ụgbọ oloko mmanụ
Aha mbụ nke ọrụ ahụ na ngosi ahụ bụ 'Techno Fibre System', mana a na-akpọkwa ya 'Enhanced petrol tracker'
E gosipụtara ya dị ka ihe ngosi kọmputa na ngalaba ICT, ọ bụ ezie na a ghọtara Muyika dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma na ngalaba ahụ, ọrụ ahụ nọ n'ọkwa nke atọ na mba na ngalaba ahụ
Nne na nna nkuchi ya na-arụ ọrụ obere ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na nkesa, Acrodile Publishers
N'iji ihe ntanetị na ahụmịhe teknụzụ nwetara n'afọ ndị gara aga, Muyika wuru weebụsaịtị ka mma maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2011, Muyika hiwere Hype Century Technologies & Investments Limited, ụlọ ọrụ lekwasịrị anya na ịmepụta weebụsaịtị na webhosting
N'afọ sochirinụ, maka ọrụ ya na HypeCentury, ọ natara Anzisha Prize maka ndị ọchụnta ego na-eto eto, site na African Leadership Academy
Muyika rere HypeCentury na Wemps Telecoms na nkwekọrịta ọnụ ọgụgụ isii na Mee 2013
Ka ọ na-erule oge ire ere Hypecentury nwere ndị ọrụ iri na anọ ma na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ 700 nwere ngalaba 1400
Kemgbe ahụ, HypeCentury agbanweela ma bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka nke Wemps Telecoms
Mgbe e mesịrị na 2013, Muyika hiwere Zagace na Nairobi site na ego sitere na ire HypeCentury, na ego ndị ọzọ sitere n'aka ndị na-etinye ego
Kemgbe ahụ, Zagace etinyela ọtụtụ ego ndị mmụọ ozi site n'aka ndị na-etinye ego dị iche iche
Na June 2015, e megharịrị ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna Zagace dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna nke Delaware nke otu aha ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ugbu a na San Jose, California
Mubi North bụ ọchịchị ime obodo nke Adamawa State, Nigeria
Obodo a bụ ebe Mahadum Adamawa State na Federal Polytechnic, Mubi
Mubi South bụ ọchịchị ime Obodo nke Adamawa Steeti, Naịjirịa
Àtụ LGAs and communities of Adamawa State

Rashid Abdul Mugeez, onye a maara n'okpuru aha ya bụ Mugeez, bụ onye Ghana na-agụ egwu ma na-edekwa egwu
A mụrụ ya na Bimbila (mpaghara ugwu, Ghana) ọ bịara mara ya site na Afrobeats / Hiplife duo R2Bees (Refuse to Be Broke), nke ya na nwa nwanne nna ya Faisal Hakeem (aka Omar Sterling) guzobere na 2007
Abọm ikpeazụ nke R2Bees akpọrọ Site 15 site na 2019 mere ka ọ banye n'elu 10 na Billboard Chart
Mugeez nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ na ndị nọ na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Africa dị ka Wizkid, Mr Eazi na Davido
Ya na onye mmeri Grammy bụ Ed Sheeran rụkọrọ ọrụ na Boa Me
N'afọ 2019 nke Eprel Mugeez hiwere akara ndekọ ya bụ Extrial Music iji kwalite ọrụ ya, yana ndị na-ese ihe na-abịa

Rashid Abdul Mugeez zụlitere ịhụnanya maka rap mgbe ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ nke mere ka ya na nwa nwanne nna ya mepụta R2Bees na 2007, wee bụrụ onye ọkacha mmasị na Ghana ngwa ngwa, na-ewepụta abọm mbụ ha, Da Revolution, na 2009
Ihe sochirinụ, Da Revolution II, bịara n'afọ 2012, tupu a họpụta ha abụọ maka Best International Act na 2013 BET Awards
Egwu R2Bees dị iche iche pụtara n'ime afọ ole na ole sochirinụ ebe Mugeez gbakwara onwe ya, na-egosi na egwu ndị dị ka Criss Waddle, Mr
Eazi, na DJ Breezy
2017 hụrụ ya na-egosi na Fuse ODG 'Boa Me,' n'akụkụ Ed Sheeran
Ụmụnne abụọ ahụ bi n'otu ụlọ ma gaa otu ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, nke nta na nke sekọndrị na Tema
Malite ọrụ ha n'oge, ha malitere ịnọchite anya ụlọ akwụkwọ ha na asọmpi egwu ụlọ akwụkwọ
Nke a mere ka ha sonye na asọmpi redio a ma ama Kasahare, nke ha meriri
Ọrụ ha na-aga n'ihu mere ka ha bụrụ ndị a ma ama n'ime obodo ha
N'afọ 2007, ụmụ nwanne nna ha abụọ ahụ guzobere egwu abụọ R2Bees ma bụrụ ọkacha mmasị na Ghana ngwa ngwa
Mugeez bụ onye isi egwu nke R2Bees, ebe Omar Sterling bụ onye na-eti egwu, yana onye isi nke R2Bees Entertainment
KillBeatz's (Joseph Addison) bụ onye na-emepụta R2Bees site na mmalite
R2Bees' lyrics dị na Twi na Ghanaian Pidgin English na egwu ha bụ ngwakọta nke Afrobeats na Hiplife, ụdị egwu Ghana nke jikọtara omenala Ghana na Hip Hop

Mgbe abọm Site 15 gosipụtara akụkọ Afrobeats Wizkid na Burna Boy, yana ndị bịara ọhụrụ dịka King Promise na Kwesi Arthur na egwu dịka 'Over', 'Sunshine', 'Yesterday' na 'My Baby', Mugeez hiwere akara ndekọ Extrial Music, iji kwalite ọrụ nke ya, yana ịkwado ndị na-ese ihe na-abịa
N'ịkwụsị ihe, Mugeez wepụtara egwu 'Regular' na Sarkodie na 'Your Number' na Juls na King Promise
Mugeez bịanyere aka na Tecknikal, onye na-eto eto na-achọ ịbụ onye na-ese ihe site na Ghana, dị ka onye mbụ na-ese ihe n'okpuru akara ndekọ ya
Mgbe ntọala nke Extrial na Eprel 2019 Mugeez jikọtara ya na DJ Mic Smith na Kwesi Arthur iji wepụta otu 'Dripping'
'Chihuahua' bụ egwu mbụ nke Mugeez n'afọ 2020 ma wepụta ya na 27 Machị mgbe ewepụtara ya na Audiomack
Na 8 Mee n'afọ ahụ 'Six In Da Morning' pụtara; e gosipụtara egwu ahụ na 'African Heat'; Spotify's ndepụta ọkpụkpọ nke egwu Afrika Kachasịrị na ọtụtụ Apple Ndepụta egwu egwu ndekọ
Mugoyo bụ nri ọdịnala na obodo Uganda
A na-eje ozi ya n'ọtụtụ mpaghara dị na Uganda ma kọwaa ya dị ka ngwakọta
Ihe ndị bụ isi e ji eri nri ahụ bụ poteto na agwa
Mugoyo na-ewu ewu na obodo ụfọdụ na Uganda
Ndị Iteso na-akpọ ya, ndị Baganda na-ezo aka na ya dị ka Mugoyo ma ọ bụ Omugoyo nke pụtara na ọ na-agwakọ
Na Buganda, a na-ejikọta omugoyo na ụmụ nwanyị na-eme agadi n'ihi na a na-eche na ọ bụ naanị ụmụ nwanyị meworo agadi nwere ndidi ịkwado e ya n'ihi usoro nrụgide
Ekwenyere na omume dị otú ahụ ga-agbanyụ ọkụ ahụ ma nwedịrị ike ịkpata mmekọrịta dara ada
Nchịkọta maka mugoyo nwere red kidney beans nke a makwaara dị ka Nambale na poteto na-atọ ụtọ
A na-amalite usoro isi nri site n'iso ọka akụrụ kpọrọ nkụ a maara dị ka Nambale na nnu ruo mgbe ọ dị nro
Mgbe ahụ, a na-ewepụ poteto na-atọ ụtọ na-acha odo odo ma na-esi ísì ụtọ n'ime akwụkwọ unere ruo mgbe ọ dị nro
A na-agwakọta agwa na poteto na-atọ ụtọ ọnụ iji mepụta otu nri
A na-akwadebe Mugoyo n'elu nkụ ebe anwụrụ ọkụ sitere na nkụ na-agbakwunye nnukwu ụtọ na mugoyo n'oge oge a na-eme achịcha a maara dị ka kubobeeza
A pụrụ iji kọfị ma ọ bụ tii mee Mugoyo maka na ụtụtụ
Otu ga-ekpuchi ya na obogwu ma sie ya nwa oge na stove omenala Kiganda a maara dị ka ekyoto
Muhammad bu onye bidoro Áláküba
Muhammad Bala Shagari (amụrụ na n'ubọchị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Maachị afọ 1949) bụ onye isi ndị agha lara ezumike nka na Onye-isi-ọchịchị nke mpaghara gọọmentị obodo Shagari na Sokoto Steeti, Naijiria
O ji aha ọdịnala bụ Sarkin Mafara nke Shagari
Shagari bụ ọkpara onye isi ala gara aga bụ Shehu Shagari nke nwunye ya bụ Hajiya Amina mụrụ
Amuru ya na obodo Shagari na Sokoto Steeti n’afo 1949
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu bụ Barewa kọleji, Zaria wee gaa Ụlọ mmụta Nchebe Naịjirịa n'afọ 1975 ebe ọ bụ onye otu mgbe n'ezie nke iri na asatọ

Mgbe agha nke ọnwa Decemba nke afọ 1983 na Naijiria nke General Muhammadu Buhari duziri nke wepụrụ nna ya, ejidere ya obere oge ma mesịa jiri ike laa ya ezumike nká site na ndị agha Naijiria na-enweghị mmejọ na ọkwa nke Captain
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ ndị agha n'afọ 1984, Muhammad Bala Shagari guzobere Shag Náijiria Limited, ma mechaa chọpụta Ụlo ọrụ Hamadah Shipping ya na Alhaji Aliko Dangote na Sen
Usman Albishir, tinyere ndị ọzọ, n'afọ 1989
Ọ bụ onyeisi oche nke Ụlo ọrụ Hamadah Shipping n'oge ahụ
Tupu Mba Naijiria nke atọ, ọ bụ onye otu ọgbakọ omebe iwu na-anọchite anya mpaghara Yabo, nke gụnyere gọọmentị obodo Yabo, Shagari na Tambuwal n'afọ 1988
Agbanyeghị naMba Naijiria nke atọ abịaghị na mmezu n'ihi nkagbu nke ntuli aka onye isi ala nke Naijiria n'afọ 1993
Emechara, họpụta ya dịka onye ntụzi-aka nke Nkwenye ndị ọrụ ugbo Naijiria na ụlọ akụ mmepe ime obodo (NACB) n'afọ 1993
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke mbadamba eletrik Ime obodo nke Sokoto Steeti na kansụl nke egwuregwu na Sokoto Steeti n'okpuru ọchịchị ndị agha gawa n'ihu na Steeti
n'afọ 1997, mgbe Shagari mechara bụrụ Gọọmenti Obodo, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye Isi nchịkwa mpaghara nke Shagari site n’aka Sultan Muhammadu Maccido
N’afọ 2009, ọ bụrụ onye otu Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ikpe na Federal Capital Territory
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye otu ndị nlekọta nke PZ Cusons Foundation, onye otu ego ntụkwasị obi nke mmụta na Sokoto steeti, na onye otu otu ndị gọvanọ nke Aduvie International Schools
Muhammad Bala Shagari lụrụ nwanyị ma nwee ụmụ asatọ
Otu n’ime ha bụ onye ndu ndị ntorobịa bụ Bello Bala Shagari
Ya onwe ya bu ọkpara nwa onye isi ala Shehu Shagari
Mallam Shagari bụ onye egwuregwu Polo na-anụ ọkụ n’obi na otu onye isi otu egwuregwu Polo nke Zaria
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke Iko Georgian ama ama nke otu Polo nke Kaduna
Dịka onye hụrụ egwuregwu n'anya, ọ na-egwuri egwu ise, ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Fives Federation na Naijiria
Muhammad Ben Ali ar-Ribati (1861 - 1939) bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-ese ihe na Morocco
Dị ka aha nna ya na-egosi, a mụrụ Ribati na Rabat na 1861
Otú ọ dị, ọ nọ na Tangier, ebe - ọ bụ ezie na ọ nweghị ọzụzụ ọ bụla - ndị na-ese ihe na Europe na-akwado ya, na ebe ọ nwere ohere ịnweta ihe eji agba mmiri
Na 1903, Ribati ghọrọ onye na-esi nri maka onye Ireland na-ese ihe bụ Sir John Lavery, onye mbụ biri na Morocco na 1890
Lavery chọpụtara na Ribati bụ onye na-ese mmiri
Ihe ngosi mbụ nke Ribati bụ na Goupil Gallery na London na 1916
Ihe ngosi nke abụọ ya bụ na Marseille, France, na 1919, nke atọ ya bụ na Mamounia hotel na Marrakesh na 1922
Ribati họọrọ mmiri na mpempe akwụkwọ dị ka ihe ọ ga-eji ese ihe karịa mmanụ na akwa
Ọ na-ese Tangier, qasba ya, na ndị bi na ya
Ọ na-ese ihe osise mmadụ dị mfe, ma na-esekarị nnukwu ihe nkiri mara mma na ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ
Ọ na-etinye aka na eserese ya n'asụsụ Arabic
Muhammadu Buhari bu onye isi na achi obodo Naijiria
Obatara n'ochichi na afo 2015
Tupu obata n'ochichi, Buhari bu onye ochi aha na Ami Naijiria
Ochi kwara obodo Naijiria site na Disemba 1983 rue Ogoost 1985 mgbe onye ami oso anakpo Ibrahim Babangida chupuru ya n'okwa
Buhari doro ndoro ochichi n'afo 2003, 2007, and 2011 na okara ndi All Progressive Congress tupu ozota okwa n'afo 2015 oge omeriri Goodluck Jonathan nke pati

Muhammadu Dikko Yusufu A makwaara dị ka MD Yusufu ma ọ bụ MD Yusuf (Ụbọchị iri nke ọnwa Novemba, afọ 1931 - ụbọchị mbụ nke ọnwa April afọ 2015) bụ onye uwe ojii Naijiria, Onye isi nyocha nke Ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa , onye na-ejere ọha ozi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Yusufu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu na Ụlọ akwụkwọ Nchịkwa, Zaria n'afọ 1954 na Mahadum Oxford ebe a zụrụ ya dịka onye isi nchịkwa
Yusufu malitere ọrụ na Ụlọ ọrụ Ikike nwa-afọ Katsina na-eje ozi dị ka onye enyemaka Onyeisi mpaghara na mpaghara Ilorin site n'afọ 1949 ruo afọ 1954
Yusufu rigoro n'ọkwa onye isi nyocha ndị uweojii na Naịjirịa, ọkwa ọ nọrọ site n'afọ 1975 rue afọ 1979 n'oge ọchịchị ndị ọchịagha General Murtala Mohammed na Olusegun Obasanjo
A họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Ụlọ ọrụ ikuku mmanụ ala emere ka ọ ghọrọ mmiri nke Naịjirịa (NLNG) n'afọ 1994

N'afọ 1998, o debara aha ya maka Ije ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na ikpe ziri ezi dịka otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị N'afọ 1999 na 2003, ọ dọrọ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka onye isi ala na ndoro ndoro ochichi n'okpuru otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya

Na ntuli aka ndi ochichi obodo nke ọnwa Desemba afọ 1998, otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị a biara nke ano wee merie oche ndi Kansụl iri abuo n'otu nke mba na onye isi oche nke Warri na Delta Steeti, Hadejia na Jigawa Steeti na Bama na Borno
Yusufu bụ onye isi oche nke LNG Naịjirịa n'afọ 1994, mgbe ndị ọrụ nke otu KBR n'okpuru ụlọ ọrụ Halliburton na-arịọ maka nkwekọrịta iji wuo ụlọ mbupụ LNG na asọmpi ha na ụlọ ọrụ US Bechtel

N'akwụkwọ ozi e degaara Yusufu n'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 1994, Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mmanụ ala Don Etiebet kwuru na ndị NLNG 'etinyela ezigbo nkasi obi n'iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe nke onyinye nkwekọrịta a na-echere'
O lere anya na e nweela mgbe e mebiri izu nzuzo, nke ahụ nwere ike ịbara ndị na-elekọta KBR uru
N’oge a na-enyocha nyocha gbasara ebubo inara aka azụ KBR, onye ndụmọdụ bi na London, Maazị Jeffrey Tesler kwuru na ya enyela Muhammadu Dikko Yusufu ụfọdụ ego n'ụdị nke ikwughachi ụgwọ
Ego a gbapụtara $ puku ir asaa mgbe Yusufu gara London n'afọ 1998 ma ọ bụ afọ 1999
Agbalịrị ime ka onye isi ala US Dick Cheney tinye aka na mkparị nrụrụ aka, nke gụnyere ihe karịrị $ nde Otu narị na iri asatọ nke aka azụ na nnọchite nke ụlọ ọrụ nke Halliburton duziri
Ọ sonyeere Kansụl mba Naịjirịa na Cameroon(NCNC) n'afọ 1950, yana Otu ọganihu nke ndị ugwu (NEPU) n'afo 1951, mana ọ hapụrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ banyere na Ije ozi mpaghara ugwu
Na mba nke abụọ mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká site na ndị uwe ojii ọ ghọrọ onye otu People's Redemption Party

Yusufu gosipụtara mmasị ịzọ ọkwa ntuli aka nke Onye isi ala n'okpuru Grassroots Democratic Movement na Naịjirịa n'oge mgbanwe gaa ochichi onye kwuo uche ya nke General Sani Abacha kwalitere n'afọ 1997-1998
Otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nwere nghazi aka ekpe
N'afọ 2000, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Arewa Consultative Forum, otu nzukọ ọdịnala na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndu ugwu

Mgbe e mechara ntuli aka ọnwa Eprel nke afọ 2003, ma Muhammadu Buhari nke ANPP na Yusufu, onye zọrọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Movement for Democracy and Justice (MDJ), kwụ jọrọ mmeri ntuli aka nke President Obasanjo
Ka osila dị, n'onwa June nke afọ 2003, Yusufu kwuru na ndị e meriri na ntuli aka bụ ndị adịghị njikere ịla ụlọ ikpe kwesịrị ịnabata mmeri ha n'ezi okwukwe

N’ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ 2003, Yusufu kwuru na enyemaka onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo nyere onyeisiala Liberia a chụpụrụ, Charles Taylor enweghị ike ịgbachitere ya site na ikpe nkwụmọtọ ma ọ bụ nke na-enweghị isi, ya mere na a ga-achụpụ ya
MD Yusufu nwụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2015 na Abuja
Moharam Fouad nke a makwaara dịka Muharram Fouad (24 June 1934 - 27 June 2002) bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Egypt
A mụrụ Moharam Fouad na 24th nke June afọ 1934 na Cairo, Egypt
Mmalite Moharam na ihuenyo bịara n'afọ 1959 na ihe nkiri Hassan na Nayima, akụkọ ịhụnanya ndị Ijipt na Soad Hosny
'Moharam nwere àgwà pụrụ iche, ụtọ pụrụ iche ma lụọ ọgụ n'ọrụ ịbụ abụ n'enweghị iṅomi ndị ọzọ na-agụ egwú nke oge ya, 'ka Tarek Shinawy, onye nkatọ ihe nkiri a ma ama kwuru
N'oge ndụ ya niile, ọ bụrụ abụ karịrị 900, 20 n'ime ha na-eto Palestine
Otu n'ime abụ ya - nke a na-akpọ Rimsh Enoh (His Eye Lashes) - nwetara ndị na-akwado ya site na gburugburu ụwa
O nwere nsogbu ụfọdụ n'obi ma ọ ghaghị ịga Europe ka a gwọọ ya, agbanyeghị nsogbu ndị nwere akụrụ ya kpatara nsogbu na-aga n'ihu
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 27 ọnwa June áfọ 2002 na-ahapụ ebe ahụ n'efu maka ndị hụrụ ya n'anya
Moharam nwere ụmụnne nwoke anọ na ụmụnne nwanyị anọ
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ site na afọ 4 mgbe a họpụtara ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ya ka ọ bụrụ abụ n'onwe ya n'ihu Eze Farouk
Moharam lụrụ ọtụtụ di ma nwee naanị otu nwa nwoke, Tarek
Nwa nwa ya bụ onye na-agụ egwu Belgium bụ Tamino
Muher (Muxar) bụ asụsụ Semitic Etiopia nke otu Gurage
A na-asụ ya n'ugwu ugwu Cheha na Ezhana Wolene dị na Etiopia
Asụsụ ahụ nwere olumba abụọ, nke akpọrọ aha aha onye mbụ bụ 'M' ha na-eji Ana na-eji əni/anä, Adi na-eji adi/ädi (dị ka asụsụ Soddo yiri ya)
Muideen bụ aha nwoke Naijiria nyere aha
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Muizat Ajoke Odumosu (amụrụ 27 Ọktoba n'afọ 1987 na Lagos ) bụ ònye na-eme egwuregwu egwu na ama ama Naịjirịa bụ ọkachamara n'agba ọsọ mita 400 na ihe mgbochi 400
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi olimpik n'afọ 2008 na 2012 wee zọọ asọmpi n'asọmpi egwuregwu ụwa n'afọ 2007,na 2009, 2011 na 2013
Ọ bụ onyeka nwetara ihe nrite ọla n'asọmpi Africa niile nke 2007 wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ onye mmeri kọntinent jiri mmeri n'afọ 2008 na 2012 nke Africa
N'afọ 2010, ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe mgbochi 400 mita na asọmpi Commonwealth, ma bụrụ onye gbara ọsọ na asọmpi Africa ma nwetakwa nrite ọlaọcha maka Africa na asọmpi Continental
Ọ ka jikwa ndekọ Naịjirịa na narị anọ m ihe mgbochi, ka emechara ka ọ dị mma na 5440 Sekọnd n'ime asọmpi Olympic nke London n'afọ 2012
Amụrụ na Lagos, Odumosu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Toybat tupu ọ kwaga United States ịgụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum South Alabama
Na Mahadum South Alabama, Odumosu nọchitere anya otu kọleji South Alabama Jaguars, ọ bụ 400 m Onye mmeri ogbako Sun Belt na 2004 mana agbagharala ọtụtụ oge 2004–05 n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
N'afọ 2006, ọ ghọrọ onye 400 nke ime ụlọ m Sun Belt onye mmeri wee were sprint na ihe mgbochi okpukpu abụọ na nzukọ dị n'èzí
Ọ rutere NCAA Championship n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ, mana a chụpụrụ ya n'ihi ịkụ aka n'ihe mgbochi
Ọ kwalitere ndekọ nke onwe ya ruo 5537 sekọnd iji merie na Drake Relays na 2007 - akara na-eduga n'ụwa n'oge ahụ
Odumosu nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na mba ụwa na nke mbụ ya n'August n'afọ
2006, na-ekere òkè na asọmpi ndị ntorobịa ụwa

Ọ gụchara nke ise na narị anọ m hurdles ikpeazụ mana jisiri ike nyere ndị otu egwuregwu ịgba ọsọ mita 4 × 400 nke ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria aka (gụnyere Folashade Abugan, Joy Eze na Sekinat Adesanyato ) ihe nrite ọlaọcha, na-esetịpụ ndekọ ọhụrụ nke obere ndị Africa nke 3 3084 maka mmemme ahụ
Ọ malitere ịsọ asọmpi n'afọ 2007 wee nweta ihe nrite ọla nchara n'egwuregwu 2007 All-African na Algiers na Julaị
Na 2007 World Championship (ọsọ asọmpi mbụ ya) ọ gbara na 400 m ihe mgbochi, mana a kpochapụrụ ya n'oge okpomọkụ
O jiri ihe nrite ọla edo rute n'ọkwa n'ọkwa kọntinent n'asọmpị Afrịka nke afọ 2008, wee nweta ihe mgbochi na 5592 sekọnd
Ọ pụtara n'egwuregwu Olympic mbụ ya n'August 2008, na-agba ọsọ ọsọ mita 400 na Beijing
O setịpụrụ ihe kacha mma 5139 Sekọnd iji nwee ọganihu site na okpomọkụ, mana a kpochapụrụ ya na ọkara nke ikpeazụ
Ọ gbara ọsọ na mita 4×400 wee ruo n'ikpeazụ ebe ndị Naijiria gbagoro n'ọkwa nke asaa
N'afọ 2009 World Championship, ọ ruru 400 m na-egbochi ọkara ikpeazụ ma bụrụkwa nke isii n'ozuzu ya na otu mgbagharị ụmụ nwanyị
O debere ndekọ nzuko na Ponce Grand Prix, ebe o meriri na 5502 sekọnd
Odumosu debere ndekọ Naijiria na nzukọ Herculis na Julaị n'afọ 2010, na-agba ọsọ 5468 sekọnd nke ise n'ime ihe mgbochi
Ọ laghachiri iji gbachitere aha ihe mgbochi ya na asọmpi Africa n'afọ 2010, mana ọ ga-enwe afọ ojuju na nrite ọlaọcha n'azụ Hayat Lambarki
Ọ ka ruru n'elu podium na asọmpi, Otú ọ dị, ka ọ na-enyere 4×400 aka m relay otu na ndekọ asọmpi nke 3 2926
Tinyere Lambarki, a họpụtara Odumosu ka ọ nọchite anya otu ndị Africa na narị anọ m nwere ihe mgbochi n'afọ 2010 IAAF Continental Cup
Ọ kwalitere ndekọ mba ya ruo 5459 Sekọnd na asọmpi ahụ wee nweta nrite ọla ọcha n'azụ Nickiesha Wilson nke Jamaica, na-agba ọsọ maka America
Na 10 October n'afọ 2010 Odomosu nwetara nrite ọla edo na ihe mgbochi 400m na asọmpi Commonwealth na Delhi
Àtụ Footer Commonwealth Champions 400m Hurdles WomenÀtụ Footer All-Africa Champions 400 m Hurdles WomenÀtụ Footer African Champions women's 400 metres hurdles
Mujuru bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Mukarama Abdulai (amụrụ n'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2002) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba maka Deportivo Alavés Gloriosas, Black Maidens na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana
Na ngwụcha afọ 2018, Abdulai nwetara nnabata na Mahadum maka Ọmụmụ Mmepe (UDS) wee sonye n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ

N'oge mbipụta nke asatọ nke Ghana University Sports Association (GUSA) obere egwuregwu na 2019, ọ duuru ndị otu ahụ merie asọmpi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na-agba goolu atọ iji merie onye kacha gbaa goolu na onye kachasị mma nke asọmpi ahụ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ na Tyler Junior College na Texas, USA, ka ọ na-achụso ọrụ bọọlụ ya

N'oge oge izizi ya maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Tyler Junior College, ọ gbara goolu iri abụọ na asaa ma nyere aka iri na atọ iji nyere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri 2019 NJCAA Gulf South District Championship na NJCAA Women's Soccer Championship, gụnyere ihe mgbochi na nke ikpeazụ
Mgbe o dekọrọ ihe atọ na-aga n'ihu iji mechie asọmpi ahụ, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye egwuregwu kachasị mma nke asọmpi ahụ

N'oge nke abụọ ya, ọ gbara goolu iri abụọ na atọ ma nyere aka iri iji nyere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri 2020 NJCAA Gulf South District Championship na NJCAA Women's Soccer Championship maka afọ nke abụọ n'usoro
N'egwuregwu ikpeazụ, o nyere akara ka Tyler College meriri Salt Lake (Utah) n'egwuregwu mmechi nke oge ahụ iji mezue mkpọsa ahụ na ndekọ 180
Ọ kwụsịrị asọmpi ahụ dị ka onye kacha gbaa bọọlụ, onye na-eduzi ihe, a na-ekwukwa na ọ bụ onye egwuregwu kacha baa uru
Abdulai sonyeere ndị otu Ghana Premier League Northern Ladies FC na 2011 mgbe ọ dị afọ 9
N'oge afọ 2020 nke afọ 21, n'ụbọchị egwuregwu nke mbụ, o nyere hat-trick na mmeri ha meriri Ashtown Ladies na 17 Jenụwarị 2021
Ọ gbara goolu abụọ na ọkara mbụ na otu na ọkara nke abụọ iji mechie mmeri mbụ maka klọb ahụ
Na 16 Julaị 2021, Deportivo Alavés Gloriosas, kwupụtara na ha abanyela na Abdulai na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ ma kpebie ịnọ na klọb ahụ ruo 2023
Ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu Ghana n'oge 2018 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup na Uruguay, ebe ọ meriri Golden Boot maka asọmpi ya kachasị mma asaa na enyemaka abụọ
O nyere hat-trick na egwuregwu mbụ ya na mba na-anabata ya
Na mgbakwunye, ọ meriri Bronze Ball
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na ndị otu ahụ, SWAG kpebiri na ọ bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 2018, na-eti Grace Asantewaa na Faustina Ampah ihe nrite ahụ
A kpọrọ Abdulai ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị okenye n'ihu 2019 WAFU Zone B Women's Cup
O mere nke mbụ ya n'egwuregwu mbụ nke asọmpi ahụ megide Senegal ma gbaa goolu iji nyere Ghana aka inweta mmeri 2o0
A kpọrọ ya aha n'akụkụ Ghana U20 ma mee ya onye isi n'ihu egwuregwu enyi na enyi abụọ megide Morocco na Nọvemba 2020
O mere nke mbụ ya n'egwuregwu mbụ ya na 23 Nọvemba 2020 na Ghana na-enwe mmeri 1 0 , mana n'egwú nke abụọ na 30 Nọvember, ọ gbara bọọlụ iji nyere Ghana aka imeri site na 4 0
Mulalo Doyoyo FRSA (amụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1970) bụ onye injinia South Africa, onye mepụtara ihe, na prọfesọ
Doyoyo bụ onye nchọpụta na applied mechanics, ultralight materials, green building, renewable energy, na ngalaba ndị ọzọ nke injinia
Ọ kụziri ihe n'ihe ọmụmụ injinia dị iche iche gụnyere injinia oké osimiri, injinia obodo na gburugburu ebe obibi, na injinia igwe
Doyoyo mepụtara ihe na-enweghị simenti, Cenocell, na Amoriguard
A mụrụ Mulalo Doyoyo na William Edie Hospital na Tshidimbini Venda na Khorommbi Doyoyoyo na Mudzuli (née Dzaga) nke obodo Vondwe
Venda bụ bantustan dị n'ebe ugwu South Africa n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma bụrụzi akụkụ nke Limpopo Province
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Vondwe Ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị dị ala n'afọ 1977 wee gaa Tshidimbini Nke ka elu Ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na 1981
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Tshidimbini na 1984 ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ruo n'afọ 1985
N'afọ 1986, o debara aha ya na Mbilwi Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
E mechara họpụta ya dị ka onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, na-abanye na 1988
Ọ họọrọ ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Cape Town
E debara aha ya na mahadum na mmemme injinia afọ ise, nke e mere n'oge ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ bantu
Ọ biri na Smuts Hall, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi na sayensị na injinia, mesịa bụrụ onye isi nkuzi

Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ nke kansụl injinia ụmụ akwụkwọ, onye nnọchi anya ụmụ akwụkwọ nke South African Ụlọ ọrụ Ndị Injinia Aerospace, na onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ụmụ akwụkwọ aerospace na ngalaba injinia na gburugburu ebe obibi
Thesis nsọpụrụ nke Doyoyo bụ na imepụta na iwu nke ngwá ọrụ igwe iji nyochaa brelling ụgha nke ibu ọrụ dị arọ na motors eletrik
O nwetara nzere masta na solid mechanics na applied mathematics na 1995 na 1996, n'otu n'otu
Nnyocha doctoral ya dabeere na ngalaba nke ballistics na-elekwasị anya na imepụta ihe agha dị arọ
Ọ gbachitere thesis doctoral ya na injinia n'afọ 1999
Isiokwu edemede ya bụ, 'Nnyocha nnwale nke subsonic penetration in silica glasses and ceramics'
O jiri physics nke ihe ndị dị n'ime ya kọwaa omume nke iberibe na ịkọ ọdịdị mmetụta nke mgbọ dị ka ọrụ nke ọsọ ọsọ

N'ịhụ omume na-adịghị mma site na nchọpụta nnwale, o tinyere echiche nke mgbagwoju anya dị iche iche iji kpughee ma kọwaa ọrụ nke mmụba nke oke oke n'oge ọdịda nke ihe ndị na-emebi emebi n'okpuru mkpakọ dị ike
N'afọ 1999, ọ natara ọkwa onye nyocha postdoctoral site na Massachusetts Institute of Technology iji bulie ọmụmụ ya na applied mechanics
Doyoyo na ndị nchọpụta na Joint MIT-Industry Consortium on Ultralight Metal Body Structures, Cambridge-MIT Institute, na Next Generation Vehicles Initiative rụkọtara ọrụ
O mere nnwale na ụlọ nyocha mmetụta na crashworthiness na cellular solids gụnyere metallic foams na honeycombs
[citation needed]
Ihe ịma aka ahụ bụ iji usoro nnwale ọhụrụ, ihe atụ, na ngwaọrụ iji nwalee ihe siri ike dị nro n'okpuru oke oke ihe mberede, iji mepụta ihe omume mgbagwoju anya
Ọ mepụtara ihe atụ dị ka trapezoid iji wepụ mmekọrịta nrụgide na-emetụta mpaghara maka ụfụfụ metal ka etinye ya na koodu nyocha nke ihe (FEA)

Maka nhazi nke ihe mejupụtara na ọdịda ọdịda n'elu, ọ mepụtara ihe atụ dị ka urukurubụba, ma gbanwee ngwaọrụ Arcan, na-enweta usoro maka ikpebi shear na compressive ma ọ bụ tensile stresses na ngalaba nnwale nke ihe atụ ahụ
N'ihi ihe isi ike nke ijikwa ụdị urukurubụba ahụ, ọ mepụtara Ngwá Nnyocha Biaxial Universal nke nwere geometry gbanwere
Ọ hapụrụ MIT n'afọ 2004 ka ọ gaa kụzie na ụlọ akwụkwọ nke injinia obodo na gburugburu ebe obibi na Georgia Institute of Technology (Georgia Tech)
O mepụtara ụlọ nyocha nke usoro ultralight nke a raara nye nyocha nnwale na ihe ultralight
[citation needed]

N'itinye ntọala na echiche efere nke usoro ihe owuwu, o gosipụtara na dị ka ihe na-eme ka ihe sie ike n'ime, usoro truss nwere ikike ibelata ịdị arọ nke arịa nrụgide site na ibelata ọkpụrụkpụ akpụkpọ ahụ ya ka ọ na-emeziwanye ike ọkpụkpụ ya
Nke a dugara na nchọpụta nke microtruss pressure vessels
Ihe ndị a na-eme ka nrụgide na-anabata ọdịdị ndị na-abụghị gburugburu nke na-akpata nchekwa dị ukwuu, ebe ọkwọ ụgbọala, na ohere ụlọ maka ụgbọ ala hydrogen
N'ime mgbalị iji mepụta usoro nchekwa ike maka nnukwu ọdịnala na ihe na-agbanwe agbanwe, ọ malitere imekọ ihe ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọkụ eletrik
Dị ka otu n'ime nsonaazụ nke mmekorita a, ọ mepụtara Cenocell, ihe yiri ihe nkedo nke dabeere na ntụ na-efe efe na-enweghị mgbakwunye nke Portland cement
Fly ash bụ ihe na-emetọ ihe nke ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik, mmepụta simenti, imepụta akwụkwọ, na ọrụ igwu ala
Cenocell microstructure yiri nke nkume na-echekwa gas
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2006, ọ malitere inwe mmasị n'ime nnyocha na-agbaso usoro nhazi na mmepe nke ala nna ya (RDP)
Ọ malitere iso ụmụ akwụkwọ ya gụsịrị akwụkwọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na ike na-agbanwe agbanwe
N'agbata afọ 2007 na afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya dị ka prọfesọ pụrụ iche ma mesịa bụrụ onye na-eleta oche nyocha na ihe ọhụrụ na Mahadum Nkà na ụzụ Tshwane
Nke a nyere ya ohere iso ndị nchọpụta mpaghara na RDP rụkọọ ọrụ
Njikọ a kpaliri ya ịmepụta Retecza (ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ na-akpali akpali)
N'oge e bidoro ya na South Africa n'afọ 2008, nzukọ ahụ nabatara ndị na-eme nchọpụta na ndị na-emepụta ihe site na gburugburu ụwa
Otu n'ime nsonaazụ nke Retecza bụ imepụta na iwu ọgba tum tum hydrogen aha ya bụ 'Ahifambeni'
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Georgia Tech, ọ kwagara Midrand, Johannesburg, ebe o mepụtara ụlọ nyocha maka kemịkal na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi
Kemgbe a tọrọ ntọala ya na 2012, ụlọ nyocha ahụ emepụtala ọtụtụ ihe
Ọ kụzikwaara injinia igwe n'oge dị mkpirikpi na Mahadum JohannesburgSasol Chemcity ghọtara ọrụ ụlọ nyocha Midrand ma nye ego site na mmemme ya maka obere ụlọ ọrụ na nke etiti
Na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị na-emepụta ihe na ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-egwupụta ihe, ọ mepụtara 'akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ' Solunexz na Glunexz maka uzuzu coal, ihe owuwu, na icheku ọkụ
Site na nkwado na-aga n'ihu site na Sasol, ọ mepụtara Amoriguard, ihe na-adịghị emebi emebi na mkpuchi mkpuchi nke dabeere na tailings na ihe mkpofu ụlọ ọrụ
Amoriguard enwetala asambodo Agrément
N'afọ 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ịsacha ụlọ mposi ndị na-eji anyanwụ eme ihe nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka obere ụlọ ọrụ na-edozi ihe mkpofu
A na-etinye teknụzụ a dabere na nanofiltration na anaerobic digestion n'ọrụ n'ebe mmiri na ịdị ọcha dị ụkọ
N'afọ 2016, mgbe ọ na-emepụta brik acid, Doyoyo mepụtara ma rụpụta brik Ecocast na-eme igwe na-echekwa mmiri na ike, mgbe ọ na'ime ka ọ na-agbanwe maka obodo ndị na-abụghị nke netwọk
Mulder bụ aha nna nke nwere mmalite abụọ Dutch na German
Ọ nwere ike ịbụ aha ọrụ asụsụ nke obodo Dutch
Ọ bụ okwu Dutch ochie maka 'miller' (Dutch nke oge a molenaar)
Na mmadụ 38,207 na Netherlands aha ya bụ Mulder, ọ bụ aha nke iri na abụọ a na-ahụkarị n'ebe ahụ na 2007
Na Belgium ụdị De Mulder ('onye na-egwe ihe') bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị
Aha nna Mulder bụkwa aha ọrụ sitere na German, nke pụtara 'onye na-eme efere osisi', site na Middle High German mulde 'efere', 'oghere', ma ọ bụ 'tube' + onye nnọchi anya -er
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere ndia
Ayo Hulayat Omidiran, a muru ya na onwa November nke iri, na afor 1965
O so na ndi ndoro ndoro ochichi, ndi eme iwu nke Nigeria
O na anochite anya ndi Ayedaade/Irewole/ Isokan federal constituenci na Osun State
O bu onye otu All Progressive Congress
o si na obodo Ikire di niime local government Ireole na Osun steeti
born 10th of November 1965, is a Nigerian politician and federal law maker representing the Ayedaade/Irewole/Isokan federal constituency in Osun State
She is a member of the All Progressive Congress
She is a native of Ikire in the Irewole local government area of Osun State
Nwada gara ulo akwukwo Ayedaada Gramma skulu di na Osun Steeti
Ebe a hu ka onwetere adambodo nke oyibo kporo West Africa School Certificate na aho 1980
O gakwara n'iru gakwa mahadum Ahmadu Bello di na Zaria, kaduna Nigeria ebe onwetere nzere Bsc na Biochemistry na afo 1985
O zoro ndoro ndoro ochichi Na ulo omi iwu nke ala na anochite anya ndi Ayedaade/Irewole/Isokan constituency na afor 2011 ma merie, o zokwara ndoro ndoro ochichi a ozo site na otu ndi Apc

Ahoputakwara ya ozoAPC nwada a, a ruola na ogo oru di iche iche na Ulo omi iwu tinyekwara osote onye isi, ndi otu na ahu maka ndi egwuregeu, ndi otu na ahu maka ikowa iwu obodo, otu na ahu maka nzikorita ozi, ndozi ime obodo, ihe ngwupute nke ala, ihe gbasara umu nwanyi, ya na ihe gbasara umu nwanyi na ochi ochit
Na afor 2002, o biara buru onye otu ndi nzuko na ahu maka egwuregwu boolu nke Nigeria
became a member of the Nigerian Football Association Board, and remained there till 2005
Ke mgbe afor 2006, Obu onye otu nzuko na ahu maka unu nwanyi no ne egwuregwu boolu FIFA O bu onye isi bidoro otu egwregwu umu nwanyi na Oshogbo, Osun steeti a kporo Omidiran Babe
na afor 2017 , e mere ya onye isi na ahu maka umunwanyi no na egeregwu boolu NigeNigeria Football Federation (NFF) Women Football Committee
Mulikat Adeola Akande (amụrụ 11 November 1960) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Nigerian na onye chọrọ ibụ onye omeiwu
A hoputara ya n’ime ulo ndi nnochite anya n’elu ikpo okwu nke ndi People's Democratic Party (PDP) nke nochitere anya Ogbomoso North, South na Orire Constituency n’afọ 2007 ma họpụtagharia ya na 2011
A mụrụ Mulikat Adeola na November 11, 1960 na Kaduna nke dị n'ebe ugwu nke Nigeria site n'aka Alhaji na Alhaja, Akande bụ ndị nwụrụ anwụ, ma bụrụ akụkụ nke ezinụlọ Jokodolu
Kpọpụta njehie Invalid tag; refs with no name must have content Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị St
Annes na Queen Amina College dị na Kaduna
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara kọleji nke Arts na Science na Zaria maka ọkwa ya wee mesịa gaa Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, (ABU) na 1979, ebe ọ gụrụ Iwu wee nweta LLB ya na 1982 na ngalaba nke abụọ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Iwu nke Nigeria ma kpọọ ya bar na 1983
O mechara gaa Mahadum nke Lagos maka nzere nke abụọ na Iwu (Masters of Law) na 1985
Muliro bụ aha nna Afrịka
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Mulugeta (Amharic ሙሉጌታ) bụ aha nwoke sitere na Etiopia nke nwere ike na-ezo aka na

Mulukhiyah, molokheyya, molokhia ma ọ bụ mulukhiyyah (Arabic ملوخية, mulūkhiyyah) bụ akwụkwọ nke Corchorus olitorius, nke a maara na Bekee dị ka denje'c'jute, nalta jute, tossa jute, jute mallow ma ọ bụ Jew's Mallow
A na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka akwụkwọ nri ma na-ewu ewu na Middle East, ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka, ọdịda anyanwụ Africa na mba ndị dị na Ndida Afrika ma a na-akpọ ya na Philippines
Mulukhiyah na-esi ísì ụtọ, mgbe a na-esi ya esi, mmiri ahụ na-esi na ya apụta bụ broth siri ike, nke na-esi n'ahụ nke ukwuu; a na-akọwakarị ya dị ka 'slimy', kama dị ka okra siri esi
A na-eri Mulukhiyah mgbe e siri ya, ọ bụghị mgbe a na-esighị ya esi, a na-agbanwe ya ka ọ bụrụ ụdị ofe ma ọ bụ ofe, nke na-enwekarị otu aha ahụ dị ka akwụkwọ nri n'asụsụ obodo
Dị ka omenala si dị, a na-esi mulukhiyah na ọkụkọ ma ọ bụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala anụ ọkụkọ maka ụtọ ma na-enye ya osikapa ọcha, tinyere lemon ma ọ bụ lime
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta na-eche na mmalite mulukhiyah dị na obodo Ijipt oge ochie, enwere ihe akaebe na India bụ isi iyi nke ụdị Corchorus capsularis, nke a na-ejikwa maka nri yana eriri
Mulukhiyah bụ nri a ma ama n'ụwa ndị Arab oge ochie
A kpọtụrụ usoro nri maka otu esi akwadebe ya aha na narị afọ nke iri na anọ nke Arabic akwụkwọ Kanz al-Fawa'id fi Tanwi' al-Mawa'id
Dị ka ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Ijipt al-Maqrizi (d
1442), mulukhiyah bụ nri kachasị amasị caliph Muawiyah ibn Abi Sufyan (r
661ş680) onye guzobere Caliphate Umayyad
Ọzọkwa, na 7th nke Muharram n'afọ 395 AH (1005 AD) onye ọchịchị Fatimid nke Ijipt al-Hakim bi Amr Allah (r
996ī1021) nyere iwu nke machibidoro ndị ọ na-achị iri mulukhiyah, nke a chere na ọ bụ aphrodisiac
Otú ọ dị, onye nọchiri ya bụ caliph al-Zahir (r
1021X1035) nyere ohere iri mulukhiya ọzọ
Ndị Druze, ndị na-akwanyere Al-Hakim ùgwù dị elu ma nye ya ikike dị ka nke chi, na-aga n'ihu na-akwanye mmachibido iwu ahụ ùgwù, ma ghara iri Mulukhiyah nke ụdị ọ bụla ruo taa
Dị ka a na-eji ya eme ihe na nri ndị Ijipt, a na-akwadebe molokhiya (Egyptian Arabic pronunciation ) site n'iwepụ ọkpụkpụ etiti n'akwụkwọ, wee jiri galik na coriander bepụ akwụkwọ ya nke ọma
Nri ahụ na-agụnyekarị ụdị anụ ụfọdụ; n'Ijipt nke a na-abụkarị ọkụkọ ma ọ bụ ewi, mana a na-ahọrọ nwa atụrụ mgbe ọ dị, ọkachasị na Cairo
Ndị na-esi nri na Alexandria na-ahọrọkarị iji shrimp na ofe, ebe Port Said bụ nke a ma ama maka iji azụ
A na-eri Molokhiya na nri ndị Ijipt oge ochie, ebe a na-eche na aha 'molokhiya' malitere
Ọtụtụ ndị Ijipt na-ewere molokhiya dị ka nri mba Ijipt, tinyere medames zuru ezu na kushari
Ụdị ndị Ijipt nke ịkwadebe molokhiya dị iche, ma dị iche na ụdị Levantine
A na-ewepụ akwụkwọ molokhiya site na ogwe osisi, nwere alaka osisi dị elu
A na-etinye ha n'elu nnukwu mpempe akwụkwọ (ihe ákwà) ka a hapụ ha ka ha kpọọ kpamkpam maka iji ha mee ihe mgbe e mesịrị
Mgbe akpịrịchara, a na-egbutu akwụkwọ ya nke ọma, na-ejikarị mezzaluna
A na-esi akwụkwọ ya n'ime broth; ọ bụrụ na a na-eji anụ ma ọ bụ nri mmiri eme ihe, a na-agbakwunye ya n'oge a, ọ pụkwara ịbụ ọkpụkpụ ma ọ bụ ọkpụkpụ
A na-esi Coriander na galik n'otu n'otu na ghee ma ọ bụ mmanụ iji mee 'ta'leyya' (, n'ụzọ nkịtị 'ihe a na-esi esi' ma ọ bụ ' a siri esi'), wee tinye ya na ofe na njedebe mgbe ta'leyya ka na-esi ísì
A na-enye ofe ahụ na osikapa ọcha ma ọ bụ na akụkụ nke achịcha dị larịị nke Ijipt (ʿeish baladi)
A na-ejikarị ụdị akwụkwọ nri dị iche iche, nke a maara dị ka mekhallel ma ọ bụ torshi n'Ijipt, na-ejikọta nri ahụ
Tomato sauce, vinegar, na ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ nwekwara ike ịdị
A na-akwadobe nri molokhia dị na Levant site na isi anụ nke ụdị ụfọdụ n'ime ite dị iche site na isi ya
Mgbe e mesịrị, a na-esi yabasị na galik ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-esi ísì, mgbe ahụ, a na'agbakwunye mmiri na anụ ọkụkọ iji mepụta broth
Mgbe esichara ya, a na-etinye ọkụkọ ma ọ bụ anụ e siri esi na broth coriander na akwụkwọ molokhia ma sie ya ọzọ nkeji iri na ise

Ọzọkwa, n'ebe ugwu Lebanọn, a na-eji akwụkwọ ọhụrụ na okooko osisi Nalta jute eme nri a na-akpọ mloukhiye b zeit, nke a na-esi na mmanụ oliv, yabasị, galik, tomato na ose; ọ bụ nri a ma ama n'oge ọkọchị, ọkachasị na mpaghara Miniyeh-Danniyeh na Akkar
Ndị Bedouin nwere omenala ochie nke isi nri dị iche iche
A na-egbutu ọkụkọ dum, wepụ eriri afọ, ma tinye ahịhịa, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na osikapa a na-esighị esi n'ime ya wee jiri eriri siri ike mechie ya

A na-esizi ọkụkọ ahụ iji mepụta brọsh maka ofe molokhia nke, mgbe a kwadobe ya, a na-enye ya dị ka ihe ise dị iche iche ofe molokhiya, achịcha dị larịị nke Arabic, ọkụkọ (nke e ji osikapa na-atọ ụtọ), osikapa ọzọ, na obere efere nwere ngwakọta mmiri lemon na chilli a pịrị apị
A na-agwakọta ofe ahụ na mmiri osikapa na mmiri lemon dịka ụtọ ya si dị, ebe a na-eri ọkụkọ ahụ na efere dị iche
[citation needed]
Na Tunisia, a na-akwadobe nri ahụ n'ụzọ dị iche na usoro ndị Ijipt
A na-akpọnwụ akwụkwọ ndị ahụ, ndị kewara la na ogwe osisi ahụ, wee gwọọ ha iji mepụta ezigbo ntụ ma chekwaa ha n'ime ite ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ mechiri emechi
Na nri Tunisian, mulukhya, ma ọ bụ mloukhiya, na-ewe awa 5 ruo 7 iji kwadobe, nke a na-emekarị ruo ọkara mgbede ma mechaa n'ụtụtụ
A na-eji mmanụ oliv na ụfọdụ tomato na-agbanye n'ime ofe, ọ bụghị ofe, a na-agbakwunye nnukwu anụ ehi na ọkara nri
Ọchịchịrị na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na-esi ísì ụtọ na okpomọkụ dị ala ma hapụ ya ka ọ sie ike ka ọ bụrụ tomato sauce
A na-enye ofe ahụ na obere efere miri emi na anụ ehi ma rie ya na achịcha French ma ọ bụ Italian na-acha ọcha
N'ógbè ụfọdụ ebe anụ ehi adịghị ahụkebe, a na-eji nwa atụrụ eme mana ọ na-esi nri maka oge dị mkpirikpi
[citation needed]
Na Kenya, a mara nri ahụ dị ka murere (Luhya), murenda, apoth (Luo), na ọtụtụ aha asụsụ ndị ọzọ

Ọ bụ nri akwụkwọ nri na-ewu ewu n'etiti obodo ndị dị na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ (Vihiga, Kakamega, Busia, Trans Nzoia na Bungoma Counties) na mpaghara Nyanza (Kisumu, Siaya, Homa Bay, Kisii, Migori na Nyamira Counties)
Mpaghara abụọ ahụ dị n'ógbè dị gburugburu Ọdọ Mmiri Victoria
A na-ekewapụta akwụkwọ jute site na ogwe osisi, saa ya, wee sie ya na mmiri nnu na ligadi (ụdị soda (bicarbonate nke soda), ma ọ bụ munyu ( nnu sitere na osisi ọdịnala)

A na-esi akwụkwọ ya na akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ nwere akwụkwọ dị ka likuvi (Vigna unguiculata (cowpea) akwụkwọ) ma ọ bụ mito (Chipilín) iji belata ịdị gịrịgịrị ha ma nyere aka mee ka akwụkwọ nri ndị ahụ dị nro
N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, mgbe a gbasịrị ya ruo ihe dị ka nkeji iri atọ, a na-etinye akwụkwọ nri na tomato na yabasị na mmanụ
(E nwere ọtụtụ ụzọ n'ozuzu iji kwadebe mutere na ụzọ ndị ọzọ a na-enye ya)
Ihe ndị na-esi ísì ụtọ dị ka curry, ose, masala, ma ọ bụ coriander bụ nhọrọ
A na-enye mutere na ugali ( oriri, nri ọka e siri esi) ma nwee ike ijikọta ya na anụ ma ọ bụ ọkụkọ
[citation needed]
Akwụkwọ ya bụ nri a na-ahụkarị n'ọtụtụ mba ndị dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka
Ekwenyere na 'ọnụ ọnụ' dị n'elu akwụkwọ na-eme ka mmiri si na akwụkwọ ahụ pụọ n'oké mmiri ozuzo n'ebe okpomọkụ

Na Sierra Leone, a na-akpọ ya Kren-kre (krain krain ma ọ bụ crain crain), a na-eri ya na ofe mmanụ nkwụ nke a na-enye ya na osikapa ma ọ bụ cassava fufu (nri ọdịnala e ji cassava mee), ma ọ bụ ma ọ bụrụ na a na-esi ya na-esi ísì ụtọ ma gwakọta ya na osika tupu a rie ofe mmanụ nkịta na-abụghị
N'etiti ndị Yoruba nọ na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ obodo Naijiria, a na-akpọ ya ewedu ma jiri ntụ ọka yam (amala) sie ya
Na Liberia, a na-akpọ ya sauce palaver, a na'ejikwa osikapa ma ọ bụ fufu
Na Gambia a na-akpọ ya kereng-kereng ma na-ejikarị ya eme supakanja (nri a na-ejekarị na Satọdee ma jiri okra, mmanụ nkwụ na-acha ọbara ọbara, azụ na anụ mee ya)
Na mba Ghana, a maara ya dị ka Ademe ewe ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ Ayoyo ma jiri ya mee ofe maka Banku (nri ọka cassavas) ma ọ bụ osikapa siri esi)
[citation needed]
Na Saịprọs, a mara nri ahụ dị ka molohiya
Ọ na-ewu ewu n'etiti ndị Saịprọs
A na-akụ akwụkwọ jute ma na-etolite n'oge opupu ihe ubi, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-ewepụta ha ma kewaa akwụkwọ ya na ogwe osisi ma kpọọ ya
A na-esi ha n'ime broth tomato na alịbasa na galik
A pụru itinye nwa atụrụ n'ọkpụkpụ ma ọ bụ ọkụkọ nwere ọkpụkpụ
Maka nsonaazụ kachasị mma, a na-ejikwa lemon na poteto iji nyere aka mee ka nkwekọrịta ahụ ghara ịghọ nke na-esi ísì ụtọ ma ọ bụ nke na-esighị ike
A na-enye ya na broth na achịcha sourdough
[citation needed]
Na Haiti, a na-akpọkarị nri akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ dị ka lalo ma na-esi ya na anụ ma ọ bụ na-enweghị anụ
Mgbe ha na-atụle anụ, ndị Haiti na-eji anụ ehi ma ọ bụ anụ ezì ebu
Ihe oriri mmiri dị ka crabs na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, shrimp ma ọ bụ ụkwụ snow crab bụkwa nhọrọ
A na-ejikarị osikapa ọcha enye ya
Akwụkwọ ya bara ọgaranya na folate, beta-carotene, iron, calcium, vitamin C na ihe karịrị vitamin 32, mineral na trace elements
Osisi ahụ nwere ọrụ antioxidant siri ike na vitamin E dị ịrịba ama nke α-tocopherol
A na-ahụ okwu maka osisi ahụ n'asụsụ Mediterenian oge ochie dị ka Arabic na Greek
Akụkụ okwu a gụnyere Grik oge ochie μαλάχη (malákhē) ma ọ bụ μολόχη (molókhē), Grik nke oge a μολόχα (molókha), Arabic nke oge a ملوخية (mulukhiyah) na Hibru nke oge a
Àtụ Cuisine of Egypt
Gift Iyumame Eke (née Uwame; amuru n'ubo iri na asato n'onwa November n'afo 1978), na-ede egwu, na-eme ihe egwuregwu, bukwazi nwaanyi ji ego acho ego
O so na ndi na-eme ihe e ji acho mma ma sokwa na ndi ochichi obodo
Aha egwuregwu ya bu Muma Gee (/muːmə dʒiː/Àtụ IPAc-en), nke putara 'onyinye ime mma'
O bi na Port Harcourt ebe a no muo ya ma zuo ya,
Mumbi Maina (amuru 14 Jenuarị 1985) bu onye omere Kenya amara maka oru ya na ihe nkiri Mali
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agba egwu bụ onye kpagoro n'ihe nkiri mpaghara na nke mba ụwa kemgbe 2009
A maara Mumbi nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Zakia na netflix sci-fi show Sense8
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị egwuregwu mbụ ya na 2009, ọ gbara Riziki na 'Unseen Unsung Unforgotten' wee nweta ihe nrite Kalasha mbụ ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-akwado kacha mma
Mumbi ghọrọ aha ezinụlọ site na ihe ngosi NTV na-emeri emeri nke Mali (2011-2013) wee nata nhọpụta Kalasha maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-akwado Kasị Mma
Mumbi Maina mere mpụta mbụ ya na ụwa ntụrụndụ n'afọ 2008 mgbe ọ gbara n'ihe nkiri Unseen, Unsung, Unforgotten dị ka Riziki
Ọ pụtara n'akụkụ Benta Ochieng' na Nice Githinji
N'afọ 2011, a tụbara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eduga na ihe nkiri usoro Kenya nke Mali
Na Nọvemba 2011, ọ na-ekerịta ọtụtụ yat na Rita Dominic na Robert Burale na ihe nkiri Shattered
Ná mmalite 2015, ọ gbara n'usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn How to Find a Wife
Ọ gosiputara dị ka Jackie, bụ enyi Abigail na Carol
Ya na Lizz Njagah na Sarah Hassan rụkọru ọrụ
Kati Kati' Nyocha ihe nkiri | AFI Fest 2016
Mumbi Maina na IMDb
Mums for Lungs bụ otu na-enweghị uru, otu na-eme mkpọsa gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi, nke dị na United Kingdom, nke na-eme ka a márá mmetụta ahụike nke mmetọ ikuku, ọkachasị ụmụaka
E guzobere Mums for Lungs na London n'afọ 2017 site n'aka obere ìgwè ndị nne na nna, gụnyere onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ Jemima Hartshorn

A kpaliri ha ime ihe n'akụkụ ụfọdụ site na ahụmịhe onwe ha nke ibi n'obodo na-emetọ okporo ụzọ na akụkụ ụfọdụ site na mgbalị mkpọsa nke Rosamund Kissi-Debrah, ónyé nkuzi ghọrọ ónyé na-eme ihe ike nke ọnwụ nwa ya nwanyị bụ mmetụta nke iku ume na-emetọrọ ikuku
Ìgwè ahụ gbasaa ngwa ngwa site na ndị enyi ole na ole nwéré otu echiche, nke mbụ na ọtụtụ mkpọsa gbụrụ-gbúrụ London wee gaa na ọtụtụ ìgwè ndị mmekọ gburugburu UK
Ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na ndị ọzọ na-eme mkpọsa gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi, dị ka Choked Up na Clean Cities Campaign, na London Assembly, yana Onye isi obodo London
N'afọ 2021, Mums for Lungs meriri Sheila McKechnie Foundation Best Community Campaign Award màkà ọrụ ya

Mums for Lungs na-eme mkpọsa n'ọtụtụ ókwú ịdị mma ikuku, gụnyere mgbasawanye nke London Ultra Low Emission Zone; mmetọ sitere n'ọkụ ọkụ ọkụ, mmanụ ọkụ, na mmanụ dizel; ọrụ nke mmetọ na ụkwara ume nwa, ntuziaka ikuku dị ọcha na ebumnuche, okporo ụzọ na-enweghị ụgbọ ala, na njem dị ọcha karịa ịga na site na ụlọ akwụkwọ
Kemgbe afọ 2018, o nyerela aka ịkwado mkpọsa ónyé isi obodo London akpọrọ School Streets, nke na-emechi okporo ụzọ màkà okporo ụzọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ebuli na oge nkwụsị iji belata mmetụta nke polisi
E nwèrè ugbu a ihe dị ka atụmatụ narị ise dị otú ahụ na London na narị abụọ ndị ọzọ na-abụghị isi obodo
Ndị Mumuyes bụ ndị obodo Naijiria
Ha na-asụ asụsụ Mumuye

Ha mejupụtara agbụrụ kachasị ukwuu na Taraba Steeti nke dị na Naịjirịa, ma mepụta agbụrụ ndị kachasị na Zing, Yorro, Jalingo, Ardo-Kola, Lau, Gassol, Bali na Gashaka, ndi niile bụ mpaghara gọọment,ị mpaghara nke steeti ahụ
A na-ahụkwa ndị Mumuyes n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke steeti Adamawa dị nso
Àtụ Ethnic groups in Nigeria
Muna Kalameya Durka (Arabic; amụrụ na June 19, 1988) bụ onye Sudanese steeplechase runner
Durka nọchitere anya Sudan na 2008 Summer Olympics na Beijing, ebe ọ sonyere maka asọmpi mbụ ụmụ nwanyị 3000 mita steeplechase
Ọ gbara ọsọ na okpomọkụ nke abụọ megide ndị egwuregwu iri na isii ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Tatyana Petrova nke Russia, onye mechara merie ọla nchara na nke ikpeazụ
Ọ gwụchara ọsọ ahụ n'ọnọdụ nke itoolu site na sekọnd isii n'azụ Sofia Assefa nke Etiopia, na oge nke 9 5309
Otú ọ dị, Durka enweghị ike ịga n'ihu na nke ikpeazụ, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri atọ na asatọ n'ozuzu, ma nọrọ n'okpuru oghere anọ dị mkpa maka agba ọzọ
Muna Jabir Adam (amụrụ na 6 na onwa Jenụwarị, na afọ 1987) bụ onye Sudanese na-eme egwuregwu amụrụ na Al-Ubayyid onye ọkachamara na 400 mita mgbochi
Mundat bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic, a na-asụ na Plateau State, Nigeria na Mundat obodo nke Bokkos LGA
Mundele bụ aha nna Congolese
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Munganga bụ aha nna Congolese
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Munkoyo ma ọ bụ ibwatu bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ a ma ama n'ime ime obodo Zambia
Ọ bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ a na-eme nke ọma nke e ji mgbọrọgwụ a gwokọtara ya na ọka mee
Enwere ike ịṅụ ngwakọta ahụ ozugbo emechara ya ma ọ bụ hapụ ya ka ọ gbasaa ruo ọtụtụ ụbọchị
Ndị Zambia na-akpọkarị ya ' biya na-atọ ụtọ'
A na-ahụkwa ya na mba ndị dị n'etiti Afrịka dị ka obodo Congo ebe a na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka ihe ọṅụṅụ n'ememe ọdịnala yana ihe ọṅụṅụ nkịtị
Muntari bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Munyaradzi 'Munya' Chidzonga (a mụrụ na Disemba 8, 1983) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri
O bu ụzọ bụrụ onye a ma ama n'afọ 2008, mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi TV Big Brother Africa na-anọchite anya Zimbabwe na oge nke atọ ya, ebe ọ nwetara ọnọdụ nke atọ
N'afọ 2010, o sonyere na oge nke ise nke Big Brother Africa, na-aghọ onye nke abụọ na-emeri Uti Nwachukwu, onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa, onye sonyekwara na Oge 3
Mgbe ihe ngosi ahụ gasịrị, Munya gara n'ihu na-emepụta ma na-eme ihe nkiri Lobola (2010) na The Gentleman (2011) site na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya, Ivory Pictures

N'afọ 2012, o ritere ihe nrite NAMA maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe nkiri na telivishọn maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri The Gentleman N'afọ 2014, Chidzonga pụtara na oge nke atọ nke ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke South Africa Mzansi Love, nke a na-egosi na etv na eKasi+
A mụrụ Chidzonga n'abalị 8 ọnwa Disemba afọ 1985
Maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ gara Peterhouse Boys' School, ụlọ akwụkwọ kwụụrụ onwe ya dị na mpụga Marondera, ebe ọ bụ onye isi
A jara ya mma maka arụmọrụ ya n'egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ, 'Absent Friends', n'afọ 2004
Munya bụ onye Petrean mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ natara onyinye Drama Colors for Drama
Munya wee gaa n'ihu nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na Motion Picture na The South African School of Motion Picture Medium and Live Performance na Cape Town, South Africa
Ebe a họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma
Chidzonga lụrụ Adiona Maboreke, onye ikpeazụ nke 2008 Idols East Africa na emume nzuzo na Harare n'afọ 2012
Chidzonga na Maboreke anọwo na-eme mkpapụ kemgbe afọ 2009 ma nwee nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Pfumai, amụrụ n'afọ 2010, tupu alụmdi na nwunye ahụ
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ nwa nwoke nke abụọ, aha ya bụ Diwai, amụrụ n'afọ 2015
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke akporo (Alliance High skull)rue n'afọ 1945
Ma mesia ga kọleji na Adams ebe ọ gụrụ fiscis, kemistri, na mgbakọ na mwepụ tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Fort Hare na Eastern Cape Province na South Africa maka nzere bachelọ nke sayensị
O si South Africa rute Mombasa n'oké osimiri n'afọ 1951 mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị nna ya mere ka ọ mata Jomo Kenyatta na Mbiyu Koinange na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị n'okporo ụzọ Latema na Nairobi
Mgbe ọnwa ole na ole gachara, ọ gara agụmakwụkwọ ọzọ na Britain nke ọ gara n'ihu ruo mgbe ọ laghachiri Kenya na afo1958

Gọọmentị Kenya nyere ya ọrụ ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka dọkịta, ọkwá ọ rụrụ n'ihe na-erughị otu afọ kemgbe ọ lara ezumike nká ma họrọ ịmepụta ụlọ ọgwụ nke ya na Victoria Street (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Tom Mboya Street)
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ebe ọ bụ na ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche distrikti nke Kenya African National Union (KANU) n'oge 1960-1968
N'afọ 1962, ọ mara Tom Mboya aka maka oche ndị omeiwu nke Nairobi East mana o ji vootu 2668 merie na 31407

Ọ banyere n'ụlọ omebe iwu na nke mbụ ya na onwa ise na afo1963 dị ka onye omebe iwu maka North Eastern Nairobi (nke bụzi Kasarani) ọ ghọkwara odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide maka ulo oru ahuike na ụlọ obibi N'afọ 1963, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ndị omeiwu
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2017, a kọrọ na Waiyaki nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ Aga Khan dị na Nairobi mgbe ọ na-agwọ ya ọrịa
Chief Muraina Oyelami (a mụrụ 21 Febụwarị n'afọ 1940) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe na onye na-agba egwu nke agbụrụ Yoruba
O so na ọgbọ mbụ nke ndị na-ese ihe si na Osogbo School of Art pụta n'afọ 1960
Ọ bụ onye na-agba egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Duro Ladipo
Ọ kụziri egwu ọdịnala na ịgba egwu na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo site na 1976 ruo 1987
Dị ka onye na-eti egwu, ọ zụrụ na dùndún (bọm na-ekwu okwu) na Batá drum
Ọ bụ onye isi obodo ya bụ Iragbiji
A mụrụ Muraina Oyelami na 21 Febụwarị 1940 na Iragbiji, Osun Steeti
Site na 1963 ruo 1965, Oyelami nwetara ọzụzụ na dùndún (bọm na-ekwu okwu) site n'aka Oba Laoye, onye bụ Timi nke Ede
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ gụrụ Batá drum na Ayantunji Amoo nke Okinni na Abeyefo nke Iseyin

Ọ bụ onye na-agba egwu nakwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Duro Ladipo National Theatre, ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke onye Yoruba na-eme ihe nkiri Duro Ladipo Ọ gara Europe dị ka onye otu ìgwè ahụ, buru ụzọ gaa Germany maka Berlin Festival of Art na 1964 wee gaa United Kingdom maka Commonwealth Arts Festival na 1965
N'afọ 1964, Oyelami gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nka oge okpomọkụ nke Mbari Mbayo Artists and Writers Club na Osogbo ebe ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe eserese nke Georgina Beier nyere

Ọ malitere ịgụ akwụkwọ na Osogbo Art School, nke Georgina na Ulli Beier hiwere, ma soro n'ọgbọ mbụ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ Osogbo Art; n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ gara ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ na eserese na mgbakwunye na ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye isi egwu Yoruba
N'ihe osise ya, Oyelami nwetara mkpali site na ọrụ onye na-ebi akwụkwọ Kenya bụ Hezbon Owiti
N'ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Edinburgh na 1967 e jiri ọrụ ya tụnyere nke Paul Klee na Amedeo Modigliani, ọ bụ ezie na ọ maghị nka Europe
E mechara jiri ya tụnyere Georges Rouault ma gaa ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ nke Ru Van Rossem na 1966 na 1972
Oyelami gara Mahadum nke Ife (nke bụzi Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo) na Ile-Ife, na-amụ ihe nkiri nkà na ụzụ na ọkachamara na imewe ihe nkiri ma nata asambodo na nka ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1973, ọ gara New York ebe o nwere mkpakọrịta na ebe obibi na National Black Theatre na Harlem
Oyelami kụziri egwu ọdịnala na ịgba egwu na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo site na 1976 ruo 1987
Ọ bụkwa prọfesọ nleta na Mahadum Bayreuth, Germany
E nyekwara Oyelami ọrụ ịmepụta mosaics maka Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo
E dechara mosaics abụọ mbụ ya, na ngalaba nke Health Science na Ile-Ife, n'afọ 1975
Ọ rụchara ihe osise mosaic na campus Iragbiji na Wema Bank Plc
n'afọ 1983
Oyelami na-egwu egwu ọdịnala na egwu fusion ma bụrụ onye na-ese ihe na abọm Embryo nke afọ 1985 nke Embryo & Yoruba Dun Orchester
Ọ bụ onye nduzi egwu maka ma depụta akara na 1998 Royal Exchange Theatre mmepụta nke Wole Soyinka play Death and the King's Horseman
Oyelami bụ onye isi obodo ya, ebe emere ya Eesa nke Iragbiji na 14 Febụwarị 1993
N'afọ 2018, Oyelami hiwere Abeni Visual and Performing Art Institute na Iragbiji
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi nka nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-azụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na nka ọhụụ na ime ihe nkiri, gụnyere ịme drum, imewe ákwà na ibipụta akwụkwọ
Dị ka onye ọgbọ mbụ nke Osogbo Art School, a na-ewere Oyelami dị ka akụkụ nke Osogbo Art movement
A na-ewere ụdị ya dị ka Modernist, ya na eserese mmanụ ya na-egosipụta echiche nke imewe, kpọmkwem, na nke agba dị nro na akara siri ike
Omenala ndị Yoruba na-emetụta isiokwu Oyelami, isiokwu nke ala ya na ihe osise ya na-esitekarị na ndụ kwa ụbọchị na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu
Ihe osise mmanụ mbụ nke Oyelami gụnyere ihe ngosi nke ndụ n'obodo ahụ, ebe ọ na-erule afọ 1980, ọrụ ya aghọwo ihe atụ, na-aga n'ihu n'isiokwu ndị ọzọ
Oyelami esonyewo na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke o mere naanị ya na nke o sonyere otu
A gụnyere ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta
Ihe osise ya nke 1971 Birds in the Garden bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta nke Smithsonian Institution's National Museum of African Art na Washington, DC

Ihe eserese nke Oyelami n'afọ 1971 a kpọrọ Village on the Hillside is in the Tyler Collection of Romanian and Modern Art na Mahadum Tasmania Ọrụ ya dịkwa na nchịkọta nke National Gallery of Modern Art na Lagos, Studio Museum na Harlem, na Lagos State House of Assembly, nchịkọta onwe nke Bola Ige, Institute of Contemporary Arts na London, na Staatlichen Kunsthalle na Berlin
Ọrụ Oyelami so ndị sitere na nchịkọta nke Susanne Wenger na ihe ngosi nke 2016 nke jere ozi dị ka ụtụ maka ndụ ya
N'afọ 2017, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi nke Osogbo art na United States na Art Dubai
Oyelami edeela akwụkwọ banyere ịgba egwu na omenala ndị Yoruba
The 1993 monograph Abefe An Autobiography of Muraina Oyelami dabeere na ajụjụ ọnụ nke Oyelami, nke Ulli Beier deziri
N'ihe odide ahụ, Oyelami na-akọwa oge ntorobịa ya, ihe nkiri na Ile-Ife, ụlọ ọrụ Mbari-Mbayo, na ebe obibi ya na Iwalewa-Haus

Murasaki Shikibu bu onye édémédé akwukwọ na onye na-ede uri
Ọ bụ ya dere akwụkwọ a na-akpọ Genji monogatari
E si n'akwụkwọ ahụ mara aha ya nke ukwuu n'ụwa nile
Ọ mụrụ n'ọnwa n'afọ 973 n'obodo Heian kyo
Murasaki Shikibu onye nke nne na nna ya kpọrọ Fujiwara Tametoki

Murcian (endonym murciano) bụ ụdị nke Peninsular Spanish, nke a na-asụkarị na obodo Murcia na mpaghara Vega Baja del Segura na Alto Vinalopó dị nso na mpaghara Alicante (Valencia), ụzọ Almansa na Albacete (Castile-La Mancha)

N'ụzọ ka ukwuu, ọ nwekwara ike ịgụnye ụfọdụ mpaghara ndị bụ akụkụ nke alaeze Murcia, dị ka ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Albacete (nke bụzi akụkụ Castile La Mancha) na akụkụ nke Jaén na Almería (nke bụ akụkụ nke Andalusia ugbu a)
Ụdị asụsụ dị iche iche nke Murcian na-eme ka asụsụ na-aga n'ihu na Eastern Andalusian na Manchego Peninsular Spanish
A na-ewere Murcian dị ka asụsụ dị iche nke Spanish site n'aka ụfọdụ ndị obodo ahu na-asụ ya, ndị na-akpọ ya llengua murciana
A na-ejikwa okwu panocho eme ihe iji kọwaa asụsụ Murcian, agbanyeghị na ọ na-ezo aka na ụdị dị iche iche a na-asụ na comarca nke Huerta de Murcia
Murcian sitere na ngwakọta nke ọtụtụ asụsụ dị iche iche sonyeere alaeze nke Murcia mgbe mmeri nke Crown nke Aragon na Crown nke Castile n'etiti narị afọ nke 13 na 14
Ụdị asụsụ dị iche iche bụ Tudmir's Romance (ụdị Andalusi Romance), Arabic, Aragonese, Old Castilian na Occitano-Catalan
N'oge a, French na Caló emetụtala Murcian

Akụkụ asụsụ Murcian dị iche n'etiti mpaghara, obodo nta, klas mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu dịka ọnọdụ nkwurịta okwu ha na-etinye aka na ya, nke a bụ n'ihi mmetụta nke iwu ọkọlọtọ
Asụsụ a nwere myirịta na ọdịiche na asụsụ Spanish, Aragonese na Catalan
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, akụkọ ihe mere eme //pt//, //kt// na //st// niile na-adaba ọnụ dị ka //tt//, na-asụgharị cacto 'cactus', casto 'chaste' na capto 'M ghọtara' homophonous dị ka [ˈkatto]
Nke a na-emepụta obere ụzọ abụọ dị iche iche site na ogologo ụdaume, dị ka cisne [ˈθinne] 'swan' vs
cine [ˈθine] 'cinema'
Usoro a na-emekwa gafee ókèala okwu, dịka na los nenes 'ụmụ'
Okwu ikpeazụ //n// na-aghọta dị ka velar [ŋ]
/n/'a/s/ụsụ ime obodo ndị agadi na-arụ ọrụ, mkpụrụedemede ikpeazụ /s/ na-apụta dị ka [ɾ] n'ihu ụdaume mmalite okwu (karịsịa ụda olu na /n/), dị ka na los vasos [lɔɾ ˈβæsɔ] 'oghere'
/b, d, ɡ/ na-agbanye mgbe allophone a gasịrị
A na-ewere dochie [s] na [ɾ] dị ka ihe dị ịrịba ama nke ime obodo Murcian, ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ anaghịkwa anabata ya
E nwere ihe omume asụsụ fonetiks ndị (ma ọ bụ ndị) na-adịkarị na ụdị asụsụ ndị ọzọ (Aragonese, Mozarabic, Catalan, Andalusian, wdg)
Murder at Prime Suites (M@PS) bụ ihe nkiri mpụ na akpalị obi Naijiria nke afọ 2013 nke Chris Eneng na-eduzi ya ọ gosiputara Joseph Benjamin, Keira Hewatch na Chelsea Eze

Mgbe Florence Ngwu ( Chelsea Eze ) egburu n'ụzọ jọgburu onwe ya n'ụlọ oriri na ọñụñụ site n'aka onye na-amaghị ama, Agent Ted ( Joseph Benjamin ) na-ezigara ka ọ nyochaa ọnọdụ ndị kpatara ọnwụ ya ma hụ na ikpe ziri ezi na-emeri

Mmeghachi omume na ihe nkiri ahụ dịgasị iche nke ọma, na Sodas na Popcorns nyere ya 3 n'ime 5 nkezi akara ma na-ekwupụta 'Ọ bụ ihe nkiri mara mma, dị iche, nke ekeputara nke oma, mana ụfọdụ ihe yiri ka ọ dịchaghị mma mere ka ahụmahụ m karịa nke a'
Adnan Patrawala bụ nwa nwoke dị afọ iri na ụma nke onye ọchụnta ego si Mumbai, India
N'ubochi irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2007, a tọọrọ Adnan maka ~ 2 crore (US $ 260,000) mgbapụta
E gburu ya n'echi ya mgbe akụkọ banyere ntọrọ ahụ pụtara na TV na mgbasa ozi mba
Ndị na-esonụ bụ ndị a na-ebo ebubo na afọ há dị n'oge ihe a mere;
A tọhapụrụ mmadụ anọ n'ime ha n'ihi na aka ha dị ọcha
Ka oruru oge ndị ntọ ahụ kpọrọ oku mgbapụta, ntọ ahụ aburula akụkọ mba nke mere na ndị ntọ Adnan nyagburu ya ma tụfuo ozu ya n'okporo ụzọ Palm Beach, Navi Mumbai ma were ụgbọ okporo ígwè obodo laa
Na abalị irí atọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2012, ụlọ ikpe Mumbai tọhapụrụ mmadụ anọ n'ime mmadụ ise a na-ebo ebubo
Ndị ọka ikpe ahụ egosighi ikpe ya
Aslam Patrawala (nna) kwuru na ọ ga-arịọ arịrịọ n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu
N'ịbụ onye na-eto eto, ndị Juvenile Justice Board kpere onye nke ise a na-ebo ebubo ikpe
Muriel Winifred Turner, Baroness Turner nke Camden (née Price; 18 Septemba 1927 - 26 February 2018) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye isi otu ndị ọrụ Britain
N'agbata 1970 na 1987 Turner bụ onye enyemaka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke ASTMS (mgbe emechara nrụpụta, sayensị na ego, Amicus na ugbu a Unite the Union)
Site na 1981 ruo 1987 ọ bụ onye otu TUC General Council
E kere ya dị ka Life Peer na 29 Mee 1985 na-ewere aha Baroness Turner nke Camden, nke Camden na Greater London
O nwere mmasị pụrụ iche na ọdịmma ọha na eze na nsogbu ezumike nká, site na 1987 ruo Ọktoba 1996 ọ bụ ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Front Bench na Ọrụ maka ndị ọrụ na-emegide
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke House of Lords n'etiti afọ 2002 na 2008

Ọ bụ onye otu Equal Opportunities Commission 1982-88; Occupational Pensions Board 1977-93; Council Member, Occupational Pension Advisory Service, 1989-2007; na onyeisi oche, Personal Investment Authority Ombudsman Council 1994-97
Ọ bụ onye otu British Parliamentary Committee for Iran Freedom
Ọnụnọ ya na Ụlọ ahụ kwụsịrị na 13 June 2017
Ọ nwụrụ ọnwa asatọ ka e mesịrị, ọ dị afọ 90
N'afọ 1955, Muriel Price lụrụ Reginald Thomas Frederick Turner, MC, DFC
Ha enweghị ụmụ ọ bụla mana alụmdi na nwunye ahụ wetara ụmụ abụọ
Ọ nwụrụ tupu ya, ọ nwụrụ na 1995
Ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke Humanists UK na onye mmekọ nsọpụrụ nke National Secular Society
Na 15 Septemba 2010, Turner, ya na mmadụ 54 ndị ọzọ, bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ ozi e bipụtara na The Guardian, na-ekwupụta mmegide ha megide nleta steeti Pope Benedict nke Iri na Isii na UK
Murilo Araújo Rosa (21 Ọgọọst 1970) bu onye Brazilian bu ọmẹka

Murjanatu Liman Musa (ka a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2000) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Naijiria nke na-agbara ndị otu egwuregwu basketball nke Naijiria Air Warriors na ndị otu mba Naịjirịa bọọlụ ugbu a
Murjanatu na-egwuri egwu ugbu a na otu celta zorka na spain

murjanatu na-egwuri egwu maka ndị otu Air warriors Women's Basketball nke Naijiria, na 2019 Zenith Women's Basketball league, ndị otu ahụ meriri Mountain of Fire Ministries Women's Basketball team na nke ikpeazụ, a họpụtara ya MVP nke otu egwuregwu ahụ ebe ọ nwetara akara iri na asaa na 15 rebounds na enyemaka atọ na egwuregwu ikpeazụ
Murjanatu nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi basketball 3x3 na 2019 Morocco Africa Games na 2019 African Beach Games, Cape-Verde, ndị otu ahụ meriri ọla edo na ọla nchara n'otu n'otu
A kpọrọ Murjanatu Musa ka ọ nọchite anya D'Tigress ma sonye na Tokyo 2020 FIBA Women's Olympic Qualifying Tournaments na Belgrade
Murle (nakwa Ajibba, Beir, Merule, Mourle, Murule) bụ asụsụ Surmic nke ndị Murle na-asụ na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke South Sudan, na nso oke ala Etiopia
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke Murle bi n'ofe oke na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia
Usoro usoro okwu bụ isi maka nkebiokwu Murle bụ VSO (ngwaa – isiokwu – ihe)
Ọdịdị nke ngwaa na-ekwenye na onye na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke isiokwu ahụ, ma nwee ike igosi nke ihe ahụ
Arensen, et al
na-atụle ụfọdụ isi ihe dị iche iche nke ụtọ asụsụ, dị ka na asụsụ VSO eburula amụma na ha agaghị enwe nbido ma ọ bụ ajụjụ ikpeazụ
Ịka akara nọmba na aha na Murle dị mgbagwoju anya, na-enweghị otu suffix na-arụpụtakarị ihe
Ụfọdụ aha ka e ji suffix dị iche iche akara, ụfọdụ nwere suffix plural, ụfọdụ nwere ha abụọ, na ole na ole nwere mkpịsị na-adịghị agafe agafe maka ọnụọgụ ọ bụla
Arensen atụpụtala usoro nke usoro dabere na semant (dị ka mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị, ma ọ bụ na ihu igwe na oge) iji nwaa ịkọ nke suffixes ga-eji (1992, 1998)
Payne (2006) atụpụtala ntụle ụfọdụ okwu dị ka ihe atụ nke morphology mwepu
Payne na-atụ aro na ụdị abụọ a na-egosipụta ka a ga-esi buru amụma ọtụtụ Murle site n'ụdị otu, mana ọ bụghị nke ọzọ
onyiit 'rib' onyii 'ribs'
rottin 'onye agha' rotti 'ndị agha'
Agbanyeghị, otu mgbanaka ikpeazụ ahụ ka a na-ahụ na akara na-arụpụta nke ọnụọgụ ọnụọgụ na Majang, asụsụ Surmic ọzọ, dịka ọmụmaatụ
ŋɛɛti-n 'louse', ŋɛɛti 'lice'
Ọzọkwa, ikpeazụ -t egosila na ọ bụ suffix na Murle na asụsụ ndị ọzọ nke Surmic, dabara ụkpụrụ nke T maka otu na K maka plural nke Margaret Bryant rụtụrụ aka
Ọ bụrụ na enyocha consonants ikpeazụ ndị a dị ka suffixes, ọ pụtara na nkwuputa nchoputa pụrụ iche nke mwepu morphology na Murle ezighi ezi
Kama, egosiri na Murle na-enwekarị usoro nke suffixes
A sụgharịrị Agba Ọhụrụ n'asụsụ Murle
Murphy Ijemba bụ onye ọrụ redio Naijiria na-akwado ihe ngosi RUSH HOUR na 977 METRO FM
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ụdị ịgbachite anya redio ya enwetala ya ọtụtụ nhọpụta na nkwanye ugwu na mmemme inye onyinye na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye Igbo
Amụrụ ya na Mushin, dịpụrụ adịpụ na Legọs steeti, bụ ebe ọ gawara agụsị akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị
O nwetara nzere BSc na Accounting ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Bayero, Kano
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Emmanuel Tobi nke New Telegraph, o kpughere na ọ ga-ere ọkụkọ iji kwado ego mmụta ya
Ọ malitere ọrụ redio ya dịka onye na-eme ihe ngosi na Raypower FM dị na Kano n'okpuru Daar Communication ebe ọrụ afọ ise
Ọ sonyeere Brila FM na 2011 ebe ọ tolitere n'ọrụ ya tupu ọ kwụsị n'ụlọ ọrụ redio na 2017 mgbe ọ dechara akwụkwọ ịgba arụkwaghịm ya na-ekwupụta mkpa ọ dị ịkwalite 'agụmakwụkwọ ikike' ya'
He Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ika maka 360Bet na Zutasia

Mursi (nakwa Dama, Merdu, Meritu, Murzi, Murzu) bụ asụsụ ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Surmic nke ndị Mursi bi na South Omo Zone na-asụ n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ndagwurugwu Omo ala dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia
Asụsụ ahụ yiri Suri, asụsụ Surmic ọzọ ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke a na-asụ na ọdịda anyanwụ nke mpaghara asụsụ Mursi
Ihe dị ka mmadụ 7,400 na-asụ ya 91
A na-ekewa Mursi dị ka nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Surmic asụsụ, nke asụsụ ndị ọzọ sokwa na ya Suri, Me'en na Kwegu
Dị ka nke a, Mursi bụkwa akụkụ nke ezinụlọ ndị isi ọwụwa anyanwụ Sudan nke asụsụ Nilo-Saharan
Udaume na consonant inventory nke Mursi yiri nke asụsụ ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Surmic ndị ọzọ, ma e wezụga maka enweghị ejectives, labial fricative /f/ na enweghị olu nkwụsị /p/
Ma Mütze na Firew kwenyere na enwere naanị ọkwa ụda olu abụọ dị na Mursi, n'adịghị ka nnukwu ngwa ahịa nke Turton na Bender na Moges tụpụtara
Ụtọasụsụ Mursi na-eji akụkụ okwu ndị a aha, ngwaa, adjectives, pronouns, adverbs, adpositions, okwu ajụjụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ, njikọ, akụkụ okwu, interjections, ideophones, na nkọwapụta
Enwere ike ịtụgharị aha maka nọmba na ikpe
Usoro akara ọnụọgụgụ dị nnọọ mgbagwoju anya, na-eji suffixation, suppletion ma ọ bụ ụda iji mee akara plurals site na ntọala otu, ma ọ bụ mkpụrụ okwu sitere na ntọala ọtụtụ
Ihe ọmụmụ Mursi preverbal na ihe niile enweghị akara, ebe okwu nkwuputa ga-eji akara nhọpụta
Okwu ndị ọzọ bụ ikpe oblique na ikpe genitive
Aha ndị emegharịrị na-enweta akara nrịbama morphological pụrụ iche nke a na-akpọ construct form nke Mütze
Murtala Muhammed International Airport (MMIA) bụ ọdụ ụgbọelu mba ụwa dị na Ikeja, Steeti Lagos, Naijiria
Ọ bụkwa nnukwu ọdụ ụgbọ elu na-ejere steeti ahụ dum ozi
E wuru ya na mbụ n'oge Agha mba Ụwa nke Abụọ ma kpọọ ya aha Murtala Muhammed (1938 -1976), onye ọchịagha nke anọ nke Naịjirịa
E wuru ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ n'oge Agha mba Ụwa nke Abụọ

De Havilland Doves na mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na WAACs Nigeria n'ime ụzọ na West African ọrụ

Ogige ọhụrụ ahụ meghere n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro na 15 Machị na afọ 1979

KaMurtala Muhammed International Airport nwere ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba ụwa na nke dị n'ime, nke dị ihe dị ka otu kilomita site na ibe ya

E weghachiri ọrụ ụlọ ahụ na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ochie nke Lagos na afọ 2000 mgbe ọkụ gbara
E wuru ọdụ ụgbọ elu ọhụrụ nke onwe ya nke a maara dị ka MMA2 ma nye ya ọrụ na 7 Eprel, na afọ 2007
N'ime ngwụcha afọ 1980 na afọ 1990, ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba ụwa nwere aha nke ịbụ ọdụ ụgbọ elu dị ize ndụ

Site na afọ 1992 ruo na afọ 2000, US Federal Aviation Administration biputere akara ịdọ aka ná ntị na ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba US niile na-adụ ndị njem ọdụ na ọnọdụ nchekwa na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Lagos erughị ụkpụrụ ICAO kacha nta

Ndị uwe ojii nọ n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu guzobere iwu 'ịgba égbè n'ahụ anya' maka onye ọ bụla a chọtara n'ebe dị nchebe gburugburu ụzọ ụgbọ elu na ụzọ ụgbọ ala, na-akwụsị izu ohi ụgbọelu ndị ọzọ
Ndị uwe ojii chebere n'ime ọdụ ụgbọ elu na ebe mbata n'èzí

N'afọ 2010, ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ nyere ndị njem 6,273,545
Afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya [mgbe?] ahụla ọganihu dị ukwuu na Murtala Muhammed International Airport
A rụzigharịrị ihe ndị na-adịghị arụ ọrụ na ndị na-arụ ọrụ dịka ikuku oyi na eriri ibu
A sachaa ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ dum, ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ọhụrụ na ụlọ ahịa na-enweghị ụtụ emeghela
A na-eweghachi nkwekọrịta ọrụ ụgbọ elu abụọ a bịanyere aka n'etiti Naịjirịa na mba ndị ọzọ na ndị ọhụrụ a bịanyere aka
Nkwekọrịta ndị a ahụla ndị dị ka Emirates, Ocean Air, Delta na China Southern Airlines na-egosipụta mmasị ma nata ikike ịdakwasị n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba kacha ukwuu na Naịjirịa

N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2012, Minista na-ahụ maka ụgbọelu n'oge ahụ, Stella Oduah, kwupụtara na Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa kwadoro ego mgbazinye N106 ijeri site na Exim Bank nke China iji wuo ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba ụwa ọhụrụ ise, gụnyere ọdụ ụgbọ elu ndị njem na Murtala Muhammed International Airport
Ihe owuwu ahụ malitere na ngwụcha afọ 2013, Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari nyere iwu ka ọ rụọ ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba ụwa ọhụrụ ahụ na 22 Machị na afọ 2022
Ọdụ ụgbọ elu ọhụrụ ahụ nwere ikike ịhazi nde ndị njem 14 kwa afọ
Àtụ Airport destination list
Ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ gụnyere isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Federal Airports Authority of Nigeria
Ọ na-enwekwa isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority, nke bụbu naanị ụlọ ọrụ Lagos ya; na isi ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ nke Accident Investigation Bureau
Ọfịs Lagos nke Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority dị na Aviation House na ala nke ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ
Isi ụlọ ọrụ Arik Air dị na Arik Air Aviation Center na ala ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ
Aero Contractors nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Private Terminal nke Domestic Wing na Murtala Muhammed International Airport
N'otu oge Nigeria Airways nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Airways House na ụlọ ọdụ ụgbọ elu
Tupu e wepụ ya, Afrijet Airlines nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na NAHCO Building na ala ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ

Musa Audu (amuru 18 June 1980) bu onye okacha amara na 400 mita na Naijiria

Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka inweta ihe nrite ọla nchara n'egwuregwu Olympic 2004 4 x 400 relay dị ka akụkụ nke otu Nigeria na nrite ọla ọcha na 2003 All-Africa Games 4 x 400 mita dị ka akụkụ nke otu ndị Nigeria kwa

Dọkịnta Musa Inuwa, CON (Site na 1948 ruo ụbọchị iri n'isii nke ọnwa jenụwarị afọ 2010) bụ gọvanọ nke Niger Steeti na Naijiria site n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1992 rue ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1993, a hoputara ya dika onye otu National Republican Convention (NRC)
Ọ bụ onye esi na Kanbari mịpụta , site na mpaghara Kontagora nke Niger Steeti

Ọ mere ntuli aka maka gọvanọ nke Niger n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2003 na okpuru otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị All Nigeria People's Party, ọ biara nke atọ dịkaAbdulkadir Kure nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị People's Democratic Party na Mustapha Bello nke People's Redemption Party (PRP)
N'ọnwa maachị afọ 2006, ya na ndị isi ọchịchị Steeti ndị ọzọ gbara gọọmentị ume ka ha merie na nzukọ mba iji kwụsị nyocha akwụkwọ iwu, dabere na iwu ala Naịjirịa erubeghị afọ asaa
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2006, emere ya ọchịagha nke ịtụ nke Niger
Musa Inuwa nwụrụ n'ụbọchị iri isii nke n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, afọ 2010 na Zaria mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na abụọ
Nwunye ya na ụmụ ya atọ nọchitere anya ya

A họpụtara Architect Musa Mohammed Sada (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1957) dịka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Ngwuputa na mmepe ígwè na 6 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2010, mgbe onye isi oche Goodluck Jonathan kwupụtara kabinet ọhụrụ ya
A mụrụ Sada na February 25, 1957 na Mani, Katsina State
Ọ gara Mahadum Ahmadu Bello (ABU), Zaria ebe o nwetara BSC na 1982 na MSc na Architecture na 1984
O nwetara MBA na ABU n'afọ 1998
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka ọkachamara na-ewu ụlọ ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ọrụ, ụlọ na njem maka Katsina Steeti n'afọ 2007
Musawa bụ mpaghara ógbè Gọọmentị nke ime Obodo dị na Katsina Steeti, Naịjirịa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Musawa
O nwere mpaghara nke 849 km2 ( ) na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 171,714 na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke afọ 2006
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 833
Ọkpụkpụ ọkpụkpụ (nke a na-akpọkarị ọkpụkpụ) bụ akụkụ nke usoro uru ahụ nke vertebrate ma na-ejikọta ya na ọkpụkpụ ọchụ
Mkpụrụ ndụ uru ahụ nke uru ahụ ọkpụkpụ dị ogologo karịa ụdị anụ ahụ ndị ọzọ, a makwaara ha dị ka eriri uru ahụ
Akwara ahụ nke uru ahụ ọkpụkpụ nwere akara nwere ọdịdị dị nro na ihi nhazi nke sarcomeres
Ọkpụkpụ ọkpụkpụ bụ uru ahụ afọ ofufo na okpuru nchịkwa nke usoro akwara somatic

Ụdị uru ahụ ndị ọzọ bụ uru ahụ nke obi nke na-enwekwa eriri na uru ahụ dị nro nke na-enweghị eriri; a na-ekewa ụdị anụ ahụ abụọ a dị ka nke na-amaghị ama, ma ọ bụ, na okpuru nchịkwa nke usoro akwara na-achị onwe ya
Ọkpụkpụ ọkpụkpụ nwere ọtụtụ fascicles nke eriri uru ahụ
Akpụkpọ anụ ọ bụla, na uru ahụ ọ bụla nwere ụdị eriri jikọtara ọnụ nke fascia
A na-emepụta eriri uru ahụ site na njikọta nke myoblasts mmepe na usoro a maara dị ka myogenesis na-akpata mkpụrụ ndụ multinucleated ogologo
Na ime mkpụrụ ndụ ndị a, nucleus ndị a na-akpọ myonuclei dị n'ime membrane nke mkpụrụ ndụ
Akwara uru ahụ nwekwara ọtụtụ mitochondria iji gboo mkpa ike
Musetta Vander (onye amụrụ Musetta van der Merwe; 26 Mee 1963) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya na onye na-agba egwu
N'afọ 1991, Vander nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya nke a ma ama, na-egosi Zander Tyler na ihe omume asaa nke usoro ihe omume TV Super Force
N'afọ 1997, Vander gosipụtara Sindel n'ihe Mortal Kombat Annihilation
N'afọ 1998, Vander pụtara dị ka Lady Elara, otu n'ime ndị isi na egwuregwu vidio Dune 2000
N'afọ 2002, Vander weghachiri ọrụ ya maka ihe ọzọ, Emperor Battle for Dune
Vander pụtara na mgbasa ozi, gụnyere ndị maka Lancôme, Sanyo, McDonald's, Diet Coke, Mercedes, Heineken na Skittles
Ọ gbara Agent 24-7 maka Prudential Real Estate
A na-egosi Vander na magazin, gụnyere na Maxim na mkpuchi na nkọwa
1999, Vander nwere ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri Barry Sonnenfeld Wild Wild West na-egosi onye na-enyere Kenneth Branagh aka, Dr
Loveless
2000, Vander mere Siren na-adọrọ adọrọ na O Brother, Where Art Thou?
N'otu afọ ahụ, o nwere ọrụ na The Cell n'akụkụ Jennifer Lopez
Vander pụtara na mmemme telivishọn, ọkachasị akụkọ sayensị nke gụnyere Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Stargate SG-1, Star Trek Voyager, Babylon 5, Xena Warrior Princess, na Highlander The Series
Ihe ngosi TV ndị ọzọ gụnyere ndị ọbịa na NCIS, Criminal Minds Beyond Borders, na Hawaii Five-0
Vander mere dịka nwunye onye isi na ihe ọchị Kicking & Screaming, ma soro na Say It na Russian
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nwanyị na egwu egwu Breaking Point A pụkwara ịhụ Vander na ihe ọchị / comedy Transylmania
Vander pụtara na ihe nkiri Ndị Kraịst a na-akpọ Johnny, ma mee ka nne Gattlin Griffith na ihe nkiri egwu Under the Bed

Mushin bụ ógbè Gọọmentị Obodo na Lagos Ọ dị kilomita iri n'ebe ugwu nke isi obodo ahụ, n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ isi na-aga Ikeja, ọ bụkwa ebe obibi jupụtara na ya nke nwere mkpocha na ụlọ dị ala
O nwere ndị bi na 633,009 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke afọ 2006
Ọ bụkwa ebe ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Wande Coal si na ya pụta
Mgbe nwere onwe 1960 gasịrị site na Great Britain, e nwere nnukwu mbata na mpaghara ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ
Nke a mere ka mmadụ jupụta nke ukwuu
N'ihi ya, adịghị ọcha na ụlọ ezughi oke na-eduga n'ọnọdụ ibi ndụ dị njọ
Otú ọ dị, kemgbe ịrị elu nke mmepụta ihe na Naijiria, Mushin awogo otu n'ime ndị kacha rite uru na mgbasawanye ụlọ ọrụ
Ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa ha na-agụnye ịkpa na ịkpa ákwà ogho, imepụta akpụkpọ ụkwụ, ịnyịnya ígwè na mkpokọta igwe kwụ otu ebe, yana mmepụta mmiri ara ehi
