MUSON Centre (ụlọ ọba egwu nke Nigeria) bụ ụlọ nzukọ na Lagos
Ụlọ nzukọ obodo ahụ dị n'etiti Lagos Island, nke dị n'agbata National Museum, Citi họọrọ, Onikan Stadium na ebe obibi mbụ nke ndị Gọvanọ Naịjirịa na n'akụkụ Tafawa Balewa Square
E guzobere égwu ọgbọ nke Nigeria (MUSON) n'afọ 1983 na saịtị nke 'Love Garden' (tupu Prince Charles kpughee ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1995)
E guzobere MUSON n'ihi mgbalị nke ụfọdụ ndị Naijiria na ndị mba ọzọ a ma ama iji nye ụlọ ọrụ maka egwu egwu oge ochie na Naijiria, ọkachasị na Lagos
Mkpa maka ọzụzụ na ntụziaka egwu kpaliri nguzobe nke Muson School of Music n'afọ 1989
MUSON na-anọchite anya nde isi nlekọta nke Royal skulu nke egwu (ABRSM) na Naijiria ma na-enye echiche ABRSM na nyocha bara uru
MUSON na-ahazi kọntaktị nke Naijiria na nke Ọdịda Anyanwụ
Ndị ukwe MUSON malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 1995 ebe ndị MUSON Symphony Orchestra, nke bụ naanị ndị ọkachamara symphony orchestra n'oge ahụ, malitere ime ihe ngosi na 2005
Ha na-eme ihe mgbe niile na MUSON Festival kwa afọ na n'oge oge egwu Society
A na-akpọkwa ndị MUSON Choir na ndị MUSÓN Symphony Orchestra ka ha rụọ ọrụ n'èzí MUSON
MUSON Skulu nke of egwu, nke egwu ọgbọ nke Nigeria guzobere N'afọ 1989 ma bụrụ nke gọọmentị etiti nke Nigeria kwadoro, bụ ụlọ ọrụ egwu zuru oke
Ọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ egwú oge ochie nke Naịjirịa maka ndị ọgbọ niile
Ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu na-agụnye ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu na ụlọ akwụkwọ diplọma
Mustafa Hussein (1935 - 16 August 2014) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-ese foto, onye na'ese ihe na onye nta akụkọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Fine Arts, ngalaba foto na 1959
N'afọ 1980, Hussein mepụtara magazin eserese kwa izu, Caricature, ya na onye na-ese ihe nkiri ibe ya Ahmed Toughan
N'ihi ihe ọ rụzuru n'afọ ndị ọ rụrụ ọrụ, Mustafa Hussein pụtara n'ọtụtụ ụzọ, dịka na Guinness Book of Somalian figures, ọ bụ aha a ma ama
Ọ natara onyinye mbụ ya afọ abụọ gara aga
Ọ bụ ihe nrite kachasị ewu ewu, Gold Award maka Duke nke Edinburgh
N'afọ 2009, e nyere Hussein onyinye Order of Distinction, First Class yana State Incentive Award na Arts nke Supreme Council of Culture (nke ikpeazụ o jidere ọzọ n'afọ 2011
N'afọ 2011, o ritere ihe nrite nke abụọ na Global Forum Art of Cartoons na Emirate of America
Ihe karịrị otu narị ndị na-ese ihe si mba ịrị ato bịara ihe omume ahụ
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, a kwanyeere ya ugwu na International Festival of Cinema na 2010 ka e nyere ya State Merit Award
Hussein nwere asambodo ekele abụọ, otu sitere na Mahadum Cambridge (2010) na otu sitere na Jami'ar Oxford (2011)
Mustafa Jaffer Sabodo mụrụ na Lindi, Tanzania site na nne na nna sitere na ndị India
Ọ bụ ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara akụ na ụba, onye na-ahụ maka ego ụgwọ ụgwọ mba ụwa, na onye ọchụnta ego
O nwere mmasị azụmahịa na India, France, Kenya, Sudan na Zimbabwe
Na 2003, o kwere nkwa inye ego maka itolite pulse maka mbupụ na ụda 100 nde TZS[] Mwalimu Nyerere Foundation National Lottery bụ echiche Sabodo, onye nyere TZS nde 800 maka ọrụ guzobe lọtrị[][]
Mustafa Maluka (amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1976, Cape Town, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-enyocha ọdịbendị
A maara ya maka ịnagide ihe nkiri na-eche ihu na njikọ nke echiche nkatọ nke oge a na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ụwa na foto ya na-akpali akpali

Ọ tolitere na Cape Town, South Africa, mànà o toro na Amsterdam, Netherlands ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na De Ateliers postgraduate art institute na Amsterdam School for Cultural analysis na Mahadum Amsterdam
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Finland

Ọrụ Maluka apụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa dịka São Paulo Bienal nké irí abụọ na asaa nà Brazil, 'World Histories' na Des Moines Art Centre, Iowa na 'Flow' na Studio Museum na HarlemMustafa Maluka gụrụ akwụkwọ na De Ateliers art institute na Mahadum Amsterdam na Netherlands ma bírí na Berlin na New York
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Turku, Finland

A gụnyere ya na ihe ngosi mba ụwa na Snug Harbor Cultural Center (2010), Studio Museum na Harlem (2008), Des Moines Art Center (2008), Stedelijk Museum Zwolle (2006) na Contemporary Museum of Honolulu (2006)
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta nke Kamel Lazaar Foundation na Sindika Dokolo Foundation na ndị ọzọ

Mustafa Maluka sonyere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na ihe ngosi otu You Love Me, You Love Me Not na Municipal Gallery na Porto, Portugal (2015) na-egosi akụkụ nke nchịkọta Sindika Dokolo nakwa na Us Is Them site na Pizzuti Collection, Columbus, USA (2015)
N'afọ 2009, o mere mkpuchi akwụkwọ mbụ gbasara nka oge a nke Afrịka, nke Sue Williamson dere, onye bụ isi na nka nka South Africa kemgbe mmalite afọ 1980
Mustafa Maluka (afọ irí anọ na abụọ) (amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Novemba n'afọ 1976 Cape Town South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-enyocha ọdịbendị
A maara ya màkà ịnagide ihe nkiri na-eche ihu na njikọ nke echiche nkatọ nke ógè a na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ụwa na foto ya na-akpali akpali

Ọ tolitere na Cape Town South Africa mana o toruru ogo na Amsterdam na Netherlands ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na De Ateliers postgraduate art institute na Amsterdam School for Cultural analysis na Mahadum Amsterdam
Ọrụ Maluka apụtala n'ihu akwụkwọ dị iche iche

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ihe osise ya nkè akpọrọ 'A pụghị ikwere na ị chere na nke m' pụtara n'ihu akwụkwọ Harper Collins South African Art Now na otu n'ime foto ya n'ihuakwụkwọ sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya 'The new media nation indigenous peoples and global communication'
E ji ihe osise sitere na 2001 na-emekọrịta ihe mee ihe dị ka mkpuchi màkà akwụkwọ 'Africa and its significant others forty years of intercultural entanglement'
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Doreen Baingana nké nwetara ọtụtụ ihe nrite nke akpọrọ 'Tropical Fish Stories Out of Entebbe' ka ejiri mkpuchi atọ chọọ yá mmá nké gosipụtara ọrụ dị iche iche nke onye na-ese ihe
Mustafa Metwalli (Arabic) (a mụrụ n'afọ 1949 - nwụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2000) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme egwuregwu
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ọchị, mana ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ dị iche iche na Drama
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1973 site na Institute of Theatrical Art nke bụ naanị ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ nwụrụ n'August 5, 2000 n'ihi nkụchi obi
Nwoke di ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Adel Emam
Mustapha Adouani (Arabic) (Ọktoba 2, 1946 ruo Disemba 14, 2006 na Tunis) bụ onye mbaTunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Mustapha Laribi a mụrụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 8, 1969) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri

Onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Higher Institute of Arts Theater na asambodo nka ya, nke gụnyere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-aga nke ọma dịka usoro 'obi na esemokwu', 'blue band' 'usoro mmekọrịta' ihe nzuzo na mgbakwunye na 'nnyocha siri ike', nke meriri Golden Art Award maka ọrụ nke abụọ kachasị mma maka ụmụ nwoke, na ihe nkiri ọhụrụ akpọrọ 'Seven Walls of the Citadel' onye nduzi Algeria 'Ahmed Rachedi', ebe ọkà okwu anyị gosipụtara ọrụ nke 'Kaid Gaballah, onye gụrụ akwụkwọ dị n' dị n'etiti ọkụ nke dị n'ihu na-achọ ọkụ nke nwa ya nke Front nke National
Mustapha Sahnoune (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 27, 1937) bụ onye Algeria na-ede egwu
Ogologo oge tupu agha Algeria amalite, Mustapha Sahnoune mepụtara ihe na ngwụcha afọ 1940, ya na ndị enyi ya, ọ kpọrọ, La Rose blanche

N'afọ 1958, ndị ndú ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mgbanwe ahụ dị na Tunis kpebiri ịmepụta ndị òtù agha abụọ ndi na-ese ihe na ndị na-eme egwuregwu ga-abụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị mmadụ na-alụ ọgụ maka nnwere onwe ya
A na-eme nnukwu arịrịọ, na-esote mkpebi a, site na Redio Tunis, 'Sawt El Djazaïr' maka ndị Algeria niile nọ na mba ahụ ma ọ bụ mba ọzọ ka ha sonye na FLN na Tunis
Otu a gosipụtara egwu nke isiokwu dị iche iche, nke na-ewu ewu karị, ruo 1954 mgbe a machibidoro ọrụ ọdịnala niile
Ozugbo ụbọchị asatọ nke Jenụwarị 28, 1957, ndị omenkà ndị a machibidoro ime ihe na mba ha weghachiri Tunisia, ndị ọzọ n'etiti ha sonyeere maquis
E jidere Sahnoune dị ka ndị obodo ya ndị ọzọ ma ndị uwe ojii na-achị France tara ya ahụhụ, n'ụbọchị a n'afọ 1957

Site n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, ndị na-agu egwu na Algeria na-enupụ isi n'akụkụ ha ma katọọ mkpu ha, arụrụala nke ndị France na-achị, site na ebe onye agha mbụ na-eme mkpesa megide okwu 'fellagha', nke ndị agha na-achị ala nyere ndị Mujahideen, bụ onye na-ede uri Moufdi Zakaria
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, Mustapha Sahnoune gara Paris na Jenụwarị 1958, ogologo oge tupu e mepụta ndị ọrụ nka nke FLN
Ọ natara ọrụ na ORTF site n'aka onye na-eme ihe ike na onye na-agụ egwu Farid Ali, onye bụ onyeisi ngalaba n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Farid nyeere ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe aka idekọ egwu na ụlọ ọrụ a iji nwee laissez-passer
ORTF nyere ndị na-agụ egwu ohere ịhazi ọtụtụ ihe ngosi maka nhazi nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke FLN
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 1958, ọ gara Tunis wee sonye n'òtù ahụ na Villa Bardo (isi ụlọ ọrụ) iji guzobe njikọ nka n'ọnwa Eprel nke otu afọ ahụ

Sahnoune nọ n'òtù ndị egwú, dị ka onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, n'akụkụ Ahmed Wahbi na oud, ndị na-agụ egwú, Hsissen, onye dere Ya Tir El Kafs na Saïd Saïh, onye na-agụ egwu Ben Ahmed, onye na-akpọ violin Mensour Boualem, Alilou na darbuka, onye na agụ egwu na na-agba egwu, Hamou Sadaoui (nwanne Salah Sadaoui) onye na-eto eto na-agụ El Rad Hadijeb na onye ọhụụ Djaâfar Bek n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Kalbi ya Bladi la nensek bụ abụ ịhụ mba n'anya mbụ Mustapha Sahnoune dere
Ọ bụ El Hadi Radjeb kụrụ abụ a mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, onye na-ede uri bụ Mustapha Toumi dere ya, onye dere Sbhan Allah ya Ltif a ma ama maka El Hadj El Anka
Abụ nke abụọ bụ Ya oumi ma tkhafich, nke Bouzidi Mohamed na El Hadi Radjeb dere ma bụrụkwa
Mustapha Sahnoune dere maka ndị ọzọ na-agu egwu dịka Said Saih onye na-abụ abụ, L Petrol na Djaâfar Bek, Ya De Gaulle

E dekọrọ Yema azizen, Bladi Ya Kalbi, Djazaïrana, Qacamen na ihe karịrị ọrụ iri ise ndị ọzọ na repertoire nke ndị otu ahụ, n'oge njem ya na Yugoslavia, na-agbasa na redio Belgrade, na site na Aissa Messaoudi na ihe ngosi ya Sawt El Djazaïr (Olu nke Algeria) na redio Tunis na ngwụcha afọ 1958
Achọrọ m otu ụbọchị ka Algeria weghachitere egwu ịhụ mba n'anya niile ewepụtara n'oge ahụ, na mba ụmụnna, ndị agbata obi na ndị enyi
Ndị a bụ ihe ndekọ nke ekwesịrị ichekwa maka ọgbọ n'ọdịnihu
Enwere ọtụtụ ihe ị ga-eche maka ụzọ a ga-esi na-edobe ihe nketa ọdịnala a na-ahụ anya na nke a na-apụghị ịhụ anya nke obodo ahụ
Ọrụ Algeria bu ihe gbasasịrị agbasasị
Anyị bụ ole na ole ga-echeta taa, ederede mgbanwe na ndị ọzọ
Onye ọ bụla na-akwado ndị otu nka nka FLN na-ahapụ ya na-ekere òkè nke akụ ahụ
Ndị ọchịchị ga-enyerịrị ngalaba a site na akụrụngwa sayensị na omenala dabara adaba
N'akụkụ egwu ịhụ mba n'anya, nke a rụpụtara, ọkachasị maka El Hadi Radjeb na Said Saih, Sahnoune, so Tahar Ben Ahmed rụrụ ọrụ na-ede ederede nke egwu châabi a ma ama
O dere maka ndị Tunisia, Mustapha Kamel na Raouf Charfi na maka nwanyị mbụ na-agụ egwu Tunisian bụ Oulaya, El Hayou Djazaïr na Ya Djazaïr y a Djamhourïa, n'oge Gọọmentị Provisional Algeria
N'afọ 1960, ọ gara Ijipt ịrụ ọrụ otu afọ na Conservatory nke Cairo, 'Sawt El Aarab', ebe o dere abụ maka Mohamed Kandil Ana Ibn El Djazaïr
Site na 1962 ruo 1972, o degaara ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto akwụkwọ ozi dịka Mohamed Rushdi, El Ghazi, Faïza El Djazaïria, Ahmed Choukri, Sami El Djazaïri na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Dijon Isaiah McFarlane (amụrụ na June 5, 1990), nke a maara dịka Mustard (nke a makwaara dị ka DJ Mustard), bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Ọ bụ ónyé na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na ndị na-ese ihe na California YG na Ty Dolla Sign; n'etiti ihe ndekọ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche màkà ụdị hip hop na R&B kemgbe ọ banyéré n'egwú ndị a ma ama na egwu Tyga nke afọ 2011, 'Rack City'
A kọwaala ụdị mmepụta Mustard dị ka ụdị up-tempo, klọb-oriented, na-adọrọ mmasị ma ọ bụ ụdị hip hop
Ụdị a emeela ka ọ bụrụ ụdị mmepụta nke oge a nke West Coast hip hop n'oge mmalite afọ 2010, nke ọ na-akpọ 'egwú ratchet'

Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mmepụta ya niile na-amalite ma ọ bụ na-ejedebe na mkpado 'Mustard on the beat, ho!', ihe atụ olu nke YG, ónyé na-ekwu ya na njedebe nke 'M dị mma', otu n'ime mmekorita mbụ ha, yana áká na ikwughachi ókwú 'hey'
A mụrụ McFarlane na Los Angeles, California na nné na nnà Jamaican
N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2013 ya na magazin The Fader, o kwùrù na a chụgara nna ya na Jamaica mgbe ọ dị obere, mana na ha ka na-akpọtụrụ
Mgbè McFarlane dị afọ iri na otu, nwanne nna ya, onye bụ nne na nna na onye DJ, hapụrụ ya DJ na oriri ezinụlọ
Ọ nwetara aha DJ ya site na condiment dijon mustard n'ihi na aha mbụ ya bụkwa Dijon
Ọ malitere DJing karịa ka ọ na-etolite, ma bụrụ onye maara nke ọma na ọrụ ahụ nke dugara ya na DJing na klọb ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Sway's Universe, DJ Mustard kọwara mmekọrịta azụmahịa ya na onye na-eti egwu West coast YG
Kemgbe mixtape nke abụọ nke YG The Real 4Fingaz, ọ mepụtara na mixtapes ya niile
'Amalitere m na-akụ màkà YG; ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ mere ịkụ m
Amalitere m na ya, yabụ na anyị ime mixtape dị mfe
Anyị mepụtara ụda ịgba egwú a
Ọ na-adị m ka anyị ji ya ụgwọ n'okporo ámá ma anyị anaghị akwụsị
' DJ Mustard emepụtala égwu YG dịka 'Bitches Ain't Shit' nke gosipụtara ndị rapper Tyga na Nipsey Hussle, na 'You Broke' nke gosipụtakwara Nipsey Hassle

N'afọ 2010, DJ Mustard wepụtara abọm nchịkọta na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na ndị omenkà dị iche iche site na akara Thump Records nke a kpọrọ Let's Jerk aha ya bụ aha égwu okporo ámá a na-akpọ jerking na Los Angeles

Muthoni Gathecha (a mụrụ na Eprel 8, 1962) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Kenya
A mụrụ ya na Eprel 8, afọ 1962, Muthoni bụ onye nkuzi na onye nchịkwa agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Kenyatta
Ọ zụrụ dịka ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ na United States International University
N'afọ 2013, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na telenovela Kenya, Kona
Ya na ndị otu Nini Wacera, Janet Sision, na Lwanda Jawar gbara egwu
O mechara laghachi na TV n'afọ 2014 mgbe ọ pụtara na Pray and Prey dịka onye ọjọọ Margaret, nne ọjọọ na onye na-echebiga onwe ya ókè
Ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ na ihe nkiri soap opera, Skandals kibao, nke ọ na-eme nne na-ahụ n'anya nke ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịla Avril na Janet Sision
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ndị a na-emepụta n'okpuru Africa Magic Movie Franchise
Ha gụnyere Shortlist, Close Knit Group, Get Me a Job, The Black Wedding, The Next Dean, na I Do

Nwa mbụ ya bụ onye na-eti egwu rap na onye na-eti egwu nke aha ya bụ Mchizi Gaza
Nwa ya nke abụọ bụ Rowzah, onye na-emepụta ejiji
Nwa ya nke ikpeazụ bụ Mizen

Mutumba Mainga ma ọ bụ Mutumba Maingu Bull (amụrụ n'afọ 1938) bụ onye Zambia na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ nwanyị Zambia mbụ nwetara PhD, nwanyị Zambia mbụ na-akụzi na Mahadum obodo Zambia, na nwanyị Zambia mbụ jere ozi dị ka Minista zuru oke na Zambia
Mutumba Mainga si Nalikolo, obodo nta dị na Mongu District
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị Induna, onye isi ndị Lozi

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Sefula Mission School, Senanga Mission School, Mabumbu Mission School, Chipembi Mission School na Goromonzi Government School, tupu ọ nweta akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na Mahadum College of Rhodesia na Nyasaland, na BA na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadụ nke London na 1963
N'afọ 1965, ọ lụrụ Nicholas Theodore Bull, nwa nwa Otto Beit
N'afọ 1969 ọ nwetara PhD
ya n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadum London
Ọ nọrọ otu afọ na nyocha postgraduate na Mahadum Cambridge
Site na afọ 1969 ruo afọ 1973 ọ kụziri akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadum Zambia
N'afọ 1973, a họpụtara Mutumba Mainga Bull ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu, dịka onye omeiwu maka Nalolo Constituency na Western Province
Site na afọ 1973 ruo na afọ 1976 ọ bụ Minista nke Ahụike
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche na UNIP tupu ọ laa ezumike nká na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na afọ 1991
N'afọ 1996, Mutumba Mainga Bull laghachiri na Mahadum Zambia dị ka Senior Research Fellow
Site na afọ 2005 ruo na afọ 2008 ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Institute of Economic and Social Research na Mahadum ahụ
Alexis Gizaro Muvuni bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ nwafọ Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka akụrụngwa na ọrụ ọha na eze na ụlọ ọrụ Lukonde
Netwọk mgbasa ozi Muwatin bụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi n'abụghị maka uru nke Arabic nke Mohammed Al-Fazari hiwere na Oman n'afọ 2013

Ọ bụ usoro mgbasa ozi nwere onwe ya nke na-ebipụta ọdịnaya na Arabic màkà ọtụtụ nsogbu metụtara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ikike obodo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ikike mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na omenala, ikike nwoke na nwanyị, mmekọahụ na ndị ọzọ

Mgbe ejidechara onye isi nchịkwa ya na onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya bụ Mohammed Al-Fazari na Oman n'afọ 2014 n'ihi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, na mgbapụ ya na UK na-achọ ebe mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a manyere Muwatin ịkwụsị ibipụta akwụkwọ n'ubochí iri na anọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2016 mgbe ejidere ya na ajụjụ ọnụ nke ndị nta akụkọ ya na-enye aka bi na Oman
Muwatin laghachiri na mbipụta akwụkwọ n'ubochí atọ n'ọnwa Mee, afọ2017 na World Press Freedom Day mgbe e debanyere aha ya na London
Muwatin (مواطن) pụtara 'onye amaala' n'asụsụ Arabic
A họọrọ aha ahụ n'ihi na Muwatin na-eche maka nsogbu ụmụ amaala na Gulf na mba ndị Arab ma ọ na-achọ ịmepụta steeti ụmụ amaala
Mohammed Al-Fazari hiwere Muwatin n'ọnwa June ụbọchị isii, n'afọ 2013, iji mepụta ohere maka nnwere onwe ikwu okwu maka olu Omani na Arab

Ọrụ ahụ malitere n'afọ ofufo, ebe ọ bụ na enweghị ike inweta ego n'ime Oman n'ihi iwu nchịkọta akụkọ nke netwọk ahụ, iwu Omani machibidoro ego sitere na mba ofesi n'ihi ọdịnaya Muwatin na-ahụ maka nsogbu nke nnwere onwe na ikike mmadụ
Muwatin na-enyocha ihe mmemmé ndị Arab ma na-eche maka nsogbu ụmụ amaala na mpaghara Gulf na ụwa ndị Arab

Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi kwụụrụ onwe ya, nke na-ebipụta ọdịnaya n'asụsụ Arabic n'ihe ọtụtụ nsogbu metụtara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ikike obodo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ikike mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na omenala, ikike nwoke na nwanyị, mmekọahụ na ndị ọzọ
Muyiwa Ademola (a mụrụ na 26 Jenụwarị 1971) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
N'afọ 2005, ihe nkiri ya bụ ORI (Fate) nwetara mmeri ihe nkiri kacha mma na 1st Africa Movie Academy Awards
N'afọ 2008, a họpụtara ya maka 4th Africa Movie Academy Awards for Most Outstanding Indigenous Actor
A mụrụ ya na 26 Jenụwarị afọ 1971 na Abeokuta, isi obodo Ogun Steeti ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ọ gara St
David's High School dị a Molete na Ibadan ebe ọ nwetara asambodo West Africa Secondary School
O mechara gaa Mahadum nke Ibadan ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ nke agụmakwụkwọ na agụmakwụkwọ ndị okenye
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa site n'aka Charles Olumo, onye a maara dịka Agbako onye bi n'obodo ya, Abeokuta
O mechara zute onye nduzi ihe nkiri a na-akpọ SI Ola onye kụziiri ya ka e si eme ihe nkiri na mmepụta ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'ụzọ zuru ezu n'afọ 1991
N'afọ 1995, o mepụtara edemede mbụ ya n'ime ihe nkiri akpọrọ Asise nke pụtara BLUNDER na Bekee
Ọ bụ Dibel kwadoro mmepụta ahụ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ịmepụta set
Kemgbe afọ 1995, ọ mepụtara, duzie ma gosipụta na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Yoruba Nollywood
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, a kọrọ na o nwere ihe mberede na-egbu egbu, nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ nwụọ
Muyumba bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Mvanip (Mvano), ma ọ bụ Magu, bụ obere asụsụ Mambiloid nke Naijiria
N'agbanyeghị ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ndị na-asụ ya, iji asụsụ eme ihe siri ike
Ethnologue na-ekewa Mvanip dị ka ihe na-eyi egwu
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1964, Mvanip nwere ndị ọkà okwu 800 n'ime na gburugburu obodo Zongo Ajiya, nke dị na Mambila Plateau na Naịjirịa
Ka ọ na-erule 1999, naanị ihe dị ka 100 ndị na-asụ asụsụ ahụ
N'agbanyeghị nke a, ụmụ niile nke ndị na-asụ Mvanip ka na-asụrụ asụsụ ahụ, nke pụtara na ọ ka dị ndụ
A na-asụkwa Fulfulde, Mambila, na Ndoro na Zongo Ajiya
Ọtụtụ na-agbagwoju Mvanip anya na asụsụ Kaka, nke a na-asụ na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa na mpaghara ndị gbara ya gburugburu na Cameroon
N'agbanyeghị mgbagwoju anya ahụ, asụsụ abụọ a enweghị njikọ
Asụsụ kacha nwee njikọ chiri anya bụ Ndunda, nke dịkwa na Mambila Plateau
Ụfọdụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ Mvanip nwere njikọ bụ Fam, Nizaa, Kwanja, Mambila, Vute na Wawa, nke niile sitere na proto-Mambiloid
Ọ bụ ezie na enweghi ọtụtụ ozi gbasara phonology nke Mvanip n'onwe ya, enwere ozi gbasara phonological nke asụsụ ya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-eji egbugbere ọnụ eme ihe nke ukwuu na Kwanja na Nizaa, asụsụ Mambiloid abụọ ọzọ
Njikọ ụdaume n'asụsụ ndị dị ka Mambila na-atụ aro, na Mvanip nwere ike ịnwe ụdaume ole na ole karịa nna nna ha, proto-Mambiloid
Ọ bụghị ihe doro anya ma ụdaume ma ọ bụ ụdaume ọ bụla na-ada ụda na Mvanip, dịka ụfọdụ n'ime ndị ikwu ya nwere ụda ụda na ụfọdụ enweghị
Asụsụ Mambiloid niile yiri ka ha nwere usoro ụda olu dị mgbagwoju anya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Vute, Kwanja, Atta na Gembu Mambila niile nwere ọkwa dịgasị iche iche na ụda dị iche iche, nke a na-etinye n'okwu ahụ
Asụsụ Mambiloid nwekwara usoro ntinye aha
Àtụ Northern Bantoid languages
Mwaghavul (nke a makwaara dị ka Mupun na Sura) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic, a na-asụ na Plateau State, karịsịa na Mangu LGA, Middle Belt Region nke Nigeria
Asụsụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere, Mupun na Takas
Mwaghavul nwere otu n'ime usoro kachasị mma nke logophoricity a maara n'asụsụ ọ bụla (lee logophorticity)
Mwaghavul nwere ụdaume isii ndị gụnyere /a, e, i, ɨ, o, u/

Mwakpo nke Septemba 11, nke a na-akpọkarị 9/11, [lower-alpha 4] bụ mwakpo ndị na-eyi ọha egwu igbu onwe anọ a haziri ahazi bụ ndị otu ndị otu Islamist extremist network al-Qaeda mere megide United States na Septemba 11, 2001
N'ụtụtụ ahụ, ndị na-eyi ọha egwu 19
tọọrọ ụgbọ elu anọ azụmahịa ha chọrọ isi na mpaghara New England na Mid-Atlantic nke East Coast gaa California
Ndị tọọrọ n'ụgbọelu abụọ mbụ kpọkatara n'ụlọ elu Twin Towers nke World Trade Center dị na New York City, ụlọ abụọ n'ime ụlọ ise kacha ogologo n'ụwa n'oge ahụ

Ndị omekome ahụ bu n'obi ụgbọ elu abụọ na-esote n'ebe ndị e lekwasịrị anya na mpaghara Washington metropolitan dị ka akụkụ nke mwakpo a na-ahazi n'otu aka ahụ na isi obodo mba ahụ, wee feba ụgbọ elu nke atọ n'ime Pentagon, isi ụlọ ọrụ US Department of Defence na Arlington County, Virginia
Nke anọ e bu n’obi ịkụtu ụlọ gọọmentị etiti dị nso na Washington, DC
mana dara n’ime ime obodo Pennsylvania ka otu ndị njem nupụrụ isi
Mwakpo a gburu ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mmadụ 3,000 ma kpalite agha afọ iri zuru ụwa ọnụ megide ụjọ
Mmetụta mbụ bụ nke ụgbọ elu American Airlines Flight 11, bụ nke dara na North Tower nke World Trade Center complex na Lower Manhattan na 08 46
6] Ụgbọ elu United Airlines 175 kụrụ World Trade Center's South Tower
Ụlọ elu abụọ ahụ dị akụkọ 110 dara n'ime otu awa na nkeji iri anọ na otu, [ala-alpha 7] wetara mbibi nke ihe owuwu ise fọdụrụ na WTC mgbagwoju anya
, yana imebi ma ọ bụ mebie ụlọ dị iche iche ndị ọzọ gbara ụlọ elu ahụ gburugburu
Ụgbọ elu nke atọ, American Airlines Flight 77, dara na Pentagon n'elekere 09 37, kpatara ndakpọ akụkụ ụfọdụ
Ụgbọ elu nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ, United Airlines Flight 93, fere n'akụkụ isi obodo ahụ

N'ịbụ ndị a mara na mwakpo ndị gara aga, ndị njem ahụ megwara na mbọ ha na-achịkwa ụgbọ elu ahụ, na-amanye ndị na-agba ọsọ ụgbọ elu ahụ na mpaghara Stonycreek Township, dị nso na Shanksville n'elekere 10 03 n'ụtụtụ ahụ
Ndị nyocha kpebiri na ebumnuche Flight 93 bụ US Capitol ma ọ bụ White House
N'ime awa ole na ole nke mwakpo ahụ, Central Intelligence Agency kpebiri na ọ bụ al-Qaeda kpatara ya

United States meghachiri site n'ịmalite agha megide iyi egwu na ịwakpo Afghanistan iji wepụ ndị Taliban, nke jụrụ ọnọdụ nke usoro US iji chụpụ al-Qaeda na Afghanistan ma nyefee onye ndú ya, Osama bin Laden
Nkwupụta nke US nke Nkeji edemede 5 nke Nkwekọrịta North Atlantic - naanị ojiji ya ruo ugbu a - kpọrọ ndị enyi ka ha lụso al-Qaeda ọgụ
Ka ndị agha mwakpo US na NATO na-agafe Afghanistan, bin Laden furu efu n'ime White Mountains, na-ezere ndị agha ọdịda anyanwụ
Ọ bụ ezie na bin Laden na mbụ gọnahụrụ itinye aka ọ bụla, n'afọ 2004 o kwuru na ọ bụ ya kpatara mwakpo ahụ
Ihe ndị Al-Qaeda kwuru gụnyere mwakpo Israel wakporo South Lebanon na 1982, ọnụnọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha US na Saudi Arabia, na mbibi nke UNSC kpatara Iraq
Mgbe ọ gbanahụrụ ijide ya ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri, ndị agha US gburu bin Laden na Mee 2, 2011
Ndị agha US na NATO nọgidere na Afghanistan ruo 2021
mana ọ kwụsịrị ikweta na ọ bụ ya kpatara mwakpo ahụ
Bin Laden kwuru na ya onwe ya nyere ndị na-eso ụzọ ya iwu ịwakpo World Trade Center na Pentagon

Vidio ọzọ Al Jazeera nwetara na Septemba 2006 na-egosi bin Laden na otu n'ime ndị isi na-eme atụmatụ mwakpo ahụ, Ramzi bin al-Shibh, yana ndị ohi abụọ, Hamza al-Ghamdi na Wail al-Shehri, ka ha na-akwadebe maka mwakpo ahụ
ebughị bin Laden ebubo maka mwakpo nke Septemba 11, mana ọ nọ na Ndepụta FBI kachasị achọ maka bọmbụ nke ụlọ ọrụ nnọchi anya US na Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, na Nairobi, Kenya
Mgbe afọ iri gachara, Onye isi ala US Barack Obama kwupụtara na ndị agha pụrụ iche nke America gburu bin Laden n'ogige ya na Abbottabad, Pakistan, na Mee 1, 2011
Onye nta akụkọ Yosri Fouda nke ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn Arabic Al Jazeera kọrọ na n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2002 onye otu al-Qaeda bụ Khalid Sheikh Mohammed kwetara na ya na Ramzi bin al-Shibh sonyere na mwakpo ahụ
Mohammed bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ na onye na-ahụ maka ego nke bọmbụ World Trade Center nke 1993 na nwanne nna Ramzi Yousef, onye na-ebute bọmbụ na mwakpo ahụ
Na Septemba 26, 2005, ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Spain mara Abu Dahdah ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ 27 maka ịkpa nkata maka mwakpo 9/11 na ịbụ onye otu ndị na-eyi ọha egwu al-Qaeda
N'otu oge ahụ, a mara ndị otu al-Qaeda 17 ọzọ ikpe ntaramahụhụ dị n'agbata afọ isii na iri na otu
Na Febụwarị 16, 2006, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Spain belatara ntaramahụhụ Abu Dahdah ruo afọ iri na abụọ n'ihi na o lere ya anya na enweghi ihe akaebe maka ya na nkata ahụ
Nkwupụta Osama bin Laden banyere agha dị nsọ megide United States, na 1998 nke bin Laden na ndị ọzọ bịanyere aka, na-akpọ maka igbu ndị America, ndị nyocha na-ahụ dị ka ihe akaebe nke mkpali ya
Mgbe mwakpo ahụ gasịrị, bin Laden na Ayman al-Zawahiri wepụtara vidio ndị ọzọ na ndekọ ọdịyo, ụfọdụ n'ime ha kwughachiri ihe kpatara mwakpo ahụ
Akwụkwọ abụọ dị mkpa karịsịa bụ 2002 'Letter to America' nke bin Laden na vidio 2004 nke bin Laden
Bin Laden kọwara Muhammad dị ka onye machibidoro 'ọnụnọ na-adịgide adịgide nke ndị na-ekweghị ekwe na Arabia'
N'afọ 1996, bin Laden wepụtara fatwā na-akpọ ndị agha America ka ha hapụ Saudi Arabia

N'afọ 1998, al-Qaeda dere 'ruo ihe karịrị afọ asaa United States anọwo na-ebi n'ala ndị Alakụba n'ebe kachasị nsọ, Arab Peninsula, na-apụnara ndị ọgaranya ya, na-agwa ndị ọchịchị ya, na'emenye ndị agbata obi ya ihere, na-eyi ndị agbata obi egwu, ma na-agbanwe ntọala ya na Peninsula ka ọ bụrụ ube iji lụso ndị Alakụbụrụ ha agbata obi ha ọgụ'

Na fatwā nke afọ 1998, al-Qaeda gosipụtara mmachibido iwu Iraq dị ka ihe kpatara igbu ndị America, na-akatọ 'mgbochi ogologo oge' n'etiti omume ndị ọzọ nke mejupụtara nkwupụta agha megide 'Allah, onye ozi ya, na ndị Alakụba'

Fatwā kwupụtara na 'iwu igbu ndị America na ndị enyi ha - ndị nkịtị na ndị agha bụ ọrụ onwe onye maka onye Alakụba ọ bụla nwere ike ime ya na mba ọ bụla o kwere omume ime ya, iji tọhapụ ụlọ alakụba al-Aqsa na ụlọ alakụka dị nsọ nke Mecca n'aka ha, na iji mee ka ndị agha ha [ndị America] pụọ n'ala niile nke Islam, merie ma ghara iyi ndị Alakụba egwu'
N'afọ 2004, Bin Laden kwuru na echiche nke ibibi ụlọ elu ahụ bụ nke mbụ o mere n'afọ 1982, mgbe ọ hụrụ bọmbụ Israel tụrụ n'ụlọ elu dị elu n'oge Agha Lebanọn nke afọ 1982
Ụfọdụ ndị nyocha, gụnyere ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị John Mearsheimer na Stephen Walt, kwukwara na nkwado US na Israel bụ otu ihe kpatara mwakpo ahụ

N'afọ 2004 na 2010, bin Laden jikọtara mwakpo nke Septemba 11 na nkwado US maka Israel, ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ ozi ahụ gosipụtara nlelị bin Laden nwere maka Onye isi ala Bush na olileanya bin Laden 'ibibi na imebi' US

Mwakpo nke Anjouan (nke a na-akpọ Operation Democracy na Comoros), na Machị 25, 2008, bụ mwakpo amphibious nke Comoros duziri, nke ndị agha African Union (AU) kwadoro, gụnyere ndị agha si Sudan, Tanzania, Senegal, yana nkwado nhazi sitere na Libya na France

ebumnobi ya maka mbuso agha ahụ bụ ịkwatu ọchịchị Colonel Mohamed Bacar na Anjouan, bụ agwaetiti dị na Union of Comoros, mgbe ọ jụrụ ịla n'iyi mgbe e nwechara ntuli aka 2007 arụrịtara ụka, na-emegide ọchịchị etiti na AU
Agwaetiti Comoros nke dị n'Oké Osimiri India enweela akụkọ na-agbawa agbawa kemgbe nnwere onwe ya na France n'afọ 1975, na-enweta ihe karịrị ọchịchị iri abuo ma ọ bụ nwara ịchị ọchịchị
Mwakpo ahụ mere n'isi ụtụtụ nke Maachị 25, 2008
E meriri obodo ndị bụ isi ngwa ngwa ma kwupụta n'àgwàetiti ahụ n'okpuru nchịkwa nke ndị agha mbuso agha n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
Mohamed Bacar jisiri ike gbapụ na Mayotte na Machị 26 wee rịọ maka mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ndị ọchịchị France mechara jide ya n’ebe ahụ ma kpọbata ya n’agwaetiti Réunion
Na Mee 15, France jụrụ arịrịọ Bacar maka mgbaba, mana ụlọ ọrụ ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ nke France kpebiri na enweghị ike ịnyefe onye ndú ahụ a chụpụrụ na Comoros n'ihi ihe ize ndụ nke mkpagbu

Gọọmenti etiti mba Comora na-egbu oge ime ntuli aka na Anjouan n'ihi mmebi iwu na egwu egwu, mana Bacar ebipụta akwụkwọ ntuli aka ma mee ntuli aka na June, na-ekwu na mmeri dị elu nke pasent iri itoolu
Na Machị 2008, ọtụtụ narị ndị agha gọọmentị Comoran malitere ịgbakọ na Mohéli, nke dị nso na Anjouan karịa agwaetiti buru ibu, Grande Comore
Sudan na Senegal nyere ngụkọta nke ndị agha narị asaa na iri ise, ebe Libya nyere nkwado maka ọrụ ahụ
Na mgbakwunye, ndị agha Tanzania narị ise ga-abata n'oge na-adịghị anya
France, nke bụbu ike ọchịchị, nyekwara aka n'ọrụ ahụ site n'ibubata ndị agha AU n'ebe ahụ
Nkwa nke nguzogide sitere n'aka onye isi oche nke Anjouan nke kwuputara onwe ya nwere okwu siri ike sitere n'aka onye nnọchiteanya AU, na-ekwu 'Ọ ga-eju afọ
M na-atụ egwu ịsị na ọ bụrụ na ọ nwaa ime nke ahụ, ọ ga-abụ njedebe ya
n'anụ ahụ, ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa
' N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na IRIN, Bacar kwuru, sị 'Onye isi ala Ahmed Abdallah Mohamed] Sambi amaghị ihe ọ bụla gbasara ndị agha, mana ọ bụrụ na m ga-adụ ya ọdụ, m ga-ekwu na ọ bụghị ihe ngwọta
Oge mbụ ndị agha bịara anyị chụpụrụ ha
Oge nke abụọ [May 2007] ndị agha bịara anyị chụpụrụ ha
Nke ahụ pụtara na ọ bụrụ na ha agbalị ịbịa nke ugboro atọ, anyị ga-achụpụ ha
Anjouan kwere nkwa ime ntuli aka ọhụrụ na Mee 2008, nke onye isi ala South Africa Thabo Mbeki kwadoro dịka ụzọ isi dozie nsogbu ahụ
Mbeki nwara ọzọ ịkwụsị mbuso agha ahụ na Maachị 14 mana AU leghaara atụmatụ ya anya na mbuso agha ahụ gara n'ihu
Na Machị 3, 2008, ụgbọ mmiri na-ebute mmanụ na-enye ndị agha Comoros ọkụ n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke isi obodo Comoros, Moroni
A maghị ihe kpatara ọkụ ahụ
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Machị, e jidere ndị agha atọ n'àgwàetiti ndị ahụ ebe e jidere mmadụ atọ n'òtù ndị agha Anjouan na-eguzosi ike n'ihe nye Onye isi ala Bacar ma kpọga ha Mohéli maka ajụjụ ọnụ
Mmekọrịta mmekọrịta mba na mba gara n'ihu site na ntinye aka nke Onye isi ala South Africa bụ Mbeki onye nwara igbu oge mwakpo AU a na-eme atụmatụ na-eme ka gọọmentị Comorian ghara inwe obi ụtọ
↵Aghọtara na Mbeki gwara onye isi otu AU, onye isi ala Tanzania Jakaya Kikwete, site na ekwentị na Maachị 14 iji kwụsị mbọ ịchụpụ Bacar
N'agbanyeghị mbọ Mbeki gbalịsiri ike ịkwụsị mbuso agha a, ụgbọ mmiri na ndị agha hapụrụ Moheli gawa Anjouan na March 14
E nwere okwu ndị na-emegiderịta onwe ha sitere n'akụkụ abụọ ahụ, ebe ndị isi ndị agha Comoran na AU na-akọ na ụgbọ mmiri bu ihe ruru ndị agha iri ise sitere na Gọọmenti Comoros rutere
na ndịda Anjouan ma nwaa ijide ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii

Na nkwupụta mechara, onye isi ndị ọrụ Comoran Salim Mohamed degharịrị ozi ahụ wee sị na ndị otu nyocha nke ihe dị ka ndị agha iri rutere na Machị 14 na ndịda agwaetiti Anjouan wee rute obodo Domoni dị na ndịda
Otu akwụkwọ gọọmentị etiti kwuru na ndị agha abụọ merụrụ ahụ
'Ebumnuche nke ọrụ ahụ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Domoni dị na Anjouan iji tọhapụ ndị mkpọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, 'ka onye isi iyi ahụ kwuru
Ndị agha ahụ laghachiri Mohéli wee laghachi Anjouan na Sọnde 16 Machị iji napụta ndị agha abụọ ahụ merụrụ ahụ
Dị ka otu onye agha si kwuo, otu onye agha gọọmentị etiti merụrụ ahụ n'aka na onye ọzọ nwere obere mmerụ ahụ n'ụkwụ
Otu akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ kwuru na n'oge ọrụ ahụ 'ihe dị ka mmadụ iri abụọ' na Domoni nwụrụ n'ihi bọmbụ Comoran na AU nke ọnọdụ Anjouanais
Ndị ọchịchị Anjouan na-agbagha eziokwu ndị a, bụ ndị kwusiri ike na otu n'ime ndị agha Comoran abụọ wakporo ọnọdụ Anjouanais na Domoni na Maachị 15 anwụọla n'ezie na e jideghị ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii
Ha kwuru na ndị agha Comoran na ndị AU bụ ndị agha Anjouanais zoro n'oge mmalite nke mbubata ha na Domoni na a manyere ha ịla azụ n'ọnọdụ enweghị olileanya

A kpalitere ọrụ France na nsogbu ahụ mgbe, na Machị 19, helikopta ndị uwe ojii France na-enweghị ikike, ozi nzuzo sitere n'agwaetiti Comoro nke Mayotte nke France na-achị dara n'oké osimiri dị nso n'obodo Sima na Anjouan
Ọ bụ ndị uwe ojii ikuku na oke ala France nke Mayotte nwe helikopta ahụ
Ndị nkatọ na-ekwu na helikọpta ahụ so na mgbalị iwebata Bacar n'ebe a chụgara ya na France, nakwa na Bacar nọ na-eguzogide ya ogologo oge n'ihi na ndị France chebere ya
Lieutenant-Colonel Salimou Mohamed Amiri, ọnụ na-ekwuchitere gọọmentị Comoros, kwupụtara
Ndị agha France ebularị ihe dị ka ndị agha Tanzania 300 na tọn 30 nke ibu na Grand Comore n'etiti Machị 14 na Machị 16
Dị ka akụkọ si kwuo, otu onye nnọchi anya mba France kwuru na France adịla njikere ibuga ndị agha Senegal, mana emebeghị nke ahụ
Isi iyi nke diplomatic kwuru na France ka dị 'mma' maka mkparịta ụka mana ọ bụrụ na Bacar na-anabata ọnụnọ nke ndị agha Africa n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Anjouan
N'ụtụtụ nke Machị 24, 2008, ụgbọ mmiri ise na-ebu ihe dịka ndị agha AU 1,500 hapụrụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Fomboni, isi obodo agwaetiti Mohéli
Bacar na ndị agha ya kwere nkwa ịlụ ọgụ ruo mgbe nwoke ikpeazụ guzo ọtọ, na onye isi Anjouan na-ekwu, 'Anyị ga-alụ ọgụ ruo mgbe anyị nwụrụ'
A kọrọ na ụgbọ elu akpa ejiri kpọchie ụzọ ụgbọ elu dị n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu Ouani dị nso na Mutsamudu na ikuku adịkwaghị mma ka agwaetiti ahụ na-akwado onwe ya maka mwakpo na-abịa
Tupu ebibie ahịrị ekwentị ahụ, a kpọtụrụ ọnụ na-ekwuchitere gọọmentị Anjouan na-ekwu, sị 'Ha ekpebiela igbu ma anyị anaghị atụ egwu
Anyị jikere nke ọma
Ndị agha anyị dị njikere ma ọ ga-arụ ọrụ!'
Ihe dị ka ndị agha 450 rutere n'akụkụ ugwu nke Anjouan Bay n'isi ụtụtụ na 25 March
A nụrụ mgbọ mbụ n'ihe dị ka elekere 5 nke ụtụtụ (GMT+3) n'àgwàetiti ahụ, n'ime obodo Ouani, nso ọdụ ụgbọ elu na ebe obibi onye isi ala
Ndị agha jikọtara ọnụ gara n'ihu ngwa ngwa n'obodo Ouani iji chekwaa ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule n'etiti ehihie, a gbahapụrụ obí onye isi ala
Mana ndị nta akụkọ ndị ọzọ kọrọ na ndị agha AU 'gbalịsi ike ịga n'ihu n'okpuru ọkụ nke ndị agha Anjouan' ma n'ehihie 'esemokwu na artillery dị arọ nọgidere na-ama jijiji obodo Ouani'
A kọrọ na ndị agha na-achọ ebe Bacar zoro
Bacar jisiri ike gbalaga Mayotte site na ụgbọ mmiri ọsọ, na akụkọ na Machị 26 kwadoro ọnụnọ ya n'àgwàetiti ahụ ma kwuo na ọ rịọrọ maka mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na France
Associated Press kọrọ site na Paris na France na-atụle arịrịọ maka mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mana ndị isi Comoran na ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na Comoros chọrọ ka France weghachite Bacar na Comoros

France kwuru na ọ na-emeso arịrịọ ịgba ọsọ ndụ ngwa ngwa o kwere mee, mana, na Machị 27, a kpọgara Bacar n'àgwàetiti Réunion nke France, ebe a na-ebo ya ebubo ma na-enyocha ya maka ịbanye n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị n'ókèala France mgbe ọ na-ebu ngwá agha, tinyere ndị na-eso ụzọ ya 23
A jụrụ ikpe ahụ n'ihi ihe ndị metụtara usoro, mana Bacar na mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ ndị ọzọ nọgidere na-ejide ha
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị nke March, ejidere ọtụtụ ndị na-akwado Bacar a ma ama, gụnyere Caabi El-Yachroutu, onye bụbu osote onye isi ala, Prime Minister, na Onye isi oche nke Comoros

Achọtara mmadụ atọ ndị ọzọ na nzuzo na nso Domoni na Machị 29, gụnyere Mohamed Abdou Mmadi (onye bụbu Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ụgbọ njem na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Bacar), Ibrahim Halidi (onye bụbu Prime Minister na onye ndụmọdụ Bacar), na Ahmed Abdallah Sourette (onye bụbu Onye isi ala
Ụlọikpe Iwu)
N'April 5, a kpọchiri Bacar n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Comoran President Sambi gara Anjouan na mbido April, bụ akara nleta mbụ ya na agwaetiti ahụ kemgbe May 2007
O kwuru na ya na-atụ anya na nkewa na Anjouan ga-akwụsị na mwepụ nke Bacar n'ọchịchị, ma too ndị ndú Africa bụ ndị nyere aka maka enyemaka
mbuso agha
N'adịghị ka akụkọ ndị gara aga na France megidere mwakpo ahụ, France nyere nkwado ya ma nyere aka bufee ndị agha African Union n'àgwàetiti ahụ
Minista na-ahụ maka mba ofesi nke France Bernard Kouchner kwusiri ike na Eprel 8 na France akwadoghị Bacar ma ọ bụ nye ya nchebe ọ bụla, nakwa na ọ kwadoro ntinye aka nke African Union
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel, a tọhapụrụ Bacar, ya na mmadụ iri abụọ na otu n'ime ndị nche ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ma laghachi n'ụlọ ndị agha nọ n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu Réunion

N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Eprel, a mara ọkwa na ụlọ ọrụ France na-ahụ maka ichebe ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na ndị na-enweghị ala (Office français de protection des réfugiés et apatrides; OFPRA) enyewo ndị ikom abụọ nke Bacar ebe mgbaba ma jụ ebe mgbaba maka isii n'ime ha; a ga-eziga ndị a jụrụ arịrịọ ha na mba nke atọ ma ghara ịlaghachi na Comoros n'ihi egwu nke mkpagbu
OFPRA ka na-achịkwa ikpe Bacar ma ọ bụ ndị ikom ya ndị ọzọ
Ajụrụ arịrịọ Bacar mgbapu na Mee 15
Odeakwụkwọ nke steeti France maka mba ofesi, Yves Jégo kwuru na France ga-akwado mbọ gọọmentị Comoran
'Anyị ga-aga n'ihu na-eme mkparịta ụka na Comoros ka e wee tinye iwu ahụ ma nwee ike ikpe Colonel Bacar
' Nhọrọ onye isi ala na Anjouan mere na June 15 na June 29
Moussa Toybou meriri ntuli aka ahụ, onye meriri Mohamed Djaanfari na agba nke abụọ
Mwanga, or Namwanga (Nyamwanga), bu asusu Bantu nke ndi Mwanga na mpaghara ugwu nke Zambia (nke di karimi na mpaghara Isoka na Nakonde) na mpaghara Mbeya, naTanzania
Igu onu 2010 nke Zambian nwetara ihe di onu ogu 140,000 ndi nkwuputa
Onu ogu nke ndi Tanzania bu ihe amaghi Ethnologue gosiri onu ogu sitere na 1987 nke 87,000
E nwekwara ụfọdụ ndị na-asụ Namwanga n'akụkụ ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Chitipa District n'ebe ugwu Malawi
Asụsụ Namwanga yiri asụsụ nke Mambwe nke ndị Mambwe nke mpaghara Mbala na Mpulungu na ndị Lungu na-asụkwa na Isoka
Ndị ọzọ dị obere gụnyere Lambyas, Nyikas na Wandyas

Mwele Ntuli Malecela (26 Machị 1963 ruo 10 Febụwarị 2022) bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị Tanzania bụ onye isi ọrụ United Nations na onye nduzi nke Ngalaba Nchịkwa nke Ọrịa Tropical A Na-eleghara anya na isi ụlọ ọrụ World Health Organization na Geneva, Switzerland

Nna ya, John Malecela, nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị elu na Tanzania, gụnyere nke Praịm Minista na osote onye isi ala mbụ, Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ, onye nnọchi anya United Nations na Kọmishọna Ukwu na United Kingdom

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Zoology na Mahadum Dar es Salaam, ọ sonyeere Tanzania's National Institute for Medical Research (NIMR) n'afọ 1987, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Amani Center iji mee nchọpụta na lymphatic filariasis
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine, ebe ọ gụsịrị MSc (1990) na PhD (1995)

Ọ gara n'ihu na nyocha ya na NIMR mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, wee bụrụ onye nduzi nke Nhazi Nnyocha na Nkwalite (DRCP) n'afọ 1998 tupu ọ gaa n'ihu ịghọ onye nduzi mmemme Lymphatic Filariasis n'afọ 2000, nke na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na mpaghara 53 (ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nde mmadụ iri na atọ)
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ NIMR's Director General, ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa a
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2015, ọ gara ezumike iji chụsoo ọchịchọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya

N'afọ 2017, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara WHO maka Africa n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2017 dị ka onye nduzi na ụlọ ọrụ onye nduzi mpaghara (RD) nke na-ahụ maka inye iwu, ndụmọdụ nchịkwa na nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na RD, ịhazi na ime ka atụmatụ ọrụ maka ngalaba niile nọ n'okpuru ụlọ ọrụ RD, yana nlekota mmejuputa mkpebi iwu nke ndị na-achị WHO
O nyekwara nkwado na RD na ntụziaka atụmatụ nke ọrụ WHO na mpaghara ahụ

N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2018 onye isi nchịkwa nke WHO, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, họpụtara ya dịka onye isi nchịk nke Ngalaba Nchịkwa nke Ọrịa Tropical A Na-eleghara anya, nke dị na isi ụlọ ọrụ nke nzukọ ahụ na Geneva
Malecela sonyeere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania, Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM), n'afọ 1981 mgbe ọ nọ na KilaKala
N'oge ahụ, ndị otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị chọrọ usoro mbata, nke Dr
Malecela gara n'ọnwa Eprel, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ ghọrọ onye otu zuru oke
Ọ gbara ọsọ maka ntuli aka na CCM presidential primaries, nke mere n'ọnwa July 2015 iji chọpụta onye CCM ga-ahọpụta maka onye isi ala nke Tanzania
Mwenda bụ aha Africa nyere aha na aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Mwera bụ asụsụ Bantu di na obodo nke Tanzania
My Barbarian bụ otu ihe nkiri na-arụkọ ọrụ na Los Angeles nké gụnyere Malik Gaines, Jade Gordon na Alexandro Segade

Ha atọ na-eme ihe ngosi na-emeghachi omume na saịtị na ntinye vidiyo nké na-eji egwuregwu ihe nkírí iji wepụta akụkọ ihe atụ site na nsogbụ akụkọ ihe méré eme, esemokwu akụkọ ifo, na nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ugbu a
Kemgbe 2004, My Barbarian egosila ọrụ nà ihe ngosi otu na/ma ọ bụ mmemme arụmọrụ n'ebe egwuregwu gụnyere

REDCAT; LACMA; Hammer Museum; LAXART; Schindler House; LACE; Steve Turner Contemporary, Los Angeles; New Museum; Whitney Museum; Studio Museum in Harlem; Participant, Inc; PS1; Joe's Pub; Anton Kern Gallery, New York; Yerba Buena Center, San Francisco; MOCA, Miami; Hyde Park Art Center, Chicago; Aspen Art Museum; Contemporary Arts Forum, Santa Barbara; Vox Populi, Philadelphia; Estacion Tijuana & Lui Velazquez, Tijuana Mexico; The Power Plant, Toronto; De Appel, Amsterdam; Peres Projects, Berlin; Torpedo, Oslo; El Matadero, Madrid; Galleria Civica, Trento, Italy; Center for Contemporary Art, Tel Aviv; Townhouse Gallery, Cairo
My Barbarian was included in the 2005 and 2007 Performa Biennials, the 2006 and 2008 California Biennials, the 2007 Montreal Biennial, and the 2009 Baltic Triennial
The group has made two full-length albums of music from its performances Cloven Soft-Shoe (2004) and California Sweet & the 7 Pagan Rights (2008)
My Barbarian nwèrè ihe ngosi onwé ya na Steve Turner Contemporary na Los Angeles (2008, 2009) na na Participant, Inc
na New York (2009)
N'afọ 2008, otu ahụ mèrè ihe ngosi jikọrọ aka na ónyé na-ese ihe Lara Schnitger na Museum Het Domain, Sittard, NL, nke, na 2009, gara Luckman Gallery na Los Angeles
N'afọ 2016, My Barbarian gosipụtara ebe óbíbí na ngosi na New Museum nke akpọrọ The Audience is Always Right
Akụkụ ahụ dọtara ihe nkírí, nka anya, omume dị oke egwu, na arụmọrụ kpọmkwem iji mee ihe nkiri maka nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
My Barbarian meriri onyinye Creative Capital na 2012 maka ọrụ ha, Post-Living Ante-Action Theater
Akụkụ ahụ gosipụtara na New Museum dị ka The Audience is Always Right
Ha nwetakwara onyinye Foundation for Contemporary Arts Grants to Artists na 2013
My Secret Life on the McJob Lessons from Behind the Counter Guaranteed to Supersize Any Management Style bụ akwụkwọ Jerry Newman dere banyere ọrụ a na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ala na ụlọ ahịa nri ngwa ngwa

Newman bụ prọfesọ a ma ama na Mahadum dị na Buffalo (NY) School of Management onye kụziri ihe ọmụmụ azụmahịa ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 30, wee gaa na nzuzo dị ka onye ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ maka nnukwu aha na nri ngwa ngwa, gụnyere McDonald na Burger King
Akwụkwọ a enweela nyocha dị mma
The Wall Street Journal dere,
Jerry Newman nyere akụkọ ifo ntụrụndụ na nkọwa magburu onwe ya nke ndị na'ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ọ bụla

Ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe maka akwụkwọ azụmahịa na'enye ndụmọdụ njikwa, a kwadoro, My Secret Life on the McJob e dere ya site n'echiche nke otu onye sị n'ebe atumanya nke onye isi karịa nke njirimara nke onye nchekwa nke hụrụ ihe nhịa ahụ n'ịguzobe ndi otu, ga-ahụ maka azụmahịa na ịkpata nloghachi na itinye ego
Ọ na-enye ọtụtụ nkuzi ga-enyere ndị njikwa aka n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ ọ bụla nke azụmahịa ma ọ bụ ọbụna gọọmentị
Àtụ Food industry criticism
My wife & I bụ ihe nkiri ọchị Naijiria maka ezinụlọ nke afọ 2017 nke Bunmi Ajakaiye duziri ya na Moses Babatope, Kene Mkparu, Kene Okwuosa, Zulu Onuekwusi, Chinaza Onuzo na Isioma Osaje mepụtara ya
Emere ihe nkiri a na 25 Ọgọst 2017
Na 23 Disemba 2018, ihe nkiri a mere ihe ngosi mbụ onyonyo ya na Taiwan
Mya Mason (a mụrụ Önwa iri na otụ 4, 1984) bụ Amerikạ akpali agụụ mmekọahụ omee
Enye ama odụk okenye ịse ụlọ ọrụ na 2003 na afọ na 19 ma pụtara ihe karịrị 60 nkiri
Myeni o bụ aha nna South Africa
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Myfanwy Bekker-Balajadia bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkuzi nka na South Africa
A na-egosi ọrụ ya na gallery na showrooms n'ụwa niile
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ onwé na ụlọ ọrụ na-anakọta ya, ma na-aga n'ihu na-emepụta, ma maka ọrụ onwé na ebe a na-ere ahịa
A mụrụ ya n'ime nnukwu ezinụlọ South Africa ébé ha na-enyocha ngosipụta onwe ónyé kwa mgbede
Ọ gàrà Pretoria High School for Girls na Pretoria Technikon ebe ọ nwetara diplọma na nka mara mma na isi na eserese
Na Pretoria Technikon, ya na Richard Adams, Walter Battis, Esias Bosch, Sammy Lieberman na Gunter van der Reis nwere mmekọrịta
Ọ malitere usoro teknụzụ ceramic mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, ma kụzie ceramics
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na PACT
ụlọ ihe nkiri steeti South Africa dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ ónyé njikwa ụlọ ọrụ maka Richard Adams School of Ceramics na South Africa ma kụzie ihe osise ndụ na Mahadum Pretoria na Architectural School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ma nwee mmetụta site na nka site na njem
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'okpuru Vladimir Tarachenhof na Seychelles
Ọ kwagara US na 1976 ma biri ma kụzie na New Mexico, Texas na California
O nwetala nkwado zuru oke ma n'Africa ma na United States
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-akpali ma na-akụzi ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa
O gosipụtara na gallery na US niile ma na-anọchite ányá ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na nchịkọta onwé
Kemgbe afọ 1993, Bekker lekwasịrị anya na ọrụ, imepụta oghere na ihe ngosi ọrụ ebere
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-eme onwé ya, ihe ngosi otu na ọrụ e bipụtara
Nkem Okotcha onye na-ede n'okpuru aha mkpịsị odee Myne Whitman (amụrụ ya na 26 Ọktoba 1977) bụ onye odee, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye mbipụta na Naijiria

Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ akụkọ ịhụnanya abụọ, nke gbagoro n'elu ndepụta Amazoncom bestseller maka akụkọ ifo n'ime ọnwa ole na ole mbụ ebipụtara ha Ihe ngosi a, nke enwetara site na nkwalite akwụkwọ ntanetị nkwado n'etiti ndị na-ede blọgụ akụkọ ifo, na mgbasa ozi ịntanetị na Naijiria na mgbasa ozi ọdịnala, wetara ya n'uche nke okirikiri akwụkwọ na Nigeria ebe ịhụnanya na akụkọ ifo n'ozuzu, anaghị adịkarị

A kọwawo akwụkwọ ya dị ka ndị na-egosi na ọ bụghị nanị na ndị Naijiria 'na-adaba n'ịhụnanya na-alụkwa di na nwunye n'ihi ịhụnanya, [ma] na-ejikwa ịhụnanya emeri ọnọdụ dịgasị iche iche nke nwere ike isiri ya ike ijide naanị ya' ]
Amuru nkem Okotcha na 26 0ctober 1977obukwa onye
nke abụọ n'ime ụmụaka ise nwere ụmụnne nwanyị atọ na otu nwanne ozugbo ọ nwụsịrị
A mụrụ ya n'Enugwu ma nwee ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Ezinụlọ ya bụ ndị na-agụsi akwụkwọ ike, malite na nne na nna ya, n'ihi ya, akwụkwọ na-anọkarị ya gburugburu

Nne ya bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ, nna ya na-arụkwa ọrụ na National Electoral Commission, n'ihi ya, mmasị ịgụ akwụkwọ na agụmakwụkwọ sitere na ha na gburugburu Enugwu, nke bụ akụkụ nke obodo agụmakwụkwọ na ọrụ obodo
Nkem gara Ekulu Primary School na obere sekọndịrị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Queens, ha abụọ 36n'Enugwu
Maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ gafere na Loretto Special Science School tupu ọ gaa mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe dị n'Anambra ka ọ mụọ sayensị Biological Sciences maka nzere nke mbụ ya

N'ịbụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2000, Nkem kwagara Abuja, ebe o biri wee rụọ ọrụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ, wee nọrọ afọ abụọ n'ụlọ akụ azụmahịa tupu ọ hapụ Nigeria na 2006 ịga mụọ maka nzere masta na nchọpụta ahụike ọha na mahadum nke Edinburgh
Nkem kwuru na ọ bụbu onye nkuzi, onye ndụmọdụ NGO, onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ, onye ọrụ skate-hire, na onye nyocha wee rụọ ọrụ maka gọọmentị ma na Nigeria na Scotland
Nkem kwagara Seattle na United States ka ọ lụchara, ma ya na di ya bi ugbu a n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-aga Nigeria mgbe niile maka ọrụ na ezumike
N'ime aha nna ya, Nkem ekwuola 'Myne Whitman bụ aha ochepụtara na onwe m mgbe m malitere ide ihe siri ike mgbe o ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọtụtụ akwụkwọ m gụrụ bụ n’asụsụ Bekee, ebe ọ bụkwa na m na-ede n’asụsụ Bekee, ekpebiri m na aha m ga-abụ otu ihe ahụ
Ya mere, pseudonym bụ egwuregwu dị n'okwu ndị e degharịrị n'aha nwa agbọghọ m, Nkem Okotcha'
Nkem kwuru na ya nwere mmasi ide ihe kemgbe
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ na-edere ụmụnne ya ihe omume ụmụaka ka ha gụọ
O dere ụfọdụ abụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, wee malite ide ọzọ, oge a na ụdị ịhụnanya, mgbe ọ banyere mahadum
Akọrọ nkụ sochiri mgbe ọ na-agbalị ịmalite ọrụ ruo mgbe ọ maliteghachiri ide na 2009 ka ọbanyere alụmdi na nwunye
Nkem edeela akwụkwọ akụkọ ịhụnanya abụọ ama ama, A Heart to Mend and A Love Rekindled
Na mgbakwunye, o deela ọtụtụ akụkọ mkpirisi e bipụtara na mgbasa ozi Nigeria dị iche iche, ha niile n'okpuru aha mkpịsị akwụkwọ Myne Whitman
Na mgbakwunye na ederede ya, Myne Whitman na-agbakwa Romance Meets Life, blọgụ ụdị ndụ gbasara mmekọrịta, onye ama ama na ịzụ nwa na ntụrụndụ
A malitere blọọgụ ahụ na 2009 ka ụzọ isi kwalite akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, wee malite n'ụdị ọ dị ugbu a ka oge na-aga, na-elekwasị anya n'ihe gbasara mmasị ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria
Myra DuBois bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Gareth Joyner na-egosipụta, onye na-eme ihe ọchị na onye na-ese ihe nkiri si Rotherham nke dị na London
Gareth Joyner malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka Myra DuBois na klọb burlesque na ụlọ mmanya nwoke na-edina nwoke mgbe ọ kwagara London na 2008
Mgbe a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ dị ka Myra DuBois, onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ kọwara na ya nwere 'ndụ gara aga dị ka onye na-akpọ oku bingo'
N'afọ 2019, DuBois bụ onye so na ndị ikpeazụ mere nke ọma na Britain's Got Talent
Mgbe mbụ a na-ege ya ntị, Boy George kwuru na Twitter 'A hụrụ m eze nwanyị na-atọ ọchị n'anya', ebe Piers Morgan kọwara arụmọrụ ya dị ka 'ajọ mmụọ'
DuBois abụwo onye ọbịa na The John Bishop Show, onye nnọchiteanya na Big Brotherz Bit on the Side, wee pụta na Dom Jollyz Fool Britannia

O mere ka onye ọbịa pụta na ihe nkiri nke Everybody's Talking About Jamie N'afọ 2021, DuBois mere Lady Von Fistenberg na 'Dragatha Christie murder-mystery' Death Drop tinyere ime ihe nkiri ya Dead Funny na Edinburgh Festival Fringe
Myriam Léonie Mani (amụrụ na Mee 21, 1977) bụ onye Cameroon na-eme egwuregwu nke maara nke ọma na mita 100 na 200
Mani nọchitere anya Cameroon na 2008 Summer Olympics na-asọmpi na 100 mita sprint
Na agba nke mbụ ya, ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke atọ n'azụ Torri Edwards na Jeanette Kwakye na oge nke 1164 iji gaa n'ihu na agba nke abụọ
N'ebe ahụ, o rughị eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ n'ihi na oge ya nke 1165 bụ naanị oge nke isii nke okpomọkụ ya, na-akpata mwepụ
Àtụ Footer African Champions women's 100 metres
Myriam Mihindou (amụrụ na 1964 na Libreville, Gabon) bụ onye Franco-Gabonese na-ese ihe nke oge a
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Paris
Myriam Mihindou tolitere na Gabon nye nne French na nna Gabonese, tupu ọ gaa mba ọzọ na France na ngwụcha afọ 1980
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị akara ugo mmụta n'ihe owuwu, ọ sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ nka dị mma na Bordeaux
N'ịbụ onye na-arịa ọrịa aphasia, nsogbu nke asụsụ a na-ekwu na nke a na-ede, ọ nọ n'oge ahụ na-achọ ụzọ isi kwuo okwu

Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mbụ na ihe ọkpụkpụ na ịkpụ ihe, Joseph Beuys na Ana Mendieta gbara ya ume iduzi nyocha plastik ya na okike site na omume omenala na ihe ndị dị ndụ (ala, mmiri, anyanwụ, paraffin, kaolin na tii)
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1993, na-azụlite asụsụ plastik dị iche iche, na-arụkwa ọrụ na foto dịka na arụmọrụ, vidiyo, eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ
Ahụmahụ ya nke ịga ọtụtụ mba gụnyere site na Gabon ruo Reunion Island, site na Egypt ruo Morocco, ọrụ ya sitere na mmekọrịta ala na ọdịbendị ndị a
N'ịbụ nke na-akọ akụkọ ndụ onwe onye, usoro okike ya na-enyocha ncheta, njirimara, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọahụ
Myriam Telemaque bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Seychelles onye jere ozi dị ka Minista Ọrụ, Migration na Ọnọdụ Obodo nke Seychelles site n'ụbọchị 7 Julaị 2017 ruo ụbọchị 3 Nọvemba 2020
Tupu nhọpụta ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi odeakwụkwọ maka Immigration na Civil Status na onye isi ọrụ immigration na Ngalaba Immigration n'okpuru Ministry of Affairs
Myrtle Solomon (N'ụbọchị 9 June 1921 22 April 1987) bụ onye Britain na-eme udo
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Peace Pledge Union (PPU), otu ndị na-ahụ maka udo na Britain, n'etiti afọ 1965 ruo afọ 1972, na onye isi oche nke War Resisters International (WRI) n'etiti 1975 ruo afọ 1986
Ahmed Olotu (a mụrụ n'abalị 9 ọnwa Disemba afọ 1950) nke a maara nke ọma dịka Mzee Chillo bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Tanzania
O meela ihe nkiri karịrị 100 n'ọrụ ihe nkiri ya
E gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri mpaghara na nke mba ụwa na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Tanzania kachasị ukwuu n'oge niile
O meela ihe nkiri na nnukwu aha na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Afrịka gụnyere Steven Kanumba, ndị Afrịka Nkiru Sylvanus, Emmanuel France na Mercy Johnson
Olotu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị ya na Majengo Primary school na Kilimanjaro, Moshi, Tanzania site na mbido afọ 1957 ruo na ngwụcha afọ 1964
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Azania dị na Dar es Salaam iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndndrị ya site n'afọ 1966 ruo 1969
N'afọ 1970, ọ gara ọmụmụ nchịkwa na ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ọrụ gọọmentị na Dar es Salaam
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ a, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka ozi ọrụ ugbo dịka onye nchịkwa dị ala n'etiti afọ 1971
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Bora Shoes Company ruo afọ ole na ole
O mechara gaa Saudi Arabia iji nweta ihe ọmụma Alakụba na mahadum Alakụba
Mgbe o si Saudi Arabia lọta, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma kụzie n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ole na ole na Moshi, Tanzania, Tanzania
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ahụ gụnyere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị Weru Weru, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịtandrị ụmụ agbọghọ Kibosho, ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ Old Moshi, na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọọndrị Majengo
Olotu lụrụ di ma mụta otu nwa aha ya bụ Fatuma Ahmed Olotu
Ya na ezinụlọ ya bi ugbu a na Dar es Salaam, Tanzania

Ọ bụ ezie na Ahmed anọwo na-eme ihe nkiri kemgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị ma mee ihe nkiri ihe nkiri olenaole, o nwere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 2003 nke akpọrọ Sumu ya Mapenzi ma mesịa n'otu afọ ahụ mee Tanzia abụọ na Swahili
Kemgbe ahụ, e gosipụtara ya na ọtụtụ narị ihe nkiri ma mee nke ọma ma nweta onwe ya nnukwu aha na nkwanye ùgwù na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na Central Africa
E gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri na nnukwu ihe omume Afrịka
Nke a gụnyere Mercy Johnson, Emmanuel France, na Nkiru Sylvanus na Cross my sin movie na The director
N'ihi ewu ewu na ọha mmadụ, ụlọ ọrụ egosila Ahmed n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi telivishọn na redio

Mzi Godfrey Khumalo (amụrụ na 4 Nọvemba 1955) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa na onye ọchụnta ego
N'ịbụ onye nne naanị ya zụlitere, Khumalo tolitere na KwaMashu' Durban
Otu n'ime ụmụnne iri, nna ya nwụrụ tupu ọ dị afọ itoolu
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata nwoke, Khumalo nwetara ego n'ịzụta ma na-ere ite mmanụ ochie ma, mgbe e mesịrị, nweta ego site n'ịzụta na ire mmanụ ụgbọala
N'afọ ndị 1970 Khumalo sonyeere African National Congress, na-eje ozi na ngalaba ndị agha ya
N'afọ 1978, e jidere ya ma bo ya ebubo ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru, ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ iri abụọ na Robben Island
O jere ozi n'akụkụ ndị dị ka Nelson Mandela maka ọrụ mgbochi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ tupu a tọhapụ ya na 1990
Ọ bụ onye mkpọrọ nke iri abụọ na asaa batara Robben Island n'afọ 1979, e nyekwara ya nọmba onye mkpọrọ 2779
Khumalo nwere nzere bachelọ nke azụmahịa na Mahadum nke South Africa
O nweela ọkwa nke onye isi oche na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, gụnyere JCI Limited na Point Waterfront Corporation
Khumalo hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ego Capital Alliance Holdings, nke e mechara ree ya na ijeri $ 8 nke akụ n'okpuru njikwa
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Gold na General, nke nwere ọtụtụ òkè na Metallon Corporation yana ego ezinụlọ ndị ọzọ
N'akụkụ Ngwuputa, o nwere mmasị na ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta

EN 13537 (ma ọ bụ EN13537) bụ ọkọlọtọ Europe e mere iji mee ka okpomọkụ dị na akpa ihi ụra arụpụtara na / ma ọ bụ ree na Europe
Ka ọ na-erule 1 Jenụwarị 2005 ụkpụrụ CEN malitere ịrụ ọrụ na-ekpuchi nnwale na mbipụta na ímé ihe nọr ka ndị ọzọ ụra mbụ Nile dị ka ndị mmadụ nke ọkwa okpomọkụ maka akpa nwa agbọghọ ụra
Ụkpụrụ ọhụrụ ahụ n'ebe nile ya na ezinụlọ ndị mmadụ dị iche na ụkpụrụ ndị dịbu
N'afọ 2016, ISO EN 23537 2016 nọchiri ọkọlọtọ a
Ụkpụrụ Europe maka akpa ụra malitere na 1 Jenụwarị 2005
Ụkpụrụ a nwere ihe dị mkpa gbasara iwu maka ụdị, ndị na-ekesa na ndị na-ere ahịa na-ere akpa ụra na Europe
Enwere mgbanwe dị mkpa n'ụzọ a na-akpọ akpa ụra akpa ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị ka ndị ọzọ na ímé nga ka onye isi na
Ụkpụrụ Europe pụtara na akpa ụra niile na-agbaso ụkpụrụ ahụ ga-enwe ọkwa okpomọkụ nke ule ụlọ nyocha
Nke a pụtara na akpa ụra sitere na ndị nrụpụta dị iche iche ga-enwe okpomọkụ yiri ya
Enweghị iwu maka ụdị iji kwekọọ, ebe ọ bụ na ụkpụrụ ahụ bụ nhọrọ
'EN 13537 2002 Requirements for Sleeping Bags' bụ ụkpụrụ gọọmentị Europe maka nhazi nke akpa ụra
EN13537 na-emetụta akpa ụra niile na-enweghị akpa ụra maka iji agha na akpa ụra maka oke okpomọkụ, ya bụ, nkasi obi dị n'okpuru -25 °C
E bipụtara ụkpụrụ ahụ na 2002 ma ugbu a nabata ya n'ọtụtụ mba Europe, ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị n'èzí na-ejikwa ya
Ụkpụrụ a nọchiri na 2013 site na EN 13537 2012 na na 2016 site na ISO EN 23537 2016

A na-eji ụkpụrụ ahụ eme ihe na mba ndị a Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, na United Kingdom
EN13537 chọrọ nnwale manikin na-ekpo ọkụ nke na-emepụta nsonaazụ okpomọkụ anọ - oke elu, nkasi obi, oke ala, na oke
A na-arụ ọrụ okpomọkụ ndị a maka ndị na-azụ ahịa nkịtị
Ụkpụrụ ahụ na-atụle ọkwa okpomọkụ anọ
A na-ewere ọkwa ndị a na-eche na onye ahụ na-eji akwa ụra, ụlọikwuu ma na-eyi otu akwa okpomọkụ

Maka ebumnuche nke nha ndị a, a na-ewere 'nwoke ọkọlọtọ' dị afọ 25, na ịdị elu nke 173 m na ịdị arọ nke 73 kg; a na-eche na 'nwaanyị ọkọlọtọ ' dị afọ 25, nwere ịdị elu nke 260 m na ịdị ịdị arọ ya bụ 60 kgÀtụ List of EN standards
N'abalị Dị jụụbụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta àkwà na matarasị na UK ma dị na Barnoldswick, Lancashire, England
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ nke HIG Europe bụ onye nwetara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 10 Mee ka ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị y 2011, na-esote oge nchịkwa
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụkwa ihe ndina na matarasị Rest Assured ma guzobe ya na 1946
Akara ahụ bụ Silentt, aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ N'abalị Dị jụụ otu
Tom Clarke guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 11 Julaị 1946
E guzobere ya dị ka Clarke's Matarasị Limited na Skipton na ụgwọ a kwụrụ Tom mgbe a chaputara ya na Royal Navy
A gbanwere ndụ ebighị ebi n'ụwa ọhụrụ nke dị ka ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị ka ndị mmadụ aha ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Silentnight Limited na 1951 na aro nke nwunye Tom, Joan
Clarke mèchàrà kwuo uche na nke ukwu na mgbanwe aha ahụ bụ ụbụrụ nke wetara ọtụtụ nde mmadụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ede ndị mmadụ dị ndụ ebighị ebi n'ahịa na 1973 mana n'ihi ejighị n'aka ahịa na enweghị ntụkwasị obi na njikwa, ezinụlọ Clarke weghaara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ọzọ na 2003 ma ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ nke onwe
N'ime afọ 1980, na ọzọ n'afọ 2000 na afọ 2010, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ebe nile site n'aka Onye ọrụ nkụzi bụ onye na-emepụta àkwà kachasị na United Kingdom
Ọgaranya ụlọ ọrụ ahụ belatara ndị mmadụ na ndị nwe onwe ha, na Mee 2011, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ zọpụtara site na nkata ụlọ nzukọ alaeze nke dị ka ndị ọzọ na ímé ihe site na HIG Europe, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka onwe
A gbanwere ọtụtụ n'ime njikwa ndị dị ugbu a na 2011, gụnyere ezinụlọ Clarke
HIG Europe mefuru £ 19 nde iji nweta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, mana n'ime nke a, echekwara ụfọdụ ikike atụmatụ ezumike nká maka ndị ọrụ lara ezumike nkwe na ndị ọrụ ugbu a
Onye na-ahụ maka ezumike nká nyere ọkwa na 2013 na ha ga-amalite usoro iwu iji gbanwee usoro a ma manye HIG itinye ego £ 172 nde n'ime ite ezumike nkwe nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
HIG mechara kwenye na nkwekọrịta £ 25 nde na onye na-achịkwa na 2021
Ruo ọnwa iri na asatọ n'etiti afọ 1985 na 1987, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ọgbaghara ogologo oge nke bụ ọgbaghara kachasị ogologo megide otu ụlọ ọrụ na Britain, nke mere ihe karịrị ụbọchị 616
Ndị ọrụ nke Furniture, Timber and Allied Trades Union mere ngagharị iwe site na ụlọ ọrụ abụọ nke Silentnight n'oge ahụ, Barnoldswick na Sutton-in-Craven n'ihi mmụba nke ndị njikwa na-achọ na mmepụta
Òtù ahụ kwukwara na e meela nkwekọrịta ebe ndị ọrụ agaghị agbasi mbọ ike ka a kwụọ ụgwọ ma ọ bụrụhaala na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ emeghị ka a chụọ ha n'ọrụ
Izu asatọ ka e mesịrị, e mere ka ndị ọrụ 52 ghara ịrụ ọrụ
N'ihi ọgbaghara ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ chụpụrụ ndị ọrụ 346
Ọgbaghara ahụ nwetara nkwado dị ukwuu site n'aka ndị na-egwupụta ihe n'ime ala na ndị otu Labour Party

Ọ bụ ezie na a tụlere ọgbaghara ahụ n'ụzọ zuru ezu na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu ma mara ya maka ọdịdị ya n'ozuzu ya, e nwere ihe omume nke ịtụ nkume na otu ihe omume dị ịrịba ama mgbe a gbara ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe ọkụ
Onye isi nchịkwa n'oge ahụ bụ Tom Clarke, onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, onye na-akwado ndị Conservative Party na enyi Margaret Thatcher, onye nyere ya aha njirimara nke Maazị Wonderful
Nke a mere ka ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe guzobe bọọdụ n'ahịrị mkpesa nke na-agụ 'Mazị Wonderful's scabs cross here'
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ewe ihe dị ka mmadụ 1,250 na United Kingdom
O nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Barnoldswick, Lancashire, na Pendle, ebe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị kemgbe 1949, na ụlọ ya ugbu a kemgbe 1961
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụkwa ọrụ dijitalụ na Quay Street na Manchester
N'oge gara aga, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na Sutton-in-Craven (1970-1994), Batley (mechiri na Machị 2012) na Keighley, nke mechiri na Machị 2002
Ihe ndị a niile, na ụlọ ọrụ Barnoldswick, dị na West Riding nke Yorkshire mgbe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere
Mgbanwe ókèala nke 1974, tinyere ụlọ ọrụ Barnoldswick na Lancashire
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ onye isi na-ewe mmadụ n'ọrụ n'ógbè ahụ n'akụkụ ụlọ ọrụ Rolls-Royce jet engine n'obodo ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwekwara ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ gburugburu United Kingdom n'ihi nnweta nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-asọmpi
E mechiri ụlọ ọrụ abụọ dị na South Wales na Andover, nke bụ akụkụ nke akara Ducal, mgbe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ haziri ma gaa n'onwe ya na 2003
E wegara ọtụtụ ọrụ site na ụlọ ọrụ Keighley mechiri emechi na Sunderland, mana e rere ụlọ ọrụ a dị ka ihe nchịkwa n'okpuru akara Stag Furniture na June 2005
N'oge HIG nwere ma ntụgharị na uru amụbaala nke ukwuu, mgbe njikwa mbụ ahụ kwụsịrị ma tinye atụmatụ ntụgharị ahụ n'ọrụ
Mgbasa ozi ji ihe karịrị 50% rịa elu n'etiti afọ 2012 na 2017 ma a gbanwere mfu ụtụ isi nke £ 45m ka ọ bụrụ uru ụtụ isi mbụ nke £ 116m n'otu oge ahụ

N'gandwe Mwaba (a mụrụ n'afọ 1982) bụ onye Omenkà Zambia , onye meriri na 2019 Ngoma Award for Most Outstanding Male Visual Artist
A mụrụ N'gandwe Mwaba n'afọ 1982 na Kitwe
Ọ kụziiri onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Lusaka
Ihe osise nke Mwaba na-ese nke ọma tinyere ihe osise ndị a na-adịghị ahụkebe so n'ihe osise Zambia gosipụtara na African Studies Gallery na Tel Aviv n'afọ 2018
N'oge na-ehi ụra (ihe nkiri 1936) bụ ihe nkiri America na-atọ ọchị nke Norman Z
McLeod duziri na 1936, nke Arthur Kober, Lucien Littlefield, S
Perelman na Chandler Sprague dere, Mary Boland, Charlie Ruggles, George Barbier, Gail Patrick, Robert McWade na Lucien Littlewood
E wepụtara ya na June 25, 1936, site na Paramount Pictures
Chester Beatty (Ruggles) na Tessie Weeks (Boland) agbaala akwụkwọ ruo afọ 5 ma na-agbakọ aka ruo afọ 15 tupu nke ahụ
Chester na-ala azụ ịlụ Tessie n'ihi nsogbu nzuzo ya
Ọ bụ onye isi oche n'ime ndị kasị mma maka nsogbụ ndị na-ehi ụra
Mgbe Tessie mechara tinye Chester n'ime alụmdi na nwunye, ọ pụghị inweta oge ezumike site n'aka onye isi ya nke afọ 26, Maazị Frisbee (McWade)
Iji dozie nsogbu ahụ, Chester na-eme atụmatụ ịmasị onye isi ya site n'inweta nnukwu nkwekọrịta ire ahịa nke anya enyo
Ọ kpọọrọ Tessie ma soro onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ nwa bebi bara ọgaranya Horace B
Stanton (Barbier) gaa n'ebe ezumike dị n'akụkụ ọdọ mmiri wee bụrụ enyi ya
Otú ọ dị, ije ije ụra ya na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye a na-enyo enyo na ikpe ohi / igbu ọchụ
TV ndu kọwara ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka 'ihe ọchị nzuzu, mana Ruggles na Boland na-eme ezigbo otu'
Àtụ Norman Z
McLeod
N'okpuru Dome (Chinese; ) bụ ihe ngosi China nke afọ 2015 nke Chai Jing, ónyé bụbu ónyé nta akụkọ China Central Television, gbásárá mmetọ ikuku na China

A na-ele ya ihe karịrị nde ugboro otu narị na iri ise na Tencent n'ime ụbọchị atọ a tọhapụrụ ya ma na-elekwa ya nde ugboro otu narị na iri ise ọzọ site n'ogè ewepụrụ ya n'ịntanetị ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị
Chai Jing bidoro ime ihe ngosi ahụ mgbè nwa ya nwanyị a na-amụbeghị amụ butere akpụ n'afọ, nke a ga-ewepụ n'oge na-adịghị ányá mgbè amuchara ya
Chai na-ata mmetọ ikuku nke China ụta maka akpụ ahụ
Ọ bụ Chai na-akọ akụkọ ahụ, ónyé na-egosi nsonaazụ nke nyocha ya were otu afọ n'ụdị nkuzi, nke na-echetara Al Gore's An Inconvenient Truth
The Great Smog nke afọ 1952 na London jere ozi dị ka ihe akaebe akụkọ ihe méré eme Chai n'ịmepụta ihe nkiri ya
Ọ na-ekpughe ihe nkiri na data sitere na nleta ụlọ ọrụ na ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị, ndị ọkachamara na gburugburu ébé obibi na ndị nwe ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ na-agwa ndị ọrụ si London na Los Angeles okwu banyéré otu obodo ha si nwee ike ịnagide nsogbu akụkọ ihe méré eme nke mmetọ

Ọ na-ekwu na ọ na-ewe iwe megide smog, ma malite ịza ajụjụ atọ Gịnị bụ smog? Ebee ka o si bịa? Gịnịkwa ka anyị nwèrè ike ime màkà ya? Màkà ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ nke otu narị na anọ nkeji, ọ na-aza ajụjụ ndị a, na-eji animations, chaatị, ajụjụ ọnụ, ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe méré eme, na nleta saịtị
A tọhapụrụ Under the Dome n'ịntanetị n'ubochi irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 2015, na Satọdee tupu nzukọ nke National People's Congress na Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
E bu ụzọ na-egosi ihe ngosi ahụ na ntanetị atọ dị mkpà, gụnyere Tencent, Youku, na People's Daily Online, nké bụ mbipụta n'ịntanetị nke akwụkwọ akụkọ gọọmentị nke Chinese Communist Party
A na-ele ihe nkiri ahụ ihe karịrị nde ugboro otu narị na iri anọ na asaa na Tencent na mgbede nke ụbọchị abụo n'ọnwa Machị ma nweta ọtụtụ mkparịta ụka n'ịntanetị
Ọtụtụ nyiwe ntanetị dị n'ịntanetị gụnyere Sohu, NetEase, na Sina, biputara nyocha banyéré ihe ngosi ahụ n'ogè na-adịghị anya mgbè a tọhapụrụ ya

Otú ọ dị, akwụkwọ akụkọ ọdịnala azaghachighị ihe ngosi ahụ, na Beijing Youth Daily biputara nyocha nke ihe ngosi 'Chai Jing My Personal Battle with Smog' dị ka isi akụkọ ya n'ubochi mbu n'ọnwa Machị, 2015, bụ naanị ihe dị iche
Ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị na-eji Intanet eme ihe gosipụtara nkwado ha màkà ihe ngosi ahụ, ma mepụta echiche ọhụrụ banyere nsogbu ụfụfụ nke China mgbè ha kiriri ihe nkiri ahụ
N'ezie, oku ekwentị na Ministry of Environmental Protection hotline number (12369) mụbara percent narị abụọ na iri anọ mgbè ewepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'ịntanetị
Ihe karịrị 80% nke ndị na-ekiri kwuru na ha na-echegbu onwe ha nke ukwuu banyéré mmetọ ikuku na China
Ihe dị ka 70% nke ndị na-ekiri kwuru na ha gbanwere echiche ha banyéré anwụrụ ọkụ ma mepụta nghọta ka mma banyéré nsogbu ahụ
Ihe karịrị 75% gosipụtara njikere igbochi ụgbọ ala na ikuku oyi na iji ụgbọ njem ọha na eze
Ọzọkwa, ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri kwenyere na ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị, ndị na'ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, na ndị omeiwu kwesịrị ịza ajụjụ màkà nsogbu anwụrụ ọkụ

N'okpuru Dome a na-agbasa site na People's Daily Online, ébé nrụọrụ weebụ nke Chinese Communist Party gosipụtara na ihe ngosi ahụ nwèrè ike ịnata nkwado gọọmentị, ma na-eme ka iwu gburugburu ébé obibi gọọmentị dị mfe ma ọ bụ na-ekwu màkà ọdịmma gọọmentị

Dị ka ónyé bụbu ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na China Central Television (CCTV) na ónyé na-ede akụkọ na-eme nchọpụta, Chai Jing nwere ohere ịnweta ihe onwunwe ma nweta nkwado site na ọwa weebụ na ndị ọkachamara site na Ministry of Environmental Protection na National Energy Administration
Mgbè a tọhapụrụ ya, ndị ọrụ gọọmentị nwekwara àgwà dị mma n'ebe ihe nkiri ahụ nọ

Na Machị 1, 2015, Minista ọhụrụ nke Nchedo Gburugburu Ébé Obibi nke China, Chen Jining, toro ihe ngosi ahụ dị ka 'kwesịrị ịmasị' ozugbo a tọhapụrụ ya na mkparịta ụka akụkọ mbụ ya na ndị nta akụkọ China na Beijing
O jiri ya tụnyere akwụkwọ Rachel Carson nke 1962, Silent Spring, nke a na-ekwu na ọ kwadoro mmegharị gburugburu ébé obibi na United States
O kwukwara, na-eche na ọrụ a nwere ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịkwalite mmata ọha na eze banyéré nsogbu ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi, ya mèrè enwere obi ụtọ karịsịa maka ihe omume a

Ọzọkwa, onye isi China bụ Xi Jinping kwupụtara n'okwu nke ya na nzukọ Chinese National People's Congress na Machị 6 na, 'Anyị ga-eji aka ígwè taa ndị ọ bụla na-emebi gburugburu ébé obibi ma ọ bụ gburugburu ébé obibi ahụhụ, na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla ọzọ
Under a White Sky The Nature of the Future bụ akwụkwọ gburu-gburu ébé obibi nke afọ 2021 nkè Elizabeth Kolbert dere
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-agbaso ọtụtụ n'ime isiokwu ndị ọ nyochara na The Sixth Extinction An Unnatural History

N'okpuru Eluigwe na-acha ọcha na-elekwasị ányà n'ụdị nsogbu gburu-gburu ébé obibi dị íchè íchè nke Anthropocene mepụtara na ogo dị íchè íchè dị íchè íchè màkà ihe ngwọta teknụzụ dị màkà ụmụ mmadụ iji dozie ha ma na-akatọkwa usoro teknụzụ zuru oke
Aha ahụ na-ezo aka na usoro mgbochi mgbanwe ihu igwe kachasị njọ, solar geoengineering, nke e mèrè iji gosipụta ìhè anyanwụ site n'ụwa
N'ime akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ na-enyocha otu ngwọta teknụzụ màkà otu nsogbu nwèrè ike isi duga na nsogbu ndị ọzọ ma na-ekweta ọrụ dị mkpa teknụzụ ndị ahụ nwere ike ịrụ
Mmeghachi omume nke akwụkwọ ahụ dị mmá n'ozuzu ya
The Washington Post toro ya màkà 'ịgwakọta njem, akụkọ sayensị na akụkọ nkọwa, ihe niile nwere ikike nke ónyé édémédé nwéré obi ike iji kweta mgbagwoju anya
' Nnyocha New York Times lekwasịrị anya n'otú akwụkwọ ahụ si enyocha mgbagwoju anya nke nsogbu gburu-gburu ébé obibi anyị ugbu a
Nnyocha NPR kọwara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka 'ịkọọ' site na igosi

N'emeghị ka onye na-agụ ya tie ya ihe n'isi, ọ na-eme ka o doo ányà ébé anyị nọ kemgbe site n'ụwa nke enweghị nsogbu, nke zuru oke na ébé anyị ga-aga ịchọta nguzozi ọhụrụ màkà ọdịnihu ụwa nke ka nwere anyị ụmụ mmadụ na ya
' Jeff Goodell nke Rolling Stone toro Kolbert site n'ikwu, 'Iji bụrụ nwa amaala maara nke ọma nke Planet Earth, ọ dị mkpà ịgụ Elizabeth Kolbert'
N'okpuru White Sky ka edepụtara màkà 2021 Wainwright Prize na Global Conservation Writing category
Akwụkwọ ahụ mèrè ndepụta ogologo màkà 2022 Andrew Carnegie Medal for Excellence in Nonfiction
A họọrọ ya màkà ndepụta '10 Best Books of 2021' nke Washington Post
Nevada bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Néjia Ben Mabrouk (amụrụ na 1 Julaị 1949) bụ onye Tunisia na-ede ihe nkiri na onye nduzi, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Sama na-enweta ihe nrite na ihe ngosi The Gulf War
What next?
A mụrụ Ben Mabrouk na El Oudiane, Tunisia, na 1949, o wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na Sfax
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ matara ihe nkiri Europe ma sonye na klọb ihe nkiri dị n'ógbè ahụ
Banyere atụmatụ ọrụ ya na-etolite, ọ kọwara
N’oge ahụ, achọghị m ime ihe nkiri nke m, ikekwe n’ihi na e nweghị ndị na-esetịpụ ihe nlereanya nke ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ndị na-ese fim
Ndị isi niile bụ ndị ikom; maka m dị ka nwa agbọghọ, ya mere, nhọrọ kacha pụta ìhè bụ ịkọ akụkọ site na ide ihe
M rọrọ ide akwụkwọ akụkọ
N'oge ọ nọ na kọleji, Ben Mabrouk bu ụzọ mụọ French na Mahadum Tunis, mana ọ hapụrụ mgbe ọnwa ole na ole gachara n'ihi ihe gbasara ego
Ọ malitere ịmụ ihe nkiri na INSAS na 1972 na Brussels
A na-ewu agụmakwụkwọ ihe nkiri ya n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri dị egwu
O dere ma duzie ihe nkiri 'At Your Service' maka nchịkọta ngusi akwụkwọ ya na 1976, wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye a na-enye ọzụzụ maka RTBF
Site na 1979 ruo 1980, Ben Mabrouk malitere ide edemede maka ihe ngosi mbụ ya zuru oke, Sama (The Trace)
E mechara ihe nkiri ahụ na 1982, mana esemokwu ya na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe SATPEC mere ka ewepụta ihe nkiri ahụ na 1988
Sama meriri Caligari Prize na 1989 Berlin International Film Festival
Sama nwere ihe gbasara ndụ onwe onye site na ndụ Ben Mabrouk, ma na-akọ akụkọ banyere nwa agbọghọ Tunisia na-achọ agụmakwụkwọ, nke ọ mechara chọta na Europe
O dere ma duzie akụkụ nkeji iri na ise akpọrọ 'In Search of Chaima' maka ihe ngosi The Gulf War
What Next?(1991), nke na-enyocha mmetụta agha na ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
O dere ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri ya nke abụọ zuru oke, nke akpọrọ Nuit à Tunis (Night in Tunis)
Néjib Belkhodja (Arabic نجيب بلخوجة) (amụrụ na Tunis, 1933 - ọ nwụrụ na May 8, 2007) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Tunisia
Ọ bụ nwanne di nke onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba Ali Zouaoui; n'etiti ọrụ ya bụ atụmatụ maka ọtụtụ stampụ Tunisia

A mụrụ ya nye nna bụ ọgaranya Tunisia nke sitere na Turkey, ndị otu ya bụ ndị ọkachamara na azụmaahịa na ụlọ ọrụ okpu, na nne Dutch, onye na-agụ egwu opera na Opéra de Paris, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na School of Fine Arts na Tunis
Ọ malitere igosi ọrụ nka ya na 1956 na ihe ngosi onwe ya na Tunisia; n'otu afọ ahụ ọ natara ihe nrite Tunis City International Exhibition Award
Ọ na-aga n'ihu n'ọrụ ya na France na Morocco, ọ sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu n'ụwa niile gụnyere na Tunisia, United Kingdom, France, Egypt, West Germany na United States
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na Ịtaly na 1964 na Egypt na 1968
N'afọ 1968, o ritere ihe nrite mba maka ihe osise nke Cité internationale des arts na Paris
N'afọ 1991, ya na onye na-ese ihe n'Iraqi bụ Dia Azzawi haziri ihe ngosi na Tunis
A na-amata Belkhodja site n'ụzọ pụrụ iche maka ụlọ ọdịnala nke medina, ebe ihe ịga nke ọma nke ọrụ ya na ihe osise ya nke na-ebu akara nke kpọmkwem na izi ezi nke nka Tunisia nke oge a

Néstor Martín-Fernández de la Torre, nke amara a na-akpọkarị Néstor (4 May 1887, Las Palmas - 6 February 1938, Las Palmas) bụ onye Kanarian na-ese ihe na onye na-ese ihe nkiri onye rụrụ ọrụ na ụdị Symbolist na Art Deco
Ọ malitere mmepe nka ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, mgbe ọ gara 'colegio San Agustín' ma nye ya nkuzi nkuzi site n'aka Nicolás Massieu (1876-1954), onye ga-emecha bụrụ onye na-ese ihe ama ama
N'afọ 1899, ọ natara ntụziaka nka mbụ ya site n'aka onye na-ese ihe nkiri Spain bụ Eliseu Meifrèn

Mgbe ọ ka dị nanị iri na ise, ọ natara onyinye n'aka obodo Las Palmas ka ọ mụọ na Madrid, mana ule ntinye maka Ụlọ Akwụkwọ ahụ siri ike, n'ihi ya, ọ kụziiri onwe ya site na ịmepụta akwụkwọ na Museo del Prado
O mechara nweta ọnọdụ na ogbako Rafael Hidalgo de kaviedes
[ ] Ọ gara ọtụtụ njem, na-eleta París, Bruzzels na London, n'etiti ebe ndị ọzọ, iji mechaa usoro ya
Mgbe ọ nọ na Paris, o mekwara ihe ngosi ihe nkiri na uwe

O guzobe ụlọ ihe nkiri na Barcelona n'afọ 1907 na ihe ngosi mbụ ya bịara na 1908, na 'Círculo Ecuestre', otu egwuregwu egwuregwu na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, bụ ebe o gosipụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise, na-emetụta ọnụnọ ya na England
N'afọ soro, o gosipụtara ogwe ihe ịchọ mma anọ na Sala Parés, bụ nke o mere maka ụlọ ịgba egwú na Tibidabo, nke sitere na abụ nke Jacinto Verdaguer
Ọ gara n'ihu na-egosipụta ọtụtụ ebe, na Paris na London, ya na Madrid
N'afọ 1915, o nwere ihe ngosi ya dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na-emepụta setị na ejije maka mmepụta nke El amor brujo nke Manuel de Falla na Madrid
Ọ kwagara ụlọ ihe nkiri ya na Paris na 1928 ma mee ọtụtụ nhazi maka ballets, operas na mmepụta ndị ọzọ, gụnyere ejiji maka Cécile Sorel, Grace Moore na Conchita Supervía
Ka ọ gachara njem ọzọ, gụnyere njem nlegharị anya site na mpaghara ndị Spen na Africa, ọ laghachiri na Las Palmas wee guzobe ụlọ ihe nkiri ebe ahụ na 1934

Na mgbakwunye eserese ya, ọ chọkwara 'Casino de Tenerife' na Santa Cruz na 'Teatro Pérez Galdós' na Las Palmas wee malite mgbasa ozi iji kwalite njem nlegharị anya, nke ọ kpọrọ 'Tipismo' (picturesqueness)
Ọ nwụrụ na mberede, site na nsogbu ndị metụtara oyi, na-ahapụ ọtụtụ nnukwu ọrụ emechabeghị
N'afọ nari, ewepụtara 'Museo Néstor' na etiti obodo Las Palmas
Ọ dị na 'Pueblo Canario', ogige omenala nke nwanne ya nwoke bụ Miguel Martín-Fernández de la Torre nwanne ya nwoke mere, onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ihe mgbaghwoju anya gụnyere ihe ịchọ mma nke Néstor ma nwee ihe ọrụ ya kachasị
Neziha Labidi bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ụmụ nwanyị, Ezinụlọ na Ụmụaka na kọmitii nke Praịm Minista Youssef Chahed
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Paris 1 Pantheon-Sorbonne na afo otu puku narị itoolu, iri asaa na itoolu

Néziha Zarrouk, onye a na-akpọkwa Naziha, (amụrụ na 12 Disemba, na afọ 1946) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nnọchi anya mba Tunisia bụ onye minista gọọmentị site na afo 1995 ruo na afọ 2002 n'okpuru Praịm Minista Mohamed Ghannouchi N'afọ 1998, o nwere ike ịkọ akụkọ banyere mmelite na ahụike ụmụ nwanyị na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Nzukọ Ndị Ọkachamara nke United Nations na 'Ndị inyom na Ahụike' nke ọ kwadoro na Tunis
Site na afọ 2003 ruo na afọ 2005, Zarrouk jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya Tunisia na Lebanọn
N'ọnwa Mee, afọ 2019, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Tahya Tounes
A mụrụ ya na 12 Disemba, na afọ 1946 na Jemmal dị nso na Monastir, Néziha Zarrouk nwetara nzere masta na Arabic, na-enye ya ohere ịkụzi asụsụ Arabic na akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke Tunis
N'ịzaghachi oku Ben Ali maka nkwado mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala na 7 Nọvemba, na afọ 1987, ọ sonyeere Democratic Constitutional Rally (RDC)
Site na 1989, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na National Union of Tunisian Women, na-eduzi ndị ntorobịa ya
Mgbe a họpụtara ya n'ọtụtụ ọrụ na RCD, na Machị, na afọ 1995 ọ ghọrọ osote minista na ngalaba maka Women's and Family Affairs, nweta ọkwa minista zuru oke na ozi dị iche na Nọvemba, na afọ 1999
N'afọ 1998, Zarrouk nọchitere anya Praịm Minista na-ahụ maka Women's and Family Affairs na nzukọ United Nations on Women and Health nke emere na Tunis (28 Septemba ruo 2 Ọktoba)
O nwere ike ịkọ akụkọ banyere ọganihu dị ukwuu na ikike ụmụ nwanyị, ahụike ụmụ nwanyị na ọkachasị atụmanya ndụ ụmụ nwanyị nke ji afọ 22 rịa elu (1966-1996)
Na mbido Ọktọba,na afọ 2001, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọzụzụ na ọrụ, na-anọchi Faiza Kefi onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya na Paris
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa a ruo Septemba, na afọ 2002
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Tunisia na Lebanọn ruo n'afọ 2005
Site na afo 2005 ruo na afọ 2011, ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke ụlọ elu Tunisia, Chamber of Councillors
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke Mohamed Sahbi Basli, na Mee, na afọ 2019 ọ sonyeere otu Tahya Tounes

Joseph Johnson (amụrụ na Machị 31, 1975), nkè a maara site na aha egwu ya bụ NO
Joe, bụ ónyé egwu America, ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ hip hop na onye na-ede egwu
Joe bụ ónyé ọsụ ụzọ nke ụda Southern Hip Hop n'oge 1990s
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe a na-akpọ Gumbo Funk, nke bụkwa aha e nyere ngwakọta nke ụdị egwu ya
A mụrụ Johnson na New Orleans
Mgbè ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị (na New Orleans), ọ malitere inye ndị na-eme ihe nkírí na Jackson Square
E mechara gbaa ya ume ịkwaga New York, ébé ọ malitere njikọ ya na Universal Music Group dị ka ónyé na-emepụta ihe
Mgbè ahụ a maara dị ka Joe Kool, Johnson sooro Devante Swing rụkọọ ọrụ, na otu mmepụta Da Bassment nke o nyere aka na abọm mbụ Jodeci, Forever My Lady
Johnson gara n'ihu soro Brian McKnight, ónyé na-ese ihe R&B Joe na D'Angelo rụọ ọrụ tupu ọ banye n'ụdị rap
