The North Atlantic Fellas Organization (NAFO, French Organisation des Fellas de l'Atlantique nord, OFAN, a play on NATO, the North Atlantic Treaty Organization) bụ ihe ntanetị na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta nke raara onwe ya nye igbochi mgbasa ozi Russia na ozi aghụghọ banyere mwakpo Russia nke Ukraine na 2022
A na-ahazi ya dị ka ụdị agha ozi

E mepụtara meme ahụ na Mee 2022, mgbe onye na-ese ihe na Twitter bụ Kamil Dyszewski (n'okpuru aka @Kama_Kamilia) malitere ịgbakwunye foto gbanwere nke nkịta Shiba Inu (nke 'Fella') na foto sitere na Ukraine
E hiwere NAFO, dị ka ọ dị, na 24 Mee 2022 site na tweet
Ụdị Shiba Inu enweela ọnụnọ dị ịrịba ama na-enweghị njikọ na omenala ịntanetị kemgbe ọ dịkarịa ala 2010 n'okpuru 'doge' meme
Mgbe oge ụfọdụ gasịrị, Dyszewski malitere ịmepụta omenala 'Fellas' maka ndị ọzọ nyere onyinye na Georgian Legion
'Fellas', nke sitere na 'mmekọrịta', bụ nke NAFO na-ewere dị ka okwu na-anọpụ iche na nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị
Ndị ọrụ ugbu a na ndị lara ezumike nká site na ndị agha Ukraine na NATO, yana ndị Eastern Europe na ndị Eastern Europe, na-anọchite anya nke ukwuu n'etiti ndị na-ekere òkè na ọrụ nke otu ahụ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ German bụ Berliner Kurier na-eme atụmatụ na otu ahụ gụnyere 'ọtụtụ iri puku' nke ndị mmekọ ka ọ na-erule Septemba 2022

Fellas na-apụta na foto dị iche iche edepụtara na 'vidiyo Tokyo-style nke ndị agha Ukraine setịpụrụ ịgba egwu egwu', ma 'na-agbakọta na ihe nkiri agha iji kwara ndị agha Russia emo ma too ndị agha Ukraine'
NAFO na-akpọ ndị iro ya (n'ịntanetị na n'ọgbọ agha) vatniks
A na-akọ na ụfọdụ ndị otu NAFO nwere 'nlebara anya pụrụ iche' n'ịkwụsị 'whataboutism' nchebe nke mwakpo Russia
Dabere na Wall Street Journal, a na-ekwere na nchịkọta ego na ahịa ahịa nke otu ahụ na-akwado Ukraine na-agbakọta 'ihe karịrị $ 1 nde
mana ọ nweghị ọnụ ọgụgụ gọọmentị' yabụ enweghị ike ịchọpụta nkwupụta ahụ n'onwe ya
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2022, NAFO nwetara ego maka Signmyrocketcom, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ebe ndị mmadụ na-akwụ ụgwọ maka ozi omenala edere na bọmbụ na ngwá ọrụ Ukraine

Task & Purpose kọwara nsonaazụ ahụ, 2S7 Pion self-propelled artillery na ihe odide 'Super Bonker 9000' na mkpịsị aka baseball bat na barel na ihe odide NAFO-Article 69' dị ka 'artillery self-propoted nke na-eweta ihe ntanetị n'ụdị ụwa'

Per The Economist, 'Another popular slogan—'What air defence doing?'—pokes fun at the failure of Russian air defences to prevent an attack on Saky air base in Crimea on August 9th' The origin of the meme was a quote tweet in 'dubious English' by @200_zoka (with airdefense idiosyncratically combined into one word) reacting to photos of smoke billowing up from the distant airfield

Ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke Germany bụ ZDF jụrụ echiche ahụ bụ na NAFO bụ ọrụ nke US Central Intelligence Agency; 'eziokwu ahụ bụ na 'Nafo' bụ nke CIA na-akwado bụ naanị ihe ọchị na-eweda onwe ya n'etiti ndị Twitter
' Ọtụtụ Fellas n'onwe ha nabatara ihe ọchị ahụ, na-agbanwe profaịlụ Twitter ha iji gosipụta ọnọdụ ha dị ka Langley, Virginia, ebe isi ụlọ ọrụ CIA dị
A kọwara NAFO dị ka 'Mmeghachi omume nke ndị obodo ọdịda anyanwụ na mkpọsa Russia' site n'aka Tobias Fella, onye sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-azụ ndị agha Bundeswehr na-emeso mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke nnukwu 'ọgụ maka ọbụbụeze nke nkọwa' na oghere ịntanetị
Dị ka Politico si kwuo, 'Ịga n'ime NAFO bụ inweta ihe mberede na otu obodo ndị dị n'ịntanetị si eme ka ndị na-agba ọsọ n'ịnta na-agba egwu na-agba agba nke ndị agha n'ịntanị mepụtala omenala ịntanetị
Prọfesọ na-amụ ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi n'America bụ Jaime Cohen na-ekwu na òtù NAFO 'bụ ihe omume na-emegide steeti mba'
Onye nta akụkọ Britain na Lebanọn bụ Oz Katerji na-ekwusi ike na NAFO 'egbochiwo ndị mgbasa ozi Russia ma mee ka ha yie ndị na-enweghị isi na ndị na-adịghị mma na usoro ahụ'
Onye nnọchi anya Ukraine na Australia na New Zealand Vasyl Myroshnychenko kwuru na ntọala, ọdịdị nke NAFO bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ike ya

Dị ka otu nyocha si kwuo, 'Memes ndị na-asụ Bekee n'ụzọ dị ukwuu emeela ka ndị Ọdịda Anyanwụ na-elebara agha Ukraine anya - nlebara anya nke dị mkpa n'ihi mkpa ngwá agha ndị Ọdịtoba dị maka ndị agha Ukraine'
Onye isi agha America Steve Speece na Modern War Institute na West Point na-ekwu na 'Meme ọdịnaya e kesara na ọwa NAFO
bụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị asụsụ Bekee ma eleghị anya ọ bụghị maka ndị na-ege ntị Russia
Ọmụmụ ihe ndị a dị iji mepụta ọdịnaya maka ntụrụndụ na ọnọdụ nke ndị otu ha
Ma ọbụna iwu nchekwa mba ọdịda anyanwụ na-akpali mgbe ụfọdụ n'ụzọ doro anya site na mmetụta - dị ka iwe - nke a zụlitere na obodo ndị dị n'ịntanetị
Speece na-ekwu na ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe n'ịntanetị dị ka NAFO na-arụ ọrụ nke ndị uwe ojii ọjọọ na ezigbo ndị uwe ojii / ndị uwe ojii na-eme iwu
Dị ka Berliner Kurier si kwuo, 'Dị ka ezigbo NATO, NAFO nwere ọrụ enyemaka nke Nkeji edemede 5
Nke a pụtara na nwoke ọ bụla nwere ike ịkpọ ndị ọzọ maka enyemaka ma ọ bụrụ na a na-awakpo ha ma ọ bụ na-ezute ozi ụgha
Maka nke a, ndị otu NAFO na-eji hashtag #NAFOarticle5 wee nweta nkwado site n'aka ndị ọzọ
Otu onye nyocha na German Council on Foreign Relations nyochara ya dị ka 'nke dị irè nke ukwuu'
Russia etinyela ugbo troll n'ụzọ dị irè n'oge gara aga; mmeghachi omume mgbagwoju anya ya na NAFO nwere ike isi na 'mgbasa ozi echiche banyere Ukraine'

Dị ka ndị agha cyber nke ndị agha US, 780th Military Intelligence Brigade, si kwuo, 'Nye obodo dị n'ịntanetị dị ka NAFO, ịkpọ aha ọjọọ site na mgbasa ozi gọọmentị nke ebumnuche ya bụ ihe akaebe na ịkwa emo ya na-enweta mmetụta achọrọ

N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2022, akaụntụ Twitter nke Ministrị Nchebe nke Ukraine tweetere ekele ya maka NAFO, na onyinyo nke mgbọ ogbunigwe a na-agba na 'Fella' yi uwe agha, aka n'ihu, n'ọnọdụ ekele
Ndị isi ndị agha na ndị ọrụ obodo na Ukraine na mba NATO agbanweela ihe ngosi Twitter ha ka ọ bụrụ Fella
Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa nke Ukraine bụ Oleksii Reznikov gbanwere avatar Twitter ya ruo nwa oge ka ọ bụrụ Fella nyere ya iji sọpụrụ ya, na 30 Ọgọst 2022

Others have included former President of Estonia Toomas Hendrik Ilves, current Prime Minister of Estonia Kaja Kallas, Lithuanian Foreign Minister Gabrielius Landsbergis, United States Representative Adam Kinzinger, and United States Army Major General Patrick J
Donahoe

NASFAT nke a makwaara dị ka Nasrul-lahi-li Fathi Society of Nigeria bụ òtù ekpere ndị Alakụba nke Naijiria nke na-elekwasị anya na ndị ntorobịa, ụmụ nwanyị na ndị isi
Otu ahụ nwere ihe karịrị otu nde ndị otu na Naịjirịa
Ìgwè ahụ na-ahazi emume ekpere ebe onye ọ bụla nwere ike ikwughachi ekpere na-enweghị ndị ụkọchukwu
Enwere ike ịchọta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke NASFAT na otu ekpere nke ndị Yoruba ole na ole na ndị ụlọ akụ Alakụba guzobere na Ibadan na 28 Julaị 1984
Otú ekpere nke a bịara mara dị ka Yusrullahi Society of Nigeria toro n'okpuru nduzi nke Murtada Akangbe
Uto nke otu ahụ dugara n'ịmepụta alaka ụmụnne nwanyị n'obodo ndị ọzọ Yoruba gụnyere Lagos
N'afọ 1995, alaka Lagos guzobere otu nweere onwe ya nke ndị otu ya ghọrọ ndị isi nke Nasrul-lahi-li Fathi Society of Nigeria ma ọ bụ NASFAT
Otú ndị ahụ nwere nkwenkwe nke oge a na nke mgbanwe n'ihe gbasara ịha nhata nke ndị Alakụba niile
Isi ihe na-elekwasị anya n'ìgwè ahụ bụ omume ọma na nsọpụrụ onwe onye yana agụmakwụkwọ na ike mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
NASFAT na-enwe nzukọ ekpere ya kwa izu n'ụtụtụ Sọnde ọ bụla na odeakwụkwọ gọọmentị steeti Lagos, Alausa
Nzukọ ahụ na-enwekwa mmemme kwa afọ nke a na-akpọ Lailatul Qadr na Mowe Village, Ogun State na ala a na-emepebeghị emepe nke otu ahụ nwere
Nzukọ ahụ guzobekwara Mahadum Fountain
NADH dehydrogenase [ubiquinone] 1 alpha subcomplex subunit 2 bụ protein nke NDUFA2 gene na-edepụta n'ime ahu ndi mmadụ
NECOM House (nke bụbu NITEL Tower na tupu nke ahụ, NET Building) bụ ụlọ elu dị ogugo ole na ole na Lagos
E wuchara ụlọ ahụ dị ogo ụlọ elu iri atọ na abụọ n'afọ 1979, ọ bụkwa isi ụlọ ọrụ NITEL
Ogidi nkwukọrịta dị n'elu ụlọ elu ahụ na-eje ozi dị ka ihe ngosi ọkụ maka Lagos Harbour
A na-ewu ụlọ ahụ na simenti
Ụlọ ahụ bụ nke kachasị elu na West Africa n'oge a rụchara ya
Ụlọ Necom enweela enwela ihe mberede agbamụ ọkụ ugboro abụọ kemgbe e wuru ya; otu na 1983 nke kpatara nnukwu mmebi na ụlọ ahụ, na nke ọzọ na 2015 nke metụtara elu ụlọ ahụ
NEL ma ọ bụ Nel nwere ike izo aka na ndia
NEPA Lagos bụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria nke dị na Lagos, nke sonyere na asọmpi kachasị elu na Naijiria n'afọ ndị 1974, 1995 na 1996
Klọb ahụ bụ nke National Electric Power Authority (NEPA) nke Naijiria ma bụrụ nke a maara dị ka Lagos ECN
Kedu ihe bụ NFT Mining? Ego ole ka NFT Mining na-eri? Ndị a bụ ajụjụ ndị mbido n'ahịa a na-eme nke ọma na-ajụkarị
Ahịa tokens na-abụghị fungible (NFTs) tolitere site na nde $ 340 na 2020 ruo ijeri $ 249 na 2021, nke a ga-abụrịrị dọtara uche nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na ndị mmadụ onwe ha nwere mmasị n'ịchọgharị ahịa ahụ
Ọtụtụ ndị ama ama na-etinye aka na ahịa NFT karịa mgbe ọ bụla
Lelee 10 ama ama ama ama nwere Ape Yacht Club NFT
Ọ ga-abụrịrị na ị nụla maka “Mmekọrịta,” NFT nke akpọrọ dị ka nke kachasị ọnụ ahịa erere
Pak kere nka dijitalụ wee ree ya nde $918
Ndị NFT ndị ọzọ emeela akụkọ akụkọ mgbe niile ka ọtụtụ ndị ama ama na-etinye aka
Ọ bụrụ na ị bụ onye ọhụrụ na ụwa cryptocurrency, e nwere ụfọdụ okwu nkịtị ị ga-ahụ ka ị na-amụtakwu banyere ahịa, na otu okwu dị otú ahụ bụ minting
Ọ dị mkpa iburu n'obi na tupu enwere ike ịzụ ahịa ihe onwunwe dị ka NFT online, ọ dị mkpa ka a na-egwupụta ya n'ahịa
Ya mere, kedu ka usoro nhazi ahụ si arụ ọrụ?
Kedu ihe bụ NFT Mining?
Minting bụ okwu ị ga-ahụ ma ọ bụrụ na ị na-agbalị ịmepụta NFT maka oge mbụ
NFT Mining bụ usoro ịtụgharị foto, vidiyo, ọdịyo ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ dị ugbu a ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-adịghị agwụ agwụ (NFT) na ịdenye ha aha na blockchain
Nke a nwere ike ịdị mgbagwoju anya, mana ka anyị kọwapụtara gị ya
Ọ bụ usoro ntugharị a na-eme NFT ọ bụla pụrụ iche na netwọk blockchain
A na-echekwa ihe nka na mkpokọta ihe na blockchain site na iji koodu pụrụ iche nke na-enye ohere nwe ahaziri iche (izo ya ezo)
Mgbe usoro mmeghari ahụ gasịrị, mpempe nka ma ọ bụ mkpokọta ọ bụla na-aghọ NFT na blockchain nkwekọrịta smart, dị ka Ethereum, Solana, na ụdọ NFT ndị ọzọ dakọtara
Nke a na-eme ka enwere ike ịchekwa NFT na obere akpa cryptocurrency blockchain
Azụmahịa blockchain ndị a chọrọ ụfọdụ ụgwọ azụmahịa, mana anyị ga-erute nke ahụ ma emechaa na post

Ị nwere ike iche n'echiche NFT mining usoro dị ka na-ebugote foto profaịlụ na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ na-elekọta mmadụ, naanị na a ga-ebugo ya n'ahịa ahịa maka NFT, na obere akpa crypto gị na-eji mint NFT bụ ụzọ ámá gafere na mkpokọta nke na-enye ha ohere ịnweta ya
nweta blockchain ma debekwa azụmahịa ọ bụla
Ego ole ka NFT Mining na-eri?
Iji ghọta nke ọma ka nft mining si arụ ọrụ, ị ga-achọkwa ịma maka ụgwọ dị iche iche nwere ike itinye aka dabere n'ahịa ahịa nke nhọrọ gị
Enwere ọtụtụ ebe ahịa na-enye minting n'efu maka mgbanwe pasentị nke ọnụ ahịa ndepụta gị ozugbo NFT rere, ma ọ bụ mgbe ụfọdụ na-ebufe onye na-azụ ya ụgwọ ego n'oge ọrịre
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ bụ n'efu ị nweta NFT na Openea, mana nke ahụ apụtaghị na ị gaghị akwụ ụgwọ gas ma emechaa
OpenSea na-ana 25% nke ọnụahịa ọrịre ikpeazụ ọ bụla
Rarible, n'aka nke ọzọ, na-akwado Tezos, nke na-efu naanị $ 05 na mint NFT
Rarible nwekwara njiri “ume-ngwu” nke na-eme ka ndị nwe NFT mepụta NFT n'efu ma mee ka onye zụrụ ya kwụọ ụgwọ gas mgbe ha zụrụ ya
Enwere ọtụtụ ebe ahịa ndị ọzọ na-ewu ewu, yana ọ dịkwa mma ịme nyocha gị ka ịchọta nke kacha kwesị ekwesị maka ọrụ nka dijitalụ na mmasị ego gị

Naîgnouma Coulibaly (amụrụ na ọnwa Mee 31, na afọ 1989) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị nke Mali na Cavigal Nice Basket nke Ligue Féminine de Basketball na otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụnwaanyị nke Mali
Mgbe ọ meriri FIBA Africa Championship maka umunwaayi, na afọ 2007, Coulibaly nọchitere anya Mali na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics
Naïma Ben Ali (Arabic), bụ onye bụbu nwanyị mbụ nke Tunisia na nwunye mbụ nke onye bụbu onye isi ala Zine El Abidine Ben Ali
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nwanyị mbụ site na 1987 ruo mgbe ya na Ben Ali gbara alụkwaghịm na 1988
A mụrụ ya Naïma Kefi, ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Mohamad Kefi, onye isi ndị agha Tunisia a ma ama nke nwere ọkwá dị elu na gọọmentị nwere nnwere onwe
Ọ zutere onye na-eto eto nke ndị agha Tunisia, Zine El Abidine Ben Ali, n'oge ngwụcha afọ 1950 ma ọ bụ 1960, ọ bụ ezie na ọnọdụ nke nzukọ ha ka na-arụrịta ụka
Di na nwunye ahụ lụrụ na 1964
Alụmdi Ben Ali na Naïma, nwa nwanyị nke onye isi agha dị elu, nyeere ọrụ ya aka ozugbo ma mesịa nyere aka mee ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala afọ iri abụọ ka e mesịrị
A họpụtara Ben Ali, onye bụ naanị onye ọrụ na-abụghị onye ọrụ n'oge ahụ, dịka onye isi nke ndị agha na 1964, obere oge ka agbamakwụkwọ ya gasịrị
Naïma Ben Ali na Ben Ali nwere ụmụ nwanyị atọ, ha niile lụrụ ndị ọchụnta ego Tunisia a ma ama Ghazoua Ben Ali, amụrụ na Machị 8, 1963, na Le Bardo tupu alụmdi na nwunye ha, wee lụọ Slim Zarrouk
Dorsaf Ben Ali, amụrụ na July 5, 1965, onye bụ nwunye Slim Chiboub
A mụrụ nwa ha nwanyị nke nta, Cyrine Ben Ali, n'August 21, 1971

Ka ọ na-erule n'etiti afọ 1980, Ben Ali, onye isi nchịkwa nke National Security n'oge ahụ, na onye isi ya, Leïla Trabelssi, onye ọ zutere na 1984, na-egosi mmalite nke njedebe nke alụmdi na nwunye ya na Naïma Ben Ali
Ben Ali na Trabelssi mụrụ nwa nwanyị na-abụghị alụmdi na nwunye na Jenụwarị 1987
Naïma Ben Ali ghọrọ First Lady nke Tunisia na 1987 mgbe Zine El Abidine Ben Ali ghọrọ onye isi ala

Otú ọ dị, Onye isi ala Ben Ali gbara Naïma alụ kwa ghịm na 1988, mgbe afọ 24 nke alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị, maka ihu ọma nke onye isi ya, Leïla Trabelssi, onye kwa gara na obí onye isi ala obere oge ka a mara ọkwa nkewa ahụ
Naïma Ben Ali nọ gi dere na Tunis mgbe mgbanwe Tunisian gasịrị, nke chụpụrụ di mbụ ya n'ọchịchị
Na-Kel Allah Smith (amụrụ na Julaị 22, 1994) bụ onye America na-agba skateboard, rapper, ónyé na-ede egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkírí

Na mbụ, ọ bụ onye na-agba skateboard si n'ógbè Los Angeles, a maara ya màkà mmekọrịta ya na ndị otu hip hop Odd Future, na-apụta na vidiyo egwu, vlogs na ihe ngosi TV Adult Swim Loiter Squad, ma na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị otu ya
Smith malitere ọrụ egwu ya n'afọ 2013, na-egosi amaokwu mbụ ya edere na Tyler, abọm studio nke abụọ nke Onye Okike Wolf na 'Trashwang'
N'afọ 2014, mgbè ọ pụtara na vidiyo kachasị elu 'Cherry', Smith guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ngwaike / uwe nke ya, Hardies, ya na onye otu ya bụ Tyshawn Jones
N'afọ 2015, o guzobere Hog Slaughta Boyz, duo nke Smith na ónyé bụbu ónyé otu Odd Future bụ Earl Sweatshirt mejupụtara
N'afọ 2018, Smith pụtara na ihe nkiri azụmahịa mbụ ya, Mid90s, nke Jonah Hill duziri
N'afọ 2019, Smith wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya bụ Twothousand Nakteen site na A Dream No Longer Deferred Records na Narcowave
Ịgụ atụrụ bụ mmega ahụ nke uche nke a na-eji n'ọdịbendị ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụ gị aka ọbá dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Ụwa dị ka ụzọ isi mee ka mmadụ hie ụra
N'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ahụ, onye na-eme ya na-ahụ usoro na-adịghị agwụ agwụ nke atụrụ ọcha na-awụli elu na mgbidi, ka ọ na-agụ ha ka ha na-eme otú ahụ
Echiche ahụ, ma eleghị anya, bụ ime ka ike gwụ mmadụ mgbe ị na-eji ihe dị mfe, na-ekwughachi ugboro ugboro, na-eme ka mmadụ dị ndụ ebighị ebi n'ụwa ọhụrụ nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ ndị na-ehi ụra

Ọ bụ ezie na omume a bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu, a naghị ejikarị ya eme ihe dị ka ihe ngwọta maka ehighị ụra nke ọma, ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị, na mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ na-ezo aka na ya, nke mere na ọ gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ n'echiche ụra nke ọdịbendị a ma ama

Okwu ahụ bụ 'ụmụ atụrụ na-agụ' abanyewo n'asụsụ ndị ogbi ozi ọma ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ndị kasị dị ndụ ebighị ebi n'ụwa ọhụrụ nke dị n'ala nke dị ndụ ebighị ebi n'ụwa ọhụrụ Bekee dị ka okwu idiomatic maka ehighị ụra nke ọma
Atụrụ n'onwe ha abụrụla ihe jikọrọ ya na ụra, ma ọ bụ enweghị ya
Ịdị irè nke usoro ahụ nwere ike ịdabere na ike uche achọrọ

Nnyocha nke ndị nchọpụta na Mahadum Oxford mere, ọ bụ ezie ọrụ ugbo nke dị n'ala ahụ n'ebe nile site na ụdị nke dị ka Azụmaahịa ka mma na ụdị na olu na ọ naghị etinye anụ ụlọ dị ka ihe a na-ahụ anya, chọpụtara ọhụrụ banyere mmanụ aṅụ achịcha dị ndụ ebighị ebi nke dị ka Azụmaahịa ka Azụmaahịa na ndị na-eche 'ụsọ osimiri ma ọ bụ nsụda mmiri' ka a manyere ha iji ike uche mee ihe, ma na-ehi ụra ngwa ngwa, karịa ndị a gwara ka ha 'na-adọpụ uche, nchegbu na nchegbu'
Enwere ike inweta ụra site na ọtụtụ ọrụ ọ bụla dị mgbagwoju anya nke na-emefu ike uche

Enwere ike ịbelata ọnụ nke dị ka onye ọ bụla n'ime anyị si nọrọ anyị nso n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ ndị ogbi ike ịchọta ihe mbụ na-ekwu maka ịgụta atụrụ dị ka ụzọ isi nweta ụra na Illustrations of Political Economy nke Harriet Martineau, site na 1832

'Ọ bụ ihe na-enweghị isi ịhụ otu atụrụ n'otu n'otu na-esote nke na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ọ bụla n'otu ya na-etinye ụkwụ ihu ya na oghere dị na mgbidi, na-ebuli ụkwụ azụ ya n'azụ ya, na-ele anya n'otu ntabi anya site n'elu ugwu, wee banye n'ime olulu mmiri kpọrọ mmadụ dị ndụ ebighị ebi n'ụwa ọhụrụ ezi ntụziaka oriri dị ndụ ebighị ebi n'ụwa olileanya nke dị nkụ, nke e ji ajị anụ kpuchie

Usoro ahụ nwere ike ịbụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị ma ọ bụrụ na ubi ahụ nwere ike bụrụ ihe onwunwe nwoke ọzọ, ma ọ bụ ma ọ bụrụ n'ìgwè atụrụ ahụ na-apụ kama ịbanye; mana ncheta nke ebe njem ahụ mere ka onye nwe ala ahụ hie ụra karịa otú unu niile ụmụ ndị ogbi na ụdị nke dị n'ala ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ndị kasị dị umeala Àgwà dị ùgwù n'anya dị ndụ ebighị ebi n'ụwa ugboro, mgbe ọ na-eme na njedebe nke usoro nke echiche nchegbu nke mere ka ọ teta
Enwere ike ịchọta ọbụna ihe odide mbụ na Don Quixote nke Miguel dé Cervantes, site na 1605 (ma e wezụga Cervantes na-anọchi 'ụmụ ndị ogbi na ụdị ewu' maka 'ụmụ atụrụ nke dị n'ala ahụ n'ebe')
'Ka ofufe gị na-agụnye ewu ndị onye ọkụ azụ na-agafe , n'ihi na ọ bụrụ na mmadụ echefu nke dị ka, akụkọ ahụ ga-agwụ, ọ gaghị ekwe omume ikwu okwu ọzọ banyere ya

O yikarịrị ka Cervantes gbanwere akụkọ banyere ịhụnanya dị ndụ ebighị ebi nke dị ka Azụmaahịa ka onye ọ bụla n'ime ụmụ ndị ogbi ewu site na akụkọ banyere ịgụọ atụrụ na mmalite narị afọ nke iri na abụọ nke akwụkwọ Spanish Disciplina clericalis
Akụkụ The King and his Story-telller (nkebi nke 12) na-eji echiche nke ịgụta atụrụ n'ụzọ na-atọ ọchị
Disciplina clericalis na-adabere n'ihe odide sitere n'ụwa Alakụba
Ịgụ atụrụ bụ ma eleghị anya omume a ma ama n'ụwa Alakụba tupu mmalite narị afọ nke iri na abụọ

Ọtụtụ ndị edemede na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na itoolu kwuru na a na-eji ịgụta atụrụ iji nyere aka n'ụra; oge nke 1860s-70s yiri ka ọ bụ mgbe ọ ghọrọ okwu a na-ahụkarị, dịka ọmụmaatụ dị ka onye na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ ndị ogbi na na Sabine Baring-Gould's Through flood and flame (1868) 'Ọ tụgharịrị dị ka Azụmaahịa na ụdị ihu ya na mgbidi na-agwụ ike, ma gbalịa, site n'ịgụta dị ka ndị atụrụ na-agafe oghere ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime, iji mechie anya ya'
Macfarlane, Alexander William dere banyere usoro ahụ na Insomnia and Its Therapeutics (1891)
Serta, onye America na-emepụta matarasị dị ka Azụmaahịa na ụdị nke dị ka, na-eji ihe odide atụrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na mkpọsa nri mgbasa ozi esighi na ozi ya 'Counting Sheep', nke ọ malitere na 2000
Ọ bụ Aardman Animations mepụtara mgbasa ozi na ihe odide ahụ
Na Goodnight Mr
Bean, nke iri na atọ nke usoro telivishọn Mr
Beana, onye isi nwere nsogbu ihi ụra
Mgbe usoro ndị ọzọ dara, ọ na-ese foto nke ìgwè atụrụ wee malite ịgụta ha, nke mbụ na mkpịsị aka ya wee, mgbe ọ tụfuru ọnụ ọgụgụ ugboro ole na ole, site n'enyemaka nke onye na-agbakọ
Mgbe ọ hụrụ ọnụ ọgụgụ atụrụ (ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị nanị site n'ime ka ọrụ nkụzi na ọmụmụ Ihe Anyị mụtara n'aka dị ka ndị ogbi na ime ihe eziokwu) na ngosipụta nke kalịnda, ọ na-ehi ụra ozugbo
Na Shaun the Sheep Championsheeps, usoro 2012 nke egwuregwu animated shorts, a na-ezo aka na 'ụmụ atụrụ na-agụta ọnụ' na ihe omume akpọrọ 'Steeplechase'
N'ụzọ dị mkpirikpi, Shaun na atụrụ ibe ya na-ekere òkè na ihe omume steeplechase

Bitzer nkịtị ọ bụla n'ime anyị si nọrọ na nche megide dị ka Azụmaahịa ka mma na, onye bụ onye na-ekpe ikpe, na atụrụ ndị ọzọ na anụ ụlọ, ndị bụ ndị na-ekiri, niile na-ehi ụra na-ekiri Shaun na atụrụ ndị ahụ ọzọ na-agba ọsọ gburugburu ụzọ ma na-awụli elu n'elu ihe mgbochi
Aha akwụkwọ akụkọ sayensị dị otú ahụ n'ebe nile Philip K
Dick, Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?, na-ezo aka na okwu a
con or con may refer tot
Mary Naa Amanua Dodoo, nke a makwaara dị ka Naa Amanua, bụ onye Ghana na-agụ egwu ọdịnala na onye na-ede egwu
Ọ bụ onye ndu nwanyị so na-abụ abụ nke Wulomei, otu egwu Ghana nke e hiwere n'afọ 1973
Naa bụ onye natara Ihe nrite awod nke Vodafone Ghana Music Awards Lifetime Achievement Honors nke afọ 2018
O sonyeere otu ukwe n'ụlọ ụka St
Georges Garrison Anglican Church, Burma Camp, ma mesịa gaa Abokobi Presbyterian Mixed-Middle School, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye ndu abụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na ngwụcha afọ ndị 1960
N'oge ọchịchị General Acheampong nke afọ 1974 (ọrụ akpọrọ nye onwe gị nri), ha gaharịrị mba ahụ na-agafe Volta na Yaipe Queen gaa Yaipe wee gaa Bolgatanga
N'etiwapụ egwu ha na ngafe mba Ghana, ndị otu ahụ gara Togo iji soro Charlotte Dada, nwanyị ama ama na Ghana na-eti egwu
Ha mekwara ngosipụta egwu ha na USA na UK
Naa Amanua mechara hapụ Wulomei isonyere Suku Troupe nke abọm mbụ ya, awo de me, bụ nnukwu egwu kporo ọkụ
Ndị Suku Troupe nyere Naa Amanua ohere inye ndị ụwa ntakịrị ihe n'abụghị naanị egwu
Ha bụkwa ndị a ga-atụle n'ụlọ ihe nkiri na ebe ịgba egwu
N'afọ 1978, ha gara Benin, Togo na Liberia na West Africa ma gaa Kenya, ebe ha gosiputara nka egwu ha nye onye isi ala Jomo Kenyatta
Mgbe afọ iri gasịrị ọ nọwara na Suku Troupe, Naa Amanua hapụrụ ha iji mepụta otu nke ya n'afọ 1988 wee wepụta Mi yen Maya na 1989
Naa ka na-arụsi ọrụ ike
Ọ na-eme ihe omume egwu na mmemme na n'emume pụrụ iche ma nwee nnatara uche ngosi tinyere onye egwu Burgher Highlife, Charles Amoah, na mbipụta nke iri na asatọ nke Vodafone Ghana Music Awards
N'afọ 2018, Ga-Adangme Concern Youth Group n'okpuru nduzi nke Nii Ayaafio Tetteh ghọtara ma nye ya aha Ga 'Nye Kpakpa' maka ntunye ya na egwu Ga-Adangme site na mbido ya
Naa kwenyere na onyinye sitere n'aka Chineke bụ onyinye n'adigide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi
Naa Ashorkor (amụrụ 24 Nọvemba 1988) makwaara dị ka Nisirine Naa Ashorkor Mensah-Doku, bụ onye omere Ghana na onye mgbasa ozi onye na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Asaase Radio ụlọ ọrụ redio dị na Accra
A maara ya maka ịgbanye na 'Foto zuru oke' (2009), nke Shirley Frimpong-Manso na Iroko TV's Poisoned Bait - ihe nkiri Leila Djansi duziri
O ritere ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 2010 na African Movie Academy ihe nrite maka ọrụ ya na 'The Perfect Picture' (2009)
Naa Ashorkor sonyekwara Yvonne Okoro, Joselyn Dumas, John Dumelo

Naadiya Moosajee, bụ onye injinia South Africa, onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta mmadụ na onye so wee tọọ ntọala nke otu Women in Engineering (WomEng), otu nzukọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ nke na-achọ ịzụlite nkà injinia n'etiti ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'ọtụtụ mba Africa
A mụrụ ya na South Africa na 1984
Ọ gara Mahadum Cape Town (UCT), ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere bachelọ nke sayensị (BSc) na Civil Engineering
Ọ gara n'ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ ya na UCT, wee gụchaa nweta nzere Master of Science (MSc) na Transport Engineering na 2009
N'ime afọ ikpeazụ ya mgbe ọ na-agbaso akara ugo mmụta nke Masters, ọ nọrọ ọnwa iri na abụọ dị ka nwa akwụkwọ mgbanwe mba ụwa na Mahadum Stuttgart dị na Germany
Na 2013, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Edinburgh ma nweta nzere Master of Business Administration (MBA)

Ruo otu afọ, ozugbo ọ nwetachara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya, e goro ya dị ka Onye Injinia Project, site na Arcus Gibb Engineering (nke buzi GIBB Engineering ), ụlọ ọrụ injinia na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ dị na Cape Town

N'oge 2010 FIFA World Cup, e goro ya dị ka VIP & Media Transport Coordinator maka atụmatụ, nhazi oge na arụmọrụ maka njem ụgbọ ala niile maka VIPs, ndị mgbasa ozi na ndị isi egwuregwu n'oge ọrụ 2010 FIFA World Cup na Cape Town
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi otu Global Leadership Fellow by Youth Action Network, otu ụlọ ọrụ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na United Kingdom
Ọ jere ozi ebe ahụ ọnwa iri na anọ ruo na Nọvemba 2010

N'ihe karịrị afọ abụọ, site na May 2011 ruo July 2013, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ntinye aka na Pegasys Strategy & Development, otu ndụmọdụ na-elekwasị anya na mmetụta nke mmepe na akụ na ụba na-apụta
Ọ jere ozi ebe ahụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka nnukwu mgbanwe ihu igwe na ọrụ ụgbọ njem ọha
Na Disemba 2014, akpọrọ Naadiya Moosajee n'etiti 'Ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ kachasị ike na Africa 2014', nke Forbes Magazine

N'ime afọ ndị gafeworonụ, o guzobela ma kwado ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-achọghi uru nakwa ụlọọrụ ndị na-achọ uru, nke gụnyere (a) Naadiya M, azụmahịa na-emewe, na-emepụta nakwa na-azụ ahia nke na-ezubere uwe azụmahịa ụmụ nwanyị na uwe mgbede, bụ nke ọ tọrọ ntọala ya na 2013 (b) Na 2014, o so wee tọọ ntọala JourneyMap Consulting, ụlọ ọrụ nchọta talent na inweta talent nwere ụlọ ọrụ na Johannesburg na Cape Town
(c) O mebere Women in Engineering (WomEng) na 2005 ma jee ozi dị ka CEO kemgbe
WomEng na-arụ ọrụ na South Africa na Kenya
Ọ bụ onye otu n'ime ọtụtụ bọọdụ, nke gụnyere (a) Onye otu mpaghara Advisory Board of Frost & Sullivan, maka mpaghara Africa
(b) Otu onye so na Board nke International Youth Foundation, kemgbe Jenụwarị 2012
(c) Onye otu ndị isi oche na Pegasys, kemgbe August 2013
na (d) Onye otu nke Global Future Council na World Economic Forum, kemgbe August 2016
Nabiha Lotfy (January 28, 1937 - June 17, 2015) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri a mụrụ na Lebanọn
A mụrụ ya na Saịdọn
Ọ gara Mahadum America nke Beirut tupu ọ kwaga Cairo
N'ebe ahụ, ọ gara Cairo Higher Institute of Cinema, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1964
O nyere aka guzobe Association of Egyptian Women Filmmakers na 1990
O mepụtara ihe karịrị ihe ngosi iri na abụọ na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri iri ise
A kpọrọ Latfy aha na National Order of the Cedar na 2006
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Cairo mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ọtụtụ ọnwa

Nabil Elouahabi (a mụrụ na 6 Febụwarị 1975), nke a na-akpọkarị Nabil El ouhabi, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain na Morocco, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya dịka Tariq Larousi na EastEnders site n'afọ 2003 ruo afọ 2005, dịka Rashid 'Gary' Mahmoon na 'Strangers on the Shore' (Krismas Special nke afọ 2002 nke Only Fools and Horses) na dịka Maazị Mustapha na usoro Netflix Top Boy n'afọ 2011 na 2013
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn dịka Attachments, Only Fools and Horses na In This World
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri dịka Ali G Indahouse (2002) na The Sum of All Fears (2002)
N'afọ 2005, e wepụrụ ya na ncha mgbe agwa ya, ya na ezinụlọ ya na-ese onyinyo, Ferreiras, gosipụtara na ndị na-ege ntị enweghị mmasị na ha
Kemgbe ọ hapụrụ EastEnders ọ pụtara na Holby City ma mee ka Ramzi Yousef na-eyi ọha egwu na telivishọn The Path to 9/11
N'afọ 2008, ọ mere Meesh, onye nsụgharị Kuwait, na HBO's Generation Kill
Nabila Ebeid (amụrụ na 21 Jenụwarị 1945 na Cairo, Egypt), nke a na-akpọkwa Nabila Ebeed, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Shoubra, Nabila bụ nnukwu onye na-akwado ihe nkiri ndị Ijipt oge ochie ma na-anakọta ego mgbe ọ bụ nwata iji gaa Shoubra Cinema Palace
E gosiri ya onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ijipt bụ Atef Salem na ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Mafish Faida
N'afọ 1965, ya na Omar Sharif mekọrịtakwara n'ihe nkiri The Mamluks, ọrụ a kọwara dị ka 'nzọụkwụ mbụ ya ịghọ onye a ma ama'
O meela ihe nkiri telivishọn El-Ammah Nour (Aunt Nour) na El-Bawaba El-Taniya (The Second Gate)
N'afọ 1967, ya na Salah Zulfikar mekọrọ ihe nkiri egwuregwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama Rubabikya (Robabekya)
Ọ lụrụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri, Atef Salem, onye chọpụtara ya site na 1963 ruo 1967
O mechara nwee ọtụtụ alụmdi nzuzo nke gụnyere Osama El-Baz nke were afọ itoolu
A mụrụ Nabilah Naggayi na Uganda n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1972
Ọ gara Kibuli Demonstration School maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya tupu ọ gaa Kibuli Secondary School maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ A-Level ya na Mengo Senior School, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ na diplọma ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1992
N'afọ 1994, Naggayi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Diploma na Translation na Mahadum Saarland, na Saarbrücken, Germany
N'afọ 1996, ọ gara nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na nke kachasị ukwuu na Uganda
Mahadum Makerere nyere ya nzere Master of Arts na Public Administration n'afọ 2011
Naggayi malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Gọọmentị Obodo Wakiso na 2001, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo n'afọ 2005
Ya, ya na ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Muhammad Nsereko, onye omeiwu nọ n'ọkwa maka Kampala Central Division, guzobere Social Democratic Party (SDP)
Ọ na-eme mkpọsa maka imegheghachi ohere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'oge ntuli aka nke afọ 2005
Ọ bụghị ruo mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 2006 gasịrị, ka ọ sonyeere òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Forum for Democratic Change (FDC)

N'afọ 2006, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na ise, ọ chụpụrụ Margaret Nantongo Zziwa nke National Resistance Movement (NRM) ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, iji weghara oche onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Kampala na omeiwu nke asatọ (2006 ruo 2011)
N'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2011, ọ nwetara vootu 222,724 ma e jiri ya tụnyere vootu 164,378 onye ya na ya kacha nso, Margaret Zziwa nke NRM nwetara

N'afọ 2013, otu ndị ọka iwu gbara ya akwụkwọ, Attorney General nke Uganda na Electoral Commission nke Uganda, n'ihe gbasara teknụzụ, ebe ọ bụ na Gọọmentị etiti nke Uganda weghaara nlekọta Kampala na 28 Disemba 2010, a kwụsịrị ile obodo ahụ anya dị ka mpaghara
N'afọ 2016, Naggayi zutere ndị ọzọ ise na-asọmpi, gụnyere Minista nke steeti maka ndị ntorobịa na ụmụaka, Florence Nakiwala Kiyingi
Otú ọ dị, Naggayi meriri n'ụzọ dị mfe

N'oge arụmụka iji wepụ oke afọ nke onye isi ala site na Iwu Iwu Uganda, Naggayi bụ otu n'ime ndị omebe iwu na-emegide ndị ndị ndị ọrụ nchekwa ji ike wepụ n'ụlọ ahụ, na 27 Septemba na afọr puku abụọ na iri na asaa , ọ bụ ezie na onye isi oche akwụsịbeghị ya
Ọ guzoro maka ọkwa Lord Mayor maka ntuli aka 2021-2026 ma merie Erias Lukwago
Nabit nke a na akpọkwa (Nabt) ma ọ bu Nabdem (nke a na-akpọkwa Nabde, Nabte, Nabdam, Nabdug, Nabrug, Nabnam, Namnam), bu asụsụ Gur nke Burkina Faso na Ghana
A jụrụ atụmatụ ịmepụta koodu ISO 639-3 na Jenụwarị 2017
Nabulya Theopista Ssentongo (amụrụ na 14 Febụwarị 1951) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na nke asatọ na nke itoolu nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ndị ọrụ maka National Resistance Movement Workers District
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya onye ọrụ kpọmkwem ma jee ozi na Nzukọ nke asatọ na nke itoolu n'okpuru òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị NRM

Ọ nọ n'etiti ndị otu ise họpụtara site n'aka onye bụbu onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu Rebecca Kadaga iji nyochaa ebubo nke nepotism na recruitment na-ezighị ezi na NSSF, ịzụta na-akwadoghị nke òkè UMEME, nkwụsịtụ na-ezughị oke nke akụ NSSF na ihe ọ bụla ọzọ metụtara nlekọta ọjọọ nke NSSF
Onye isi oche nke NSSF bụ onye bụbu onye isi oche Masaka District LCV, na Kalungu East MP, Vincent Bamulangaki Ssempijja (onye nweere onwe ya)

Ndị omeiwu Kalungu West Joseph Ssewungu (Democratic Party), Ann Maria Nankabirwa (NRM, Kyankwanzi Woman), Alex Ruhunda (NRM), Fort portal Municipality) na Theopista Nabulya Ssentongo (Ndị ọrụ na-anọchite anya NRM) nyeere ya aka
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ , ndị bụbu ndị ọrụ nke Uganda Telecom Limited tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa ha n'ụlọ omebe iwu ma nye Nabulya
Nke a bụ n'ihi ịnyefe uru ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ndị na-eme ihe omume dị ukwuu nke malitere na 2002 nke hụrụ ka ndị ọrụ a tụfuru ọrụ ha tinyere ụgwọ ezumike nká ha na mmebi ndị ọzọ
O nwere akara A dị iche iche na arụmọrụ kọmitii
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu gara ụlọ omeiwu Pan African iji kwado ọrụ ya n'ịkwado nkwanye ùgwù maka ikike mmadụ na kọntinent ahụ
N'afọ puku abụọ na atọ ọ kọọrọ ndị omeiwu na ọ fọrọ nke nta ka e dinara ya n'ike n'ụlọ ya dị na Namasuba, nso Kampala site n'aka ndị Sudanese Refugee
O kwuru na otu ìgwè ahụ kọwara dị ka ndị na-ebu égbè na ndị dị ize ndụ dinara ndị na-enyere ya aka n'ụlọ
Ọ kọọrọ ndị uwe ojii ikpe ahụ, agbanyeghị na ọ nweghị ihe e mere na mgbasa ozi ma a kọọrọ ikpe anọ ọzọ nke ndina n'ike site n'otu ìgwè ahụ ọ bụ ezie na ọ nweghị omume e mere
Mgbe nzukọ ahụ gasịrị, osote onye isi ala mbụ Lt Gen
Moses Ali gwara Nabulya ka ọ zute ya

Nabyl Lahlou (a mụrụ n'afọ 1945 na Fes, Morocco) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Moroccan, onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara maka ịbụ onye nduzi ụlọ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ọhụrụ, a na-ewerekwa ya dịka otu n'ime ndị nduzi ihe ngosi Moroccan kachasị emetụta n'afọ ndi 1980
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na Paris na Académie du Théâtre de la Rue Blanche na L'Ecole Charles Dullin, ma mesịa kụzie na Kordj-el-Kifane (Algeria)

O dere ihe nkiri na French na Arabic; n'etiti ihe nkiri French ya bụ Ophélie n'est pas morte (Ophelia abụghị onye nwụrụ anwụ) (1969) na Schrischamtury (1975), na n'etiti Arabic ya Les Milliandaires (The Millionaires) (1968), Les tortues (The Turtles) (1970), na Asseyez-vous sur les cadavres (Sit on Corpses) (1974)
Lahlou duziri egwuregwu mbụ ya al-Sa'aa na obodo Morocco n'afọ 1965, wee hapụ ya ka ọ gaa gụọ akwụkwọ na mba France, laghachi n'afọ 1970
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-agbanwe Shakespeare iji gosipụta Morocco na-achị mgbe ọ na-achị
Edere ya n'afọ 1968, egwuregwu ya Ophélie n'est pas morte sitere na Shakespearean, aha ya bụ ihe na-ezo aka na Shakespeare's Ophelia
N'ịbụ nke Ministry of Culture nke Morocco kwadoro n'ụzọ ego, ọ bụ 'University Theater Companies' nke Lahlou mere ya n'afọ 1969

N'ime egwuregwu ahụ, a na-egosi ihe odide Shaksphere abụọ dị iche iche nke Hamlet na Macbeth na obere ihe nkiri na ihe odide ahụ ji aka ha kpọnwụọ na ihe ngosi ha na-ejide site na iji mkpara ma ọ bụ oche nkwagharị
A na-ewere mmepụta ya nke al-Salahef (The Turtles) dịka ọganihu
Nada Meawad (Arabic ندى معوض; amụrụ n'April 12, 1998) bụ onye Egypt na-egwu volleyball ụlọ na n'ụsọ osimiri, onye otu egwuregwu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Egypt
O mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise na 2013 FIVB Volleyball Girls' U18 World Championship na Thailand
Ọ malitere ịgba egwu na El Shams Club mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Nada Meawad na onye otu ya Doaa Elghobashy bụ ndị otu Afrịka mbụ sonyere na egwuregwu egwuregwu volleyball n'ụsọ osimiri FIVB na 2016
Ọ bụ onye AVCA First Team All-American ugboro ise na onye NAIA Player of the Year 2018, 2020 na 2021 mgbe ọ na-egwu volleyball kọleji na Mahadum Park
A mụrụ Meawad na Hossameldin Meawad and Eman Helmi ma too na Cairo, Egypt
N'ịbụ onye sitere n'ezinụlọ volleyball, o gosipụtara mmasị maka egwuregwu ahụ site na nwata
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Ibn El-Nafees ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2017, mgbe ọ na-egwu volleyball na El Shams Sporting Club na-agbaso nzọụkwụ nke ụmụnne ya

Meawad malitere ọrụ volleyball kọleji ya na 2017 na Mahadum Park dị na Parkville Missouri nke US, a nabatara ya na Park na agụmakwụkwọ zuru oke ya na nwanne ya nwanyị ejima Noura nke na-egwuri egwu volleyball maka Mahadum park
N'afọ ahụ, a kpọrọ ya American Volleyball Coaches Association NAIA Freshman of the Year 2017
AVCA NAIA First Team All-American, AVCA NA IA Midwest Region Freshman na Player of the Year, 2017
American Midwest Conference Freshman na Player of the Year
O nyeere Park aka na ndekọ nke 33-4 na mpụta na NAIA Volleyball Championship national quarterfinals
N'afọ 2018, ọ duuru ndị Pirates gaa 34-1 na NAIA Volleyball Championship nke mba, a kpọrọ ya MVP na All Tournament Team NAIA National Championship 2018
NAIA All-American First Team na NAIA Player of the Year 2018

N'afọ 2019 ọ duziri ndị Pirates na 32X4, ha meriri asọmpi Conference Championship wee ruo nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ na National Championship, Meawad mere AVCA All-American First Team na All-Tournament Team na NAIA National Championship
N'afọ 2020 ọ duziri otu ahụ wee merie asọmpi Conference
Ọ bụ onye egwuregwu nke afọ na Nzukọ, Mpaghara na Onye egwuregwu nke Afọ
O mere ya nke anọ Time First Team All-American

Mgbe afọ a na-atụghị anya ya nke iru eru n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 ọ laghachiri na 2021 na Mahadum Park maka oge ọzọ ma duru ndị otu ahụ gaa Heart of America Conference Championship ma kpọọ na ngwụcha nke NAIA National Championship ebe ha bụ Runner Up
A kpọrọ ya onye mwakpo kachasị mma na onye egwuregwu NAIA nke afọ 2021
Meawad na-egwuri egwu maka El Shams Volleyball Club kemgbe ọ dị afọ ise
O sonyere na nke mbụ ya na ndị otu okenye nke klọb ahụ na 2015 Women's African Clubs Championship (volleyball) nke emere na Egypt
El Shams mechiri n'ọnọdụ nke anọ
N'afọ 2016 El Shams kwụsịrị n'ọnọdụ nke ise na Women's African Clubs Championship (volleyball) CAVB na Tunisia
N'afọ 2017 El Shams meriri n'ọkwa nke abụọ mgbe o meriri ndị otu Al Ahly 3 South na mmeri akụkọ ihe mere eme wee ruo eru maka ngwụcha na Women's African Clubs Championship (volleyball)
E nyere Meawad ihe nrite Most Valuable Player
Ya na onye mmekọ ya Doaa Elghobashy, ọ ruru eru na volleyball osimiri maka 2016 Summer Olympics na Rio de Janeiro site na mmeri CAVB Continental Cup nke emere na Naịjirịa
Elghobashi na Meawad sonyeere ndị mmekọ dị iche iche n'inyere Egypt aka inweta ebe na Rio
Doaa na Lamies Nossier na Nada na Randa Radwan gbara egwu
Ijipt weputara ihe ndekọ 5 na ngwụcha nke African Continental Cup n'etiti Eprel na Abuja, Naịjirịa
Site na mmeri mbụ n'elu ndị otu si Morocco, Mozambique, Namibia, na Naịjirịa, ndị Ijipt meriri Rwanda 2o1 na ngwụcha
Meawad na Elghobashi gbara na asọmpi FIVB Beach Volleyball World Tour nke mbụ ha
Enweghị ihe omume FIVB World Tour gara aga, Doaa na Nada bụ ndị otu mbụ si Egypt n'akụkọ ihe mere eme iji sọọ mpi na Olympic Games maka volleyball osimiri
Nada bụ nwa agbọghọ kachasị nta na-agba bọọlụ na-asọmpi n'egwuregwu Olimpik isii ọ bụla mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, ọnwa atọ
Ha abụọ gbara na Pool-D na 2016 Summer Olympics
Ashraf hibere akaụntụ Instagram 'Assault Police' na mbụ iji wepụta ikpo okwu maka ụmụ nwanyị ndị nwetara mwakpo mmekọahụ na ndina n'ike iji mee ka ahụmahụ ha pụta ìhè

Akaụntụ ahụ keere òkè pụtara ìhè n'ikpughe ikpe nke onye na-amaja na onye eboro ebubo idina n'ike, Ahmed Bassam Zaki, onye a tụrụ mkpọrọ afọ atọ maka ebubo iyi egwu mmekọahụ n'ịntanetị na Disemba 2020
Okwu a dị elu kpatara ndị ọha na eze na òtù dị na Egypt
dị ka ụlọ alakụba Al-Alzhar nke Cairo, ikwu okwu megide idina nwoke na ime ihe ike mmekọahụ
Ọdịnaya nke akaụntụ 'Ndị uwe ojii wakporo' gbasaa site na ịfụ ụfụ iji kwupụta nchegbu zuru oke gbasara ime ihe ike mmekọahụ, yana ịkụziri na inye ụmụ nwanyị ihe onwunwe
Ọ kpalitere mmegharị ndị ọzọ ma gbaa ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ ume ikwu okwu megide iyi egwu mmekọahụ, dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ na Higher Film Institute of Egypt

Nader Galal (Jenụwarị 1941 - Disemba 2014) bụ onye nduzi telivishọn na ihe nkiri nke Ijipt nke a maara nke ọma maka iduzi ihe nkiri Barak men Waraq (A Hero of Paper), El-Irhaby (The Terrorist) na El-Wad Mahrouz Beta'a El-Wazir (Mahrous, onye minista)
A mụrụ Galal na 1941 n'ezinụlọ na-ese ihe, nna ya bụ onye nduzi Ijipt Ahmed Galal na nne ya bụ Mary Queeny, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Ijipt
O nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Commerce na 1963, na 1964, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Higher Cinema Institute na diplọma na nduzi ihe nkiri
Galal malitere ọrụ ya na 1965 ma duzie ihe karịrị ihe nkiri ịrị ise, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ama ama dị ka Adel Imam na Nadia El-Gendy

Nader Galal (Jenụwarị 1941 - Disemba 2014) bụ onye nduzi telivishọn na ihe nkiri nke Ijipt nke a maara nke ọma maka iduzi ihe nkiri Barak men Waraq (A Hero of Paper), El-Irhaby (The Terrorist) na El-Wad Mahrouz Beta'a El-Wazir (Mahrous, onye minista)
A mụrụ Galal na 1941 n'ezinụlọ na-ese ihe, nna ya bụ onye nduzi Ijipt Ahmed Galal na nne ya bụ Mary Queeny, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Ijipt
O nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Commerce na 1963, na 1964, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Higher Cinema Institute na diplọma na nduzi ihe nkiri
Galal malitere ọrụ ya na 1965 ma duzie ihe karịrị ihe nkiri ịrị ise, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ama ama dị ka Adel Imam na Nadia El-Gendy

Nadia Arop Dudi Mayom (amụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị 1971) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan nke jere ozi na South Sudan National Legislative Assembly kemgbe 2011, na-anọchite anya Koch County dị ka onye otu Sudan People's Liberation Movement
Dudi bụ otu n'ime ndị Padang abụọ na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ndị minista, n'akụkụ Simon Mijok Mijak
A mụrụ Dudi na 1 Jenụwarị 1979 n'obodo Bentiu, Western Upper Nile, Sudan
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Bahr El-Ghazal na 2009 na nzere na sayensị anụmanụ, ma na-aga Mahadum Juba ugbu a, na-agbaso nzere masta nke nka
N'afọ 2005, a họpụtara Dudi ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba Sudan, na-eje ozi ruo n'afọ 2010
N'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke Southern Sudan, na-eje ozi ruo n'afọ 2011
Dudi nọchitere anya Koch County dị ka onye otu SPLM na mgbakọ abụọ ahụ
Site na 2005 ruo 2007, Dudi bụ onyeisi oche nke Unity State SPLM
Dudi jere ozi na South Sudan National Legislative Assembly kemgbe afọ 2011, na-esote ntuli aka South Sudan nke afọ 2010 na ntuli aka nnwere onwe South Sudan nke 2011

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2011, Salva Kiir Mayardit, onye isi ala South Sudan, họpụtara Dudi ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo na ọhịa, njem nleta, ihe onwunwe anụmanụ, na Cooperatives na mmepe ime obodo; ọ ga-anọ n'ọkwa ndị a ruo n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2013
Site n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013 ruo n'ọnw Machị afọ 2020, ọ bụ minista na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị, ntorobịa na egwuregwu
N'oge a, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-anọchite anya minista nke Gender, Child and Social Welfare na 2018
Kemgbe Machị 2020, ọ bụ minista nke Ọdịbendị, Ebe Ngosi Ihe Mgbe Ochie na Ihe Nketa Mba
N'oge ọ bụ minista ọdịbendị, South Sudan kwadoro usoro nkwekọrịta UNESCO, ọ nyekwara aka iduzi mmemme mgbasa ozi na-egosi akwụkwọ echekwara site na National Archives of South Sudan

N'afọ 2016, Dudi bụ otu n'ime ndị ọrụ gọọmentị iri isii a na-ebo ebubo na ha na-etinye aka n'ihe ihere gbasara Bank of South Sudan, nke a na-eji £ 443 nde SSP nke ego maka Kọmitii Nchịkwa Nsogbu akwụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche ụgwọ
Dudi bụ onye otu SPLM Politburo ma bụrụ onye guzobere South Sudan Veterinary Council
Ọ lụrụ onye nnọchi anya William Daud Riek Totor
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ
Nadia Benbouta (amụrụ na 21 Jenụwarị 1970) bụ onye Algeria na-ese ihe nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Paris
A mụrụ ya na Algiers, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na École supérieure des beaux-arts d'Alger na École nationale supérieure des Beaux-Arts
Ihe osise ya jikọtara ihe ndị yiri ihe ndị na-enweghị njikọ ihe oyiyi sitere na mgbasa ozi, ihe nkiri ụmụaka na isi mmalite ndị ọzọ, ihe osise na-atọ ọchị, ọkọlọtọ, ngwá agha na ihe ịchọ mma
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi onwe ya na France, Germany na Ukraine
O sonyere n'ihe ngosi otu na Paris, Lyon, Marseille, Toulouse, Germany, Norway, Greece, Algeria na New York City
Benbouta natara onyinye Prix Albéric Rocheron na 1998 na Prix Fenêtre des Arts Européens nke Sprengel Museum nyere na Hanover na 1999
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Bibliothèque nationale de France, École nationale supérieure des Beaux-Arts, Musée de Serignan na obodo Bobigny
Nadia Buari (amuru na November 21, 1982) bu onye Nkiri Ghana
O nwetara nhọpụta abụọ maka Best Actress in a Leading Role na Africa Movie Academy Awards na 2009
A mụrụ Buari na Sekondi-Takoradi, Ghana, nye nna Lebanon na nne Ghana
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị Mfantsiman wee mụọ nka nka na Mahadum Ghana, wee gụchaa ma wee BFA degree
N'ime oge niile ọ nọ na Mahadum Ghana, ọ na -etinye aka na ihe nkiri na ịgba egwu otu
Buari bidoro na onyonyo Ghana na usoro TV Games People Play na ngwụsị 2005
Ọrụ ya na 'Beyonce' bụ nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma ya
Ọrụ ihe nkiri ya bidoro na -ekere òkè n'usoro ihe nkiri TV Games People Play na 2005, nke ọ họpụtara maka onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma
O nweela ihe nkiri karịrị iri abụọ
N'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara ihe nkiri nke ya akpọrọ The Diary of Imogene Brown
Buari si na ihe nkiri Ghana gaa na ihe nkiri Nollywood n'afọ 2008
Ọrụ ọ rụpụtara na Nollywood bụ na ihe nkiri Beyonce & Rihanna bu ru Beyonce n'akụkụ omee Nollywood Omotola Jalade Ekeinde onye mere dika Rihanna
A makwaara ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood ya na Jim Iyke na-eme ihe nkiri, nke nwekwara nlebara anya
Na 2013, ọ meriri ihe nrite Pan African Actress na nturu ugo nke aa N'eme n'afọ bu Entertainment Awards nke Naijiria (NEA Awards) na New York City
Buari ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya na Tablet India Limited (TIL) na 2013
N’afọ 2019, Buari kpughere n’ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ọ nwụrụ mmadụ ma nwee ụmụ anọ
N'afọ 2014, e nyere Buari onyinye nzere pụrụiche na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Nadia Davids (amụrụ na Cape Town ) bụ onye na-ede egwuregwu ndi South Afirika, onye na-agụ akwụkwọ, na onye edemede nke obere akụkọ na ihe nkiri
Ebipụtala, mepụta ma rụọ ọrụ ya na South Afirika, Europe, na United States
Ọ bụ onye meriri ihe nrite Philip Leverhulme na 2013
Ejije ya What Remains meriri Fleur du Cap Theatre Awards ise
Davids toro na Cape Town no na South Afirika
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mbụ na Zonnebloem Girls School - otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ kacha ochie, nke kachasị na Cape nke dị na nsọtụ District isii - na mgbe e mesịrị na St Cyprian School

Na onwa June, na afor 2008, ọ nwetara PhD na ihe nkiri na Mahadum Cape Town (UCT) maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Echeta Eketara; Ime Ụlọ Nche', bụ nke nyochara akụkọ ihe mere eme, ebe nchekwa na nhụjuanya nke mwepụ nke mmanye na District isii n'okpuru Mpaghara Group
Mee n'oge apartheid na South Africa, site na oghere nke arụmọrụ
O mere Mellon Fellowship n'etiti 2000 na 2005, ma bụrụ onye ọkà mmụta nleta na UC Berkeley (2001) na Mahadum New York (2004-05)
Ọ meriri ihe nrite Philip Leverhulme na 2013
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị odee egwuregwu iri na-ekere òkè na ụlọ nyocha ihe nkiri ụmụ nwanyị dabere na New York maka 2008–10
Ọ malitere ọkwa nkuzi oge niile na ngalaba ihe nkiri na Mahadum Queen Mary nke London na Septemba 2009
Na 2018 ọ sonyeere Ngalaba Bekee nke Mahadum Cape Town dị ka onye prọfesọ na-akpakọrịta
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara Davids ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke PEN South Africa, na-eweghara oge n'aka Margie Orford

A na-ekesa ọrụ Davids site n'ụdị dị iche iche (akụkọ akụkọ, ihe nkiri ndụ, ederede egwuregwu ebipụtara, akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe nkiri, akwụkwọ akụkọ) nye ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị (ahịa, agụmakwụkwọ / agụmakwụkwọ)

N'ụkwụ ya (2002–12), ihe ngosi otu nwanyị gbadoro ụkwụ na njirimara ụmụ nwanyị Cape Muslim biputere 9/11 nke onye omere South Africa ama ama Quanita Adams mere na Cissie (2008–11), egwuregwu na-enyocha akụkọ ndụ nwanyị, akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Mpaghara isii, na akụkọ ndekọ akụkọ ihe mere eme site n'echiche ihe nkiri nke ndụ onye na-akwado ịkpa ókè agbụrụ Cissie Gool, bụ ezi ihe atụ
N'ụkwụ ya nke mbụ rụrụ na Arena Theatre na 2002 na Cissie rụpụtara ya na National Arts Festival na Grahamstown na July 2008

Ọrụ abụọ ahụ enwetala ihe nrite ihe nkiri na nhọpụta (ise Fleur du Cap Theater Awards, otu Noma, otu Naledi ), ma bụrụkwa nke a haziri n'ụwa niile (na Africa, Europe, United States na ebe ndị dị ka Market Theater, Baxter Theater, Southbank Center, na na Grahamstown National Arts Festival, Arovibes, na London Book Fair )
A na-amụ egwuregwu a na mahadum dị iche iche (Mahadum Cape Town, Stanford, Mahadum New York, SOAS, Mahadum Warwick na Mahadum York ) na bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-arụ ọrụ na South Africa dum
Aghọtara ha n'ime ọnọdụ ndị a dị ka imeghe oghere ndị a na-atụghị anya ya nke ndụ South Africa - karịsịa Muslim Capetonian - ụmụ nwanyị, na-ewere isi ihe
N'ụkwụ ya bụ otu n'ime ọrụ ihe nkiri izizi pụtara na nzaghachi na 9/11 wee bụrụ otu n'ime egwuregwu naanị na-akọ akụkọ ndụ ụmụ nwanyị Muslim Capeton
Njabulo Ndebele kọwara ya dị ka 'agaghị echefu echefu
Art nke usoro kachasị elu,' ọ laghachiri na Baxter na 2018 maka ọsọ ikpeazụ ya na Quanita Adams

Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ Davids, Ngọzi na-ezughị okè, bipụtara na Eprel 2014 site n'aka Random House Struik-Umuzi, na na Disemba 2014 ka ekwuputara dị ka otu n'ime akwụkwọ atọ ahọpụtara maka Etisalat Prize for Literature
Edepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ogologo oge maka onyinye nrite Sunday Times wee depụta aha ya maka ihe nrite UJ
Jay Pather duziri ya, ọ gosipụtara Denise Newman, Faniswa Yisa, Shaun Oelf na Buhle Ngaba
Ihe fọdụrụ na- ere na Grahamstown, gaa n'ihu na-ere ahịa na Hiddingh Hall na Cape Town, ma na-egwuri egwu na 2017 Afrobibes Festival na Holland

A na-eto ihe fọdụrụ dị ka 'nkà mmụta mara mma' na Cape Times ; E mechara họpụta ya maka ihe nrite Fleur du Cap Theater asaa wee nweta ise, gụnyere Best New South African Play, Best Director, Best Ensemble, Best Actress and Best Lighting Design
Mwepụta nke ihe fọdụrụ pụtara na Margaret Busby 's 2019 anthology New Daughters of Africa
Nadia Ejjafini (amụrụ na abalị asatọ, na onwa Nọvemba, na afo 1977) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge a mụrụ na Morocco
Ọ gbanwere mba ya site na mba a mụrụ ya gaa Bahrain n'afọ 2003, ma mesịa ghọọ nwa amaala Ịtali site n'alụmdi na nwunye n'afọ 2009
Ọ mechara nke anọ na mita 5000 na 1998 World Junior Championships
O meriri ọkara ọsọ marathon na afọ 1999 Pan Arab Games, n'oge ahụ na-anọchite anya Morocco
O meriri asọmpi Giro di Castelbuono n'afọ 2002
Ejjafini sonyere na World Cross Country Championships na afọ 2003 rue na afọ 2004 na marathon na Isompi ụwa na afọ 2003
O mekwara asọmpi marathon na afọ 2004 ya na afo 2008 Summer Olympics, mana ọ gwụbeghị na mgbalị ọ bụla
Ọ bụ onye nke anọ n'elu 5000 m na afọ 2006 Asian Games
O nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na circuit n'okporo ụzọ na afọ 2006 ọ meriri Tilburg Ten Miles, Diecimiglia del Garda, Parelloop, Circuito Podistico na Rome-Ostia Half Marathon n'afọ ahụ
O nwetakwara mmeri n'usoro na Corrida de Langueux na Correda de Houilles 10K agbụrụ na afọ 2006 rue na afọ 2007
Na-anọchite anya Bahrain, o nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha 5000m na ọla nchara 10,000m na 2007 Military World Games wee merie ọla nchara na afọ 2007 Asian Cross Country Championships
Na Athletics na afọ 2007 Pan Arab Games, ọ bụ onye nwetara ọla edo 10,000m
O nwetara nwa amaala Ịtali na onwa Septemba, na afọ 2009 site n'alụmdi na nwunye
N'afọ ahụ, ọ bụ onye mmeri na Singelloop Utrecht
O meriri n'asọmpi mba mbụ ya na afọ 2011 Italian Athletics Championships n'elu 10,000 m
Ọ bịara nke abụọ na Cross della Vallagarina na onwa Jenụwarị, na afọ 2011, na-agwụcha n'azụ onye na-agba ọsọ Etiopia Fente Alemu Birtukan
Ọ nọchitere anya Ịtali na mba ụwa na nke mbụ ya na afọ 2011 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, na-abịa nke 34 n'ozuzu
N'ọnwa sochirinụ, o sonyere na Great Ireland Run wee ruo n'elu atọ
O meriri Cremona Half Marathon n'ọnwa Ọktoba site na ọsọ kachasị mma nke 1 08 27 awa na nke kachasị mma nke 2 26 15 na igba ọsọ sochiri, dịka ọ bụ nke isii na Frankfurt Marathon
Na November's Cross Internacional Valle de Llodio ọ meriri ọsọ 764 kilomita na ọkara nkeji fọdụrụ
Ọ nọ na-asọ mpi maka ihe nrite maka ọtụtụ n'ime asọmpi ahụ na 2011 European Cross Country Championships, mana Gemma Steel mere ya n'ọkwa nke anọ
Na Cross de Venta de Baños n'ọnwa ahụ, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ n'azụ Priscah Jepleting
Na asọmpi ikpeazụ ya n'afọ ahụ, ọ bịara nke anọ na Saint Silvester Road Race
Ọ meziwanyere 10K kacha mma ya ruo 31 52 nkeji na Great Manchester Run na Mee 2012, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'azụ Linet Masai
Nadia Eke (amụrụ na 11 Jenụwarị, na afo 1993, Accra) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ atọ
Eke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Columbia na afọ 2015
N'afọ 2014, ọ mechara nke iri na Commonwealth Games na Glasgow, merie ọlaọcha na African Championships na Marrakech ma bụrụ onye nke asaa na IAAF Continental Cup
O nwetakwara ọla nchara na African Games na Brazzaville n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2016, ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri Afrịka n'oge asọmpi African Athletics Championship nke afọ 2016
O ruru eru ịnọchite anya Ghana na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị atọ
N'èzí
N'ime ụlọ
Nadia Farès (Arabic, a mụrụ n'abalị 20 nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 1968 na Marrakech, Morocco) bụ onye obodo France na-eme ihe nkiri
O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya n'afọ 1992, na My Wife's Girlfriends Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na akụkọ ndị uwe ojii Les Rivières pourpres (The Crimson Rivers)
Ọ pụtara dịka Jade Agent Kinler n'afọ 2007 action / thriller War, na dịka Pia na 2007 horror film Storm Warning
Nadia Fares Anliker (a mụrụ na 18 Septemba 1962) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede ihe nkiri nke Egypt-Switzerland
A mụrụ Fares na Bern, Switzerland, nwa nwanyị nke nna Ijipt na nne Switzerland
Ọ mụtara Arabic mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Cairo ruo otu afọ, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cairo n'afọ 1986
N'otu afọ ahụ, Fares duziri ihe nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ ya, Magic Binoculars, nke mbụ n'ime ọtụtụ mepụtara maka telivishọn Switzerland
Fares malitere ịga Mahadum New York n'afọ 1987 iji mụọ ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1991, o ritere ihe nrite site na Stanley Thomas Johnson Foundation maka obere ihe nkiri ya Sugarblues
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum New York, Krzysztof Kieślowski duziri Fares ma jee ozi dịka osote onye nduzi maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya
O nwetara nzere masta ya na ọmụmụ ihe nkiri n'afọ 1995
N'afọ 1996, Fares duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Miel et Cendres
Ọ na-agbaso njikọ nke ụmụ nwanyị atọ dọkịta Naima, onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ Amina, na nwa akwụkwọ Leila
Miel et Cendres na-achọpụta njem ha ka ha na-agagharị n'etiti ọdịnala na ọgbara ọhụrụ
Ọ natara onyinye iri na asatọ n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri, gụnyere Oumarou Ganda Prize na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou
Fares duziri ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na isiokwu nke nsogbu mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka RTS / TV5 Monde
Nadia Gamal bụ onye Egypt na-agba egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya maka ịgwakọta egwu baldy nke Ijipt na Western Waltz, Cowboy, Cha Cha na ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ ya dị ka Maria Carydias na Alexandria, Egypt
Gamal malitere ịgba egwú dị ka akụkụ nke ihe nne ya na-eme na cabaret
N'ịbụ onye a zụrụ na piano yana ụdị ịgba egwu dị iche iche dị ka ballet na tap, Gamal malitere ịgba egwu ọdịnala Europe dịka ihe nne ya mere
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, otu onye na-agba egwú na-arịa ọrịa n'òtù nne ya nyere ya ohere ịgba egwú raqs sharqi na Lebanọn, nke nna ya machibidoro ya ime n'ihi ntorobịa ya
Mgbe nke mbụ a gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye na-agba egwú a ma ama ma gaa n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ijipt
N'afọ 1953, ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri India bụ Shammi Kapoor mgbe ha zutere na Sri Lanka, mana ọ laghachiri Cairo
O mekwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri India
N'afọ 1968, Gamal ghọrọ onye mbụ na-agba egwu raqs sharqi gbara egwú na Baalbeck International Festival
Ọ pụtakwara na Cairo Opera House ma gbaa egwú maka Eze Hussein na Shah nke Iran
Gamal gara Eshia, Middle East, Europe, Latin America na North America n'oge ọrụ ya
N'afọ 1978 na 1981 ọ kụziri obere oge na-agba egwu na New York City
Ka oge na-aga n'ọrụ ya, Gamal malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ ịgba egwú
A chọpụtara na Gamal nwere ọrịa kansa ara n'afọ 1990, mgbe ọ na-agwọ ọrịa na Beirut, oyi bara ya n'ahụ
O wee nwụọ
A maara Gamal maka iji ala rụọ ọrụ nke ọma
Ọ na-agụnyekarị raqs baladi (agba egwú ọdịnala), ịgba egwú Bedouin na ịgba egwú Zār na raqs sharqi na arụmọrụ ya
O nwere mmetụta n'ọtụtụ ndị na-agba egwú dịka Ibrahim Farrah, Suhaila Salimpour, na Claire Naffa
Nadia Hamza (amụrụ na 1939 na Port Said) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na-ede ihe nkiri
Tupu ọ malite ọrụ nduzi, Hamza rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede, onye enyemaka na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi na onye edemede nke na-aga nke ọma nke a maara maka ime ihe nkiri na ndị inyom na-ekwu maka ọchịchọ na ahụmịhe ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1994, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, Seven Stars Studio ma malite iso ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri n'Ijipt rụkọọ ọrụ
Nadia kwenyere na ndị nduzi nwanyị dị iche na ndị nwoke ibe ha n'ihe gbasara isiokwu nke ihe nkiri na otu ha si eji igwefoto
A maara ya maka igosi ụmụ nwanyị na ịma echiche ọha na eze banyere ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ aka
A na-egosipụta àgwà nwanyị ya dị ka ndị mmeri ma lekwasị anya na nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ
A mụrụ Nadia n'obodo Port Said, North nke Cairo na 1939
Hamza rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ na ngalaba nka nke akwụkwọ akụkọ 'Al Goumhouriah' mgbe ezinụlọ ya kwagara Cairo
O mechara chọta ọrụ na magazin Egypt nke a ma ama, 'Al Kawakeb' nke dugara ya na ndị na-ese ihe, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, ndị na-emepụta ihe na ndị nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe na edemede ihe nkiri na Cinema Institute wee bụrụ onye na-enyere onye nkuzi ya Niazi Mustafa aka onye bụkwa onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya ọrụ nduzi izizi ya, Sea of Fantasy / Bahr al-awham (1984), bụ nke ndị nkatọ ihe nkiri North Africa na Middle East toro

Nadia malitere iduzi ma mepụta ihe ọhụrụ kwa afọ na Women/ Al-Nisa na 1985, Women Behind Bars/ Nisa Khalfa al-qoudban na 1986, A Womanī's Greed/Hiq Imraī'ah na 1987, The Woman and the Law/ Al-Marī'ah wa-I-qanoun na Women, Alas!/ Imraʹah li-I-asaf na 1988
Hamza nwetara ụgwọ ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye na-enyere Niazi Mustafa aka na 'Saghira Ala Al Hobb' (1966)
Hamza mechara bụrụ onye a maara dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ụmụ nwanyị nke a maara maka igosi ụmụ nwanyị dịka ha dị, karịa ihe oyiyi a ma ama na ihe ngosi ndị Ijipt
Onye na-emepụta
Onye nduzi
Onye na-enyere onye nduzi aka
Nadia Kaci (a mụrụ n'afọ 1970) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri
A zụlitere Kaci na Algiers site n'aka nne 'onye mara mma, onye na-amaghị akwụkwọ, na onye nwere uche'
Ọ kụziiri nwa ya nwanyị nwanyị nwanyị site na nwata ma kpọọ darbouka maka ụmụ asaa ahụ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Kaci malitere ichegbu onwe ya banyere ntụziaka nke Algeria na nnwere onwe n'ihi ọgba aghara nke ọnwa October afọ 1988 na ịrị elu nke ịhụ mba n'anya nke Islam
Mgbe o kpebiri ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nna ya jụrụ ịgwa ya okwu ruo afọ iri abụọ
A gbara Kaci ume ịkwaga France, mana ọ jụrụ na mbụ ebe ọ bụ na o chere na ọ bụ onye sabo
O mechara gaa France n'afọ 1993, mgbe nkwenye ahụ ghọrọ ihe na-enweghị ike ịnagide ya
N'afọ 1994, Kaci mere Yamina, nwanne nwanyị Said nke a manyere iyi ákwà mkpuchi, na Bab El-Oued City
Merzak Allouache duziri ihe nkiri ahụ ma katọọ ime ihe ike nke ndị Alakụba, ma nata onyinye International Federation of Film Critics n'afọ 1994 Cannes Film Festival
O gosipụtara onye nwere ọgụgụ isi Fatiha na Bent Familia, nke e wepụtara n'afọ 1997
N'afọ 1999, Kaci pụtara dị ka onye nọọsụ ụmụaka Samia Damouni na It All Starts Today
Kaci mere Julie, onye ọrụ n'ụlọ ndị ọchịchị na-elekọta René, na Nationale 7 n'afọ 2000
Malcolm Lewis nke New Internationalist toro arụmọrụ ya dịka onye nwere 'ịdị mfe ma bụrụ ezigbo ume'
Ọ pụtara na Les Suspects n'afọ 2004, nke sitere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Les Vigiles nke Tahar Djaout
N'afọ 2007, Kaci pụtara na Délice Paloma, nke Nadir Moknèche duziri
Nadia Khiari (amụrụ na 21 Mee 1973) bụ onye Tunisia na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-ese ihe eserese, onye na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi nka
A maara ya nke ọma maka akụkọ ihe mere eme ya na nchịkọta ihe nkiri banyere Arab Springs, ọkachasị maka agwa ya 'Willis si Tunis', nke a na-akpọ 'Cat of the Revolution' n'ebe ụfọdụ
Na agụmakwụkwọ, Khiari bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Plastic Arts na Aix-en-Provence, France, ma na-akụzi nka na Faculty of Fine Arts na Tunis
N'afọ 2013 ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta dị ka Docteur Honoris Causa na Mahadum Liège na Belgium
Ewezuga mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta, e bipụtara ọrụ Khiari na magazin ndị dị ka Siné Mensuel, Courrier International na Zelium
N'ịkatọ onye bụbu onye isi ala Tunisia bụ Ben Ali, o mepụtara ihe nkiri nke nwamba aha ya bụ Willis
Na Jenụwarị 2011, ọ malitere ibe Willis si Tunis na Facebook iji gosipụta mmetụta ya banyere Arab Spring, nke dọtara ihe karịrị ndị na-eso ụzọ puku iri ise na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021
O kwupụtara na ọ na-ese ihe 'iji wepụ okpomọkụ n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ'
N'ihi iwu siri ike nke ọchịchị mbụ na iji zere ịtụba ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, o kpachapụrụ anya 'ịmụta ịghọ aghụghọ, ịtụ aro kama ikwu okwu'
O kwuru banyere ọrụ nka ya na mgbanwe ahụ 'ọ bụghị ọrụ nye m
Ọ bụ nnwere onwe
Dị ka a na-amụ m
Tupu mgbanwe ahụ, abụ m zombie
Echere m, mana enweghị m ike ikwupụta onwe m
Ya mere, echeghị m na m dị ndụ
Site na mgbanwe ahụ, a mụrụ m, dị ka nwa ọhụrụ
Mkpu mbụ m tiri bụ ihe osise m
Ma ugbu a maka m ọ bụ mgbanwe na nka m, kpamkpam
Enwere m ike ikwu onwe m n'ikpeazụ ma kwuo ihe m chere ma katọọ gọọmentị
Maka m enwere m ike ime ihe na-atọ m ụtọ ihe nkiri
Ewezuga ihe osise ya, a makwaara Khiari maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Dị ka onye otu 'Cartooning for Peace', ọ sonyekwara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ French na mmemme 'Dessine-moi la Méditerranée'
N'afọ 2020, o bipụtara akwụkwọ ya Willis from Tunis, 10 ans et toujours vivant! nke nwere okwu mbido nke onye France na-ese ihe nkiri Plantu
Khiari enwetala otuto dị iche iche maka ọrụ nka ya

E nyela ya Honoré Daumier Award n'oge nzukọ nke abụọ nke mba ụwa nke Cartooning for Peace na Caen (2012), Political Satire International Award na Forte dei Marmi (2014), na 2015 Agora Med Award for Intercultural Dialogue in the Mediterranean
Nadia Kounda (a mụrụ n'abalị 24 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1989) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Morocco
A mụrụ Nadia Kounda na Casablanca, MoroccoỌ malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri na telivishọn n'afọ 2008, na Morocco
N'afọ 2011, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri L'amante du rif [fr], na-enweta nkwado na mba ya
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ kwagara Montreal, Canada, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na mmepụta ihe nkiri
E gosipụtara Kounda na ihe nkiri na telivishọn nke mba na nke mba ụwa
Nadia Lalami Laaroussi (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1990 na Casablanca) bụ onye Morocco bụbu onye na-egwu tenis
N'ọrụ ya, ọ meriri utu aha abụọ na utu aha abụọ abụọ na ITF Women's Circuit
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2011, ọ ruru ọkwa kachasị mma n'ụwa nke 322
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2011, ọ rutere n'ọkwa nke 427 n'ọgụ abụọ
N'ịgba bọọlụ maka Morocco na Fed Cup, Lalami nwere ihe ndekọ mmeri nke afọ 1812
Na 2011 Grand Prix SAR La Princesse Lalla Meryem na Fes, ọ kpasuru mkpụrụ mbụ na ụwa No
24, Aravane Rezaï iwe na agba nke abụọ, na-aghọ onye ọkpụkpọ Moroccan mbụ ruru nkeji iri na ise nke asọmpi WTA
Nadia Lutfi ma Nadia Loutfi (a mụrụ Poula Mohamed Mostafa Shafiq (3 Jenụwarị 1937 - 4 Febụwarị 2020) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
N'oge ọ kachasị elu n'ọrụ ya, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ewu ewu n'oge ọlaedo nke ihe nkiri Egypt
A mụrụ Nadia na Cairo dị ka Poula Mohamed Mostafa Shafiq na nna onye Ijipt, Mohamed Mosta fa, na nne onye Alakụba nke Upper Egypt aha ya bụ Fatma
Ezinụlọ Nadia Lutfi bụ onye Alakụba
Nadia malitere ime ihe nkiri dị ka ihe ntụrụndụ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, o sonyere n'egwuregwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ya ma mee nke ọma
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na anọ na-achọ ime ihe nkiri mbụ ya na 1958, Omar Sharif bụ eze na-achị ihe nkiri Egypt, na nwunye ya, onye Egypt superstar Faten Hamama, eze nwanyị ya
Di na nwunye kpakpando ahụ ka nwere ihe nkiri La Anam na Hamama dị ka 'Nadia Lotfy', onye na-eto eto na-eme ihe n'amaghị ama nke na-ebibi alụmdi na nwunye nna ya
Poula nakweere aha nna na ọdịiche nke aha nna nke onye ahụ dị ka nke ya
N'okpuru aha ọhụrụ ya, onye nduzi Ramses Naguib hụrụ nwa agbọghọ na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ
Ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ na ihe nkiri dị ala, ojii na ọcha, Soultan na 1958
Foto ya nke abụọ bụ obere ọrụ n'otu n'ime ihe nkiri nke oge ya, Cairo Station

N'afọ 1963, ọ mere ka nwanyị Frankish bụ onye agha nke oge Crusade, na-eyi uwe agha zuru oke iji gaa agha megide onye ọ hụrụ n'anya bụ Onye Kraịst-Arab, (nke Salah Zulfikar mere), na Naser Salah el Dine (nke a na-egosi na telivishọn na United States dị ka Saladin na Great Crusades) (1963)

Na Lil-Rigal APC aka For Men Only (1964) nke Mahmoud Zulfikar, Lutfi na onye ya na ya so Soad Hosny mere ụmụ nwanyị ndị na-amụ banyere ala bụ ndị, ndị a jụrụ ọrụ, meghachiri site n'ime onwe ha ka ha bụrụ ụmụ nwoke ma gaa ọrụ, ebe ha chọpụtara na ha ga-egbochi ikike ịhụnanya ha iji nọgide na-eme ihe nzuzo ahụ

N'etiti afọ 1960, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri abụọ nke dabere na akụkọ nke odee ritere nrite Nobel Naguib Mahfouz, naanị afọ ole na ole mgbe e bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke a machibidoro iwu Awlad Haretna পাই حارتنا nke na-anọchi anya Chineke na Mozis, Jizọs na Mohammed, Ụmụ Gebelawi
Lutfi mechiri afọ iri na Abi Foq Al-Shagara aka Nna m n'elu osisi (1969) dị ka onye na-agba egwú abalị nke na-edina nwoke na-eto eto, wee chọpụta na ọ maara nna ya nke ọma
Tinyere El Momia aka The Night of Counting the Years (1969)
O so Soad Hosny mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere Al-Saba' Banat aka The Seven Girls
N'afọ ndị 1970, ọrụ ya kwụsịrị ka 'Golden Age' nke Egypt maka ihe nkiri na-eru nso na njedebe
Ebe o mere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri ịrị ise n'ime afọ irí na otu mbụ nke ọrụ ya, o mere naanị atọ n'ime iri afọ sochirinụ, ọ naghị arụkwa ọrụ na ihe nkiri kemgbe 1981
N'afọ 2006, ọ laghachiri n'ìhè mgbe vidiyo nke onye na-agụ egwú na Lebanọn na-eto eto Nourhanne mepụtara ihe nkiri egwu site na otu n'ime nkiri ya El Sokkariyya,
N'afọ 2014, Cairo International Film Festival nyere Nadia Lutfi otuto site na iji foto ya na foto mmemme ahụ
Na 4 Febụwarị 2020, mgbe ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ siri ike ruo oge ụfọdụ, Nadia Lutfi nwụrụ n'ụlọ Ọgwụ Maadi
Nadia Makram Ebeid (Arabic) bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ Ijipt nke jere ozi dị ka minista nke steeti maka gburugburu ebe obibi, bụrụ nwanyị Ijipt mbụ jere ozi n'ọ́kwa ahụ
Ebeid si n'ezinụlọ Coptic nke malitere na Qena ebe nwanne nna ya bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Makram Ebeid
Nwa nwanne nna ya bụ Mona Makram-Ebeid
Ebeid nwetara nzere masta nke nka na Mahadum America nke dị na Cairo n'afọ 1977
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na Julaị afọ 1997 na mgbanwe nke ndị isi ọchịchị, nke Praịm Minista Kamal Ganzouri mere
E guzobere isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ọhụrụ, Ebeid bụrụkwa minista mbụ nke gburugburu ebe obibi nke Ijipt
Ọ nọgidere na-eje ozi n'ọfịs ahụ ruo n'afọ 2002

Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọchịchị, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Council of Arab Ministers Responsible for the Environment (CAMRE) na nke ndị nlekọta nke Centre for Environment and Development for the Arab Region and Europe (CEDARE)
N'agbata afọ 2002 na afọ 2003 ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya udo pụrụ iche nke Arab League na Sudan
Ọ bụ ọkà mmụta nleta na Mahadum George Washington, USA
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2016 ọ bụrụla onye isi nchịkwa nke CEDARE
Nadia Mukami (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1996) bụ onye Kenya na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu nke a maara amara maka egwu ya 'Si Rahisi', na 'Radio Love', nke gosipụtara Arrow Bwoy
O wepụtara EP mbụ ya, African Popstar, n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2020Ọ bụ onye guzobere akara ndekọ Kenya 'Sevens Creative Hub'
A mụrụ Nadia Mukami n'ụlọ ọgwụ Pumwani na Nairobi, Kenya na mkpụrụ ụbọchị 9 n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1996
Ọ gara Kari Mwailu Praịmarị ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya n'afọ 2009
E mechara nabata ya na Mount Laverna School na Kasarani, Nairobi O mechara sonye na Mahadum Maseno wee nweta nzere na BBA Finance option
Nadia dere ma dekọọ egwu mbụ ya bụ Barua Ya Siri n'afọ 2015
Egwu ya nke abụọ bụ Kesi bụ oge mgbanwe ya, ọ nwetara ewum ewu ma bụrụ ihe egwu nke oge ahụ
O mere ka o nwee ohere iji mee ihe nkiri na ohere Kenya dị iche iche dịka Blaze The Nile Festival, The Luo Festival wdg
Nadia wepụtara egwu 'Radio Love' nke gosipụtara Arrow Bwoy n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2019
Abụ ahụ bụ ọganihu ya
Ọ nwetara nnukwu nlebara anya site na mgbasa ozi Kenya ma kpọọ ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ redio na TV na mpaghara ahụ
N'afọ 2019, Nadia kewara ụzọ ya na njikwa ya 'Hailemind Entertainment'
N'otu afọ ahụ 2019, egwu ya 'Radio Love' meriri ihe nrite abụọ na Pulse Music Video Awards (PMVA)
N'afọ 2019, o so na ndị na-ese ihe na-anọchite anya Kenya na Coke Studio Afrịka
Ná mmalite afọ 2020, Nadia wepụtara 'Nitekenye' nke gosipụtara otu egwu Gengetone nke Kenya 'Sailors'
E mechara wepụta EP mbụ nke Nadia na Ọktoba 2020
E wepụtara egwu 'Jipe' nke gosipụtara onye na-agụ egwu Tanzania bụ Marioo na Machị 2020
EP gosipụtara Khaligraph Jones, Maua Sama, Fena Gitu, DJ Joe Mfalme, Sanaipei Tande, Orezi nke Nigeria, Tamy Moyo nke Zimbabwe na Lioness Nam si Namibia
A họpụtakwara ya maka onyinye HiPipo na 2020
N'afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya nke mbụ ya na MTV Africa Music Awards (MAMA)
Nadia Nakai Kandava (née Dlamini; amụrụ n'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1990), bụ onye South Africa na-eti egwu na onye ama ama n'ihe ngosi telivishọn
A mụrụ Nakai na South Africa
Nna ya bụ onye South Africa ma nne ya bụ onye Zimbabwe
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, a gbanwere aha nna ma zawa nke nne ya
Nakai gara Fourways High School na Johannesburg ruo otu afọ wee gụchaa akwụkwọ na Kenya
O mechara nweta akara ugo mmụta azụmahịa , nkwukọrịta, na ọmụmụ mgbasa ozi na Mahadum Monash, Johannesburg
Nakai mere Mpụta telivishọn mbụ ya na etv hip hop show Shiz Niz ebe o meriri asọmpi Mixtape 101, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ meriri asọmpi ahụ
O mechara bụrụ onye a ma ama N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2013, mgbe ọ wepụtara egwu mbụ ya 'Like Me'
N'afọ sochirinụ, e gosipụtara ya na remix nke Riky Rick song, Amantombazane n'etiti ihe omume dị iche iche
N'ihe banyere ọnwa Juun afọ 2015, Nakai wepụtara egwu ya nke atọ 'Saka Wena' nke gosipụtara onye egwu Ice Prince, na-esote egwu ya nke abụọ, 'Whatever' nke gosipụtara DotCom na Psyfo
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2016, Nakai wepụtara egwu ya 'The Man' nke gosipụtara Cassper Nyovest site na EP ya, Bragga E wepụtara Bragga n, abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2016
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017, Nakai wepụtara egwu ya a ma ama 'Naaa Meaan' nke gosipụtara Cassper Nyovest
Egwu a nọ n'elu chaatị n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ redio na South Africa
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2016, ọ kwadoro red carpet pụrụ iche maka MTV Africa n'afọ 2018 MTV Europe Music Awards

N'afọ 2019, Nakai kwadoro ihe ngosi MTV Base hip hop, Yo! MTV Raps South Africa ya na onye na-egosi telivishọn Siyabonga Ngwekazi Mee 2019, Nakai kwadoro na a ga-ewepụta abọm mbụ ya Nadia Naked N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa June afọ 2019
N'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, ewepụtara 'Imma Boss' dị ka egwu nke atọ ya na mkpuchi ihe osise nke abọm ahụ
N'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2020, o wepụtara ihe nkiri na Showmax banyere ịme abọm Nadia Naked Na Mee 2020, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Def Jam Africa
N'emume nke isii nke AFRIMA, o nwetara ihe nrite Best Female Artist
E nyere ya onye na-ese ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 2020 SA Style Awards
N'afọ 2021, Nakai kwadoro oge mbụ nke ihe ngosi telivishọn nke Channel O's Gen-Z South Africa
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2021, ọ hapụrụ Family Tree Records iji gbasoo akara nke ya
N'afọ 2021 South African Hip Hop Awards, Nakai natara nhọpụta maka Artist of the Decade
N'afọ 2022, Nakai pụtara na Netflix mbụ ihe ngosi ndị Afrika ama ama, n'etolite etolite bụ Young, Famous & African
Nakai nwetara mkpalị mmụọ iku egwu site n'aka nwanyị Kenya n'akụ egwu rap, Nazizi, onye ọ zutere mgbe ọ nọ na Kenya
O kwuru na Nazizi metụrụ mmụọ ya na mmalite ọrụ rapping ya
Ná mmalite afọ 2022 Nadia dere na Instagram ya na ya na onye egwu ndịda Afrịka bụ AKA
Nadia Pariss (a mụrụ Önwa mbu 1, 1990) bụ Amerikạ akpali agụụ mmekọahụ omee
Enye ama odụk okenye ịse ụlọ ọrụ na 2011 na afọ na 21
Nadia Ramassamy (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 17 Mee 1961) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị French si Réunion
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu maka mpaghara nke isii nke Réunion kemgbe afọ 2017
Ewezuga ịbụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ọgwụ, ọkachasị n'oge ọrịa COVID-19
Nadia Salem (amụrụ n'afọ 1946) bụ onye Ijipt na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Nadia Salem na 23 Septemba 1946
Ọ gụrụ gbasara ichụ nta akụkọ na Faculty of Arts na Cairo na 1969, na ngalaba nduzi nke Cairo Higher Cinema Institute na 1979
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere National Film Centre, ebe ọ duziri ọtụtụ ihe ngosi
Nadia Baher Sirry ( Arabic ) bụ onye Cairo amụrụ na-ese ihe nke sitere na Turkish-Lebanese, a mụrụ na 1958
Sirry bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ain Shams
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo oge na British Institute na Egypt tupu o tinye onwe ya oge niile na ọrụ nka ya
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Cairo
Nadia Tromp (amụrụ na 31 Jenụwarị 1977) bụ onye South Africa na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọha na eze, ọkachasị nlekọta ahụike n'ime mba South Africa
N'afọ 2017 ọ bụ onye mmeri nke emume ihe owuwu ụwa na ngalaba ahụike maka ụlọ ọgwụ Westbury ya
O mechara nata onyinye nke afọ 2017 nke ịdị mma site na GIFA (Gauteng Institute for Architecture) na onyinye nke 2018 nke uru site na SAIA (South African Institute of Architects)
N'afọ 2019, ụlọ ọrụ ya meriri ihe nrite Masterprize nke ụlọ na ngalaba nke ngwakọta
A mụrụ Tromp na Fishhoek, South Africa
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ wee nwee akara ugo mmụta na Mahadum nke Cape Town, wee nweta nzere masta na Mahadụ Harvard
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma rụọ ọrụ na Noero Wolff architects n'okpuru Jo Noero, ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye nduzi na Paragon Habitat Architects
N'afọ 2008, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ya 'Ntsika Architects', nke pụtara ogidi ike ma ọ bụ ogidi ụlọ
Tromp na-ebute ụzọ n'ihe owuwu nke nwere mmetụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọgwụ na South Africa, nakwa mmekorita ya na gọọmentị, na ọrụ ya na mpaghara obodo emeela ka ọ bụrụ ọkachamara n'ọhịa ahụ
Tromp ekwuola okwu na mmemme AZA na Pretoria ma bụrụ onye ọka ikpe maka PPC Imaginarium Award for Architecture

Tromp nwere ọkwa onye nduzi nke International Union of Architects (UIA) 'Community Architecture' - Architecture & Human Rights, Work program, ogbako zuru ụwa ọnụ na-aga n'ihu nke na-aga na nkwadebe maka UIA Congress ọ bụla, a ga-emecha ogbako a n'oge maka 2020 Brazil UIA Congress
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, a họpụtara Tromp ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Gauteng Institute for Architecture, oge ya gwụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020 mgbe a họpụtara onye isi oche ọzọ nke GIfA, Krynauw Nel
