Naima Akef (7 Ọktoba 1929 - 23 Eprel 1966) bụ onye Egypt a ma ama na-agba egwú afọ n'oge oge ọlaedo nke ihe nkiri Egypt ma mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n'oge ahụ
A mụrụ Naima Akef na Tanta na Delta Naịl
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Akef Circus (nke nna nna Naimaʹs na-achị), nke bụ otu n'ime ndị a ma ama n'oge ahụ
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, ma ghọọ otu n'ime ndị a ma ama na-eme ngwa ngwa na nkà ya
Ezinụlọ ya bi na mpaghara Bab el Khalq nke Cairo, mana ha gara ebe dị anya iji rụọ ọrụ
Otú ahụ gbasara mgbe Naima dị afọ iri na anọ, mana nke a bụ naanị mmalite nke ọrụ ya
Nna nna ya nwere ọtụtụ njikọ na ụwa arụmọrụ nke Cairo ma ọ kọwaara ya ndị enyi ya
Mgbe ndị nne na nna Naimá gbara alụkwaghịm, o guzobere ihe nkiri na-eme ihe ọchị nke na-eme n'ọtụtụ klọb na Cairo
O wee nweta ohere ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ abalị a ma ama na Badia Masabni, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama ma bụrụ otu n'ime mmadụ ole na ole na-agba egwu ma na-abụ abụ
Oge ya na Badeia, Otú ọ dị, adịteghị aka, ebe Badia nwere mmasị n'ebe ọ nọ, nke mere ka ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri nwee ekworo
Otu ụbọchị ha gbakọtara ya ma gbalịa iti ya ihe, mana o gosipụtara na ọ dị ike ma dị ngwa wee merie ọgụ ahụ
Nke a mere ka a chụọ ya n'ọrụ, ya mere ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'ebe ọzọ
Klọb Kit Kat bụ ebe ọzọ a ma ama na Cairo, ọ bụkwa ebe a ka a kọwaara Naima wee nye onye nduzi ihe nkiri bụ Abbas Kemal
Nwanne ya nwoke Hussein Fawzy, onye bụkwa onye nduzi ihe nkiri, nwere mmasị dị ukwuu ime ka Naima gosipụta n'otu n'ime ihe nkiri egwu ya
Nke mbụ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị dị otú ahụ bụ 'achịcha na nnu'
Onye na-agụ egwú ya bụ onye na-agụ egwu Saad Abdel Wahab, nwa nwanne onye na-abụ abụ na onye na-ede egwu Mohammed Abdel Wa Hab
Naima kwụsịrị ime ihe nkiri na 1964 iji lekọta naanị nwa ya, nwa nwoke sitere n'alụmdi nke abụọ ya na onye na-ahụ maka ego Salaheldeen Abdel Aleem
Ọ nwụrụ afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị site na ọrịa kansa, na Eprel 23, 1966, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na isii
Naima El Jeni (Arabic) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Lungile Khumalo nke a maara nke ọma dịka Naima Kay, bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu Afro-Jazz
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ ma na-ede abụ na ukwe n' ụlọ akwụkwọ ya, ọ rụkwara na jazz Festival ebe ọ malitere ịdọta uche
Nweputa nke egwu Umsebenzi n'afọ 2013 nwere ọtụtụ mmetụta na ndụ ndị South Africa
Abọm ahụ rere nke ọma ma nweta ihe nrite, South African Music Award (SAMA) n'afọ 2014 maka Best Newcomer
onye isi Touch Africa Records bu Mdu Ngcobo chọpụtara nka Kay,bụ onye nyere ya aha Arabic bụ Naima Kay na-nke nkọwa ya Udo na Obi iru ala
Ya na Robbie Malinga na Scelo Gowane rụkọrọ ọrụ
Kay ejidela mpụtara Siri ike, na-akwudosike ime ihe ngosi redio na ngosipụta ihe n' isi ihe omume mba na Ememe dị ka ememe UGu Jazz Festival na Durban Jazz festival
N'afọ 2014, Naima Kay ritere ihe nrite 'Best Newcomer' na South African Music Awards na abọm mbụ ya bụ 'Umsebenzi'
Naima Lamcharki (a mụrụ na 1943 na Casablanca) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
Lamcharki ritere ihe nrite maka Best Female Lead maka arụmọrụ ya na A la recherche du mari de ma femme na 6th National Film Festival n'afọ 2001
N'afọ 2021, o ritere ihe nrite Best Actress na Sweden's 11th annual Malmo Arab Film Festival (MAFF) maka ọrụ ya na Mohamed Moftakir's Liao automne des pommiers
Naima Melsa Gule Avako bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya n'ọfịs dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na nzuko omeiwu maka mpaghara Yumbe n'oge ntuli aka nke afo 2021 Uganda
Azeez Adeshina Sanyaolu (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 10 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1991), onye a maara dịka Naira Marley, bụ onye Britain na Naijiria na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
A maara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke ndị na-akwado ya na-ese okwu, 'Marlians'
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, ọ kwagara Peckham, South London, England
Marley gụsịrị akwụkwọ na azụmahịa na Peckham Academy
Ọ gụkwara iwu azụmahịa na Crossways College (nke bụzi Christ the King Sixth Form College)
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, Naira Marley nwere atụmatụ ịghọ MC na onye na-ese olu
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ n'afọ 2014 mgbe ọ chọpụtara mmasị ya maka egwu ma ndị enyi ya gbara ya ume ka ọ gbasoo ọrụ egwu ya
O wepụtara egwu Max Twigz nyere aka 'Marry Juana' tupu ọ wepụta EP mbụ ya Gotta Dance na 2015
Naira Marley wepụtara egwu Zlatan nyere aka 'Am I A Yahoo Boy' na 3 Mee 2019, ndị Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) jidere ya n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
Ọ tọhapụrụ 'Soapy' na 27 June 2019, ụbọchị ole na ole ka a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Na 11 Jenụwarị 2020, o meriri Nhọrọ Ndị Na-ekiri maka 'Soapy' na 2020 Soundcity MVP Awards

N'oge 'Marlian Fest', nke e mere na Eko Hotels and Suites na 30 Disemba 2019, Naira Marley kwupụtara mmalite nke akara ndekọ ya Marlian Records ma kpughee CBlvck, Zinoleesky, MohBad na Fabian Blu dị ka ndị bịanyere aka
Na 10 Julaị 2020, Naira Marley gara na Instagram Page ya iji kpughee ihe omume ọzọ n'okpuru akara ya, aha ya bụ Emo Grae na egwu ọhụrụ na ọhụụ akpọrọ 0903 nke gosipụtara Buju
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2021, onye egwu a ma ama na onye meriri ihe nrite kwupụtara na post o mere na akara Instagram ya na ọ ga-ahapụ abọm ọhụrụ
Dị ka ya si kwuo, a na-akpọ abọm ahụ 'God's Timing Is The Best' ma ọ ga-ewepụta ya mgbe ọ hapụsịrị vidiyo gọọmentị maka egwu ya 'COMING'
Na 10 Mee 2019, EFCC jidere Naira Marley na ndị enyi ya Zlatan, Tiamiu Kayode, Adewunmi Moses, Micheal 'Taqueesh' Adenuga na Abubakar Musa
E jidere ya otu ụbọchị mgbe Marley weputara vidiyo maka egwu a na-ese okwu 'Am I A Yahoo Boy'
Mgbe ụbọchị ise gasịrị, EFCC tọhapụrụ Zlatan na mmadụ atọ ndị ọzọ mana ha debere Marley n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'ihi ihe akaebe megide ya
Na 16 Mee 2019, EFCC boro ya ebubo iri na otu nke aghụghọ n'ihu Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Federal dị na Ikoyi, Lagos
Na 19 Mee 2019, Zlatan wepụtara egwu '4 Nights In Ekohtiebo' mgbe Marley ka nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
N'ime ya, ọ na-ekwu banyere ndị enyi ụlọ ọrụ ya, ndị iro ya na ndị ọzọ ọ masịrị ya na otú ha si nweta ya
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, a gbara Marley akwụkwọ n'ihu Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Federal ma kwuo na ọ bụghị ikpe mara ya; e debere ikpe mgbapụta maka 30 Mee 2019
N'ụbọchị a na-ekpe ikpe mgbapụta ahụ, Marley wepụtara 'Why', abụ nke na-esonyere ihe oyiyi ya na aka

Na 14 June 2019, a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ụbọchị iri na anọ mgbe e nyechara ya mgbapụta ~ 2,000,000 Ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ọ wepụtara 'Soapy', egwu banyere omume mmekọahụ nke ndị mkpọrọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2019, Marley laghachiri n'ụlọ ikpe iji chee ebubo ahụ ihu
E mechara kwụsị ikpe ya na 27 Febụwarị 2020 mgbe onye akaebe EFCC gbara akaebe megide ya
Ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa jidere Marley maka imebi iwu mkpọchi nke onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari nyere Lagos Steeti iji gbochie mgbasa nke coronavirus na mba ahụ
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2020, ọ rụrụ egwu na Abuja n'agbanyeghị mmachibido njem n'etiti steeti na iwu ịpụ iche iji gbochie mgbasa nke COVID-19
Ndị nchịkwa FCT gbara ya akwụkwọ n'ihu ụlọ ikpe na-agagharị agagharị na Abuja maka egwu ahụ
Concert Valentine na Cameroon
Na Satọdee 13 Febụwarị 2021, akụkọ pụtara n'ịntanetị na ndị ọchịchị na mba ahụ akagbuola Valentine's Concert nke Marley na Cameroon

Onye nhazi ahụ akwụsịlarị egwu ahụ ugboro abụọ ma kwaga ebe dị iche iche, mana ndị ọchịchị [nke?] na mba ahụ mechara kagbuo ya kpamkpam n'ihi ekworo [nkọwa dị mkpa] n'akụkụ ndị na-eme egwuregwu na Cameroon bụ ndị na-enweghị obi ụtọ na egwu na ndị egwu Naịjirịa nwere na Cameroon
Nairaland (ma obu kwa Nairaland Forum bu site na ndi mmadu na abaye, koo akuko nke masiri ha
Nairaland bu otu n'ime site nke nwe kachasi ndi ozo na Naijiria ma obu kwa Afrika
Nairobi Community Media House bụ ụlọ ọrụ Kenya na-ewe ma na-azụ ndị ntorobịa n'ime ihe nkiri na idezi
Ọ dabere na mkpọda obodo Nairobi
E hiwere Voices of Africa Media Foundation n'afọ 2010
E hiwere Nairobi Community Media House iji zụọ ndị na-eto eto nwere nkà (afọ 20–25) sitere na ọtụtụ mkpọkpọ ụlọ dị na Nairobi ka ha bụrụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri mgbasa ozi ọkachamara
Ndị a na-enye ọzụzụ na-amụtakwa ka e si enweta ego, na-enye ha ohere ịghọ ndị nta akụkọ nwere onwe ha
Ebumnuche Nairobi Community Media House bụ inye ndị slums olu
Vidio a na-akọ African Slum Journal bụ otu n'ime mmemme a
Bunge Mtaani bụ mmemme ọzọ
Aha a bụ Kiswahili maka 'Parliament of the Streets,' na e bu n'obi na-amụba nsonye ụmụ amaala
Naja'tu Bala Muhammad (onye amụrụ na 1956) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchichi nke Naijiria

Ọ bụ nwanyi mbụ nwere mmeri nke ọkwa Senate nke Kano State (Kano Senatorial Seat in Central District) Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime nwanyi mbụ nogoro n'ọkwa dika onye isi ndii 'National Students Union Nigeria' na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria (ABU) bụkwara nwanyi mbụ na-esote onye isi President of the National Association of Nigerian Students (NANS)
Muhammed bụ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke Dr Bala Muhammed, onye ndụmọdụ gbasara ọchịchị na Republic nke abụọ bụ Mallam Muhammadu Abubakar Rimi
Umu agha ndi mmadu gburu di ya n'afo iri abuo na ato gara aga mgbe Mallam Muhammadu Abubakar Rimi nyere Emir nke Kano, Ado Bayero otu njuju
Muhammed bụ nwunye Dr Bala Muhammed, onye ndụmọdụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Gọvanọ Republic nke abụọ Mallam Muhammadu Abubakar Rimi
Ndị mmadụ butere ọgbaghara gburu di ya n'afọ iri abụọ na asatọ gara aga ka Mallam Muhammadu Abubakar Rimi nyechara Emir nke Kano, Ado Bayero ajụjụ
Najat Badri (Arabic ; amụrụ na 19 Mee 1988) bụ onye Morocco na agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na agba ọsọ n'etiti AS FAR na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
Badri gbara ọsọ maka Morocco na ọkwa dị elu n'oge 2018 Afrika nwanyi iko nke ntozu oke (agba nke mbụ)
Najat El Garaa (Arabic نجاة الكرعة) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Paralympic si Morocco na-asọmpi karịsịa na ụdị F40 discus throw events
El Garaa sonyere na afọ 2008 Summer Paralympics na Beijing, China
N'ebe ahụ, o ritere ọla nchara n'ihe omume F40 nke ụmụ nwanyị
O mechara sọọ mpi na afọ 2012 Summer Paralympics na London ebe o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe omume F40 nke ụmụ nwanyị
El Garaa mere ihe ndekọ ụwa ọhụrụ 3237 mita
A mara El Garaa dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu Moroccan nke afọ n'afọ 2012 ma were Sheikh Mohamed Bin Rashid Al Maktoumiz Creative Sports Award
Ụmụnne ya nwanyị Laila na Hayat bụ ndị nwetara ihe nrite Paralympic
Najee Dorsey (amụrụ n'afọ 1973) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri nke oge a nkè a maara màkà iji mgbasa ozi agwakọta, collage, paint na ọrụ foto nke na-egosi ahụmịhe na ọdịbendị ndịda Afrịka America
A mụrụ Najee Dorsey n'ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1973 na Blytheville, Arkansas
Ọ malitere ịmepụta ihe osise site na nwata, mana n'afọ 2005 ọ ghọrọ ónyé na-ese ihe ógè niile mgbè ọ kwagara Atlanta, Georgia
Enwere ike ịhụ nka ya na ụlọ ọrụ nka dị íchè íchè na nchịkọta onwe ónyé gafee United States

N'afọ 2010, Dorsey mepụtara Black Art in America (BAIA), ebe nrụọrụ weebụ mgbasa ozi nke na-enye ohere na ikpughe ihe osise ojii na ndị na-ese ihe ma na-eme ka njikọ dị n'etiti ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, ndị na-anakọta ihe na ndị na'anụ ọkụ n'obi
Dorsey na nwunye ya, Seteria Dorsey (ọ bụkwa ónyé na-ese ihe, na ónyé mmekọ azụmahịa ya), bi na Columbus, Georgia
Najee Dorsey ejirila collage gosipụta ahụmịhe nkè itolite na South, gụnyere oge ọ bụ nwata na Mississippi County, Arkansas
Ihe osise ya gụnyere ihe osise, foto, ụdị dijitalụ na nkè mgbasa ozi
Dorsey na-emepụta collages nke na-elekwasị ányà na ọdịbendị ndịda Afrịka America
A maara nka ya ka ọ na-eme ka isiokwu ndị dị ka Blues, ndị isi ojii n'ime akụkọ ihe méré eme nke United States na ọnọdụ akụ na ụba nke South pụta ìhè

Ọrụ ọhụrụ ya, nke akpọrọ The Poor People's Campaign (nkwanye ugwu nye mmemme Martin Luther King maka ikpe ziri ezi akụ na ụba) na-elekwasị ányà na isiokwu nke afrofuturism na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gburugburu ebe obibi na obodo ndị dárá ogbenye na South
Dorsey egosila ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi na ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere
Art and Public History Approaches, Opportunities, and Challenges, nke Rebecca Bush na K

Najeeb Yakubu (amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2000) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dika onye nno n'azu aka nri ndị otu Veikkausliiga nke Finland bụ Ilves na mgbazinye site n'aka ndị otu Premier League nke Ukraine bụ FC Vorskla Poltava
A mụrụ ya na Ghana, ọ na-egwuri egwu maka otu egwuregwu mba Niger
Na 20 Eprel 2022, Yakubu sonyeere CD Lugo na Spain n'okpuru iwu FIFA pụrụ iche metụtara mwakpo Russia nke afọ 2022 na Ukraine
Otú ọ dị, ọ na-esonye na ọzụzụ ma ọ pụtaghị na egwuregwu league ọ bụla
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2022 ọ kwụsịtụrụ nkwekọrịta ya na Vorskla n'okpuru otu iwu ahụ, n'oge a ruo 30 June 2023, wee kwaga Ilves na Finland
A mụrụ ya na Ghana, Yakubu bụ onye Nijeria
O gosipụtara mmasị n'ịgba bọọlụ maka otu mba egwuregwu bọọlụ Ukraine
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa n'òtù egwuregwu mba Niger maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi na Machị 2022
Ọ malitere na Niger dị ka onye na-anọchi anya n'azụ oge na mmeri enyi na enyi na 3 na Egypt na 23 Septemba 2022

Najia Mehadji (amụrụ na 1950) bụ onye na-ese ihe nke Franco-Moroccan nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Paris, France na Essaouira, Morocco

Najia Mehadji bụ onye French-Moroccan na-ese ihe nke a maara nke ọma na ọnọdụ Morocco ma bụrụ onye a ma ama na France kemgbe afọ 1980 site na ihe ngosi na nnukwu ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke gụnyere Centre Georges Pompidou na Paris
O nwetara n'etiti afọ 1970 nzere masta nke nka na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadum Pantheon-Sorbonne nakwa nzere ihe nkiri na Mahadum Paris 8

Nke ikpeazụ mere ka ya na Peter Brook na The Living Theatre rụọ ọrụ, ndị otu na-aga n'ihu na-emeghe maka ndị a na-akpọ 'ndị na-abụghị ndị Europe', na-emepụta ọrụ ahụ pụrụ iche ma na-emetụta ọrụ nke ya na mmepe nke ụdị ya
N'ime afọ ndị ahụ, ọ chọpụtara Japanese zen aesthetic na emume Sufi Whirling Dervish, na-eji icheku ọkụ ma ọ bụ ink nwere nnwere onwe dị ukwuu
Mgbe ahụ, ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ na-emeputa ememe nke oge a nke emepụtara n'ihe nkiri, na-ese ihe na nnukwu mpempe akwụkwọ
O sonyekwara otu Women / Art ma bipụta eserese mbụ ya, ụdị eserese ojii na nke ọcha nke a pụrụ ịkọwa dị ka 'ihe na-emetụ n'ahụ'
N'afọ 1985, ọ nọrọ otu afọ na Essaouira ebe o nwetara agụmakwụkwọ n'efu 'Villa Médicis Hors les murs' ma na-alọghachi kwa afọ ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa

Ọ bụ n'oge ọnụnọ mbụ a ka o sere usoro ya na akụkọ ifo nke Icarus, 'ihe nnọchianya nke nnwere onwe na-etinye ihe ize ndụ' na nnukwu akwa akwa ebe a na-ejikọta akara nke mmegharị ahụ na ndekọ foto na ọdịdị geometric doro anya
E gosipụtara ọrụ ndị ahụ na ngosi mbụ ya na ihe ngosi nka nke Caen na Poitiers na 1986-87

N'afọ 1993–1994, na nzaghachi maka mpụ agha emere megide ndị Bosniaks na ex-Yugoslavia, o mepụtara usoro Domes n'ihi mmasị ya na 'transcultural' architectural shapes (nke gụnyere octagon), mgbe ọ na-arutu aka n'ụzọ doro anya na nnọchi anya nke cosmology na nka nke Islam
N'afọ 2005, ọ laghachiri na ihe nkiri a na Agha Ifuru; ọrụ dijitalụ nke pụtara na 'Ọdachi nke Agha' nke Goya
Site n'afọ 1996 ruo n'afọ 2006, Mehadji sere nnukwu ihe osise na agba nzu mmanụ eserese / eserese site na isiokwu ihe atụ monochrome dị ka okirikiri, osisi (ma ọ bụ osisi nke ndụ), ifuru Granada, wdg
O kere ọtụtụ 'abstract flow structures' na-ejide ma oge ndụ, ngafe, echiche nke enweghị ngwụcha
Mgbe ahụ, ọ malitere iji akara sara mbara na-acha uhie uhie na 'arabesque' na-acha ọcha ma ọ bụ na-acha uhie uhie na oji, ma na-echepụta 'edemede dị n'ime' ahụ na mkpụrụ obi dị egwu Akwụkwọ Mpịakọta
N'afọ 1998, ọ kụziri eserese dị ka prọfesọ nleta na École nationale supérieure des Beaux-Arts (National School of Fine Arts) nke Paris

N'akụkụ eserese na eserese, kemgbe afọ 2005, ọ gara n'ihu na nkwa ya megide ime ihe ike na Middle East, na-emepụta ọrụ dijitalụ na-agụnye nkọwa sara mbara nke ihe osise Goya (gụnyere La Tauromaquia na Ọdachi nke Agha ) n'ime atụmatụ ifuru fluorescent - 'dị ka esemokwu n'etiti Eros na Thanatos'

Kemgbe afọ 2008, o mepụtara usoro ọhụrụ nke nnukwu eserese na ihe oyiyi dijitalụ nke na-enye akụkụ ọkpụkpụ na omume ya na Swirls, Arabesque, Mystic Dance, Coil nke akara ya na-aga n'ihu, mmegharị aka n'efu na ntụgharị aka na calligraphy nke ọwụwa anyanwụ na Sufism bụ atụmatụ niile na-enye ya ohere ịnakwere omume ndị a na-ekwukarị na ọ bụ ụmụ nwoke site na ịmepụta ụzọ ọhụrụ nke eserese, nke a tọhapụrụ site na ọdịnala ma yie arụmọrụ
Emere ihe ngosi onwe ya na France, Museums of Fine Arts nke Poitiers nke Caen na Epinal; Montenay Gallery (Paris); na St
John hall (Mairie de Paris); gallery The Ship (Brest)
Na Morocco, na National Gallery Bab Ruach (Rabat); Actua space na Attijariwafabank (Casablanca); Delacroix Gallery (Tanger); Shart Gallery na Atelier 21 (Casablanca)
Na Qatar, ya na Anima Gallery na Doha
Ọ kọwakwara Amman (Shoman Foundation) na ngosi ahụ na Basel, ya na Arco Madrid, FI AF (French Institute Alliance Française) na New York na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ n'ụwa niile
O sonyere na 2009 na ihe ngosi Elles@centrepompidou na Musée National d'Art Moderne (Paris) na Crossing n'oge Mawazine Festival (Rabat)
N'afọ 2010, na Contemporary Art Fair na Dubai, na ngosi Resonances ihe ngosi nka Marrakech na Marrakech Art Fair dị ka akụkụ nke Shart gallery nke Casablanca

N'afọ 2011, n'ihe ngosi otu 'Architectures / Drawings / Utopias' 'na National Museum of Romanian Contemporary Art na' 'Nature and Landscapes' na ohere nka nke General Company of Casablanca, na Drawing Now Paris na Carrousel du Louvre
Mgbe ahụ, ọ na-ekpughe na 'Sense & Essences' na New York French Institute (FI AF) na Villa Roosevelt na Casablanca usoro Mystic Dance

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị a na-ese ihe Traits d'Union - Paris na nka ndị Arab nke oge a na Villa Emerige na Paris ihe ngosi ihe ngosi nka nke na-akpọkọta ndị Arab iri na abụọ nwere mmekọrịta pụrụ iche na France, na onye ihe ịga nke ọma ya bụ nke na ọ, site na French Institute, na-eme njem na 2012–2013 (Beirut, Sana'a, Rabat, wdg)
N'afọ 2012–2013, o gosipụtara na Galerie Shart, Casablanca, Close na Galerie Albert Benamou na Paris na Art Paris Art Fair, mgbe ahụ Anima Gallery na Doha (Qatar)
O sonyere na afọ iri abụọ na ise nke Arab creativity na Institut du Monde Arabe, Emirates Palace na Abu Dhabi na Manama na Bahrain
Ihe ngosi ya n'afọ 2013 bụ Mystic Dance na Espace Art Roch (Paris), The 2000 na Espace Claude Lemand (Paris), draping na gallery The Ship (Brest)
Ọ na-ekere òkè n'ahịa Syriart na Paris na Beirut iji kwado ndị nkịtị nke ndị Siria na nnupụisi
Ná mmalite afọ 2014, o mere ihe ngosi 'New Arabesque' na Galerie Le Violon Bleu na Tunis na Art Dubai (Selma Feriani Gallery London) na Art Paris Art Fair (gallery Lemand Claude Paris)

N'oge ọkọchị 2014, usoro ọrụ dijitalụ ya Suites Goyesques; A na-egosi ọgụ ehi na Musée d'Art Moderne de Céret na The painter and the arena and bullfighting art from Goya to Barceló Mgbe ahụ, o sonyere na ngosi mmeghe nke Musée Mohammed VI d'art moderne et contemporain Rabat 'Art 1914–2014,100ans na Morocco,' yana nke Arab World Institute na Paris 'the Contemporary Morocco'
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2015, o gosipụtara 'afọ iri abụọ nke ọrụ' na gallery Atelier 21 na Casablanca nke na-ahazi ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Morocco na Art Paris Art Fair na Grand Palace na gallery Claude Lemand

Ọrụ Najia Mehadji dị n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta ọha na eze na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, gụnyere Centre Georges Pompidou MNAM (4 nnukwu eserese na eserese na mpempe akwụkwọ) na Arab World Institute na Paris (ihe osise) na nchịkọta Société Générale, ONA Foundation, Mohammed VI Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art of Rabat na Casablanca Attijari Waffabank ndị nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ
Enwere ike ịhụ ọtụtụ vidiyo banyere onye na-ese ihe na YouTube
Najima Rhozali ma ọ bụ Najima Thay Thay Rhozali (Arabic ; amụrụ na afọ 1960, Oujda) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Moroccan nke National Rally of Independents party
O nwere ọkwa odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka ịgụ na ide na agụmakwụkwọ na-abụghị nke iwu kwadoro na ụlọ ọrụ Driss Jettou
Rhozali bụ prọfesọ nke asụsụ na Mahadum nke Agadir na-ahụ maka ọdịnala ọnụ
O dere akwụkwọ gbasara akụkọ ọdịnala na akụkọ mgbe ochie
Najjar Abdul-Musawwir (amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1958) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe na prọfesọ nke ihe osise na akụkọ ihe méré eme
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya gburugburu ụwa, gụnyere na United States, Europe, Africa, na Eshia
Ọ na-akụzi na Southern Illinois University Carbondale's School of Art and Design
Najjar Abdul-Musawwir tolitere na mpụga Chicago, Illinois na mpaghara Harvey
Ọ na-echeta na mbụ na-enwe mmasị na nka nka nkè nnà ya na nwá nwanne ya mèrè mgbè ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ asaa ma ọ bụ asatọ
Mana oge ọ hụrụ nka n'anya bụ na klas nke anọ, mgbè ọrụ nka ụlọ akwụkwọ nke gụnyere itinye oji n'elu agba ndị ọzọ na eserese pensụl, wee kpochapụ oji iji kpughee agba n'okpuru
O jiri ógè ahụ tụnyere 'ónyé ọkà mmụta sayensị na-achọpụta penicillin'

N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, a kpọgara Abdul-Musawwir n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọcha, Thornridge High School na Dolton, Illinois, ebe ọ nọrọ ógè ya na otu egwuregwu mmega ahụ, ebe ọ bụ ónyé nwetara ọla edo, na n'ọbá akwụkwọ, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nka
Otú ọ dị, n'akụkụ abụọ a, ọ bụ onye ịkpa ókè agbụrụ lekwasịrị anya
A na-ebibi nka nke ya mgbe ụfọdụ, na-eme ka ndị nkụzi ya kwere na ọ naghị arụ ọrụ ụlọ ya
Ọ nwetakwara ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'otu egwuregwu mmega ahụ, ebe ndị otu ya ga-eme nsị n'uwe ya
N'ikpeazụ, ọ kwụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ụdị nka bụ isi nke Abdul-Musawwir bụ eserese na eserese, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ n'ụdị nka abstract, abstract expressionism, na realism
Ihe osise ya na-egosipụta njirimara ya dị ka ónyé Alakụba na ónyé Africa America yana mmasị ya na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke Islam, Africa, na Africa America
Otu n'ime ndị isi nwere mmetụta bụ ónyé nkụzi WSIU Robert Paulson
Abdul-Musawwir kwuru, sị, 'Ọ bụrụ na e nwere onye ọ bụla kụziiri m otú e si ese ihe, na ịhụ, na iji nwee ekele màkà agba, ọ bụ Bob Paulson'
Ónyé nkụzi ọzọ nwere mmetụta bụ Larry Bernstein
Abdul-Musawwir apụtala na gallery na ngosi na United States, Europe, Africa, na Eshia, gụnyere
O nwèrè ụmụ nwanyị anọ ma lụọ Khaleelah
Najla Ben Abdallah (Arabic نجلاء بن عبد الله , a mụrụ na June 16, 1980), bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya na onye na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ elu nke mere Feriel na usoro Tunisian Maktoub
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri gụnyere ihe nkiri Un fils Mehdi M
Barsaoui
Najla apụtawokwa n'ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn
A mụrụ Najla Ben Abdallah n'abalị 16 nke ọnwa June, afọ 1980, na Tunis
Ọ bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ elu maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu Tunisair
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ọtụtụ ngwaahịa
N'afọ 2009, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na mgbasa ozi
Najla nwalere ohere mbụ ya na ihe nkiri ncha nke Ramadan nke a na-akpọ Donia n'akụkụ Nadia Boussetta
Ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ nke Lilly na 'False Note'
N'afọ 2012, o mere mkpuchi nke magazin ndị mmadụ Tunivisions, mgbe ahụ nke magazin Tunisian E-young na Nọvemba
N'afọ 2015, Ben Abdallah rụrụ ọrụ Hourya na ihe nkiri Mehdi Hmili 'Thala mon amour' ya na Ghanem Zrelli
N'afọ 2017, onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ sonyere n'afọ a na usoro 'Bolice 4', O sonyekwara na ihe nkiri ncha nke Libya, ebe a na-eme fim na Tunisia maka ebumnuche nchekwa
N'afọ 2019, Najla Ben Abdallah rụrụ ọrụ nkwado dị mkpa nke ihe nkiri Un fils na Sami Bouajila, e nyere ihe nkiri ahụ na Cairo International Film Festival nke afọ 2019
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri nke asọmpi Horizons of Arab Cinema, na ngosi gala nke gara, na mgbakwunye na onye nduzi Mehdi M

Barsaoui, onye na-emepụta Habib Attia na onye isi oche nke CIFF Mohamed Hefzy, ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị ọkachamara nke ihe nkiri Egypt na mba ọzọ na nnukwu ndị na-ege ntị bịara ịchọpụta ihe nkiri Tunisian a
Ndị otu ndị ọka ikpe dị iche iche nyere ya ihe nrite atọ Special Jury Prize Salah Abou Seif, UNFPA Prize na Prize maka ihe nkiri Arab kacha mma

N'afọ 2020, ọ meriri ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Malmö Arab Film Festival, maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Un Fils na Bekee 'A Son', ihe nkiri nke Mehdi Barsaoui dere ma duzie, meriri ihe nkiri kachasị nke mbipụta nke iri nke Arab Film Festival si Malmö (MAFF na Sweden)
César Academy a họrọla ya ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke 'César for Most Promising Actress afọ 2021' maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 'A Son', nke enwetala ihe dịka onyinye mba ụwa iri atọ
Ọ bụ nne nke ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
N'afọ 2020, o kwupụtara, dịka nne, na ọ na-eji ịbụ nna kpọrọ ihe nke ukwuu

Najwa Kassem (Arabic نجوى قاسم, romanized dị ka Qasem, Qassim, na Kassem; 7 Julaị na afọ 1967 意 2 Jenụwarị afọ 2020) bụ onye nta akụkọ Lebanọn na onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn (anchor) maka Al Jadeed, Future TV na Al Arabiya
A mụrụ Najwa Qassem na 7 Julaị afọ 1967 na Joun, Lebanon, afọ ole na ole tupu Agha Obodo Lebanọn
Qassem na mbụ chọsiri ike ịmụ ihe owuwu mana n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ hụrụ mgbasa ozi na mgbasa ozi telivishọn n'anya
Ọ pụtara na telivishọn na afọ 1991 na Al Jadeed (New TV Lebanon) dị ka onye na-eme ihe omume, mgbe ahụ na 1993 ọ kwagara na Future TV nke Beirut
N'afọ 2003 ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị otu Al Arabiya
Kemgbe afọ 2003, Qassem abụwo onye isi na onye nta akụkọ nke ụlọ ọrụ akụkọ Al Arabiya
Ọ kọọrọ ọtụtụ agha na igbu ọchụ n'oge ọrụ ya gụnyere ogbugbu Rafic Hariri na afọ 2005, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka onye nta akụkọ akụkọ
Najwa Qassem nwetara akụkọ dị ukwuu n'oge agha Israel na Lebanọn ebe ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị nta akụkọ Arab na-akọ akụkọ site n'ihu
Qassem na onye ọrụ ibe ya Rima Maktabi hụrụ bọmbụ nke mpaghara ndị mmadụ bi na ya nke ndịda Lebanọn na-awakpo site na ikuku yana oké osimiri
E nyere Najwa Qassem Best Female Presenter na afọ 2006 na Fourth Arab Media Festival
Na Jenụwarị 2, afọ 2020, Qassem nwụrụ n'ụra ya site na nkụchi obi, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nweghị nsogbu ahụike
Princess Naganda Nakatindi Wina (15 Febụwarị na afo 1945 na 5 Eprel na afo 2012) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia na onye otu ezinụlọ eze nke Barotseland
A mụrụ Princess Naganda Nakatindi Wina Mukwae Nakatindi n'ime ezinụlọ eze nke Barotseland, nwa nwa Eze Yeta nke Atọ nke ndị Lozi
Nakatindi bụ nwa nwanyị nke Nakatindi Yeta Nganga na Induna Yuyi Nganda; otu n'ime ụmụ 11
Mgbe eweputara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọtụtụ pati na mbido afọ 1990, ọ sonyeere Movement for Multi-Party Democracy na afo 1992 ọ ghọrọ Minista n'onwe ya mgbe akpọrọ ya Minista nke Steeti maka njem nleta
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ ghọrọ Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe obodo na ọdịmma ọha na eze ruo n'afọ 1994
N'oge mmalite afọ 1990, e nwere usoro ihe ihere mbubata ọgwụ metụtara ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị MMD
Steve Denning nke World Bank tụrụ aro ka Frederick Chiluba, Onye isi ala Zambia, dozie ọnọdụ ahụ
Nakatindi Wina jikọtara ya na ihe ihere ahụ site n'aka ndị nta akụkọ Zambia, mana Chiluba jụrụ ịchụ ya
Kama nke ahụ, ọ katọrọ ndị mgbasa ozi maka ikwubiga okwu ókè
Otú ọ dị, o mechara tụọ ya mkpọrọ n'afọ 1998, mgbe ejikọtara ya na mgbalị ọchịchị nke Zambia na afo 1997
A kpọchiri ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Mukobeko, ebe di ya, Induna Sikota Wina, sooro ya nọrọ
Ọ boro onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Michael Sata ụta maka ịgha ụgha nye Chiluba iji nye Nakatindi Wina ụta

N'afọ 2000, ọ kpọrọ ụmụ nwanyị ka ha kwụsị African Union n'ihi enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya; ebe ọ bụ na mba ọ bụla chọrọ ka ọ tinye otu nwanyị dị ka obere n'ime ìgwè ndị nnọchite anya
O kwuru na ndị isi nwoke chọrọ naanị ka ụmụ nwanyị bụrụ 'na-acha okooko osisi' na Union
N'afọ 2012, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa obi ma kpọga ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Johannesburg, South Africa
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe a wasịrị ya ahụ n'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Eprel na afọ 2012
Nwa ya nwoke, Wina Wina, mechara kelee ndị ọchịchị South Africa maka ikwe ka ọ nweta ọgwụgwọ n'ebe ahụ
Nakatindi Yeta Nganga na afọ (1922 - 1972) bụ onye Lozi aristocrat na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia
N'otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na National Assembly, ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ na-eto eto na mba ahụ
A mụrụ Nakatindi na Lealui; nna ya bụ Yeta III, Litunga nke Barotseland
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ Tiger Kloof na South Africa, n'etiti afọ 1952 na afọ 1964 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Mongu-Lealui District Education Authority
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a ma ama na Barotseland sonyeere UNIP, ọ bụkwa onye nduzi mbụ nke UNIP Women's Brigade, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo mgbe Maria Nankolongo meriri ya na ntuli aka ime obodo na afọ 1967
O sonyere na ntuli aka nke ndị omeiwu nke afọ 1962 na mpaghara Zambezi, mana Job Michello nke Northern Rhodesian African National Congress meriri ya
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 1964, Nakatindi gbara ọsọ na mpaghara Nalikwanda ma họpụta ya na Kansụl Iwu, nke ghọrọ National Assembly mgbe nnwere onwe n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ
Ya na Margret Mbeba na Ester Banda, ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na ndị omeiwu
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ odeakwụkwọ omebe iwu nke Minista nke Ọrụ na Mmepe Ọha na afọ 1966, nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa minista dị ala
N'afọ sochirinụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ omebe iwu nke Mines na Co-operatives, tupu ọ bụrụ ode akwụkwọ omebe iwu na Minista nke Co-operations, Youth and Social Development na afọ 1967
Nakatindi nọgidere bụrụ onye otu National Assembly ruo mgbe ọ tụfuru oche ya na Zambia African National Congress na ntuli aka afọ 1968
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu House of Chiefs na gọvanọ nke Sesheke District, ọkwá ọ rụrụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na afọ 1972
Nwa ya nwanyị a na akpọ Nakatindi Wina, otu n'ime ụmụ iri na otu, mechara bụrụ onye omeiwu na onye minista
Naki, ma ọ bụ Munkaf, bụ asụsụ Beboid nke Cameroon ya na Nigeria

Enweghị aha maka asụsụ ahụ; obodo ahu ndị a na-asụ ya maara ya, gụnyere Naki na Mekaf (Munkaf) n’ime Cameroon na Bukwen na Mashi na Naịjirịa, nke ikpeazụ edepụtara dị ka asụsụ dị iche iche site na Ethnologue, ọ bụ ezie na ha abụghị ihe dị iche
Àtụ Beboid languages

Grace Naledi Mandisa Pandor (née Matthews; Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 7 Disemba 1953) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, onye nkuzi na agụmakwụkwọ na-eje ozi dị ka Minista nke Mmekọrịta na Imekọ ihe ọnụ kemgbe afọ 2019
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress (ANC) kemgbe afọ 1994
A mụrụ ya na Durban, Pandor gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Botswana
Ọ ruru eru dị ka onye nkuzi ma kụzie na ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na mahadum, ebe ọ nwetara nzere dị iche iche site na mahadum dị iche iche
Pandor malitere ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu n'afọ 1994
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi nke ANC caucus n'afọ 1995
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke National Council of Provinces n'afọ 1998 wee bụrụ onye isi oche n'afọ 1999
O bu ụzọ bụrụ onye otu kansụl mba n'afọ 2004, na-esote mkpebi Onye isi ala Thabo Mbeki ịhọpụta ya dị ka Minista nke Mmụta
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ya na kọmitii nke Kgalema Motlanthe
Onye isi ala a họpụtara ọhụrụ bụ Jacob Zuma họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista sayensị na teknụzụ n'afọ 2009
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị n'ime obodo n'afọ 2012
Ọ laghachiri n'ọkwa Minista nke Sayensị na Teknụzụ n'afọ 2014 wee nwee ya ruo afọ 2018, mgbe ọ ghọrọ Minista nke agụmakwụkwọ na ọzụzụ dị elu na kọmitii mbụ nke Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa
Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 2019 gasịrị, a kpọtụrụ Pandor aha dị ka onye nwere ike ịzọ ọkwa osote onye isi ala nke South Africa
Kama nke ahụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mba ụwa na imekọ ihe ọnụ

A mụrụ Grace Naledi Mandisa Matthews n'ụbọchị 7 Disemba 1953 na Durban, Natal, na Regina Thelma (nwụrụ n'afọ 2002) na Joe Matthews (1929), onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na nwa nke agụmakwụkwọ Z
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Botswana
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Gaborone Secondary School
N'agbata afọ 1973 ruo afọ 1977, ọ nwetara asambodo maka agụmakwụkwọ na-aga n'ihu na nzere bachelọ na Mahadum Swaziland na Mahadim Botswana, n'otu n'otu
Ọ gara n'ihu na-aga mba ofesi ma nweta diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ na nzere MA na Mahadum London n'etiti afọ 1978 ruo afọ 1979

Pandor nwetara diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ ka elu, nchịkwa na idu ndú site na Bryn Mawr Summer Programme n'afọ 1992, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ debanyere aha na Harvard Kennedy School iji nweta diplọma na idu ndọkwa na mmepe n'afọ 1997
O nwetakwara nzere MA na asụsụ na Mahadum Stellenbosch n'otu afọ ahụ
Pandor nwetara PhD
ya na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Pretoria n'afọ 1019, na thesis akpọrọ 'Ihe a na-asọ mpi nke mgbanwe na agụmakmakwụkwọ ka elu na South Africa mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị'
Mohammed Namadi Sambo GCON (amụrụ na 2 Ọgọstụ 1954) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa bụ osote onye isi ala Naịjirịa site na 19 Mee 2010 ruo 29 Mee 2015
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka Gọvanọ nke Kaduna Steeti site n'afọ 2007 ruo 2010
A mụrụ Namadi n'abalị 2 August 1954 na Zaria, Kaduna State, Nigeria
Ọ gara Baptist Primary School dịna Kakuri, Kaduna, tupu ọ gaa Kobi Primary School na Bauchi na Towns School No
1 na Zaria
Site n'afọ 1967 ruo 1971, ọ gara Government Secondary School (nke bụzi Alhuda-Huda College), na Zaria

Namadi gara School of Basic Studies na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello dị na Zaria n'afọ 1972, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyere Ngalaba Osisentọala, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1976 na nzere bachelors na nsọpụrụ (BSc(Hons))
O nwekwara nzere masta na ụlọ
Sambo jere ozi na Oyo State Ministry of Works and Housing maka National Youth Service Corps ruo August 1979
Mgbe ahụ, ọ banyere n'ọrụ onwe ya dịka onye na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ
N'afọ 1988, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ọrụ, njem na ụlọ na Kaduna
N'afọ 1990, Sambo hapụrụ ọrụ nke Gọọmentị Kaduna Steeti wee laghachi na ọrụ onwe ya
Na Mee 2007, Namadi malitere ọrụ dịka Gọvanọ nke Kaduna Steeti
Oge ọchịchị gwụrụ na 18 Mee 2010
Sambo nwere usoro ihe omume iri na otu dị ka Gọvanọ nke Kaduna Steeti nke bụ ilekwasị anya n'inye ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị nke obodo ike na idozi nchekwa maka steeti
Mgbe ọ ka na-eje ozi dịka gọvanọ, onye isi ala Naịjirịa n'oge ahụ, Goodluck Jonathan, họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ala
Mgbe onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua nwụsịrị, Goodluck Jonathan ṅụrụ iyi dịka onye isi ala, ma họpụta Sambo dị ka osote onye isi ala
Akwụkwọ ozi ya na-egosi nhọpụta nke Sambo maka ọkwa VP natara site na National Assembly na 15 Mee 2010
Na 18 Mee 2010, National Assembly kwadoro nhọpụta ahụ
Na 19 Mee 2010, Namadi Sambo ṅụrụ iyi dịka osote onye isi ala Naịjirịa, na-eje ozi n'ọfịs ruo 29 Mee 2015

Namaganda Susan (nwụrụ n'afọ 2015) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda a họpụtara na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke itoolu nke Uganda na-anọchite anya mpaghara Bukomansimbi
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ Bukomansimbi bụ onye omeiwu n'afọ 2011 mgbe e guzobere distrikti ahụ na Julaị afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị St
Mary nke Lourdese, na Mengo Senior School
Susan nwetara UCE ya na Christ the King Bulinda na 2002 tupu ọ sonye na St
Andrew Kagwa na Daniel maka ọkwa A ya
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ICT na Degree na Cisco Certified Network Associate nwetara na nzere bachelọ na Information Technology na 2006
N'afọ 2008, ọ nwetara diplọma na Cisco Certified Network ọkachamara na Mahadum Makerere
A mụrụ Namaganda na Eprel 10, 1984, nye Simon Peter Kamala na Elizabeth Sserunkuma Bbosa
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise Susan nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ Nakasero mgbe ihe mberede ụgbọ ala mere na Mpanga, Mpigi District n'okporo ụzọ Masaka mgbe ọ na-aga Kampala ịga nnọkọ ndị omeiwu
Ihe mberede ahụ mere na 11th December, 2015 n'etiti 1 00-2 00am na Mpanga Forest dị nso na kansụl obodo Mpigi dị ka odeakwụkwọ nhazi nke Democratic Party, Innocent Katerega si kwuo
Susan hapụrụ ụmụ atọ gụnyere nwa nwanyị dị ọnwa asaa

Namaganda bụ nwunye onye omeiwu East African Legislative Assembly Member of Parliament, Mukasa Mbidde onye lụrụ ya na Disemba 2012 na agbamakwụkwọ ọdịnala a maara dị ka (Kwanjula) nke emere n'ụlọ nne na nna ya na Kisojjo Village, Kibange Sub County, Bukomansimbi District
Otú ọ dị, Mukasa Mbidde, ka enyi ya nwanyị, Fiona, mechara mee ka ọ pụta ìhè n'ememe ọdịnala Kinyarwanda
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke itoolu, Susan jere ozi dị ka nwanyị Member of Parliament n'okpuru Democratic Party(DP)
Susan sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ 2010 mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa na Egy Trading and Engineering Ring na Bugolobi
Mgbe ọ nọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na 2011, Susan jere ozi dị ka osote Onye isi oche DP National Women site na Julaị 2015, Onye otu nke Parliamentary Scripture Union na odeakwụkwọ nhazi DP Bukomansimbi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu na Kọmitii nke Sayensị na Teknụzụ na nke Ọrụ Ugbo, Ụlọ Ọrụ Ụmụ Anụmanụ na Azụmaahịa
Ọ ghọrọ aha a ma ama mgbe ọ lụrụ ọgụ siri ike maka ọnụahịa ngwaahịa ugbo ma kpọọ ya beyi y'abilime

Ụbọchị anọ ka Susan nwụsịrị, e tere Veronica Nanyondo mmanụ dị ka onye nọchiri ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ime ezinụlọ ahụ n'ili Namaganda Nanyondo na-asọ mpi n'ọnọdụ nwanne ya nwanyị na ndị mmegide Democratic Party (DP) na Febụwarị 18, 2016, a họpụtara ya n'ọfịs wee merie ndị ọzọ ise

N'oge ọha na eze na-ekiri ozu Susan Namaganda nwụrụ anwụ nke e mere ka ọ ghara ịga nke ọma na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu, Rwampara MP, Vincent Kyamadidi kwuru na mba ahụ efunahụla onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị siri ike nke ka nwere ọtụtụ ihe ọ ga-enye ndị na-akwado ya

Namib Mills Ltd, nke e guzobere na 1982, bụ ụlọ ọrụ nhazi ọka kachasị ukwuu na Namibia
Ọ na-emepụta ntụ ọka, pasta, nri anụmanụ na ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ site na ihe ndị a na-emepụta gụnyere ọka, nke a na-ebubata ọtụtụ n'ime ha, na ụdị pearl millet (mahangu)
Ebe a na-egwe ọka ya bụ isi obodo, Windhoek ma nwee ndị ọzọ na Otavi na Katima Mulilo

Ndị ntorobịa nke African Democratic Rally of Ivory Coast (French Jeunesse du Rasseblement Démocratique Africain de Côte d'Ivoire, JRDACI) bụ òtù ndị ntorobịa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Ivory Coast
JRDACI bụ ngalaba ndị ntorobịa nke African Democratic Rally (RDA) na mba ahụ
E hiwere JRDACI na Treichville na Machị 14, 1959
Ọ bụ onye na-emegide ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị
Félix Houphouët-Boigny hụrụ JRDACI ngwa ngwa dị ka ebe mmegide, wee nye iwu ka ọ gbasaa
Odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke JRDACI bụ Amadou Koné, onye mechara bụrụ Minista nke Ahụike
Namli bụ obodo dị na mpaghara Ratlam na steeti India nke Madhya Pradesh
O nwere nkezi ịdị elu nke mita 490 (1,607 ụkwụ)
Ọ dị kilomita 14 na ebe ugwu Ratlam
Namli nwere otu nnukwu ọdọ mmiri na ya mere na ọtụtụ oge, a na-enye mmiri maka ụmụ mmadụ na ọrụ ugbo site na ya
Namli nwere olulu mmiri abụọ dị iche iche
As of 2021[update] India census, Namli nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 25,250
Ụmụ nwoke ha pụtara 51% ya na ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nwanyị 49%
Namli nwere nkezi mmuta ọnụego nke 65%, higher than the national average of 595% male literacy is 77%, and female literacy is 53%
In Namli, 15% of the population is under 6 years of age
Nampalys Mendy (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 23 n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1992) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agbara otu egwuregwu Premier League Leicester City bọọlụ
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na France, ọ na-anọchite anya Senegal na ọkwa mba ụwa
N'ihi obere ogo ya, nkesa dị mfe, na ụdị egwuregwu a pụrụ ịdabere na ya, e jiriila Mendy tụnyere onye bụbu onye mba France, Claude Makélélé
Onye nyocha klọb Monaco Didier Christophe, dịka ọmụmaatụ, zoro aka na Mendy dị ka 'carbon copy' nke Makélélé
Mendy gosipụtara na egwuregwu ikpeazụ AFCON nke 2021 megide Egypt
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ Sporting Toulon n'ọnwa nke ise n'afọ 2007, Mendy gara ikpe na ngalaba bọọlụ nke RC Toulon
Dị ka onye nyocha Monaco Didier Christophe si kwuo, ndị nkuzi Toulon kwuru na Mendy nọ ebe ahụ iji 'mepụta ọnụ ọgụgụ'

Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ na-ele Mendy anya na ọzụzụ, Christophe chọpụtara ọgụgụ isi na nghọta nke onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ banyere egwuregwu ahụ ma tụọrọ ya aro ka Dominique Bijotat, onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ntorobịa Monaco
Na 27 Eprel 2010, Mendy bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọkachamara mbụ ya, na-ekwenye na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ na Monaco ruo June 2013

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2010, onye njikwa Guy Lacombe kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu mbụ maka ọzụzụ tupu oge, ọzọ iji mejupụta ọnụ ọgụgụ na Lacombe na-efu ọtụtụ ndị egwuregwu dịka Diego Pérez, Nicolas Nkoulou, Park Chu-young, na Lukman Haruna, ndị niile sonyere na 2010 FIFA World Cup
N'ụbọchị nke asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2010, Mendy mere egwuregwu izizi ya na egwuregwu mmeghe nke klọb ahụ megide Lyon
Ọ gbara nkeji iri itoolu ahụ dum, na-anata kaadị odo na ọkara nke abụọ
Mendy nwetara kaadị uhie mbụ ya na 19 Ọgọstụ 2011 megide Amiens SC, chụpụrụ ya na akara nkeji iri asaa na 1-1
N'oge 2012–13, Mendy rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na nkwalite Monaco laghachi na Ligue 1
N'agbanyeghị oge gara nke ọma, Mendy kpebiri ịhapụ Monaco na njedebe nke oge ahụ mgbe nkwekọrịta ya gwụchara
E jikọtara Mendy na ndị otu dị ka Manchester United na Arsenal N'agbanyeghị na ọ kpọrọ Manchester United 'klọb nrọ' ya, Mendy jụrụ ịkwaga n'akụkụ ndị England n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ịnọ na France
Mgbe ya na onye njikwa Nice, Claude Puel kwurịtara okwu nke ọma, Mendy kpebiri isonyere OGC Nice na nnyefe n'efu

Mendy mere egwuregwu nke mbụ ya na 17 August 2013, na mmeri 2–1 megide Stade Rennais Mgbe onye isi klọb Didier Digard hapụrụ Real Betis na nnyefe n'efu na njedebe nke oge 2014-15, na onye isi ọhụrụ Mathieu Bodmer merụrụ ahụ, a kpọrọ Mendy onye isi
Mendy mere egwuregwu 110 n'ime oge atọ maka Nice ma nyere ha aka iru ebe nke anọ na Ligue 1 na 2015–16

O nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ nke abụọ kachasị elu nke ngafe n'azụ Thiago Motta (2950), nke kachasị agafe kwa egwuregwu (78), na ngafe ziri ezi nke (92%), nke kachasị mma karịa onye ọkpụkpọ ọ bụla na-abụghị onye otu Paris Saint-Germain

Na ụbọchị nke atọ n'ọnwa nke asaa nke afọ 2016, Mendy kwagara Leicester City, nke onye isi ya na Monaco, Claudio Ranieri, na-elekọta, na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ maka nde £ 13, ihe ndekọ klọb n'oge ahụ
E mebiri ndekọ mbufe ahụ ọzọ mgbe Ahmed Musa sonyeere Leicester maka nde £ 16 ụbọchị ise ka e mesịrị, ma ọzọ ihe na-erughị ọnwa abụọ ka e mesịrị mgbe Islam Slimani sonyeere Leicester maka nde £ 29
Mendy gbara egwuregwu asọmpi mbụ ya maka Leicester na mmeri 2–1 nke Manchester United na 2016 FA Community Shield na 7 August, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi anya Andy King na nkeji iri isii na atọ
O merụrụ ahụ n'ụkwụ na egwuregwu mbụ ya n'ụlọ megide Arsenal na 20 Ọgọstụ 2016 ma dochie ya na nkeji 53
Mendy nọ n'akụkụ ihe karịrị ọnwa atọ, ọ laghachighịkwa ruo ụbọchị asaa n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2016 n'egwuregwu Champions League na Porto, na-egwu egwuregwu ahụ dum na mmeri 5-0
N'ikpeazụ, ọ pụtara naanị ugboro anọ maka oge ahụ
Na 31 Julaị 2017, Mendy sonyere Nice na mgbazinye ego
Na 24 August 2020, Mendy bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na klọb ahụ
Na 10 Septemba 2021, a hapụrụ Mendy na ndị otu Leicester 25 ikpeazụ Premier League maka oge 2021-22
Otú ọ dị, e tinyere ya ọzọ mgbe emelitere ndị otu ahụ mgbe windo mbugharị nke Jenụwarị 2022
A mụrụ Mendy na France, ọ bụkwa onye Senegal
Mendy bụbu onye ntorobịa mba France nke nwetara okpu n'okpuru afọ iri na asaa, n'okpuru afọ iri na asatọ, na n'okpuru afọ iri na itoolu
Ya na ndị otu na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa, onye nkuzi Philippe Bergeroo ahụghị ya ruo na 2009 UEFA European Under-17 Championship mgbe e mechara kpọọ ya na otu ahụ
Mendy pụtara n'egwuregwu atọ nke otu egwuregwu ka ewepụrụ France n'enwetaghị mmeri
Ya na ndị otu na-erubeghị afọ iri na asatọ, o mere nke mbụ ya na 29 Ọktoba 2009 na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Denmark

A kpọrọ Mendy na mbụ na otu ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2010 naanị igwu egwu na Sendai Cup na Japan, mana n'ihi arụmọrụ ya na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ụlọ, onye nkuzi Monaco bụ Guy Lacombe mere ka Bergeroo kwenye ime ya akụkụ na-adịgide adịgide nke ndị otu ahụ
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na itoolu maka egwuregwu iru eru maka 2011 UEFA European Under-19 Championship

Mendy mere nke mbụ ya na ndị otu ahụ na mmeri 3-0 megide San Marino ma pụta dị ka onye mbido na egwuregwu abụọ sochirinụ megide Montenegro na Austria, ka France meriri egwuregwu abụọ ahụ iji mechie agba ahụ n'enweghị mmeri
Na 9 Nọvemba 2010, mgbe ọ ka ruru eru ịnọchite anya ndị na-erubeghị afọ 19 na ndị na-erubeghị afọ 20, a kpọrọ Mendy na ndị na-erubeghị afọ 21 maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Russia
Na Machị 2021, Mendy natara oku mbụ na ndị otu mba Senegal, na-eme nke mbụ ya na ọkpụ goolu na Congo
Mendy bụ nwa nwanne nna ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ ibe ya bụ Bafétimbi Gomis na Alexandre Mendy
Mendy bụ onye na-agbachitere onwe ya nke a maara maka nkwụsi ike ya, ọgụgụ isi ya, na nkesa bọọlụ dị mma
N'agbanyeghị afọ ndụ ya na ogo ya, a na-eto Mendy maka egwuregwu ya tozuru etozu ma sie ike, na-akpọ òkù iji ya tụnyere onye bụbu onye mba France bụ Claude Makélélé

Echiri ya okpueze nke abụọ n'oge Miss Malaika 2003 na onye meriri Miss Ghana-Germany na 2005
Ọ natara ọtụtụ nkwanye ugwu na ihe nrite na ihe omume kapeeti uhie gụnyere Glitz Style Awards na City People Entertainment Awards
A na-akpọ ya nke ọma dị ka eze nwanyị kapeeti uhie Ghana maka ime ka isi tụgharịa na uwe ya na ihe nrite ama ama na ihe ngosi ejiji
N'ihe dị ka afọ 2017, ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ ime ihe nkiri na New York Film Academy na United States

Felicity Ama Agyemang (amụrụ 15 Ọgọst 1973), nke a maara dị ka Nana Ama McBrown, bụ onye omere Ghana, onye ihe ngosi TV na onye ode akwụkwọ egwu
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe onyonyo Tentacles
Ka oge na-aga, ọ chọtara ihe ịga nke ọma nke ọma na-eso ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri asụsụ Twi 'Asoreba'
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye ọbịa ihe ngosi nri ihe onyonyo McBrown Kitchen na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri United Showbiz na UTV
A mụrụ Nana Ama McBrown Felicity Ama Agyemang na Kumasi, Ghana, na 15 Ọgọst 1977
Nne ya, Cecilia Agyenim Boateng, na nna ya Kwabena Nkrumah, gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe McBrown dị obere
Ebe nna ya gawara nne ya enweghị ike ilekọta ya na ụmụnne ya isii ndị ọzọ, ya na ụmụnne ya bụ Kofi McBrown na nwanne nne ya, Madam Betty Obiri Yeboah
Ya na ụmụnne ya isii, McBrown tolitere na Kwadaso, Kumasi ya na nwanne nne ya na nna kuchiri ya
Ruo taa, ọ na-ewere nwanne nne ya dị ka 'ezigbo nne' ma kwuo maka ekele ya nye nwanne nne ya maka inye ya ụlọ anụ na nlekọta
McBrown gara St
Peter's International Residential School, gafere na Minnesota International wee gaa Central International
Ọ gara n'ihu na Kwadaso LAJSS, n'agbanyeghị na ọ kwụsịrị dị ka onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na enweghị ike ịnọdụ ala maka ule Asambodo Mmụta Basic
McBrown mechara gaa Coleji nke azụmahịa ebe ọ nwetara asambodo odeakwụkwọ
McBrown sụrụ ngọngọ n'ime eme ihe nkiri
Ọ zara oku nlele na redio site na Miracle Films ma were ya n'ọrụ ka ọ na-eme iji ngwa kama
Otú ọ dị, na setịpụ, ọ na-enwe ike ịdọrọ onye nduzi mgbe onye nduzi, Samuel Nyamekye, chere na ọ ka mma maka ọrụ ahụ
Na 2001, a tọhapụrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya, That Day, na-amalite ọrụ ya
Ọrụ ya na That Day nyeere ya aka inweta ọnọdụ na usoro TV Tentacles
N'afọ 2007, McBrown pụtara na ihe nkiri ' Asoreba', na-emekọ ihe ọnụ Agya Koo na Mercy Aseidu
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
McBrown bụ onye nnọchi anya akara Royal Drinks
Ọ bụ onye ọbịa ihe ngosi nri ihe onyonyo McBrown Kitchen na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri United Showbiz na UTV
Na Machị 2021, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya COVID-19 National Trust Fund
E jikọtara McBrown na Omar Sheriff Captan, onye na-arụkọ ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, ọ bụ ezie na ha abụọ nọgidere na-agọnahụ njikọ ịhụnanya ọ bụla
N'afọ 2004, McBrown nwere ụbọchị dị mkpirikpi Okyeame Kwame, onye egwu Ghana
N'ime afọ ahụ, a hụrụ ka ha abụọ na-eme njem ọnụ na Ghana niile na-akwalite ntọhapụ nke Kwame
Na 15 Julaị 2007, e chiri McBrown n'ocheeze dị ka ' Nkosuohemaa ' (ma ọ bụ emume eze nwanyị-nne mmepe ) nke Assin-Basiako nso Assin- Fosu na Assin North District nke Central Region, Ghana
N’afọ 2016, ọ lụrụ enyi ya bụ́ Maxwell Mawu Mensah
Na February 2019 McBrown mụrụ nwa nwanyi na Canada

McBrown emeela n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ma nwee ọtụtụ ihe nrite gụnyere Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Bekee kacha mma, onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'ọrụ ndu, ihe nkiri ọdịnala kacha mma na akụkọ kacha mma na 2011 Kumawood Awards
Ọ merikwara onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọkacha mmasị na 2016 Ghana Movie Awards na Eurostar Nwanyi achasị mma iyi uwe ama ama na kapeeti uhie na 2016 Ghana Movie Awards
O nwetakwara onye na-eme ihe nkiri Golden na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị na ihe nkiri SideChic Gang na Golden Movie Awards na 2018
Na 2020, e nyere ya ihe nrite Redio na Television Personality Awards TV Female Entertainment Show Onye ọbịa nke afọ 2019 – 2020
Ọ họpụtakwara ihe nrite ihe nrite nke nwanyị TV nke afọ 2019–2020
N'afọ 2020 ọ meriri ihe nrite maka nwanyị mara mma Brand Influencer na mbipụta nke atọ nke Ghana Outstanding Women Awards (GOWA)
Na Machị 2021, e nyere ya ihe nkiri nwanyị nke afọ na ihe nrite ihe ntụrụndụ
Philip Boakye Dua Oyinka, onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Nana Asaase bụ onye na-ede uri, onye nkuzi akwụkwọ na onye edemede

Ọ bụ onye enyemaka mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Saatchi & Saatchi site n'afọ 2010 ruo afọ 2011
N'afọ 2011, ọ ghọrọ onye isi mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Global Media Alliance ruo otu afọ ma bụrụ ugbu a onye na-ede akwụkwọ na Asaase Inscription
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2022, ọ na-eje ozi nke abụọ ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke ụlọ ọrụ na-achịkwa Ghana Folklore Board

Nana Asante Frimpong bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana nke jere otu term from 2001 to 2007
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke atọ nke Nanamba nke anọ nke Ghana na onye bụbu onye otu ndị isi maka mpaghara Ghana
Ọ malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na 1997 mgbe ọ nwesịrị mmeri na 1996 Ghanaian General Elections

O nwetara vootu 333,035 n'ime vootu 45,342 ziri ezi na-anọchite anya 5880% megide Oppong Kyekyeku Kwaku Kaaky onye otu NDC nke nwetara vootu 10,808, Kwaku Dua-Twum onye otu PNC nke nwetara voolu 1,499 na Abdullah Uthman onye otu P NC nke nwetara vooti 0
A họpụtara Frimpong ka ọ bụrụ onye otu nzuko omeiwu nke atọ nke Republic of Ghana ka a họpụtara dị ka onye omeiwu nke Kwabre Constituency na mpaghara Ashanti n'oge 2000 Ghanaia
Ntuli aka n'ozuzu
Ọ meriri na tiketi New Patriotic Party na 41,098 votes na-anọchite anya 8090% nke ngụkọta vootu ziri ezi emere n'afọ ahụ
O kwuputara ebumnuche ya ịsọ mpi na 2004 GhaNtuli aka izugbe nke Ghana mana Kofi Frimpong meriri ya na ntuli aka ndị otu pati 2004
Ọ rụrụ naanị otu oge dị ka onye omeiwu
Frimpong bụbu onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Kwabre na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana Ọ bụkwa Magnata Business
Àtụ Infobox religious biography
Nana Asma'u (aha ya niile Nana Asma'u bint Shehu Usman dan Fodiyo, Arabic ; 1793-1864) bụ nwa eze , ode uri , onye nkụzi , na nwa nwanyị nke onye guzobere Sokoto Caliphate , Usman dan Fodio
Ọ bụ onye a na-asọpụrụ na mgbago ugwu Nigeria
Ụfọdụ na-ahụ ya dịka onye eji ame ihe atụ agụm akwụkwọ ma nnwere onwe nke ndị inyom na o kwere omume n'okpuru Islam , na ndị ọzọ dị ka otu ndi bidoro Feminism n' Africa
A mụrụ Nana Asma'u ihe dị ka afọ 11 tupu Fulani Agha (1804-08), a kpọkwara ya Asma bint Abi Bakr , onye enyi nke Onye Amụma Muslim

Nwa nke Sufi -inspired na Fuluve -led Sokoto Caliphate bụ onye nchọpụta na nwanne nwanyi nke Muhammed Bello (Sultan nke Sokoto nke abụọ), ọ nọkarichara ndi niile chọpụtara Caliphate, na-eme ka o buru isi ihe nduzi nye ndị ọchichi n'ọdịnihu
Site na 1805, ndị otu Caliph bịara bụrụ ndị a ma ama, gụnyere ndị ikwu nwanyị Caliph
Mgbe Nana Asma'u ghọrọ onye a ma ama, ụmụnne ya nwanyị bụ Myram na Fatima, na ndị nwunye Caliph bụ Aisha na Hawwa kpara ezigbo ike n' ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na steeti ọhụrụ ahụ
Dị ka nna ya, a kụziiri ya ọmụmụ ihe ndị dị na Qur'an , ma tinye ya n'ọrụ mmụta zuru ụwa ọnụ
Dị ka ihe atụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Qadiriyyah Sufi, dan Fodio na ndị na-eso ụzọ ya mesiri ike ịkekọrịta ihe ọmụma, karịsịa nke Sunnah , ihe nlereanya nke onye amụma Muhammad
Iji mụta na-enweghị nkuzi, ha chere na ọ bụ ihe efu
Ya mere, Nana Asma'u kwadoro, karịsịa, mmụta nke ụmụ nwanyị Muslim
Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị ezinụlọ ya, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ede akwụkwọ

Ọ maara akwụkwọ na klas nke mba Arab na nke oge ochie, na-asụkwa asụsụ anọ ( Arabic , asụsụ Fula , Hausa na Tamacheq Tuareg ), Ọha na Eze maara Nana Asma'u dịka ọkà mmụta kachasị elu na ala ndị Alakụba kachasị mma na West Africa, nke mere ka o nwee ohere iji kwekọọ ọnụ
Ọ hụrụ ọtụtụ agha nke AghaF ulani ma dee banyere ahụmahụ ya na akụkọ gbasara Wakar Gewaye , 'njem'
Dika Sokoto Caliphate malitere dika omuma omenala na okpukperechi okpukpe, ihe odide nke ndi ndu nwere ebe puru iche nke ndi ozo ma ndi ochichi ma chia, puru ime ka ha di
Ọ ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ nye nwanne ya nwoke mgbe o werela Caliphate, edekwaara ndị gọọmenti na ndị na-amụrụ ndị isi mba ọzọ akwụkwọ ntụziaka
N'etiti ya ihe karịrị ọrụ di ndụ ruru 60 e dere ihe karịrị afọ 40, Nana Asma'u hapụrụ otu nnukwu uri Arabic, asụsụ Fula na Hausa, niile edere na edemede Arabic
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme, mana ha na-agụnye ume, mkpu, na ndụmọdụ
Ndụmọdụ nduzi ya dị iche iche ghọrọ ihe eji eme ihe maka ịkụziri ụkpụrụ ntọala nke Caliphate
Asma'u jikọrọ aka na Muhammed Bello , nke abụọ Caliph
Ọrụ ya na-agụnye ma gbasaa agbasapụ ike dan Fodio siri ike banyere ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị na ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'ime echiche obodo nke Sunnah na iwu Islam
Ọrụ ndi ọzọ dị nke Asma'u e dere dere na-emetụta akwụkwọ nkuzi nke Islam n'ihi na ọtụtụ n'ime ndị okenye ya, ọ bụ maka ọrụ nkụzi okpukpe ụmụ nwanyị
Malite n'afọ 1830, o kere usoro nke ndị nkuzi ụmụ nwanyị ( Jajis ) bụ ndị na-agagharị na Caliphate na-akụziri ụmụ nwanyị n'ụlọ obibi ụmụ akwụkwọ

N'aka nke ya, onye ọ bụla n'ime ndị jajis ji akwụkwọ edemede Nana Asma'u na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ Sufi na-agụkarị, na-abụkarị site n'ịgụ ihe nkiri na uri, iji zụọ ihe ọkụkụ nke ụmụ nwanyị mụtara, ndị a kpọrọ 'yan-taru , ma ọ bụ' ndị na-ezukọta, ụmụnna nwanyị
' Iji ọ bụla jaji ọ onyere a malfa (a okpu na omenala emume nnọchianya nke ụlọ ọrụ nke na-ekpere arụsị Bori priestesses na Gobir ) kegide na a red eke n'isi
Jajis ghọrọ, ya mere, ihe nnọchianya nke ala ọhụrụ, usoro iwu ọhụrụ, na nke ịmụ asụsụ Islam ọbụna n'èzí obodo ndị inyom
N'akụkụ, ọrụ nkuzi a malitere dị ka ụzọ isi jikọta ndị agha ndị agha meriri meriri n'agha n'ime òtù ndị ọchịchị Muslim
Otú ọ dị, ọ gbasaa, gụnyere ndị ogbenye na ime obodo, na-akụziri ndị nkụzi bụ ndị na-agafe na Caliphate
Ncheta Nana Asma'u mgbe niile a bụghị nanị na akwụkwọ edemede ya, kamakwa n' ọrụ ya n'ịkọwa ụkpụrụ nke obodo Sokoto
Taa na mgbago ugwu Naijiria, aha ya ka a na-akpọkarị otu ụmụ nwanyị ndị inyom Islam, ụlọ akwụkwọ, na nzukọ nzukọ
Ọ weghachitere arụmụka banyere ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na Islam na narị afọ nke 20, ebe ọ bụ ndị ọkà mmụta Alakụba na ndị kwabatara na Europe na ihe arụmụka ya
Ntughari na nsụgharị nke ọrụ ya etinyewo uche na nsụgharị dị mma nke akụkọ na edere ya

Ọ bụ isiokwu nke ọtụtụ ọmụmụ, gụnyere Jean Boyd si Nwanyị Caliph Nana Asma'u 1793-1865 Onye Ozizi, Poet na Onye Ndú Alakụba (1989), kọwara dịka 'akwụkwọ dị mkpa' nke 'na-enye ezigbo ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ na-agụ akwụkwọ
iji tụfuo ihe ndị a na-emekarị banyere ụmụ nwanyị n'Africa ', na Jihad Ji Otu Otu Nana Asma'u, Onye Ọkà Mmụta na Dekọọ na Beverly B
Mack na Jean Boyd (2000)
Ọrụ nchịkọta nke Nana Asma'u, Nwa nke Usman dan Fodiyo 1793-1864 , nke Boyd na Mack bipụtara, bipụtara n'afọ 1997
Àtụ Portal
Nana Darkoa Sekyiamah bụ onye Ghana na-ede akwụkwọ na onye na-ede blọgụ

O kwadoro ihe nrite na-emeri blọgụ Adventures from the Bedrooms of African Women and gas dere maka Guardian na mepee DemocracySekyiamah bụ onye isi njikwa nkwukọrịta na Association for Women's Rights in Development na onye otu Black Feminism Forum Working Group feminist na Bahia, Brazil
A mụrụ Nana Darkoa Sekyiamah na London, England, nne na nna Ghana, ma too na Ghana
O nwere diplọma na nkuzi arụmọrụ na asambodo na mgbochi esemokwu ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ndụ na ọkà okwu ihu ọha

E nyekwara ya nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na nkwukọrịta na ọmụmụ ọdịbendị site na Mahadum nke North London na nzere masta nke sayensụ na okike na mmepe site na London School of Economics and Political Science
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-enye ndị isi ọzụzụ maka ndị uwe ojii Metropolitan nke London

Sekyiamah jikọtara aka guzobe blọọgụ, Adventures from the Bedrooms of African Women, iji nyere aka gbasaa mkparịta ụka gbasara mmekọahụ na mmekọahụ site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka ma nye ha ohere ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha
O meriri ihe nrite kacha mma na blọọgụ kacha mma na 2013 Ghana Blogging and Social Media Awards na blọọlụ kacha mma ọzọ na 2014
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2011, magazin Arise nabatara Sekyiamah dị ka otu n'ime 'Ndị na-eme mgbanwe na Ghana'
Sekyiamah bụ onye na-akpọkọta Fab Fem, otu ụmụ nwanyị na-ezukọ mgbe niile na Accra
Sekyiamah edeela edemede maka The Guardian, This Is Africa na Open Democracy
O dere akwụkwọ Communications Handbook for Women's Rights Organisations ma nwee akụkọ mkpirikpi e bipụtara n'ọtụtụ mba

Sekyiamah edeela ọtụtụ ihe gbasara mmekọahụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka ma nwee otu isiokwu ('Standpoint Adventures from Our Bedrooms - Blogging about diverse erotic experiences') nke e bipụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ agụmakwụkwọ Feminist Africa
Sekyiamah na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke nkwukọrịta na Association for Women's Rights in Development (AWID)
Ọ bụ onye otu Black Feminism Forum Working Group
O so dee akwụkwọ Creating Spaces and Amplifying Voices The First Ten Years of the African Women's Development Fund na mmalite akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ego ahụ

O dekwara Women Leading Africa Conversations with Inspirational African Women, nchịkọta ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ụmụ nwanyị si n'ofe Afrịka na isiokwu gụnyere ụmụ nwanyị, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nka nke sitere na ọrụ ya na AWDF

In 2021, Sekyiamah had an anthology entitled The Sex Lives of African Women published by Dialogue, described in a review by Margaret Busby as 'an extraordinarily dynamic work'Sekyiamah bụ ọkà okwu na 2015 Writivism Festival na Kampala, Uganda,na mmemme Aké Arts and Book Festival nke 2016 na Abeokuta, Nigeria
Ephex Kanana Gichuru (14 Disemba 1986 - 22 Septemba 2015) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ahụ maka TV

A maara ya nke ọma dịka Nana Gichuru Dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, a maara ya maka ọrụ ya na usoro telivishọn Noose of Gold, Demigods na How to Find a Husband Dịka onye nnabata, ọ ga-egosi Interior Designs, usoro eziokwu nke Kenya, tupu ọnwụ ya
Ọ bụkwa onye ọrụ ụgbọ elu nke Kenya Airways
Ọ lụrụ Richard Wainaina tupu ọnwụ ya
Gichuru pụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka Noose of Gold n'afọ 2010 na Demigods n'afọ 2011
Mmepụta ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị How to Find a Husband na ihe ngosi Interior Designs
N'ihe dịka elekere iri nke ụtụtụ na 22 Septemba 2015, Nana na-eme njem na BMW convertible ya na Eastern Bypass, Utawala, mgbe ụgbọala ya gbakwuuru gwongworo
Ọ nwụrụ ozugbo
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na asatọ
Ọnwụ ya bịara ụbọchị iri ka a kọrọ na ọ buru amụma ọnwụ nke ya na ibe mgbasa ozi ya
Emere ememe ncheta ya na 30 Septemba afọ 2015 na Ruaraka Methodist Church
E liri ya na 2 Ọktoba 2015 n'obodo ya, Kaaga na Meru

Nana Hill Kagga Macpherson (nke a makwaara dị ka Nana Kagga-Hill ma ọ bụ dị ka Nana Hill ma ọ bụ Nana Hill Kagga ) bụ onye Uganda na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ọdịnaya, onye edemede, injinia mmanụ ala na onye na-ekwu okwu mkpali
O dere ma duzie ihe nkiri nke afo 2012 The Life ma bụrụ onye edemede na onye isi mmepụta nke Beneath the Lies - The Series
A mụrụ Kagga na Nairobi, Kenya na nne na nna Uganda, otu onye injinia
Kagga bụ onye Muganda na akụkụ nke ezinụlọ ọdịnala na-achị achị nke ebo Baganda, 'Bambejja' (ndị eze nwanyị)
Kagga bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ isii nke nne na nna ya
N'oge a mụrụ ya, nne na nna ya nọ n'ala ọzọ n'oge ọchịchị onye isi ala Idi Amin
Kagga tolitere na Uganda n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ego
Na mgbakwunye na nna ya na nna nna nne ya, ụmụnne ya anọ bụkwa ndị injinia
Kagga bi na Kampala, Uganda ya na ụmụ ya atọ
Ọ maara asụsụ Bekee na Luganda nke ọma
Kagga gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Kampala Parents School
O sonyeziri Gayaza High School, otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị a ma ama na Uganda, maka O-Levels ya
O mechara mee A-Levels ya na Red Maids School, Bristol, ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ agbọghọ kacha ochie na UK
Kagga sonyeere Mahadum Birmingham, Birmingham, UK ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na injinịa kemịkalụ
N'oge ezumike okpomọkụ ya, ọ ga-alaghachi Uganda ma bụrụ onye na-egosi Jam Agenda na WBS, ihe ngosi Igwe onyonyo nke Uganda a ma ama
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Kagga kwagara Florida, United States, mgbe ahụ New Mexico, United States
Na New Mexico, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Laguna Industries dị ka Injinia Usoro na Laguna na-arụ ọrụ na nkwekọrịta ndị agha US
Kagga kpebiri ịkwaga ịchụso ime ihe nkiri ya na ngosi ya na Los Angeles ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma
E mere Kagga na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri gụnyere Cowboys and Indians, A Good Day to Be Black and Sexy (Segment ‘Reprise’), He's Just Not That into You, Star Trek, CSI NY - Boo, Life, Runway Stars
Na US Theatre, a họpụtara Kagga dị ka Mercy na egwuregwu, Butterflies of Uganda nke Darren Dahms nke a họpụtara maka onyinye NAACP
Kagga pụtara na ọtụtụ vidiyo egwu nke P!nk, Amy Winehouse, Sting, Lenny Kravitz
Kagga pụtakwara na ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi Igwe onyonyo gụnyere maka KFC, Coors Light, Pepsi, DSW, Microsoft, APPLE, Tylenol, DOVE
Mgbe ọ nọ na LA, Kagga nwekwara ụlọ ahịa na-ere ihe na Santa Monica Blvd nke a na-akpọ A Vintage Affair
Kagga laghachiri Uganda na ngwụcha afọ 2009 wee guzobe azụmahịa, Savannah MOON Ltd

Savannah MOON n'okpuru akara ahụ, Savannah MOON Productions mepụtara ihe nkiri zuru oke, The Life nke e gosipụtara na M-NET, TV Series Beneath The Lies - The Series, nke a na-egosi ugbu a na Urban TV ma kesaa ya na dijitalụ site na MTN Uganda na Mmemme TV, How We See It
Savannah MOON emepụtala obere ihe nkiri a na-akpọ The Last Breath na Kampala Film School
Savannah MOON na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a n'ịzụlite ọtụtụ echiche na ọdịnaya gụnyere Taking Time, usoro TV na-abịanụ
Kagga mepụtara atụmatụ, You are Limitless (YAL), nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịkpali, iduzi ma gbaa ndị Afrịka ume, ọkachasị ndị ntorobịa iji nweta ikike ha niile
Kagga na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka Injinia mmanụ ala maka otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na gas na-arụ ọrụ na Uganda
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọka ikpe maka Miss Uganda 2018
A mụrụ Nana Ama Browne Klutse na ka ọnwa Mee dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ n'afọ 1981 na Nyanfeku Ekroful
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Anomabo Methodist Primary nakwa JHS
Ọ gara n'ihu n' ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Mfantsiman Girls ma mecha gaa Mahadum Cape Coast na Ghana ị gụ ma nweta nzere BSc na Physics
Ọ gara n'ihu ma nweta nzere PhD
ya na Climatology na Mahadum Cape Town na South Africa
Dr Klutse na-amụ banyere ọnọdụ ihu igwe nke West Africa
Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya n'ihe gbasara sayensị ihu igwe tụmadị mmiri ozuzo nke Afrịka
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi dị elu na Ngalaba Physics, na Mahadum Ghana
N'oge gara aga, ọ na-elekọta ngalaba a kpọrọ Remote Sensing and Climate Centre
Ọ na-agbakwa ụmụaka ndị nwaanyị nọ na Ghana ume ka ha tụlee ọrụ sayensị ma na-akwado mmelite na agụmakwụkwọ sayensị na mba ahụ
Klutse rụrụ ọrụ nụlọ ọrụ a kpọrọ Ghana Space Science and Technology Institute nke Ghana Atomic Energy Commission dị ka onye isi nchọpụta sayensị site n'afọ 2016 ruo 2018
Tupu nke a, ọ bụ onye nkuzi ọbịa na West African Science Service Centre on Climate and Adapted Land Use (WASCAL) na Akure, Nigeria
Klutse na-arụkwa ọrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka onye otu National Democratic Congress
Nana Obiri - Yeboah (amụrụ na Maachị 28, 1983) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ghana
A maara ya maka ihe nkiri afọ 2015 The Cursed Ones, nke nwetara nhọpụta ịrị na atọ na Africa Movie Academy Awards, nke gụnyere Best Film na Best Director
A mụrụ Nana Obiri - Yeboah na Maachị 28, 1979, na Accra, Ghana
O dere ma duzie egwuregwu mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ na chọọchị ya
Nana Otuo Siriboe bụ onye ọchịchị ọdịnala Ghana, injinia eletrik na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye Omanhene nke mpaghara ọdịnala Juaben
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọkwa n'ihe gbasara ndị isi ma nwee ọtụtụ nhọpụta gọọmentị Ghana
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke kansụl steeti nke asatọ nke Republic nke anọ ugbu a

Nana otuo Siriboe nke abụọ was born in the Ashanti Region of GhanaA nabatara ya ka ọ mụọ injinia eletriki na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology na 1960sỌ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1964na mgbe obere oge dị ka onye injinia, etinyere ya dị ka onye isi na mpaghara omenala Juabeng
A họpụtara Nana Otu Siriboe nke Abụọ dị ka Onye isi nke Juaben Traditional area na 1971
O nwere utu aha Juabenhene - Chief of Juaben
Mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye ọchịchị ọdịnala, ọ nwetara ahụmịhe dị ukwuu n'ihe gbasara azụmahịa, ọchịchị na ihe gbasara onye isi n'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ mgbe ọ banyere
Nana Siriboe nke Abụọ na-arụ ọtụtụ ọrụ na maka Asantehene na Alaeze Asante
N'ọnwa Febụwarị, 2017, ọ sonyeere onye Asantehene, Osei Tutu nke Abụọ, gaa Seychelles, ebe ha zutere Onye isi ala Seychelles, James Michel
N'oge ọchịchị John Agyekum Kufour, a họpụtara Nana Siriboe nke Abụọ na kansụl steeti
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro abụọ dị ka onye otu kansụl site na 2001 ruo 2009
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2017, Onye isi ala Nana Akuffo-Addo họpụtara ya ọzọ na kansụl ahụ
N'oge emume iyi e mere na Flagstaff House, Onye isi ala Akuffo-Addo rịọrọ kansụl ka ha dọọ ya ọdụ nke ọma na ebumnuche nke ịkwalite Ghana mgbe niile
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche ọrụ niile nke ndị otu iri abụọ na ise
N'oge emume inyefe nke nnọkọ nke isii nke kansụl ahụ na nke asaa, onye isi oche kansụl na-apụ apụ, Naa Prọfesọ
John S
Nabila, dụrụ ụlọ ọhụrụ ahụ ọdụ ka ha nye gọọmentị ọhụrụ ndụmọdụ kachasị mma iji hụ na mba ahụ na ụmụ amaala ya niile ga-ebi na ọganihu na udo

Ọrụ Nana Siriboe dị ka onye isi oche nke kansụl ahụ gụnyere izute ndị Ghana nke nkwenye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị ọkachamara niile iji gee ntị na nchegbu na echiche ha ka e wee nwee ike inweta nkwubi okwu na-enweghị ntụpọ n'oge mkparịta ụka kansụl
Ọ na-ekwukarị okwu ihu ọha nke na-eme ka iwu gọọmentị na nke ụlọ ọrụ onwe
Ọnwa isii ka ọ ghọsịrị onye isi oche nke Council of State, Nana Otu Siriboe II, n'okwu o depụtara ụfọdụ ọrụ ndị kansụl ahụ mere
Ha gụnyere nzukọ 36 iji kwurịta okwu dị mkpa gbasara mba ahụ
Isi okwu n'etiti okwu ndị o kwuru bụ ndị metụtara ịmepụta mpaghara ọhụrụ na mba ahụ
Na Febụwarị 23, 2021, a họpụtara ya ọzọ ma ṅụọ iyi dị ka onyeisi oche nke Kansụl nke Steeti asatọ site n'aka onye isi ala, Nana Akuffo-Addo
N'ime ndụ ya niile dịka onye injinia eletriki na onye ọchịchị ọdịnala, Nana Siriboe nke abuo enweela ọtụtụ ọkwa na ndụ ọha
Ogologo oge maka nke a agafeela afọ iri anọ na isii ma ha gụnyere
Nancee Oku Bright bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Liberia, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe na New York City
Ọ bụ onye isi nke ngalaba ọrụ ebere nke ọrụ ikpezi udo nke UN na Democratic Republic of the Congo
Nancee Oku Bright nwetara nzere MA nakwa nzere doctorate na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum Oxford
E bipụtara ide odide PhD ya, banyere ndị Eritrean gbara ọsọ ndụ n'ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Um Gargur na Sudan, dị ka akwụkwọ na 1998
O meela ihe ndekọ akụkọ dị mkpirikpi banyere ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Sudan na ndụ na Liberia
Ihe ngosi PBS ya bụ Liberia America's Stepchild (2002) nyochara ihe kpatara Agha Obodo Liberia nke Mbụ
Nancy Acora bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndị obodo Lamwo dị ka nwanyị MP na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda
Acora bụ onye omeiwu nwere onwe ya, ọ banyere na omeiwu mgbe o meriri onye bụbu onye omeiwu Molly Lanyero nke National Resistance Movement party
Mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, Lanyero enweghị afọ ojuju ma tinye akwụkwọ mkpesa megide Acora
Acora na ngwụcha usoro ahụ meriri akwụkwọ mkpesa ntuli aka n'ọnwa Septemba 2021
Na nzuko omeiwu nke Uganda, Acora na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara onye isi ala
Nancy Gathungu bụ Auditor General nke mba Kenya, na-amalite ọrụ na onwa June afo 2020
Ọ nọchiri Edward Ouko onye lara ezumike nká n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afo 2019
Ọ rịọrọ ka ọ bụrụ Auditor General n'okpuru iwu afo 2010
Gathungu bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị na-arụ ọrụ, sonyeere ọfịs Auditor General na 1993 ma bụrụ onye a na-akwalite n'ọkwa Director Quality Assurance, Ofis nke Auditor General
N'oge nhọpụta, ọ bụ onye na-achọ ịzọ ọkwa PhD na Jomo Kenyatta nke University nke Agriculture n Technology
Degree ndị gara aga gụnyere MBA na Strategic Management na nzere bachelọ nke azụmahịa (Accounting Option)
N'oge ọ malitere ọrụ n'afo 2020, Gathungu nwere ego ruru nde Ksh3089
N'onwa 2021, Nancy Gathungu lekọtara akụkọ na-egosi na ọkara nke ijeri KSh 185 nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ nke ụlọ Kenya enweghị ike ịkọwapụta
Nancy Handabile bụ onye Zambia na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nta akụkọ na onye na-eme fim
Handabile mere ihe ngosi Progress na Love Games, nke nwetara ya nhọpụta maka Best Supporting Actress na 2014 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Ọ duziri Tizibika, ihe ngosi TV nke eziokwu banyere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na-anwa iji mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta iji nweta aha
Ọ sokwa duzie ma mee ihe nkiri na Zambezi Magic TV show Masauso N'afọ 2019 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Zimbabwe Lord of Kush
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018 a matara Handabile dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị asatọ na-eme ihe nkiri Multi Choice na Southern African Development Community (SADC)
O jiri oge ahụ kpọọ ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị ka ha banye n'ọrụ ụmụ nwoke, na maka ime ihe nkiri iji nweta nkwado ego na Zambia
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019 ọ natara Ankazi Woman of the Year Award site na Stanbic Bank
Nancy Illoh bụ onye odeakụkọ Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye na-egosi MoneyShow na Television Independent Television nakwa onye ndụmọdụ mgbasa ozi na Channel Manager of Africa Business Channel na Daarsat
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke African Economic Congress
Illoh bụ nwa afọ Delta Steeti na nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ isii
A mụrụ ya na Lagos Steeti, Naịjirịa ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, Awka ebe o nwere BSc
na Parasitology na Entomology
Nancy Isime onye amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ime ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1991, bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa n'eme ihe nkiri, onye nlereanya ejiji na onye mgbasa ozi
Amụrụ Isime na Edo Steeti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mpaghara agụmakwụkwọ Social Work afọ abụọ na Mahadum Lagos

Nancy Jepkosgei Kiprop (amụrụ na 7 Julaị 1979) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
O meriri Vienna City Marathon na 2017, 2018 na 2019
N'afọ 2019 o setịpụkwara ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke 2 22 12
N'afọ 2005, ọ meriri Almond Blossom Cross Country, nke dị mita 8,000, na oge nke 19 35
N'afọ 2008, ọ meriri Parelloop nke e mere na Brunssum, Netherlands na oge nke 32 43
N'afọ 2014, ọ meriri asọmpi kilomita 10 nke ụmụ nwanyị na Lidingöloppet na oge nke 34 24
N'afọ 2016, o meriri Granollers Half Marathon na oge nke 1 11 30
N'afọ 2018, ọ mechara bụrụ onye nke abụọ na Ústí nad Labem Half Marathon na oge 1 07 32
Na 2019 New York City Marathon ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke anọ
Àtụ Footer Vienna Marathon Champions Women
Nancy Jebet Langat (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1981) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ n'etiti, onye na-agba bọọlụ bụ ọkachamara na mita 1500
O meriri nrite ọla edo na 1500m na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics, na oge kachasị mma nke 4 0023
O mekwara asọmpi na afo 2004 Summer Olympics na 2005 World Championships, n'erughị ngwụcha
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ na-asọ mpi na mita 800, ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka onye na-eto eto
Langat ritere ọla edo na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics na Beijing wee bụrụ nwanyị Kenya nke abụọ meriri ọla edo Olympic
Onye mbụ bụ Pamela Jelimo, onye meriri 800m n'otu egwuregwu Olimpik ahụ
Na afo 2009 World Championships, Langat agafeghị ọkara ikpeazụ, mana o ji mmeri na World Athletics Final mechie oge ahụ
N'afọ 2010, Langat meriri na Diamond League maka 1500m
Ọ gara na-enweghị mmeri na agbụrụ ya niile megide ndị na-agba ọsọ kachasị mma n'ụwa
Ọrụ ya na afo 2010 IAAF Continental Cup bụ nke na-ese okwu, ka ọ na-anwa ịdọrọ Hind Dehiba azụ ka ha abụọ lụrụ ọgụ na nke ikpeazụ
Langat dara ma mechie n'ikpeazụ
O kwuru na 800/1500 m n'etiti okpukpu abụọ na afọ 2010 Commonwealth Games, Otú ọ dị, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye egwuregwu Kenya nke Afọ na Disemba
Langat nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na 2011 Diamond League circuit na mpụta abụọ ya, na Golden Gala na Prefontaine Classic, ọ bịara nke ise ugboro abụọ ahụ
Ọ nọ n'elu ikpo okwu na 1500 m na afọ 2011 Military World Games, mana e wepụrụ ya na ọkara ikpeazụ na afọ 2011 World Championships in Athletics
O merụrụ ahụ n'ikpere n'afọ 2012 wee hapụ ohere iji chebe aha Olympic ya
Nancy Langat lụrụ onye na-agba ọsọ marathon Kenneth Cheruiyot
Nwa ya nwoke nke okenye gbara afọ isii n'ụbọchị ọ meriri Olympic Gold
Ọ bụ ndị Kenya Air Force were ya n'ọrụ ma na-adabere na Moi Air Base na Nairobi
Nna ya Joseph Langat bụ onye na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge na mba ụwa
Àtụ Kenyan Sportsperson of the Year

Nancy Asiko Onyango, nke a na-akpọkarị Nancy Onyango, bụ onye ndekọ ego Kenya, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, onye bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na nyocha nke ime ụlọ na International Monetary Fund
A họpụtara ya na 4 Disemba 2017, ebe ọrụ ya malitere na 1 February 2018
Tupu nhọpụta ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Reliance Risk Advisory Solutions, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ nke di na Nairobi
A mụrụ ya na Kenya, ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na mpaghara maka agụmakwụkwọ ya tupu mahadum
Na 1984, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Nairobi (UoN), ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1987, ma nweta nzere bachelọ nke Commerce (BCom) na Akaụntụ na ihe gbasara ego
Ọ gara n'ihu na akwụkwọ ya na UoN, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1989, nweta nzere Master of Business Administration (MBA)
Mgbe e mesịrị n'afọ 2013, ọ debanyere aha na United States International University Africa, ebe ọ gụrụ wee gụsịe akwụkwọ na 2016 wee nweta nzere Dọkịta nke Business Administration (DrBA)
Dị ka akụkụ nke ọmụmụ doctoral ya, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Columbia Business School, na New York City
N'ime ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ anọ, site na Julaị 1995 ruo Disemba 1998, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye njikwa na PricewaterhouseCoopers, n'ebe ha nọ na Uxbridge, London, United Kingdom
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi njikwa n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, bụ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ atọ na ọkara ọzọ ruo Ọgọọst 2002

Na July 2005, a họpụtara ya Onye Mmekọ na PwC, na-eduzi ngalaba na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ na PwC East Africa, nke dabeere na Nairobi, Kenya ka ọ bụrụ ọkachamara na nkà na ụzụ, ihe ize ndụ ọchịchị na nnabata, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo na Jụn 2012
Na Julaị afọ 2012, a kpọrọ ya onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ nke Risk Assurance Service Unit na PwC East Africa, na-eje ozi ebe ahụ ruo October 2014
Na Jenụwarị 2015, maka oge ọnwa iri abụọ, a họpụtara ya onye mmekọ na Ernst & Young, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi ọchịchị, ihe ize ndụ & nrubeisi maka mpaghara Africa, ruo August 2016
Na Disemba 2017, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ngalaba nyocha Internal Audit na IMF, dnke dịrị irè malite na February 2018
Nancy Onyango bụ nne lụrụ dị ma mụta ụ nwoke atọ

Ọ na-ejide ọtụtụ nhọpụta bọọdụ, nke gụnyere dị ka onye na-abụghị onye isi nchịkwa nke Kenya Commercial Bank Group, onye na-abụghị onye isi nchịkwa nke Cytonn Investments, nakwa ụlọọrụ Fairtrade Africa, ebe ọ na-elekọta kọmitii nyocha na ego nke bọọdụ
Nancy Jean Shelley ( - 2010) OAM bụ onye Quaker na-ahụ maka udo nke nọchitere anya òtù udo nke Australia na United Nations n'afọ 1982
Ọ bụ ọkà okwu a ma ama n'ọtụtụ nzukọ Australia na nke mba ụwa n'afọ 1980s na afọ 1990s
Shelley natara Medal of the Order of Australia (OAM) n'afọ 1989 maka ọrụ ya
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụbọchị 28 Septemba 2010

Nomadewuka Nancy Sihlwayi bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, onye a họpụtara na National Assembly of South Africa na ntuli aka 2019 dị ka onye otu African National Congress Ọ rụburu ọrụ dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) nke na-ahụ maka Ngalaba Mmepe Ọha na Eze na gọọmentị mpaghara Eastern Cape
Sihlwayi na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye otu Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements
Ọ bụbu onye otu Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Nandagire Christine Ndiwalana bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021, dị ka onye omeiwu National Unity Platform na-anọchite anya Bukomansimbi North na Bukomansimb District
Nandagire Christine Ndiwalana nwere nzere bachelọ na ọgwụ na ịwa ahụ na Mahadum Makerere
A maara ya na mbụ dị ka Christine Nandagire, ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Nandagire Christine Ndiwalana site na ntuli aka na 2018
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2019, a mara ọkwa na ọ bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Democratic Party ga-asọ mpi Bukomansimbi North na Bukomansimb District
O mechara kwaga na National Unity Platform
Mgbe esemokwu dị n'ime ụlọ kewara National Resistance Movement n'ógbè ahụ, Ọ meriri onye omeiwu nọ n'ọkwa Ruth Katushabe ka a họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu maka 2021-26

Nandi Madida née Mngoma (amụrụ na 20 Machị 1988) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nlereanya na onye na-egosi ihe onyonyo, A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Maphumulo, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, O ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe DJ Franky gosipụtara ya dị ka onye na-eti egwu na otu 'Tonight', nke ewepụtara (2012)
N'afọ 2011, o wepụtara egwu mbụ ya 'Tonight'
O mechara bịanye aka na Universal Music Group wee wepụta abọm izizi ya akpọrọ Nandi n'afọ 2012
It isA mụrụ Madida na Maphumulo ma zụlite ya na Durban, KwaZulu-Natal
Ọ gara Danville Park Girls High School, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gara mụọ iwu na UKZN ma mesịa gaa Varsity College, n'agbanyeghị na atụmatụ mbụ ya bụ ịchụso ọrụ nta akụkọ
Madida bụ onye na-agba egwu na ihe nlereanya kemgbe ọ bụ nwata
O meriri Miss Junior RSA mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Ihe ịga nke ọma ya na nchọta talent dugara n'ọkwa dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Gateway Mall na Umhlanga
N'afọ 2004, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ nwetara ọru ihe onyonyo mbụ ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi ntụrụndụ SABC2 nke a na-akpọ Bling, nke lekwasịrị anya na egwu na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2013, ya na ProVerb na Dineo Ranaka sonyere na mmemme Mzansi Magic Magazine All Access Mzansi
N'afọ 2014, Nandi Madida na KO wepụtara egwu 'Skhanda Love', ọ ghọrọ ihe egwu ozugbo ma mesịa bụrụ onye a họpụtara maka ọtụtụ onyinye egwu
Site na 2015 ruo 2016, ọ gbara Zokuthula Dhlomo na Mzansi Magic telenovela The Road
Ọ kwadoro usoro ihe nkiri eonyonyo bu usoro eziokwu Coke Studio
Na Septemba 2016, ya na Ayanda Thabethe kwadoro ihe ngosi magazin ntụrụndụ BET BET A-List
