Naseef Ali (nke a na-akpọkwa Nasif, Naseef, Nassef ma ọ bụ Nasiff, Arabic ناصيف) bụ nwoke Arabic nyere na aha nna sitere na Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Mediterenian, karịsịa site na Lebanọn na Siria, nke sitere na okwu Arabic nasif nke pụtara ezi ma ọ bụ ezi uche
Nassif Zeytoun (Arabic; amụrụ ya na Septemba 25, 1988) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Siria na onye mmeri 2010 nke ihe ngosi telivishọn nke Arabic Star Academy
A maara ya nke ọma maka egwu ya 'Mesh Aam Tezbat Maae', nke e wepụtara na 2014
Vidio egwu ya na YouTube nwere ọtụtụ nde mmadụ
A tọhapụrụ abọm ya bụ Toul Al Yom na Julaị 2016 wee ruo n'elu chaatị na ụwa ndị Arab ozugbo
[citation needed] Otu na ime egwu sitere na abọm ahụ, 'Bi Rabbek', bụ No
1 na ngwa egwu Anghami
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị Kraịst nke Siria
Na 2016, Zeytoun keere òkè na Stars On Board, ụgbọ mmiri televishọn na ndị ọbịa a ma ama si n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke Arab Arab, ma mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na Syria na Lebanon
Ịhụnanya Zeytoun maka obodo ya kpaliri egwu 'Haweety', bụ nke onye na-agụ egwú na-asọpụrụ mba ya agha tisasịrị
Na afọ 2010, Zeytoun bụ onye Siria mbụ batara na nke ikpeazụ ma merie Star Academy Arab World; ọ nwetara 6521% nke vootu ikpeazụ nke ndị na-ekiri
Zeytoun esonyewokwa na Tomorrow/Bokra, ihe omume ọrụ ebere nke Quincy Jones mepụtara ma bụrụ nke Shakira na ndị ọzọ 23 na-ese ihe Arab
Nassima Saleha Ben Hamouda Akouche (amụrụ n'October 20, 1973 n'ime Villeurbanne, France) bụ onye Algeria na agba bọọlụ volleyball nke mba ụwa
Klọb ikpeazụ MC Alger (Algeria)
Nassima Saifi (Ọmụmụ 29 October 1988) bụ nwa afọ nke Algeria nke na atụ ihe ọtụtụ
Saifi nke na enweghi otu ụkwụ bụ kwa onye nke ritere ihe nrite nke ọlaedo ugboro abụọ na ihe egwuruegwu nke ndi na enweghi ụkwụ na aka
Saifi eritere ihe nrite ugboro atọ na ihe egwuruegwu nke ndi uwa nile
Obodo ọmụmụ Saifi bụ ebe nke ana akpọ Mila nke di na Algeria
Ihe ọdachi biara danyere Saifi na okporo ụzọ mgbe ụgbọ ala biara kụrụ ya
Ihe ọdachi nkea mere ka egbupu ya ụkwụ ikpa ya
Nna ya nyere ya ndụmọdụ ka otinye uche ya na ihe gbasara itụ ihe otụtụ
Na oge na adighi anya, nwa ada Saifi biara nonyere ndi otu Mila Handisport Club ma soro ha mụta ka esi atụ ihe otụtụ
Nassira Traoré (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1988) bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ basketball maka US Colomiers
Traore sonyere Mali na 2008 Summer Olympics, ebe ọ na-emeghị ihe na egwuregwu 4
Nasty Beatmakers bụ ndị America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, nke ụmụnne DJ Nasty (Johnny David Mollings) na LVM (Leonardo V
Mollings) mepụtara
Ha abụọ mejupụtara Lil Wayne's 'I'm Me', Plies's '#1 Fan', [citation needed] na Ludacris's 'Grew Up a Screw Up'
A mụrụ DJ Nasty na LVM na Cuba, owéré bịa nà United States na 1988 màkà na nna ha nọ na Navy; ọ 'chọrọ mgbanwe n'ọnọdụ,' ka Nasty na-ekwu
DJ Nasty zutere DJ Khaled na onye ọzọ aha ya bụ Ceaser wee malite Hitmen Productions
Ha na-eme oriri ụlọ oriri na nkwari na-akwụ ụgwọ ụlọ nzukọ, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ha malitere imere onwe ha nnukwu aha na Orlando, Florida
Ndị otu ahụ mechara gbasaa
Nsikayesizwe David Junior Ngcobo (amụrụ na 11 Febụwarị na afọ 1997), nke a maara dịka Nasty C, bụ onye South Afrika na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị mixtapes atọ, otu bụ 'Undisputed' na EPs abụọ, Ngcobo wepụtara abọm mbụ ya Bad Hair (2016), na Strings and Bling (2018) nke jikọtara ma kwado njem mbụ ya, The Ivyson Tour
Ọ bụ onye kacha nta natara ihe nrite na 2015 South African Hip Hop Awards, ya bụ Best Freshman Award

Na ọnwa Machị afọ 2020, Nasty C bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta na Def Jam Records, ma wepụta egwu ya na United States mgbe ọ sonyere Def Jam, 'There They Go', nke mere ka a mara ya n'ụwa niile, o weputara abọm nke atọ ya na 28 Ọgọstụ afọ 2020, na nke mbụ ya na akara nke akpọrọ Zulu Man with Some Power (2020)
A mụrụ Nsikayesizwe David Junior Ngcobo na 11 Febụwarị na afọ 1997 na Diepkloof, mpaghara Soweto, Johannesburg
Mgbe nne ya nwụrụ nke nwere ihe mberede ụgbọ ala mgbe ọ dị ọnwa iri na otu, ọ kwagara Durban, Kwa-Zulu Natal ka nna ya, David Maviyo Ngcobo, bụ onye njikwa akụ na ụba mmadụ zụlite ya
O nwere nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya, Siyabonga Ngcobo, onye mere ka ọ rap ka ọ mụtara ihe ndị bụ isi nke imepụta egwu site n'aka ya mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu
Ngcobo gara Strelitzia Secondary School na Lotus Park, Durban ebe ọ gụsịrị klas nke iri na abụọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, Ngcobo wepụtara mixtape mbụ ya One Kid, a Thousand Coffins na 14 Mee afọ 2012
O weputara EP mbụ ya LAME (Levitating Above My Enemies) na 4 Eprel 2014
N'afọ sochirinụ na 10 Febụwarị, ọ wepụtara mixtape ya nke abụọ Price City nke mepụtara egwu 'Juice Back' nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama
'Juice Back' mechara mepụta Gemini Major-produced remix nke gosipụtara onye na-agụ egwú Davido na onye na-eti egwu Cassper Nyovest na 20 Nọvemba afọ 2015
Na 11 Febụwarị afọ 2016, Ngcobo wepụtara 'Hell Naw' nke e mechara kpughee na ọ bụ onye ndu site na abọm izizi ya na-abịanụ
Na 23 Septemba, Ngcobo wepụtara abọm izizi ya, Bad Hair n'okpuru Mabala Noise Entertainment
Maka ihe osise nke abọm ahụ, o mere ka ndị na-akwado ya na Twitter zigara ya ozi email foto ha na-egosi oge ntutu isi ọjọọ ha, o wee jikọta ihe osise niile n'ụzọ nka na-achịkọta ihu ya
Bad Hair ruru nọmba otu na chaatị mpaghara iTunes ma bụrụ abọm kachasị egwu na South Africa n'ime awa iri abụọ na anọ ya
Ngcobo wepụtara ihe nkiri nkeji iri na anọ nke gosipụtara egwu atọ sitere na Bad Hair nke Kyle Lewis duziri

Obere ihe nkiri ahụ nke gụnyere egwu 'Don't Do It', 'Good Girls and Snapchat Hoes' na 'Phases' nke gosipụtara Rowlene, gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ mba gụnyere France, Germany, United Kingdom na United States, nke na-adịkarịghị maka vidiyo Afrika

Na 2 Disemba afọ 2016, Ngcobo wepụtara nsụgharị agbatị maka Bad Hair aha ya bụ Bad Hair Extensions Bad Hair Extension gosipụtara egwu anọ ọhụrụ gụnyere egwu ndu Allow nke gosipụtara onye egwu America French Montana
N'inweta ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka afọ 2016 na afọ 2017, Ngcobo natara nhọpụta ya kachasị nke bụ maka 2017 BET Award for Best International Act Africa ebe Wizkid meriri ya
A họpụtakwara ya maka 2017 MTV Europe Music Awards Ngcobo nọ n'ọkwa nke atọ na afọ 2016 MTV Base SA's Hottest MCs N'afọ 2017, a họọrọ ya ọzọ n'otu ihe omume ahụ, na nke ugbu a n'ọkwa nke anọ
Na 16 Febụwarị, Ngcobo bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkesa na Universal Music Africa na mmekorita ya na Universal Music South Africa na nkwekọrịta ntinye akwụkwọ talent na UMG Live Africa

Na 1 June, n'oge nleta ya na Naịjirịa, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkesa na Universal Music Group Nigeria, tupu ewepụta egwu ya, 'Jungle' na 'King' nke gosipụtara onye egwu America A $ AP Ferg, site na abọm nke abụọ ya, Strings and Bling N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2018, n'oge mgbasa ozi na Premium Times, onye isi njikwa nke Universal Music Group Nigeria, Ezegozie Eze kwuru 'Strings na Bling bụ ihe akaebe maka nkà, ọrụ aka na agụụ nke ọ na-eweta na egwuregwu ya oge ọ bụla, anyị nwere obi ụtọ iweta ọrụ a magburu onwe ya n'ahịa
' A tọhapụrụ Strings na Bling na 6 Julaị afọ 2018 na usoro dijitalụ na nke anụ ahụ
TimesLIVE kpọrọ Strings na Bling otu n'ime abọm hip hop kachasị mma na South Africa, e tinyekwara ya na ndepụta nke abọm hip hop na magazin Tina
Egwu ndị ọzọ nke abọm ahụ gụnyere 'SMA' nke gosipụtara Rowlene, na egwu nkwado 'Gravy'
Na 20 Ọgọstụ afọ 2018, Ngcobo guzobere akara ndekọ nke ya, Tall Racks Records Onye na-agụ egwu ya ogologo oge bụ Rowlene bụ onye mbụ bịanyere aka n'okpuru akara ahụ, ya na ya onwe ya
Ngcobo malitere Ivyson Tour na 6 Ọktoba afo 2018, na Melrose Arch na Johannesburg
Njem ahụ nwere ihe ngosi ise n'usoro (abụọ na South Africa na otu na Namibia) bụ ihe ịga nke ọma na ndị bịara ya
Na ngwụcha afọ 2018, a họọrọ ya na MTV Base SA's Hottest MCs nke ugboro atọ n'usoro, na ebe nke atọ
N'ihe banyere afọ 2019, a kpọrọ Ngcobo onye nnọchi anya nke ụlọ ọrụ ịkwa akwa nwoke, Axe South Africa Na afọ 2019 Dstv Mzansi Viewers Choice Awards a họpụtara egwu ya 'SMA (Vol
1)' nke gosipụtara Rowlene maka Favourite Song Of the Year
Na Nọvemba 24, afọ 2019, o nwetara ihe nrite AFRIMA abụọ gụnyere Best African Rapper / Lyricist na Best African Collaboration
A họpụtakwara ya n'elu MTV Base SA's Hottest MCs maka afọ 2019, oge nke anọ ya n'usoro na ndepụta ahụ
Ngcobo mere nkeji nke atọ nke njem egwu ya, The Ivyson Tour, nke malitere na 20 Septemba afọ 2019, na Cape Town, South Africa
Na 27 Septemba na afọ 2019, ọ wepụtara 'God Flow' nke gosipụtara onye na-eti egwu okpuezeYung, onye ndu nke abọm studio nke atọ ya na-abịanụ, Zulu Man with Some Power
A kọrọ na e nwere ndị na-ese ihe na mba ụwa ga-apụta na abọm ahụ
Na ọnwa Machị afọ 2020, Billboard kọrọ na Nasty C bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta na Def Jam Records, na ntọhapụ nke otu 'There They Go' dị ka nke mbụ ya n'okpuru akara ahụ
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, Nasty C wepụtara EP ọhụụ Lost Files, ya na abụ ndị e gosipụtara na ihe nkiri na YouTube
Ọ kọwara echiche EP ahụ na-ekwu, sị 'Ha bụ abụ ndị na-emeghị ya na ọrụ ụfọdụ, abụ ndị mechara bụrụ naanị echiche' N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Mee, e bugoro EP ahụ na Apple Music
Na 20 Mee 2020, Nasty C mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ọrụ cameo na akụkụ isii nke Netflix African mbụ na-eto eto na-eto eto Blood & Water, na-arụ ọrụ nke Zhero
Na 28 Mee 2020, Nasty C bịanyere aka na Universal Music Group flagship Def Jam Africa
N'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Juun, Nasty C sonyeere onye egwu America bụ TI
maka egwu ngagharị iwe 'They Don't'
Ihe a na-enweta site na abụ ahụ na-abara òtù ndị na-abaghị uru uru uru uru uru uru ruo mgbe nnwere onwe na ego, na okwu na-ezo aka na ogbugbu George Floyd
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Juun, ya na DJ Whoo Kid wepụtara mixtape, nke akpọrọ Zulu
Mgbe ọtụtụ oge gasịrị, na 6 Ọgọstụ 2020, Nasty C gara na soshal midia ya ma kwupụta na a ga-ewepụta abọm ya a na-atụ anya ya Zulu Man with Some Power n'ime ọnwa Ọgọstụ
O wepụtara ndepụta egwu nke nwere egwu iri abụọ nke gosipụtara ndị egwu mba ụwa na South Africa, gụnyere Lil Keed, Ari Lennox, Lil Gotit, TI, Tellaman na Rowlene
E wepụtara abọm ahụ na 28 Ọgọstụ 2020
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020, Nasty C meriri ihe nrite Best Male Rap Act na mmemme African Muzik Magazine Awards 2020
Na Disemba 2020, ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke atọ na MTV Base SA's Hottest MCs list, nke ugboro ise ya n'usoro ịpụta na ndepụta ahụ
Na June 2021, o wepụtara otu egwu akpọrọ 'Best I Ever Had'
Na emume nke isii nke All Africa Music Awards, ọ natara nhọpụta atọ maka Songwriter of the Year, Best Male Artist in Southern Africa na Best African Rapper/Lyricist
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke atọ ọzọ na 2021 MTV Base SA's Hottest MCs list, nke isii ya n'usoro na ndepụta ahụ
Na Mee 2022, ọ malitere Ivyson Army Tour malitere Mee 7 (Bloemfontein); njem ahụ gụnyere ụbọchị 5 nke ga-amalite na Mee 7 ruo June 4, 2022
Àtụ Nasty C
Natália Pedro da Costa Umbelina Neto (3 Nọvemba 1951) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị si São Tomé na Príncipe, onye jere ozi dị ka minista mba ọzọ n'etiti afọ 2012 ruo afọ 2014
N'etiti afọ 1990 ruo afọ 1999, Umbelina Neto bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke UNESCO National Commission na São Tomé na Príncipe
N'afọ 2007, ọ nwetara PhD
na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadum Aix-Marseille na ọmụmụ nke mmekọrịta ọha na eze na akụ na ụba nke São Tomé na Príncipe n'etiti afọ 1853 ruo afọ 1903
Natalia Danielle Dyer (amuru Jenụwarị 13, 1995) [lower-alpha 1] bụ onye omere America
A maara ya maka ọrụ ịgba egwu ya dị ka Nancy Wheeler na usoro akụkọ ifo sayensị Netflix egwu egwu Stranger Things (2016 – ugbu a)
A mụrụ Dyer ma zụlite ya na Nashville, Tennessee, guru akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Nashville School of Arts
Na 2011, ọ pụtara na The Greening nke Whitney Brown
Dyer wee bụrụ kpakpando na fim indie M Kwere na Unicorns, nke malitere na 2014 na SXSW
Na 2016, a tụbara Dyer dị ka Nancy Wheeler na usoro Netflix Stranger Things
Na 2019, Dyer gbara egwu dị ka Coco na ihe nkiri egwu Netflix Velvet Buzzsaw
Dyer kwagara mba New York City wee debanye aha na NYU na 2013, na-agụ akwụkwọ na Gallatin School of Individualized Study
Kemgbe 2016, Dyer anọwo na mmekọrịta ya na onye otu kpakpando Stranger Things, Charlie Heaton
Ihie nlere anya ndi ọzọ deputara afọ amụrụ ya dika 1997, mànà ọ bu ihie mgbagwoju anya maka etu Dyer na onwe ya ji kwuo maka ya
Natalia Molebatsi bụ onye odee South Afrika, onye na-ede uri na onye ọrụ omenala

Ọ zụlitere nnukwu ndị na-eso ya site na ebe a na-edebe uri uri ya, a na-ekwupụtakwa ya na ọ bụ onye 'bụ onye kpatara iwebata ọrụ Alice Walker na Toni Morrison n'ọgbọ mgbe ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Afrika' Ọ bi na Johannesburg
A mụrụ Natalia Molebatsi ma zụlite ya na obodo Tembisa, na nso Johannesburg na South Afrika
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke mkpokọta uri South Africa akpọrọ We Are…A uri Anthology (Penguin Books, 2008), na onye dere Sardo Dance (Geko, 2009)
Ọ bụ onye guzobere otu egwu Soul Making, na na afo 2015 ewepụtara CD ya Natalia Molebatsi & The Soul Making

Ọrụ ya gụnyere akwụkwọ ozi na South Afrika Ndị na-ede uri na-akpọ steeti ka ha nye iwu, obi ụtọ na-atọ ụtọ-osisi Anthology of Contemporary International Poetry, New Coin, Anthology of World Poetry (2010), na New Daughters of Africa (2019)
nke Margaret Busby deziri), n'ime akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Edemede prose ya apụtala na akwụkwọ akụkọ agụmakwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, dị ka Muziki, ma sụgharịa ya n'asụsụ Italian na Dutch n'ụdị oge dị ka Kuma na Les Simpledadi

Na mgbakwunye na nnabata, ịhazi na isonye na ogbako na mmemme na South Afrika, Molebatsi emeela uri ma kwadoo ihe omumu ihe omumu ihe okike na mba uwa, tinyere na mahadum na mmemme na Naijiria, Senegal, Kenya, Zimbabwe, England, Italy, Azerbaijan, Argentina, Palestine na Germany, ma soro ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Lebo Mashile, Alice Walker na Simphiwe Dana kerịta ọkwa ahụ
Molebatsi mere na afo 2009 Women in Africa na African Diaspora International Conference in Nigeria na 2012 Cultural Olympiad na London, na-anọchi anya South Afrika
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na UNISA Press na South African Literary Awards (SALA) dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi / ọrụ na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
Ọ bụkwa ya na-ahụ maka mbipụta nke ọtụtụ ndị na-ede uri South Afrika na ndị na-ede akụkọ mkpirisi site na ọkwa ya na UNISA
Natalie Ball (amụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Klamath / Modoc nké dị na Chiloquin, Oregon
A mụrụ ya na Portland, Oregon, Ball debara áhà ya na Klamath Tribes
Ọ bụkwa ónyé Africa-America, Modoc, na Anglo-American
Ball bụ nwa Kientpaush, nkè a makwaara dị ka Captain Jack (1837 rụo 1873), ónyé isi nke duuru ndị Modocs lụso United States ọgụ na 1872 Modoc War
Nna nna ya bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, nwanne nne ya Peggy Ball, bụ ónyé na'ime ákwà
Ezinụlọ ya si n'ala Klamath kwaga Portland, Oregon, mgbe e weputara Klamath Termination Act na 1954
Ball nwèrè ụmụ atọ, gụnyere nwa nwanyị Lofanitani Tiago
Ball nwetara nzèrè bachelọ ya na nka na ọmụmụ agbụrụ na Mahadum Oregon, na nzere masta ya na Maori Visual Arts na Mahadim Massey na Palmerston North, New Zealand
O nwetara MFA ya na Yale University School of Art na eserese na óbìbì akwụkwọ na 2018
Ọrụ nka Ball gụnyere nka ntinye, nka arụmọrụ, nka akwa ngwakọta, ihe ọkpụkpụ, ihe osise, ihe osisa, na obibi akwụkwọ
Uwe ya na-ejikọkarị okwu ndị a dụkọtara ọnụ na akwa na ụmụ bebi nke na-adabere na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke Modoc na Klamath
Nwanne nne ya kụziiri ya ime akwa mgbè Ball dị obere, na-akpali ónyé omenkà toro eto ịma echiche banyéré ihe, ọrụ nne, na akwa
Ball egosila na mba ụwa, gụnyere na Hungary na New Zealand
O nwetara MFA na eserese na óbìbì akwụkwọ na Yale University School of Art na 2018

Na mba, Ball egosila na Seattle Art Museum, Portland Art Museum, IAIA Museum of Contemporary Native Arts, SOMArts, Disjecta Contemporary Art Center, na Nerman Museum of Contemporary Art, ebe o mepụtara ihe ntinye, Mapping Coyote Black na 2015
Ọtụtụ onyinye Ball gụnyere MRG Foundation's Lilla Jewel Fund Award, Santo Foundation Award, na Oregon Arts Commission's Joan Shipley Award (2016)
Ọzọkwa na 2016, Oregon Arts Commission kpọrọ Ball onye na-ese ihe n'otu n'otu
N'afọ 2018, ụlọ ngosi nka Seattle nyere ya Betty Bowen Award
N'afọ 2019, Crow's Shadow Institute of the Arts nyere ya Golden Spot Residency Award
Natalie Mwagale (a mụrụ na Septemba 7, 1993) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Kenya
Ọ gbara bọọlụ basketball maka ndị na-ahụ maka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Kenya na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Kenya
Mwagale na-agba maka otu basketball nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Kenya
Mwagale na-agba bọọlụ basketball 3 × 3 maka otu basketball nke Kenya 3 × 3
Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ maka ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwanyị Kenya, na-asọ mpi asọmpi ụmụnwanyị Afrobasket 2021 ebe ọ nwetara isi 8, jiri isi 47 na enyemaka 43 lọta
Natalie Myburgh (na 15 Mee, na afọ 1940 na 21 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2014) bụ onye na-egwu mmiri na South Africa
Na 1954 British Empire na Commonwealth Games na Auckland, Myburgh sonyeere Felicity Loveday, Joan Harrison na Machduldt Petzer iji merie 4×110 yards freestyle relay
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị na afo 1956 Summer Olympics na Melbourne, Myburgh sonyeere Susan Roberts, Moira Abernethy na Jeanette Myburough iji merie 4 × 100 m freestyle relay
Natalya Petrova (née Kokulenko; amụrụ ya na ọwa 16 Nọvemba 1957) Ọ bụ nwanyị emba Russia ọ bu onye na-agba ọsọ track and field hurdler onye na-asọ mpi maka Soviet Union na 100 mita hurdles
Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya na 1983 World Championships in Athletics na ahu 1982 European Athletics Indoor Championships, na-emecha nke anọ n'oge abụọ ahụ
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ọtụtụ ihe nrite ọla edo na sprint hurdles na ahụ 1983 Universiade
Ọ bụ onye mmeri mba otu oge, ebe ọ meriri ihe mgbochi mita 60 na 1982 Soviet Indoor Championships
O nwetara ihe kachasị mma ya na World Championships na 1983, na-agba ọsọ nke 1283 sekọnd na iru eru
Natasha Hadiza Akpoti ( amuru n'afọ 1979) bu onye okaiwu Naijiria, onye elekọta mmadụ ọchunta ego na onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi
Ọ zọrọ oche nke Etiti Kogi Sinetorịa Distrikti (SDP) n'okpuru Otu Igwe Mmadụ Onye Kwuo Uche ya n'afọ 2019
Ọ gbara aka na ntuliaka gọvanọ steeti Kogi nke mere na abalị 16 nke ọnwa Nọvemba 2019
Ọ bụ onye chọpụtara Builders Hub Impact Investment Program (BHIIP)
Natasha, nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ anọ, na otu nwa nwanyi nke nna Naijiria na nne onye Ukraine
Nne ya, Ludmila Kravchenk, bụ onye Ukraine si na Rakitna di na mpaghara Chernivtsi
Nna ya, Dr
Jimoh Abdul Akpoti, bu onye Obeiba-Ihima, dI na Kogi Steeti
Ọ nọrọ n'afọ ndị mbụ ya na Ihima, Okene Ọchịchị Ime Obodo Nna ya nwụnahụrụ ya n'afọ 1998 ya mere ezinaụlọ ahụ ji kwaga ebe ọzọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Abuja bido na 2000 ruo 2004 wee gụchaa were bachelọ nke iwu pụta
Akpọrọ ya oku ka onye ọka iwu Naijiria na 2005 ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ọkàiwu Naijiria dị na Abuja
Na 2011, ọ gara n'ihu ị ga Mahadum Dundee wee gụchaa jide ogo na Ndi Ịsị Iwu n'afo 2012
O jide Nnaukwu Nke Azụmahịa Nchịkwa na Njikwa Mmanụ na Gas na Mahadum Dundee
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ọkàiwu Naijiria, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ọla Kọpa NLG dị ka onye ndụmọdụ n'ihe gbasara iwu site na 2007 ruo 2010
Na 2015, o guzobere Builders Hub Impact Investment Program (BHIIP)
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama na mba ka o nyechara akụkọ nyocha na Ọgbakọ Mbana 1 Maachị 2018 maka ọrụ rụrụ arụ gbasara igwe igwe Ajaokuta
Mịnịstrị na-ahụ maka mpụta na nchara nchara nke Gọọmenti Etiti kwugidere akụkọ a na ebo Akpoti ebubo na ọ kpachaara anya na-akọwa hie ndị ụlọ nnọchiteanya
Otu ndị na-ere nchara n'obere boro Akpoti ebubo na-eme mkpọsa nkwado iji mebie ọchịchị na ime ka ụfọdụ ọdịmma ụlọ ọrụ baa ọgaranya
Ụlọikpe ukwu nọ n'Abuja nyere iwu ka onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Ikike, Ifeanyi Uba na Williams Orji kwụọ Natasha Akpoti ego pụtara nde naira iri maka akwụkwọ nkwutọ ha bipụtara imegide ya
N'afọ 2018, o kwuputara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa Sinetọ na-anọchite anya Etiti Kogi na Sinetị Naijiria n'okpuru nche anwụ nke Social Democratic Party (SDP)
Natasha Akpoti bu onye Okehi dị na Kogi steeti
Ọ bu onye Ebiraland
Ọ bụ nne ụmụaka atọ
Natasha Marin bụ onye na-ese ihe na Seattle, ónyé na-ede uri, na ónyé na-eme ihe ike nke nwere mgbọrọgwụ na Trinidad na Canada, ónyé ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na ndị mmadụ, ọbọdọ, na ọgwụgwọ
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya Reparations (ebe nrụọrụ weebụ), nke nwetara nlebara anya mba na 2016, yana màkà ọrụ nka ya na akwụkwọ a na-akpọ BLACK IMAGINATION, nke McSweeney bipụtara
Marin bụ onye isi ndụmọdụ maka NONWHITEWORKS, ma depụta ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 30 'Run This City' site na magazin Seattle Metropolitan na 2018
Marin bụ ónyé guzobere Seattle People of Color Salon (SPoCS)
Black Imagination bụ ọrụ nka echiche nke Marin na akwụkwọ nke otu aha ahụ
Ọrụ ahụ malitere site na ihe ngosi nka na Jenụwarị 2018 nke akpọrọ ŌBlack Imagination The States of Matter,ʹ na CORE Gallery na Seattle
Ihe ngosi ahụ sochiri ihe ngosi abụọ ọzọ n'okpuru aha Black Imagination ŌThe (g)The (g)
Nke ọ bụla n'ime ihe ngosi nka atọ dabeere na ọdịyo, nke echiche na gbụrụ-gbúrụ Seattle ka e mere iji gbasaa, etiti, ma jide ihe ngosi dị iche iche nke olu ojii
Ọrụ ahụ gàrà n'ihu n'ụdị akwụkwọ uri, ntụgharị uche, na akụkọ nke Marin haziri nke a na-akpọ 意 BLACK IMAGINATION Black Voices on Black Futures
E wepụtara akwụkwọ ahụ na Hugo House na Seattle na Jenụwarị 2020, McSweeney bipụtara ya na Febụwarị 2020
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwetara nlebara ányà mbà, na The Paris Review na-ekwu, olu iri atọ na isii dị n'akwụkwọ ahụ na-ada ụda n'onwe ha ma nwee ike miri emi mgbè Marin jikọtara ọnụ

A tụleghachikwara akwụkwọ ahụ na Los Angeles Review ma Jason Reynolds tụrụ aro ya na PBS NewsHour A gbara Marin ajụjụ ọnụ banyéré akwụkwọ ahụ na KUOW-FM Forum Black voices, origins, and futures, na KEXP-FM, SãoSound & Vision Natasha Marin na Black Imaginations, zuru ezu na ndepụta nke akụkọ mmalite site na akwụkwọ ahụ
Natasha Mostert bụ onye odee South Afrika na onye na-ese ihe na-ebi ugbu a na London
Amụrụ na Johannesburg South Afrika, Mostert tolitere na Johannesburg na Pretoria
O bi ugbu a na United Kingdom, na Chelsea, ọdịda anyanwụ London n'agbanyeghị na ọ ka nwere ụlọ na Stellenbosch na ala nna ya South Afrika
Mostert na-azụ dị ka onye kickboxer ma na-ebulikwa ego maka CPAU, ọrụ ebere Afghan na-akụziri ụmụ nwanyị ka esi agba ọkpọ na inwe mmetụta na-enye ike na ndụ ha
Mostert gụrụ akwụkwọ na South Afrika, wee gụchaa Mahadum Columbia, New York
Dị ka onye edemede ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị op-ed, odela akwụkwọ maka New York Times, Newsweek, The Independent na Times
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi na Mahadum Witwatersrand, Johannesburg na n'ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn WNET na New York City tupu ọ malite ide ihe
-emeri akwụkwọ akụkọ otu aha
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, o bipụtala akwụkwọ akụkọ isii
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na ihe egwu mmụọ echiche efu nke oge a nwere isiokwu paranormal na ihe omimi
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, The Midnight Side, ma ihe omimi igbu ọchụ na akụkọ mmụọ, ka ewepụtara na afo 2000
Ihe sochiri ya bụ akụkụ nke ọzọ nke Silence (2001), onye na-akpali akpali banyere egwu na egwuregwu kọmputa, na Windwalker (2005), akụkọ ịhụnanya Gothic banyere igbu ọchụ, mgbapụta na ịlọ ụwa
Akwụkwọ ya nke anọ, Season of the Witch (2007) na-ekwu banyere ikiri anya, ụlọ ebe nchekwa na amoosu
Oge nke Witch meriri Akwụkwọ iji kwuo banyere World Book Day Award nke afo 2009 na onyinye £ 5,000 a na-enye CPAU, ọrụ ebere Afghan
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke ise bụ Onye na-echekwa ọkụ na uzuzu (nke ebipụtara dị ka The Keeper na UK) ma na-ekwu maka chi, mysticism, ịgba egwu na physics quantum
Ọ laghachiri na isiokwu nke ncheta na njirimara na akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụrụ ya, Ekpere Ọchịchịrị
Kirkus Reviews na -akọwa ya dị ka 'ihe na-akpali akpali nke ụbụrụ na-eme ngwa ngwa' nke Mostert 'na-ejikọta usoro ndu ndị na-adọrọ mmasị, nkà mmụta uche na ihe omimi'
Elsabe Natasha Ntlangwini (née Louw) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly of South Africa kemgbe Mee 2014
A mụrụ Ntlangwini na Pearston na Cape Province
Nna ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe ọkụ, ebe nne ya na-arụrụ ọrụ dị ka ihe na-esi nri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi
N'afọ 2002, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Parkdene High School
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ otu afọ na njikwa mma site na Mahadum nke South Africa
Ntlangwini sonyere na ma ndị ntorobịa nke ANC na ndị inyom
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na atọ , ọ sonyeere Economic Freedom Fighters mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọrụ ya
N'afọ sochirinụ, a họpụtara ya na National Assembly dị ka onye nnọchi anya otu
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na 2019
Ntlanwini lụrụ Sivuyile
Na Jenụwarị 2020, ọ mụrụ nwa nwanyị nke anọ
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn Honeytown, Tarzan The Epic Adventures and Scandal!
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa odee, ọkà okwu mkpali na onye ndụmọdụ
A mụrụ ya na 20 November 1970 na Durban, South Africa dị ka ada nke ndị n'eme ihe omume egwu bụ Geoffrey Sutherland na Kenlynn Ashby
Ọ lụrụ Steve Hofmeyr, onye South Africa na-agụ egwú, onye na-ede abụ, na onye na-eme ngosi TV
Ha lụrụ na 1998 ma mesịa gbaa alụkwaghịm na 2008 na-ekwu maka mmekọrịta afọ iri nke Steve na onye nkuzi ahụike Janine van der Vyver
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ Benjamin na Sebastian
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na mmalite 1990 dị ka onye na-egosi ụmụaka na-ihe ngosi Kideo
Mgbe ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe omume soap opera bụ , Egoli The place of Gold n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma na 1991
Na 1996, ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na usoro telivishọn abụọ Honeytown na Tarzan The Epic Adventures
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke usoro ndị ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na fim ụlọ nụ Operational Delta na 1997
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ malitere ịchị ụlọ ihe nkiri South Africa na ọtụtụ ihe omume ama ama dị ka Gigi na 1992 na The Revlon Girl
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ na-eduzi vidiyo egwu ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ Finesse Magazine
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, Sutherland bụkwa onye na-ekwu okwu mkpali ọha na-eme njem gafee mba ahụ yana ọkwa mba ụwa
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Ngwa ahia mma nke South Africa Beauty brand bu'Placecol' na 'DNB'
Ọ bụkwa onye edemede amara nke oma mma, nke o dere akwụkwọ mbụ ya Bittersweet
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma ya dị ka onye edemede, o mesịrị dee akwụkwọ Green na Blue na 2010 (akwụkwọ gbasara ụmụaka mbụ ya), Fairytale na Sprokie
Nate Lewis (amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
Lewis gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Virginia Commonwealth na Bachelor of Science na Nursing na 2009
Ihe osise Lewis na-agbaziri n'ụzọ dị ukwuu site na ọzụzụ ahụike ahụ iji nye ọrụ ndị ọ kọwara dị ka ndị 'rhythms na ndekọ nkè ndụ ndị mmadụ
adịghị ike, ọmịiko na nlekọta' metụtara
Ka ọrụ na ngosipụta nke ónyé na-ese ihe na-akụzi onwé ya na-aga n'ihu, ọ 'malitere iji ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na-eche echiche banyéré ọmịiko na ihe ọmịiko n'èzí ụlọ ọgwụ'
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Washington City Paper kọwara usoro ya dị ka '
Ọrụ ndị ahụ dị obéré, ọbụnakwa ihe osise ndị dị mfe ma kwụ ọtọ, nke e bipụtara na akwụkwọ nwere oghere na oji na ọcha
Lewis wee kpụọ akwụkwọ ahụ site na ịpị, ịkpụ, ma gbanye oghere nke ahụ iji mepụta ihe atọ dị iche iche nke na-apụta na ákwà

N'afọ 2019, ya na ónyé na-ese ihe n'okporo ámá Shepard Fairey na ndị ọzọ, Lewis malitere inyocha ojiji nke bọọdụ mgbasa ozi maka ebumnuche nka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iji mepụta ozi na-emegide Onye isi ala Trump tupu nleta Ónyé ísí ala na Cleveland
Lewis bụ ónyé mmeri mpaghara nke 2014 Bombay Sapphire Artisan Series (Washington DC)
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na US Art in Embassies Program, ọ dịkwa na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Mahadum Maryland na Yuko Nii Foundation
A họpụtara Lewis na 2014 dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na-eme ihe nkírí màkà Martha's Vineyard Art na mmemme Vine
NationLink Telecom bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta nke dị na Somalia
Abdirizak Ido, onye ọchụnta ego Somalia na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi oche na onye na-achịkwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, guzobere NationLink Telecom na Septemba 1997
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eweta ọrụ mgbasa ozi (TSP) na Somalia ma na-enye ozi ya na mba ahụ dum
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ lekwasịrị anya n'akụkụ bụ isi nke ekwentị mkpanaaka, ịntanetị na ọrụ ahịrị
Ụkpụrụ nke ibi ndụ
Nationlink so n'ime nnukwu ndị na-arụ ọrụ netwọk mkpanaka na mba ahụ

National Agency for the Great Green Wall (NAGGW) bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị Naijiria n'okpuru Federal Ministry of Environment (Nigeria), nke e guzobere iji dozie mmebi ala na ọzara, bulie nchekwa nri na nkwado obodo iji mee mgbanwe ihu igwe na steeti Naijiria nke Sokoto, Kebbi, Kastina, Zamfara, Kano, Jigawa, Bauchi, Gombe, Yobe, Borno, na Adamawa
NAGGW na-eje ozi dị ka ebe a na-elekwasị anya na Naijiria maka mmelite nke ọhụụ nke African Union Great Green Wall of the Sahara na Sahel project

Ebumnuche nke NAGGW bụ ịkwụsị ma gbanwee mmebi ala, gbochie mmebi nke ụdị dị iche iche, hụ na ka ọ na-erule afọ 2025, gburugburu ebe obibi na-eguzogide mgbanwe ihu igwe ma na-aga n'ihu na-enye ọrụ dị mkpa nke ga-enye aka na ọdịmma mmadụ na mkpochapụ ịda ogbenye

E guzobere National Agency for the Great Green Wall (NAGGW) site na Iwu nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu n'afọ 2015 iji mezuo ọhụ nke African Union na ndị isi ya na steeti nke gọọmentị Great Green Wall of the Sahara na ọrụ Sahel Initiative (GGWSSI) nke afọ 2007

Omume ahụ lekwasịrị anya na mgbalị iji lụso mmebi ala, ụkọ mmiri ozuzo na ọzara na egwu ndị ọzọ nke mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na mgbalị na usoro mmejuputa iji melite ihe ndị obodo ndị ahụ metụtara ma belata ngosipụta doro anya nke ịda ogbenye na iwulite ume nke ndị mmadụ na ihe omume nke mgbanwe ihu ọha
Ogologo usoro mmejuputa nke mmemme GGW na-ekpuchi steeti ndị dị n'ebe ugwu (Adamawa, Borno, Bauchi, Gombe, Jigawa, Kano, Katsina, Zamfara, Sokoto, Kebbi, na Yobe)

Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Onye isi ala nke Federal Republic of Nigeria họpụtara, onye na-aza ajụjụ maka mmezu nke iwu, mmemme na atụmatụ dịka Council kwadoro; na nchịkwa kwa ụbọchị nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
DG nke ugbu a bụ Dr Yusuf Maina-Bukar onye Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara n'ọnwa Eprel 1, afọ 2022 maka afọ anọ mgbe oge Dr Bukar Hassan gwụsịrị

National Agency for the Prohibition of Trafficking in Persons ( NAPTIP ) bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmanye iwu nke gọọmentị etiti Naijiria hibere na afọ 2003 iji luso ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na mmegide ikike mmadụ ndị ọzọ yiri ya
NAPTIP bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ dị n'okpuru nlekọta nke Federal Ministry of Humanitarian Affairs, Disaster Management and Social Development

E hiwere NAPTIP n'okpuru iwu gọọmentị etiti na Julaị 14, 2003 site na iwu ịzụ ahịa mmadụ (mmachibido iwu) nke Enforcement na Administration Act (2003) sitere na nkwado nke ndị Women Trafficking and Child Labour Eradication Foundation (WOTCLEF)
NAPTIP nwere ikike ịmanye iwu ịzụ ahịa mmadụ (Mgbochi) nke Enforcement na Administration Act (TIPPEA) na Nigeria
Iji hụ na arụru ọrụ ịlụso ịzụ ahịa mmadụ ọgụ nke ọma, ụlọ ọrụ a nwere ngalaba na nkeji ndị a
Nkeji
Ugbu a, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere iwu zonal 9 dị na Lagos, Benin, Enugu, Uyo, Sokoto, Maiduguri, Oshogbo, na Makurdi
Ụlọ ọrụ a na ndi otu na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị na-ejikọ aka ị rụ na steeti dị iche iche

Na 2013, NAPTIP malitere mmekorita ya na ndị Devatop Center for Africa Development, otu ndị ntorobịa na-eduzi ndị na-emegide ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, iji zụọ na inye ndị ntorobịa ike ịlụso ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na Nigeria ọgụ, yana nyocha ikpe na ịzọpụta ndị ọ metụtara
NAPTIP na-arụkọkwa ọrụ yana Network nke CSOs Against Child Trafficking, Abuse and Labour, Women Trafficking and Child Labor Eradication Foundation, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
NAPTIP rịọrọ ka akwalitekwuo nkwado sitere na aka Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, EFCC, ka were nwe ike ikpochapụ izụ ahịa mmadụ na ihe nsonazụ na-emebi onyinyo Nigeria
Arịrịọ a sitere n'aka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Imaan Sulaiman-Ibrahim
Kemgbe ọ malitere, ụlọ ọrụ a akpụkpula ma makwa mmadu 331 ikpe na ihe gbasara ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, site na ọnwa nke Septemba 2017
Site n'agbata afọ 2003 na 2017, NAPTIP agbapụtala ihe karịrị mmadụ 3000

Ụlọ ọrụ a na-ebute ụzọ n'ịgbapụta na imezigharị ndị Naijiria si Libya, site n'enyemaka nke Gọọmenti etiti, Ụlọ Ọrụ Mba Ụwa nke Migration, na ụlọ ọrụ ndi mba ụwa ọzọ, nke nwere ịja mma otuto site na United States
Àtụ International human rights organizations
Otu ndị ọrụ ntuziaka nke mba jikọtara etiti, mpaghara na parastatal (nke a na-akpọkarị The Manuel Workors) bụ òtù ọrụ na Botswana
Ụlọ ihe nkiri national theatre art, Nigeria bụ isi ebe maka nka na-eme ihe nkiri na Nigeria
Ihe ncheta ahụ dị na Iganmu, Surulere, Lagos
E wuchara ya na 1976 iji kwadebe maka Festival of Arts and Culture (FESTAC) na afọ 1977
Enwere ike ịkọwa National Theatre of Nigeria dị ka ụlọ ntụrụndụ
Nchịkwa ya na-agba mbọ iru ebumnuche nke e guzobere National Theatre, n'ihe gbasara ngosi, nchekwa na nkwalite nke nka na ọdịbendị na Naịjirịa
Dị ka gọọmentị etiti na-azụ ahịa, ọ kpebisiri ike ịgbasawanye ikike ya site n'ịghọwanye ihe ọhụrụ na ihe egwu iji bụrụ ihe dị mkpa na ahịa asọmpi
Amaritere ịlụ ogege national theatre art na oge Ọchịchị ndị agha nke General Yakubu Gowon malitere iwu ụlọ ihe nkiri National ma wuchaa ya n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha nke Olusegun Obasanjo
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2021, ọtụtụ ndị na-elekọta ụlọ a nwere ndị isi dịka Jimmy Folorunso Atte (1991 August 1999), Prọfesọ Babafemi A
Osofisan (2000 2004), Dr
Ahmed Parker Yerima (2006 August 2009), Kabir Yusuf (2009 August 2016), George Ufot, (Late) Dr
(Mrs) Stella Oyedepo, Prọfesọ Sunday Enessi Ododo, fsonta, FNAL
E mere mpụga ụlọ ihe nkiri kpụọ ma wuo ya ka ọ dị ka okpu agha
Na mbụ, o nwere ike inabata opekanpe mmadụ dika 5,000 nke nwere ikpo okwu na-ada ada, na ụlọ ihe nkiri abụọ nwere ike, nke niile nwere ihe owuwu maka ntụgharị asụsụ 8 n'otu oge; n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ ihe nkiri National, Naịjirịa bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ nke Bulgaria (Techno Exporstroy) haziri ma wuo ya
Alhaji Sule Katagum bụ onye nwe ya na onye isi oche ha
Ebe ndị njem nleta a hụrụ n'anya nke ukwu maka omenala ọdịbendị na arụmọrụ n'etiti ndị ọzọ na-aga n'ihu ugbu a
N'afọ 2005, Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo kwupụtara atụmatụ ime ka ụlọ ihe nkiri National Theatre bụrụ nke onwe

Nke a kpatara esemokwu n'etiti ndị na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ na ndị na-ede egwuregwu na Naijiria dị ka Wole Soyinka Na 30 Disemba N'afọ 2014, a kọrọ na ereela ụlọ ihe nkiri National na ụlọ ọrụ Dubai maka ego $ 40million, nakwa na a ga-agbanwe ụlọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ahịa na-enweghị ụtụ isi
Mgbasa ozi na Dalit Human Rights (NCDHR), nke e hiwere n'afọ1998, ugbu a nwere usoro ọrụ anọ, nke ọ bụla n'ime ha na-arụ ọrụ iji kpochapụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ megide Dalits na India
Ọ dabeere na Delhi ma nwee isi n'ebe ndị ọzọ na mba ahụ
O kwuputala ebumnuche ya iji nweta mmụba n'ihe banyere nsogbu Dalit ma jide steeti, n'ụdị usoro ikpe ziri ezi ya, maka ọdịda ya

E hiwere y'à na 1998 site na ndị Dalit na ndị na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na mmeghachi omume na enweghị mmanye nke Ihe nkedo ahaziri ahazi na agbụrụ akwadoro (Mgbochi arụrụ arụ) Iwu, 1989, NCDHR nwere isi na 14 nke steeti India site na 2003
Ebumnuche mbụ ya bụ iji mee ka ndị India na ndị mba ụwa na-ege ntị pụta ìhè ma na-ahụ okwu Dalit ma na iji mee ka steeti ahụ zaa ajụjụ maka ebubo ya na ọ dara inye ikpe ziri ezi na usoro iwu mpụ
Mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri nke ịdị adị, NCDHR hibere mkpọsa anọ, nke ọ bụla lekwasịrị anya n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke ịkpa ókè

A na-akpọ Dalit Arthik Adhikar Andolan (DAAA), All India Dalit Mahila Adhikar Manch (AIDMAM), National Federation of Dalit Land Rights Movement (NFDLRM) na National Dalit Movement for Justice (NDMJ) Ndị a strands bụ, dị ka Rafto Foundation, n'otu n'otu ezubere iji lebara ya anya
Ná mpaghara oge ahụ, NCDHR malitere ịchọpụta, ịkwalite na ịkwado mmekorita n'etiti òtù ndị ọzọ Dalit na-arụ ọrụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ nakweere usoro nhazi a, n'afọ 2009, e guzobere National Dalit Watch (NDW)

O sochiri nyocha sara mbara nke emere na tsunami nke afọ 2004 na mgbe e mesịrị nke nnukwu idei mmiri na Bihar (afọ 2007 rụọ afọ 2008), nke NCDHR kwuru na ọ gosipụtara ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na mmemme nnapụta n'oge ọdachi
Kemgbe ọ malitere, e meela ngwá ọrụ na ụzọ dị iche iche iji chọpụta, kpughee ma dekọọ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma jiri ahụmịhe nke ndị mmadụ metụta ụkpụrụ nduzi nchịkwa ọdachi site n'aka gọọmentị etiti
E nyere NCDHR Rafto Prize n'afọ 2007 maka ọrụ ya na-akwalite ikike Dalit na maka ịkpalite mkparịta ụka màkà okwu ahụ na mba ụwa
Ọ rụkọrọ ọrụ na mba ụwa na òtù dị ka United Nations na International Dalit Solidarity Network
National Centre for Atmospheric Science (NCAS) bụ ebe nyocha a raara nyé ọganihu nke sayensị ikuku, nkè Natural Environment Research Council (NERC) kwadoro
NCAS bụ otu n'ime ụlọ nyocha isii nke NERC, e guzobere ya n'afọ 2002 iji nyé UK ikike mba na nyocha sayensị ikuku na teknụzụ
Usoro nyocha NCAS gụnyere
NCAS na-enye ndị na-eme nchọpụta na UK ụlọ ọrụ sayensị na ọrụ ndị na-enyere ákà sayensị ikuku dị mma na mba
Ndị a gụnyere ụgbọ elu na-eduga n'ụwa, ngwá ọrụ dị n'ala, na ịnweta ụdị kọmputa na ụlọ ọrụ màkà ịchekwa na ịnweta data sayensị
NCAS adịghị n'otu ébé, a na-ekesa ndị ọrụ ya, ụlọ ọrụ na ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ mahadum UK na ụlọ ọrụ ndị metụtara ya
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị nà Leeds National Centre For Atmospheric Science Fairbairn House 71-75 Clarendon Road Leeds LS2 9PH Tel +44 (0) 113 34 36408
National Commercial Bank Limited, nke a maara dị ka NCB, bụ ụlọ ọrụ ego nke dị na Mauritius na isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Port Louis
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa nyere ikike nke Bank of Mauritius, ụlọ akụ etiti obodo na onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke mba ahụ
E debanyere aha National Commercial Bank Limited na Thursday April 9, 2015 ma nye ya ikikere ụlọ akụ azụmahịa site na Bank of Mauritius na Friday April 10, 2015
National Commercial Bank nwetara akụ na ụgwọ ụfọdụ nke Bramer Banking Corporation ugbu a
Nke a bụ mgbe ụlọ akụ nke Mauritius wepụrụ ikike ụlọ akụ nke Bramer Banking Corporation na-esote nsogbu ego na ụlọ akụ ahụ
E mere mbufe akaụntụ akụ na ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ Bramer mbụ na NCB na Satọde Eprel 11, 2015
Na Mọnde Jenụwarị 4, 2016, NCB jikọtara na steeti Mauritius Post na ụlọ ọrụ nkwado iji guzobe Bank Mauritius (MauBank)
Ụlọ akụ ahụ e guzobere ọhụrụ natara ikikere ụlọ akụ n'otu ụbọchị ahụ

Ndị nduzi nke National Commercial Bank bụ
National Commission for Person with Disabilities (NCPD) bụ ụlọ ọrụ na Naijiria
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2012
Ebumnuche nke ụlọ ọrụ a bụ igbochi ịkpa ókè, mmegide ndị nwere nkwarụ, na ime ka onye ọ bụla n'ime ha nwee ikike na ohere nha anya dịka ndị ogbo ha na-enweghị nkwarụ
E hiwere NCPD dị ka ntụgharị nke iwu (Prohibition) Act, 2019 iji gbochie ịkpa oke megide ndị nwere nkwarụ na iji hụ na nsonye ha na mpaghara ọ bụla
agụmakwụkwọ mba, ahụike na ndị ọrụ jikọrọ aka (NEHAWU) bụ òtù ọrụ aka na South Africa
N'inwe ndị otu 276,000 ọ bụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze na mba ahụ
Ọ na-ahazi ndị ọrụ steeti, ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ na ọdịmma
E guzobere njikọ ahụ na 1987, mgbe
Otu ahụike na ndị ọrụ jikọrọ aka rụrmọ o eae ụeh T

jikọtara ya na General and alliedworkers 'Union na South African Allies ' Union

National Financial Credit Bank SA (NFCB) bụ ụlọ akụ azụmahịa na Cameroon
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akụ azụmahịa iri na anọ nwere ikikere na mba ahụ
Emebere NFCB na 1989 ka ụlọ ọrụ kredit ego nke mba (NFCC)
Kemgbe mmalite ya, NFCC rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa ego na kredit
N'afọ 2006, NFCC nwetara ikikere ụlọ akụ zuru oke ma degharịa aha ya ugbu a

N'elu ntụzịaka nke Central Bank of Central African States, Loita Capital Partners International, ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ na-ahụ maka itinye ego na Mauritius, ka a kpọrọ ka itinye ego na NFCB ma nye nduzi nkà na ụzụ na ọkachamara n'oge mgbanwe site na ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa ego na kredit gaa na nke zuru oke
ụlọ akụ azụmahịa
Ọ bụ nwoke Oshie si West Cameroon nke aha ya bụ Awanga guzobere ya
N'ime Jenụwarị 2007, NFCC nwere alaka asaa nwere netwọk n'ofe Cameroon
Ebe nkiri ihe onyonyoo nke National Gallery of Modern Art, Lagos (NGMA) bụ nnukwu ụlọ ngosi ǹkà dị na Steeti Lagos, obodo kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ ihe nlere anya na-adịgide adịgide nke Ministri n'ahụ maka Njem nlere anya, Omenala na Nhazi ọha nke gọọmentị etiti Naijiria hiwere
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ dị n'ime National Arts Theatre, na ụzọ mbanye nke B
Ụlọ nkiri National Gallery of Modern Art dị okpukpu abụọ
Ụlọ nke ala ya bụ nnukwu ụlọ nzukọ nke National Arts Theatre
N'elu, a na-egosipụta ihe ngosi nke ǹkà nke oge a, gụnyere ihe osise mara mma dị iche iche nke gụnyere nke Bruce Onobrakpeya na ọla nchara nke Ben Osawe
E nwekwara ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ na ọbá akwụkwọ
Akụkụ ihe ngosi Portrait Gallery gụnyere ma foto nke oge a na nke ndị mbụ nke ndị ámà àmá, gụnyere ndị isi ala niile enwerela na Naijiria
Ọ gụnyere foto nke ndị na-ese ihe dịka Aina Onabolu, Chief Hubert Ogunde, Chinua Achebe, Wole Soyinka na Ọkammụta Ben Enwonwu
Akụkụ na-ejide ọrụ nke ndị nna ukwu na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na Naijiria gụnyere ọrụ Akinola Lasekan, Erhabor Emokpae, Ọkammụta Solomon Wangboje, Bruce Onobrakpeya, Haig David West na Gani Odutokun
Akụkụ ihe ọkpụkpụ nke oge a na-egosi ihe ọkpụchụ Naijiria na-adịbeghị anya, na-egosi na ọ na-aga n'ihu na ụdị ndị mbụ dị ka ọdịbendị Nok mana ugbu a ọ bụgasi omenala na ihe omimi na àgwà
Akụkụ ndị ọzọ na-etinye aka na arịa, ihe osise sitere na mba ndị enyi, ntụnyere nke mgbasa ozi na ụdị, ihe osisa iko na akwa
Nkà akwa nke oge a na Naịjirịa na-adabere na ọdịnala bara ọgaranya sitere na Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo na ndị ọzọ nke Naịjirị
Ọbụna nka akwa nke oge a nwere ike ịdabere n'akụkọ ọdịnala ma jiri akara ọdịnala, agba na ụkpụrụ
Iwu National Green Tribunal Act, 2010 bụ Iwu nke nzuko omeiwu nke India nke na-enye aka ịmepụta ụlọ ikpe pụrụ iche iji dozie ngwa ngwa nke ikpe metụtara nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi

Ọ na-enweta mkpali site na ndokwa iwu nke India nke (Constitution of India / Part III) Nkebi nke iri abụọ na otu Nchedo nke ndụ na nnwere onwe nke onwe, nke na-enye ụmụ amaala India ikike maka gburugburu ebe obibi dị mma
Iwu nke nzuko omeiwu na-akọwa National Green Tribunal Act, 2010 dị ka ndị a

Iwu iji nye ohere maka nguzobe nke National Green Tribunal maka ikpochapụ ikpe dị irè na ngwa ngwa nke ikpe metụtara nchedo gburugburu ebe obibi na nchekwa nke oké ọhịa na akụ na ụba ndị ọzọ nke gụnyere ịmanye ikike iwu ọ bụla metụtara gburugburu ebe obibi na inye enyemaka na nkwụghachi ụgwọ maka mmebi nke ndị mmadụ na ihe onwunwe na maka ihe metụtara ya ma ọ bụ ihe mberede ya
Ikike nke Ụlọikpe ahụ n'ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi ga-enye ikpe ziri ezi gburugburu ebe obibi ngwa ngwa ma nyere aka belata ibu ọrụ nke ikpe n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu
A gaghị ejide Ụlọikpe ahụ site na usoro e debere n'okpuru Iwu nke Usoro Obodo, 1908, kama ọ ga-eduzi ụkpụrụ nke ikpe ziri ezi
A na-enye ụlọ ikpe ahụ iwu ka ọ na-eme ma na-agba mbọ maka mkpofu ngwa ma ọ bụ arịrịọ n'ikpeazụ n'ime ọnwa isii nke ntinye akwụkwọ nke otu ihe ahụ

Na mbụ, a na-atụ aro ka e guzobe NGT n'ebe ise a na-anọdụ ala ma ga-agbaso usoro sekit maka ime ka onwe ya dịkwuo mfe; New Delhi bụ Isi Ebe Nnọdụ ala nke Ụlọikpe, ebe Bhopal, Pune, Kolkata na Chennai ga-abụ ebe ọzọ a ga-anọdụ nke Ụlọikpe ahụ

N'oge nzukọ nke United Nations Conference on Environment and Development na June 1992, India kwere nkwa na steeti ndị sonyere na ya ga-eweta ọgwụgwọ ikpe na nchịkwa nye ndị mmetọ ahụ na mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi ndị ọzọ metụtara
E nwere ọtụtụ ihe kpatara e ji guzobe ụlọ ikpe a
Mgbe India kwagara na carbon credits, ụlọ ikpe dị otú ahụ nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịhụ na a na-achịkwa ikuku na ịnọgide na-enwe ọkwa achọrọ
Nke a bụ òtù mbụ nke ụdị ya nke iwu buuru ya ụzọ chọrọ iji tinye ụkpụrụ onye na-emetọ ihe ga-akwụ ụgwọ na ụkpụrụ nke mmepe na-aga n'ihu
India bụ mba nke atọ na-esote Australia na New Zealand nwere usoro dị otú ahụ
Delhi Pollution Control Committee (DPCC) na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru iwu nke (NGT)
Ọnọdụ ndị mpaghara ise dị na New Delhi (North), Pune (West), Bhopal (Central), Chennai (South) na Kolkata (East)
Ọnọdụ ọ bụla nwere ikike mpaghara a kapịrị ọnụ na mpaghara
Ọzọkwa, usoro maka ọnọdụ sekit dịkwa
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọnọdụ mpaghara ndịda, nke dị na Chennai, nwere ike ikpebi inwe nnọkọ n'ebe ndị ọzọ dị ka Bangalore ma ọ bụ Hyderabad
Onye isi oche nke NGT bụ onye ọka ikpe lara ezumike nká nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu, nke isi ya dị na New Delhi
Na 18 Ọktoba 2010, Justice Lokeshwar Singh Panta ghọrọ onye isi oche mbụ ya

Onye ọka ikpe lara ezumike nká Adarsh Kumar Goel bụ onye isi oche nọ n'ọkwa na 15th Jan 22 Afroz Ahmad na-elekọta dị ka onye otu na isi oche Delhi Ndị otu ikpe ndị ọzọ bụ ndị ikpe lara ezumike nká nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu
Ọnọdụ ọ bụla nke NGT ga-agụnye ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu onye otu ikpe na otu onye ọkachamara
Ndị otu ọkachamara kwesịrị inwe nzere ọkachamara na opekata mpe afọ iri na ise nke ahụmịhe na ngalaba nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi / ọhịa na isiokwu ndị metụtara ya
A naghị ahọpụta ndị otu ahụ ọzọ

Kọmịshọn Ahụike nke Mba (nke akpọrọ NHC dị ka aha ịchafụ na asụsụ bekee) nke bụ ngalaba emere maka ihe gbasara ahụike nke onye isi ebe ahụ bụ onye n'ọkwa onye nke so na Kansụl Steeti ma bụrụ kwa onye na-ahụ maka ịhazi amụma gọọmentị na ihe niile gbasara ahụike na Mainland China
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ na ọnwa Machị na ụbọchị iri na itoolu, n'afọ 2018
Isi ụlọ ọrụ a bụ na nnukwu obodo Beijing n'China
Onye isi na ụlọ ọrụ bụ minista onye nke nwere ọkwa na kansụl steeti onye na -edu kọmiti nke a
Ma Xiaowei bụ onye minista ugbu a na -elekọta Kọmitii ahụ ma bụrụ kwa ode akwụkwọ Alaka nke otu ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ nọ na ọchi-chi
Na mbụ, ụlọ ọrụ na arụ ọrụ ndị Kọmịshọn Ahụike bụ National Health and Family Planning Commission tupu emepụta amụma maka NHC
N'ime ọchịchị otu ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ nke a n'akpọ PRC dị ka aha ịchafụ ya na asụsụ bekee, kemgbe afọ 1954, ụlọ ọrụ na ahụ maka ihe niile gbasara ahụike na mba China na mbụ bụ ndị Ministry of Health
Ka'ma nke a gbanwere na afọ 2013 mgbe enyere National Health and Family Planning Commission ike maka nlekọta ahụike na obodo ahụ
Na ọnwa Machị na afọ 2018, Gọọmentị nke ndị mmadụ nke Republik China kwupụtara na etisara Kọmịshọn Ahụike na Atụmatụ Ezinụlọ
Gọọmentị gara n'ihu kwuo na ha were ọrụ na ịga ozi nke ndị ụlọ ọrụ Kọmịshọn Ahụike na Atụmatụ Ezinụlọ nyefe ndị ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ, National Health Commission
China sokwa n'otu nzukọ ahụike ụwa nke a n'kpọ World Health Organisation na asụsụ bekee ma ọ bụ WHO dị ka aha ịchafụ ya

Minista Ma kọrọ na Mgbakọ Ahụike nke WHO nke iri abụọ na iteghete, na kemgbe afọ 1978, China lekwasịrị anya n'ịkwalite ahụike site na isi, ma mepụta atụmatụ maka nchekwa na ahụisike ndị obodo ahụ site na ime ka onye ọbụla nwee ohere ịnweta nlekọta ahụike nke mbụ nke dị ọgọ ma na arụọrụ nkeọma
Kọmịshọn ahụ bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ nke dị na ebe mepere emepe na China na-ahazi mbọ mba iji lụso ọrịa COVID-19 agha
Na ụbọchị nke iri na otu n'ọnwa February n'afọ 2020, maka iji jikwaa nsogbu ahụike nke COVID-19 na -aga n'ihu, enwere mgbanwe dị iche iche na ụlọ ọrụ National Health Commission
A mara ọkwa ndị a;
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị a nọ n'okpuru National Health Commission

E guzobere Otu Na-ahụ Maka Ikike Ruuru Mmadụ na Mba Naijiria (“NHRC”) site na iwu nke amadebere maka Otu Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ (Ndezigharị), na afọ 1995, nke iwu NHRC megharịrị, na afọ 2010
Otu nkea na ahụ maka usoro na egbochi mmebi iwu nke na-echekwa ikike mmadụ nke ndị bi na obodo Naijiria
Ọ na-enyocha ikike ruuru mmadụ na Naịjirịa, na-enyere ndị e metọrọ aka maka imebi ikike ruuru mmadụ aka, ma na-enye aka n'ịwepụta amụma gọọmentị nke Naịjirịa gbasara ikike oruuru mmadụ
Otua na-arụ ọrụ na nyocha na nlekota nke ọtụtụ ọnọdụ ikike ruuru mmadụ kemgbe ọ malitere
Otu nke Amnesty International welitere olu tinyere ihe gbasara ụjọ ndị uweojii na Naịjirịa na enye Otu Na-ahụ Maka Ikike Ruuru Mmadụ na Mba Naijiria na afọ 2012
Onye Isi Ode Akwukwo ugbu a bụ Anthony O
Ojukwu Esq
Ọrụ Asụsụ Mba na-akwalite ma na-akwado nzikọrịta ozi n'ofe asụsụ na South Africa
Ọbá akwụkwọ National nke Naịjirịa malitere ịdị n'etiti afọ 1960, site na iwu nke National Library Act nke afọ 1964 bụ nke mechara dochie ya site na Iwu Nke iri abụọ nke afọ 1970

Tupu etie iwu nke Ọbá akwụkwọ National Library, emere otụtụ nzukọ ihe ọmụmụ Ịbada, nke agbakwasiri ụkwụ were hazie obere Ọbá akwụkwọ nke esitere na ego ochịchị goomenti were na akwado nke mekwara ka ngwa akwụkwọ rue ndị ọha Naịjirịa aka
Emechara Mepụta Kọmitii ndụmọdụ goomenti n'ihi Mkpa ọ dị maka mmepe nke ebe nchekwa mpaghara ihe ọmụmụ
Echere Kọmitii ahụ aka mgba ịchọta ụzọ iji nyere goomenti aka ịmepụta ntọala ọgụgụ isi nke amụma ya, ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ ọgụgụ nke obodo anyị na ikeputa ogige maka nkwalite ihe amụma
Kọmitii ahụ bụ ndị mbụ kwadoro ka enwe Ọbá Akwụkwọ Mba dika akụkụ nke ntụnye ya
Goomenti nabatakwara atụmatụ Kọmitii ndụmọdụ ahụ wee mee ihe ndị dị mkpa iji wuo Ọbá Akwụkwọ Mba
Nkpakota nke oba akwukwo a bidoro n'afo 1962 ma meghee ya bu ọnwa iri na otu n'afo1964
Ebupụtara isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site na Lagos gaa Abuja n'afo 1995

Iwu Ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ nke Ndị ochichi Nnọchiteanya nke Naịjirịa tiri nyere nkwado ego maka ọrụ ahụ, Iwu ahụ nyekwara ndokwa maka ọzụzụ nke ndị ọrụ na ịmepụta otu ndị isi oche nke ndị okachamara nọ nimeya
N’ikwekọ na ihe ndị otu ala Naịjirịa na ọgbakọ choro, otu ndị ọrụ oba akwụkwọ iri na ise a zụrụ azụ ka ahọrọ na ọrụ iji huna eniri Ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ na osisi sirike
E hiwere otu ndị nlekota ụlọ ọrụ na ọnwa anọ n'afo 1966 site na goomenti ndị agha ọhụrụ
Ọ bụ ndị ọrụ goomenti mejupụtara ndị ọrụ nlekota ahu Kama ndị okachamara dị ka edere na mbụ ahụ
Agbanyeghi nkea , ndị nlekota ahu, gbalịrị imeziwanye ebumnobi mbụ nke oba akwụkwọ ahụ
Mana agha obodo Naijiria mebiri inweta ego na goomenti emeghị ihe rue n'afo 1970
Na n'afo 1970, atọrọ iwu ọhụụ ọhụrụ na ịmepụta iwu Ọbá Akwụkwọ Mba, etinyere iwu ahụ na ndụmọdụ nke Kọmitii ahụ chọrọ ịgbasa oba akwụkwọ gaa n'isi obodo steeti ndị ọzọ iji mepụta netwọọdụ ebe nchekwa

Aka mgba nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyekwara ịnye ISBN na ISSN maka ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, usoro nke na-esiri ike na enweghị usoro teknuzu na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara mpaghara mana ọ na-adịwanye mfe ugbu a site na ịmatakwu na ịmụrụ nke teknụzụ mkpanaka
Ọbá akwụkwọ National nke Naịjirịa nwere aka mgba na-egbochi ya imezu ebumnuche ejiri hiwe ya
National Mirror bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na-ebipụta kwa ụbọchị na Naịjirịa
Ọ nwere usoro tabloid
Onye isi ala Emeka Obasi tọrọ ntọala National Mirror na 2006
Mbipụta gụnyere Daily Mirror, Saturday Mirror na Sunday Mirror
Na August 2008 Barrister Jimoh Ibrahim nwetara oke 100% nke National Mirror
Na 5 Mee 2010 Global Media Mirror Limited, ndị na-ebipụta National Mirror, weghaara Newswatch Communications Limited, ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Newswatch kwa izu nke
National Museum of Egyptian Civilization (NMEC) bụ nnukwu ebe ngosi nka (490,000 uare mita (5,300,000 sq )) nke dị na Old Cairo, mpaghara nke Cairo, Egypt

N'ịbụ nke e meghere n'ụzọ ụfọdụ na 2017, Onye isi ala Abdel Fattah El-Sisi meghere ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ na 3 Eprel 2021, site na ịkwaga 22 ozu, gụnyere ndị eze 18 na ndị eze nwanyị anọ, site na Ebe Ngosi Ihe Mgbe Ochie Ijipt na etiti Cairo, na ihe omume a na-akpọ Fero's Golden Parade
Ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ na-egosipụta nchịkọta nke ihe ochie 50,000, na-egosi mmepeanya Ijipt site n'oge tupu akụkọ ihe mere eme ruo taa
A na-ekewa mkpokọta na-adịgide adịgide na mpaghara abụọ dị iche iche; otu usoro oge ma nke ọzọ bụ isiokwu
Mpaghara usoro iheomume bụ ndị a Archaic, Pharaonic, Greco-Roman, Coptic, Medieval, islam, ọgbara ọhụrụ na nke ugbu a
Mpaghara isiokwu ndị a bụ Dawn of Civilization, The Nile, Writing, State and Society, Material Culture, Beliefs and Thinking and Gallery of Royal Mummies
UNESCO nyere aka oru aka na ngosi nka

A ga-ewere nchịkọta ndị ahụ site na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ndị ọzọ dị ka Egyptian Museum, Coptic Museum, Museum of Islamic Art, Manial Palace and Museum na Cairo, na Royal Jewelry Museum na Alexandria
Na ngwụcha afọ 2017, Zahi Hawass kọrọ na Francis Ricciardone, onye isi oche nke Mahadum America dị na Cairo, nyere 5,000 n'ime ihe ndị ọ rụpụtara na National Museum of Egyptian Civilization
Ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ kwadoro mmeri ikpeazụ nke 2021 World Men's Handball Championship
'National Museum of Poland' bụ aha a na-akpọkarị ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie kachasị ukwuu na nke a ma ama na mba ahụ
Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka nke Poland nwere ọtụtụ alaka nwere onwe ha, nke ọ bụla na-arụ ọrụ ọtụtụ obere ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie

Isi alaka bụ National Museum na Kraków (Polish ), nke e guzobere n'afọ 1879 na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke nwere ọtụtụ narị puku ihe - nke e debere na nnukwu akụkụ na Main Building (n'akụkụ 3 Maja St), kamakwa na asatọ nke ngalaba ya gburugburu obodo ahụ
N'etiti ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi nka nke mba Poland gburugburu ụwa, e nwekwara Polish Museum of America na Chicago, Polish American Museum na New York City na Polish National Museum na Rapperswil, Switzerland
Ibadan National Museum of Unity bụ ihe ngosi nka nke agbụrụ na steeti Ibadan, Naijiria
A raara ihe ngosi nka a nye omenala nke agbụrụ dị iche iche nke obodo Naịjirịa

Ihe ngosi ahụ nwere ihe ngosi banyere Egunguns, Mmaawun, Ekpo, Egwu Atta, Dodo na Ekpe, yana ozi gbasara ọnọdụ ime mmụọ nke ọdịbendị Yoruba, Igbo, Efik, Ibibio na Ebira na mpaghara Middle Belt nke Naịjirịa
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwekwara ngwá egwu dịka ịgba, yana ọba, ihe oyiyi na ihe mkpuchi sitere n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Naịjirịa
Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere ihe ngosi banyere ite nke gụnyere ite dị ka efere a na-akpọ Kula nke a na-eji akwadebe nri
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere ihe ọkpụkpụ nke Nnamdi Azikwe, Tafawa Balewa na Ladoke Akintola, yana ihe ngosi banyere ebo Hausa, Igbo na Yoruba nke obodo Naijiria

Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere ihe ochie dị ka ihe ngosi nka nke Orisa Oko, Ile Ori, [lower-alpha 4] Orisa Ibeji dolls, ite ụrọ Amu eji echekwa mmiri, oriọna ọdịnala a maara na asụsụ Yoruba na Hausa dị ka Fitila na osisi xylophones
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwekwara gongs na rattles, yana nchịkọta ite gụnyere efere ọdịnala na efere
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere nchịkọta ite emume eji eme ihe n'okpukpe Yoruba gụnyere Esu, Ogun na Osun
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere akwa ọdịnala yana ihe ngosi na-akọwa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Aso-Oke
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere ụgbọala nke Premier nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ, Ladoke Akintola
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwekwara ihe ọdịnala dị ka ihe mkpuchi Epa, Esie soapstone figures, yana nchịkọta ngwá ọdịnala Afrịka gụnyere Ogboni drums, [lower-alpha 5] Agidigbos na Egun Sato drum
[lower-alpha 6] Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere ebe a na-akpọ 'Gallery of Unity', nke a na-egosipụta ngwá egwu dị iche iche, gụnyere drum cylindrical a na-akpọ 'Joko-tofofo', nke a na-eji agwọ ọrịa
Tụkwasị na nke a, n'ebe a na-ese ite, e nwere ite nwere perforations eji eme frying a na-akpọ 'Ikoko'

Ụlọ ọgwụ National Orthopedic Hospital, Igbobi, Lagos malitere ọrụ dịka ebe mgbazigharị maka ndị agha merụrụ ahụ n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na 1943, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere n'ụlọọgwụ n'okpuru nlekọta ahụike British Colonial Medical Services nke Colonial Nigeria na 6 Disemba afọ 1945
ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ, nke akpọrọ aha ya na mbụ Royal Orthopedic Hospital na 1956 bụkwa ihe enyemaka n'ịgwọ ndị agha merụrụ ahụ na ndị nkịtị n'agha obodo Naijiria nke 1967 ruo 1970

Otu ndị inyom ime obodo na ụmụ amaala (Asociación Nacional de Mujeres Rurales e Indígenas, ANAMURI) bụ ụlọ ọrụ obodo Chile na-abaghị uru ma nwee onwe ya, nke bụ naanị ụmụ nwanyị
E hiwere nzukọ ahụ n'afọ 1998 na Buin, Chile
Ọrụ ya bụ ịhazi ma kwalite mmepe nke ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo na ụmụ amaala Chile site n'ịkpalite ma wusie nzukọ ha ike
ANAMURI bụ akụkụ nke Onye nhazi mpaghara mpaghara Latin America na International Via Campesina (Coordinadora Latinoamericana de Organizaciones del Campo y la Vía Campesina Internacional)
N'afọ 2016, ANAMURI nwere ihe dịka ndị mmekọ puku isii na narị asatọ
E hiwere Òtù Mba Ndị Na-ahụ Maka Ime Ime Obodo na ụmụ amaala n'ọnwa June ụbọchị iri na ato, n'afọ 1998 na Buin
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2018, ANAMURI nọ na mpaghara Chile sitere na Arica (Arica na Parinacota) ruo Coyhaique (Aysén), gụnyere ụmụ amaala Aymara, Colla, Diaguita na Mapuche si mba niile
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Santiago

Ozi nke ANAMURI bụ ịhazi ma kwalite mmepe nke ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo na ụmụ amaala Chile bídó na Arica ruo Coyhaique, na-atụle ọdịbendị, ọrụ, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na akụ na ụba ha, na ebumnuche nke ịkwalite ma wusie nzukọ ha ike
Ọrụ nke ANAMURI dabeere na iwulite mmekọrịta nhata, na-akpọkọta ma na-ahazi ihe ndị inyom ime obodo chọrọ na ọdịmma ha na ọkwa obodo
Ụmụ nwanyị nke ANAMURI na-alụ ọgụ iji nweta ikike nri nke ndị mmadụ, na-aghọta ọrụ dị mkpa ụmụ nwanyị rụrụ na mmepụta ọrụ ugbo kemgbe oge nna ochie

Lagos National Stadium bụ ámá egwuregwu nwere ọtụtụ ebumnuche na Surulere, Lagos State, Nigeria, nke nwere ogige igwu mmiri Olympic na ogige egwuregwu nwere ọtụtụ zubere nke a na-eji eme egwuregwu, rugby, basketball, volleyball, table tennis, ịgba mgba na egwuregwu ịkụ ọkpọ
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe maka egwuregwu bọọlụ ruo n'afọ 2004
Ọ kwadoro ọtụtụ asọmpi mba ụwa gụnyere 1980 African Cup of Nations final, 2000 iko mba nke African Cup of Nation final, na FIFA World Cup qualifying matches
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka isi ámá egwuregwu maka afọ 1973 All-Africa Games
Mgbe e wuru ámá egwuregwu ahụ N'afọ 1972, ọ nwere ikike nke 55,000
E belatara ikike ahụ ruo 45,000 N'afọ 1999
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bịara bụ 85,000 ma were ya na egwuregwu ikpeazụ iko mbà nke Afrịka n'afọ 1980 n'etiti Nigeria na Algeria
N'ihi ihe ndị a na-amaghị, a hapụrụ nke kachasị na ama egwuregwu nke national stadium ka ọ daa kemgbe mmalite afọ 2000
Ọ kwadoro egwuregwu mba ikpeazụ n'afọ 2004, na egwuregwu bọọlụ kwagara na Teslim Balogun Stadium dị nso
A na-eji ya eme ihe ugbu a mgbe ụfọdụ maka nnọkọ okpukpe ma ụmụ okorobịa na ndị squatters weghaara ya
N'afọ 2009, National Sports Commission malitere mgbalị jikọrọ aka iji weghachite ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ọnọdụ ụwa

National Temple ahụ bụ ebe ofufe dị n'ebe mgbakọ nke The Apostolic Church Nigeria dị na Olorunda-Ketu, Lagos State
O nwere oche 100,000
N'afọ 1969, a kwagara Nzukọ Lagos, Western and Northern Areas (LAWNA) nke a na-emekarị na Ebute Metta na Orishigun, obodo dị na Ketu n'ihi ọnụ ọgụgụ na-arịwanye elu nke ndị a tọghatara
N'afọ 1970, a kwagara Nzukọ ahụ n'ebe dị ugbu a na Olorunda-Ketu na Nzukọ Nzukọ kwa afọ nke 1976 malitere ime n'ihe a maara ugbu a dị ka Old Convention House
N'afọ 1979, onye isi oche mbụ nke LAWNA Territorial, onye ụkọchukwu S
Adegboyega tọrọ ntọala nke ihe ga-abụ Ụlọ Nsọ Mba
N'afọ 1994, onye ụkọchukwu Samuel Jemigbon mere ọganihu ngwa ngwa n'iwu ihe owuwu ahụ n'oge ọ bụ onye isi oche nke atọ nke LAWNA Territorial
E wuchara Ụlọ Nsọ National Temple ahụ na 19 Nọvemba 2011 n'okpuru ọzụzụ nke Pastor Gabriel Olutola onye kọwara ya dị ka 'Ụlọ e ji ekpere wuo' na 'ihe nnọchianya nke ịdị n'otu nke ụka'
Ọ nwere ikike nke 100,000 oche
otu mba nke ndị ọrụ na-egwuputa ihe (NUM) bụ otu ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na-egwupụta akụ na-egwupụta aku, na South Africa
N'inwe ndị otu 300,000 as of 2014[update] na-erule afọ 2014, ọ bụ onye mmekọ kachasị ukwuu nke Congress of South African Trade Unions (COSATU)
E guzobere otu ahụ na 1982 dị ka otu ndị ọrụ ojii na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe a na'ala, na mbido nke Council of Unions of South Africa
Onye ndú mbụ ya bụ Cyril Ramaphosa, onye ọ toro ngwa ngwa n'okpuru ya, na-enweta nkwenye nkwekọrịta site na Chamber of Mines na 1983 51

NUM mere mkpọsa nke ọma na 1980s maka njedebe nke usoro ndoputa ọrụ, usoro nke mere ka a mata na ọrụ kacha akwụ ụgwọ bụ nke ekenyela ndị ọcha bụ otu n'ime ntọala ntọala Congress nke ndị otu azụmahịa South Africa na 1985
N'afọ 2001, ọ nabatara ndị Construction and Allied Workers' Union, ebe n'ọnwa 2019 a mara ọkwa na ọ ga-amịkọrọ ndị Liberated Metalworkers 'Union of South Africa n'oge na-adịghị anya
NUM jikọtara ya na mba ụwa niile na njikọ kemịkalụ, ike, nke m na ndị otu ndị ọrụ izugbe
Na 4 Disemba 2007, otu ahụ gara abụbọ ọrụ iji mee mkpesa maka ọnọdụ ọrụ na ogbunigwe South Africa
Ọ bụ ịrị elu nke ọnwụ ndị ọrụ site na 2006 ruo 2007 n'agbanyeghị gọọmentị
N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, ọtụtụ puku ndị otu NUM malitere usoro ọgbaghara na Lonmin's Marikana mines jikọtara ya na arịrịọ maka ịbawanye ụgwọ

N'ụbọchị na-esote, ndị isi NUM gbara ndị otu N UM na'ịgba arụkwaghịm égbè, bụ ndị na - na A na-ekwu na mgbasa ozi na ogbugbu nke ndị na'egwupụta ihe n'ime ala abụọ bụ isi ihe kpatara nkwụsịtụ ntụkwasị obi n'ime ndị ọrụ
N'inyefe ya na Farlam Commission, NUM kwuru na ike igbu egbu n'ụbọchị a ziri ezi

A na-eme atụmatụ na n'etiti 12 na 14 Ọgọstụ ihe dị ka mmadụ itoolu (ọ dịkarịa ala ndị na'egwupụta ihe n'ọhịa, ndị uwe ojii abụọ na ndị nche nche abụọ) nwụrụ nʼógbè Marikana - ọ bụ ezie na e nwere akụkọ na - na ọ dị iche iche banyere onye gburu noge ụbọchị ndị a

N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, ndị uwe ojii gbara otu ndị na-egwupụta akụ̀ ndị dị n'ime ala égbè, ha gburu ma ọ dịkarịa ala mmadụ iri atọ na anọ na Marikana, mmadụ narị asaa na iri asaa merụrụ ahụ ma jide mmadụ abụọ na ise na itoolu
Ndị na-egwupụta akụ̀ ndị dị n'ime ala na ndị na'ebe ahụ bu mma ma jụ arịrịọ maka iwepụ ngwá agha
Dị ka Congress of South African Trade Unions si kwuo, ndị uwe ojii bu ụzọ jiri gas na-agba mmiri, egbe mmiri wee jiri 'mgbọ dị ndụ'
A na-akpọ ogbugbu ahụ ogbu mmadụ n'ime mgbasa ozi niile na ndị uwe ojii, Lonmin na NUM n'onwe ya ka a na'ebo ya ebubo

Mkpughe banyere ahụ mere malite na nyocha agụmakwụkwọ [citation needed] wee soro akụkọ Greg Marinovich gosipụtara na ọtụtụ n'ime igbu ọchụ ndị ahụ weere ọnọdụ na igwefoto ọtụtụ nkeji mgbe edere ụfọdụ igbu egbu na telivishọn

Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ New York Times si kwuo, 'Frans Baleni, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke National Union of Mineworkers, gbachitere ndị uwe ojii n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Kaya FM, ụlọ ọrụ redio' na-ekwu na 'Ndị uweojii nwere ndidi, mana ndị a ji ngwá agha dị ize ndụ'
Mgbatị ahụ bụ otu n'ime ihe kachasị njọ nke ndị ọchịchị South Africa kemgbe njedebe nke oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Afrika
Baleni na ndị ọrụ NUM ndị ọzọ ebuboola 'ike nke atọ' na ha na-akwado ọgụ Marikana
A na-ekwu na e nweela ọpụpụ site na NUM
Dị ka Justice Malala si kwuo, na-ede na The Guardian, 'NUM enwekwaghị ntụkwasị obi niile ma na ndị otu na'ime ya na ya
E nyere odeakwụkwọ ya a na-akwụ ụgwọ nke ọma, Baleni, mmụba ụgwọ ọrụ nke ihe karịrị 40% n'afọ gara aga na ngụkọta ụgwọ ọnwa ya karịrị R105 000 kwa ọnwa
Ndị isi NUM ajụla ịpụ n'ụgbọala ndị uwe ojii iji gwa ndị ọrụ okwu
Ndị ọzọ arụrịtakwara na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị otu NUM na-arị elu ma, ugbu a, n'ihi ọgbaghara na North West, ndị òtù ya nwere ike ịnọ ihe dị ka 150,000
Ndị ọzọ toro nzukọ ahụ
Otu nchịkọta akụkọ na Business Day kwuru 'NUM bụ ihe na-eche echiche, nke a na na'etiti ndị otu ebe a
Ọ na-enwe ekele ma na'anya na ụlọ ọrụ ndị siri ike

Òtù na-asọ mpi Association of Mineworkers and Construction Union (AMCU) amụbawo n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị otu kemgbe ịgba égbè Marikana ma ugbu a na'anọchite anya ihe karịrị 40% nke ndị ọrụ na Amplats na 70% na Lonmin
Ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke agha nke Naijiria dị na Umuahia na-egosi akụkọ ndị agha nke Naịjirịa na ihe ndị sitere na agha obodo Biafra-Nigerian
o nwere nchịkọta tankị, AFLs, ụgbọ mmiri na ụgbọelu niile sitere na Naịjirịa ma ọ bụ Biafra

Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ tankị niile na AFL bụ Biafra na ụgbọelu niile bụ ndị NaijiriaO nwere ihe akaebe nke agha ime obodo na Naịjirịa site n'afọ 1967 ruo afọ 1970Ihe ngosi nka a bụ ebe nketa nke na-echeta agha Biafra

Ihe ncheta ụmụ nwanyị nke mba (Afrikaans ) na Bloemfontein, South Africa, bụ ihe ncheta na-echeta ihe dị ka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka Boer puku iri abụọ na asaa nwụrụ n'ogige ịta ahụhụ ndị Britain n'oge Agha Boer nke Abụọ
Ihe ncheta ahụ bụ ebe nchekwa mpaghara na Free State
Ọ bụ onye na-ewu ụlọ na Pretoria, Frans Soff, na Anton van Wouw kpụrụ ihe ncheta ahụ
O nwere obelisk dị ihe dị ka mita iri atọ na ise n'ịdị elu na mgbidi dị ala, nke ọkara okirikiri n'akụkụ abụọ

Otu ìgwè ọla nchara etiti, nke Emily Hobhouse sere ma gosipụta ahụmịhe nke ya nke ụbọchị irí na isé n'ọnwa Mee n'afo 1901, bụ nke ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na-eru uju na nwatakịrị na-anwụ anwụ n'ogige Springfontein
E kpughere ihe ncheta ahụ n'ubochí iri na isii n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1913, ihe dị ka ndị South Africa puku iri abụọ gara ya
Afọ iri na atọ ka e mesịrị, e debere ntụ Emily Hobhouse n'okpuru ihe ncheta ahụ
N'akụkụ ihe ncheta ahụ, e nwekwara ili Christiaan de Wet, Rev
John Daniel Kestell, Onye isi oche nke Orange Free State Martinus Steyn, na nwunye ya
Martinus Steyn, onye isi oche nke Orange Free State Republic n'oge ahụ, kwupụtara echiche nke ihe ncheta ógè ọ na-anata ọgwụgwọ na Europe mgbe Agha Boer gasịrị
Nwunye ya, Rachel Isabella 'Tibbie' Steyn, sonyere n'echiche ahụ, ebe ndị ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya nwụnahụrụ n'ogige ịta ahụhụ ndị Britain
Ya na Emily Hobhouse nwekwara mmekọrịta chiri anya
Ógè ọ laghachiri South Africa, Steyn guzobere kọmitii na-eme ihe iji malite ọrụ ahụ
A jụrụ echiche nke iwu ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọgwụ dị ka enweghị mkpali, echiche nke nwetara nkwado site n'aka ndí ọtụtụ òtù Afrikaner
Ihe ncheta ahụ dị ihe dị ka kilomita atọ n'ebe ndịda nke etiti Bloemfontein
N'azụ ugwu ndị gbara ya gburugburu, ihe ncheta ahụ na-agwakọta nke ọma na obodo ugbo obodo ya mere na ndụ Boer a na-echeta n'ebe ahụ
Ebe mgbaba (mgbidi ihuenyo) gbárá gburugburu mita iri atọ na ise n'ịdị elu gbara obelisk etiti gburugburu
Ndị otu a kpụrụ akpụ gụnyere nwanyị na-enweghị okpu ya, ya na nwa ya na-anwụ anwụ n'apata ụkwụ ya
Nwanyị nke abụọ na-aga n'ebe dị anya, na-akpọ Onyenwe anyị ka ọ hụ ọdachi ahụ
Ụmụ akwụkwọ nke C&N Sekondêre Meisieskool Oranje ('C&N Girls' Secondary School Orange') na Bloemfontein na-eleta ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ kwa afọ iji cheta onye isi ala Steyn na akụkọ ihe mere eme ya
Nleta ahụ bụ njem kilomita iri site n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ruo ihe ncheta ahụ
A na-etinye okpueze n'ili Steyn, a na-emekwa ụfọdụ emume dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ekwe nkwa ịzụlite ikike nke Afrikaner ha, ihe nketa Ndị Kraịst
Ihe ngosi mara mma nke ihe ncheta ahụ mụbara ka oge na-aga
Na mgbé izizi, ọ dịghị ndị ikom e gosipụtara, mana site na olili Steyn n'ala ala nke ụlọ ahụ, oge ncheta ọhụrụ bịdọrọ, n'ikpeazụ weta ncheta agha n'ime mpaghara ahụ
Tibbie Steyn kwupụtara nchegbu na iji ala nke ihe ncheta ahụ n'ihe banyere olili nke ndị agha ochie ga-eme ka uche izizi na nhụjuanya nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
N'agbanyeghị mkpesa ya, Dr
Malan liri ya n'afọ 1955 n'akụkụ di ya, otu afọ ógè ọ lara ezumike nká dị ka Prime Minista nke South Africa
Malan kwupụtara na ọ bụ njikọ ikpeazụ na Boer Republics nké izizi
Kemgbe afọ 1960, e wuru ihe ncheta ndị ọzọ nke Agha Boer nke Abụọ n'ala ihe ncheta ụmụ nwanyị, na-eme ka ihe ncheta ahụ bụrụ otu n'ime ebe ndị bụ isi a raara nye ihe nketa agha ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ọdịbendị jiri ala ndị gbara ya gburugburu echeta ndị nkịtị, ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo, ndị POWs, na Bittereinders
Ógè ha na-akwado ihe ncheta ụmụ nwanyị, ha kwadoro mgbanwe na mmesi ike

National Youth Service (NYS) bụ nzukọ nke dị n'okpuru Gọọmentị Kenya
E guzobere ya na afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri isii na ano, iji zụọ ndị na-eto eto n'ihe ndị dị mkpa nke mba
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na itoolu , a gbanwere nzukọ ahụ site na ngalaba steeti gaa na ụlọ ọrụ steeti na-achị onwe ya mgbe iwu NYS, puku abụọ na iri asatọ nke ndị omeiwu Kenya
Isi ọrụ nke NYS bụ ịzụ na iduzi ndị ntorobịa Kenya site na
Ndebanye aha maka ọrụ ahụ bụ ọrụ afọ ofufo maka ndị ntorobịa Kenya dị n'agbata afọ iri na asatọ ruo na afọ iri abụọ na abụọ
Mgbe ha debanyere aha, a na-enye ndị a na-akpọbata ọzụzụ siri ike na-abụghị nke agha maka ọnwa isii
A na-achọ ka ndị a na-akpọbata na-enye ma ọ dịkarịa ala ọnwa isii nke ọrụ mba, nke nwere ike ịgụnye;
Tupu ngwụcha afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri asatọ, ụmụ akwụkwọ ga-esonye na nzukọ ahụ tupu ha abanye na mahadum
Taa, a na-ewe ndị mmadụ n'ọrụ n'afọ ofufo
Mgbe ha mechara ọrụ mba iwu, a na-eziga ndị a na-akpọbata n'ụlọ akwụkwọ teknụzụ na ọrụ aka n'ime NYS iji zụọ ha n'ọhịa dị iche iche dịka ọrụ ugbo, injinia na ile ọbịa
Ọzụzụ ahụ bụ n'efu maka ndị niile a kpọrọ ọhụrụ
E guzobere National Youth Service site n'enyemaka nke gọọmentị Israel, ọ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Nahal (ndị ntorobịa na-alụ ọgụ) na GADNA (Youth battalion) nke jikọtara ọrụ agha na nguzobe ebe ọrụ ugbo

Ọ bụ ezie na n'Izrel, ọ dị mkpa iji dozie egwu dị adị site na Palestine na ụwa ndị Arab, na Kenya ihe nlereanya ahụ mara mma nye gọọmentị iji kụnye ụkpụrụ mba nye ndị na-eto eto na iji mee ka ndị na-alụ ọgụ nnwere onwe (mau mau)
Ndị Israel nwere olile anya iji ọzụzụ ndị ntorobịa dị ka ebe ha ga-abanye n'Afrịka
E wezụga Kenya, ha nwere mmemme dị otú ahụ na Naịjirịa, Tanzania na Uganda
Ịrụpụta NYS nwere ike ịmalite n'oge karịa ka a kwetara n'ihu ọha
N'etiti afọ 1959, Mboya duuru ndị nnọchiteanya gaa Israel ebe a kpọbatara ya na ndị isi Afrịka ndị ọzọ na òtù Gadna-Nahal, n'oge nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe izu isii
Ọ bụ CIA kwadoro nzukọ ahụ International Union of the Socialist Youth (IUSY), nke na-ebipụta isiokwu Mboya ugboro ugboro banyere ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'Afrịka
Gadna bụ acronym nke pụtara ndị ntorobịa, ebe Nahal pụtara ịlụ ọgụ megide ndị ọsụ ụzọ ntorobịa
Ndị a bụ òtù ndị ntorobịa nke gọọmentị Israel na-achịkwa ma na-akwado iji kụnye mmetụta nke 'ezube mba', na 'na-arụ ọrụ obodo na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya'
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Nairobi, Maazị Mboya gwara ndị nta akụkọ, sị 'N'Izrel, ahụla m ndị ntorobịa a zụrụ ka ha bụrụ ihe na-eme ka mba ahụ nwee obi ụtọ, ha dịkwa mfe maka ụdị ọrụ mba niile'
N'ihi ihe mmụta ọ mụtara n'Izrel, Mboya nwere olileanya ịgbanwe ngalaba ndị ntorobịa nke People's Congress Party ya ka ọ bụrụ ngwá ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị egwu
Ọ bụ otu Mboya-Kariuki a ga-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị Israel iji guzobe National Youth Service niile dị ka akụkụ nke mbọ Israel na-agba iji wulite mmekọrịta chiri anya na ọchịchị Kenyatta
Kenya nwere olile anya ịnakwere nnwale Nahal nke Israel n'ịdị n'otu agbụrụ Kenya site na iji òtù ndị ntorobịa
Israel mekwara ka onye isi ala Kenyatta nabata echiche Kibbutz nke bụ usoro ọrụ ugbo obodo nke ndị ntorobịa a zụrụ azụ dị ka ndị ọsụ ụzọ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri isii na isii, JG

Mbogo nke Embu wetara Motion na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na-achọ ka a gbasaa otu ndị Israel na-enye ego na-ekwu na a na-azụ ndị ntorobịa 'maka onye guzoro n'ebe ahụ ma yie nnukwu'Iji chebe ọrụ Israel site na mgbasa, a gụnyere ya dị ka akụkụ nke ndị agha a dọrọ aka ná ntị na mmezigharị Eprel otu puku, narị itoolu na iri isii na isii nke Iwu Kenya
N'ozuzu, mmegharị Nahal dị ka ndị Israel na-emepụta n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka dara

Steven Carol, onye ọkà mmụta iwu mba ọzọ na Nahal na-ekwu na nnwale nke East Africa emeghị mkpụrụ n'ihi na ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ntorobịa ahụ amaghị akwụkwọ ma n'adịghị ka ndị Israel 'ha enweghị onye iro doro anya, ma ọ bụ ndị na-eyi ọha egwu gafere ókèala'
Site na ọrụ NYS dara, ndị Israel tụgharịrị ugbu a n'ịzụ ndị Kenya n'ọhịa nzuzo na nchekwa
Ka oge na-aga, ndị China weghaara ego ahụ ma webata ọzụzụ tupu mahadum nke e mechara hapụ
Ka a ghara ịhapụ ha, ndị Ịtali nyere aka guzobe ọrụ Nyayo-bus nke dara ọzọ
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, NYS aghaghị ịkọwa onwe ya iji bie ndụ nke ya mgbe ihe nlereanya Israel dara
Onye nduzi mbụ, Geoffrey Griffin, onye na-ahụ maka ịdọ aka ná ntị nke ọma duziri nzukọ ahụ n'ime afọ ndị mbụ ọgba aghara ruo nkwụsi ike (1964-1988)

NYS nọgidere bụrụ ngalaba gọọmentị na-amaghị ama na nke na-enye obere ego ruo ọtụtụ afọ ruo na afọ puku abụọ na iri na atọ mgbe onye isi ala Uhuru Kenyatta kpebiri ime ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ maka inye ndị ntorobịa ikike
E jiri otu puku pecenti mụbaa mmefu ego NYS na afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ
Mana enwere nsogbu; nzukọ ahụ nwere oke ikike mmadụ iji jikwaa nnukwu mmefu ego ma ọ bụ ikike teknụzụ iji rụọ ọrụ ọ na-azọrọ na ọ nwere ike ime
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị NYS nwere agụmakwụkwọ pere mpe, ahụmịhe pere mpe na àgwà omume ọma na-adịghị mma iji jikwaa nnukwu mmefu ego
N'otu aka ahụ, nzukọ ahụ aghọwo ihe na-enweghị isi n'ihi agha ya mere na-egbochi ịza ajụjụ n'ime ụlọ na ọkachamara
Ihe sochiri bụ iji nnukwu ego eme ihe n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi na nnukwu mmebi nke ego ọha na eze
Iji dozie ihe ịma aka ndị a, gọọmentị malitere njem mgbanwe na NYS nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịnagide nsogbu iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe, iwulite ikike na ime ka nzukọ ahụ bụrụ ọkachamara
E mere NYS ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị nwere kansụl iji mee ihe ya
NATIVELAND bụ emume egwu kwa afọ na Lagos, Naịjirịa, nke The Native haziri
E guzobere ikpo okwu ahụ iji jikọta ihe kachasị mma nke ọdịbendị pop, egwu, nka, nri, ụdị, egwuregwu, na agụmakwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Naijiria
NATIVELAND bụ nke The Native mepụtara ma hazie
E kere ya iji jikọta ihe kachasị mma nke ọdịbendị pop, egwu, nka, nri, ụdị, egwuregwu, na agụmakwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Naijiria
A na-eme ihe omume ahụ kwa afọ na Muri Okunola Park, na Lagos
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2016, Ndani TV mere mbipụta mbụ ma nye ya ike
Ọ bụ Skepta, na Burna Boy duziri egwu ahụ ma egosipụtara ihe ngosi site na, Ycee, Ajebutter 22, Maleek Berry, Fresh L, DAP The Contract, Odunsi (The Engine), Cruel Santino, na Lady Donli
Na mbipụta mbụ, otu egwu DRB LasGidi, jikọtara ọnụ n'elu ikpo okwu

Na 22 Disemba 2017, e mere mbipụta nke abụọ, nke Kojo Funds, Davido, Nonso Amadi, Maleek Berry, Burna Boy, Tekno, Not3s, Mayorkun na Yxng Bane, na-eme ihe ngosi site na, Fasina, Fresh L, Mobblanta, No Politics Mob, Kazeem Twins, Yinka Bernie, AYLØ, Lady Donli, Barelyanyhook, Dice Ailes, Ladipoe, Prettyboy D-O, DJ, Ayevy The Creator, Blackmagic, Santije, Od
E mere mbipụta nke atọ na Odunsi, PrettyBoy D-O, na Santi dị ka ndị ọbịa pụrụ iche, yana mmemme ndị ọzọ sitere na Wande Coal, Runtown, Sababii, Falana, na Teni
Na mbipụta nke anọ, emume ahụ gbakwunyere otu ụbọchị maka otu mkparitaụka akpọrọ NATIVE HOUSE, nke kpọrọ ndị na-arụ ọrụ egwu site na òtù dị iche iche na ndị na-ese ihe si Naijiria na African Diaspora
Iji kwurịta isiokwu ndị sitere na mbata nke egwu Africa nke oge a, nka anya, na mmasị egwu mba ụwa na egwu Africa
Ihe ngosi nke emume ahụ sitere na Naira Marley, Santi, Rema, Lady Donli, Tems, Joeboy, Fireboy DML, Buju, Gigi Atlantis, SOMADINA, Cuppy, Maison 2500, DJ Femo na ndị ọzọ
Site na egwu ndị ọzọ nke NATIVE Sound System bi na DJs Bristar na Vvada nyere
Burna Boy na Koffee emeghị, n'ihi na ndị na-akwado ya mebiri nchekwa na ọnụ ụzọ VIP
Na 22 Disemba 2021, NSS kwadoro mbipụta nke ise nke NATIVELAND, nke akpọrọ NATIV5 na Harbour Point Marquee
Iji mee emume ncheta afọ ise nke The Native
Rema, Amaarae , Styl-Plus, Teezee, SGaWD, na Lojay duziri ihe ngosi egwu ahụ, ndị ọzọ mere ihe ngosi gụnyere Odunsi, Ayra Starr, Tems, Wale Davies, na Ladipoe
Ọkọlọtọ oke ọhịa (NFS) bụ ọkọlọtọ carbon afọ ofufo emebere maka ọrụ ọkara ruo nnukwu nnukwu REDD +dị n'etiti na nnukwu
Ụkpụrụ ahụ na-ekwusi ike na carbon, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na uru dị iche iche nke ọrụ ma chọọ usoro zuru oke iji hụ na ọ na-agbaso ụkpụrụ ndị a chọrọ na inweta asambodo

NFS na-etinye usoro dị mma nke dabeere n'ihe ize ndụ na ọnụọgụ carbon maka ngụkọta na-agbanwe agbanwe na nke yiri ya ma na-ezube ijikọ omume mpaghara n'ime usoro mba maka ibelata ọnwụ nke oké ọhịa okike
Ọdachi ndị na-emere onwe ha na Naijiria, na-emetụta ihu igwe nke Naijiria
Ọdachi sitere n'okike nwere ike ibute site na idei mmiri, mbuze ala, ahụhụ na-emetụta, wdg
Iji kewaa ya dị ka ọdachi, ọ ga-adị mkpa inwe mmetụta dị ukwuu na gburugburu ebe obibi na / ma ọ bụ ọnwụ mmadụ ma na-enwekarị mfu ego
Ihe omume a aghọwo ihe na-echegbu onwe ya, na-eyi ọtụtụ ndị bi na gburugburu ebe dị iche iche egwu n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya

Naịjirịa enwetala ọtụtụ ọdachi nke sitere na ide mmiri, ala na mbuze mmiri, mbuze ala, ebili mmiri, mbufe mmiri, mbugharị mmiri, mbupụ mmiri, oké ifufe ájá, mpụga mmanụ, igurube / ahụhụ, na ọdachi ndị ọzọ mmadụ mereEnwere ike ikwu na mba ndị dị n'okpuru ebe a na-echebe ma na-agbasawanye emeela ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-adịghị ike maka ọdachi ndị a
Ihe ize ndụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere oké ifufe uzuzu nke ugwu, nke na-esikarị na steeti ndịda gaa na steeti; na-akpata mmebi site na nnukwu uzuzu na unyi sitere na mpaghara ndị a
Hail bụ ihe ọzọ na-akpata nke na-adịghị emekarị n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Naịjirịa, na-eduga na mmebi ihe ọkụkụ na onwunwe
[citation needed]

A na-ekwu na ụkọ mmiri ozuzo nke afọ 1972 na afọ 1973 kpatara ọnwụ nke pasentị iri na atọ (13%) nke anụmanụ n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria na mmebi nke ihe ọkụkụ kwa afọ nke ihe karịrị pasentị iri ise (50%)
Ide mmiri na-eme ugboro ugboro n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Naịjirịa emeela ka mmebi akụ na ụba dị ukwuu, mmerụ ahụ na ọnwụ nke ndụ
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị, a kọrọ na mmiri ozuzo na-ezo ụbọchị abụọ nke dugara na ide mmiri na mpaghara Alimosho, steeti Lagos
O gburu ụmụnne atọ na mmadụ anọ ndị ọzọ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, ide mmiri mere na steeti Adamawa na-emetụta obodo 79 na mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo 16
Ọ bụ ezie na ala ugbo 150 na ihe dị ka ụlọ 66 bibiri dị ka Ụlọ Ọrụ Nlekọta Mberede nke steeti Adamawa (ADSEMA) si kwuo
N'afọ 2020, mmadụ 68 nwụrụ na mmadụ 129,000 hapụrụ ebe ha nọ n'ihi ide mmiri nke afọ 2020 dịka onye isi nchịkwa NEMA, Muhammadu Muhammed si kwuo
Òtù Ahụ Ike Ụwa kọwara ide mmiri nke afọ 2012 na Naịjirịa dị ka ide mmiri kachasị njọ dakwasịrị Naịjirị n'ime afọ 50 gara aga
E dekọrọ na ide mmiri nke afọ 2012 mebiri ụlọ 5,50000 ma kpatara ọnwụ karịrị 431 yana ndị mmadụ karịrị otu nde
1000 ndị bi na Lagos na mpaghara Ogun steeti nke Naịjirịa chụpụrụ n'ihi ide mmiri metụtara nnukwu mmiri ozuzo, nke ka njọ site na ịhapụ mmiri site na Oyan Dam n'ime Osimiri Ogun
Ide mmiri metụtara ihe dị ka ndị Naijiria 250,000 na 2016 ebe 92,000 metụtara na 2017
National Emergency Relief Agency (NERA)
E guzobere National Emergency Relief Agency (NERA) site na Iwu 48 nke 1976 iji meghachi omume na ide mmiri na-ebibi ihe n'etiti afọ 1972 na afọ 1973
NERA bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka njikwa ọdachi na-elekwasị anya naanị na nhazi na nkesa nke ihe enyemaka nye ndị ọdachi dakwasịrị
E guzobere National Emergency Management Agency (NEMA) na Machị 1999 site na Iwu 12 nke 1999 iji jikwaa ọdachi na Naịjirịa site na ibelata, nzaghachi nkwadebe na mmemme mgbake

Iwu NEMA sitere na nhazi iwu ọdachi, agụmakwụkwọ ọdachi ọha na eze, nchịkọta data ọdachi, imekọ ihe ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa mberede ndị ọzọ, nkwalite na nhazi nke nyocha metụtara ọdachi yana njikwa ọdachi
National Disaster Management Framework nke Nigeria (NDMF)
E mepụtara usoro National Disaster Management Framework of Nigeria(NDMF) n'afọ 2010 iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka ngwá ọrụ iwu iji duzie ndị metụtara ya na njikwa ọdachi na Naịjirịa
E kere ya iji kwalite njikwa ọdachi dị irè na nke dị irè n'etiti gọọmentị etiti, steeti na nke ime obodo, nzukọ ọha na eze na ngalaba onwe
NDMF nwere ebe 7 na-elekwasị anya na njirimara zuru oke, ya bụ
Naude bụ aha nke nna Afrikaans, nke sitere na ndi French Naudé
Ọ nwere ike izo aka na

Nawëal Ouinekh-Youssouf (amụrụ na 8 Jenụwarị 1997), nke a maara dị ka Nawëal Ouinekh, bụ onye na agba bọọlụ nke na agba ọsọ dị ka onye na aga n'ihu maka Nkewa 2 Féminine club Saint-Étienne na ndị otu mba Morocco
A mụrụ ya na France, Ouinekh nọchitere anya mba ya na mba ụwa na ọkwa ndị ntorobịa, tupu ọ gbanwee nkwado na Morocco na 2020
Ouinekh mere nke mbụ ya na Morocco na 26 Nọvemba 2020, megide Ghana
Ouinekh lụrụ Zaydou Youssouf

Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya na 2008 Summer Olympics
