Ndewo ịhụnanya ndị bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ America nke na-ere ngwaọrụ na-eso na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụra na ngwa na-esote ụra iji nyere aka nyochaa ụra
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2012 ma mechie ya n'ọnwarị afọ 2017
Ọ bụrụ bụ Thiel Fellow na CEO James Proud guzobere Ndewo iji Tinye na August 28, 2012
Ihe ịga nkeMgbasa ozi Kickstarter sitere na Ndewo na 2014 welitere $24 nde site na ndị na-akwado 19,000 karịa, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime mkpọsa Kickstarter kacha aga nke ọma n'oge niile
Ego mbido ego sitere na ndị nkwado Silicon Valley welitere $105 nde ọzọ

Na June 2015, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ welitere $ 40 nde na ntinye ego sitere na Temasek Holdings na Hello bara uru n'etiti $ 250 nde na $ 300 nde n'oge ahụ Ndị nkwado ndị ọzọ gụnyere onye isi Facebook Messenger David Marcus, onye isi Facebook mebere eziokwu Hugo Barra, onye isi Facebook Dan Rose, onye bụbu Twitter CEO Dick Costolo, na onye isi Spotify nke ọrụ pụrụ iche, Shakil Khan

Ndewo nọrọ ihe karịrị otu afọ na-emepụta ngwaọrụ na-eso ụra, mana ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechara kpebie ịmepụta ngwaọrụ dị n'akụkụ peeji dị ka ndị na eme ìhè nke àkwà kama n'ihi na Proud chere na ndị ahịa ga-anọgide dị ndụ ebighị na-eji ngwaahịa ahụ
Ndewo wepụtara ihe na-eso ụra ha, Sense, na Febụwarị 24, 2015; e rere 21,000 n'oge a malitere ya
Ngwaahịa Sense gụnyere ngwaọrụ dị n'akụkụ àkwà, 'Sleep Pill' nke na-agbaso ndị na ụdị àlà úkwú ụra onye ọrụ site na ịpị ya na pillow, na ngwa na-agwọ ụra

Sense nwere ihe mmetụta nke na-agbaso okpomọkụ, ìhè, ụda na data nke ihe nọr na mkpóró ndị ogbi ozi ọma ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ ndị ikom abụọ igbu ndị na-adịghị anabata ma nwee ike igwu ụda iji nyere onye ọrụ aka ihi ụra
Ngwaahịa ahụ na-enye onye ọrụ akara ụra kwa abalị ma na-akpọte na onye ọrụ n'oge kwesịrị ekwesị n'oge ụra ha
Na Nọvemba 1, 2016, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wepụtara ụdị olu nke Sense sleep tracker

Kà àkà gbúrù nwéré ama ọ na-agbalị ịchọ onye na-azụ ahịa, Proud mara ọkwa na June 12, 2017, na blọọgụ na ọkara Ndewo ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị ga-emechi ma ụlọ ọrụ ahụ chụpụrụ ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ha n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
A kọkwara na Hello enweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ ya
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwuru na ha na Fitbit nọ na mkparịta ụka maka ha inweta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, mana há sị ọ bụrụ ndị na eme ìhè nke dị ka ndị mmadụ na ímé ihe nọr na ímé enwetaghị nkwekọrịta
Ndey Tapha Sosseh (amụrụ n'afọ 1979) bụ onye nta akụkọ Gambia na onye unionist
N'afọ 2004, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Daily Observer, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa ụbọchị na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Gambia
Site na 2008 ruo 2011, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Gambia Press Union

Sosseh bụ onye gọọmentị lekwasịrị anya n'ime afọ ikpeazụ nke ọchịchị Yahya Jammeh, nke ka ukwuu n'ihi nzaghachi ya na ogbugbu nke onye nta akụkọ Deyda Hydara, na ọ nọrọ 2009–2017 na Mali, ebe o nwere ikike ịbụ nwa amaala abụọ
A mụrụ Ndey Tapha Sosseh na 1979 na Banjul, isi obodo Gambia
Ndị mụrụ ya bụ Adelaide Sosseh Gaye [de], onye na-akwado ikike mmadụ na Mustapha Sosseh, onye nwụrụ na mberede mgbe nne ya dị ime ọnwa atọ
Sosseh malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi na Daily Observer, akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke Gambia kwa ụbọchị, na June 1998
Ọ ghọrọ onye nta akụkọ na onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, mechaa na-agba ọsọ kọlụm 'Women in Development'
N'afọ 2000, ọ kwagara United Kingdom maka ọzụzụ ọzọ na ọrụ odeakụkọ
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta masters na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa na Mahadum Central England dị na Birmingham wee gụkwaa akwụkwọ na Warwickshire College tupu ọ laghachi Gambia na June 2004
Mgbe ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ, ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Daily Observer ka afọ ahụ gasịrị, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na-eduzi akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa ụbọchị na Gambia
Na Jenụwarị 2005, Momodou Sanyang nọchiri ya n'ọrụ ahụ
Mgbe ọnwa abụọ gachara, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Gambia Press Union
Mgbe ahụ, n'afọ 2008, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi Mgbe ahụ, na 2008, a họpụtara ya ịbụ onyeisi oche nke GPU, na-anọchi anya onye isi ala Madi Ceesay
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa onye isi ala ruo n'afọ 2011, mgbe Emil Touray [de] gbara ọsọ megide ya wee merie, na-aghọ onye ndu ọhụrụ GPU
N'oge ya dị ka onyeisi oche nke GPU, Sosseh gara biri na Bamako, Mali, malite na June 2009
Oghọrọ onye gọọmentị lekwasịrị anya n'ihi nkwupụta ya n'afọ ndị sochiri ogbugbu onye nta akụkọ ibe ya Deyda Hydara

N'afọ 2011, e boro ya ebubo ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru na Gambia maka ọrụ ya na otu a na-akpọ Coalition for Change - The Gambia (CCG), na ọchịchị Gambian n'okpuru Mịnịsta Ofesi Mamadou Tangara chọrọ ka achụpụ ya
Na nzaghachi, Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ndị nta akụkọ nke Mba Nile goro ndị nchekwa oge nile iji chebe ya
Tangara mechara gọnarị na ọ chọrọ ka a kpụpụta ya ma kwuo na ya akwadola maka nchebe ya
Sosseh laghachiri Gambia site na ndọrọ n'agha n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2017, mgbe a họpụtara Yahya Jammeh na ntuli aka onye isi ala Gambia n'afọ 2016
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nke Minista nkwurịta okwu na mgbasa ozi Demba A
Jawo
Na July 2019, Sosseh gbara akaebe n'ihu Gambia's Truth, Reconciliation and Reparations Commission, na-ekerịta ahụmịhe ya na nyocha onwe ya na nrụgide na ndị nta akụkọ n'okpuru President Yahya Jammeh
Di Sosseh bụ onye Mali, nke nyere ya ohere inweta ikike ịbụ nwa amaala Malii

Nhazi ọdịnaya, nke a makwaara dị ka nchịkọta akụkọ, nchịkọta akụkọ zuru oke, nhazi macro, ma ọ bụ nchịkọta akụkọ dị arọ, bụ ụdị nhazi mbipụta nke na-enyocha nhazi, ụdị, na ọdịnaya nke akwụkwọ iji mee ka atụmatụ ọhụụ na nghọta dị mma
Ndị editọ zuru oke bụ ụdị ọkachamara asụsụ
Ndezi ọdịnaya anaghị agụnye iji akwụkwọ ntuziaka, nduzi, ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ ntuziaka, ma lekwasị anya kama na ihe ga-eme ka isi ihe ederede ahụ ghọtakwuo dabere na nyocha nke onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Usoro ahụ na-achọkarị mgbanwe dabere na ajụjụ okwu metụtara ịdị mfe nghọta na arụmọrụ
Nhazi ọdịnaya na-elekwasị anya na ebumnuche echiche n'ozuzu, ọdịnaya, nhazi, na ụdị edemede nke ederede a na-atụle
Edemede ọdịnaya anaghị agụnyekarị iji akwụkwọ ntuziaka, ntuziaka, ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ ntuziaka, ma na-elekwasị anya kama na ihe ga-eme ka isi ihe dị n'ime ya nwee nghọta dabere na ntule nke onye ndezi
Usoro na-achọkarị mgbanwe dabere na ajụjụ nkwuputa okwu metụtara mfe nghọta na ịrụ ọrụ
Edemede ọdịnaya na-elekwasị anya na ebumnuche izugbe, ọdịnaya, nhazi, na ụdị edemede nke ederede n'uche
Edezi ọdịnaya dị irè nwere ike ikwe ka akwụkwọ na-agbagwoju anya doo anya na nkenke, yana dị mfe ịgụ
Ndozi ọdịnaya abụghị naanị na-enye ohere nkwalite na ọgụgụ, kamakwa ọ na-adọrọ mmasị
Tebụl, eserese, na idobe onyonyo nwekwara ike ịbụ akụkụ nke ndezi ọdịnaya dị mma
N'adịghị ka copyediting, nke na-agụnyekarị usoro iwu, nhazi ọdịnaya nwere ụkpụrụ nduzi na-esighị ike, karịa ihe a chọrọ n'ozuzu ya na mgbanwe ndị e mere na-eme ka a gụọ ya nke ọma
Ọ na-atụ anya mkpa nke onye na-agụ ya, ya mere ọ nwere ike ibute ihe isi ike ime mgbanwe ndị ọzọ dị aghụghọ, ebe ọ chọrọ nghọta nke ndị na-ege ntị
Ọzọkwa, nsogbu nwere ike ịpụta ma ọ bụrụ na onye edemede n'onwe ya dezie ọdịnaya ahụ ma ọ nwere ike ọ gaghị ahụ mmejọ nke ha
N'ihi ya, n'ọnọdụ ndị dị otú ahụ, a na-eji ngwá ọrụ nhazi iji hụ na edemede ahụ enweghị njehie

Anioma bụ otu ndị Igbo dị na Delta State, ha mejupụtara obodo ndị Igbo nke gafere mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo itenaani
Ha bi na Delta North Senatorial District, nke nwere Enuani (Oshimili / Aniocha), Ika, na Ukwuani / Ndokwa asụsụ mpaghara nke Delta State
Anioma pụtara 'Ala Dị Mma' n'asụsụ Igbo ma o nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na ya dị ihe dị ka nde mmadụ 18
Anioma dị n'ógbè West Basin nke Osimiri Niger, n'ebe ndịda n'ime steeti Delta nke Naịjirịa ugbu a, ọ na-agụnye ala dị dị ka 6,300 km2 [citation needed]
N'ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke steeti ahụ, a na-akpọkarị Anioma Delta North megide ndị ọzọ a maara dị ka Delta South na Delta Central n'otu steeti ahụ

Anioma nwere ókèala n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ site na Anambra State, n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ site na Obodo Imo na Rivers, n' ndịda Bayelsa State, n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ site na Isoko, n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke ndị Urhobo, n'etiti ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ ruo Edo State na n'ebe ugwu site na Kogi State
Ya mere, enwere ike iwere Anioma dị ka onye na-ejikọta ọtụtụ agbụrụ ndị agbata obi
Ndị mmadụ enwetawo ahụmịhe n'ihi ịnọ n'akụkụ ọtụtụ obodo, obodo na steeti ndị ọzọ nke na-akọwa Anioma dị ka otu n'ime mpaghara ndị udo na mba ahụ
E nwere mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo iri abụọ na ise na Delta State na itoolu dị n'okpuru mejupụtara mpaghara Anioma

Asụsụ nke Anioma gụnyere Enu-Ani dialect nke asụsụ Igbo nke a na-asụ na Ibusa, Ogwashi-Uku, Asaba, akụkụ nke Igbodo, Ilah, Isseles, Idumujes, Onichas wdg), asụsụ Ika (Agbor, Umunede, Owas wdg) & Ukwuani-Aboh Language nke ndị Ndokwa Ethnic Nationality na-asuru
E nwere ndị Anioma na steeti Edo nke Naijiria(Igbanke), steeti Anambra (Onitsha, Ozobulu, Obosi, Oraifite) steeti Imo (Oguta), steeti Rivers (Ndoni, Ogba) wdg
Obodo na obodo Anioma haziri n'usoro mkpụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru ebe a
Upwards of 11 million
Ndi Aro ma obu ndi Aros bu mpaghara ndi Igbo nke sitere na alaeze Arochukwu di na steeti Abia nke ugbu a, Naijiria
Enwekwara ike ịchọta Aros n'ihe dịka ógbè 250 ndị ọzọ kachasị na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Nigeria na n'akụkụ ya
Edebere ndi Aros taa dika ndi igbo ma obu ndi Cross River n’ihi ebe ha si, omenaala ha, na olu ha di iche iche
Chi ha bụ Chukwu Abiama bụ isi sekpụ ntị na mbido Aro Confederacy dịka ndi nwere ikikere na mpaghara Niger Delta na Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa n'ime narị afọ 18 na 19
Tupu ndị Igbo amalite ibata na mpaghara Aro na narị afọ nke iri na asaa, ndi Ibibio si na Benue na ebe plateau ma tọ-ntọala wee hiwe steeti dịka Obong Okon Ita na Ibom ọdịda anyanwụ nke Cross River
Mbugharị ndị Igbo nke Eze Agwu na Nnachi duuru wee banye na mpaghara Aro malitere n’etiti narị afọ nke iri na asaa
Ndị Igbo a na-akwaga mba ọzọ jikọtara ha na ndị nwe obodo Ibibio
Agha Aro-Ibibio na mbugharị nke Akpa si ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Cross River, guzobere mba ahụ n'oge ntụgharị nke narị afọ 17 na nke 18
Mmekọrịta ndị Igbo na nke Akpa, meriri ma chikọta ndị Ibibio mbụ ka ha lụchara agha ogologo afọ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, mmanụ nkwụ na ahia ohu ewuru ewu na mba ọzọ
Ka ọ na-erule n’etiti narị afọ nke iri na asatọ, e nwere ọtụtụ mbugharị nke ndị ọchụnta ego Aro rutere n’etiti ala Igbo na mpaghara ndị debere ya

Mbugharị a, mmetụta chi ha bụ Chukwu Abiama site n'aka ndị ụkọchukwu, na ike ndị agha ha site na njikọ aka na ọtụtụ agbata obi Igbo na ọwụwa anyanwụ Cross River (ọkachasị Ohafia, Abam, Abiriba, Nkporo, Afikpo, Ekoi, wdg) mebere ngwa ngwa
Aro Confederacy dị ka ikike akụ na ụba mpaghara
Agbanyeghị, ọda mba nke ndị Europe, ọkachasị ndị Britain na- achị Britain na- atụ egwu ikike akụ na ụba Aro na njedebe nke narị afọ nke 19
Esemokwu mechara duga ọgbụgba ọbara, na agha Anglo-Aro mere site na 1901 ruo 1902
Ndi Aro Confederacy jisiri obi ike ma mesịa merie ha
Nke a nyeere ndị Briten aka weghaara ndị ọzọ nke ghọrọ East Nigeria
Ndị Arọ nwere ọdịnala bara ụba
Otu ihe bụ ọha mmadụ bụ Ekpe bụ obodo dị nsọ nke sitere na ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Cross River
Ndi otu okpukperechi na ndi ikpe na-ekpe kariri ndi Aro
Ojiji e ji ede edemede, Nsibidi gbadoro ụkwụ na ndị otu nzuzo dị ka Ekpe
Uli, usoro ederede ọzọ, mere nke ọma n'ụdị ahụ
Ihe ọzọkwa bụ ụlọ nsọ Chukwu Abiama, bụ nke ndị ụkọchukwu Aro malitere
Ha metere ndị agbata obi na ndị ha na ha jikọrọ aka tupu mwakpo Britain na mbibi nke ụlọ nsọ Chukwu Abiama na ụkọchukwu nke Aro
Omume masiri nke Ekeleke dị mkpa n’obodo Aro

Ezinaụlọ Ohuhu nke Umuahia dị na mgbago ugwu nke Abia Steeti bụ ndị Igbo, akpọrọ Ohonhaw, hiwere otu obodo pụrụ iche dị n’Umuahia, Abia steeti, Naịjirịa, nwere ọtụtụ obodo dị iche iche gụnyere Umukabia, Ohiya, Isingwu, Ofeme, Afugiri, Nkwoegwu, Umuawa, Umudiawa, Akpahia, Umuagu, Amaogugu, Umule- Eke-okwuru, Umuhu-Okigha, Amaogwugwu kporo eziama / Amaudo In Ohuhu etc
A na-akpọbu Ohuhu dịka Umuhu-na-Okaiuga, ma ọ bụ onye a maara nke ọma dịka Ọhu-ahia-na-otu
Ruo 1949, Umuopara ezinụlọ bụbu akụkụ nke Ohuhu
tupu ewepụta ha na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Enwere nkwenye dị iche iche gbasara mmalite nke ndị Ọhuhu
Otu echiche bụ na ndị Ohuhu anaghị akwagharị n’ebe ọ bụla
Ekwadoro echiche a bụ na ọtụtụ obodo dị na Ohuhu nwere ebe obibi ochie ha ma ọ bụ nke ha gbahapụrụ agbahapụ, Ọkpuala, dịkwa na Ohuhu

Ọ bụ ezie na echiche a yiri ihe ezi uche dị na ya, ụfọdụ obodo nta dị na Ohuhu taa nwere ike iji nkwenye kwenye na ebe obibi ochie ha gaa n’èzí Ohuhu, n’agbanyeghi na ha nwere okpuala ọzọ dị ugbu a na Ọhuhu
Umukabi, Umuawa, Umuagu, Umungasi na Umudiawa bụ ihe atụ olemaole na otu a
Ekwuola na ọ dịkarịa ala ngalaba nke Umuhu ndị Ohuhu si mpaghara Isuikwuato na akuku Awgu
Nkwenye siri ike karịa ndị ọzọ bụ echiche ahụ bụ na ndị Ohuhu si n'otu akụkụ nke ndi Etiti dị ugbu a kwaga
N'ikwu ya n'ụzọ doro anya, echiche a na-ahapụ ọtụtụ ụdị dị iche iche
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, otu ọdịnala na-ekwu na njem ahụ malitere site na Orsu wee metụ Okiwudo na Akaokwa niile na mpaghara Orlu
Ọ bịarutere Anara-Osu
Omenala ahụ na-ekwu na ebe ahụ, ka ndị nna ochie Ohuhu nọ na-egbu oge, ndị nna ochie Obowo nọ n’ihu ha gara n’ihu na njem ha wee biri n’ebe ha dị ugbu a tupu ndị Ohuhu esonyere ha
Versiondị ọzọ kwusiri ike na ndị Ohuhu, ha na ndị ogbo ha Obowo, si na mpaghara Nekede dị na Owerri kwaga
N'ihe metụtara echiche a, ụfọdụ ndị ode akwụkwọ kwenyere na n'ọdịnala, ndị nna ochie Ohuhu-Ngwa guzobere akụkụ nke mbugharị site na Agbaja na Owerri wee kwaga Osimiri Imo
Ma mbugharị a bidoro na Orlu, Nekede, Agba ma ọ bụ Ahiara, ebe atọ a dị n’otu ala adịghị emebi emebi
Aha ana - agughachi na ncheputa ndi a, bu Obowo - agburu bi na odida anyanwu Osimiri Imo Osimiri a, nke di n'etiti agburu Obowo na nke Ohuhu, bu ma ebe di nma ma oli
Ma ndị Ọhuhu kwagara na mpaghara Orlu ma ọ bụ Owerri, ọ dị mkpa na ha gafere ókèala Obowo tupu ha erute na ebe ha bi ugbu a
Ebe a nwere ike ịbụ ebe izu ike nke njem dị ogologo iji gaa ala e kwere ná nkwa
Enwere ike inwe mmekọrịta n'etiti Ohuhu na Obowo n'eziokwu, maka na ọtụtụ ebe na aha obodo n'ime agbụrụ ọ bụla nwere ndị ha na ibe ha
Akụkụ abụọ sara mbara nke Ikenga na Ihite, dịka ọmụmaatụ, dị na ha abụọ
Ndi obodo Umukabi na Umuagu bu ndi amara na ha nwere n’oge emume ha na ndi ogbo ha ndi Obowo iji cheta ezi nwanne ha
N'otu aka ahụ, a sị na ụmụ Umuawa nọ na Ohuhu si na Umuoparaodu na Umudibi si Obowo kwapụ, ebe a ka nwere ike ịmata ebe ebe ha bi taa
Ihe dị ka arụmụka kachasị sie ike maka ọdịmma nke Ohuhu-Obowo bụ ihe ha nwere nke chi pụrụ iche - Ajana, nke kachasị dị elu na ezinụlọ abụọ ma bụrụ naanị nke abụọ
Ndi Okereke-Onyiuke (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1950) bụ onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Nigerian Stock Exchange na nwanyị mbụ na-ere ahịa na Nigeria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Queen's School, Enugu, Nigeria O nwetara MBA ya na Finance na Computer Science na City University of New York, USA

Ọ bụ ezie na Okereke-Onyiuke kwuru na ọ nwetara Doctor of Philosophy yana Doctor of Administration in Finance and Securities Market site na Graduate School nke otu mahadum ahụ, ọ dịghị ndekọ dị ka mahadum si kwuo na ọ gara mmemme ahụ ma nye ya akara ugo mmụta ahụ
Ndi Okereke-Onyiuke malitere ọrụ na Nigerian Stock Exchange na Jenụwarị 1983 dị ka onye njikwa na onye isi nyocha na ozi
Ọ gbagoro n'ọkwa kachasị elu nke Director General na Chief Executive Officer nke Nigerian Stock Exchange (NSE)
Ndi Okereke Onyiuke bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị a ma ama na Naịjirịa nke nọ n'ọkwa ọchịchị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị mkpa
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa nke onye isi nke NSE
Ndi Okereke-Onyiuke n'etiti ndị ọzọ bụ ndị Professional Excellence Foundation of Nigeria (PEFON) kwanyere ùgwù maka ịdị mma na idu ndú na ọrụ ha

Ndidi Nnoli-Edozien (amuru ya na July 31, 1972) bu onye omuru oha na eze Naijiria na onye okachamara nkwado na ibu ọrụ na Bottom of the Pyramid empowerment
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Growing Businesses Foundation, nnukwu ala ala Nigeria nke na-ahụ maka ọrụ CSR maka ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche
Ọkwa ya dị ka onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta mmadụ ka Bertelsmann AG bụ onye jikọrọ ya na Reinhard Mohn Fellow
Na African Conference on Women in Governance, Business and Community Leadership na Women of Influence Awards na London 2010, ọ natara African Star Excellence Award in Business Development
Otu onye otu International Finance Corporation (IFC), Nnoli-Edozien enyela aka na ndozigharị amụma na Naijiria site na ọrụ ya na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị na ụlọ ọrụ

A mụrụ Nnoli-Edozien na Karlsruhe City na Jamanị ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Queen's College Lagos na 1989 wee gụọ akwụkwọ na London School of Economics and Political Science, United Kingdom wee nweta nzere BSc na Economics

Nnoli-Edozien nwetara akara ugo mmụta nna ya ukwu na Mahadum Johann Wolfgang Goethe, Frankfurt am Main, Germany na nkà mmụta okpukpe Katọlik tupu ya emee PhD na Mahadum Johann Wolfgang Goethe na mpaghara 'ihe nwe na njikwa njikwa' na-elekwasị anya n'ụzọ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke mba ụwa
Ụdị ndị Africa nke ọchịchị ụlọ ọrụ na nkwado
Ọ bụ nwata akwụkwọ nke Wharton Business School, ogara mmemme ndị isi na INSEAD na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ judge business school Cambridge
Ọ na-akụzi, nwa oge, ụkpụrụ omume, ịzụ ahịa ọha na eze na nkwado na ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa Lagos
Ọktoba 1999, Nnoli-Edozien hiwere ụlọ ọrụ Growing Businesses Foundation dị ka ikpo okwu iji kwado mmepe ụlọ ọrụ na Bottom of the Pyramid in Nigeria

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2001, Nnoli-Edozien tọrọ ntọala Micro-enterprise Development Co-operation, MDC bụ ikpo okwu maka nyochaa omume kacha mma nke mba ụwa na obere ego maka iwulite ndị na-ahụ maka ego na-adabere na onwe na nke na-adịgide adịgide nke na-azụlite ma na-eto obere azụmahịa ka ọ bụrụ ihe kwesịrị ekwesị na nke ọha mmadụ
ndị na-enye ọrụ
Site na Nọvemba 2004 ruo Disemba 2005, Nnoli-Edozien jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchiteanya Africa nke Bank für Orden und Mission, Germany
Na Jenụwarị 2011, ọ sonyeere kọmitii nhazi Central nke Nigerian Economic Summit Group (NESG)
N'April 2011, Nnoli-Edozien kweere ibu onye otu National Committee on Job Creation na Nigeria nke Aliko Dangote bụ onye isi oche ma malite ịmepụta atụmatụ ọrụ maka ịmepụta ọrụ na Nigeria
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2012 Nnoli-Edozien b
Ndị International Finance Corporation họpụtara Nnoli-Edozien ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke AB Microfinance Nigeria

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2012, ndị Federal Ministry of Communication Technology họpụtara ya dị ka akụkụ nke ọtu onye otu onye Honourable Minista na-ahụ maka ICT kpọkọtara iji depụta amụma ICT zuru oke maka Naijiria

Ndidi Dike's most recent solo show 'Waka-into-Bondage The Last ¾ Mile” for CCA (Lagos 2008) was curated by Bisi Silva
this exhibition was commemorating the 200th anniversary of the abolition of slave trading, that was ignored within the cultural calendar of Nigeria
Through her works in 'Waka-into-Bondage', Ndidi Dike is determined to keep alive the memory of the epochal matter that led to the capture, enslavement, killing or death of some 21 million Africans

In an insightful conversation with curator Bisi Silva about this exhibition, Ndidi Dike said “I visited Badagry in 2002 to see the slave route through which large numbers of our people were sent to the Americas to work daily, for long hours on plantations under subhuman conditions
During that visit, I knew I was standing face to face with history
Yet, much as I wanted to go back sooner, it only happened in 2007 at which point I knew I wanted to capture in a dramatic visual form this cataclysmic episode in human history

No-one can visit Badagry without being moved by this ignoble part of our history or by the consequences of man’s inhumanity” Dike’s experimentation with form led to the sculptural offering “Dwellings, Doors and Windows” in which she appropriated harbour pallets; she then broke them down to reconfigure the materials in a manner that evoked the Middle Passage
Blood is a striking motif of the sculpture, and Dike explains “The blood represents what was shed before, during and after the Trans-Atlantic trade, but also what continues to be shed today” –
Although slavery is no longer legal anywhere in the world, human trafficking remains an international problem and an estimated 298 million persons are living in illegal slavery today
In modern times, the trading of children has been reported in modern Nigeria

Ndidi Dike announced in an interview after her last exhibition that she would like to further explore this issue in her future works 'As I stated earlier, slave trading may have been abolished by the British parliament 200 years ago, but it is still in practice in certain countries
There are so many countries where the condition of the Black people leaves much to be desired
These new forms of slavery are not yet captured in the current works
I hope to reflect them soon in another set of works'
Ndidiamaka Nneoma Amutah-Onukagha (amụrụ n'afọ 1981) bụ onye dọkịta America bụ Julia A
Okoro Prọfesọ nke ihe gbasara ahụike ndị nne ojii na Tufts University School of Medicine

Amutah-Onukagha bụ onye enyemaka Dean nke mbụ na Tufts University nke Diversity, Equity, na Inclusion maka ahụike ọha
A kpọrọ ya onye ọkachamara na-eto eto nke afọ 2019 nke American Public Health Association Maternal and Child Health Section
A mụrụ Amutah-Onukagha ma zụlite ya na Trenton, New Jersey ma gaa Trenton Central High School Nne na nna ya siNaijiria
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Amutah-Onukagha tụfuru enyi ya n'ihi nsogbu mgbe ọ mụsịrị nwa, nke kpaliri Amutah'Onukagha ịchụso nzere kọleji
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rutgers, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ọmụmụ Africa na ahụike ọha na eze
Ọ sonyeere Mahadum George Washington dị ka nwa akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere masta na ahụike ọha na eze

A kpọrọ ya onye nyocha W
Kellogg Foundation na Mahadum Morgan State n'afọ 2012 tupu ọ banye na Mahadim Montclair State iji kụzie ahụike ọha

Na Mahadum Tufts, Amutah-Onukagha guzobere Maternal Outcomes for Translational Health Equity Research (MOTHER) Lab, ụlọ nyocha nke na-achọ iwepụ ọdịiche dị iche iche nke ahụike nne

Ndombe Opetum (March 3, 1944 , May 24, 2012), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Pepe Ndombe, bụ onye Odemba na-edekọ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-agụ egwú, na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
Ọ bụbu onye otu egwu soukous TPOK Jazz nke na-achịkwa egwu egwu Congolese site na 1960s ruo 1980s
Ndombe Opetum bụ onye isi na-agụ egwú maka Afrisa International, tupu ọ banye na TPOK Jazz, n'etiti afọ 1970, mgbe Sam Mangwana hapụrụ òtù ahụ
Ọ bịara na TPOK Jazz na onye na-akpọ mpi Empopo Loway, ọ nọrọkwa n'òtù ahụ ruo mgbe ọ kewara na Disemba 1993, afọ anọ mgbe onye guzobere François Luambo Makiadi nwụsịrị
Ndị otu egwu nke oge ahụ gụnyere ndị na-agụ egwú Wuta Mayi, Michel Boyibanda, Josky Kiambukuta na Youlou Mabiala, na onye na-agụ egwu rhythm Simaro Lutumba na onye na'onwe ya Franco
A na-ekwu na Ndombe Opetum dere egwu ndị a maka òtù ahụ, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Mgbe ọnwụ Franco na afọ 1989, TPOK Jazz nọgidere na-egwuri egwu ruo afọ anọ
Simarro ga-elekọta ndị egwu na ezinụlọ ga-elekọta Ndị ọka iwu, ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka teknụzụ
Ndị na-agụ egwú ga-ekere òkè na 70% nke ego, ebe ezinụlọ Franco ga-edebe 30% nke ego niile
Otú ọ dị, esemokwu bilitere n'etiti ndị egwu na ezinụlọ Franco na òtù ahụ kewara na ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 1993
Ndombe Opetum, ya na Simaro Lutumba, Josky Kiambukuta na ihe dị ka iri atọ bụbu ndị otu TPOK Jazz
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere otu egwu Bana OK na Jenụwarị nke afọ 1994 ma bụrụ onye otu egwu ahụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Mee 2012
A mụrụ Pepe Ndombe Opetum na Bandundu Province na ihe a maara mgbe ahụ dị ka Belgian Congo na afọ 1944
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Leopoldville (nke bụzi Kinshasa)
Ọ lụrụ di ma bụrụ nna ụmụ itoolu
Nwa ya nke ise bụ nwa nwoke, amụrụ na Kinshasa na 3 na ọnwa Machị nke afọ 1974, onye bụkwa onye ọkachamara na-agụ egwú na DRC
Nwa okorobịa Ndombe na-akpọ onwe ya Baby Ndombe ma ọ bụ Baby Black, ma rụọ ọrụ maka nnukwu ndị na-ege ntị na Africa, Europe na North America, na-elekwasị anya na ndị Afrịka
Pepe Ndombe Opetum nwụrụ n'ihi nkwụsị obi na ọnwa Mee 24, 2012, na Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of Congo
Na oge ọnwụ ya, a kọrọ na ọ dị afọ 68

Ekekwe (amuru July 1975) bu onye okachamara Naijiria, onye nmeputa, injinia, ode akwukwo, na onye ọchụnta ego Ọ bụ onye nchoputa nke First Atlantic Semiconductors

Ahụmịhe ọrụ ya gụnyere Analog Devices Corp ebe o mebere ọgbọ accelerometer maka iPhone wee mepụta ngwugwu ọkwa mgbawa ọkwa mbụ nke ụlọ ọrụ maka ihe mmetụta inertial Ọ bụ onye ọkpụkpọ na ụlọ ọrụ semiconductor US ebe ọ na-emepụta microchip ọhụrụ wee chepụta micro-controller maka roboti ahụike The Guardian (Nigeria) kpọrọ Ndubuisi Ekekwe aha na 2020 dị ka otu n'ime ndị Naijiria 60 n'ime afọ 60 na-eme 'Nigerian Lives Matter'

A mụrụ Ekekwe na Ovim, Abia State south-east Nigeria O si n'agbụrụ Igbo na Naịjirịa Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nka na ụzụ Secondary ebe o debere ndekọ site n'inweta ọdịiche asatọ Ọ gakwara na mahadum Federal University of Technology, Owerri ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na Electrical engineering wee gụchaa dịka nwa akwụkwọ kacha mma na klaasị ya Ndubuisi nwere akara ugo mmụta doctoral abụọ na nna ukwu anọ, gụnyere MTech sitere na Federal University of Technology, Akure, Nwada sitere na Tuskegee University, USA na MBA sitere na Mahadum Calabar O nwetara Doctorate abụọ na Management na St
Clements University na Electric
Ekekwe bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ semiconductor US ma jee ozi na kọmitii E&D nke United States National Science Foundation Engineering Research Centre
Ekekwe bụ onye isi oche nke JPL Financial Group, ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ gbasara ego dabere na California nke na-akwado isi ego maka ọrụ na Africa

Dị ka onye nchoputa nke African Institution of Technology, ọ na-akwado inye nkwado mmụta bara uru, na-akwado ntinye iwu nke nkà na ụzụ ma na-eme ka nkà na ụzụ mmepụta ihe dị n'okpuru ala na-esite na akụ na ụba Africa
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ kwadoro Atlantic Americas, ụlọ ọrụ injinia, na-ahụ maka nnukwu ọrụ n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ugwu Nigeria
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Diamond Bank na Naijiria
Ekekwe chepụtara ụzọ pụrụiche e ji chịkwaa nrụrụaka nke igwe rọbọt ọgwụ eji eme ịwa ahụ
Na 2017, Gọọmenti United States nwetara ikike ndị kenyere ikike na patent

Ekekwe edewo akwụkwọ maka Harvard Business Review na nso nso a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye nlekọta nhọrọ nke Tony Elumelu Entrepreneurship Programme nke $100 Million Ekekwe nwekwara asambodo na ngalaba ndị dị mkpa na teknụzụ ma nweekwa aha ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ dị elu na akwụkwọ nka n'etiti akwụkwọ akụkọ na ọgbakọ ọgbakọ gbasara teknụzụ O nwekwara akwụkwọ ikike abụọ na-echere na Microelectronics ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na mahadum, ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ na World Bank Ndị otu ndị ndu Africa asọpụrụla ya dị ka 'Onye Ndú Ọgbọ Ọhụrụ maka Africa' Ọ bụkwa onye otu TED Akwụkwọ ya 'Nanotechnology and Microelectronics Global Diffusion, Economics and Policy' natara IGI Global 'Book of the Year' Award na 2010

World Economic Forum kwanyere ya ugwu na 2013 dị ka onye ndu ụwa na-eto eto maka mmezu ọkachamara ya na ntinye aka ya ọha mmadụ Ọ bụkwa otu ndị otu National Youth Council of Nigeria nyekwara ya nsọpụrụ maka ezigbo onye ndu Ọ bụ onye isi ngalaba na Tekedia Institute's Mini-MBA, mmemme njikwa ihe ọhụrụ nke ọnwa anọ, ahaziri maka mmebe azụmahịa na uto, yana mkpuchi ọrụ dijitalụ

N'afọ 2020, Ekekwe wepụtara akwụkwọ ọ kpọrọ aha 'The Dangote System Techniques for Building Conglomerates' gbasara onye ọchụnta ego n'Africa bụ Aliko Dangote Dị ka ya si kwuo 'Ebumnuche nke akwụkwọ ahụ bụ igosi ike nke ọhụụ, ime ihe na ịchọta ohere na ahịa
Aliko Dangote, onye nchoputa nke Dangote Group, otu ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, bụ otu n'ime ndị kasị mkpa na azụmahịa Africa '

A mụrụ ya na Ibadan na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ, Naịjirịa na Julaị 14, 1959 n'obi eze nke ndị Owa Kingdom, Delta Steeti

Prince Chinedu Munir Nwoko (amụrụ ya na ụbọchị Iri abụọ na otu na ọnwa Disemba 1960) nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Ned Nwoko bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria, onye ọrụ ebere na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye otu House of Representatives n'etiti 1999 na 2003 na-anọchite anya Aniocha/Oshimili Federal Constituency, Delta State
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2020, o mere njem ihe atụ gaa Antarctica ibido oru ngo iji kpochapụ ịba
Nke ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ojii Africa mbụ gara South Pole (Antarctica)
A mụrụ Prince Chinedu (Ned) Munir Nwoko na ụbọchị iri abụọ na mbụ nke onwa Disemba, 1957 n'ime Nwoko Royal Family, Idumuje Ugboko Kingdom na Aniocha North Local Government Area
Ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Naịjirịa
Ọ gakwara King's College London, ebe ọ nwetara LLM na iwu ụgbọ mmiri na azụmahịa
A kpọrọ Ned Nwoko ka ọ gaa n'ụlọ ikpe Bekee, na Lincoln's Inn
E nyere ya nzere Honourary Doctorate na Letters (DLitt) site na Commonwealth University College, Belize, North America
Nwoko malitere ọrụ iwu ya site na mmalite dị mkpirikpi na crown prosecution service ma ruo eru dị ka onye ọka iwu nke ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu nke England na Wales
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kumars Solicitors na Pascaldiers & Co Solicitors tupu o guzobe Ned Nwoko & Co Solicors na London
Nwoko bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu, ndị ọrụ iwu Naijiria na UK, onye otu Law Society, England na Wales ma bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ nleta, ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ ụmụ amaala, nke dị na London

Na ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke iwu ya na UK, o nwere nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ọka iwu nke kachasi ibu onye isi ojii nwere na England ma bụrụ onye a ma ama dị ka onye ọka iwu ojii kachasị mma nke agbụrụ Afrịka na England 1995
Nwoko laghachiri Naịjirịa n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1998 wee banye n'ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ụlọ omebe iwu n'agbata afọ 1999 na 2003

Ned Nwoko nyere aka na mmalite nkwụghachi London na Paris Club Loans na Naịjirịa
O dere akụkọ ndị mere ka gọọmentị Naịjirịa kwụsị ịdọrọ ego kwa ọnwa site na nkwekọrịta steeti na ịmalite ịkwụghachi steeti

Site na ụlọ ọrụ iwu ya, Ned Nwoko Solicitors na ụlọ ọrụ ya Linas International, ọ nyochara ndị na-akwụ ụgwọ mba dị iche iche wee chọpụta nghọtahie na ịkwụ ụgwọ ego, nke a dugara na nkwụghachi nke mbụ nke ego malitere site na nchịkwa Obasanjo
O bokwara gọọmentị etiti ebubo n'ụlọ ikpe n'aha gọọmentị ime obodo narị asaa na iri asaa na anọ maka ịkwụghachi ego iwu na-akwadoghị ma nweta ikpe nke $ 32 ijeri maka gọọmentị mpaghara
Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa enwetala ego niile kwekọrọ na mkpebi ikpe ụlọ ikpe nke afọ 2013

Naịjirịa n'okpuru Ọchịchị Buhari nwere ike imeri ndakpọ akụ na ụba ya nke ruru n'ókè n'ịkwụ ụgwọ ndị ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọha na eze na mmepe nke akụrụngwa
A kwụrụla ngụkọta nke ijeri dollar iri abụọ na steeti ya na gọọmentị ime obodo n'ihi ọrụ ya
Nwoko jere ozi na Vision 2010 Committee ma bụrụ onye otu ahịa isi obodo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke External Committee of Vision 2010
Nwoko bụkwa Onye isi oche nke Project Tourism Africa
Ned Nwoko bụ onye nkwado siri ike maka mkpochapụ ịba n'Africa
Ọ bụ onye malitere Ned Nwoko Malaria Eradication Project
Ọ malitere Ned Nwoko Malaria Eradication site na njem ihe atụ gaa Antarctica na ọnwa Jenụwarị 2020
Ntọala ahụ na-akwado mgbalị ndị dị ugbu a maka mmepe ọgwụ mgbochi site n'inye ego maka nyocha maka ọgwụ mgbochi ịba site na mmekorita ya na mahadum ndị na-eduga na Africa na ụlọ ọrụ nyocha ndị ọzọ
Na Jenụwarị 2020, Prince Ned Nwoko gosipụtara mkpọsa mkpochapụ ịba site na njem ihe atụ na Antarctica
Ned Nwoko mere akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ka onye isi ojii Africa mbụ gara South Pole, Antarctica
Ned jiri nlebara anya zuru ụwa ọnụ njem a dọtara iji mepụta mmata banyere ihe otiti nke Ịba na otu esi ekpochapụ ya kpamkpam n'Africa
Ned na ndị njem ndị ọzọ rutere na Geographical South Pole, otu n'ime ebe abụọ ebe axis nke ntụgharị ụwa jikọtara n'elu ya
N'ebe ahụ, o mere akụkọ ihe mere eme maka Naịjirịa na Afrịka site n'ịkwado ọkọlọtọ Naịjirịja na-eme ka Naịjiria bụrụ mba nke iri na atọ na-eweli ọkọlọtọ n'ebe ahụ
Agbanyeghị, Gọọmentị Naijiria ga-eme ihe ndị dị mkpa iji kwado nkwekọrịta Antarctic maka ọkọlọtọ ka ọ nọrọ ebe ahụ
Nwoko bụ onye guzobere ebe njem nlegharị anya Mount Delta, otu n'ime ebe njem nlegharị anya iri abụọ na otu nke gọọmentị Delta kwadoro
Ebe ndị njem nleta ahụ mejupụtara ihe ngosi nka, ugbo, zoo, ọdọ azụ, ọkụkọ na ogige golf oghere itoolu
Nwoko bụ onye guzobere Mahadum Sports,nke dị na Idumuje ugboko, Mahadum egwuregwu mbụ dị na sub Saharan Africa

Mahadum nke e nyere ikikere arụmọrụ na 2022 site n'aka gọọmentị etiti nke Nigeria, site na National Universities Commission NUC, na-enye ọmụmụ ihe na egwuregwu na ọzụzụ ndị ọzọ ma ga-amaliteghachi ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ zuru oke n'oge na-adịghị anya
Site na ntọala ya, Prince Ned Nwoko Foundation, o nyela aka n'inye ndị ntorobịa nke mpaghara ya, mpaghara ndị omeiwu na steeti ike na agụmakwụkwọ
N'afọ 2019, o nyere dollar narị puku abụọ na iri asaa na atọ (otu narị nde naira) maka imezigharị akụkụ ụzọ na-ejikọ South Eastern Nigeria na isi obodo mba ahụ, Abuja
Ned Nwoko nwere ọtụt nwunye ma nwekwa ụmụ
Neelima Azeem(amụrụ n'abalị abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba 1958) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke India, onye na-agba egwu oge gboo, onye edemede na nne nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Shahid Kapoor, Ishaan Khatter
A makwara ya na India maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn
Nna Neelima Azeem bụ Anwar Azeem, onye odeakụkọ Marxist a ma ama na onye edemede Urdu sitere na Bihar, na nne ya, Khadija, bụ onye ikwu Khwaja Ahmad Abbas
Azeem mụrụ ụdị Kathak nke ịgba egwu oge ochie nke India ma a zụrụ ya n'okpuru Birju Maharaj na Munna Shukla

Azeem na-apụta na fim nke asụsụ p Hindi na usoro telivishọn, o mekwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme na ihe nkiri, Phir Wahi Talash, Amrapali, Mma agha nke Tipu Sultan na Junoon N'afọ 2014, ọ gosiputara na ememme panchTatva kwa afọ nke Kathak nke Birju Maharaj 's Kalashram haziri na ogbe umuakwukwo bụ Bhartiya Vidya Bhavan na Mumbai
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri Hindi Sadak megide Deepak Tijori
Ọ lụrụ Pankaj Kapoor n'afọ 1979 mana ha mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm
Nwa ya nwoke Shahid Kapoor bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Bollywood
O mechara lụọ Rajesh Khattar wee mụọ nwa nwoke Ishaan Khattar bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri Bollywood

Negash bụ obodo dị na mpaghara Tigray nke Etiopia, nke dị n'okporo ụzọ Adigrat ruo Mekelle kilomita iri (62 kilomita) n'ebe ugwu Wukro
Ọ dị na Wukro woreda
A na-ewere Negash dị ka ebe obibi ndị Alakụba mbụ n'Africa; e gwupụtara ili ozu site na narị afọ nke asaa OA n'ime ókèala obodo
Ihe ndekọ Futuh al-Habasha Ahmad ibn Ibrahim al-Ghazi gara n'ili Ashama ibn Abjar na Negash n'oge ọ wakporo mpaghara Tigray (n'ihe dị ka 1537)
A makwaara Negash maka inwe otu n'ime ụlọ alakụba kachasị ochie n'Africa, ya bụ ụlọ alakụla Al Nejashi
N'afọ 2020 n'oge Agha Tigray, ụlọ alakụba Al Nejashi mebiri nke ukwuu site na bọmbụ na ịpụnara mmadụ ihe

Na tebụl ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke 2007 nke Central Statistical Agency bipụtara, a kọrọ na kebele Negash dị na ya nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ puku asaa na narị asaa na iri ise na atọ nke n'ime ha bụ ụmụ nwoke puku atọ na narị isii na asaa na ụmụ nwanyị puku anọ na otu narị na iri anọ na isii; a na-ekesa ha n'etiti ezinụlọ otu puku na narị isii na iri asatọ na itoolu na ụlọ ọrụ puku na narị isii na iri abụo na isii
Ọ bụ ezie na a maara ya maka mmekọrịta ya na Islam, 982% nke ndị bi na ya na-agbaso Chọọchị Ọtọdọks Tewahedo nke Etiopia, 11% nke ndị bi bụ ndị Protestant, na 07% fọdụrụ bụ ndị Alakụba
Negussie (nke a na-akpọkwa Negusse, Negusie ma ọ bụ Nigussie), nke pụtara 'Eze nke', bụ aha sitere na Etiopia nke nwere ike na-ezo aka na
Nehme (Arabic) bụ aha nna a ma ama na Lebanọn nke sitere na aha Nehme
Ka ọ na-erule na afọ 2014, Nehme bụ aha nna nke iri atọ na itoolu a na-ahụkarị na Lebanọn na ihe dị ka mmadụ iri na atọ na-ejide aha nna, ma ọ bụ ihe dị ka otu onye na ime mmadụ narị atọ na iri asatọ
Aha a sitere na okwu Arabic maka maka 'Ngọzi ' ma ọ bụ 'Amara'
E kwenyere na ezinụlọ Nehme sitere na osisi ezinụlọ Daou na otu na ime ụmụ ya, Nehme Daou, dị ka nna nke ezinụlọ Nehme niile dị na Levant
Lehfed, obere obodo dị nso na Byblos na mpaghara Byblos nke Lebanọn nke oge a, kwenyere na ọ bụ ebe nna nna nke ezinụlọ Nehme

Dị ka Ugwu Lebanọn bụ ebe a na-enwe ọgba aghara na-aga na ihu na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, a manyere ọtụtụ ezinụlọ Nehme ịgbaga na obodo ndị dị nso, gụnyere obodo Deir el Qamar, ebe ndị ọzọ gara na ebe ndịda iji ruo obodo Haifa na karịa
Aha nna Nehme bụ nke a ma ama na ime ezinụlọ ndị Kraịst dị na ebe ugwu Lebanọn; ezinụlọ Shia, Sunni, na Druze nọ na mba ahụ na-ekerịta aha nna ahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, alaka Shia nke osisi ezinụlọ dịkwa na ndịda Lebanọn, ọkachasị na obodo Mahrouna
Na ihi ihe ịma aka ndị transliteration na-eche ihu, ọtụtụ ọdịiche nke Nehme dị dị ka Naameh, Nemeh, Nimah na Naama

E nwere ezinụlọ Nehme ndị ọzọ na Middle East nke nwere ike ọ gaghị enwe njikọ na alaka Lebanọn, dịka ọmụmaatụ na Iraq, Iran, Jordan, Qatar na United Arab Emirates, ndị na-enwekarị 'Al-' ma ọ bụ 'Abu', dịka Al-Neama ma ọ bụ Abu Nimah
Neila Gonji (amụrụ na onwa nke iri na asoto na afọr otu puku narị ise na itoolu ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia
Ọ bụ Minista nke Ụlọ Ọrụ, Ike na Mmanụ ala ugbu a na Gọọmentị Bouden
Neils Walwin Holm (1866 - 1927?) bụ onye na-ese foto n'ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka nke mechara nweta ọzụzụ ọzọ dị ka onye ọka iwu
Ọ bụ 'onye na-ese foto kachasị mma nke Lagos, West Africa, site na 1890 ruo 1910'
A mụrụ Holm na Gold Coast
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na 1883, ma mụta ọrụ n'aka ụmụ nwanne nna ya, bụ ndị ọkachamara na-ese foto
N'ịhapụ ha na 1885, otu onye ahịa Germany nyere ya ọrụ nke bubatara ngwá ọrụ foto maka ya iji
Site na ọrụ ya, o jisiri ike zụta ngwá ọrụ ahụ, wee kwaga Lagos Colony na 1886
O wuru azụmahịa foto na-aga nke ọma n'ebe ahụ, na-enweta ọrụ mbụ site n'aka ndị ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye mbụ na Lagos Colony iji webata efere akọrọ, na-eji efere ndị e mepụtara na Ilford na England
Ọ lụrụ di na 1890, ọ bụ ezie na nwunye ya nwụrụ na 1892
Na Julaị 1893 Holm gara Britain na nke mbụ ya, na-eleta ihe ngosi Pall Mall nke Photographic Society of Great Britain
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Lagos, ọ kpọsara onwe ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya West Africa nke ndị na-emepụta ihe na mba UK
Ọ nọgidere na-enwe njikọ transatlantic site na iji adreesị eriri telegraphic na mgbasa ozi na magazin British Practical Photographer
N'afọ 1895, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Royal Photographic Society, ma n'afọ 1896 ọ ghọrọ onye otu
N'afọ 1900, ọ laghachiri London ịga nzukọ mbụ nke Pan-African Conference
Ọ gara London ọzọ na 1903
Na 1910 ọ hapụrụ foto, site na 1910 ruo 1917 ọ gara ọzụzụ na Middle Temple dị ka onye ọka iwu maka ụlọ ikpe Lagos
NEIMETH International Pharmaceuticals PLC bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ nke edepụtara n'ihu ọha nke e hiwere n'afọ 1997 ma nwee isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos Steeti
Ọ bụ onye bụbu onye isi nchịkwa nke Pfizer Products nke Naịjirịa guzobere ya iji nweta ụfọdụ akụ azụmaahịa nke Pfizor International na Naịjirị
Pfizer malitere ọrụ na Naijiria n'afọ 1957 na-ebubata ngwaahịa ya dịka Terramycin na mba ahụ
N'afọ 1962, ọ meghere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na Aba, ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ mbụ na British West Africa
Agha obodo na Naịjirịa metụtara mmepụta na ụlọ ọrụ Pfizer na Aba nke mere ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ tinye ego ọhụrụ iji wuo ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ na Oregun, Lagos
Ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ahụ gbasaa ngwaahịa Pfizer iji tinye ọgwụ ndị a na-etinye
N'afọ ndị 1990, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ chere asọmpi dị ukwuu ihu site na ngwaahịa ndị si Eshia na ndị rụrụ n'ime mba ahụ

Ọ bụ ezie na, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara ọtụtụ ahịa ya site na mmekọrịta ya na ndị na-emepụta ọgwụ na ụlọ ọgwụ, ịrị elu nke OTC oriri na mbubata nke generics gbanwere uche ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site na azụmaahịa gaa na ahịa azụmaahịa nke ọgwụ na OTCs
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mụbara mmepụta nke ọgwụ OTC na ahịa na ụlọ ahịa ọgwụ na ndị ọzọ n'elu ndị na-ere ahịa
N'afọ 1997, ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna na-emegharị ụwa niile site na ọgwụ OTC dugara na njikwa ịzụta ọtụtụ òkè
A kpọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ahụ Neimeth International Pharmaceuticals, iji sọpụrụ onye isi Pfizer nke nyere nkwado maka ọrụ Naijiria
Na mbido, Neimeth rụrụ ọgwụ ndị Pfizer International nyere ikike, na 2009, nyocha Neimeth n'ime ụlọ mepụtara ngwaahịa nke ruru pasenti iri atọ nke ego ya
N'etiti afọ 2010, Neimeth gafere oge furu efu, n'otu oge, ọ tụfuru ihe niile na-emepụta ihe n'ihe ọkụ
Nnyocha na mmepe nke Neimeth n'ime ụlọ mepụtara ọgwụ mkpá akwụkwọ maka njikwa nsogbu sickle cell a na-akpọ Ciklavit, na Cajanus cajan dị ka ihe na-arụ ọrụ
Ọgwụ ahụ bụ otu n'ime onyinye sitere na Neimeth Product Group, otu azụmaahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke na-erekwa onyinye ndị dị ka Normoretic na flexodene
Nejib Belkadhi (Arabic; amụrụ na Mee 13, 1972, na Tunis, Tunisia) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Ọ gụrụ nka ahịa na njikwa na Carthage High Commercial Studies Institute na Carthages, tupu ọ malite ọrụ na nka
Nejib nwere ọrụ mbụ ya na Hbiba Msika (Dancer of the Flame), ihe nkiri nke Selma Baccar, na 1995

Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na egwuregwu Mohamed Kouka bụ Madrasat Nisaa(مدرسة النساء / The Women's School), Otú ọ dị, ihe ịga nke ọma kachasị mma Nejib bụ na usoro El Khottab Al Bab (الخطاب عالباب /Many Fiancees) nke pụtara na mpịakọta nke mbụ na nke abụọ (1996 - 1998) maka onye nduzi Slaheddine Essid

Nejib Belkadhi malitere ọrụ ya n'ịduzi n'afọ 1998 na netwọk TV Canal+ Horizons, na-ekpuchi Carthage Film Festival, tupu o mepụta ihe ngosi TV kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na netwọk ahụ Chams Alik (شمس dom ), onye echiche ya gbanwere usoro ihe nkiri TV nke Tunisia
Ọ tụụrụ ime, mepụta ma soro gosipụta ihe ngosi ahụ site na 1999 ruo 2001

N'afọ 2002, ya na enyi ya Imed Marzouk guzobere Propaganda Productions, na 2003 ọ duziri ma mepụta ihe ngosi nke na-abụghị eziokwu nke ọha na eze nke a na-akpọ Dima Lebess (ديما لا باس /Always fine), nke a na'agbasa na Canal21 TV channel
O duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 2005, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi a na-akpọ Tsawer (Passoاور/Pic), nke nwere ihe nkiri nke Souad Ben Slimane

VHS Kahloucha (2006), ihe nkiri mbụ ya, gosipụtara ya na nnukwu otuto na mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa, nke gụnyere Cannes (2006), Philadelphia (2007), Sundance l (2007) na Dubai (2007), ọ bụkwa ọrụ ya kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma ruo ugbu a
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ya, Bastardo, na Toronto International Film Festival na Septemba 2013
Neku Atawodi-Edun (amụrụ na 1987), nke a na-akpọbu Uneku Saliu-Atawodi, bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Polo na Naijiria onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka, na onye ji ego achọọ ego
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka ịbụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole na-eme polo na ụwa niile, yana onye izizi na-eme egwuregwu ahụ dika ọkachamara
A zụlitere Uneku na Nigeria ma na England, Uneku na-agba egwuregwu mba ụwa ihe karịrị afọ iri
Ọ bụ onye Yvette Noel-Schure nọchitere anya, n'oge ya na-egwu Polo na USA
Ọ na-sonye na egwuregwu ihe karịrị obodo iri abụọ na abụọ na mba iri na anọ, ma merie asọmpi iko na Argentina, India, Ibiza na USA ebe ọ meriri Aiken 10 na afọ mbụ ọ na-egwu
O sonyere na asọmpi ikpeazụ na egwuregwu nke WCTA High, na-egwu maka otu Catalina diamonds
WCTA bụ asọmpi nke onye egwuregwu nwanyị, Sunny Hale haziri tupu ọ nwụọ
O jere ozi dị ka ihu ewguregwu Polo na Afrika maka afọ 2018
Ọ na-ewere ọnọdụ kwa afọ
Ndị ha na Saụt Afrịka gbaara n'afọ 2018 bụ Naịjirịa
Uneku nwetara nzere na mmuta bụ Equine Sports Science na Mahadum nke Brighton
O nwetakwara nzere mastas na International Business na Regent's University London

Igba mbọ Uneku n'ịhe gbasara azumahia gunyere Malaik - ebe ndi mmadu Afrika na-acho ahia na-achikota ndi mmadu ego, na Bamboo Green Concepts Malaik mere nkwekọrịta $300,000 nke mbụ ya n'ime ọnwa abụọ ebido
N’afọ 2016, Forbes Africa Magazine depụtara aha Uneku na-otu nke Forbes Africa 30 under 30
Malaik kwụsịrị ọrụ ya mgbe ndị nchekwa gọọmenti bụ Securities and Exchange Commission machibidoro ụdị ụfọdụ usoro nchikota ego na 2016
N’afọ 2016, Uneku sonyeere Meltwater Entrepreneurial School of Technology dị ka onye isi obodo mba Naịjirịa
MEST bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ nke na-azụ ma na-etinye ego na ndị ọchụnta ego n'Africa
O guzobekwara Ride to Shine, otu nzukọ na-ekpughe ụmụaka site n'ụlọ ndị n'enweghi ịhe ịga nke ọma site na usoro nke akpọọrọ equestrianism
Na 2008, Uneku haziri asọmpi mbụ maka egwuregwu polo nwanyị emere na West Africa na ụlọ egwuregwu polo na Kaduna
Ụmụ nwanyị si mba asatọ dị iche iche zọọrọ mpi ahụ
Ọ haziri egwuregwu polo mbụ a na-agba na-akuku mmiri bụ Africa Beach Polo Cup, nke SuperSport gosiri na televishọn, ya mere ndị mmadu matara egwuregwu ahụ n'Afrika
Na 2013, Uneku bụ isiokwu nke Trace Sports Stars, mmepụta nke Trace Urban nke soro ya gburugburu ụwa maka egwuregwu polo na mba dị iche iche maka idee na ịkekọrịta akụkọ njem ya
E wezụga polo, Uneku bụ onye na-ekwu okwu banyere teknụzụ, mmalite, na azụmaahịa n'Afrika

Ọ na-ekwu okwu mgbe niile na mmemme Forbes Africa haziri, ma na enyekwa aka na Techcabal, blọọgụ teknụzụ gbadoro anya na mba Afrika site na Lagos, na Global Citizen, bụ ikpo okwu lekwasịrị anya na mmepe
Na Mee 2019, Access Bank, bụ gosipụtara Uneku dị ka onye nnọchi anya ya na ihu nke akara W ya
W bụ ụzọ ebumnuche iji nye ike, ijikọ ma gbaa ụmụ nwanyị ume
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na World Economic Forum na Davos n'afọ 2013
World Economic Forum Global Shaper
Forbes 30 under 30
Onye nhọpụta maka CNBC Young Business Leader of the Year, 2016
Nel Erasmus (amụrụ na 1928 na Bethal, Transvaal Province, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
Erasmus kwuru n'otu oge, m na-enwe obi ụtọ mgbe obi na isi yiri ka ha na-agagharị na eriri na ákwà ebe mmetụta na echiche yiri ka ọ dị n'ọgbaaghara
Maka m, abụọ a na-enwe ike ijide m na onyinyo m, obi m na isi m
Erasmus gụrụ akwụkwọ na Académie Ranson, École des Beaux Arts, na Sorbonne na Paris na 1953, ma gosipụta ọrụ ya na nke mbụ ya na Paris na 1955
Ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya bụ na South Africa na 1957, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa
Erasmus emepụtala ihe ngosi iri atọ n'onwe ya, sonye n'ihe karịrị ihe ngosi iri asaa ma bipụta akwụkwọ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe
Ọrụ ya nwetara otuto dị egwu n'ihi na ọ bụ naanị onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke a gụnyere na nyocha Michel Seuphoriz na 1964 nke abstraction, Abstract Painting 50 Years of Accomplishment

Ndị South Africa atọ ndị ọzọ ha na Erasmus nọrọ na Paris na mbido afọ 1950 na ndị yiri ka usoro nghọta nke eserese abstract na Paris bụ Christo Coetzee, Paul du Toit, na Eric Loubser sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ
Nel Erasmus bụ onye mbụ na-akwado Abstract Art na South Africa ma dị ka omume ma ụkpụrụ
Erasmus bụ onye nduzi nke Johannesburg Art Gallery (JAG) (1966 - 1977]

Onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi nka nke New Church bụ Marilyn Martin, onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi nke Thinking, Feeling, Head, Heart, na-akọwa ihe Erasmus na-enweghị atụ site na ọrụ ya abụọ, Space Dance II na Whirlwind, nke a na-akọwakọta ya site na ụdị ndị na-egbuke egbuke
Martin na-ekwu, ihe a na-ejikọta oge na-agbaze ma gbanwee onwe ya n'ime akara, ihe oyiyi na ihe ịrịba ama, nke ọ na-enwe n'ezie na nzuzo n'ime onwe ya
Ihe ịrịba ama ndị a nwere ike ịpụta kpọmkwem na isi ihe, ike ya; njikọ ya na ihe ndị ọzọ na-abụghị onwe ya
Nel Erasmus rụrụ ọrụ na Johannesburg Art Gallery (JAG) site n'afọ 1957 dị ka onye ọkachamara ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká dị ka onye nduzi na 1977
O nyere aka n'inweta ihe osise maka ọha na eze na ụlọ ọrụ (karịsịa Sanlam na Sasol) na South Africa, ọkachasị nchịkọta mba ụwa nke oge a dị na Johannesburg Art Gallery (JAG)
Nchịkọta a ma ama na 1973, afọ Picasso nwụrụ, nke Pablo Picasso Tête d'Arlequin (1971) mere ka o kwe omume site na onyinye ego sitere na ndị enyi nke nzukọ Museum

Nchịkọta nke ihe osise a nke onye na-eme ihe ọchị zutere mmegide site n'aka ndị na-agbaso omenala, ndị a na-enyo enyo, ndị nọpụrụ iche, ndị na-akpa ókè agbụrụ South Africa, na-enweghị onye nkịtị ga-achọ ihe osise ahụ, ma kpalie Erasmus ide akwụkwọ banyere ihe mere e ji nweta ya
Nel Erasmus dere na nzaghachi nye ndị nleta na Picasso Tête dīArlequin na nka adịghị ebe ahụ iji mee ka obi ụtọ ma ọ bụ gosipụta, ọ dị ebe ahụ iji kpughee
Erasmus na-ekwu na n'ihi na Picasso nwere mmetụta dị otú ahụ na nka n'oge anyị, ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie kwesịrị inwe ihe atụ nke ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ha na-adịgide adịgide
Site na nnweta a, JAG nwere ihe atụ nke ọrụ nke Picasso
Erasmus gwara ọha na eze ka ha ghara ịkpọ ihe osise ahụ nke onye na-eme ihe ọchị kama dị ka onye na-agba akwụna, wee nye ya nkwanye ùgwù o kwesịrị
Erasmus kọwara na ọ bụ iwu nke ebe ngosi nka ndị ọzọ dị na South Africa iji nweta nchịkọta nke nka South Africa mana JAG nwere iwu iji lekwasị anya na nka mba ụwa
N'oge ọ nọ n'ọkwa, ọ mụbakwara nchịkọta South Africa nke ukwuu
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1975, e mere ihe ngosi nke ndị omenkà ịrị anọ site na ihe JAG nwere
Nel Erasmus nọ n'afọ iri asatọ ya ma ọ ka na-ese ihe kwa ụbọchị
Ihe ngosi kachasị ọhụrụ ọ sonyere na ya bụ ihe ngosi onwe ya na 2009 na Dawid Ras Art Gallery (Johannesburg) na 2015 na Dawid Ras Gallery (Cape Town), na kemgbe ahụ ihe ngosi dị iche iche
Nelisa Mchunu (amụrụ n'abalị a8 nke ọnwa Febrụwarị afọ1992), bụ onye ome South Afrika, onye ome ejiji nlere anya, MC, ọkà okwu mkpali na onye ode akwụkwọ
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Soap opera igwe onyonyo dịka, Isithembiso, Isibaya na Uzalo dị ka fikile
A mụrụ Mchunu N'abalị abụọ nke ọnwa Febrụwarị afọ 1992 na Wartburg na KwaZulu-Natal, n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne iri
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ
O mechara tolite na Clermont, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, mgbe ya na nne ya kwagara mgbe ọ dị afọ 6
Nne ya bụ onye nkuzi
Nwanne ya nwanyị, Londeka Mchunu bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ nọ na klas nke asatọ, Nelisa na ụmụnne ya ndị nwoke abụọ kwagara Inanda, KwaZulu-Natal ka ha na nne nne ya nọrọ
OfN'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ mụtara nkà ihe omume
Edebara aha ya na Mahadum Witwatersrand ka ọ gụọ BA na Media Studies, mana ọ mechaghị akwụkwọ ahụ n'ihi nsogbu ego
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere nri na onye inyeaka nye ụlọ ọrụ PR tupu ọ banye ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2015, ọ sonyeere dị ka onye mgbakwunye na SABC 3 Soap opera telivishọn bụ Isidingo
Mgbe ahụ na 2016, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ 'Fikile' na Soap opera akpọrọ Uzalo
Ọrụ ya mere ya onye ama ama nke ukwuu, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo afọ isii ruo abali iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2021
A kwadoro igbu ọrụ ya dịka plt ahụ siri kwuo, mana Nelisa rịọrọ ka ọ ghara igbu ọrụ ahụ
Otú ọ dị, ndị na-emepụta ihe mesịrị kwụsị ọrụ ahụ, mgbe ọ na-enweghị ike ịga n'ihu na usoro akụkọ
Mgbe ọpụpụ ahụ gasịrị, ọ pụtara na SABC 1 soap opera Generations The Legacy site n'arụ ọrụ nke onye ahịa iwe n'ewe #Ezweni
N'ọgwụgwụ 2021, ọ laghachiri na ihe omume Uzalo
Nelisiwe Xaba, ónyé amụrụ na Soweto, South Africa, bụ ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede ihe nkiri na South Africa

A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na agbata obi Dube nke Soweto (Johannesburg, South Africa), Nelisiwe Xaba bụ ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na ónyé na-ede ihe nkiri nke malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-agba egwu na mbido afọ 1990 mgbè ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ ịgba egwu na Johannesburg Dance Foundation
N'afọ 1996, Xaba nwetara agụmakwụkwọ ọzọ na Rambert School of Ballet and Contemporary Dance na London, ebe ọ gụrụ ballet na usoro ịgba egwú nke oge a, n'okpuru nduzi nka nke Ross McKim
Mgbè ọ laghachiri South Africa na 1997, Xaba sonyeere Pact Dance Company tupu ọ malite ọrụ onwe ya, nke nyere ya ohere iso ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama rụọ ọrụ, gụnyere Robyn Orlin
Kemgbe ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'ọnwa ya, Xaba arụwo ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ma soro ndị na-ese ihe, ndị na-emepụta ejiji, ndị nduzi ihe nkírí na telivishọn, ndị na'ede uri na ndị na-eti egwu rụkọọ ọrụ
Ọrụ ndị dị mkpa nke Xaba, Plasticization na They Look At Me & That's All They Think, egosila na mbà ụwa ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Màkà Ha Na-ele M na Nke ahụ bụ Ihe niile Ha Na-eche, nke akụkọ Saartjie Baartman (nke a na-akpọkarị Hottentot Venus) kpaliri, Xaba so ónyé na-emepụta ejiji Carlo Gibson rụọ ọrụ

N'afọ 2008, ya na ónyé na-agba egwú na onye na'egwuregwu nke Haiti bụ Kettly Noël rụkọtara ọrụ iji mepụta Correspondances, ọrụ satirical gbásárá mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị, nke e gosipụtara na North na South America, Europe na Africa
N'afọ 2009, egwuregwu ya bụ Black!
White?, mmepụta nke Center de Développement Chorégraphique (Toulouse, France), gárá France dum
N'otu afọ ahụ, o mepụtara The Venus, na-ejikọta abụọ n'ime egwu egwu ya gárá aga, They Look At Me
na Sakhozi Says Non to the Venus, nke Musée du Quai Branly (Paris, France) nyéré iwu
Ọrụ Xaba na-emetụta n'ụzọ dị ukwuu site n'ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na nke na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, nke na-agbagha echiche gbásárá ahụ nwanyị ojii na echiche ndị metụtara okike
N'afọ 2011, Xaba bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nke Goodman Gallery South Africa gosipụtara, nke na-egosi ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke oge a si na kọntinent Afrịka
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara Xaba ka ọ gosipụta Venus na Venice dị ka akụkụ nke 'Imaginary Fact, Contemporary South African Art and the Archive' na South African Pavilion na irí isé na isé Venice Biennale
Ihe osise Xaba na-emeghachi omume na ọnọdụ mmekọrịta ya, ọkachasị ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ na-ejikọkarị ihe iji mebie ihe Mgbochi dị n'etiti ejiji na setịpụ ma na-akpọ ndị na-ege ya ntị ka ha tụgharịa uche n'ụkpụrụ arụmọrụ na nke na-anabata
N'ihe odide ya, Uncles and Angels, ya na ónyé nduzi Mocke J
van Vueren rụkọtara ọrụ iji mepụta arụmọrụ mmekọrịta na-agwakọta egwu na vidiyo nke na-ajụ echiche nke ịdị ọcha, ịdị ọcha, nnwale na ọdịnala
Ụmụnne nna na ndị mmụọ ozi na-ajụ echiche ndị a ajụjụ site n'ile anya n'ụzọ na-emegide onwé ya na mmekọrịta ike gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na mmekọrịta anụ ahụ site na arụmọrụ na projection
Kemgbe emere ya na mmemme FNB Dance Umbrella na South Africa, e gosipụtara Uncles and Angels na Germany, France (na 2013 na Avignon) na Austria
Ọrụ ahụ, nke dabeere na ihe nkiri 3D, meriri ihe nrite FNB Art Fair na 2013
Mmalite nke ọrụ a bụ ịgba egwu ahịhịa, omenala ọdịnala nke ime emume amaghị nwoke nke ụmụ agbọghọ tupu alụmdi na nwunye, na-eme ka ọtụtụ puku ụmụ agbọghọ Zulu gbakọta ọnụ
Ọ bụ ezie na omenala ahụ lara n'iyi ruo ógè ụfọdụ, ọ nwetaghachila onwe ya kemgbe mmalite afọ 1980 rụo n'ókè nke ịghọ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị ndị njem nleta
A na-awakpo ma ọ bụ dinaa ụfọdụ ụmụ agbọghọ n'oge emume ahụ

N'ime ihe ọzọ, Scars & Cigarettes, Xaba na-aga n'ihu na-enyocha mmekọrịta nke ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị site na ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị ụfọdụ na ọha mmadụ, na-elekwasị anya na ememe dị ichè íchè nke ịgafe ma ọ bụ ememe pụrụ iche màkà ụmụ nwoke, dị ka ibi úgwù

Ma ọrụ ọzọ, Fremde Tänze (Strange Dance), nke e mepụtara na 2014 dị ka akụkụ nke ebe obibi na Freiburg im Breisgau, Germany, na-ewere dị ka ọrụ mmalite ya site n'aka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri German na echiche nke exoticism
Mbipụta na-adịbeghị anya nke The Drama Review wepụtara ọtụtụ isiokwu agụmakwụkwọ na Xaba na ịgbanwe echiche ndị na-ege ntị zuru ụwa ọnụ na ọrụ ya
Nellie Mae Abrams (1946-2005) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na ndị otu Gee's Bend quilting collective
E gosipụtara nka ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston na Gund Gallery na Kenyon College, ma tinyé ya na nchịkọta nke Minneapolis Institute of Art na Philadelphia Museum of Art
Ọ bụ nwá nwanyị Annie Mae Young, ónyé bụkwa ónyé na-eme akwa

Nelly Artin Kalfayan nke a mụrụ na 3 Jenụwarị 1949 na Cairo, Egypt), nke a maara nke ọma site n'aha ya bụ Nelly, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe , onye na-agụ egwu, onye na'eme ihe ọchị, onye na na-agba egwu, onye telivishọn, na onye na-eme ntụrụndụ
A mụrụ Nelly na 1949 n'ezinụlọ ndị Ijipt nwere mkpọrọgwụ Armenia
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ọ gara mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị bụ nke ndị Armenia na-elekọta na Cairo
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke Feyrouz, onye a ma ama na-eme ihe nkiri nwatakịrị, na nwa nwanne Lubluba, onye ọzọ a ma ama nke Egypt-Armenia na-eme fim nke tọrọ ya
Nelly lụrụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ijipt aha ya bụ Houssam El-Din Mustafa, ma mesịa lụọ onye egwu bụ Moody Elemam n'oge dị mkpirikpi
O mechara lụọ Khaled Barakat (onye ọchụnta ego Ijipt) wee kwaga London, mgbe e mesịrị gbaa alụkwaghịm ma lụọ Adel Hossny, onye ọchụsa ego Ijipt ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ njem nleta
Nna ya bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ malitekwara ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, na-agbaso nzọụkwụ nke nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye, Feyrouz, onye bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri iri na abụọ dị ka nwatakịrị, ma sonye na usoro redio, na ọrụ ihe nkiri
Aha ya toro na 1966, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, na ihe nkiri mbụ ọ na-eduzi, Mahmoud Zulfikarʹs 'Al Murahiqa dị ka Saghira'
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a kacha mara mma bụ ọrụ nke abụọ ọ rụrụ na 'Al Azab Imra'a'
O nwere ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri isii na aha ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a bụ egwu, ma ọ bụ ihe nkiri nwere usoro na ihe nkiri nke a na-ejikọta ya na abụ na ịgba egwu
Ọtụtụ n'ime ha nwere mmụọ na-atọ ọchị
Nelly mere ihe nkiri asaa ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Salah Zulfikar, mekwara ihe nkiri na ọtụtụ usoro ihe nkiri TV, ọkachasị 'Bardis' na 'Ad Dawwama'

N'ime nnukwu ọrụ nka ya, a maara Nelly nke ọma n'ụwa Arab niile maka 'Fawazir Ramadan' (فوازير رمضان) (nke a sụgharịrị dị ka ihe mgbagwoju anya Ramadan), ihe ngosi TV na-atọ ọchị nke nwere ọtụtụ egwu na ịgba egwu, ebe Nelly bu isi nke ihe ngosi ahụ
A na-agbasa ihe ngosi ndị a na-agbaso nke ukwuu na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn Arab n'ụwa Arab kwa ụbọchị n'oge ọnwa dị nsọ nke Ramadan, na-agwakọta ya na akụkụ ntụrụndụ n'ozuzu
A na-eme usoro 'fawazir' nke afọ ọ bụla gburugburu isiokwu nhazi dị iche

Ihe ngosi ndị ahụ gụnyere Fawazir Arusty (1980), Fawazir Al Khatbah (1981), Fawazier Alam Wareq (1990), Fawajir Sanduq El Dunya (1991), Fawazir Om El Oreaf (1992), Fawazir Dunya Laaba (1995), Fawa zir Zay El Naharda (1996)
Fawazir ikpeazụ nke Nelly bụ na 1996, mana o mere ihe ngosi n'ụdị fawazir a na-akpọ Alf Leila Wa Leila na 2001
Kemgbe ahụ, Nelly ajụla ọtụtụ aro iji mee fawazir ọzọ n'ihi 'enweghị echiche ọhụrụ'
Nelly lara ezumike nká site n'ime ihe nkiri, ihe ngosi na-atọ ọchị, na egwu, mana a na-ahụ ya dị ka onye ọbịa n'ọtụtụ okwu TV na mmemme ntụrụndụ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ọka ikpe na 2006 na The X Factor, XSeer Al Najah TV na-abụ abụ na-achọ talent
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2010, a kọrọ na Nelly nabatara ọrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri TV siri ike
Ọ bụrụ na atụmatụ a ga-agwụcha, ọ ga-abụ ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ Nelly kemgbe 1989
Nelly Karim (amụrụ na 18 Disemba 1974) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nlereanya, na onye na-agba egwú
Nelly bụ nwa nwanyị nke nne Russia na nna Ijipt si Zagazig
Nelly Karim kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya nke onye nta akụkọ Nishan gbara ya n'oge gara aga na ịma mma ya bụ nke Fero, ọ bụghị nke Russia, nakwa na ọ dị ka nna ya
O nwere otu nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya, aha ya bụ Ashraf onye bụ dọkịta ma ọ kwagara United States
Ya na ezinụlọ ya biri na Russia ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii mana ya na ezinụlọ ya nọrọ ezumike ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge ọkọchị na Alexandria, Egypt
Mgbe ahụ, ezinụlọ ya bịara Ijipt ma nna ya nwụrụ
Nelly adọtawo ọkwa maka ọjụjụ ya n'afọ 2006 iji gosipụta 'ọrụ na-adọrọ adọrọ'
N'afọ 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu ndị ọka ikpe maka ngalaba Horizons na mbipụta nke ịrị asaa na atọ nke Venice Film Festival
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2020, ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri ịrị atọ nke Egypt na usoro TV
Nelly lụrụ di mgbe ọ dị obere n'ihi ọchịchọ nne ya
Ọ mụrụ ụmụ nwoke abụọ ma gbaa alụkwaghịm
Ọ lụrụ Hani Abuelnaga na 2004 ma ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 2015
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, ọ lụrụ onye egwuregwu squash bụ Hisham Mohd Ashour

Nelly Uzonna Edith Uchendu, MON (Nke amụrụ na afọ 1950, ma ọ nwụọ na ụbọchi April 12 nke afọ 2005), bụ onye ọgụ egwu nke si na obodo Naigeria Ihe eji mara ya bụ maka mbọ ọgbara ikwalite ma mepụta ihe gbasara ime egwu ala igbo ka ọbụrụ ihe oloro ọhụru Uchendu biara bụrụ onye nke amama na obodo nịịle na afọ 1976 mgbe ọ gụrụ egwu nke ọ kpọrọ 'Love Nwatinti' nke ọtụtụ ndi mmadụ ji maka ya tuo ya aha 'Ada nwere olu olaedo'
Ụchendụ bipụtara mpakọta egwu isịị na ngwa ọlụ agụmagụ egwu ya
Nelson A
Primus (1842-1916) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe, nke a maara màkà ihe osise ya
A mụrụ Nelson Augustus Primus na úbọchị irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Machị, 1842 na Hartford, Connecticut
Ọ bụ naanị nwá nwoke nke Mehitable (Jacobs), ónyé na-emepụta ejiji na Holdridge Primus, ónyé na-ere ahịa na RS na G
Seyms Co
Mehitable bụ nwá nwà Jeremiah Jacobs, onyeisi ezinụlọ ojii mbụ bírí na Hartford
Tinyere azụmahịa ejiji ya, ọ na-elekọta ọrụ ọrụ, na-achọta ndị ọrụ ụlọ na ndị na-akwa akwa màkà ndị were mmadụ n'ọrụ n'ógbè ahụ
A matara nkà nka Primus n'oge ọ dị obérè
O meriri ihe nrite ise ihe ugboro abụọ na Hartford County Fair, nke mbụ mgbè ọ dị afọ itoolu na nke abụọ mgbe ọ dị iri na asaa
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Primus mụtara ọrụ n'aka ónyé na-ese ụgbọ ala, George Francis
Mgbè e mesịrị, ọ mụrụ nka na Elizabeth Gilbert Jerome, ónyé na-ese foto n'ógbè ahụ
Na úbọchị irí nà asatọ n'ọnwa Juun, 1864, Primus lụrụ Amoretta Prime, nke Norfolk, Connecticut
A mụrụ nwá ha nwanyị Leila ọnwa isii ka e mesịrị, n'ubochí irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1864
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nkè 1865, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Boston ka Primus wee mụọ nka ma chọta ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
O bu ụzọ mụọ nka na Edward Mitchell Bannister, ónyé ama ama na-ese ihe osise na ónyé na-ese ala
Primus nọrọ na Bannister naanị ọnwa atọ, ebe ọ chere na ónyé omenkà ahụ toro eto enweghị mmasị ịkwalite ọrụ ónyé omenkọ ahụ na-eto eto
Ọ gàrà n'ihu na-amụ ihe na ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ, Charles Stetfield, ónyé rụrụ ọrụ n'otu ụlọ ahụ dị ka Bannister
Stetfield enweghị nkà dị ka Bannister, mana ọ bụ ónyé nkụzi na ónyé nduzi ka mma
Nelson rụrụ ọrụ nwa ógè dị ka ónyé na-ese ụgbọ ala, onye na-ete ihe n'ozuzu, ónyé na'ese foto, na ónyé na-ere nri
Ọ na-ese foto mgbè ọ na-adịghị arụ ọrụ ụbọchị, ma na-agbasi mbọ ike ire ọrụ ya
Nne na nna ya kwadoro ọchịchọ Primus ma nyere ezinụlọ ahụ aka n'ụzọ ego, na-eziga onyinye ego ma ọ bụ nri
Na Julaị 1876, nwunye Primus, Amoretta, nwụrụ site na nsogbụ nke ịmụ nwa
Ọ lụrụ Mary G
Wheeler nke Nantucket, MA na 1877
N'afọ 1893, nwa ya nwanyị, Leila, nwụrụ n'ihi oyi bàrà ya n'ahụ
N'afọ 1895, Primus na nwunye ya Mary kwagara n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ, na mbụ bírí na Seattle ruo afọ ole na ole
A chọpụtala ọtụtụ ihe osise sitere n'oge ahụ dị ka ọrụ Primus
Di na nwunye ahụ kwagara San Francisco, California n'ihe dị ka afọ 1900, na-ebi nso Chinatown
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ nri, n'oge ezumike ya, ọ na-ese ihe osise ọbọdọ, ọdịdị ala na foto
Mgbè ọ nọ na San Francisco, o mepụtara Fortune Teller na 1898, Ihe ngosi nke ndụ na San Francisco na ngwụcha afọ 1800
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise Primus furu efu na ala ọma jijiji 1906 na San Francisco
Ka ọ na-erule 1910, nwunye Primus, Mary anwụọla
A maara obéré ihe banyéré ndụ ya mgbè 1910
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa ụkwara nta na Mee 29, 1916 n'ụlọ ọgwụ San Francisco
Lizzy May Ulmer, 1876
Nehemiah Gibson, 1883
Ala na ịnyịnya, 1884
Fortune Teller, 1898
Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela (1918-2013) bu onye isi ala ndi mgbada afrika
O bu ya bu onye ndi obodo ahu na elegara anya, ha na akpo ya (hero)
Mandela bu presidenti ndi isi ojii nke izizi n'ala mgbada afrika
O bukwa ya mere na ndi isi ojii na ndi isi ocha na emekorita na obodo ha dum
Mandela nwuru n'ubochi ise n'onwa disemba n'afo puku abuo na iri na ato
Ogbara afo iri itenani na ise tupu onwuo

Nemat Abdullah Mohamed K কৰ্shhair (Arabic; transliterations ndị ọzọ Neemat, Nimat, Abdallah; amụrụ n'afọ 1957) bụ onye ọka ikpe Sudan nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Sudan onye ghọrọ Chief Justice of Sudan (isi nke ndị ọka ikpe Sudan) na 10 Ọktoba 2019

N'ihi ya, n'okpuru Nkeji edemede 293) nke August 2019 Draft Constitutional Declaration, ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Sudan ma bụrụkwa 'onye na-ahụ maka ijikwa ikike ikpe n'ihu Kansụl Ikpe Kasị Elu'
Khair bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ Chief Justice nke Sudan
Khair si al-Kamleen na Gezira, ma nweta BA na iwu na Mahadum Cairo
Khair sonyere na ngagharị iwe ndị Sudan nke afọ 2018-2019, na ngagharị nke ndị ọkàikpe na n'ịnọ n'ihu isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha Khartoum, nke e kewara na 3 June Khartous massacre
A na-ele ya anya dị ka onye na-emegide ọchịchị al-Bashir ruo ọtụtụ afọ tupu ngagharị iwe ahụ
Khair ghọrọ onye otu ndị ọka ikpe Sudan na mbido afọ 1980
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe, ụlọ ikpe nke mbụ, wee bụrụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu
Khair guzobere Sudanese Judges Club dị ka nzukọ nwere onwe ya na gọọmentị
Khair kpebiri megide gọọmentị al-Bashir na 2016 na ikpe metụtara ụka Anglican
Khair esoghị na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ bụla
Dị ka Sudan Daily si kwuo, a 'mara ya maka ikike ya, iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe na ahụmịhe ya'
Muez Hadra nke Forces for Freedom and Change (FFC) kọwara Nemat dị ka 'onye na-eme ihe n'eziokwu na onye siri ike' na onye nweere onwe ya kpamkpam na gọọmentị al-Bashir

N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2019, a kwadoro Khair dị ka onye isi ikpe Sudan mgbe a họpụtara ya site na nkwekọrịta n'etiti Kansụl Ndị Agha Transitional (TMC) na ndị agha nke nnwere onwe na mgbanwe (FFC)
N'okpuru Nkeji edemede 29(3) nke August 2019 Draft Constitutional Declaration, ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu ma bụrụkwa 'onye na-ahụ maka ijikwa ikike ikpe n'ihu Kansụl Ikpe Kasị Elu'
A tụrụ anya na Khair ga-abụ Chief Justice na 20 ma ọ bụ 21 August 2019, dị ka Khartoum Star na Sudan Daily si kwuo

Khair bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ Chief Justice nke Sudan, na otu n'ime obere ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Chief Justices na Africa (na-esote Kaïta Kayentao Diallo, 2006; Umu Hawa Tejan-Jalloh, Sierra Leone, 2008; Mathilda Twomey Xia Seychelles, 2011; Nthomeng Majara, 2014; Irene Mambilima Xia Zambia, 2015; Sophia Akuffo Xia Ghana, 2017; Meaza Ashenafi Xia Ethiopia, 2018)

Na 12 Septemba 2019, tupu nkwenye Khair n'October 10, ọtụtụ puku ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na Khartoum na obodo ndị ọzọ dị na Sudan kpọrọ ka a họpụta Abdelgadir Mohamed Ahmed dị ka Chief Justice na Mohamed el-Hafiz dị ka Attorney General
Iwu ọzọ nke 10 Ọktoba kwupụtara Tag el-Sir el-Hibir dị ka Attorney-General

Tania 'Nena' Baltazar Lugones (amụrụ ya na October 31, 1972) bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Comunidad Inti Wara Yassi, otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke na-elekọta ebe nchekwa anụ ọhịa atọ na Bolivia

Kemgbe e guzobere nzukọ ahụ n'afọ 1992, Baltazar emeela ka nzukọ ahụ si n'otu ebe nsọ na anụmanụ ole na ole a napụtara ghọọ ụlọ ọrụ na-echebe anụ ọhịa kachasị na Bolivia, na-elekọta ihe karịrị anụmanụ narị ịse sitere na ụdị iri ise dị iche iche
A napụtala ụmụ anụmanụ n'ebe ahụ site n'ahịhịa anụ ọhịa na-akwadoghị, mfu ebe obibi, na ịchụ nta n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị
Baltazar kwuru na ọ na-enweta mkpali site na ọrụ Jane Goodall
Usman bidoro agụmakwụkwọ ya na Jos, mechaa gafe na Kagoro, o mechara gaa kọleji gọọmentị etiti, Jos, Plateau steeti
O mechara nweta akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na Geography na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria ma mesịa nweta akara ugo mmụta di elu na Mahadum Jos
Ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Dana Ventures ma mechaa bụrụkwa onye ndụmọdụ na steeti Kaduna n'afọ 1992
Ọ bụkwara onye ndụmọdụ n'afọ 1993 ma onye isi n'ahụ maka ndị ọrụ FCDA site n'afọ 1994 ruo 1998

Usman arụọla ọrụ dị ukwuu na inye ụmụ nwanyị ikike ya na mbọ dị oke mkpa ọ gbara ịbido otu Nke n'abụghi Gọọmenti nwe akpọrọ 'Education and Empowerment for women' nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Jere dị na Kaduna Steeti ma tinyerekwara na ọ bụ onye isi oche ugbua nke nchịkọta otu ndị na-abụghị nke Gọọmenti nwe maka nkwalite Umunwanyị na Steeti Kaduna
Ọ lụrụ di ma nweekwa ụmụ anọ
Ọ rụọla ọrụ dị ka onye otu nzukọ nke dị na Steeti Kaduna nke National Republican Convention (NRC) kwachigoro ka ọdi ugbua
Ọ bụkwara otu onye ahọpụtara nke Ụlọ Nzukọ ndị Nnọchiteanya, na-anọchite mpaghara ọchịchị etiti nke Kachia / Kagarko n'okpuru United Nigeria Congress Party n'afọ 1998

A họpụtara ya dịka kọmishọna na Kaduna Steeti site n'afọ 1999 rue 2002, mgbe ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna n'ahụ maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na Akụ ndị esi n'ala enweta na steeti ahụ n'afọ 2002 ma mechaa bụrụ kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ahụike site n'afọ 2002 ruo 2003
Ọ bụrụ onye nhazi ndị otu mgbasa ozi ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Alh
Ahmed Makarfi n'afọ 1999 A họpụtagachiri ya onye isi oche kọmitii mgbasa ozi n'afọ 2003
Ọ bụ onye na -ahazi Kọmitii Mgbasa Ozi na ọchịchị steeti Kaduna makaOlusegun Obasanjo
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye minista nke obere na -ahụ maka ego ma mechaa bụrụzie Mịnịsta na -ahụ maka ego n'ọchịchị Obasanjo
A hoputara ya dịka onye Sịnetọ maka Kaduna South na nhoputa nke emere n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, nke ọ dọrọ na-okpuru otu People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Otu Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) rụrụ ụka maka nsonaazụ ntụli aka a
Dị ka onye Sịnetọ, ọ kpaliri gọọmentị inyekwu ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ohere, ndị ọ na-akpọ ndị kachasị na enweghị mkpuchi ma di mfe ịma n'ọnya na Obodo

Nnenna Egwuekwe (amụrụ na Septemba 22, 1992), nke a maara dịka Nenny B, bụ onye mgbasa ozi Naijiria
Ọ bụ VJ ugbu a maka MTV Base Africa
Nenny B si Imo Steeti ma amụọ ya na Lagos Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ọ gara Aloysius Ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, Abuja maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya ma nwee agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya n'otu Abuja
Ọ gakwara Mahadum Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Bekee naNkwukọrịta Mass, tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Wollongong maka nzere masta ya
Nenny B malitere ọrụ ya na 2007 mgbe ọ malitere ịpụta n'ọkwa na 2007 Kora Awards, na-emeghe ihe nkiri maka 50 Cent
N'afọ 2009, ọ gara n'ihu na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ maka Africa Independent Television, AIT, na ihe ngosi 'Ihe na-ebilite'
Ọ bịara n'ihu na 2012 wee gaa n'ihu n'afọ 2014 maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe ngosi Reality TV, X Factor West Africa na Star the Winner Is

N'afọ 2014, ọ sonyeere Hot 983 FM dị ka onye na-elekọta Daily Drive Time Show na Battle Of The Sexes
N'afọ 2017, Radio Magazine debere ya n'ihu ya, na-egosi ya n'elu ndepụta ya 'Top 20 Best Radio Presenters in Nigeria'
