kwara
Neo Ntsoma (ụbọchị irí abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1972) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa nke a maara maka foto akụkọ ya, foto, egwu na foto ọdịbendị a ma ama
A mụrụ ya na Vryburg ma zụlite ya n'ime ime obodo nke Mafikeng na North West Province, mmasị ya na ihe nkiri bịdọrọ ógè ọ dị obere

N'ịzụlite n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma hụ ihe ngosi na-adịghị mma nke ndị isi ojii South Africa na enweghị ntinye aka nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke ndị ọcha na-achịkwa, nke a mere ka ọ dịghachi ike ịchọ ime mgbanwe, agbanyeghị na ọ bụghị nrọ dị mfe imezu n'ihi mmachi agbụrụ n'oge ahụ
Ntsoma gara St Mary's High School ebe a ga-amata ya egwu, ịgba egwu na ihe nkiri, nke a bụ ebe ọ maara na ụzọ ọrụ ya dị iche na ndị ọgbọ ya
N'agbanyeghị ọtụtụ ihe ndọghachi azụ n'oge ndụ ya niile, ọ nọgidere na-achụso nrọ ya nke ịbụ onye na-ese foto ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma
A maara Ntsoma maka foto ya nke pụtara ìhè maka akụkụ dị iche iche nke a na-ewere ha na ụzọ ọ na-esi egwu ihe na-elekwasị anya na foto na ihe na-abụghị
E wezụga ịbụ onye na-ese foto na-enweta ihe nrite, ọ ghọwo onye nduzi na-anụ ọkụ n'obi maka ndị na-ese ihe na-eto eto
A mụrụ ya na Vryburg ma zụlite ya n'ime ime obodo nke Mafikeng na North West Province
Ntsoma bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ nke atọ Olefile Ntsoma na Nomalanga Maria Ntsoma née Hlabangane mụrụ
Foto bụ ọrụ ọ banyere na mberede, ọrụ a na-amaghị banyere ụmụ nwanyị ojii n'oge ahụ
Ntsoma bịdọrọ ọmụmụ ya na Peninsula Technikon n'afọ 1992
Mmasị mbụ ya bụ na Film na Television
Ọ nweghị ógè ọ natara igwefoto tupu ọ banye na Technikon
O mechara kwaga Pretoria Technikon n'etiti afọ 1994 na afọ 1995 iji gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na-ahụ maka ejiji na mgbasa ozi ọ bụ ezie na ekweghị ya ohere gụsịrị akwụkwọ
N'agbanyeghị ihe ịma aka na ihe ndọghachi azụ na njem ya, n'afọ 1998 Ntsoma ghọrọ nwanyị ojii izizi na-ese foto iji rụọ ọrụ banyere otu n'ime nnukwu akwụkwọ akụkọ na South Africa, The Star
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị ọrụ ibe ya bụ ndị ọcha na ndị nwoke na-akpa ókè na Ntsoma, ọ chere na ọ dị mkpa igosi onwe ya mgbe niile iji nweta nkwanye ùgwù na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Dị ka Ntsoma si kọwaa na nkwupụta nka ya,
N'agbata afọ 2002 na afọ 2003, itinye aka Ntsoma na Majority World malitere ógè ọ bụ onye nkuzi na Pathshala South Institute of Photography na Bangladesh, nke Shahidul Alam duziri
Alam nyere aka na mgbasa ozi ọrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe si mba ụwa ka ukwuu, nke gụnyere Africa
Majority World kpọsara ọrụ ya ma nye ya ohere igosi ha na ngosi na mbipụta n'ụwa niile
Ntsoma kwuru, 'Enwere m ike iji mpako kwuo na ndị mmadụ maara ọrụ m na mba na enweghị m ike ịgụ asụsụ ahụ'
N'afọ 2004, Neo Ntsoma ghọrọ nwanyị izizi natara onyinye Mohamed Amin, CNN African Journalist of the Year Photography Prize màkà edemede foto ya nke akpọrọ, 'Their World in Flames'
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ọrụ ya agbasawokwa na nka mara mma na foto ndị ama ama
Ntsoma so dee Women by Women 50 Years of Women's Photography in South Africa na Robin Comley, George Hallett, na Penny Siopis
Ọ bụ Ministri nka na ọdịbendị nke South Africa nyere ya iwu ka ọ bụrụ ememe ncheta afọ iri ise nke njem ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 1956 na Union Buildings
N'afọ 2007, Ntsoma guzobere Neo Ntsoma Productions, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta na mmepụta ihe nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii nwere ma na-achịkwa kpamkpam

Ndị otu Ntsoma nwere ndị na-ese foto, ndị na-ahụ banyere teknụzụ vidiyo, ndị nchịkọta akụkọ, ndị na'ahụ màkà nkwurịta okwu anya, ndị edemede, na ndị ndụmọdụ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na ụlọ ọrụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enyekwa ọmụmụ ihe azụmaahịa na mmemme ntụziaka onwe onye maka ndị na-ese foto
N'afọ 2018, onye nta akụkọ foto, Neo Ntsoma so na mkparịta ụka, ya na onye otu ibe ya, gbasara mmepe na kọntinent Afrịka - na Yale University Art Gallery

Nerima Wako-Ojiwa (née Nerima Wako ), bụ onye nyocha ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya, bụ onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Siasa Place, otu nzukọ, nke ndị na-eto eto na-edukwa ndị Kenya na-eto eto ka hà na-eme ihe, na-akụziri ha banyere iwu, ọchịchị na nhoputa ndi ochichi
usoro, site na ntinye aka obodo na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi
A mụrụ Nerima na Nairobi, isi obodo Kenya, ihe dị ka 1989, onye nke atọ n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ anọ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Nicholas Primary, tupu ọ gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Aga Khan Academy, ha abụọ dị na Nairobi
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ nwetara ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum steeti Jacksonville, dị na Jacksonville, Alabama n'ime United States
Ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na Journalism ná kwá Sociology
Emechara wéré nyé ya nzere Master of Public Administration, bụkwa nke Mahadum Jacksonville State
Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, Nerima sonyeere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ụlọ akwụkwọ ewere họpụta ya onyeisi oche nke International Student's Organisation
Nke a mere ka ọ nweta ntọala siri ike na àgwà ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na adịghị ike
N'afọ 2015, ya na ndị ọzọ na-eto eto malitere otu ndị ntorobịa na-edu ana akpo Siasa Place
N'ime afọ mbụ, ha ji akpa ego ha na-arụ ọrụ nke nzukọ a, tupu ha enweta ego ọ bụla n'èzí
Nerima na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa otú á
Nerima lụrụ Billian Ojiwa, onye na-etinyekwa aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ nwa nwanne Senator Amos Wako onye na-anọchite anya mpaghara Busia na Senate Kenya, (2013-2017) ná kwá (2017-2022)

Nerine Desmond (1908–1993) bụ onye na-ese ihe nke South Africa nke a maara karịsịa maka ihe osise ụgha mmiri ya na eserese mmanụ ya, ọkachasị eserese gbasara ala, oke osimiri, ihe osise mmadụ, ndị na-agba ịnyịnya Basuto, na ihe nkiri ndị ọzụzụ atụrụ na-egosi ndị na-azụ ehi na ndị na-azụ ewu na anụmanụ ha
A mụrụ Desmond na Constantia, Cape Town n'afọ 1908, nwa nwanyị Nicolaas Johannes Smith, onye ụkọchukwu Afrikaner, na Ivy Desmond
na London's Central School of Art n'afọ 1938, ebe ọ mụtara usoro obibi akwụkwọ eserese; mana ọ bụ onye mere mmụta ọkachasi n'onwe ya
Desmond bụ onye na asọpụrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma jụ otu n'ime ọrụ site n'enweghi itinye mkpuchi nke akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Nadine Gordimer, na-ekwu na Gordimer abụghị 'onye South Africa nwere nrube isi'
Desmond mere ngosipụta na South Africa site n'afọ 1935 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ, na mbụ dị ka onye otu South African Society of Artists na Nke otu ọhụrụ
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'oge ahụ, gụnyere Gregoire Boonzaier na Frieda Lock, bụụrụ onye a maara nke ọma maka eserese na eserese mmadụ ya na ihe ndị metụtara oru ugbo na ime obodo
Na mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ site na studio dị na Loop Street, Cape Town
Mgbe e mesịrị, o sere ihe n'ụlọ ya na Hout Bay, Wynberg, Jonkershoek, ma na ụlọ ikpeazụ ya na Onderpapegaaiberg, Stellenbosch
N'afọ 1948, o sere ọtụtụ ihe na South West Africa (nke bụ Namibia ugbu a); n'afọ 1953 n'otu aka ahụ na Zanzibar na Mombasa, Kenya
Mpempe akwụkwọ stampụ nke South Africa nke afọ 1961 nwere atụmatụ mmepụta nke Desmond ma n'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu International Institute of Arts and Letters
O gosipụtara na Quadrennials atọ niile nke South African Art n'etiti afọ 1956 na 1964, yana na São Paulo Biennale (graphic), Brazil na 1961
O gosipụtara na Women's International Art Club na Royal Institute of Painters, ma mee ihe ngosi naanị ya mere na Johannesburg n'afọ 1962 ma na Pretoria n'afọ 1970

E nwere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ndị a Bloemfontein Oliewenhuis Art Gallery; Cape Town Iziko South African National Gallery; Durban Art Gallery; East London Ann Bryant Art Gallery; Graaff-Reinet Hester Rupert Art Museum; Johannesburg Art Gallery; Kimberley William Humphreys Art Gallery; Pietermaritzburg Tatham Art Gallery; Port Elizabeth Nelson Mandela Art Museum; Pretoria Art Museum; SABC art collection
Na mgbakwunye, HM Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother; William Ormsby-Gore, 4th Baron Harlech; na Alfred Beit et al nwetara ọrụ ya
Nermin Al-Fiqy (nke a na-akpọkwa Nermine Al-Feki na Nermeen El-Fekki ma ọ bụ Al-Fekki) (amụrụ na June 21, 1972) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Al-Fiqy si n'obodo Alexandria nke Ijipt, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na El-Nasr Girls' School wee gụsịs akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa, Mahadum Alexandria
Ọ bụ Abdullah '3D TV MASTER' Ghandour chọpụtara ya wee banye n'ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mbido afọ ndị 1990s wee mee mgbasa ozi maka ihe ntecha na nri ụfọdụ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ malitere ịbanye n'ógbè nnọchiteanya na ngwụcha afọ iri itoolu na mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu ma merie ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn na ihe nkiri
Nermine Hammam (amụrụ n'afọ 1967) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cairo na London
A mụrụ ya na Cairo mana o mesịrị kwaga England na United States na 1985
Ọ natara BFA na ime ihe nkiri site na Tisch School of the Arts na New York City
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ya na Simon & Goodman na onye nduzi Egypt Youssef Chahine
Ọ bụ onye enyemaka mmepụta na ihe nkiri Spike Lee nke afọ 1992 bụ Malcolm X
Hammam mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise tupu ọ gaa na nka na foto
Dị ka nwanyị na-ese foto, Hammam kwuru na ọ 'banyela n'ebe ụmụ nwoke na-achikwa, igwefoto n'aka, na-agbanwe mmekọrịta ike na ndị agha
Nzaghachi ha na ọnụnọ m, dị ka nwanyị, n'etiti ha, aghọwo akụkụ nke ihe odide ndị e dere na eserese ndị a
A maara ya maka usoro dị iche iche nke ọ na-eji emezi foto, na-ekwu maka mmetụta nke mgbasa ozi ọha na eze na nhazi ahịa
Ọrụ ya dị larịị, nke a na-eji dijitalụ eme ihe na-enyocha ọdịdị nke eziokwu
Dị ka onye guzobere na onye nduzi okike nke Equinox Graphics, a makwaara Hammam maka iwebata nka n'ime oghere ọha na eze site na imepụta ihe ọhụrụ na akara
Ọ bụ onye na-azụ ụfọdụ ụdị ndị a ma ama n'Ijipt, gụnyere Cilantro Café, Diwan Bookstores na otu Deyafa nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụlọ mmanya
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi onwe na nke otu na Egypt, France, Italy, United Kingdom, Denmark, United States, Kuwait na Singapore
A gụnyere ọrụ Hammam na nchịkọta nke Victoria na Albert Museum na London, Tropenmuseum na Amsterdam na Parco Horcynus Orca na Ịtali
N'ime afọ iri gara aga, egosila ọrụ ya n'ihe karịrị ihe ngosi mba ụwa iri asaa na ise na ihe ngosi asaa na UK naanị
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ihe karịrị akwụkwọ ịrị ise ma dee banyere ya na magazin ndị dị ka Newsweek (USA), Financial Times (UK), na The Times (UK)
N'ihe ngosi ya na Cairo Year One na London, Hammam jiri ụdị ihe osise ọdịnala ndị Japan gosipụta ihe nkiri ime ihe ike site na Mgbanwe Ijipt nke 2011
Cairo Year One gosipụtara foto iri site na akụkụ mbụ nke usoro nke afọ nke otu, na abụọ sitere na ọrụ ndị ọzọ na usoro ahụ, nke a na-ahụ na ngosi ahụ
Hammam jikọtara foto ndị agha na Tahrir Square n'oge nnupụisi ahụ na ihe nkiri udo site na nchịkọta postcard nke onwe ya
Akwụkwọ a bụ maka ndị ntorobịa, ndị ntorobịa zuru ụwa ọnụ, na obi ọjọọ na obi ọjọọ nke iziga ụmụ anyị n'agha, ka Hammam na-ekwu

N'ịbụ nke mgbasa ozi sitere na 1940s na 1950s na-egosi ndị siri ike na ntọala ndị e chepụtara echepụta kpaliri, Hammam na-ekwu, ihe ndị gbara ya gburugburu na-emesi ọnụnọ ndị agha n'etiti ndị nkịtị na Tahrir ike ndị agha na Paradaịs
Hammam bụ onye na-ese foto

Ọ natara ihe nrite mbụ nke Freedom to Create 2011; ihe nrite nke mbụ nke Worldwide Photography Gala Awards 2011; Julia Margaret Cameron Award 2012 aha nsọpụrụ; Jacob Riis Award 2010 onye nke abụọ; na Invisible World Portfolio Selection 2010 Finalist aha nsọpụrụ
Nesbert Mukomberanwa (a mụrụ n'afọ 1969) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya na Buhera, Mukomberanwa malitere ịmụ ihe ọkpụkpụ n'aka nwanne nna ya na 1987; ka ọ na-erule 1989 ọ malitere nke onwe ya, wee guzobe ụlọ ọrụ na Chitungwiza
N'ebe a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri, tupu ọ kwaga n'obodo Dema n'ebe ndịda n'afọ 1998
Mukomberanwa na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye nkuzi, na-enye 'Village Gallery' maka ndị na-eto eto na-akpụ ihe n'obodo iji gosipụta ọrụ ha
E gosipụtara ọrụ Mukomberanwa na ngosi e gosiri na Netherlands, Switzerland, Great Britain, na United States
Mukomberanwa bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Mukomberanwa nke ndị na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwa nwanne Nicholas Mukomberanwa na Grace Mukomberanwa bụ ndị ndụmọdụ ya ma bụrụ ndi zụrụ ya n'ọrụ ya
Ọ bụ nwa nwanne nna nke ndị na-akpụ ihe Anderson, Ennica, Taguma, Tendai Mukomberanwa, Netsai, na Lawrence Mukomberanwa
Àtụ The Mukomberanwa Family
Nesrine Kheloudja Merouane (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 23, 1995 n'imeAlgiers) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball
Klọb dị ugbu a GSP (nke bụbu MC Algiers)
Nestoil Tower bụ ulo a na-eji eme ihe dị iche iche
Ọ dị na Victoria Island, Lagos nke Nestoil Limited nwere
E wuru Nestoil Towers n'afọ 2015
Ọ dị n'etiti okporo ámá Akin Adesola na Saka Tinubu na mpaghara agwaetiti Victoria
Ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ nwere helipad na oghere azụmahịa dị mita pụkụ ịrị na abụọ na narị abụọ
Ntọala iri na ise nke ụlọ ahụ bụ ihe dịka 3900sqm na nke ọ bụla
O nwere ihe dịka 9904sqm ebe azụmahịa a na-ere ere na ụlọ obibi iji nye ndị bi na ya ebe obibi
Ụlọ ahụ nwekwara ọtụtụ ụlọ nkwụsị ụgbọala na ebe ntụrụndụ
Ọ bụ ACCL (Adeniyi Cocker Consultants Limited) haziri eserese nke ụlọ ahụ, nke Julius Berger PLC wuru
E wuchara ya na Disemba 2015 wee nweta akara LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) (Silver)
Official website
Nestor K
Binabo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
Ọ bụ Gọvanọ na-anọchite anya Bayelsa Steeti na ndịda Naịjirịa site na 27 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2012 ruo 14 Febụwarị, na afọ 2012, nhọpụta nke o kwuru na ọ bụ ọnụnọ Chineke na ndụ ya
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke ụlọ omebe iwu nke steeti Bayelsa
Nwunye Nestor K
Binabo bụ Martha, bụ onye ndị a na-amaghị ama tọọrọ na 30 Juun, na afọ 2015 ma tọhapụ ya na 6 Julai, na afọ 2015 mgbe a kwụrụ mgbapụta
Nestor Hernández (1961 rụo ụbọchị irí na atọ n'ọnwa Mée, 2006) bụ ónyé America na-ese foto na onye nta akụkọ foto nke Cuban, nke bi na Washington, DC
A maara Hernández nke ọma màkà foto okporo ámá ya nke Washington, DC ya na ihe nkírí okporo ámá nke Cuba, Ghana na Mali, ebe ọ na-eduzi ọrụ nka màkà ụmụaka na ndị okenye na-eto eto
A mụrụ Hernández na 1961 na Washington, DC nke nna Afro-Cuban na nne African-American, ọ tolitere na mpaghara DC na-amaghị ihe banyéré ndị nná nna ya Afro- Cuban na ndị ikwu Cuban
Hernández malitere ise foto n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị site na Urban Journalism Workshop nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze DC
Ọ nọrọ afọ iri na ise dị ka ónyé na-ese foto màkà Capital Children's Museum, wee bụrụ ónyé isi na-ese ihe màkà usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke Washington, DC
Foto ya pụtara n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ

A gụnyere foto ya na gallery, oghere nka na ihe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie, gụnyere ihe ngosi na-adịgide adịgide, na gburugburu Greater Washington, DC isi ọbọdọ, ọbọdọ dị iche iche nke America, Havana, Cuba, na Accra, Ghana
N'afọ 2002 ọ natara ònyìnyé 'Outstanding Emerging Artist', na 2003 ònyìnyé Artist Fellowship Grant, ma site na DC Commission on the Arts and Humanities
N'afọ 1998 ọ bụ ónyé natara 'Community Service Award' nke Exposure Group, African American Photographers Association nyéré, na 2001 a họpụtara ya dị ka 'Photographer of the Year' site n'otu njikọ ahụ
North Eastern Telecommunications Company (Netco Ltd)Bụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi hibere na 1993 na Bosaaso, isi obodo azụmahịa nke Puntland bụ mpaghara Somalia nwere onwe ya
Netco bụ nke Ismael Haji Abdi, onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na MBA Mahadum Wisconsin,USA, ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Somali Telecom Group
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta kachasị ukwuu na mpaghara Puntland na-achị onwe ya nke Somalia
Netco bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepe ngwa ngwa ma too nke ukwuu n'ime afọ 15 gara aga, yana ndị ahịa ugbu a nke ihe karịrị mmadụ 800,000
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enye ekwentị ụlọ, netwọk ekwentị mkpanaaka na ọrụ ịntanetịOtu n'ime ebumnuche Netco na-esote bụ ịnye ọkụ eletrik na Puntland niile, ọrụ nke ga-ewere ọnọdụ n'ime afọ ise na-eso ya

Netsai Mukomberanwa bụ onye Zimbabwe a ma ama na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ ọgbọ nke abụọ Shona art sculptor nke na-arụ ọrụ na nkume dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ
Ọ na-eji ehihie arụ ọrụ ya n'ugbo ezinụlọ ya dị na Ruwa; ọrụ ya bụ onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Mukomberanwa a ma ama nke ndị na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke ọgbọ mbụ Shona art Sculptors Nicholas Mukomberanwa na Grace Mukomberanwa
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke ndị na-akpụ ihe Anderson, Ennica, Taguma, Tendai Mukomberanwa na Lawrence Mukomberanwa, na nwa nwanne nne Nesbert Mukomberanwa
Site na oge ọ bụ nwata gaa n'ihu, ọ hụrụ nka nke ịkpụ nkume n'ihi nna ya a ma ama, Nicholas
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-egosipụta nkà ya na ịdọ aka ná ntị a, n'agbanyeghị na ọ nọgidere bụrụ ihe omume ntụrụndụ egwuregwu ruo ogologo oge
Netsanet Achamo (amụrụ na ọnwa Disemba 14, na afọ 1987) bụ onye Ethiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
Ọ mechara na nke anọ na 2006 African Championships in Athletics na 3000 mita steeplechase
Achamo sonyere na 2007 World Championships in Athletics na 3000 mita steeplechase, mana o meputara ya maka okpomọkụ
O jidetara ọla nchara na 2007 All-Africa Games na 3000 mita steeplechase
Achamo meriri asọmupi nke 2011 Olomouc Half Marathon, 2012 Mumbai Marathon, na 2012 Hamburg Marathon
Netsanet Gudeta Kebede (amụrụ na 12 Febụwarị na afọ 1991) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi na-agba ịnyịnya n'okporo ụzọ na ihe omume ịgba ọsọ gafee mba
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ọla nchara na IAAF World Cross Country Championships na 2015
O keere òkè n'ọkwa otu na asọmupi ahụ ma merie ọlaọcha otu na IAAF World Half Marathon Championships na 2014
Ihe kacha mma ya maka ọkara marathon bụ nkeji iri isii na isii na iri na otu (naanị ihe ndekọ ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị)
Netsanet toro na Bekoji, Ethiopia bụ mpaghara a maara nke ọma maka ịmepụta ndị egwuregwu kachasị elu, gụnyere Kenenisa Bekele na Tirunesh Dibaba
Ọ malitere ọzụzụ na Aberu Kebede na Aselefech Mergia, n'etiti ndị ọzọ O mere nke mbụ ya na mba ofesi na 2013 Prague Grand Prix na Czech Republic, na-agwụcha na nke iri
Nnukwu ọsọ Etiopia mere ka aha ya bụrụ ihe a ma ama na mba niile ka ọ na-ahụ ihe ịma aka n'elu 10K site na Atsede Baysa, onye mmeri Chicago Marathon nke afọ 2012
Ọ mechiri afọ ahụ site na onye nke abụọ na São Silvestre Road Race na Brazil, na-etinye 15K kacha mma nke 52 08 nkeji
Netsanet tụgharịrị gaa gafee mba na mbido afọ 2015 ma njedebe nke anọ ya na Jan Meda International Cross Country mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ọzọ a họọrọ na mba ụwa
Ọ gbanwere nke ọma na ahịhịa nke 2015 IAAF World Cross Country Championships wee merie ihe nrite mbụ ya site na ịmecha nke atọ n'azụ onye otu Etiopia Senbere Teferi
Ha abụọ duuru Etiopia gaa n'ọkwa ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị senio na asọmupi ahụ
N'afọ 2020, o sonyere zọọ ọkara marathon ụmụ nwanyị na 2020 World Athletics Half Marathon Championships nke emere na Gdynia, Poland
Nettrice R
Gaskins (amụrụ na Septemba 25, 1970) bụ onye na-ese ihe dijitalụ nke Africa-America, agụmakwụkwọ, onye na-enyocha ọdịbendị na ónyé na-akwado mpaghara STEAM
N'ọrụ ya, ọ na-enyocha 'techno-vernacular creativity' na Afrofuturism
A mụrụ Gaskins na Baltimore MD
Na DuPont Manual High School Gaskins sere otu mgbidi nke ọrụ parabolic na klas mgbakọ na mwepụ ya ma mepụta ihe osise kọmputa na-egosi njikọ nke ọla ntị na-akụ ọnụ ụzọ nke ógè a na ngwa ọdịnala Ghana
Ọ na-etinye aka, ọbụna n'oge ọ dị obérè, na njikọ nke nka na sayensị
Ọrụ ahụ dugara n'ụzọ ka a nabata ya na Pratt Institute na Brooklyn ébé ọ nwetara BFA ya na 1992
Gaskins na-enyocha ụmụ mmadụ na okike, ụda na ihe oyiyi
Ọ chọrọ ka ndị na-acha ọbara ọbara nwee ike ịhụ onwe ha na kọmpụta na teknụzụ dijitalụ
A maara ya màkà ọrụ STEAM ya, na-arụ ụka na ịgbakwunye nka na agụmakwụkwọ sayensị, teknụzụ, injinia na mgbakọ na mwepụ ọdịnala ga-emeghe ohere màkà ụmụ akwụkwọ agba

O kwenyere na STEM adịla mgbè niile n'ime ìgwè ndị na-abụghị akụkụ ọdịnala nke ókwú a ma ama, na site na nka (dị ka hip-hop, ihe nkírí, ịgba egwu, ihe nkiri nkiri, egwuregwu vidio, na nka anya) ndị mmadụ nwere ike ịghọta na ìgwè ndị a bụ akụkụ nke mkparịta ụka ahụ mgbe niile

Mmụọ ọchụnta ego, 'dị ka ọ na-akpọ ya, dị ka ụzọ isi nwee ọganihu, nke a na-ahụ anya na ndị ọsụ ụzọ dị ka Fred Eversley, John Coltrane, Sun Ra, George Clinton na Grandmaster Flash bụ ndị gbanwere cross-fader a na-eji ugbu a site na ngwá electronic
Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah (amụrụ na 29 Ọktoba, na afọ 1952) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Namibia bụ osote praịm minista nke Namibia kemgbe Machị 2015
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mmekọrịta Mba Nile na Imekọ ihe ọnụ na Namibia kemgbe Disemba, na afọ 2012
Site na Machị, na afọ 2010 ruo Disemba, na afọ 2012, ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na njem nleta
Nandi-Ndaitwah bụ onye otu SWAPO, otu na-achị Namibia, na onye otu National Assembly ogologo oge
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara Nandi-Ndaitwah ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke Swapo Party na 6th Congress nke pati ahụ
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi n'ọkwa ahụ
A mụrụ Netumbo Nandi na 29 Ọktoba, na afọ 1952 na Onamutai na mpaghara Oshana nke Ovamboland, Ndaitwah gụrụ akwụkwọ na St
Mary's Mission na Odibo
Nandi-Ndaitwah gara mba ọzọ na 1974 wee sonye na ndị otu SWAPO na Zambia
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'isi ụlọ ọrụ SWAPO dị na Lusaka, Zambia site na afo 1974 ruo na afọ 1975 wee gaa ọmụmụ ihe na Lenin Higher Komsomol School na Soviet Union site na afo 1975 ruo na afọ 1976
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma na ọrụ na omume nke ndị ntorobịa Kọmunist

N'afọ 1987, ọ nwetara diplọma post-graduate na nchịkwa ọha na eze na njikwa site na Glasgow College of Technology, UK, na n'afọ 1988 ọzọ post-graduated diploma, na mmekọrịta mba ụwa, site na Mahadum Keele, UK
N'afọ 1989, Nandi-Ndaitwah nwetara nzere masta na ọmụmụ mmekọrịta mba na mba, site na Mahadum Keele
Nandi-Ndaitwah ghọrọ osote onye nnọchi anya SWAPO na Zambia site na afo 1976 ruo na afọ 1978 na onye isi nnọchi anya na Zambia site n'afọ 1978 ruo 1980
Site na afo 1980 ruo na afọ 1986, ọ bụ onye isi nnọchi anya SWAPO na East Africa, nke dị na Dar es Salaam
Ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii etiti SWAPO site na afọ 1976 ruo na afọ 1986 na onye isi oche nke Namibia National Women's Organisation (NANAWO) site na afo 1991 ruo na afọ 1994
Ọ bụ onye otu National Assembly of Namibia kemgbe afọ 1990

Ọ bụ osote Minista na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mba ụwa na imekọ ihe ọnụ site na afọ 1990 ruo 1996 ma nweta ọkwa minista na afọ 1996 dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Women Affairs na Ọfịs nke Onye isi ala, ebe ọ jere ozi ruo n'afọ 2000
N'afọ 2000, e buliri ya n'ọkwa ka ọ bụrụ onye ozi, ma nye ya ọfịs Women Affairs and Child Welfare
Site na afọ 2005 ruo n'afọ 2010, ọ bụ Minista nke Ozi na Mgbasa Ozi na ụlọ ọrụ Namibia

O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na njem nleta ruo mgbe a gbanwere nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na Disemba na afọ 2012, ebe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na na-ahụ Maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ, ọfịs kemgbe a gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụ International Relations and Cooperation
N'okpuru Onye isi ala Hage Geingob, a họpụtara Nandi-Ndaitwah dị ka osote praịm minista nke Namibia na Machị, na afọ 2015, mgbe ọ na-eje ozi n'otu oge dị ka Minista nke Mmekọrịta na Imekọ ihe ọnụ
Nandi-Ndaitwah na-anọdụ na kọmitii etiti SWAPO na politburo
Ọ bụkwa odeakwụkwọ nke pati ahụ maka ozi na ịhazi ma n'ihi ya, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-ekwuchitere SWAPO
Na Maachị 2023, Onye isi ala Hage Geingob kpọrọ Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah ka ọ bụrụ naanị onye ga-azọ ọkwa maka pati Swapo na-achị achị na ntuli aka nke afọ na-abịa
Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah lụrụ Epaphras Denga Ndaitwah, onye bụbu onye isi ndị agha Namibia
Netwọk India na nyocha mgbanwe ihu igwe (INCCA) bụ netwọk nke ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na India ka e guzobe iji bipụta nchọpụta ndị ọgbọ nyochara banyéré mgbanwe ihu igwe na India
A mara ọkwa ya ọzọ n'ubochi irí abụọ na ise n'onwa Jenụwarị afọ 2012 site n'aka ónyé ọrụ nke ngalaba mgbanwe ihu igwe na Ministry of Environment mgbè nzukọ atụmatụ nke onye odeakwụkwọ (Climate) JM
Mausker duziri, nke mekwara atụmatụ nhazi nke India National Action Plan on Climate Change (NAPCC)

N'ubochi anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2010 Minista gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi nke India bụ Jairam Ramesh kwupụtara na ọ ga-akpọkọta ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị narị abụọ na iri ise sitere na ụlọ ọrụ nyocha otu narị na iri abụọ na ise nke India ma soro òtù mba ụwa rụkọọ ọrụ

A tọhapụrụ nyocha mbụ ya nke ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ n'ọnwa Mee n'ubochi irí na otu n'afọ 2010 na nyocha ihu igwe nké abụọ a ga-ebipụta na Nọvemba 2010 ga-agụnye akụkọ banyéré Himalayas, ụsọ oké osimiri nke India, ugwu Ghat ugwu na mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke India
O kwuru na ọ ga-arụ ọrụ dị ka ụdị nke India IPCC, ' mana ọ gaghị emeri UN Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
Ramesh kwupụtakwara mbido nke Indian National Institute of Himalayan Glaciology
O kwụrụ na ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-akwanyere IPCC ùgwù, ọ bụ ọrụ ahụ na adịghị ike ya bụ na ọ naghị eme nchọpụta nke ya

Ramesh gosikwara na ajọ mbunobi ya mèrè ka ọ ghara inwe mmetụta na eziokwu mpaghara, kama ọ dabere na nchịkọta nyocha nke akụkọ ndị ọzọ, nke, dugara na 'goof-ups' na oké ọhịa Amazon, glaciers Himalayan, na ice caps

Netwọk mmetọ mba ụwa (IPEN) (nke bụbu netwọk mkpochapụ mba ụwa) bụ netwọk zuru ụwa ọnụ nke NGO raara onwe ha nye ebumnuche nke iwepụ mmetọ, dị ka ọdu na ágbá, mercury na ọdu na gburugburu ebe obibi, ihe na-emetọ ihe ndị dị ndụ (POPs), kemịkal na-emebi endocrine, na nsí ndị ọzọ

Network of CSOs Against Trafficking, Abuse and Labor (NACTAL) bụ nche anwụ nzukọ nke Naijiria na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị na-akwado na mgbasa ozi maka ikike ụmụaka, mgbochi ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, mmetọ ikike mmadụ na ọrụ ụmụaka nwere ụfọdụ òtù ruru otu narị na iri ise na mpaghara okpuru ọchịchị isii nke Naijiria

NACTAL tọrọ ntọala n'afọ 2003, mmekọ NACTAL na gọọmenti na ụlọ ọrụ United Nations gụnyere National Agency for the Prohibition of Trafficking in Person (NAPTIP), Nigeria Police Force (NPF), Nigeria Immigration Service (NIS), European Union, International Organisation for Migration, Ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa

Òtù ahụ na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche gụnyere nnapụta nke ndị na-azụ ahịa mmadụ, mgbasa ozi na-emegide ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, ọzụzụ, na mmejuputa mmemme na-eji P ise (5 P) iji kwụsị ịzụ ahịa mmadụ bụ ndị a mgbochi, nchebe, mmekorita, ikpe na amụma
Ọ bụ ndị Board of Trustees n'elekọta NACTAL, National Executive Council (NEC) na ndị nhazi mpaghara isii
Ọ bụ Bolaji Owasanoye bụ onye isi oche kọmitii ndị ọchịchị, Ustaz Amin O na-achị ndị isi ọchịchị obodo na onye isi nke gburugburu bụ Abdulganiyu Abubakar
NACTAL nwere ndị òtù karịrị otu narị na iri ise na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị, na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara mgbochi ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, nchekwa nke mmetọ ụmụaka na mbugharị nke ndị njem
Netwọk megide mmachibido iwu (NAP) bụ otu ndị na-akwado mgbanwe iwu ọgwụ ọjọọ nke Australia
A haziri ya n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2002, na Darwin, Northern Territory iji zaghachi iwu ụlọ ọgwụ ọjọọ nke Australian Labor Party
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke òtù ndị a bụ ịkwụsị mmachibido iwu nke iji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe ntụrụndụ ma dọta uche na mmegbu ikike mmadụ nke ndị na-akwado ọgwụ ọjọọ na-eche ihu
Òtù ahụ na-enye ụfọdụ ọrụ, gụnyere mgbanwe agịga, anwụrụ ọkụ obodo, na akwụkwọ akụkọ email
E jidere ụfọdụ ndị otu NAP n'ihe gbasara ịkpaghasị ọgbakọ omebe iwu nke Northern Territory n'afọ 2002
NAP bụ nke Njikọ ndị ọrụ ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi na ọgwụ ọjọọ nke Australia (AIVL) na kwà Njikọ mba ụwa nke NGO maka amụma ọgwụ ziri ezi na nke dị irè (ICN)
Coastal-Marine Automated Network (C-MAN) bụ netwọk na-ahụ màkà ihu igwe n'akụkụ osimiri United States

N'ịbụ nke nwéré ihe dị ka ụlọ ọrụ iri isii arụnyere na ụlọ ọkụ, na caps na osimiri, n'àgwàetiti ndị dị nso n'ụsọ oké osimiri, na n'elu ikpo okwu ndị dị n'ụsara oké osimiri, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-edekọ nrụgide ikuku, ntụziaka ifufe, ọsọ na ụfụfụ, na okpomọkụ ikuku; Otú ọ dị, a haziri ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ C-MAN iji tụọ okpomọkụ elu oké osimiri, ọkwa mmiri, ebili mmiri, ezuzo, mmiri ozuzo, na ọhụụ

National Data Buoy Center (NDBC) nke National Weather Service (NWS) na-elekọta netwọk ahụ, nké bụ akụkụ nkè National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), a na-etinyekwa data n'ime ụdị kọmputa amụma ihu igwe
E kèrè ya na mmalite afọ 1980 iji nọgide na-ahụ ihe ndị mmemme ndị ọzọ ga-akwụsị
A na-ahazi data ma na-ebufe ya n'ụzọ yiri nke usoro buoy a kwụsịrị
N'afọ 2002, agbakwunyere C-MAN nà NOAA Observing System Architecture (NOSA)
Ntụgharị asụsụ netwọkụ (NAT) bụ usoro nke ịdepụta oghere adreesị IP ka ọ bụrụ nke ọzọ site n'ịgbanwe ozi adreesị netwọkụ n'ime isi IP nke ngwugwu mgbe ha na-agafe n'ofe ngwaọrụ okporo ụzọ

Ejiri usoro a na mbụ iji gafere mkpa ịnye adreesị ọhụrụ nye ndị ọbịa ọ bụla mgbe a na-ebugharị netwọkụ, ma ọ bụ mgbe edochiri onye na-eweta ọrụ ịntanetị, mana enweghị ike ịgafe oghere adreesị netwọkụ ahụ
Ọ ghọọla ngwá ọrụ na-ewu ewu ma dị mkpa n'ichekwa oghere adreesị zuru ụwa ọnụ n'ihu nke ike ọgwụgwụ adreesị IPv4
Enwere ike iji otu adreesị IP nke nwere ike imegharị ịntanetị nke ọnụ ụzọ NAT maka netwọk nkeonwe dum

Nevada bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Alfred Neville Lewis (1895-1972) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
A mụrụ ya na Cape Town, South Africa
O wee gụọ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ ma, mgbe e mesịrị, na Slade School of Art na London
Nna ya bụ Reverend A
Lewis, onye bụ onye isi obodo Cape Town, na 4 Ọktoba 1929, meghere Table Mountain Aerial Cableway
Nville lụrụ Theo Townshend nwa akwụkwọ ibe ya
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu New English Art Club na'afọ1920
Mgbe alụmdi na nwunye ya gbasara na 1922, ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ Tom na David gara Cape Town ebe nne na nna ochie ha zụlitere ha na nwa ya nwanyị Catherine nọrọ na nwunye mbụ ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Agha Ụwa Mbụ na France, Belgium, na Ịtali
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ ọ gara n'ihu na-eji mmanụ emepụta foto
Ọ na-ese ndị isi ojii South Africa ugboro ugboro
Lewis sere foto atọ nke Field Marshal Bernard Law Montgomery
O dekwara ọtụtụ ndị na-etinye aka na agha site na onye otu South African Native Military Corps ruo nọọsụ
E ji ọtụtụ n'ime ihe oyiyi ndị a mee ihe maka stampụ akwụkwọ ozi n'oge agha ahụ

Ọ lụrụ Countess Rosa Cecilie Karoline-Mathilde Irene Sibylla Anna zu Solms-Baruth, nwa nwanyị Friedrich, 3rd Prince of Solms- Baruth na nwunye ya Princess Adelaide of Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Glücksburg, na 3 Nọvemba 1955 wee biri na Rowan Street, Stellenbosch ebe ụmụ ha Caroline na Frederick Henry Lewis gara akwụkwọ
Mgbe e mesịrị, di na nwunye ahụ nwetara obere ụlọ n'ihu Stellenbosch Golf Club ebe nwunye ya na ụmụ ya nwere ike ịchụso ịhụnanya ha maka ịgba ịnyịnya
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị n'afọ 1972 nwunye ya lụrụ Weber
Ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe gbara ihe osise Portrait of Albert van der Sandt Centlivres nke Lewis ọkụ n'oge ọgba aghara Rhodes Must Fall na Mahadum Cape Town na Febụwarị 2016

Nevine el-Kabbaj (amụrụ na abalị iri n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ijipt na Minista nke Social Solidarity ugbua site na Disemba 2019 ruo ugbua, na-anọchi Minista Ghada Waly n'oche
Tupu a họpụta ya, el-Kabbaj jere ozi dịka onye enyemaka minista na-ahụ maka nkwado na nchebe ọhanaeze ma bụrụkwa osote onye isi
Nevyana Ivanova (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 18 Mee 1962) bụ onye Bulgaria na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
O sonyere na asọmpi asatọ nke ụmụ nwanyị na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
New Mexico bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
New Afrika Shrine bụ ebe ụlọ ogege ntụrụndụ na-emeghe ikuku dị na Ikeja, Lagos State
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka ebe a na-eme emume egwu Felabration kwa afọ
N'ịbụ nke Femi Kuti (nwa mbụ nke Fela Kuti) na Yeni Anikulapo-Kuti na-achịkwa ugbu a, ọ bụ ihe nọchiri anya Africa Shrine ochie nke Fela Kuti mepụtara na 1970 ruo mgbe a gbara ya ọkụ na 1977
New Afrika Shrine na-egosi foto foto nke Fela na egwu egwu nke Femi Kuti na Seun Kuti si otú a mee ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị ndị njem nleta
Na ọnwa Julaị ubochi nke atọ nke afọ, 2018, Onye isi ala France Emmanuel Macron gara Shrine ma malite Oge Ọdịbendị Afrịka 2020 na France
Macron kwuru na ọ gara Shrine dị ka nwa akwụkwọ n'afọ 2002
Àtụ Fela Kuti
New Capitol Cinemas bụ usoro ihe nkiri na Botswana
New Capitol Cinema meghere Botswana mbụ Cineplex na 2002, dị ka ụlọ ihe nkiri ihuenyo anọ na Riverwalk shopping Mall na Gaborne East
N'otu afọ ahụ, New Capitol Cinemas meghere ihe nkiri itoolu na Game Shopping Mall na Gaborone West
Otu n'ime ndị otu ahụ bụ Rizwan K
Desai, nwa Abdul Kadir Desai, onye ọchụnta ego nke nwere ụlọ ihe nkiri Capitol na Mall
N'afọ 2017, a mara ọkwa ihe nkiri ọhụrụ nke Capitol, at the Acacia
E meghere Platinum Lounge, na-enye ndị na-aga ihe nkiri nri n'ebe ahụ na 2019
New Group bụ otu ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na South Africa bụ ndị, malite na 1937, malitere ịjụ ajụjụ ma na-emegide nchedo nke South African Society of Artists
Onye isi oche ya bụ Gregoire Boonzaier; ndị ọzọ guzobere ya bụ Lippy Lipshitz, Frieda Lock, Cecil Higgs na Terence McCaw

New Group bụ ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa nke oge a ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ ma gosipụta ihe ngosi dika otu, nke gụnyere Judith Gluckman na Alexis Preller yana Lippy Lipschitz, Gregoire Boonzaier (onye guzobere na onye isi oche ruo afọ iri), Louis Maurice, Solly Disner na Walter Battiss

Mysterious New Mexico ọrụ ebube, anwansị, na nnukwu anụ n’ala mgbaasị bụ nchịkọta afọ 2014 nke nyocha iri na atọ nke onye edemede Ben Radford duziri n'ime ikpe metụtara nkwupụta banyere ihe karịrị ike mmadụ a na-eme ma ọ bụ nwere njikọ dị mkpa na New México
Akwụkwọ a na-akọwa ojiji onye edemede ahụ ji usoro sayensị nyochaa ikpe iri na atọ nke ihe ndị paranormal

A gbara ndị mmadụ ajụjụ ọnụ na ihe omume ahụ na ebe dị iche iche metụtara akụkọ ifo gbasara KiMo Theater, El Santuario de Chimayo, okpokoro isi kristal a hụrụ na San Luis Valley, na iyi ọkụ nke Ojo Caliente
Ikpe nke igbu ọchụ West Mesa bụ ihe ndabere maka usoro ajụjụ ọnụ na ndị nchọpụta mmụọ ọjọọ nwere ike inyere aka idozi mpụta dị otú ahụ

Ikpe ndị ọzọ chọrọ nyocha akwụkwọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme, dị ka Aztec UFO Crash, Ụlọ elu Loretto Chapel, kọrọ banyere ịhụ Thunderbirds a ma ama, ọhụụ nke A maara dịka La Llorona, na Santa Fe's La Posada Hotel

Ihe ndị bụ isi nke akụkọ La Llorona, ihe a na-ejikọkarị ya na ọdịbendị Hispanic, dịka ọmụmaatụ, sitere n'akụkọ ifo German site na afo 1486A chọrọ nnwale bara uru maka otu nke atọ, gụnyere ịchọpụta mmalite nke The Santa Fe Courthouse Ghost, akụkọ banyere hauntings na Ogwe Cuchillo ochie, yana nyocha gbasara ike labyrinths
Onye edemede ahụ na-etinyekwa akụkọ ndị a n'ihe gbasara ọdịbendị ha ma gosipụta ihe jikọrọ ya site na omenala ochie naakụkọ ifo nke ikike karịrị mmadụ gafee ọdịnala
Radford kọwara ọrụ e mere maka akwụkwọ a dị ka 'iji ihe ndị ahụ kpọrọ nkụ ma nye nyocha siri ike'
New Nigerian bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria dabere na Kaduna

New Telegraph bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ mba niile na Naịjirịa, na-ekesa ihe ruru 100,000 kwa ụbọchị

New Telegraph lekwasịrị anya na ndị Naijiria na ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ si mba ofesi na gburugburu obodo mepere emepe nke obodo, yana mba ụwa, ma na-achọ ịnye ebumnobi na mkpuchi maka nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Onye isi oche New Telegraph bụ Dr
Orji Uzor Kalu ma na-egosiputakwa ndi ama ama gunyere onye ọka iwu ikike mmadụ Emmanuel Onwe
Iwa Ji ọhụrụ ndi Igbo(Orureshi na idoma, Iwa ji, Iri ji or Ike ji, n'ọlumba di iche iche) bụ emume ndi Igbo people na-eme kwa afọ na ngwụcha udu mmiri 'raining season' na mmalite ọnwa Asatọ

Emume Iwa Ji (maọbụ 'iri ji ọhọọ') bụ emume a na-eme na mpaghara ọdida anyanwụ nke Afirika 'West Africa (nke kacha na Nigeria na Ghana) nakwa mba Afrika ndi ọzọ 'African countries' ma tinyekwa, nke na-egosipụta njedebe aghọm ihe ubi nakwa mbido akụm ihe ubi Emume a n'egosipụta omenala, jikọta ndi Igbo ọnụ dika ndi ọrụ ubi makwa nwee ntụkwasi obi na Ji

Ji 'Yams' bụ ihe owuwu ihe ubi mbụ 'crop' a na-aghọta bụkwara nke kachasi mkpa na mpaghara a Ya mere Emume Ji ohụrụ bụ emume nke gosipụtara mkpa Ji di n'Omenala ndi Igbo N'uhuruchi tupu ubọchi ahụ, a na-eri maọbụ wepụ Ji ochie niile site na afọ gara aga Nke a bụ n'ihi na e kwenyere na Afọ Ọhụrụ ga-amalite site n' ihe dị ụtọ kama owuwu ihe ubi ochie nke kara aka nke afọ gara aga
N'ụbọchi nke na-esota, ihe a na-eri bụ Ji maọbụ nri Ji n'ihi n' Emume a na-egosipụta ihe owuwe ihe ubi n'uju

Ọ bụ ezie na ụzọ esi eme Emume a nwere ike ịdị iche site n'otu obodo ruo obodo, ihe ndị dị mkpa nke mejupụtara ememme ahụ ka na-adị otu N'obodo ụfọdụ, Ememme a bụ otu ụbọchị zuru ezu, n'ọtụtụ ebe ọ nwere ike ịbụ otu izu ma ọ bụ karịa Ememme ndị a na-agụnyekarị ụdị ntụrụndụ na emume dị iche iche, gụnyere omume nke Igwe (Eze), ma ọ bụ okenye, na omenala ndị Igbo, ụmụ nwanyị, na ụmụ ha Ememme a na-egosi ihe omume omenala Igbo dịka ihe ngosi nke oge a, egwu Mmọnwu di iche iche nakwa ejiji di iche iche
Mgbedum, na mmalite nke ememme a, a na-ebu ụzọ enye ndị chi na ndị nna nna mbụ Ji a tupu ekesaara ya ndị obodo
Nwoke kachasi okenye di n'obodo ahụ, onye Eze maọbụ onye echiri echichi na-eme Emume a

Nwoke a na-eweta Ji nye Chukwu abiama,God, deities na nna nna ya ancestors' site n'igosi Chineke ekele maka nchebe ya na obiọma ya na-eduga ha site na oge ruo oge owuwe ihe ubi buru ibu na-enweghị ọnwụ n'ihi agụụ
Mgbe emechara ekpere nke ekele nye Chineke, ha na-eri Ji mbụ n'ihi na-ekwenyere n' ọnọdụ ha nyere ha ohere nke ịbụ ndị na-agbata obodo ha na chi nke ala ahụ

A na-eme ememme ndị a iji gosipụta ekele nke obodo ahụ nye chi maka ime ka ihe ubi ahụ nwee ike ime nke ọma, a na-emekwa nkea n'agbanyeghị mgbanwe ndị dị ugbu a n'ihi mmetụta nke Iso Ụzọ Kraịst 'Christianity' Nke a kọwapụtara na ndi Igbo bụ ndi ọkaa omee, ndi okpukperechi nakwa ndi na-enye ekele
A na-eji ntụrụndụ ama Ụbọchị a oge a na-akọ ihe, a na-ejikwa ya ekesiri ndi agbata obi ọtụtụ ihe ndị enwetara n'ubi A na-eme ọtụtụ emume n'ụbọchi iri ji ọhụrụ
Otu egwu di iche iche 'Folk dances', Mmanwụ 'masquerades', ijenlemanya 'parades', n'emume ndi mmadụ na-ahụ dika 'nka' na-ezipụta aṅụrị, ekele na ngosipụta di iche iche ndi obodo na-eme
A na-eji mmanụ nri 'Palm oil' eri Ji ọhụrụ
Iwa ji na 'Asian Mid-Autumn Festival' nwere nyiri, ebe ha abụọ gbakwasara ụkwụ na njem ọnwa 'moon' bụkwara oge owuwe ihe ubi ndi obodo
Ihe omume a bụ ihe dị mkpa na kalenda nke ndị Igbo nọ n'akụkụ ụwa niile
Mkpụrụ owuwe ihe ubi Ji na ememme nke ikele Chineke nke ala site n' ememme Ji ọhụrụ bụ ihe atụ nke nkwenye n'okpukpere chi kachasị elu
Ọbịbịa nke ọnwa ọhụụ n'ọnwa Ọgọst bụ nkwadebe maka ememe 'Iri Ji ọhụrụ' dị ukwuu, ma oge n' usoro nkwadebe dịgasị iche iche site n'otu obodo gaa n'obodo
Ememme nke Iri Ji ọhụrụ bụ emume di ukwuu na-egosipụta nka

Ememe a ma ama bụ ihe ngosi nke mmekọrịta, ịgba egwú, oriri n'ọṅụṅụ, ngosikwa afọ maka ndị obodo, iji mee ka njedebe nke oge ịkọ ihe, ememme ebe ndị mmadụ na-egosipụta ekele ha nye ndị nyere ha aka ịghọ mkpụrụ dị ukwuu n'owuwe ihe ubi
New York bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
New York bu ama ukwu kárírí ívu mádu na Njikota Obodo Amerika, na etítì ama sárá nke New York, nke bu ótụ na ùwà kárírí madu
Bu ama oganiru, New York nwèrè íké na áhiá ùwà nílé, nká, oménàlà, ndọùwé, ọtúihe, ómúmú, na mmemmé
Ka onye jídéré Íshí Ọtú Mbà, ọ di kwà mkpà na ihe ne me na ùwà
Ha na kpo ámá nke New York City ma ọ bu City of New York Í me ka ya na nkeji obodo New York gị dị ichè, nke ọ nọr
Dí nà ébé ugbọ na bía di na ikpele mmiri nke Atlantic nke Olile owuwa Nkeji Obodo, ama nke nwèrè nkeji ise The Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens, na Élú mmiri Staten
Ha kàrà àkà na 2008 sí na ama nke nwèrè mádu gáfè nde 83, na nke àlà gbárá gburụ gbúrụ nke mile 305 (790 km2), New York City bu ébé mádu nọkọtàrà ká ama ndi ozor na Nkeji Obodo
Ama sárá nke New York nwèkwàrà mádu ká ébé ndi ozor na mgbà áhù, nwé mád ha kà àkà nde 191 na gbụrụ gbúrụ mile 6,720 (17,400 km2)
Na nke ozor, nke Njikota Kà Àkà Gbúrù nwéré ama sárá New York nwèrè mádu rúrú nde 222 na afọr 2009 nke ỌgúMádu kàrà àkà, na nke kárírí kwa na Njikota Obodo

New Zealand (Māori Aotearoa [aɔˈtɛaɾɔa]) bụ obodo agwaetiti dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Oke Osimiri Pasifik Ọ nwere nnukwu ala abụọ - North Island (Te Ika-a-Māui) na South Island (Te Waipunamu) - yana ihe karịrị agwaetiti 700 Ọ bụ obodo agwaetiti nke isii kachasị na mpaghara, na-ekpuchi 268,021 square kilomita (103,500 sq mi) New Zealand dị ihe dịka 2,000 kilomita (1,200 mi) n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Australia n'ofe Osimiri Tasman na 1,000 kilomita (600 mi) ndịda agwaetiti New Caledonia, Fiji, na Tonga Ọdịdị ọdịdị ala dị iche iche nke mba ahụ na ugwu ndị dị nkọ, gụnyere Southern Alps, nwere ụgwọ dị ukwuu n'ịkwalite tectonic na mgbawa mgbawa Isi obodo New Zealand bụ Wellington, na obodo ya kacha nwee bụ Auckland

Àtụ Infobox civil conflict
The newsboys' strike of 1899 was a US
youth-led campaign to facilitate change in the way that Joseph Pulitzer and William Randolph Hearst's newspapers compensated their force of newsboys or newspaper hawkers
The strikers demonstrated across New York City for several days, effectively stopping circulation of the two papers, along with the news distribution for many New England cities
The strike lasted two weeks, causing Pulitzer's New York World to decrease its circulation from 360,000 papers sold per day to 125,000

Although the price of papers was not lowered, the strike was successful in forcing the World and Journal to offer full buybacks to their sellers, thus increasing the amount of money that newsies received for their work
This event inspired the 1992 movie musical, Newsies, which was adapted for Broadway in 2012
Na mmalite nke narị afọ, ndị na-ebi akwụkwọ akụkọ dị mkpa maka nkesa akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ezigakarị mbipụta ụtụtụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ kpọmkwem na ndị debanyere aha, mbipụta nke ehihie na-adabere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị na ndị nta akụkọ iji ree
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-ede akụkọ sitere n'ezinụlọ ndị mbịarambịa dara ogbenye ma na-ere akwụkwọ n'ehihie na mgbede, mgbe ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ha gasịrị
Ha zụrụ akwụkwọ na 50¢ kwa narị, ma ree ha na 1 cents nke ọ bụla, maka uru nke ọkara cents kwa akwụkwọ
E nwere ọgbaghara nke ndị nta akụkọ ọtụtụ afọ tupu ihe omume nke 1899, gụnyere ndị nke 1886, 1887, na 1889
Ọgbaghara ikpeazụ a ma ama nke ndị nta akụkọ mere megide World na Journal bụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 1889

N'afọ 1898, mgbe Agha Spanish-American na-abawanye ahịa akwụkwọ akụkọ, ọtụtụ ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ welitere ọnụahịa nke akwụkwọ akụkọ 100 site na 50¢ ruo 60¢, ọnụahịa dị elu nke ahịa na-aba ụba n'oge ahụ
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọtụtụ akwụkwọ belatara ọnụahịa ahụ laghachi na ọkwa ndị gara aga, ma e wezụga The Evening World na New York Evening Journal
Àtụ Youth rights sidebar

N'ihe dị ka Julaị 18, 1899, otu ìgwè ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ na Long Island City tụgharịrị ụgbọ nkesa maka New York Journal ma kwupụta ọgbaghara megide akwụkwọ Joseph Pulitzer, onye na-ebi akwụkwọ nke World, na William Randolph Hearst, onye na'ebipụta akwụkwọ ahụ, ruo mgbe ọnụahịa laghachiri na 50¢ kwa narị
Ndị nta akụkọ nke Manhattan na Brooklyn sochiri ngwa ngwa n'echi ya
Ụzọ ndị nta akụkọ ahụ si eme ihe ike n'ụbọchị ndị mbụ nke ọgbaghara ahụ
Otu ìgwè ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe ga-emegbu nwoke ma ọ bụ nwata nwoke ọ bụla a hụrụ na-ere akwụkwọ abụọ a machibidoro iwu, tie ya ihe, ma bibie akwụkwọ ya

Ndị nwe akwụkwọ akụkọ kwụrụ ndị okenye ụgwọ ka ha ree akwụkwọ ha, na-enye ha nchebe ndị uwe ojii, mana ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na-ahụkarị ụzọ iji dọpụ uche ndị uwe ojii ka ha wee nwee ike ịbanye na 'scabs'
Ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ mere nke ọma n'ihi na, dịka onye isi otu Kid Blink si kwuo ya, 'A feller can't soak a lady'
Ndị na-ebi akwụkwọ akụkọ na-ekesa mpempe akwụkwọ ma na-akwụnye ihe ịrịba ama gburugburu obodo ahụ, na-agba ndị mmadụ ume inyere ha aka n'ihe ha na-eme site n'ịghara ịzụta World na Journal
Na Julaị 24, 1899, ndị nta akụkọ ahụ mere nzukọ obodo niile na Irving Hall nke onye omeiwu steeti, Timothy D
Sullivan kwadoro
A na-eme atụmatụ na puku ụmụ nwoke ise si Manhattan gara nzukọ ahụ, tinyere puku ụmụ nwoke abụọ si Brooklyn na ọtụtụ narị ndị si n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke obodo ahụ
Ọtụtụ ndị ọchụnta ego na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nọ n'ógbè ahụ gwara ìgwè mmadụ ahụ okwu, gụnyere onye ọka iwu Leonard A
Suitkin, Frank B
Wood, na onye bụbu onye omeiwu Phil Wissig

Mgbe ndị okenye ahụ kwụsịrị ikwu okwu, onye isi oche nke otu ahụ, David Simmons, gụrụ ndepụta nke mkpebi na-ekwu na ọgbaghara ahụ ga-eguzo ruo mgbe akwụkwọ akụkọ belatara ọnụahịa ha, yana ịkpọ ndị nta akụkọ ka ha nabata usoro mmegide na-abụghị nke ime ihe ike
Okwu ndị ọzọ sitere n'aka 'Warhorse' Brennan, Jack Tietjen, 'Bob the Indian', onye isi otu 'Kid Blink', 'Crazy' Arborn, Annie Kelly, na onye isi otu Brooklyn, 'Racetrack' Higgins
N'abalị ahụ, 'Hungry Joe' Kernan bụrụ abụ
E nyere Kid Blink okooko osisi dị ka ụgwọ ọrụ maka inye okwu kachasị mma nke mgbede ahụ
N'ime ụbọchị ndị sochiri nnọkọ ahụ, usoro ndị nta akụkọ gbanwere ka ọ bụrụ nke na-abụghị nke ime ihe ike
Ọ bụ ezie na ha anaghịzi akụ ndị na-ere World and Journal, ọgbaghara ahụ ka dị irè n'ihi na ọha na eze nọ n'akụkụ ha ma họrọ ịghara ịzụta akwụkwọ ahụ, ọbụlagodi na ha na-ere
Na Julaị 26, 1899, ndị nta akụkọ mere atụmatụ ngagharị, ebe ihe ruru ụmụ nwoke 6,000 ga-agagharị, na-esonyere otu egwu na ọkụ ọkụ, mana ngagharị a emeghị n'ihi nsogbu inweta ikike

N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1899, asịrị gbasara n'etiti ndị nta akụkọ na ndị isi na-eme ngagharị iwe, Kid Blink na David Simmons agbaala mgba okpuru ahụ ma kweta ire akwụkwọ ndị a machibidoro iwu iji gbanwere aka azụ site n'aka ndị isi akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ụmụ nwoke abụọ ahụ gọnahụrụ ebubo ahụ, mana ụfọdụ isi mmalite na-ekwu na Kid Blink yi uwe dị mma karịa ka ọ na-adịkarị, na-egosi na ọ nwere ike ịnata iri ngo

N'ịzaghachi ebubo ndị a, Kid Blink na David Simmons gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ndị ndu ha, Simmons gbanwere site na onye isi oche otu gaa na onye na-ahụ maka akụ, na Kid Blink ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya na-agagharị agagharị
Mgbe asịrị banyere Kid Blink na David Simmons hapụrụ ọgbaghara ahụ, tinyere enweghị ike inweta ikike ngagharị, okwukwe ndị nta akụkọ na ndị ndu etiti belatara
Ndị ọzọ na-akụkọ akụkọ bilitere iduzi ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe, mana ọ dịghị onye n'ime ha nwere otu ike na mmetụta nke Kid Blink nwere
N'August 1, 1899, World and Journal nyere ndị nta akụkọ nkwekọrịta ọnụahịa nke otu narị akwụkwọ ga-anọgide na 60¢, mana ha ga-azụta akwụkwọ ọ bụla a na-ere ere
Nke a pụtara na ụmụ okorobịa ahụ, ndị nwere nsogbu ire akwụkwọ ha niile agaghị amanye ha ire n'ime abalị iji zere ịla n'iyi n'ụbọchị ahụ
Ndị nta akụkọ nabatara nkwekọrịta a, kwụsị ọgbaghara ahụ ma gbasaa njikọ ahụ n'August 2, 1899
Ndị isi nke ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na-adị obere karịa ọtụtụ ndị otu, ebe ụmụ nwoke nọ n'ógbè ọ bụla na-enwe iguzosi ike n'ihe nye ụmụ nwoke ndị ọzọ nọ n'ebe ha karịa ndị isi etiti

Nke ahụ kwuru, ụfọdụ ụmụ nwoke nwere mmetụta karịa ndị ọzọ, na-ahazi nzukọ, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ndị na-ekwuchitere ọgbaghara ahụ, na akwụkwọ akụkọ dịka New York Tribune, New York Sun ma ọ bụ New York Herald na-agba ha ajụjụ ọnụ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ na-ekwukarị na ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na ụda olu ha na New York, nke a na-egosi dị ka olumba anya, na-eji okwu ndị dị ka 'Ndị ikom na-eguzosi ike n'ihe niile'
Onye na-eme ngagharị iwe bụ Louis 'Kid Blink' Baletti

Higgins bụ ọkà okwu na-akpali akpali, ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na-ekwu maka iji ọchị eme ihe n'okwu ya na ndị nta akụkọ na-adọrọ mmasị

Nezha Aït Baba Hlim (Arabic) bụ onye Morocco na-agba bọọlụ nke na agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti maka otu egwuregwu nke Moroccan Otu egwuregwu asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Municipalité de Laâyoune na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco

Nezha Alaoui bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke mba Moroccan mụrụ na onye guzobere akara Mayshad
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Mayshad Foundation, ọgbakọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ maka mmepe ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ Alaoui na Rabat n'afọ 1982
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na French High School na Rabat wee gaa n'ihu na Tangier n'ụlọ akwụkwọ America
O mechara mụọ nlekọta ile ọbịa na Spain ebe o mere ọzụzụ ọnwa isii nke dugara ya Rome, Milan na London
Ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na azụmahịa na London wee mụọ ise foto na New York City
Alaoui malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto, nke United Nations nyere ya ọrụ
O nwetara nkwekọrịta ya na Mmemme Nri Ụwa maka ịkọ akụkọ ọrụ enyemaka UN na gburugburu ụwa
Na mgbakwunye na ibipụta foto ya kacha mma, ọ chịkọtara ndị na-eso ya na Instagram maka ọrụ ya
E gosikwara foto ya n’isi ụlọ ọrụ UN dị na Geneva, Vienna, na New York
Alaoui bụ onye guzobere Mayshad, ụdị akpa akpa okomoko nke amara maka ọrụ mmekọrịta nke ọha
Aha Mayshad sitere na syllable mbụ nke aha ụmụ ya nwanyị
Ọ tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ na 2011 wee mepee ụlọ ahịa na Paris n'afọ 2014
Alaoui akwadola ma kwado mmemme maka agụmakwụkwọ na ike ụmụnwanyị site na ịmepụta Mayshad Foundation
Ntọala ahụ dabere na US mana ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Africa
Ọrụ ya dabara na ebumnuche Sustainable Development Goals nke United Nations nakweere na 2015, bụ nke lekwasịrị anya na ụmụnwanyị na ndị ntorobịa na-adịghị ike
Ntọala ahụ eguzobela ngalaba na-arụkọ ọrụ na Afrịka niile ebe ọ na-enyere aka n'ịzụ ụmụ nwanyị ka ha bụrụ ndị ọchụnta ego
Nezha Bidouane (Arabic نزهة بدوان; amụrụ na 18 Septemba na afo 1969 na Rabat) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ na-agba bọọlụ nke lara ezumike nká bụ onye ọkachamara na 400 mita hurdles
Onye mmeri ụwa ugboro abụọ, ọ meriri nrite ọla edo 400m hurdles na afọ 1997 World Championships na Athens na afọ 2001 World Championships in Edmonton

N'afọ 2000, o ritere ọla nchara n'egwuregwu Olympic

Ngụkọta nke electron (TEC) bụ ihe dị mkpà na-akọwa màkà ionosphere nke ụwa
TEC bụ ngụkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ nkè electrons jikọtara n'etiti isi abụọ, n'akụkụ tube nke otu mita square cross section, ya bụ, ọnụọgụ ọnụọgụ nké electron
A na-akọkarị ya n'ọtụtụ nkè a na-akpọ TEC unit, akọwapụtara dị ka TECU=1016el/m2≈166×10−8 mol⋅m−2
TEC dị mkpà n'ịkọwapụta scintillation na ìgwè na ógè igbu oge nke ebili mmiri redio site na ónyé na-ahụ màkà ya
A na-akọwa Ionospheric TEC site n'ịhụ oge igbu oge nke mgbaàmà redio natara site na satellites dị n'elu ionosphere, na-ejikarị satellites Global Positioning System
Ọrụ anyanwụ na-emetụta TEC nke ukwuu
TEC na-adabere n'ụzọ
Site na nkọwa, enwèrè ike ịgbakọ ya site na ijikọta n'ụzọ ds site na ionosphere nà ọnụọgụ electron na-adabere na ọnọdụ ne(s)
A na-ekpebi TEC kwụ ọtọ (VTEC) site na njikọta nkè njupụta electron na ụzọ kwụ ọtọ n'ala, a na-enweta TEC (STEC) site n'ijikọta n'ụzọ ọ bụla kwụ ọtọ
Na usoro mbụ, mmetụta mgbasa ozi redio ionospheric kwekọrọ na TEC ma kwekọọ na frequency redio f
Ógè ionospheric na-egbu oge mà e jiri ya tụnyere mgbasa na ikuku na-agụ eq
ébé igbu ógè nke ìgwè ionospheric nwèrè otu oke ma ihe ịrịba ama dị iche
A na-egosipụtakarị igbu ógè ionospheric na nkeji nke ogologo (mita), na-eche na igbu ógè (na sekọnd) mụbara site na ọsọ nké ìhè (na m / s)
Nkọwa na-adịgide adịgide κ na-agụ eq(921), (920), (919), (914)
ebe q, m, re bụ ụgwọ electron, oke, na radius, n'otu n'otu; c bụ ọsọ ọsọ nke ìhè na ε0 bụ ikike ikuku

Uru nke ihe na-adịgide adịgide bụ ihe dịka κ ≈ 40308193 m3·s−2; enwèrè ike igosipụta nkeji ndị ahụ dịka m·m2·Hz2 iji mee ka nkwụsịtụ na-emetụta igbu oge τ na mita pụta ìhè, nyéré f na Hz na TEC na m−2
A na-egosipụta ụkpụrụ ehihie nke TEC na nha site na efu ruo TEC otu narị
Otú ọ dị, enwèrè ike iwepụta obere ọdịiche nke 01-05 TEC nkeji n'okpuru echiche nke echiche na-adịgide adịgide
Obere ọdịiche TEC ndị a nwèrè njikọ na nsogbu ionospheric na-agagharị agagharị (MSTIDs)

Anụ ọhịa atọ ahụ bụ anụ ọhịa Borivali, Anụ ọhịa Nagpur na anụ ọhịa Nashik
Ọfịs nke Onye isi nchịkwa nke Ọhịa, Onye isi nke Ndị Agha Ọhịa (HoFF) bụ onye isi nke ngalaba ọhịa na Maharashtra
Ikike nke ndị agbụrụ nọ n'ọhịa n'okpuru Iwu Ikike Ọhịa na-achịkwa Ngalaba Ọhịa
Iji lụso mgbanwe ihu igwe na ụkọ mmiri ozuzo ọgụ na Maharashtra, ngalaba ọhịa mere atụmatụ ịkụ osisi 33 crore
Ọ bụ ọnwa atọ ogologo osisi na-akụ osisi gafee mpaghara 36 site na 1 Julaị ruo 30 Septemba na steeti Maharastra
Steeti ahụ ruru ihe mgbaru ọsọ ahụ site n'ịkụ ihe karịrị 33 Crore
N'ozuzu, Ngalaba Ọhịa Maharashtra kụrụ, osisi 52 crore n'etiti afọ 2017 na afọ 2019 na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị dị ndụ ka bụ pasenti Iri asatọ na otu
Ngalaba Na-ahu maka ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị nakwa Mmepe Ọha bụ akụkụ ngalaba ministri Naijiria nke na-akwalite mmepe nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka na Naijiria
Onye isi nke ozi ahụ bụ Pauline Tallen, onye bụbu osote gọvanọ nke Plateau State
Onye nọ na isi ozi ahụ bụ Minista, nke odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, onye bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị na-arụ ọrụ na-enyere aka

Ebumnuche gụnyere ịkpali ime ihe iji kwalite itinye aka na obodo, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na akụ na ụba nke ụmụ nwanyị; ịhazi na nlekota mmemme ụmụ nwanyị; inye nkwado teknụzụ na ego nye ụmụ nwanyị na-abụghị nke gọọmentị, ọkachasị National Council of Women Societies
A na-achọ ka Ministri nke na ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị nyochaa iwu ndị na-emetụta ụmụ nwanyị

Ụfọdụ ọrụ ndị Ministrị ahụ na-arụ gụnyere ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ dị ka ịkpa aṅụ, ite na mmepụta mmanụ akwụkwọ nri iji bulie ike akụ na ụba nke ụmụ nwanyị, ebe Ministrị na-enye ngwá ọrụ na ọzụzụ maka ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị
Ministrị ahụ na-akwalite agụmakwụkwọ na mmemme ahụike maka ụmụ nwanyị
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wepụtara iwu maka ịgwọ ọrịa HIV / AIDS n'ebe ọrụ, na-enyere aka hụ na mgbochi, nlekọta na nkwado maka ndị na-arịa ọrịa ahụ
Ngalaba na-ebelata ikuku (ERU) bụ otu ikuku nke e nyèrè n'okpuru ọrụ mmejuputa njikọ aka n'ihe gbásárá Kyoto Protocol
ERU nọchitere anya mbelata nke gas na-ekpo ọkụ n'okpuru usoro Joint Implementation, ebe ọ na-anọchite anya otu tọn nkè CO2 dị ka mbelata
Iji kwe ka e jiri ya tụnyere mmetụta dị iche iche nkè gas na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị akọwaala ndị na-amụba gas na-eji ike okpomọkụ ha tụnyere nke carbon dioxide
Otu ihe atụ nke ọrụ mmejuputa njikọta nke na-akpata otu mbelata ikuku, bụ mmepụta nke biogases site na ebe a na-ekpofu ihe
Gas ndị a nwèrè methane nke na-agbapụ na ikuku ma ọ bụrụ na anakọtaghị ya

Isi ihe kpatara ya màkà ịlụso methane ọgụ bụ na ọ nwere ihe na-eme ka okpomọkụ ụwa dị otu narị afọ nke iri abuo na ise ma e jiri ya tụnyere carbon dioxide (ya bụ, o nwèrè okpukpu iri abụo na ise nke ike okpomọkụ)
Nchịkọta nke methane na-esokarị ọkụ ya
Ịkpọ otu tọn nke methane ọkụ na-emepụta ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ tọn atọ nke CO2, si otú a na-ebelata mmetụta ya site na (25−3=22) ERU

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2012, ọnụahịa ERU dara na euro iri na ise euro cents tupu ọ gbakee na 23c mgbe akụkọ na Kọmitii Mgbanwe ihu igwe EU ga-atụ vootu màkà mmachibido iwu nke ERUs site na mba ndị na-edebanyeghị aha na ógè nke abụọ n'okpuru Kyoto Protocol
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, Bloomberg kọrọ na ọnụahịa nke mbelata nke ikuku na-agbadata pasent iri asatọ na itoolu n'afọ 2012
Ọnụ ego e kenyere
Ngalaba Na-ewepụ Ihe (RMU) bụ ụgwọ carbon a na-ere ahịa ma ọ bụ 'Kyoto unit' na-anọchite anya ikike iji wepụta otu tọn nkè gas na-ekpo ọkụ nke ewepụ ma ọ bụ ọrụ carbon sink na mba Annex I
E mepụtara ma nye ya site na Kyoto Protocol Annex I Parties màkà ịmịkọrọ carbon site na iji ala eme ihe, mgbanwe ala, na ọrụ ọhịa (LULUCF) dịka mgbake osisi

N'okpuru Nkeji édémédé 33 nkè Kyoto Protocol, Ndepụta I Ndị otu nwèrè ike ịmata biosequestration, iwepụ carbon dioxide site na ikuku site na carbon sinks, nke sitere na osisi mmadụ, osisi na mgbukpọ osisi kemgbe afọ 1990, na ikpebi ma ha mezuru nkwa ha na-ebelata ikuku n'okpuru Protocol ahụ
Mgbe sinks mere ka ewepụ gas na ikuku, Annex I Parties nwéré ike iwepụta nkeji mwepụ (RMUs)

Ngalaba nyocha Satellite nke United States, akụkụ nke National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) nke National Environmental Satellite, Data, and Information Service's Satellite Services Division, bụ ébé a na-elekwasị ányà màkà ngwaahịa ihe oyiyi ógè n'ime NESDIS
Ọ bụkwa ọrụ ya màkà ime usoro Dvorak siri ike na cyclones nke okpomọkụ
Mgbọrọgwụ ya sitere na nguzobe nke Ngalaba Satellite Meteorological site n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1959
Ọrụ ya bụ isi bụ 'ịrụ ọrụ ihe akaebe ọhụrụ nke usoro nyocha satellite dị mkpà iji kwado ọrụ mgbochi na ịdọ áká ná ntị' màkà gọọmentị US na ụlọ ọrụ ya
Ọ na-ekesa ihe oyiyi satellite n'oge site na satellites geostationary
SAB na-emepụta ihe osise màkà amụma mmiri ozuzo Tropical màkà usoro okpomọkụ niile dị na Western Hemisphere na ọtụtụ na Eastern Hemisphere
N'ébé dị ányá site na oké ifufe na-ekpo ọkụ, SAB na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Washington Volcanic Ash Advisory Center, ebe International Civil Aviation Organization họpụtara ya dị ka nke a n'afọ 1997
Ọ na-emekwa nyocha snow na ice, ma mee ya, ya na ndị nne na nna ya NESDIS na SSD, kemgbe afọ 1966
Ngalula bụ afa nna Congolese
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere

Ngambay (nke a makwaara dị ka Sara, Sara Ngambai, Gamba, Gambaye, Gamblai na Ngambai) bụ otu n'ime asụsụ ndị Sara na-asụ na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Chad, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Cameroon na n'ebe ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naijiria, nke nwere ihe dị ka otu nde ndị na-asụrụ ya
Ngambay bụ asụsụ a na-asụkarị n'asụsụ Sara, a na-ejikwa ya dị ka asụsụ azụmahịa n'etiti ndị na-asụrụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ ndị Sara Gambai na-asụ ya
Ngambay nwere usoro okwu nke isiokwu
Suffixes na-egosi ikpe
Enweghị oge; akụkụ a na-egosi site na ọdịiche zuru oke na-ezughị oke
Ndị na-agbanwe aha na-agbaso aha
Usoro ọnụọgụ bụ iri, mana asatọ na itoolu na-egosipụta dị ka iri ewepụta abụọ ya na iri enwepuru otu
Ọ bụ asụsụ ụda nwere ụda atọ elu, etiti, na ala
E nwere okwu mgbazinye site na Arabic na French
Enwere ike ịkọwa ụdaume ma ọ bụ nasalised
Diacritics na accents gụnyere elu /á/, etiti /ā/, ala /à/, na nasalised /ã/
Ng'ambo Petronella Musole (amụrụ na 26 na onwa nke isii, na afo 1998) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-edebe goolu maka ZESCO United FC na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Zambia
Musole agbaala bọọlụ maka Chiparamba Breakthrough na ZESCO United FC na Zambia
Musole nọchitere anya Zambia na 2014 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
O meriri n'ọkwa dị elu na 28 Nọvemba 2020 na mmeri enyi na enyi megide Chile
Ngamo (nke a makwaara dị ka Ngamawa, Gamo, Gamawa) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Naịjirịa
Asụsụ ala nna Ngamo nwere nnukwu olumba abụọ, viz, Gudi Ngamo na Yaya Ngamo
Asụsụ ndị a na-asụ site n'agbụrụ dị iche iche ma n'ime ma n'èzí Gadaka
Ngamo bụ onye otu West Branch nke Chadic ma ya mere nwere njikọ na Hausa, asụsụ kachasị n'ebe ugwu Naịjirịa
Otú ọ dị, ndị ikwu asụsụ kacha nso bụ ndị agbata obi ya, Karekare, Bole, na Maka
Ethnologue na-enye ọnụ ọgụgụ maka puku iri na isii dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụ Ngamo, nke yiri ka ọ bụghị ihe ezi uche dị na ya
Onye ọchịchị ọdịnala a ma ama nke ndị Ngamo bụ Mai Gudi, Alhaji Isa Bunuwo, onye ụlọ ikpe ya dị na Gadaka, ihe dị ka kilomita iri na ise n'ebe ndịda Potiskum
E nwere nnukwu olumba abụọ nke Ngamo, olumba Gudi na olumba Yaya

Asụsụ ndị ahụ dị iche iche na ibe ha na phonology, morphology, na lexicon nke na ha na-ejikọta onwe ha na ịbụ asụsụ dị iche iche, mana enwere ezi nghọta, nke na-akwado ịhazi ha dị ka asụsụ nke otu asụsụ
A maghị mmalite nke aha ahụ
A na-eji mgbọrọgwụ a eme ihe ma dị ka aha na-achị onwe ya ma site n'aka ndị agbata obi asụsụ
Ndị Ngoi Ngamo (m), An Ngamo (f) Ngamaye (pl)
Nnyocha banyere asụsụ Ngamo ka Yobe Languages Research Project duziri
Ọrụ a enwetala nkwado abụọ site na US National Science Foundation
Nke mbụ, Asụsụ Chadic nke Yobe Steeti, Naịjirịa (nke a na-enye #BCS-0111289, Russell G
Schuh, Onye isi nchọpụta), gbara site na 2001-2004
Nke abụọ, nke a na-akpọ, Linguistic Structure, na Verbal Arts in Chadic Languages of Northeastern Nigeria (award #BCS-0553222, Russell G
Schuh, Principal Investigator), malitere site na 2006-2009
Ndị nduzi nke ọrụ ahụ n'okpuru enyemaka abụọ ahụ bụ Russell G
Schuh, onye isi nchọpụta, na Alhaji Maina Gimba, onye nduzi obodo
Site na 2002-2004, ndị otu Ngamo bụ Umaru Mamu Goge, Jibir Audu Janga Dole (ha abụọ na-ekwu Gudi Ngamo), na Isa Adamu Gashinge (onye na-ekwu Yaya Ngamo)

N'ihi njedebe nke oge na ihe onwunwe, e kpebiri maka 2006-2009 ilekwasị anya na nyocha Ngamo na olumba Gudi, ọ bụ ezie na a chịkọtara ụfọdụ data ọhụrụ banyere Yaya Ngamo na 2009, ihe karịrị ọkara nke ihe dị na nchịkọta 2009 nke Ngamo okwu nka dị na Yaya Ngamo
Ndị otu Ngamo bụ Umaru Mamu Goge na Jibir Audu Janga Dole maka Gudi, na Isa Adamu Gashinge na-enye data Yaya
Ekele gakwara HRH Alhaji Isa Bunuwo, Mai Gudi maka nkwado ya na Madu Liman na ezinụlọ ya maka nkwado dị mkpa
Ndị Ngandangara bụ ụmụ amaala Australia nke steeti Queensland
Na atụmatụ Norman Tindale, ala agbụrụ Ngandangara gbasara ihe karịrị square 4,800 (12,000 km2)
Ha nọ n'ebe dị elu nke elu Wilson River;
N'ebe ugwu ha nọ na Eromanga wee bịaruo nso Thylungra na Ray
Ókè ha dị n'ebe ndịda dị gburugburu Nockatunga
Ndị Ngandangara bụ otu n'ime ndị otu mba Australia kachasị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ iji mee emume agbụrụ nke ibi úgwù
N'afọ 1928, P
Riddell, zutere ọtụtụ Ngandangara, onye ọ matara dị ka Unda Gnoora, n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ na Durham Downs
Ọ gara ebe ahụ site na Broken Hill iji nyochaa ma see foto usoro nkume dị ịrịba ama, na-atụle 90 site na 200 ụkwụ na mpaghara ahụ
Ebe a chịkọtara nkume ndị ahụ, ụfọdụ ruru mita atọ, na gburugburu dị iche iche, a maara dị ka A analy, nke, n'ihi na ejiri ya mee ihe maka ịnakọta ehi, omume nke nyere aka mebie usoro ememe ahụ
Ndị Ngandangara na-ala azụ nke ukwu ikpughe ozi gbasara obodo ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na Riddell mechara chọpụta site n'aka otu onye na-enye ihe ọmụma na saịtị ahụ gosipụtara ala ebe onye mbụ 'gbala elu'
Ngas, ma ọ bụ Angas, bụ asụsụ mba Afro-Asia nke a na-asụ na Steeti Plateau, no na Naijiria
Asụsụ ndị a bụ Hill Angas na Plain Angas
General Yakubu Gowon lara ezumike nká bụ onye Naijiria a ma ama nke sitere na Ngas
Bəlnəŋ, asụsụ A3 West Chadic nke nwere njikọ chiri anya na Angas
Ihe dị ka mmadụ 500 na-asụ ya n'otu obodo Langung, nke obodo Tal gbara gburugburu n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ na obodo Miship n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ
Ndị na-asụ Sur, asụsụ Plateau, ndị na-asụrụ Ngas gbara gburugburu, mana Sur ka na-anọgide na-abụ asụsụ a na-elekọta nke ọma
Asụsụ Ngas enwetala mmetụta dị ukwuu site na Tarok
Ongamo, ma ọ bụ Ngas, bụ asụsụ Eastern Nilotic nke di na obodo Tanzania
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na asụsụ Maa, mana ọ dị anya karịa ka ha dị na ibe ha
Ongamo nwere 60% nke okwu yiri Maasai, Samburu, na Camus
Ndị na-asụ ya agafeela Chagga, asụsụ mpaghara Bantu
Mgbasawanye nke ndị na-asụ Ngasa na mbara ala dị n'ebe ugwu nke Ugwu Kilimanjaro mere na narị afọ nke iri na abụọ
Asụsụ ahụ na Proto-Maasai nwere nghọta n'oge ahụ
Nchịkọta okwu site n'oge a na-agba akaebe na ndị Ngas na-azụlite sorghum na elusine
Mbugharị nke Chagga na-asụ asụsụ nke Bantu n'ime narị afọ ise sochirinụ belatara oke na ịdị irè nke asụsụ Ngasa
Ngasa profaịlụ na Project Asụsụ Ndị Nri Na-apụ n'anyaÀtụ Languages of Tanzania
Ngawi (Asụsụ Indonesian Kecamatan Ngawi) bụ subdistrict na Ngawi, Ọchịchị East Java, Indoneshia
Mpaghara a bụkwa isi obodo Ngawi Regency yana ịbụ ebe akụ na ụba nke mpaghara
Ngawi sitere na okwu 'awi' nke putara achara wee nweta mkpụrụedemede agbakwunyere 'ng' ka ọ bụrụ 'ngawi'
Dị ka aha mpaghara ndị ọzọ, e nwere ọtụtụ aha mpaghara metụtara aha osisi
QuikClot bụ ụdị ejiji ọnyá ọbara nke nwere ihe na-akwalite ọbara ịkpụkọ
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ Z-Medica korporation nwe akara ahụ
Ọ bụ ndị agha na ndị mmanye iwu na-eji ya agwọ ọbara ọgbụgba site na mmerụ ahụ
Frank Hursey nyere ikike iji ihe na-eme ka ọ ghara ịdị ọcha, dị ka zeolite, n'ime ihe na-ejikọta ya iji gwọọ ọnyá n'afọ 1989
Mgbe mwakpo nke Septemba 11 gasịrị, ndị agha US mere nnyocha iji tụnyere teknụzụ mgbochi ọbara, nke QuikClot nwetara akara kachasị mma
Nnyocha ọzọ chọpụtara na mgbe ejiri ya gwọọ mmerụ ahụ na-egbu egbu n'ọkpụkpụ ezì, anụmanụ ndị a gwọrọ nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ ndụ 100%
N'ịgbaso ule ndị a, ndị agha US kwadoro iji ya na Afghanistan na Iraq
Nhazi mbụ nke ngwaahịa ahụ nwere ihe na-arụ ọrụ zeolite, nke na-akwalite ọbara na-akpụ akpụ
Zeolite ga-enwe mmeghachi omume exothermic (ịtọhapụ okpomọkụ) na ọbara n'oge usoro ọbara, nke nwere ike ịkpata ọkụ nke abụọ
N'ihi nke a, ngwaahịa ahụ adịghị maka ire ere ma jiri ya mee ihe naanị n'ọnọdụ mberede, dịka na ọgụ
Usoro zeolite ọhụrụ na-abịa tupu mmiri, nke na-emepụta okpomọkụ dị ala, ma nwee ike iji ya mee n'enweghị nsogbu iji kwado ọnyá ma kwụsị ọbara ọgbụgba
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2009, a na-eji gaze e ji kaolin mee ngwaọrụ QuikClot kama iji zeolite
Ngwaọrụ kaolin rụrụ ọrụ dịka bandeeji hemostatic mepụtara n'oge gara aga
Kaolin anaghị akpata allergies akpụkpọ ahụ n'ihi njirimara ya na-adịghị arụ ọrụ
QuikClot dị na mbụ dị ka granulate a ga-awụnye kpọmkwem na ọnyá iji mee ka ọbara na-agbapụta
Kaolin na QuikClot Interventional bandeeji na-amịkọrọ mmiri dị n'ọbara, na-ahapụ platelets buru ibu na mkpụrụ ndụ na-eme ka ọbara kpụkọọ
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke mkpụrụ ndụ na molekụl ndị fọdụrụnụ na-eme ka ha na-akpụ akpụ ngwa ngwa
Kaolin na-eme ka ihe XII rụọ ọrụ, ihe protein nke na-enyere aka na mmalite nke coagulation cascade, mmeghachi omume protein nke na'akwalite ọbara na-akpụ akpụ n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
Ka e mesịrị, e mepụtara QuikClot site na iji beads zeolite, nke na-akwalite akpụkọ ozugbo site na ịrụ ọrụ nke coagulation cascade

Na ihe gbasara otu na ahụ maka ọgụ ndị dị oké mkpa (Committee on Tactical combat Casualty care) bipụtara na 2014, edepụtara ihe na ahụ maka ọbara ogbugba nke na egosi na onwere ike igbabo hemostatic dị mma iji mee ihe maka ọbara ọgbụgba n'èzí nke na-enweghị ike iji ya mee ihe ma ọ bụ dị ka ihe mgbakwunye na mwepụ tourniquet ma ọ bụrụ na a na-atụ anya na ọpụpụ karịa awa 2
Na ntuziaka TCCC bipụtara na 2021, Combat Gauze nọgidere na-abụ nhọrọ hemostatic ejiji maka mmerụ ahụ dị otú ahụ
Ngewo (Ngewɔ na Mende) bụ chi dịkachasịrị elu nke ndị Menda si Sierra Leone
Ngewo bụ chi e jikọtara ọnụ site na chi nwoke Ngewa na chi nwanyị Leve, onye bu Ngew ụzọ dị ka chi kachasị elu nke ndị Mende na-asọpụrụ
A na-efe chi abụọ a ofufe ugbu a n'okpuru Ngewo, ebe a na'ewere Leve dịka nwunye ya
Ngewo bụ chi eluigwe, nke na-ahụ maka ịmepụta eluigwe na ala, ọ bụkwa ya ga-ekpebi ihe ndị sitere n'okike n'ụwa
A na-egosikarị ya dị ka chi dị anya, onye na'echebaraghị onwe ya echiche na njem kwa ụbọchị nke ndị na -enye ya ofufe
Otú ọ dị, n'akụkọ ifo ụfọdụ, Ngewo na-ata ndị chefuru ikpe ekpere nye ya ahụhụ nakwa ndị na'adịghị enye ya ụtụ
Ọ na-agwa ndị Mende okwu site n'enyemaka ndị nna nna ha, dyinyinga, ndị na-achọkwa onyinye nri ụfọdụ
Ngewo biri naanị ya n'ụwa n'ọgbà
Otu ụbọchị, ọ chọrọ mkpakọrịta, ya mere ọ malitere ịmepụta ụmụ anụmanụ, n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke
N'ikpeazụ, o kere nwoke mbụ na nwanyị mbụ
Ngewo nyere ihe okike ya nnwere onwe ịjụ ya ihe ọ bụla, nke megidere mgbe oge ụfọdụ gasịrị
Arịrịọ ha juru ya anya wee laghachi n'eluigwe, ebe o biri kemgbe ahụ
Ngewo nyere ozi abụọ nke ndị Mende ga-anata ma gwa ụmụ anụmanụ abụọ, awọ na nkịta, ka ha zipụ ozi ndị a n'ụwa
E nyere nkịta ahụ ọrụ ịgwa ụmụ mmadụ na ha agaghị anwụ anwụ, ebe awọ ga-eweta ozi na-ebu amụma ọnwụ ndị mmadụ
N'ụzọ dị mwute, awọ ahụ bu ụzọ rute, ebe ọ bụ na nkịta ahụ nwetara ihe mmegharị anya
N'ihi ya, ọnwụ ghọrọ akara aka ụmụ mmadụ

Ndị Ngizim (Ngizmawa, Ngezzim) bi na Yobe Steeti, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Nijiria
Ka ọ na-erule afọ narị iri itoolu iri itoolu na atọ, e nwere ihe dịka nari iri asatọ ndi Ngizim
Agbụrụ ahụ bi na Potiskum, obodo kachasị na Yobe Steeti na mbụ obodo Ngizim, yana mpaghara ndị dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndịda obodo ahụ
Ndị Ngizim bibu n'akụkụ Borno na Jigawa steeti, mana kemgbe ahụ efunahụla ọdịbendị ha mgbe ha sonyere n'agbụrụ ndị ọzọ
Ndị Ngizim na-asụ asụsụ Chadic a na-akpọkwa Ngizim
Tupu Fulani Jihad nke mere na narị iri asatọ, akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Ngizim nwere njikọ chiri anya na nke Alaeze Ukwu Bornu
Ka oruru nari iri anọ iri asaa na abụọ, mgbe e guzobere isi obodo nke Alaeze Ukwu Bornu, Birni Ngazargamu, ndị Ngizim enwetala aha dị ka ndị agha dị egwu
Ka ha na-eme ka mmetụta ha sie ike n'akụkụ ụfọdụ obodo Yobe Steeti nke oge a, isi obodo ọdịbendị ha bụ Potiskum ghọrọ ebe etiti mpaghara
N'oge mmalite nke narị afọ na iri abụọ, ndị Ngizim nupụụrụ Fika Emirate isi, nke ndị ọchịchị na-achị ala nyere ha ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Onye isi mpaghara obodo Britain na-eduga ndị agha megide ndị Ngizim; Mai Agudum, onye ndú nnupụisi, mechara gbuo ya
E weghachighị eze ukwu Ngizim ruo n'afọ 1993 mgbe gọvanọ steeti họpụtara Mai Muhammadu Atiyaye
Onye isi Ngizim nke ugbu a, Mai Umaru Bubaram Ibn Wuriwa Bauya ka onye bụbu Gọvanọ Bukar Abba Ibrahim buliri n'oge na-adịbeghị anya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala mbụ
Ngizim bụ otu n'ime asụsụ Chadic ise sitere na Yobe Steeti, ndị ọzọ bụ Bade, Bole, Karekare, na Ngamo
Ngizim bụ onye otu Alaka ọdịda anyanwu nke Chadic ma ya mere nwere njikọ na Hausa, asụsụ kachasị n'ebe ugwu Naịjirịa
Ndị ikwu asụsụ Ngizim kacha nso bụ Bade, nke a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu Potiskum na Bade (Bedde) Emirate, na Duwai, nke a-asụ ọwụwa anyanwụ Gashua
N'adịghị ka ụfọdụ n'ime asụsụ ndị ọzọ dị na Yobe Steeti, Ngizim nwere obere ọdịiche dị n'asụsụ
Onye ọchịchịachị ọdịnala nke ndị Ngizim bụ Mai Potiskum, onye oche ya dị na Potiskum
Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala n'ebe ugwu Naịjirịa, Mai Potiskum bụkwa onye ndú Alakụba kachasị n'etiti ndị ya
Banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme ha na nso nso a, n'oge Fulani Jihad kpọmkwem na 1808, otu ìgwè N'gizim n'okpuru nduzi nke Bauya hapụrụ Mugni n'ihi mwakpo ndị Fulani Jihadi wakporo Birni N'gazargamu
Ha gara n'ebe ndịda gaa n'ógbè Kaisala
Mgbe ha rutere, Bauya na ndị otu ya nyeere ndị bi na Kaisala aka igbochi mwakpo N'gazar (alaka nke Ngizim) nke Daura (Dawura) wakporo ha
Mgbe mmeghachi omume na Daura na mmeri ya, Bauya guzobere ngalaba nke ya ma kpọọ ya 'Pataskum' nke ndị Europe mebiri ka ọ bụrụ 'Potiskum'
Okwu 'Pataskum' bụ okwu Ngizim nke pụtara ọhịa nke osisi 'Skum'
'Pata' nke pụtara ọhịa n'asụsụ Ngizim na 'Skum' bụ ụdị osisi a na-ahụkarị n'ógbè ahụ n'oge a tọrọ ntọala obodo Potiskum

Ngoli Onyeka Okafor (amuru na Disemba 30, 1974 na Framingham, Massachusetts, United States ) bu onye omee amuru n'Amerika, onye kwusiri nkiri iti okpo na ihe nlere anya nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ nwoke ojii kacha ebudata ịntanetị
ugbua Okafor bizi na Norway
A mụrụ Okafor na Framingham, Massachusetts dị ka nwa nke abụọ na ezinụlọ ndị na-enweghi ihe nke otu ahu mgbe nna ya na-emecha mmemme PhD na Mahadum Harvard
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Naijiria obere oge tupu Okafor emee emume ụbọchị ọmụmụ nke abụọ
Ọ laghachiri na steeti n'oge okpomọkụ nke 1994
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ beziki na n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'Enugu, Nigeria, ọ gakwara na Mahadum Connecticut na 1994 ebe ọ gụrụ sayensị Kọmputa tupu o nweta ọrụ na Ngalaba Ụgbọ njem Connecticut

Mgbe a churu ya n'oru dị ka ọkachamara IT na Ngalaba Ụgbọ njem na Connecticut, Ngo weere ihe nleghari anya wee buru nke a ga-egosi ya n'ibe akwukwo ama ama dị ka Fortune, Vogue, W, ESPN Magazine na The Source
Ọrụ ịkụ ọkpọ nke Ngo malitere n'October 2005 mgbe ọ dị afọ 31 mgbe ọ malitere mmasị na egwuregwu ahụ mgbe ọ na-eme mgbatị ahụ dị mfe na mgbatị ịkụ ọkpọ
Ọ sonyere wee merie asọmpi ọla edo abụọ n'ime 2008 na 2009
Ngo malitere ime ihe mgbe o tinyechara aka na mgbasa ozi TV wee gaa n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri , ncha na ihe onyonyo gụnyere Iwu na usoro Special Victims Unit, One Life to Live and Oxford Gardens

Ngola Ritmos bụ òtù egwu ọdịnala nke Angola, nke Liceu Vieira Dias, Domingos Van-Dúnem, Mário da Silva Araújo, Manuel dos Passos na Nino Ndongo mepụtara n'ihe dịka afọ 1947
Ha na-abụ abụ Kimbundu na guitar na obere percussion
N'afọ 1950, ndị otu ahụ gụnyere Liceu, Nino, Amadeu Amorim, José Maria, Euclides Fontes Pereira, José Cordeira, Lourdes Van-Dúnem na Belita Palma
Ihe ndekọ kwa ụbọchị ma ọ bụ mkpu olili ozu nke ụmụ nwanyị Bessangana na sembas ha site na ịgba egwú a ma ama
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ egwú kpuchiri egwu ndị dịka Mbiri Mbiri, Kolonial, Palamé ma ọ bụ Muxima, ihe ndekọ nke Ngola Ritmos dị nnọọ ụkọ
E dekọrọ Muxima na Django Ué na Luanda

Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị otu Ngola Ritmos bụ ndị agha mba, Liceu, onye guzobere òtù nnwere onwe MPLA na Amadeu e jidere n'afọ 1959 ma chụga ha n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Tarrafal na Cape Verde, iji laghachi naanị afọ iri ka e mesịrị
Ka o sina dị, òtù ahụ dịgidere ruo na ngwụcha afọ iri isii, na-edekọ egwu Nzage na Lisbon

Moorman, Dueling Bands and Good Girls Gender, Music, and Nation in Luanda's Musseques, 1961-1974, International Journal of African Historical Studies (2004)

Ngongo ya Chintu, onye a maara dị ka Master of Buli (senchiri nke iri na itoolu), bụ onye na-akpụ ihe osise Luba n'je bụ Democratic Republic of the Congo taa
A maara obere ihe banyere ndụ ya, mana a chịkọtara ọrụ ya na mba ụwa, a na-ekwukwa na-akwanyere ya ùgwù nke ọma n'obodo ya
Ngongo ya Chintu (aha nsọpụrụ nke pụtara 'nnukwu agụ owuru, nna nke ihe a kpụrụ akpụ') rụrụ ọrụ n'Alaeze Luba n'oge ahụ, n'oge ụfọdụ n'etiti 1810 na 1870
Ọ gara n'ihu n'eme ọdịnala ogologo nke nka Hemba
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Hemba na-asọpụrụkarị ndị isi nwoke a ma ama nke ebo ahụ
Ngongo ya Chintu pịrị ndị nna nna na ndị inyom dịka ndị na-ebu ihe na caryatids, nke jere ozi dị ka oche maka ndị isi
Dị ka Alisa LaGamma si kwuo na Heroic Africans Legendary Leaders, nakwa Iconic Sculptures

Ụdị akara ngosi nke onye na-ese ihe na-egosipụta ikwubiga okwu ókè nke ihu na aka site na mgbatị, nke nyere ya ohere ịkọwapụta ma jiri amamihe mee ihe n'ụzọ amamihe mee ihe nke ụdị dị iche iche nke ihe ọkpụkpụ a ma ama ndị na-eguzo dị ka ihe nkwado caryatid maka oche
