Nhazi gburugburu ebe obibi bụ usoro nke ilebara oke gburugburu ebe obibi anya mgbe ị na-echepụta atụmatụ, mmemme, amụma, ụlọ, ma ọ bụ ngwaahịa
Ọ na-achọ ịmepụta oghere ga-eme ka ọnọdụ okike, mmekọrịta ọha na eze, omenala na anụ ahụ nke mpaghara ụfọdụ dịkwuo mma
Nhazi akọ nke oge gboo nwere ike na-atụle ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi; Otú ọ dị, mmegharị gburugburu ebe obibi malitere na 1940 emewo ka echiche ahụ pụta ìhè karị
Nhazi gburugburu nwekwara ike na-ezo aka na nka na sayensị etinyere n'ọrụ na-ahụ maka ịmepụta gburugburu ebe mmadụ chepụtara
Akụkụ ndị a gụnyere ihe owuwu ụlọ, ọdịdị ala, atụmatụ obodo, ihe owuwu ala, na ime ime
Nhazi gburugburu ebe obibi nwekwara ike ịgbakọta mpaghara interdisciplinary dị ka ichekwa akụkọ ihe mere eme na imepụta ọkụ

N'ihe gbasara nnukwu ohere, imewe gburugburu ebe obibi nwere mmetụta maka imepụta ngwaahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ ala ọhụrụ, igwe ọkụ ikuku, akụrụngwa ike anyanwụ, na ụdị akụrụngwa ndị ọzọ nwere ike ịbụ ihe atụ
Ugbu a, okwu a agbasawanyela itinye aka na ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi na nkwado
Echiche mbụ a na-achọpụta na gburugburu ebe obibi lekwasịrị anya na ikpo ọkụ anyanwụ, nke malitere na Gris oge ochie gburugburu 500 TOA
N'oge ahụ, ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime Gris agwụla osisi ndị a na-enye mmanụ, na-eduga ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ n'ịkpụpụta ụlọ ndị ga-ejide ike anyanwụ
Ndị Gris ghọtara na ọnọdụ anyanwụ na-adịgasị iche n'afọ niile
Maka latitude nke ogo 40 n'oge okpomọkụ anyanwụ dị elu n'ebe ndịda, n'ogo nke 70 degrees na zenith, ebe n'oge oyi, anyanwụ na-eme njem dị ala, na zenith nke 26 degrees
Ejiri facade chere ihu n'ebe ndịda wuo ụlọ ndị Gris nke na-enweta ntakịrị anwụ na-adịghị n'oge okpomọkụ mana ọ ga-enweta anyanwụ zuru oke n'oge oyi, na-ekpo ọkụ n'ụlọ ahụ
N'ịgbakwụnye, nghazi nke ndịda chebekwara ụlọ ahụ pụọ n'ikuku ugwu dị jụụ
Nhazi nke ụlọ a dị akọ metụtara otú e si eji ụkpụrụ okporo ụzọ eme ihe nke obodo ochie
N'ebe mgbago ugwu-ndịda nke ụlọ ndị ahụ, okporo ámá ndị dị n'obodo ndị Gris na-agakarị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ ruo ọdịda anyanwụ
Ndị Rom nọgidere na-eme ihe owuwu nke anyanwụ, bụ́ ndị kpachakwara ihe ka ukwuu n'ime ala Peninsula ala ha nke Ịtali na narị afọ mbụ TOA
Helocaminus nke Rome, n'ụzọ nkịtị 'ọkụ anyanwụ', na-arụ otu akụkụ nke ụlọ ndị Gris mbụ
Ọtụtụ ebe ịsa ahụ ọha na eze chere ihu na ndịda
Ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ ndị Rom gbakwụnyere enyo na windo iji mee ka ìhè na-agafe na iji chekwaa okpomọkụ dị n'ime ebe ọ na-apụghị ịgbanahụ
Ndị Rom na-ejikwa ụlọ griin na-akụ ihe ọkụkụ n'afọ nile na ịkọ ihe ọkụkụ ndị dị egwu na-abịa site n'akụkụ dị anya nke Alaeze Ukwu ahụ
Pliny the Elder dere banyere griin haus nke na-enye kichin nke Emperor Taịbiriọs n'ime afọ
Tinyere ntugharị anyanwụ nke ụlọ na iji iko mee ihe dị ka onye na-anakọta okpomọkụ nke anyanwụ, ndị oge ochie maara ụzọ ndị ọzọ e si eji ike anyanwụ eme ihe
Ndị Gris, ndị Rom na ndị China mepụtara enyo gbagọrọ agbagọ nke nwere ike itinye ụzarị anyanwụ n'ihe nwere ike zuru oke iji mee ka ọ na-ere ọkụ n'ime sekọnd
A na-ejikarị ọlaọcha, ọla kọpa ma ọ bụ ọla na-egbuke egbuke eme ihe ngosi nke anyanwụ

Mgbọrọgwụ mmalite nke imewe gburugburu ebe obibi ọgbara ọhụrụ malitere na njedebe narị afọ nke 19 site n'aka onye edemede / onye nrụpụta William Morris, onye jụrụ iji ngwa na usoro mepere emepe na akwụkwọ ahụaja, akwa na akwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ ya mepụtara
Ya na ndị ọzọ, dị ka John Ruskin chere na mgbanwe nke mmepụta ihe ga-eduga ná mmerụ e mere ndị okike na ndị ọrụ

N'oge a, arụmọrụ ike, teknụzụ kwesịrị ekwesị, ahịhịa ahịhịa na ọrụ ugbo, mweghachi ala, New Urbanism, na gburugburu ebe obibi na-adịgide adịgide ike na usoro mkpofu bụ echiche ma ọ bụ nhọrọ ma onye ọ bụla nwere ike chọta ngwa

Site na ijikọ ike mmeghari ume ọhụrụ dị ka fotovoltaic anyanwụ, okpomọkụ nke anyanwụ, na ọbụna ike geothermal n'ime ihe owuwu, ọ ga-ekwe omume ịmepụta ụlọ efu efu, ebe oriri ike na-emepụta onwe ya na-adịghị emetọ ya
Ọ ga-ekwe omume iwu ụlọ 'ike-gbakwunyere' nke na-emepụta ike karịa ka ha na-eri, na ngafe nwere ike ere ya na grid
Na United States, LEED Green Building Rating System na-akwụ ụgwọ ihe owuwu na nkwado gburugburu ebe obibi ha
Nhazi na atụmatụ gburugburu ebe obibi bụ moniker nke ọtụtụ PhD na-eji
mmemme na-ewere usoro mmụta dị iche iche na gburugburu ebe e wuru

Usoro nhazi gburugburu ebe obibi na mmemme atụmatụ na-eleba anya akụkọ ihe mere eme ma ọ bụ imewe (ime ma ọ bụ mputa), atụmatụ obodo ma ọ bụ mpaghara, akụkọ ihe mere eme odida obodo ma ọ bụ imewe, atụmatụ gburugburu ebe obibi, sayensị ihe owuwu, ọdịdị ala omenala, ma ọ bụ ichekwa akụkọ ihe mere eme
A na-ejikarị usoro sayensị ọha na eze arụ ọrụ; akụkụ nke sociology ma ọ bụ akparamaagwa nwere ike ịbụ akụkụ nke mmemme nyocha
Echiche nke 'gburugburu' na mmemme ndị a sara mbara nke ukwuu ma nwee ike ịgbakọta akụkụ nke gburugburu ebe obibi, arụrụ arụ, ọrụ, ma ọ bụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Mahadum ndị na-esonụ na'enye PhD
na imewe gburugburu ebe obibi na atụmatụ
Virginia Tech ruo n'oge na-adịbeghị anya nyere mmemme nzere, mana ejirila mmemme dochie ya na 'nyocha ihe owuwu na imewe' na 'atụmatụ, ọchịchị, na ijikọ ụwa ọnụ'
Fanshawe College na London, Ontario Canada na-enye akara ugo mmụta nzere bachelọ a na-akpọ 'Enyocha gburugburu na atụmatụ

Ọmụmaatụ nke usoro nhazi gburugburu ebe obibi gụnyere iji ụdị kọmpụta mkpọtụ mkpọtụ okporo ụzọ n'ichepụta ihe mgbochi mkpọtụ na iji ụdị mgbasa ikuku okporo ụzọ na nyocha na imepụta okporo ụzọ mepere emepe
Ndị na-emepụta ihe na-akpachara anya na-arụ ọrụ n'ime usoro nkà ihe ọmụma na omume ọhụrụ a na-achọ ngwakọta nke okike na teknụzụ, gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi dịka ntọala maka imewe
Ụfọdụ kwenyere na a pụrụ itinye usoro nke nchekwa, nlekọta, na mmụgharị n'ọkwa niile site na ụlọ onye ọ bụla ruo n'obodo, na-erite uru nye mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi na mbara ala
Ihe atụ ndị a kapịrị ọnụ nke nnukwu ọrụ imepụta gburugburu ebe obibi gụnyere
Nhazi webụsaịtị
Ihe okike na imewe nke weebụsaịtị ma ọ bụ imewe weebụ bụ nhazi nke ntanetị weebụ nhazi mmekọrịta, nhazi nke ibe, nhazi osisi na igodo na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ
Nhazi nke imewe weebụ na-eburu n'uche ihe mgbochi dị iche iche nke nkwado Ịntanetị, karịsịa n'ihe gbasara ergonomics, ojiji na nnweta
N'ihi ya, imewe webụ chọrọ nkà na mmemme, ergonomics na interactivity, yana ezigbo ihe ọmụma banyere ihe mgbochi teknụzụ metụtara mpaghara a
Mgbochi teknụzụ ndị a gụnyere ụdị dị iche iche nke ọnụ ụzọ webụ na ngosipụta ha, nnweta, nkọwapụta nke asụsụ na usoro dị iche iche, mbugharị, nnabata na ndụmọdụ W3C, wdg
Nhazi weebụ nke saịtị mbụ na-abịa n'ụdị ụdị arụ ọrụ nwere nkọwa nka ergonomics, charter graphic, njirimara anya, ịzụ ahịa, mmekọrịta

Enwere ike mebe webụsaịtị site na ibe static dị mfe n'ụdị HTML enwere ike hazie ma ọ bụ mee ka CSS baa ụba gụnyere onyonyo na njikọ ọdịnaya ndị ọzọ, ma ọ bụ nwere ọdịnaya siri ike ma ọ bụ atụmatụ nwere ike ịgbakwunye iji mee ka ọ na-emekọrịta ihe na ọrụ ndị etinyere na Java, PHP
ma ọ bụ asụsụ sava ọzọ, ụdị chọrọ nhazi na Javascript, ma ọ bụ Ajax
Ọ nwere ike dabere na teknụzụ nchekwa data, dịka ọmụmaatụ MySQL ma ọ bụ MongoDB

Ọ bụ n'ime nzukọ a ka ndị otu ndị na-eme nchọpụta chepụtara Weebụ na 19892 nke ọma n'okpuru mkpali nke Tim Berners-Lee na onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ bụ Robert Cailliau, yana ndị nchọpụta ndị ọzọ3 bụ ndị n'ụzọ nke aka ha jikọrọ aka na ọrụ ahụ na mbụ akpọrọ Worldwa
Weebụ sara mbara

Na mbụ, a tụụrụ ime wee mepụta ọrụ World Wide Web 'site na ijikọta teknụzụ atọ bụ isi ihe dị na Weebụ, ya bụ, adreesị weebụ site na URL nke na-egosi ebe ihe onwunwe dị na 'internet, HTTP transfer protocol

na-egosi usoro nke ịnweta, na Hypertext Markup asụsụ HTML nke na-eme ka o kwe omume ịhazi akụrụngwa' ka ndị mmadụ na-arụ ọrụ na mahadum na ụlọ ọrụ gburugburu ụwa nwee ike ịgbanwe akwụkwọ n'efu ma kesaa ozi bara uru maka ọrụ ha, si otú a na-akpa ákwà mbụ (na)
Igbo Weebụ) na Net

Ihe mmalite nke ịntanetị akwụsịghị na ntọala njikọta nke teknụzụ nzikọrịta weebụ, na 1990 ha mepụtakwara sava HTTP mbụ na gburugburu NeXTSTEP, onye ahịa webụ wee mepụta na Objective-C, ihe nchọgharị jikọtara ya na onye mbipụta a na-akpọ WorldWideWeb4 mana
ngwa ngwa degharịa Nexus ka ịzena mgbagwoju anya ọ bụla na aha World Wide Web nke e dere na oghere
Ha si otú a na-achịkọta ihe ndị dị mkpa mejupụtara webụsaịtị mbụ nke ọha na-enweta site n'iji ụkpụrụ nke nnweta nke ihe nkesa/ụdị ndị ahịa nwere ike ịkwalite ikere òkè n'ozuzu ya na oghere okike
Emebere webụsaịtị mbụ maka ọrụ World Wide Web5 n'onwe ya na CERN wee kwado ya na kọmputa Tim Berners Lee NeXT6
Echiche bụ isi nke ọrụ Weebụ World Wide bụ ijikọ teknụzụ nke kọmputa nkeonwe, netwọkụ kọmputa na hypertext iji mepụta
usoro ozi zuru ụwa ọnụ, dị ike ma dị mfe iji
A pụkwara ịkpọ imewe webụsaịtị 'création de site internet'
Weebụsaịtị ahụ wepụrụ nzọụkwụ mbụ ya na CERN na 1991, ọ gụnyere ozi metụtara ihe nchọgharị WWW wee kọwapụta njirimara ndị dị na webụ

Saịtị ahụ nwere nkọwa maka otu esi enweta akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ, otu esi ahazi nkesa nkeonwe, nkuzi gbasara hypertext na echiche nke njikọ hypertext, nkọwa teknụzụ maka imepụta ibe weebụ nkeonwe yana nkọwa maka otu esi achọ ozi na Weebụ, ( hụ ebe nrụọrụ weebụ mbụ)… na-eme Tim Barners-Lee onye nrụpụta Weebụ mbụ na ịntanetị
Nhlangini (Hlangwane) bụ asụsụ Bantu nke South Africa Ọ dị n'akụkụ oke n'etiti Xhosa na Zulu, mana ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Swazi
Ni'Ja Whitson bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkírí, ónyé édémédé na onye guzobere / ónyé nduzi nka nke The NWA Project
Whitson bụ nwoke na nwanyị na-ekwekọghị na nwoke ma jiri nnọchiaha ha / ha

Ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí na onye édémédé, ónyé na-eme egwuregwu na ónyé edemedo, Bessie-Award-winning gender nonconforming interdisciplinary artist, Ni Tianja Whitson ka The New York Times kpọrọ ya 'majestuc' na 'magnetic', Brooklyn Magazine makwaara ya dị ka otu n'ime 100 omenala na-emetụta
Ihe nrite ndị na-adịbeghị anya gụnyere Hedgebrook Residency, LMCC Process Space Residency، Bogliasco Fellowship, Brooklyn Arts Exchange Artist Residency
Nia Imara bụ ónyé America na-ahụ màkà ihe ndị dị na mbárá igwe, onye na-ese ihe, na ónyé na-eme ihe ike
Ọrụ sayensị nke Imara na-ekwu màkà ụyọkọ kpakpando, mmepụta kpakpando na nchọpụta mbara ala
Imara bụ nwanyị Africa America mbụ nwetara PhD na astrophysics na Mahadum California, Berkeley ma bụrụkwa ónyé mbụ postdoctoral fellow na mmemme Future Faculty Leaders na Mahadim Harvard
N'afọ 2020, Imara sonyeere Mahadum California, Santa Cruz dị ka onye enyemaka Prọfesọ na Ngalaba Astronomy
A mụrụ Imara na East Oakland, Oakland, California ma too na San Francisco Bay Area
Ọ natara nzèrè bachelọ ya na Kenyon College n'afọ 2003, na-agụ akwụkwọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ na physics
Mgbè ọ nọ na Kenyon College, ọ na-asọ mpi na otu igwu mmiri nke kọleji
Ọ kwagara Mahadum California, Berkeley màkà ọmụmụ postgraduate ya, na 2010 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Africa America mbụ nwetara PhD na astrophysics na Mahadum Californie, Berkeley
Akwụkwọ édémédé ya bụ na The Formation and Evolution of Giant Molecular Clouds ma Leo Blitz lekọtara ya
Site na 2014 ruo 2017, Imara bụ ónyé mbụ postdoctoral fellow na mmemme Future Faculty Leaders na Mahadum Harvard
Nnyocha postdoctoral ya lekwasịrị ányà na nnukwu igwe ojii, ébé ọmụmụ kpakpando, na njirimara na mmetụta cosmological nke ụyọkọ kpakpando na ntụ intergalactic
O jiri telivishọn redio kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa, Robert C
Byrd Green Bank Telescope, mee nchọpụta ya
Imara bụ ónyé na-akwado ikpe ziri ezi na STEM
O guzobere Equity and Inclusion Journal Club na Mahadum Harvard na 2018 nke ya na Dr
Anna Pancoast haziri na mbụ
Ọ gàrà South Africa na Ghana iji kụzie ma kwado na mmemme ndị e mèrè iji mụbaa ọdịiche dị iche iche na mbara igwe na mpaghara STEM ndị ọzọ
Niaprazine (INN) (aha aha Nopron) bụ ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ kwụsị ịlụ ọgụ nke otu phenylpiperazine
A na-eji ya agwọ nsogbu ụra kemgbe mmalite afọ 1970 na ọtụtụ mba Europe nke ụwa gụnyere France, Italy, na Luxembourg
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe na ụmụaka hụrụ ndị ọzọ ụra na ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma n'ihi nchekwa ya dị mma na njirimara nnagide na enweghị ike mmetọ

Na mbụ, e kwenyere na ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka antihistamine na anticholinergic, e mechara chọpụta na niaprazine nwere njikọ dị ala ma ọ bụ enweghị njikọ maka ndị na-anabata H 1 μM), ma chọpụta na ọ na ọ na'arụ ọrụ dị ike ma họrọ 5-HT2A na α1-adrenergic receptor antagonist (Ki = 75 nM na 86 nM, n'otu n'otu)

Ọ nwere obere ma ọ bụ enweghị njikọ nke ụwa na ụdị nke dị ka ndị na eme ka anyị maka 5-HT1A, 5-HT2B, D2, na β-adrenergic, yana na SERT na VMAT (Ki = niile > 1 μM), mana ọ nwere ụfọdụ njikọ maka onye na-anabata α2-adrenergics (Ki = 730 nM)
E gosipụtara na Niaprazine na-agbanwe na para-fluorophenylpiperazine (pFPP) n'ụzọ yiri nke trazodone na nefazodone na-agbari na meta-chlorophenylpierazine (mCPP)
Ọ bụghị ihe doro anya ọrụ, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị, pFPP na-arụ na mmetụta ahụike nke niaprazine
Otú ọ dị, site na ọmụmụ nke ụwa na ụdị ke amụta na anụmanụ a maara na pFPP, n'adịghị ka niaprazine, anaghị emepụta mmetụta sedative, kama ọ na-egosipụta njirimara omume na-egosi ọrụ serotonergic
Niaz Ahmed, nke a makwaara dị ka Abeed Niaz bụ onye edemede Bangladesh, ọkà okwu ihu ọha, onye na-azụ ahịa na onye na-ede akwụkwọ ọgụgụ mmeri
Ọ bụ onye malitere ụlọ ọrụ jụọ ajụjụ
Nice Githinji bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na-elekọta karaoke, onye na-eti egwu na onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka ịrụ ọrụ dị iche iche na ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn, gụnyere Rafiki

Githinji bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe a họpụtara ya maka Kalasha Awards nke afọ 2009 dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe nkiri ahụ, All Girls Together N'afọ 2011, o ritere ihe nrite a na-achọsi ike maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn, Changing Times
Nice bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Nicebird Production Company nke na-ahụ maka mmepụta ihe nkiri ma sonye na ihe nkiri
Dịka nkwupụta oge ya si dị, arụmọrụ a bụ isi ya

Nice arụkọla ọrụ ya na ndị ochie na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Et Cetera Productions (2007 - 2008 ebe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri abụọ; nke a ma ama, Benta na All Girls Together, Sisimka Productions, Phoenix Players - na Planet's Theater
A mụrụ Nice n'afọ 1985 na Mombasa
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Senior Chief Koinange High School site n'afọ 1999 ruo 2002
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Nice Githinji malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Phoenix Players Richard Stockwell's Bad Blood, ọrụ nke mere ka ọrụ ya buru ibu
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Television na ihe nkiri

N'agbata afọ 2007 na 2010, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri bụ; Benta, All Girls Together, Formula X na Pieces of Peace O sonyekwara na usoro telivishọn; Guy Centre na Changing Times ebe ọ gbara Candy na Rosa n'otu n'otu
Nicholas Hlobo bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke bi na Johannesburg, South Africa
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1975 na Cape Town
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke teknụzụ na Technikon Witwatersrand n'afọ 2002
Ọ na-emepụta nnukwu ọrụ ọkpụkpụ nke bụ ọtụtụ ihe dị ukwuu nke na-enwe mmetụta dị egwu, nke na-adọrọ adọrọ ma na-ahazi nke ọma
A na -emepụta ọdịiche nke nwanyị na nwoke site n'iji ihe ndị dị iche iche dị ka roba n'ime tube, ribbon, organza, lace na ihe ndị a chọtara
Hlobo bụ onye mmeri nke 2006 Tollman Award for Visual Art, 2009 Standard Bank Young Artist Award, ọ bụ onye ikpeazụ maka Future Generation Art Prize 2010

N'afọ 2010, onye ndụmọdụ Sir Anish Kapoor họpụtara Hlobo dị ka onye na-echebe ya dịka akụkụ nke Rolex Mentor na Protégé Arts Initiative, mmemme enyemaka mba ụwa nke na-ejikọta ndị nna ukwu na ọzụzụ ha na talent na-apụta maka otu afọ nke mgbanwe okike otu onye
E gosipụtara ọrụ Hlobo na Tate Modern na London, South African National Gallery, na Institute of Contemporary Art, Boston, n'etiti ọtụtụ ebe ndị ọzọ
E tinyekwara ọrụ ya na Havana Biennial nke afọ 2009 na Guangzhou Triennial nke afọ 2008
Hlobo bụ onye oji mbụ na-ese ihe nkiri nke Aardklop arts festival na Potchefstroom n'afọ 2008
Nnukwu ihe ngosi nyocha nke ọrụ Hlobo dị na National Museum of Art, Architecture and Design na Oslo, Norway, site na 4 Machị ruo 29 Mee 2011
Hlobo na David Goldblatt bụ naanị ndị na-ese ihe abụọ South Africa nke onye nlekọta Bice Curiger kpọrọ ka ha gosipụta ọrụ na ogige mba ụwa IllUMinations nke 2011 Venice Biennale
A gụnyere ya na La Triennale 2012 na Paris na The Rainbow Nation, ihe ngosi nke ọgbọ atọ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ si South Africa, na Hague
A họpụtakwara ya maka Biennale nke iri na asatọ nke Sydney

N'afọ 2013 na 2014 ọrụ ya ga-apụta na ihe ngosi na Miami (Intethe), Aalborg (Out of Fashion Textiles in International Contemporary Art), San Francisco (Public Intimacy Art and other extraordinary Acts in South Africa) na The Divine Comedy
Heaven, Purgatory and Hell Revisited by Contemporary African Artists -Museum für Moderne Kunst (MMK), Frankfurt/Main
Nicholas 'Nick' Loftin, ónyé a makwaara dị ka Nick Fury, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta egwu
Loftin kwagara Atlanta, Georgia wee guzobe New Jeru Entertainment na Jenụwarị 1996 iji mepụta mkpụrụ obi, hip hop na egwu R&B
O mepụtara maka ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na-egosi ọtụtụ platinum

O so dee, hazie ma mepụta egwu mbụ ya 'Custom Made (Give It To You) ' n'afọ 2000 màkà ónyé na-eti egwu Lil 'Kim wee soro dee, ha hazie ma na-emepụta màkà ihe nkírí The Fast & The Furious ebe ya na Murder, Inc
rụkọtara ọrụ
N'otu afọ ahụ, o so mepụta ihe nkiri ọzọ, Osmosis Jones
Loftin esorowo Mary J
Blige, TI, Anthony Hamilton, Nas, Lil 'Flip, Wu-Tang Clan, Lil 'Kim, Fat Joe, Trina na Nick Cannon, n'etiti ndị ọzọ rụọ ọrụ
N'afọ 2014, o mepụtara ngwá ọrụ maka W3P Willy Wise Workout 3 Degrees of Power màkà onye bụbu onye mmeri ụwa, Willy Wise
Nicholas Mukomberanwa (1940 - 12 Nọvemba 2002) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe na onye nkuzi nka
O so na ndị a ma ama ndị azuputara na ụlọ akwụkwọ Workshop na National Gallery of Zimbabwe nakwa onye ndụmọdụ nka na onye nkuzi nke ezinụlọ Mukomberanwa nke ndị na-akpụ ihe
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya na ụlọ ngosi gburugburu ụwa ma ọ ka bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama na Zimbabwe
A mụrụ Mukomberanwa na Buhera District nke Manicaland Province na 1940
Aha a bara ya bụ Obert Matafi, nwa mbụ nke nwunye nna ya Marakia nke abụọ bụ Chihute, onye nwụrụ mgbe Obert dị afọ abụọ
Site n'oge ahụ gaa n'ihu, nwunye mbụ nke Marakia bụ Maiguru zụlitere ya
N'afọ 1958 na St Benedicts Mission, e mere Obert baptizim wee kpọọ ya Nicholas ma were aha nna Mukomberanwa iji kwanyere nna nna ya ùgwù
Nicholas gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Zvishavani mgbe nna ya na-arụ ọrụ na King Asbestos Mines dị nso
A naghị akụzi nka n'ụlọ akwụkwọ mana mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Nicholas jị ụrọ wee mepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ mbụ ya

Ka ọ na-erule afọ iri na asaa, a nabatara ya na St Benedicts Mission, Chiendambuya, ebe a ghọtara ya dị ka onye nwere nkà na eserese na eserese, ya mere a gbara ya ume ịkwaga Serima Mission, Masvingo Province
N'ebe ahụ, Nna Groeber gbara ya ume ịkpụ ihe na ọrụ ịkpụ osisi
Nicholas zutere ngwakọta nke ọdịnala Ndị Kraịst na agbụrụ Afrịka
Mukomberanwa nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu nke sitere na eserese, ụkpụrụ, na ihe ọmụmụ ịkpụ ihe ọ mụtara n'aka Groeber na onye nkuzi nka nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ Cornelius Manguma
Mukomberanwa mepụtara ọrụ nka mbụ ya mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, na-emepụta ihe osise isii maka ụka Serima
Ndị a gụnyere ndị mmụọ ozi simenti anọ nọ n'ụlọ elu ahụ, yana ndị mmụọ ozi osisi abụọ maka ụlọ ụka ahụ

Otú ọ dị, mgbe afọ na-arụpụta ihe na Serima, a chụpụrụ Mukomberanwa o wee kwaga Salisbury (nke bụ Harare ugbu a), o wee were ọrụ dị ka onye uwe ojii n'ụlọọrụ ndị uwe ojii British South Africa, ebe ọ nọrọ afọ iri na ise (1962–76)
Ọ bụ ezie na afọ ya na Serima dị mkpụmkpụ, ahụmahụ ya n'ebe ahụ mepụtara ụdị ya
Ọrụ ya na-abụkarị ụkpụrụ ụlọ, nke a pịrị naanị n'otu akụkụ
Tụkwasị na nke ahụ, na oge geometric ya, ọ dabere n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na ụkpụrụ a mụtara na Serima
Nicholas ka na-ese ihe maka ntụrụndụ, na 1962 ọ zutere Frank McEwen, onye nduzi nke National Gallery of Rhodesia (nke bụ National Gallery of Zimbabwe taa), onye gbara ya ume ka ọ malite ịkpụ nkume
McEwen nyere ihe na ọzụzụ n'ụlọ ọrụ dị n'okpuru ụlọ Gallery, n'oge na-adịghị anya, Mukomberanwa na-akpụ ihe n'oge ezumike ya, na-emepụta nkume mbụ ya The Thief

N'ihi McEwen, e nyere 'ọgbọ mbụ' nke ndị na-ese ihe ọhụrụ Shona na mba ụwa n'agbanyeghị mmachibido iwu a na-enye Southern Rhodesia n'oge 1965-1980 na ọrụ Nicholas sonyeere nke ahụ site n'aka ndị isi ndị ọzọ sitere na Workshop School dị ka Sylvester Mubayi, Joram Mariga na Joseph Ndandarika
Ọrụ mbụ nke ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-ese ihe n'ọgbọ mbụ, gụnyere atọ nke Nicholas, dị ugbu a na onyinye McEwen nye British Museum
Ihe ngosi mba ụwa, nke gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ Nicholas, ruo mgbe Frank McEwen gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye nduzi ihe ngosi nka na 1973, bụ ndị edepụtara n'okpuru ebe a
N'oge mmalite nke uto ya, a kọwara 'Shona sculpture movement' dị ka mmegharị nka, ihe omume nka na ọrụ ebube

Ndị nkatọ na ndị nchịkọta enweghị ike ịghọta otú ụdị nka si zụlite n'ike dị otú ahụ, n'onwe ya na mmalite na mpaghara Afrịka nke na-enweghị nnukwu ihe nketa ọkpụkpụ nke West Afrịka ma kọwaa ya na mbụ dịka nka ọhụụ dị ka nka na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla
Mukomberanwa lụrụ nwunye mbụ ya, Grace, n'afọ 1965, ha mụrụ ụmụ asatọ
N'ikpeazụ, n'ije dị ize ndụ, o kpebiri ịkwụsị ọrụ ya na ndị uwe ojii ka ọ bụrụ onye na-akpụ ihe oge niile
The gambit kwụrụ ụgwọ, na site na ngwụsị afọ 1970 n'afọ 1980s a na-egosi ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ka nkà ya dị mma n'ime afọ iri sochirinụ, na-emepe otu n'ime ụdị onwe onye kachasị dị iche iche dị na ọgbọ ya nke ndị na-akpụ nkume na Zimbabwe
Na 1968, Ulli Beier dere
'Ihe ọkpụkpụ Mukomberanwa jupụtara n'echiche na ihe ndị mepụtara, o nwere ọtụtụ àgwà na okwu dị iche iche ma ọ na-enwe mmasị igosipụta ụyọkọ ọnụ ọgụgụ jikọtara ọnụ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ nkume dị iche iche, na-eji textures na agba
Ọnọdụ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na-atụgharị uche mgbe niile, mgbe ụfọdụ okpukpe, ha dịkwa oke mma

N'afọ 1969, nwunye Frank McEwen bụ Mary (née McFadden) guzobere Vukutu, ugbo a kpụrụ akpụ dị nso na Nyanga, na 1970 McEwen mere nhazi ka Nicholas nwee ezumike site n'aka ndị uwe ojii ma nọrọ ọnwa isii n'ebe ahụ na-arụ ọrụ na nnukwu iberibe Penhalonga serpentine ojii nke ga-abụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi Musée Rodin
N'afọ 1976, Nicholas gbara arụkwaghịm n'ụlọọrụ ndị uwe ojii ka ọ bụrụ ọkachamara na-akpụ ihe ma ka ọ na-erule afọ 1977, o nwere ihe ngosi nke ọrụ na Goodman Gallery na Johannesburg

N'afọ 1978, o mere nhazi ịzụta ugbo dị nso na Ruwa n'aka Roy Guthrie, onye guzobere Chapungu Sculpture Park, ọ bụkwa n'ebe ahụ ka ya na ndị nwunye ya biri (ọ lụrụ nwunye ya nke abụọ Betty na 1976) na ezinụlọ ya
N'iji ego ọ nwetara site na ọrụ ya, Mukomberanwa tinyere ego na ugbo ma ọtụtụ ndị weere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọrụ ugbo kachasị ike na Zimbabwe
Ka ọrụ ugbo ya na-agbasawanye, ọ na-adaberewanye na ndị ezinụlọ ya iji rụchaa ọrụ ịkpụ ihe, dị ka ịcha
E gosipụtara otu n'ime ọrụ Nicholas, nke a na-akpọ The Chief, na stampụ Zimbabwe nke e nyere iji cheta ụbọchị Commonwealth na 14 Machị 1983
Ọ mepụtara uru $ 1 na set nke Henry Munyaradzi, Joseph Ndandarika na John Takawira rụchara

Na 1986 Prime Minister, Robert Mugabe, nyere Nicholas onyinye pụrụ iche maka onyinye ya na nka ọhụụ na Zimbabwe, ebe na 1989 Nicholas bụ onye mmeri n'ozuzu ya na ihe ngosi Nedlaw / Baringa kwa afọ na National Gallery of Zimbabwe maka ihe ya 'Street Beggar' ma họrọ ya na Tapfuma Gutsa na Henry Munyaradzi ịnọchite anya Zimbabwe na ngosi New York 'Contemporary African Artists - Changing Tradition'

Na June–July 1993, ụmụ ya nwoke anọ Anderson (amụrụ n'afọ 1968), Malachia (amụrụ n'afọ 1970), Tendai (amụrụ n'afọ 1974) na Lawrence (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) sonyeere Nicholas n'igosi ihe ngosi nke ihe ọkpụkpụ ha na Chapungu Sculpture Park, Harare
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị nke puku afọ ahụ, aha Mukomberanwa ka mma site n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke e gosipụtara ọrụ ya
E depụtara ụfọdụ n'ime ndị a n'okpuru ebe a
Ka oge na-aga n'ọrụ ya, ọ belatara mmepụta nka ya iji nwee mmasị n'ọrụ ugbo na ịzụ ehi n'ugbo Ruwa
Ọ rụpụtara obere ihe, na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ onwe onye ma na-ebelata ọsọ nke ndụ ya nke ukwuu

Ihe ọkpụkpụ Mukomberanwa gosipụtara ụdị mmadụ na ọkwa dị iche iche nke abstraction ma mgbe ụfọdụ na-egosi ụmụ anụmanụ, nnụnụ ma ọ bụ mmetụta ime mmụọ; ọtụtụ n'ime ha dị oke mma, ọ bụ ezie na n'ọnọdụ ole na ole ọ ga-eme ka akụkụ dị mma dị iche na ebe ndị dị oke njọ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na nkume siri ike, na-eji ihe ndị dị na mpaghara dị ka nkume opal, nkume cobalt na agwọ ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị ụdị obodo a na-akpọ springstone nke a hụrụ na Tengenenge
Celia Winter-Irving kwuru okwu a banyere Nicholas
'N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-akpụ ihe, Mukomberanwa na-ekwu okwu site na ahụmịhe onwe ya kama ịkọ ihe ọ nụrụ ma ọ bụ a gwara ya
A ghaghị ijide nkwenkwe ya n'onwe ya kama idebe ya n'ụzọ omenala
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ọrụ ya egosila echiche nke nkwado ime mmụọ na-arịwanye elu nke kwadoro nka ya

Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi nke Mukomberanwa, dị ka The Greedy One (1985) na The Corrupting Power of Money (1985), agagharịala n'ụwa niile; dịka ọmụmaatụ na Yorkshire Sculpture Park na 1990, ebe ọrụ ndị a na-egosipụta gụnyere ihe atụ sitere n'aka ndị niile na-ese ihe nyere aka na ngosi Musée Rodin nke 1971
Ndepụta 'Chapungu Culture and Legend - A Culture in Stone' maka ihe ngosi na Kew Gardens na 2000 na-egosi ihe ọkpụkpụ Nicholas My Experience (Springstone, 1992) na p
58-59, Man in a Trance (Springstone, 1987) na p
92-93, Women of Wisdom (Opal stone, 1987) na p
102-103 na The Corrupting Power of Money (Limestone, 1985) na p
Ọrụ Mukomberanwa dị na nchịkọta nke Museum of Modern Art, New York; Field Museum of Natural History, Chicago, Indianapolis Museum of Art na British Museum yana National Gallery of Zimbabwe
Ihe ngosi ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ọdụ ụgbọ elu Atlanta nke Zimbabwe, 'Omenala na Nkume' na Atlanta Georgia
N'afọ 2000, Mukomberanwa gbara Jonathan Zilberg ajụjụ ọnụ na ihe nkiri ebe o nyere akụkọ banyere ọrụ ya, gụnyere ọzụzụ mbụ ya na ozi Serima
Mukomberanwa nwụrụ na mberede na 12 Nọvemba 2002
Ụmụ ya niile ghọrọ ndị na-akpụ ihe ụmụ ya Anderson, Malachia, Tendai, Lawrence, na Taguma; na ụmụ ya ndị nwanyị Netsai na Ennica
Nwa nwoke ọzọ, nwa ya nke asatọ, ka mmiri riri n'ụzọ dị mwute
Nicholas bụkwa nwanne nna na onye nkuzi nke Nesbert Mukomberanwa na onye ndụmọdụ nke onye African-American sculptor M
Scott Johnson
Ihe kwesịrị ekwesị sitere n'aka ọkpara Anderson nwere ike ịbụ ihe ncheta Nicholas
onye amamihe, onye na-akpụ ihe, nna nye m, nna nye ọtụtụ, ọtụtụ ndị na-akpụ ihe na-arụ ọrụ na nkume na Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ laa, ọ na-anọnyere anyị n'ihi na amamihe ya na-eduzi ihe ọkpụkpụ anyị na-eme, na omume anyị na-eme
Nichole Banna nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Virgin Mary bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara na ihe nkiri dị iche iche
O mepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ, Icheke Oku nke sitere na Igbo

Dị ka ajụjụ ọnụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ punch na sunnews si kwuo, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke sitere na steeti Imo gara Oliver heights International School na Portharcourt maka agụmakwụkwọ praimarị ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ Emmy Norberton International maka agụmakọta sekọndrị
O nwetara nzere BSc na sayensị kọmputa na River State University of science and Technology
O meela ihe nkiri dị iche iche ma mepụta ihe nkiri akporo Icheke Oku
A họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ọrụ na-eduga na onyinye BON, 2016
Jumoke Odetola
Matilda Lambert
Nichole Denby (amụrụ na 10 Ọktoba 1982) bụ onye Amerika-Naijirịa na-eme egwuregwu track and field nke bụ ọkachamara na 100 mita hurdles
Ọ nọchitere anya United States na 2007 World Championships nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara ịga nke ikpeazụ
N'afọ 2014, ọ gbanwere nkwado ya na Naijirịa, na-asọmpi maka mba ọhụrụ ahụ na 2014 Commonwealth Games, yana 2014 African Championships ebe ọ meriri nrite mbụ ya maka Naịjirị
O nwere ihe kachasị mma nke 1254 sekọnd na 100 mita hurdles (Eugene 2008) na 793 na 60 mita hurdle (Boston 2007)
Mgbe ọ na-agba ọsọ maka North High School na Riverside, California, ọ bụ 1999 na 2000 CIF California State Meet Champion na 100 mita ihe mgbochi
Mmeri 1320 ya na 2000 setịpụrụ National High School Record n'oge ahụ
Nicholas Boraine (a mụrụ na 14 Nọvemba 1971) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri
Boraine gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand n'afọ 1994 na nzere Honours na Dramatic Art
N'ọnwaMachị afọ 2011, ọ sonyeere Global Arts Corps dịka Associate Artistic Director
Nna ya, Alex Boraine, bụbu onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye bụbu osote onye isi oche nke South Africa's Truth and Reconciliation Commission (TRC)
Nick Carter (nwụrụ n'afọ 2000) bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na Zambia

Enyere ya ihe nrite gburugburu ebe obibi Goldman na 1997, maka mbọ ya n'ịdekọ ndị omekome na mpụ anụ ọhịa zuru ụwa ọnụ, na ntinye aka ya n'ịhazi ihe omume na-eduga na nkwekọrịta Lusaka n'etiti mba Africa isii na Septemba 1994, na-achọ ịmanye ụkpụrụ dị ka Nkwekọrịta na Azụmahịa mba ụwa n'ụdị dị egwu
Nicholas Scott Lachey / / ləˈʃeɪ / lə-SHAY ; amuru Nọvemba 9, 1973) bụ onye America na-agụ egwú, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, àgwà telivishọn, na onye ọbịa

O tolitere bụrụ onye ama ama dị ka onye ndu onye na-abụ abụ nke multi-platinum-ere boyband 98 Degrees, wee mechaa kpalitere na usoro eziokwu ndị lụrụ ọhụrụ Nick na Jessica na nwunye ya mgbe ahụ, Jessica Simpson
O wepụtala albums solo anọ SoulO, Gịnị hapụrụ m, A Nna Lullaby, na Soundtrack nke ndụ m
O nwekwara ọrụ ugboro ugboro na usoro ihe onyonyo Charmed

Ọ kwadoro NBC 's The Sing-Off, kwadoro VH1 's Big Morning Buzz Live site na 2014 ruo 2015, ma ugbu a na- anabata Nickelodeon 's America's Most Musical Family, na onye na-akwado Netflix na-egosi ịhụnanya bụ onye ìsì na nwunye ya Vanessa
Lachey
Na 2021, Lachey meriri oge nke ise nke
A mụrụ Lachey na Harlan, Kentucky nye Cathalyn (née Fopma) na John Lachey
Ọ bụ nwanne nke onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Drew Lachey, ya na ya rụkọrọ ọrụ
Nna nna ya, Robert James Fopma, sitere na Dutch
Aha nna Nick ndị ọzọ bụ Bekee, Scottish, German na Welsh na French dị anya
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị Clovernook na mpaghara Cincinnati nke North College Hill, Ohio na ụlọ akwụkwọ maka imepụta ihe na ime nka na Cincinnati
Ọ gara Mahadum Miami na Oxford, Ohio, ebe ọ sonyere Sigma Alpha Epsilon
N'oge ọdịda nke 1992, ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Southern California, dị ka nkwupụta o mere n'oge ngosi ọbịa ya na Ụlọ Nzukọ Arsenio na December 12, 2013
Lachey malitere ọrụ ịbụ abụ ọkachamara ya na King Island ya na enyi ya Justin Jeffre n'etiti 1990s na-abụ abụ na otu quartet n'ime ogige ahụ
Lachey bụ onye otu nwoke 98 Degrees yana nwanne ya nwoke, Drew, Justin Jeffre, na Jeff Timmons
Ndekọ mpụta mbụ ha bụ nke akpọrọ onwe ya 98 Degrees ; Otú ọ dị, ezigbo ihe ịga nke ọma nke ìgwè ahụ bịara na album na-esochi ha 98 Degrees and Rising
Ogo 98 erela ndekọ nde iri
98 Degrees mere ihe ngosi nchikota oge okpomọkụ nke otu oge na Hershey, Pennsylvania, na Summer Mixtape Festival na August 18, 2012, egwu mbụ ha n'ime ihe karịrị afọ iri
N'oge okpomọkụ nke 2003, eziokwu na-egosi ndị lụrụ di na nwunye ọhụrụ Nick na Jessica, na Lachey na nwunye Jessica Simpson, malitere ịgbasa na MTV
Di na nwunye ahụ gbara egwu na telivishọn pụrụ iche Nick na Jessica Variety Hour, bụ nke e mere na 2004 ma jiri ya tụnyere The Sonny & Cher Show
N'afọ 2005, ndị lụrụ di na nwunye ọhụrụ meriri ihe nrite Nhọrọ Ndị mmadụ maka ihe ngosi eziokwu kachasị amasị tupu ha kechie obere oge
Na Nọvemba 11, 2003, ewepụtara ya solo mpụta mbụ album, SoulO
N'agbanyeghị na a tọhapụrụ ya n'oge ọganihu nke ndị lụrụ ọhụrụ, album ahụ bụ ọdịda azụmahịa
Lachey rụrụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na usoro Charmed n'etiti 2004 na 2005
E wepụtara What's Left of Me na Mee 9, 2006 wee rụpụta ya na ọnụọgụ abụọ na Billboard 200
Enyere ọba akwụkwọ ahụ akwụkwọ ikike Gold, ka o resịrị ihe karịrị 500,000 n'ime ụlọ
Nke mbụ sitere na album ahụ bụ egwu egwu, ' Gịnị hapụrụ m ', ewepụtara na February 21, 2006

Lachey malitere ịrụ ọrụ na album solo ya nke atọ na 2007
Lachey nwekwara kpakpando na usoro ihe nkiri TV a ma ama, One Tree Hill, dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na Red Bedroom Productions
A mara ọkwa na Jenụarị 2010 na Jive Records edebela ọba ọhụrụ ya n'akwụsịghị akwụsị
Na June 2010, Lachey kwadoro na ya kewara ụzọ na Jive Records
Na-ewere ogbo ahụ, ihe ngosi egwu egwu na-edepụta ndụ ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ maka Creative and Performing Arts, malitere na MTV na March 2009

Lachey na nwunye ya ugbu a na-akwado ihe ngosi Netflix eziokwu ịhụnanya bụ kpuru ìsì

Ha mechara malite mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwaanyị mgbe ha zutere ọzọ na ihe omume Teen People na Jenụwarị 1999, mana ha kewara ọnwa ise malite na Eprel 2001 ruo mgbe ha na-alaghachi azụ na-esochi mwakpo Septemba 11

Nick Monu (amụrụ na 25 Machị 1965) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye nduzi
A mụrụ Nicholas Monu dị ka nwa nke anọ na nwa nwoke nke abụọ nke onye isi Monu nke Asaba, Obiora Monu, onye na-ahụ maka ego na onye isi nke Obiora Monu & Co
na Lagos, na Oriakụ Florence Monu (née Oluwo), onye nkuzi na Corona School na Lagos
Ọ nọrọ afọ mbụ ya na nwata na Naịjirịa, ruo mgbe ya na ezinụlọ ya hapụrụ mba ahụ n'ihi agha Biafra
Ruo obere oge, ezinụlọ ahụ na nwanne nna ya bụ onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na Germany na mgbe nke ahụ biri nakwa Italy
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Andrew's na Eastbourne na Millfield Senior School na Somerset
E wezụga agụmakwụkwọ Europe, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ịbụ abụ, egwuregwu na nka

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị Mahadum America na Washington, DC, na Webber Douglas Academy of Dramatic Art na London site na 1987–1989, a họpụtara ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri ịrị na otu ọzọ na-asụ Bekee ka ha bụrụ onye ndu na Anton Tschechow's theatre play 'Uncle wanja' na Moscow Art Theatre na Russia

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na UK dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'onwe ya, na-apụta na ihe nkiri dị ka 'Wind in the Willows' 1990 ruo 2011 na Royal National Theatre, 'Talking in Tongues' 1991 ruo 1992 na Royal Court Theatre na 'Blues for Mr
Charlie' 1992 ruo 1993 na Manchester Royal Exchange
N'agbata afọ 1994 na afọ 1997, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Berlin Schaubühne Ensemble ma kpọọ ndị isi, dịka ọmụmaatụ na 'Hotel Orpheu', 'Orestes', 'Symposium' na 'Die Sprache der Vögel'

N'afọ 1998, ọ laghachiri obere oge na London ma kpọọ akụkụ ndị isi na ihe nkiri 'Oroonoko' na Royal Shakespeare Company, The honest whore na Merchant of Venice na Globe Theatre wee malite ọrụ ihe nkiri na telivishọn ya
N'afọ 2001, ọ malitere site na usoro ihe nkiri na opera Entführung aus dem Serail na Wiener Volksoper dị ka “Bassa Selim”
N'afọ 2002, ọ kwagara n'etiti Vienna na London, na-eme ihe nkiri dị ka 'Othello' na 'King Headley' na Tricycle Theatre

N'afọ 2003, ọ sonyeere Ensemble of the Wiener Burgtheater ma mee ihe nkiri dị ka 'Was Ihr wollt', '7 Sekunden oder in God we Trust', 'Die Ziege', 'Don Carlos', 'Die Katze auf dem heißen Blechdach' na 'Sofasurfin'
2006 ọ pụtara ọzọ dị ka 'Bassa Selim' na Opera de Marseille, na-egosi mmalite ọkwa mbụ ya na France

Kemgbe afọ 2004, Monu apụtawo n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri sinima na ihe nkiri na-asụ asụsụ German, dịka ọmụmaatụ na 2004 na 'Vier Frauen und ein Todesfall', na 2005 na 'Gefangene', 2006 na Tatort-series 'Schattenspiele' na 'Tod aus Afrika' yana na 'Kommissarin Lucas - German Angst', na 2007 na 'Nachtschicht [de] - Blutige Stadt [de]' na 'KDD - Scham' na 2010 na 'The Unintentional Kidnapping of Mrs
Elfriede Ott
N'afọ 2007, ọ pụtara dị ka Othello na Salisbury Playhouse
N'agbata afọ 2008 na afọ 2013, ọ gara Lagos iji rụọ ọrụ gbasara ọtụtụ mmepụta, na-akụziri ma na-azụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara ndị a
Ntọala NGO nke Austria 'Friends of Monu & Monu' bụ ibe Europe, na-enye nkwado maka ọrụ nka na Africa
Nick Monu bụ onye isi oche nke NGO a, ya na Roman Bönsch dị ka odeakwụkwọ na Simone Monu dị ka onye na-echekwa ego

Dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi, o tinyere aka na 'Sonette XCIV' nke William Shakespeare, nke Sir Alan Bates gosipụtara na 1999, obere ihe nkiri 'Split Ends' - Cruzon Cinema, Soho, 2002, yana obere 'Wienerin betet' maka Festival Mythos Modern, Vienna, 2008; na 2009 ọ duziri 'Swamp Dwellers' nke Wole Soyinka, National Theatre of Nigeria, wee malite imepụta vidiyo egwu ma nwee nzukọ ọzụzụ ya na Goethe-Institut Lagos nke a na-akpọ 'Bauprobe' dabere na Wole Soyinka's 'A dance of the Forest'
N'afọ 2010, ọ pụtara dị ka onye ndu na Christian Kracht's 'Ich werde hier sein im Sonnenschein und im Schatten' na Theater Basel, ma pụta na Alexanderfest na Augusta Raurica dị ka Zeus
N'afọ 2011, ọ duziri 'The Cost of Living' nke Sefi Atta mere dị ka ihe ngosi ụwa na Terra Kulture / Lagos, nke Wole Soyinka kpọrọ ka ọ gosipụta na Black Heritage Festival n'ọnwa Eprel n'otu afọ ahụ

N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2011, ọ duziri ihe nkiri ụwa nke 'Hagel auf Zamfara' (English The Sentence) nke otu onye edemede ahụ, Sefi Atta, egwuregwu Naijiria nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ German, na Theater Krefeld und Mönchengladbach
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2013, ọ duziri egwuregwu ọzọ na Germany, 'Happy days' nke Samuel Beckett, na Theater Krefeld und Mönchengladbach, na mmeghe ya n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye nlekọta nke African Art Gallery nke matombo guzobere na obodo ochie nke Salzburg, ebe ọ haziri ihe ngosi nke ọdịnala na nke oge a nke nka Africa
2015 o mere ọgụgụ nke dabere na Opera Wonyosi nke Wole Soyinka dịka akụkụ nke mmeghe nke Salzburger Festspiele n'ime gallery
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2016, o mere ihe nkiri nke mbụ ya na Thalia Theatre na Hamburg, na-egwu Nna Joad na mgbanwe nke akwụkwọ akụkọ John Steinbeck Grapes of Wrath, nke Luk Perceval duziri
Kemgbe afọ 2005, ọ lụrụ onye Austria na-emepụta ihe bụ Simone Monu ma nwee ụmụ atọ
Nicholas Munene Mutuma bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na-ahụ maka telivishọn / redio na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ọkachamara kemgbe afọ 2008
A mụrụ ya na Meru, Mutuma tolitere na Dar es salaam Tanzania ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya tupu ọ banye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Braeside Nairobi maka ule sekọndrị ya
Oge ezumike mbụ ya na TV mere mgbe a họpụtara ya na ihe ngosi Citizen TV, 'Tabasamu', na-egosi onye Luka
Ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri, Shuga ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ya na Lupita Nyong'o ghọrọ nnukwu ezumike ya na ihe nkiri ya
N'afọ 2015, Mutuma gosipụtara na usoro ntanetị a ma ama; 'This Is It', nke bịara nwee ezigbo ihe ịga nke ọma na ihe karịrị otu nde ọhụụ n'ime ọnwa 5 mbụ
A mụrụ ya na Meru, Kenya ma nwee ezinụlọ dị anya nke ọ na-ekwughị banyere ya
Nick Mutuma tolitere na Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na International School of Tanganyika
Ọ bụ n'oge ọ bụ nwata ka ọ chọpụtara ịhụnanya ya maka nka arụmọrụ, ma na-esonyekarị na egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ sonyeere Braeside School (Nairobi), ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị (O-level)
N'afọ 2005, ọ sonyeere United States International University Africa, ma gụsịa akwụkwọ n'afọ 2010 jiri Bsc pụta
International Business Administration
Oge izizi ya na telivishọn Kenya bụ n'afọ 2008 mgbe a họpụtara ya maka Luka, nwa akwụkwọ kọleji na-enweghị uche nke na-ebi na ịda ogbenye, onye ya na nwanyị meworo okenye, 'sugar mummy'
Ọrụ esemokwu ahụ nwetara nyocha dị iche iche site n'aka ọha na eze
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtakwara na usoro ihe nkiri mbụ nke M-Net nke Pan-African Changes, nke Tosh Gitonga duziri, na-egosi Richard, nwa okorobịa nke matara na a tọọrọ ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe a mụsịrị ya
Ya bụ njem nke ịka nká na ịchọ njirimara
Mutuma nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo oge atọ

Ọrụ mgbapu ya bịara n'afọ 2008 mgbe a họpụtara ya maka usoro ihe nkiri Shuga (2008); nke Teboho Mahallesi duziri, ihe ngosi ahụ na-agba gburugburu ndụ ngwa ngwa nke ndị ntorobịa Nairobi na omume mmekọahụ ha dị ize ndụ
Ihe ngosi a malitere ọrụ nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Kenya, gụnyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-emeri Oscars bụ Lupita Nyong'o

Mutuma pụtara na Zuku series afọ 2014 State House, nke o mere nwa nwoke nke onye isi ala Kenya, onye hụrụ nwa nwanyị nke otu n'ime ndị ọrụ ahụ n'anya

Ụlọ / com na-agbaso njem afọ mbụ nke ndị na-eto eto, ndị na-enweghị isi, Tomide (Nick Mutuma) na Dede (Chiagoziem Nwakanma)

Onika Tanya Maraj-Petty (amuru Disemba 8, 1982), onye amara dika Nicki Minaj (/ mɪˈnɑːʒ/), bu onye amuru Trinidadian [a] onye rapper, onye ọbụ abụ na onye na-ede abụ
A maara ya maka usoro ihe nkiri ya na rap ya na ike ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na-edekọ

Amụrụ na mpaghara Saint James nke Port of Spain, Trinidad na Tobago ma zụlite na Queens nke New York City, ọ nwetara nkwanye ùgwù ọha mgbe ọ hapụsịrị mixtape Playtime Is Over (2007), Sucka Free (2008), na Beam Me Up Scotty ( 2009)
Na mmalite ọrụ ya, Minaj bịara mara maka ejiji na wigs ya mara mma, usoro ọ na-asọ dị iche, na iji alter egos na ụda olu, bụ isi British Cockney
N'afọ 2010, Minaj wepụtara album studio mpụta mbụ ya, Pink Friday (2010), nke RIAA kwadoro platinum triple-platinum, wee ruo na nọmba-1 na chaatị Billboard 200
Otu mbụ Minaj kacha elu-ise bụ 'Super Bass' ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ atọ, n'oge ahụ ghọrọ abụ solo kachasị elu nke onye na-agụ nwanyị na-agụ kemgbe 2002
Ndekọ ya nke abụọ, Pink Friday Roman Reloaded (2012), hụrụ Minaj ka ọ na-aga n'ihu egwu-pop na ụda pop rap
Ndekọ a gbara arụkwaghịm na nọmba nke mbụ na Billboard 200, ya na otu onye ndu ya, 'Starships', na-arị elu na ọnụọgụ ise na Hot 100
album Studio nke atọ na nke anọ nke Minaj, The Pinkprint (2014) na Queen (2018)
akara ọpụpụ site na ụdị mbụ ya na nlọghachi na mgbọrọgwụ hip hop ya
Otu nke abụọ nke mbụ 'Anaconda' gbagoro na ọnụọgụ abụọ na Hot 100

Njirimara ya na remix nke Doja Cat's 'Say So' yana mmekorita ya na 6ix9ine, 'Trollz', ha abụọ ewepụtara na 2020, bụ akara nke mbụ na nke abụọ - otu na Hot 100, n'otu n'otu, nke ikpeazụ mere ya onye nke abụọ
nwanyi rapper ga mpụta mbụ na nke mbụ, na-eso Lauryn Hill na 1998
Gụnyere atụmatụ, Minaj bụ nwanyị na-ese ihe nwere ndenye nke abụọ kachasị na Hot 100, n'azụ onye na-abụ abụ Taylor Swift, nke ọ bụla na-agbakọta ihe karịrị 100
O nwere ndị otu 10 kacha elu na chaatị ahụ, nke kachasị maka nwanyị ọ bụla rapper ruo ugbu a, anọ n'ime ndị ahụ bụ abụ solo
Mmekọrịta ya na Karol G, 'Tusa', ghọrọ ọnụ ọgụgụ nke mbụ na-eme ogologo oge na Argentina, yana ngụkọta nke ihe karịrị ọnwa ise
Mweghachi ya 2021 nke mixtape 2009 Beam Me Up Scotty rụrụ arụ na ọnụọgụ abụọ na Billboard 200, na-aghọ mpụta mbụ kachasị elu maka ngwakọta rap nwanyị na eserese ahụ
Minaj bụ otu n'ime ndị nwanyị na-ese ihe kacha ere oge niile nwere ndekọ nde 100 rere n'ụwa niile
Ọtụtụ nkwanye ugwu ya gụnyere ihe nrite egwu America asatọ, MTV Video Music Awards ise, onyinye iri na abụọ BET, onyinye Billboard Music anọ, onyinye Briten na ndekọ Guinness World Record
Billboard họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwú nwanyị kachasị elu na 2010s, yana nke asaa n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nkiri kachasị elu nke afọ iri
Na 2016, Oge gụnyere Minaj na ndepụta ha kwa afọ nke 100 ndị kasị nwee mmetụta n'ụwa

N'èzí egwu, ọrụ ihe nkiri Minaj gụnyere ọrụ olu na ihe nkiri animated Ice Age Continental Drift (2012) na The Angry Birds Movie 2 (2019) yana nkwado ọrụ na ihe nkiri nkiri The Ọzọ Woman (2014) na Barbershop Mbelata na-esote (2016)
Ọ pụtakwara dị ka onye ọka ikpe na oge iri na abụọ nke American Idol na 2013
A mụrụ Onika Tanya Maraj na Saint James na Disemba 8, 1982
Nna ya bụ Robert Maraj (1956-2021), onye isi ego na onye ọbụ abụ ozioma nwa oge nke Dougla (nne Afro-Trinidadian na nna Indo-Trinidadian)
Nne ya, Carol Maraj, bụkwa onye na-abụ abụ ozi-ọma sitere na agbụrụ Afro-Trinidadian
Carol rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba ịkwụ ụgwọ na ndekọ ego n'oge ntorobịa Minaj
Nna Minaj bụ mmanya na-aba n'anya na mgbawa cocaine riri ahụ ma were iwe ọkụ, gbaa ụlọ ha ọkụ na Disemba 1987
O nwere nwanne nwoke nke tọrọ aha ya bụ Jelani, nwanne nwoke nke nta aha ya bụ Maịkaya, na nwanne nwanyị nke obere aha ya bụ Ming
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, Minaj na nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ, Jelani, tolitere na nne nne ya na Saint James n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ nwanne 11
Nne Minaj, Carol Maraj, na-arụ ọtụtụ ọrụ na Saint James tupu ya enweta Green Card mgbe ọ dị afọ 24
Ọ kwagara Bronx na New York City ịga Monroe College na-ahapụ ma Minaj na Jelani na Trinidad na nne nne ha
N'ikpeazụ, mgbe Minaj dị afọ ise, Carol nwetara ụlọ mbụ ya na 147th Street na South Jamaica, Queens wee kwaga Minaj na Jelani ka ha na ya na nna ha biri
Minaj chetara, 'Echeghị m na enwere m ọtụtụ ịdọ aka ná ntị n'ụlọ m
Nne m kpaliri m, ma ọ bụghị ezinụlọ siri ike
Achọkwara m ezinụlọ siri ike
' Minaj kwadoro nke ọma maka nnabata
na Fiorello H
LaGuardia High School of Music & Art and Performing Arts, nke na-elekwasị anya na nka na nka
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Minaj chọrọ ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, wee tụba ya na egwuregwu Off-Broadway In Case You Forget na 2001
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 19, ka ọ na-agbasi mbọ ike n'ọrụ ihe nkiri ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eri nri na Red Lobster na Bronx, mana a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ n'ihi nkụda mmụọ nye ndị ahịa
O kwuru na a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ 'opekata mpe iri na ise' n'ihi ihe ndị yiri ya
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere onye nnọchi anya ọrụ ndị ahịa na njikwa ụlọ ọrụ na Wall Street
Minaj na-echeta na o ji ego e nwetara n'ụlọọgwụ zụta BMW mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu
Nkolika 'Nicky' Nonyelum Anosike (amuru na Febuwari 27, 1986) bu onye na-agba basketbọọlụ maka otu Los Angeles Sparks dị na mba Amerika maka WNBA
A mụrụ Anosike na Brooklyn, New York ma o tolitere na Staten Island ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke St
Peter's High School for Girls
Enyere Anosike nsọpụrụ dika onye WBCA All-American
O sonyeere na egwuregwu nke 2004 WBCA High School All-America Game, ebe o meriri otu akara
Nwanne ya nwoke, O
Anosike, na-agba egwuregwu basketbọọlụ maka Scavolini Pesaro na mba Italy
Anosike gara mahadum na Tennessee ma gụọ akwụkwọ n'afọ 2008
Mgbe ọ nọ na Tennessee, Anosike meriri asọmpi egwuregwu nke National Champions na 2007 ma na 2008
Candace Parker, Shannon Bobbitt, na Alexis Hornbuckle bụ ndị otu ya
A kpọrọ Anosike na ndị otu USA Women's U19 nke nọchitere anya USA na asọmpi U19 nke 2005 emere na Tunis, Tunisia, na July na August 2007
Anosike gbara akara 114 site n’egwuregwu ọbụla nyere ndị otu ya aka n’ihe ndekọ 7-0 na ihe nrite ọla edo
Anosike gbara ndị otu USA bọọlụ na egwuregwu 2007 Pan American Games na Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
Ndị otu ahụ meriri egwuregwu ise niile, ma nweta nrite ọla edo maka ihe omume ahụ
N mbido egwuregwu ya na kọleji, ọ kwupụtara maka ndị otu WNBA Draft
A họpụtara Anosike na agba nke abụọ maka egwuregwu nke 2008 WNBA Draft nke Minnesota Lynx haziri
A họpụtara ya ozugbo onye otu ya na kọleji Shannon Bobbittsonyere otu ndi Los Angeles Sparks ebe onye otu ya bụ Candace Parker ga-agba
Na Minnesota ọ malitere egwuregwu niile maka Lynx
A họọrọ Anosike na otu nke 2009 West All Star Team dịka onye nnọchite, ya na onye otu ya na Charde Houston
Akpọrọ Anosike na Washington Mystics na Eprel 9, 2011
Na Febrụwarị 23, 2012, Anosike sonyere otu klọb ndị Los Angeles Sparks

Nicky Hambleton-Jones (amụrụ na Febụwarị 24, 1971) bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn, nke a maara nke ukwuu maka ịme ihe ngosi mgbanwe nke Channel 4 10 Years Younger Ọ bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-emepụta ejiji na ọkachamara na-emegide ịka nká
A mụrụ ya na Saụt Afrịka, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta Honours na dietetics tupu ọbido ọrụ onwe ya na Cape Town
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ azụmahịa na Wits Business School, tupu ọ kwaga London n'afọ 1996, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na City dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ahịa
Mgbe a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ n'afọ 2001, ọ tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ejiji onwe ya NHJ Style
N'afọ 2003 Nicky malitere igosi 10 Years Younger na Channel 4
N'oge ahụ, Nicky rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya akara maka ọtụtụ ụdị azụmaahịa
N'afọ 2008, o guzobere NHJ Style Academy, na-enye ọzụzụ na mmepe maka ndị na-achọ ejiji onwe ha na ndị na-ere ahịa nwere ngalaba ịzụ ahịa onwe ha
Hambleton-Jones na di ya Robert bi na London ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
N'afọ 2003, ka C4 kpọtụrụ ya, onye nke hụrụ ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya ma nwee mmasị n'ịwa ihuenyo ya maka ihe ngosi mgbanwe ọhụrụ a na-akpọ 10 Years Younger
E mechara were ya n'ọrụ ma gosipụta usoro ihe omume ahụ ruo afọ ise
Hambleton-Jones ebipụtala akwụkwọ anọ, otu banyere ejiji na ịma mma, otu banyere nri, na otu banyere ime ihe n'elu ndụ gị niile
Ọ na-edekwa foto magazin mgbe niile, ma nwee nkwekọrịta nkwado dịgasi iche iche
[nkọwa dị mkpa]

Nicky Hoberman ( onye amụrụ n'afọ 1967) bụ onye amụrụ na South Africa, onye na-ese ihe na London nke ụdị ya gụnyere iji photorealism tinyere njikotacaricature, na ọnụ ọgụgụ na-enweghị isi na ndabere nke oghere dị larịị, ọbụna oghere
A mụrụ Nicky Hoberman na Cape Town, South Africa n'afọ 1967
Ọ gara Worcester College of Oxford University site n'afọ 986 ruo 89, ebe ọ natara MA na Modern History
Site n'afọ 1989 ruo afọ 1993 ọ gara Parsons School of Design na Paris wee nweta BA na Fine Art
Na 1992 Hoberman gara Yale Summer School of Art na USA, wee nweta MA na eserese site na Chelsea College of Art and Design na London, ebe ọ gara site n'afọ 1994 ruo 1995
Malite n'etiti afọ 1990, Hoberman enweela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu tinyekwara nke onwe ya na United States, Italy, Switzerland, Germany, Belgium, New Zealand, na England
N'afọ 1996, a họpụtara ya maka 1996 New Contemporaries na Tate Liverpool E tinyekwara ya na ihe ngosi Saatchi 'New Neurotic Realism' n'afọ 1998
O sonyere na ihe ngosi otu na Museum of Contemporary Art, Chicago, Museum of Contemporary Art, Sydney, Melbourne National Gallery of Victoria na Magasin 3 na Stockholm
Hoberman enweela ihe ngosi atọ ke naanị ya na Feigen Contemporary na New York
Nicky Newton-King (amụrụ 1966) bụ onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ego na nchekwa yana nwanyị mbụ onye isi nchịkwa nke ụlọọrụ Johannesburg Stock Exchange nọgoro afọ otu narị na iri abụọ na ise
(JSE)
Newton-King gara Mahadum Stellenbosch ebe ọ gụchara ma nweta BA na LLB
Ọ nwetara LLM ( nke mbụ klaasị ) ọkachamara na ego ụlọ ọrụ, ụkpụrụ nchekwa na iwu nhazi na Mahadum Cambridge, England na 1994
Mgbe ọ nọ na Cambridge, College Queens's College nyere ya akwụkwọ mmụta ntọala maka mmezu agụmakwụkwọ
N'ime oge ya na Webber Wentzel Bowens Attorneys ọ dụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ọdụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa na ọrụ ego
Newton-King sonyeere JSE na 1996 wee bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke JSE na 2000
A họpụtara ya na bọọdụ JSE na 2005 o wee bụrụ CEO nke JSE na Jenụwarị 2012, wee nọchie Russell Loubser
Dị ka onye osote onye isi oche, ọ tinyere aka na iwebata atumatu mmemme na-akwado ọrụ na atụmatụ nha anya ọrụ na JSE
Ọ bụkwa ya na-ahụ maka azụmahịa ha na-ere data na atụmatụ eCommerce
Na 28 October 2014 ọ ghọrọ Director nke World Federation of Exchanges
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu nke Financial Markets Advisory Board na Presidential Remuneration Commission
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye so na King Task Group n'ime insider trading na Financial Markets Advisory Board, ma nyere aka dee Insider Trading Act, 1998
Iwu a na-enye nkwụghachi ụgwọ maka mfu ndị e nwetara n'ihi ịzụ ahịa na nzuzo
Kemgbe 2018 ọ bụbu onye nchịkwa na-abụghị onye isi nke Strate (Pty) Ltd
Na 30 Julaị 2019, Onye isi oche JSE Nonkululeko Nyembezi-Heita kwupụtara na Newton-King ga-agba arụkwaghịm na 1 October 2019
Leila Fourie, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Commonwealth Bank of Australia nọchiri ya dị ka onye isi JSE
Newton-King kwadoro na ọ lara ezumike nká na JSE n'ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke Gartner Symposium SA na 2 October 2019

Nicholas F
Oppenheimer (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 8 n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1945) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ De Beers diamond mining na nke enyemaka ya, Diamond Trading Company, na onye bụbu osote onye isi oche nke Anglo American
Ọ bụ nwoke nke atọ kasị baa ọgaranya na Afrịka
Oppenheimer bụ nwa Bridget (née McCall) na Harry Oppenheimer, na nwa nwa nke onye guzobere Anglo American Ernest Oppenheimer (ọgbọ mbụ na-elekọta De Beers, site na 1929)
Nna ya bụ onye agbụrụ ndị Juu Germany
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Harrow School na Christ Church, Oxford, ebe ọ gụrụ Philosophy, Politics na Economics, nweta Oxford MA
Oppenheimer sonyeere Anglo American na 1968, a họpụtara ya dịka onye nduzi na 1974, wee bụrụ osote onye isi oche na 1983
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'afọ 2001, ọ nọgidere bụrụ onye isi na-abụghị onye isi ruo n'afọ 2011
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke Central Selling Organisation (nke bụzi Diamond Trading Company) n'afọ 1984, na osote onye isi oche nke De Beers Consolidated Mines n'afọ 1985
A họpụtakwara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Diamond Trading Company n'afọ 1985
Onye isi oche nke De Beers Group site na 1998 ruo 2012, ọ lara ezumike nká mgbe e rere osisi ezinụlọ ahụ na Anglo American
Oppenheimer pụtara na Rich List 2018 dị ka onye nke iri abụọ na atọ kasị baa ọgaranya na United Kingdom, na akụkọ akụ na ụba nke ijeri £ 55

A họọrọ ya dị ka onye kasị baa ọgaranya na South Africa na ndepụta Forbes nke The World's Billionaires maka 2019, na akụ na ụba a kọrọ dị ka US $ 73 ijeri na, ọzọ, na ndepụta ya nke 2020, na akụkọ akụ na ụba nke US $ 76 ijeri na August 2020
Ezinụlọ Oppenheimer eduziela ọtụtụ n'ime mbọ enyemaka ya iji chekwaa ihe nketa na mkpa ọdịbendị nke mpaghara ndịda Afrịka, yana ịkwalite obodo na mpaghara agụmakwụkwọ, ahụike, nchekwa ọdịdị na nka

Nicky Oppenheimer na nwa ya nwoke Jonathan Oppenheimer guzobere Brenthurst Foundation na 2005 dị ka ụzọ isi nye aka na arụmụka gbasara atụmatụ na atumatu maka iwusi arụmọrụ akụ na ụba nke Africa ike ma mee ka mmepe gụnyere ma na-adịgide adịgide
Ezinụlọ a etinyewokwa aka ogologo oge na nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi na nchekwa
Ezinụlọ Oppenheimer sonyere De Beers iji guzobe okporo ụzọ Diamond na 2006 iji mee ka ikike nke ihe onwunwe ha maka nchekwa, nyocha na ebumnuche mmata gburugburu ebe obibi

Ụzọ Diamond jikọtara ebe asatọ gafee ugwu South Africa, site na Namaqualand n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ, ruo Kimberley, n'ebe ugwu ruo Tswalu na Kalahari, na Brenthurst Gardens na Johannesburg, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ ruo Ezemvelo Nature Reserve na n'ebe ugwu ruo Venetia Limpopo Nature Reserve na Limpopo Province
Kemgbe afọ 2015 Oppenheimer bụkwa Rhodes Trustee
N'afọ 2003, Technikon Witwatersrand nyere Oppenheimer nzere doctorate
Ọ natara Presidential Order of Honor (2004) site n'aka onye bụbu onye isi ala Botswana, Festus Mogae, na nsọpụrụ nsọpụrụ (2009) site na London Business School
N'afọ 1968, ọ lụrụ Orcillia 'Strilli' Lasch, nwa nwanyị nke onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Helli Lasch; ha abụọ bụ ndị Anglịkan
A mụrụ nna ya onye Juu ma ghọọ onye Anglịkan

Nicolas Kasanda wa Mikalay (7 Julaị 1939 na 22 ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 1985), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Docteur Nico, bụ onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, onye na-ede egwu na otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke egwu Congolese
A mụrụ ya na Mikalayi na Belgian Congo
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 1957 dị ka onye nkuzi teknụzụ, mana ezinụlọ egwu ya kpaliri ya, ọ malitere ịgba ụbọ akwara ma mechaa bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 14 Kasanda malitere iso otu Grand Kalle et l'African Jazz, nke Joseph 'Grand Kalle' Kabaselle duziri, na-egwuri egwu
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara (Jimi Hendrix letara ya mgbe ọ na-eme njem na Paris), na onye malitere ụdị ụbọ akhara Congolese, na-enweta aha njirimara 'Dr
Nico'
African Jazz kewara na afọ 1963 mgbe ya na onye na-agụ egwu Tabu Ley Rochereau hapụrụ iji guzobe L'Orchestra African Fiesta, nke ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị egwu kachasị ewu ewu n'Africa
Na afọ 1970, Kasanda dere usoro nke egwu egwu Luba bụ Kamulangu, ya na ndị otu ya, Orchestre African Fiesta Sukisa, dekọrọ ya ma wepụta ya na nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na Kinshasa
Ọ hapụrụ egwu na etiti afọ 1970 mgbe ọdịda nke akara ndekọ Belgian ya, wee mee ndekọ ikpeazụ ole na ole na Togo, obere oge tupu ọ nwụọ na ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Brussels, Belgium na 1985

Nicolaos Panagiotopoulos, onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Nico Panagio, bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn mba South Afrka, onye na-ememe ihe nkiri, na onye ọchụnta ego a maara maka ịbụ onye na-elekọta Survivor South Afrika kemgbe afọ 2010
A makwaara ya maka ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri ncha 7de Laan na dị ka onye ngosi na Top Billing
A mụrụ Panagio na Pretoria n'aka nna onye Gris si Elis ma gaa Pretoria Boys High School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Method Actor's Training Centre, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ obere ọrụ na Egoli na Generations
Nke a bu ụzọ mee nkwekọrịta ya na 7de Laan, ebe ọ na-eme onye ọchụnta ego George Kyriakis
Ọ sonyeere Top Billing dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi n'onwe ya na afo 2007 mgbe ọ hapụsịrị 7de Laan ma kemgbe ahụ na-egwuri egwu na mpaghara 14, Ella Blue na Vallei van Sluiers
Ọ na-akwado usoro ihe omume M-Net Survivor South Afrika kemgbe oge nke atọ ya na afọ 2009
O meela ihe nkiri dị iche iche, gụnyere Susanna van Biljon, Semi-Soet, Konfetti na Vrou Soek Boer
A họpụtara Panagio maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na afọ 2012 SAFTAs maka ọrụ ya na Semi-Soet
Ọ bụ onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ Trade Revolution (Pty) Ltd, ọ bụkwa onyeisi oche nke otu na-enweghị uru Missing Children SA
Nicolò Brancaleon (c1460 - mgbe 1526) bụ onye na-ese ihe a mụrụ na Venice, onye nka ya na-enwe mmetụta doro anya na Ethiopia site na ọchịchị Baeda Maryam gaa n'ihu
N'oge ndụ ya na Ethiopia, a na-akpọkarị ya 'Marqorewos'
Achọpụtabeghị ihe akaebe nke ndụ ya tupu ọ rute Etiopia, dị ka Paul B
Henze si kwuo

Wallis Budge, n'okwu mmalite ya na mbipụta nke abụọ nke nsụgharị ya nke Kebra Nagast, na-ekwu na Brancaleon bụ onye mọnk bịara Etiopia iji mee ka Eze Ukwu Zara Yaqob chegharia, ma gbakwa Abba Giyorgis ụka ọtụtụ ugboro n'ihe gbasara okpukpe; (Wallis Budge nwere ike icheta nkwupụta James Bruce banyere onye mmegide Abba Giyorgis na arụmụka okpukpe ahụ, 'A gwaghị anyị aha onye na-emegide Abba George, mana a na-eche na ọ bụ onye Venetian na-ese ihe, onye biri ọtụtụ afọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị na Abyssinia, ma, ekwere na ọ nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ - na-akọwa ya dị ka Brancaleon na ihe odide ala ala ala ala)Francisco Álvares, onye zutere Brancaleon mgbe ọ na-eso onye nnọchi anya Portuguese na ozi ya na Lebna Dengel na 1520s, dere na 'ha na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye mọnk tupu ọ bịa mba a'

Brancaleon rutere Etiopia n'etiti 1480 na 1482, dị ka akụkọ nke Francesco Suriano, onye gara mba ahụ, dere n'afọ na-esote ya Mgbe ọ bịarutere n'ụlọ ikpe nke Eze Ukwu (onye mara ụlọikwuu na Barar n'oge ahụ, nke OGS
Crawford dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Addis Ababa nke oge a), Suriano hụrụ ndị Europe iri na anọ ndị bi n'ụlọ ikpe ahụ, n'etiti ha bụ 'Master Nicolo Branchalion'
Ka ọ na-erule oge Álvares zutere Brancaleon, onye na-ese ihe bara ọgaranya ma bụrụ onye ama ama na Ethiopia - ọ bụ ezie na Eze Ukwu machibidoro ya ịhapụ mba ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule n'oge a, ọ tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ ma bụrụ onye a na-apụghị ịgbagha agbagha na nkà ya n'ise ihe oyiyi, igosi akwụkwọ, na ịchọ ụlọ ụka mma
'Ihe oyiyi Brancaleon nke ọnwụ nke Saint George na nke ọrụ ebube nke Virgin Mary nọgidere na-ewu ewu ruo na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ'
Ọrụ ya a maara nke ọma bụ eserese nke Madonna and Child nke mere ka ụlọ ụka Atronsa Maryam maa mma, nke kpatara ọtụtụ esemokwu
Beckingham na Huntingford, na ndetu ha na nsụgharị ha nke akụkọ Álvares, kwughachiri akụkọ sitere na Paris Chronicle na ọrụ Brancaleon
Otú ọ dị, eserese ahụ dịgidere ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ ruo mgbe e bibiri ya na 1704, ya na ụka, site na mwakpo Oromo

N'afọ 1973, onye njem Diana Spencer chọpụtara ụfọdụ ihe atụ nke ọrụ Brancaleon na Wafa Yesus na ebe obibi ndị mọnk dị nso nke Getisamani na Goncha Gorge, gụnyere ọrụ nke onye mmụta Etiopia a na-amaghị ama
Henze na-akọ na ya na Stanislaw Chojnacki kwadoro na ọrụ ndị a lanarịrị oge Derg
'Ọ bụ ezie na amụtala ọtụtụ ihe banyere nka okpukpe Etiopia n'ime iri afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, ọ ka bụ ngalaba ịma aka ebe o yikarịrị ka a ga-achọpụta ihe ọhụrụ dị mkpa
Brancaleon bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na narị afọ nke iri na ise ole si Ethiopia nke a maara aha ya, na mgbakwunye na onye na-ese ihe na-ese ihe na ethiopian Fere Seyon
Nicola Elizabeth Formby (amụrụ n' ọnwa Eprel n'afọ1965) bụ onye odeakụkọ nke mba South Afirika, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na onye ndụmọdụ nri, onye bụbu onye nlere anya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Amụrụ na mba South Afrịka n'afọ1965, Formby chetara na mgbe ọ na-etolite n'ebe ahụ 'nkịta bi n'ụlọ ezumike n'èzí, ọ dịghịkwa mgbe ọ bụla ha ji aka apịtị abata n'ụlọ'
Ọ bịara England wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Wellington College, Berkshire
N'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, David Bailey sere ya foto maka mkpuchi magazine ma kwuo na ọ chetara ya Julie Christie
Nke a dugara n'ịrụ ọrụ nṅomi maka Clairol na Wella na mgbasa ozi TV na Jamini
Bido na ime ihe ngosi, Formby gara n'ihu pụta na ihe nkiri Ben Elton The Man from Auntie n'afọ (1990)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ndu nke Diana, Princess of Wales, na ihe nkiri telivishọn awa atọ The Women of Windsor n'afọ (1992), banyere ndụ Diana na Sarah Ferguson
Ọ pụtakwara na usoro telivishọn Bugs na The All New Alexei Sayle Show n'afọ (1995)
N'ịbanye n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ, Formby ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Tatler ma bụrụkwa onye ndụmọdụ nri maka Pret a Manger na Itsu

Site n'afọ1995 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na n'afọ 2016, Formby bụ onye mmekọ nke AA Gill, onye edemede na onye na-akatọ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke Sunday Times, bụ onye hapụrụ nwunye ya Amber Rudd maka ya na na ogidi ya kpọrọ ya 'Blonde'
Ha mukọrọ ejima, otu nwoke na otu nwanyị, nke a mụrụ n'afọ 2007
Michael Bywater dere banyere ha 'Ya na Nicola Formby bụ Ike Di na Nwunye, nke anyị kpọrọ asị, ka ọ bụ n' anyị akpọghị?'

Esemokwu dị n'etiti Gill na Piers Morgan nwere ike ịmalite mgbe Morgan kọwara Formby dị ka nwamba nwoke na-enwe mmekọahụ nke alụlụ oge kparala ha aka ọjọọ wee kwuo na ya gosiri ya 'ihe nkiri ọtọ' n'onwe ya
Gill kwuru na Morgan mere nke a wee kpọọ ya 'onye na-ekwupụta onwe ya nke na-adịghị mma'

Akwụkwọ nke Contemporary Quotes nke afọ(1997) gụnyere abụọ sitere na Formby, gụnyekwara na 'Ha na-atụkarị ụjọ - nwa agbọghọ mara mma bụ nnukwu trofi na ha na-enweta akwara tupu egwuregwu ma ha amaghị ihe ha ga-eme gị'
Nicola Galombik bụ nwanyị South Africa na-azu ahịa nakwa nwanyị ọchụnta ego, nke a mara maka ịtọ ntọala Harambee Youth Employment Accelerator, South Africa,otu anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na-enweta ihe nrite
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Yellowwoods, ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ego na South Africa
Ọrụ ya gụnyere mmepe amụma maka gọọmentị Nelson Mandela na imepụta atụmatụ agụmakwụkwọ maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi South Africa
Nicola Galombik nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na fim, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị & Psychology site na Mahadum Witwatersrand na 1988 tupu ya enweta Masters na Cinema na Media Studies na Mahadum New York na 1992
Nicola bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Yellowwoods Investments, ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ego na South Africa
Tupu ịbanye Yellowwoods na 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Converse Consulting site na 2004 ruo 2009

Ọ bụ onye isi atụmatụ ihe onyonyo na South African Broadcasting Corporation site na 1996 ruo 2003 ebe o hiwere ngalaba mmụta ha, na onye isi ọdịnaya mpaghara maka ndị isi mgbasa ozi nọọrọ onwe ya site na 1994 ruo 1996
Na mbụ, ọ tinyere aka na ọtụtụ òtù na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma nyekwa aka n'ịzụlite amụma maka ọchịchị mbụ nke Nelson Mandela

Galombik hiwere Harambee Youth Employment Accelerator na 2010 iji lebara enweghị ọrụ ntorobịa dị elu na South Africa, nke “mmụba” nke ndị ntorobịa na-eru ogogo iru ọrụ kpatara na iji dozie enweghị nkwekọ n'etiti ndị ọrụ na ndị e were n'ọrụ
Na Swahili 'Harambee' pụtara 'anyị niile jikọtara ọnụ'
Galombik na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche kemgbe mmalite nke nzukọ a
Ụlọ ọrụ ntinye ego nke Galombik a kpọrọ Yellowwoods, na mmekorita ya na ego ọrụ ego gọọmentị South Africa National Treasury's Fund webatara nzukọ a
Harambee na-ejikọ ndị na-achọ ọrụ oge mbụ na ndị mmekọ ọrụ site na netwọk ekwentị enwetara na-enyocha ma na-azụ ndị na-achọ ọrụ oge mbụ maka ọrụ mbụ ha
Site n'ịmepụta nnukwu netwọkụ nke ndị ọrụ na-adị mfe ịnyagharị na igosi na enwere ike idowe ntorobịa nke ọma site na iji usoro a, Harambee enweela ike ịbawanye mbọ na arụmọrụ ha
Harambee malitere na ebumnuche nke ijikọ ndị ntorobịa South Africa pụkụ iri na-enweghị ọrụ n'ọrụ ma ugbu a enyela pụkụ otu narị ndị na-achọ ọrụ oge mbụ ohere ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ narị ise
Ndị na-anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na ndị isi ya ejirila onyinye na ego sitere na otu dị ka Skoll Foundation na USAID
Schwab Foundation nabatara Nicola na 2020 dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe nke afọ
Enyere ya Skoll Award for Social Entrepreneurship na 2019
Ọ bụ onye ibe nke African Leadership Initiative na African Leadership Network, na IGD Frontier 100
Ọ bụkwa onye nrite nke John P
McNulty Prize Laureate n'afọ 2015 na onye otu Aspen Global Leadership Network
Ọ nwetakwara ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu site n'aka Fulbright ịga Mahadum New York
Nicola jere ozi dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ndị otu maka African Leadership Academy's Decennial Symposium on Enabling Social Enterprise, ma kwuokwa na GIBS Business School
Pọdkastị Rockefeller Foundation #Solvable agbawokwa ya ajụjụ ọnụ
Nicola L
(amụrụ Nicola Leuthe, 1932–2018) bụ onye na-ese ihe ọhụ nke mepụtara omume dị iche iche nke jikọtara ụkpụrụ nke nka na imewe

A mụrụ ya na Morocco nye na nne na nna ndị France, onye na-ese ihe na mbụ jikọtara ya na Pop Art wee gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ n'ime afọ iri ise, na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ mmekọrịta, arụmọrụ dị egwu, na eserese dị ka collage, yana ihe nkiri na egwuregwu
N'ịzaghachi mmegharị megide ọdịbendị nke mepụtara omume ya na mbụ, ọrụ Nicola L
dị n'otu site na itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ụmụ nwanyị, na echiche nke ịha nhata na nchịkọta
Onye na-ese ihe a bịara bụrụ onye a maara nke ọma maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ya nke jikọtara ahụ ụmụ nwanyị na ihe ndị dị n'ụlọ
Onye na-ese ihe kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka 'ihe ncheta nke nnwere onwe'
Mmasị Nicola L

nwere na nka dugara ya na Paris n'afọ 1954, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe osise na École nationale supérieure des Beaux-Arts, nke onye na-ese ihe bụ Jean Souverbie duziri, onye gbara ya ume ka ọ 'bipụ ahụ n'otu ụzọ ahụ ìhè si egbutu ihe nlereanya dị ndụ'
N'oge a, ya na onye nkatọ bụ Pierre Restany ghọrọ enyi, ma zute Fred Lanzenberg, onye ọ lụrụ na 1956
Lanzenberg mechara mepee ụlọ ngosi nka na Brussels na 1966, na mbụ ya na onye a ma ama na-ere ahịa bụ Ileana Sonnabend na-arụkọ ọrụ na ihe ngosi nke ndị na-ese Pop nke America
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, Nicola L
matara ajọ mbunobi nke ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe na-eche ihu ma kwụsị iji aha nna ya, ma mesịa tinye 'L' mbụ na 2000s
Mmalite nke afọ 1960 bụ oge mgbanwe maka Nicola L
Onye na-ese ihe ahụ bịara dị nso otu onye French nke kwadoro ma na-ekwusi ike na nka kwesịrị ikwu okwu banyere ọha mmadụ site na iji ihe na ihe ndị dị ugbu a
N'ịbụ ndị Restany kpaliri, òtù ahụ gụnyekwara Yves Klein, Jean Tinguely, Christo na Niki de Saint Phalle
N'afọ 1964, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a n'etiti Paris na Ibiza, Nicola L
zutere onye na-ese ihe na Argentina bụ Alberto Greco
N'ịbụ onye si New York lọta n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ebe ọ zutere Marcel Duchamp, Greco jụrụ Nicola L
ajụjụ ugboro ugboro maka ịchụso eserese
'E suru m ihe osise m niile ọkụ ma mee The Screen for Three People Homage to Alberto Greco,' ka o mechara chee
'Nke a bụ mmalite nke ọrụ ọhụrụ ma dị iche maka m, nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ akpụkpọ ahụ, nke Pierre Restany kpọrọ Pénétrables
' Ụdị ngwakọta ndị a nwere rectangles nke akwa agbatịrị agbatịrị nke ndị na-ekiri nwere ike itinye ogwe aka ha, ụkwụ ma ọ bụ isi ha, na-aghọ n'otu na nka
Ha na-enyekarị ohere maka ọtụtụ ndị sonyere, ndị ga-apụta ọnụ dị ka otu ihe dị ndụ

Otu n'ime ọrụ ya kachasị mma site na Pénétrables, uwe mmadụ iri na otu akpọrọ Red Coat (1969), bụ nke mbụ e mere na arụmọrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na Isle of Wight festival na 1970, ya na ndị egwu Caetano Veloso na Gilberto Gil, ndị otu Neo-concrete movement na Brazil
'N'ọgwụgwụ ihe nkiri ahụ, anyị na-ekesa gloves nke e dere 'otu akpụkpọ ahụ maka onye ọ bụla', ndị mmadụ wee malite ịsụ abụ ahụ

Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ onye na-ese ihe na-arutu aka n'ahụ nwoke na nwanyị, ụdị nwanyị gba ọtọ ghọrọ ihe na-eme ugboro ugboro, dịka ọ bụ maka ndị ibe ya na gburugburu ya dịka Carolee Schneemann, Valie Export, Rosalyn Drexler na Marisol
N'ikpọ ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ ya 'ọrụ nka,' Nicola L
mere ihe ndị yiri arịa ụlọ nke dabere na onye na-ese ihe na-achọpụta ezigbo ahụ, na-ekwubiga okwu ókè ma na-eme ka ọdịdị ha dị mfe
Na La Femme Commode (1969 - 2014) a na-ahazi kabinet osisi lacquered n'ụdị ahụ, nke anya, ọnụ na ara na-aghọ draịva

Ihe ọkpụkpụ nke onye na-ese ihe na 1969 Little TV Woman 'Abụ m nwanyị ikpeazụ' na-ewere ụdị nwanyị buru ibu nke nwere ihe nlele telivishọn maka afọ, nke na-egosipụta ozi site n'oge ruo n'oge ruo n'oge 'Abụ m nwanyị ikpeazụ
Ị nwere ike iwere egbugbere ọnụ m, metụ ara m aka, metụ afọ m aka, mmekọahụ m
Ma ana m ekwughachi ya, ọ bụ oge ikpeazụ

' Ụdị dị nro, nke na-adaba adaba na The Giant Foot (1967) na White Foot Sofa (1968) - ọrụ ndị e bu n'uche imeghe ma nọdụ ala - gosipụtara nnwale mbụ nke onye na-ese ihe na vinyl, ákwà nke gbanwere omume ya
Na 1975, Nicola L
malitere itinye uche na ọrụ ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1977, ọ duziri ihe nkiri Les Têtes sont Encore Dans L'île (The Heads are Still in the Island) ya na Terry Thomas na Pierral, nke e mepụtara na Ibiza
Na 1979, Nicola L
kwagara New York, ebe ọ nọgidere na-elekwasị anya na ịme ihe nkiri
N'afọ ndị 1990, Nicola L
laghachiri na feminism site na usoro eserese na ọrụ na mpempe akwụkwọ
For Poems nke Dorothy Parker (1994), o mepụtara ndekọ foto na osisi nke gụnyere ụdị ụgbụ tinyere akụkụ nke uri

Ihe osise Femme Fatale (1995), nke e mere site na akwa ndina a pịrị apị nke na-esonyere ihe oyiyi na ederede, nyochara ụmụ nwanyị nwụrụ n'ụzọ ọdachi ma ọ bụ ọnwụ ike, n'etiti ha bụ Marilyn Monroe, Billie Holiday na Ulrike Meinhof

Ka ọ na-eru ngwụsị nke ndụ ya, onye na-ese ihe gara n'ihu ịzụlite usoro Penetrables ya, na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ọha na eze, gụnyere The Blue Cape, nke malitere na Cuba n'afọ 2002, sochiri ihe ngosi na Great Wall of China (2005) na Venice Biennale (2016)
Emere Red Coat nke onye na-ese ihe na nso nso a na London n'oge ngosi nke ọrụ ahụ na Tate Modern na 2015
Enwetawo ọrụ Nicola L

site na nchịkọta mba ụwa nke gụnyere Centre Pompidou, Paris; FRAC Bretagne, France; Gallery of Modern Art, Glasgow; Musée d'Arts Plastiques, Brussels; Museum of Contemporary Art, Antwerp; na MAMCO, Geneva
