Alma
Nicola Jane Watson (amụrụ na 10 Julaị 1955) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Zimbabwe na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly of Zimbabwe maka Bulawayo Central kemgbe 2018
Ọ bụbu otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị a họpụtara na 2013
A mụrụ Nicola Watson na 10 Julaị 1955 na Bulawayo na Southern Rhodesia n'oge ahụ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Hillside na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Townsend
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Town Nne ya jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu
N'afọ 2013, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị a họpụtara dịka ndị omeiwu a họpụtara site na nnọchite anya
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu maka Bulawayo Central na 2018
Nicolasa Machaca Alejandro (amụrụ n'afọ 1952) bụ onye isi otu ndị ọrụ na onye ọrụ ahụike na Bolivia
Nwa nke ndị ọrụ ugbo Quechua, Machaca mụtara ịgụ ihe ma ghọọ onye na-akwado ịgụ na ide
Ọ haziri mbọ enyemaka obodo ma rụọ ọrụ iji nye ụmụ nwanyị ike site n'ịmepụta klọb ndị nne
N'afọ 1980, o sonyere na ntọala nke Bartolina Sisa Confederation, nzukọ ndị isi nke ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ ugbo na Bolivia
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ma mekpọọ ya ọnụ maka ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze ya, a manyere ya ịgbapụ na mba ahụ
Mgbe ọ nọrọ na Cuba, ọ laghachiri Bolivia ma mụọ ka ọ bụrụ onye ọrụ ahụike
N'afọ 2005, a họpụtara ya maka Nobel Peace Prize dị ka akụkụ nke PeaceWomen Across the Globe's initiative iji họpụta otu ìgwè ụmụ nwanyị 1,000 maka nsọpụrụ nke afọ ahụ
A mụrụ Nicolasa Machaca Alejandro n'afọ 1952 na obodo Poopó nke Bolivia
Ọ tolitere n'ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbo, nke na-azụ atụrụ na ehi ma na-akụ poteto na agwa fava
Machaca amaliteghị ụlọ akwụkwọ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, a na-emegbu ya maka ịbụ okenye karịa ụmụ klas ya, ya mere ọ hapụrụ obere oge ka ọ debanyere aha
Otú ọ dị, afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ọ mụtara ịgụ ihe ma malite iduzi ọmụmụ ịgụ na ide na obodo ya
Ọ malitekwara itinye aka na Mothers' Club nke obodo ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị nne n'onwe ya
Machaca malitere izute ndị isi mpaghara ma guzobe netwọk n'ebe ahụ, na 1974 ọ nọchitere anya Kurawara, ayllu ya (obodo), na Congress of Peasant Women na Oruro
N'afọ 1977, Machaca hapụrụ Kurawara wee biri na Oruro, ebe a họpụtara ya ka ọ lekọta mmemme maka ụmụ nwanyị na mpaghara ya
N'afọ 1980, a bịara were ya dị ka ihe iyi egwu nye ọchịchị Luís García Meza, otu abalị, ndị agha kpọọrọ ya ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Oruro
Mgbe ọnwa abụọ nke ịtụ mkpọrọ, ịgba ajụjụ ọnụ, na ịta ahụhụ, na mbido afọ 1981 a tụbara ozu Machaca n'ụgbọ ala ma kpọga ya Obispo Santistevan Province, ebe ha hapụrụ ya
O jisiri ike chọta gwongworo ọzọ iji kpọga ya La Paz
Ọ gbabara n'ụlọ onye otu ya, onye chọtara dọkịta ma nyere ya aka ịgbapụ na mba ahụ
Ọ gara Cuba site na Lima, na Havana a kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ
Ọnọdụ ya dị oke egwu, a na-atụkwa egwu na a ga-ebipụ ya ụkwụ abụọ, mana ndị dọkịta jisiri ike zọpụta ha
Machaca nọrọ na Cuba ruo otu afọ na ọkara, laghachi Bolivia mgbe a chụpụrụ García Meza
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ya ma rụọ ọrụ na Redio Pío XII na Oruro
N'afọ 1985, ọ debanyere aha na Instituto Politécnico Tomás Katari, gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye ọrụ ahụike
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eduzi ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iji weta ndị ọrụ ahụike na obodo ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ
Dị ka onye guzobere Bartolina Sisa Confederation, Machaca gara n'ihu na ọrụ ya, mana ọ jikọtara ya na ọrụ ọha na eze
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 1,000 PeaceWomen Across the Globe họpụtara maka 2005 Nobel Peace Prize
N'afọ 2011, a kpọrọ ya onye isi oche mbụ nke 'Juana Azurduy' Social Organization of Quechua Women, nke na-ezube inye ụmụ nwanyị ike na mpaghara ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ nke Sucre
N'afọ 1991, ọ lụrụ Benjamín Cuéllar, onye ọ zutere n'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ na-enye ọrụ ahụike na obodo dị na Ngalaba Potosí
Di na nwunye ahụ kwagara Sucre, ebe ha zụlitere ụmụ ha atọ Rosa, Ernesto, na Carmen Julia
Nicole Amarteifio (amụrụ n'afọ 1982) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye na-ede ihe nkiri na Ghana
A mụrụ Amarteifio na Ghana na 1982 mana ọ kwagara London dị ka nwa dị ọnwa atọ n'ihi nnupụisi ndị agha na mba ya, wee biri na England ruo afọ isii
Nna nna ya, onye isi ala na-acha ọcha, lụrụ nne nne ya na Ghana n'afọ 1945
O mechara soro ezinụlọ ya kwaga Scarsdale, New York, mana ọ na-aga ezumike na Ghana kwa afọ
Mgbe ọ na-aga Scarsdale Middle School, a nụrụ ka otu nwa klas ya na-atụ aro ka a gbapụ Afrịka iji dozie nsogbu HIV
Nne na nna Amarteifio laghachiri Ghana na 1997
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na African na Afro-American studies na Mahadum Brandeis na 2004
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ nwetara ọrụ na Washington, DC
dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka mmepe akụ na ụba Afrịka na The Whitaker Group, na-arụ ọrụ maka Rosa Whitaker
Na 2006, Amarteifio kwagara Accra, Ghana, ịrụ ọrụ na mmepe akụ na ụba na African Development Foundation
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ kwagara Africa, o nwere echiche ime ihe ngosi dị ka Sex and the City na Accra
Amarteifio laghachiri na United States ịga Mahadum Georgetown ebe o nwetara nzere masta na nkwukọrịta ụlọ ọrụ n'afọ 2010
Na Georgetown, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Mike Long, onye gbara ya ume inwe mmasị n'ide ihe nkiri
Amarteifio chọtara ọrụ na World Bank dị ka onye mbụ na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na Accra
Ọtụtụ ọnwa mgbe ọ laghachiri Ghana, ọ malitere iwebata echiche ya na ndị ọkachamara telivishọn, bụ ndị jụrụ ịmalite ọrụ ahụ mana gbaa ya ume ịmụta otu esi ede ihe ngosi
Amarteifio mepụtara mmefu ego wee ghọta na ọ chọrọ naanị ego zuru ezu iji malite karịa ịmepụta oge zuru ezu
Iji mụta banyere mmepụta, ọ gbasoro ọrụ nke ndị na-emepụta ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi wee debanye aha na kọleji obodo

Amarteifio chọpụtara edemede nke ihe omume Sex and the City na ihe ngosi ndị metụtara ya n'ịntanetị, ma jiri ha mee ihe dị ka template maka edemede ya, yana akụkọ sitere n'aka ndị enyi ya n'Africa dum
Ọ chọtara ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na oku, wee kpọtụrụ nwa klas ochie, Maame Adjei, iji rụọ ọrụ Zainab
Adjei gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Connecticut na Nana Mensah, onye Amarteifio họọrọ maka onye Sadé
N'iji ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Ghana, Amarteifio na-ese ihe ngosi ya na ngwụsị izu na abalị iji ghara imegide ọrụ ya na World Bank
A tọhapụrụ usoro mbụ nke ihe ngosi ya, An African City, na YouTube na Machị 2014
Ọ na-agbaso ndụ ndị enyi ise laghachiri Africa mgbe ha biri na mba ọzọ ma na-agagharị ịhụnanya, ọrụ, na ndụ abalị n'isi obodo Ghana, na mkparịta ụka doro anya banyere mmekọahụ
Amarteifio bu n'uche ịmepụta mkparịta ụka banyere ihe bụ Africa, na iwepụ ihe omimi
A katọrọ usoro ahụ maka ịnọchite anya ndị isi na-enweghị ihe jikọrọ ha na ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka
Amarteifio kwụjọrọ nkatọ a, na-ajụ echiche nke nwanyị Africa
Oge nke abụọ nke ihe ngosi ahụ pụtara na 2016
E weputara usoro TV nke abuo ya, ihe egwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a na-akpọ The Republic, na 2016, dabere na ikpe ndụ n'ezie na Accra
A na-akpọ Amarteifio 'Shonda Rhimes nke Ghana'
A kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị OkayAfrica 100 na 2018
Ihe na-atọ ọchị, ọ na-agbaso mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Afua na Nii ka ha na-atụle alụmdi na nwunye
Nicole Asinugo bụ onye nduzi akụkọ, si Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye ederede ihe ngosi
Ọ bụ onye mmeri (ya na CJ

Obasi) na mmemme nke Africa Magic Viewers’ Choice Awards maka onye edemede ihe ngosi kachasị mma na ngalaba ihe nkiri fim ma ọ bụ Televishion na 2020 maka nyocha mbụ ya; Living in Bondage Breaking Free
Ọ bụkwa onye dere ihe ngosi nke ihe nkiri Nollywood bụ 'Rattlesnake'
Ọ bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ na onye na-ahazi ọdịnaya maka mmemme World Expo 2020 na United Arab Emirates, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ ya dị ka onyeisi ndị editọ na onye na-emepụta ọdịnaya na Ndani TV
A mụrụ Asinugo na United Kingdom
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na University of Nottingham, ebe o nwetara nzere bachlọ maka mmuta Iwu (LLB) na 2010
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ nwetara asambodo Barrister na Iwu (BL) site na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu nke Naijiria na 2011
Mgbe ahụ ọ gara London School of Journalism na 2012 ebe ọ nwetara post-graduate diploma (PGD) na mmuta nchikota ma mgbasa ozi akpọọrọ Journalism na-asụsụ bekee
Asinugo bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na In and out magazine na 2010 nke bụ akwụkwọ gbasara njemnleghari anya nke Niajiria
Na 2012, ọ gara na Channels Television dị ka onye edemede akụkọ, maka akụkọ banyere Environment, Aviation na Foreign Affairs
Na 2013, ọrụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ngosi ozi akpọrọ DDB na Lagos ruo afọ atọ bụrụ nnukwu onye ode akwụkwọ

O mepere ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ gunyere Diageo, Pernod Ricard, Unilever, MTN na Interswitch yana ịmepụta ihe ọhụụ maka ngosiputa na igbasa ozi Na 2016 Asinugo sonyeere Ndani TV na Lagos, dịka onyeisi ndi nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọrụ Asinugo dịka onyeisi ndi nduzi akụkọ mere Ndani lifestyle boro ya ebubo maka okike, ịmalite na ijikwa blọgụ Ndani lifestyle
O bu onye na emeputa ma na-akwado ihe ngosi Ndani TV nke bụ Real Talk
Ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya na Ndani TV maka World Epo 2020 emere na Dubai dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ na onye na-emepụta ihe ọgụgụ na 2020, ebe ọ na-ahazi akụkọ maka obodo

Na 2019, o mepụtara ihe ngosi izizi ya Living in Bondage Breaking Free nke so merie onyinye na mmemme nke Africa Magic viewers' choice awards (AMVCA) ya na CJ Obasi na February 6, 2020, na Eko expo hall na Victoria Island, Lagos
Na Eprel 2020, o mechara ihe nkiri ya nke abụọ bụ ‘‘Rattle Snake’’
O nwere blọgụ akpọọrọ '2 scoops of life and style', ebe o na-akọrọ ahụmịhe ya na ọdịbendị ndị Naijiria na ịba ọgaranya maka mmadu ịbi naanị ya na Lagos
Blọọgụ ahụ nwere ngalaba klọb akwụkwọ, ebe ọ na-ezute ya na ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ ma tụlee akwụkwọ mmasi
Asinugo natara onyinye maka ọrụ ya dịka onye mmeri nke onye edemede ihe ngosi kacha mma na fim ma ọ bụ usoro TV na mmemme nke asaa maka Africa Magic viewers 'Choice Awards (AMVCA)
Nicole 'Nicki' Becker (Buenos Aires) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe nke si Argentina na otu n'ime ndị guzobere Jóvenes por el Clima, akụkụ nke Friday for Future movement
Becker ghọrọ onye mmeri ndị ntorobịa maka Escazu Agreement and Sanitation and Water for All (SWA) na 2021
Becker bụ nwa nwanyị nke nna bụ onye ọka iwu na-eme mpụ na nne bụ onye nkuzi mgbakọ na mwepụ ma biri na Caballito
Mgbe ọ ghọtara mgbanwe ihu igwe, Becker gbanwere usoro ya na kọleji site na nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ gaa na iwu mba ụwa n'afọ mbụ ya
Ọ na-amụ iwu ugbu a na Mahadum nke Buenos Aires
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ dị afọ asatọ, Becker esonyerela Habonim Dror ma bụrụkwa akụkụ nke Ni una menos
Ọrụ ya na gburugburu ebe obibi malitere n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2019 mgbe ọ hụrụ vidiyo Instagram nke ndị na-eto eto na-eme njem ihu igwe na Europe, Greta Thunberg ghọkwara etiti isiokwu ahụ

N'ihi na e mere March mbụ International maka Nsogbu Ihu igwe na March 15, 2019, Becker, Bruno Rodriguez, na ndị enyi ha atọ ndị ọzọ kpebiri ịchọta Jóvenes por el Clima, akụkụ nke Youth Climate, na ngwụcha February 2019
Ha kpebiri ịhazi njem ahụ na Argentina, nke mmadụ pụkụ ise sonyeere mgbe ha guzobesịrị nzukọ ahụ
Nzukọ ahụ anọwo na-agba Argentina ume ime nkwupụta ihu igwe na ọnọdụ mberede
Gọọmentị mechara kwupụta na 17 Julaị 2019
N'afọ 2019, ọ natara onyinye ịga nzukọ ihu igwe nke UN na Madrid maka ndị ntorobịa Argentina

Dị ka akụkụ nke mkpọsa UnaSolaGeneración na World Children's Day site na UNICEF na America Solidaria iji kwalite mgbanwe ihu igwe nye ndị na-eto eto gburugburu Latin America na Caribbean n'oge ọrịa COVID-19, Becker ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya
N'afọ 2019, Becker bịara na 2019 United Nations Climate Change Conference n'okpuru onyinye ahụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa maka Argentina
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ laghachiri na 2021 United Nations Climate Change Conference wee zute odeakwụkwọ ukwu UN Antonio Guterres

Ụlọ omebe iwu nyere ya diplọma na ihe nrite iji kwanyere aka o nyere n'ọrụ ọha na eze na 10 Maachị 2020Access Initiative (TAI), United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean (UN ECLAC), na Gọọmentị Costa Rica họpụtara Becker dị ka otu n'ime ndị mmeri ntorobịa ise nọchiri David R
Boyd na ncheta nke abụọ nke nkwekọrịta Escazu dị ka ndị nkwado UNICEF na 2020
N'afọ 2021, SWA họpụtara ya dị ka 'Onye mmeri na-eto eto nke mmemme ahụ'
Becker ghọrọ onye na-elekọta mmemme redio FutuRöck nke akpọrọ 'Permitido pisar el pasto' na Rodriguez
Ọ bụkwa odee akwụkwọ maka Eldario
Nicole Ehizele Enabosi (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 26 n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1997) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ bọọlụ Naịjirịa na Amerịka, ọ na-agbara ndị otu Slovak MBK Ružomberok na ndị otu mba Naịjirịa bọọlụ
Enabosi gara ụlọakwụkwọ Our Lady of Good Counsel High School (Montgomery County, Maryland)
Enabosi malitere igwu egwu maka Delaware Fightin 'Blue Hens na 2015–16 oge, ọ nwetara 89 PPG na 71 RPG n'afọ ọhụrụ ya
N'afọ nke abụọ ya, ọ nwetara 137 PPG na 100 RPG
N'afọ nke atọ ya, o nwetara 180PPG na 118 RPG
A kpọrọ ya onye egwuregwu Colonial Athletic Association (CAA) nke afọ maka oge 2017–18

Enabosi na-efu oge 2018-19 n'ihi mmerụ ahụ, ọ dọwara eriri akwara ya (ACL) ma merụọ ikpere ya ahụ n'oge nnwale ya na ndị otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na-akwadebe maka iko mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị FIBA 2018 na Spain

Enabosi maliteghachiri igwu egwu maka Delaware na oge 2019–20 dị ka nwa akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, a kpọrọ ya aha na CAA 2019 preseason All conference team ma a kpọrọ ya onye egwuregwu CCA nke izu ugboro abụọ
Isi IyiÀtụ Switcher
Nicole kwupụtara maka 2020 WNBA Draft mana agbanyeghị

N'afọ 2020, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Slovak MBK Ružomberok ma nyere ndị otu ahụ aka ijide 2021 Slovak Women's Basketball Extraliga O nwetara akara iri na isii, 75 rebounds na 16 na-enyere aka na oge mbụ ya na klọb ahụ
Nicole Notat, amụrụ na 26 Julaị 1947 na Châtrices, Marne, bụ onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu CFDT
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Vigeo ugbu a, ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye aka na echiche nke mmepe na-adịgide adịgide
Notat bụ onye otu Group of Reflection on the Future of Europe nke Felipe Gonzalez bụ onye isi oche ya ma bụrụ nke European Council guzobere
Ebumnuche nke otu ahụ bụ ịtụ aro na Kansụl Europe nke Machị 2010 atụmatụ ụzọ maka Europe na 2020-2030
Kemgbe afọ 2010, Notat jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Le Siècle, nwanyị mbụ mere ya
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ duziri otu ndị ọrụ na France

Nicole Oyeyemisi Payne (amụrụ na 18 Jenụwarị 2001) bụ onye Naijiria a mụrụ n'America nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu na onye na-agbachitere ndị otu kọleji West Virginia Mountaineers na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Naịjịria
A zụlitere Payne na Birmingham, Alabama
Payne gara Oak Mountain High School n'obodo ya na Mahadum West Virginia na Morgantown, West Virginia
Payne mere nke mbụ ya na Naịjịria na 10 Jụnịị 2021 dị ka onye nnọchi anya nkeji nke 90 na mmeri enyi na enyi na Jamaica
Payne bụ nwanne nwanyị nke ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ ibe ya bụ Toni Payne na Stephen Payne
Ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Toni agbaala bọọlụ n'otu egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị nke Naịjirịa
Nicole Ramalalanirina (amụrụ na 5 Machị, na afọ 1972 na Antananarivo, Madagascar) bụ onye France na-eme egwuregwu nke maara nke ọma na 100 mita hurdles
Ọ gbanwere mba ya site na obodo ya bụ Madagascar na afọ 1998
Oge kachasị mma ya na 100 mita bụ 1276 sekọnd, nke o nwetara na Nọvemba, na afo 2000 na La Chaux-de-Fonds
Nicole sonyere n'egwuregwu Olympic ugboro anọ, ugboro abụọ maka Madagascar(1992, 1996) na ugboro abụọ maka France(2000, 2004)
Ihe kacha mma ọ rụzuru n'egwuregwu Olimpik bụ ebe nke isii na 100m high hurdles na Sydney na afo 2000 na oge nke 1291
Nicole mechiri ọrụ ya site na mmeri nke French Indoor National 60m Hurdles championship na afọ 2004 na 2006
Nidhal Guiga (a mụrụ na 11 Machị 1975) bụ onye obodo Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede, na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Guiga nwere nzere doctorate na asụsụ ma malite ịkụzi na mahadum n'afọ 2002
N'afọ 2006, Guiga dere ma duzie egwuregwu Une heure et demie après moi, nke ụlọ ihe nkiri mba Tunisia mepụtara
N'afọ 2008, ọ duziri Selon Gagarine, nke ụlọ ihe nkiri mba Tunisia mepụtara
N'afọ 2012, Guiga bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya Mathilde B, nke e nyere onyinye Zoubeïda B'chir
N'afọ 2012, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ede akụkọ maka Radio Tunis Chaîne Internationale ma mee ihe nkiri redio Antigone na Rhinoceros
N'afọ 2013, o dere Pronto Gagarin, nke a họọrọ na ọrụ Contemporary Arab Dramaturgies
E gosipụtara egwuregwu ahụ na Festival d'Avignon n'afọ 2014
N'afọ 2014, Guiga dere ma duzie ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị dị mkpirikpi A Capella, nke gụnyere mkparịta ụka n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, Tristesse Avenue, ma bipụta ya n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2015, Guiga sụgharịrị La vie est un songe, egwuregwu nke onye na-ede egwuregwu na Spain bụ Pedro Calderón de la Barca, n'asụsụ Arabic nke Tunisia
N'afọ 2017, Guiga duziri ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Astra, nke gosipụtara na Dubai International Film Festival dịka akụkụ nke Muhr Short Competition
Ọ bụ Nomadis mepụtara ya, atụmatụ ya na-agba gburugburu Dali, nwoke na-elekọta nwa ya nwanyị Douja, onye nwere ọrịa Down, na njem ha na ogige ntụrụndụ Astra
Astra natara Bronze Tanit maka ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na Carthage Film Festival
E wepụtara ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi Silencio n'afọ 2020 ma na-enyocha nnọpụiche nke ọha na eze
Guiga bi na Tunis
Nieuwoudt ([ˈniʏʋˌʌut]) bụ aha nke nna ndi Afrikaans nke sitere na topographic
Ọ bụ nsụgharị gbanwere nke aha nna nke Dutch Nieuhout / Nieuwhout nke pụtara 'osisi ọhụrụ' (site na Dutch nieuw 'ọhụrụ' na hout 'osisi')
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere ndia
Nigbo bụ asụsụ ndi Plateau na-alaNaịjirịa
A na-asụ ya na nso Agameti n'okporo ụzọ Fadan Karshi-Wamba dị nso na Sanga LGA, Kaduna State
Asụsụ ahụ, nke edepụtara na Blench (2012) na (2019), anaghị akọ na Ethnologue ma ọ bụ Glottolog
O yikarịrị ka ọ bụ asụsụ Alumic dabere na ịdị nso ya na Akpondu, asụsụ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Alumu na Tesu
A na-asụkwa asụsụ ndị na-enweghị akwụkwọ nke ana-akpo Akpondu na Babur (Bəbər) n'obodo nta ndị dị nso nke Nigbo na Babur, n'otu n'otu
Niger bu obodo no na Afrịka
O no n'elu Naigeria na Benin
Isi oche Niger bu ebe ana-kpo Niamey

Naijiria (Naigeria, Naịjiria, Naijeria), ezigbo ogologo ahà ya bụ̀ Ọ̀hàn'ezènànchịkọ̀ Naijiria (Federal Republic of Nigeria nà bèkeè), bụ̀ òbòdò dị n'ime Eluàlà, Odi n'akuku odida anyanwu Afrika ana-akpo West Africa
Obu kwa obodo ndị Igbo, ma ndi Hausa na ndi Yoruba nakwa otutu ndi ozo di iche iche
Obodo a na-akpo Republic du Benin no na aka-ekpe Naijiria
Chad na Cameroon no kwa n'aka-nri ya
Na elu ya no obodo ana-kpo Niger
Okpuru ya ruru ebe mmiri a na-akpobu Bight of Biafra nke a gbanwere Gulf of Guinea di
Ebe ahu bukwa ebe mmiri ana-akpo Bight of Biafra di tupu a kpowa ya Bight of Bonny
Na 1991, ebugara isi obodo ya n' Abuja
Isi obodo ya dibu na Lagos nke di na ndida anyanwu (Western Nigeria)
Abuja buzi isi obodo no n'etiti Naijiria
Akuko mbido Naijiria hiri nne ma dikwa ogologo

Ihe egwuputara n'ala bu ihe na egosi ebe mmadu si, gosiri na mmadu bidoro biwe nebe a site na-afo mgbe ochie bu 9000 BC, Ebe Mmiri a na-akpo River Benue-Benue-Cross River bu ebe echere na ndi a na akpo ndi Bantu bi bu,Bantu/Bantu Migrants
Ndi a sitekwara ebea wee gbasaa rue n'Etiti Afrika central Africa nakwa ndida Afrika southern Africa n'igwe site na 1st millenium BC rue 2nd millenium AD
Nà Ọnwaàsatọ 1 nà afọ ǹkè 1960, ndị bèkeè tọhapụ rụalobodoah'a nọchìrì rùouafọ ǹke zuru ọgụ àtọ United Kingdom wee bia na ala ebe ha bidoro kpowa Naijiria, nyeghachiri ndi Naijiria ala ha
Naijiria ugbua nweziri ngalaba ochichi okpuru obodo di 36, 36 states nakwa Isi Obodo- bu Federal Capital Territory- Abuja
Naijiria nweghachikwara ochichi a na akpo Demokrasi Democracy n'afo 1999, mgbe ndi Soja Military chigoro afo iri na isii
Site n'afo 1966 rue 1999 ndi soja ala Naijiria bu ndi na achi Naijiri (ma oburu na ewepu ochichi Shehu Shagari, nke na eteghi aka, nke akporosecond repiblic 1979-1983)
Ndi Soja a na-eweghara ochichi n'ike
Ha chikwara site na coup d'etats/counter-coups site n'afo 1966-1979 na 1983-1998

Nigeria bụ otu n'ime ahịa na-eto ngwa ngwa n'ihi oke akụ na ụba ya, ego, nkwukọrịta, iwu na njem na nke abụọ kachasị oke mgbanwe na Nigeria
Nigeria na 2007 bu 37th n’uwa n’uwa tinye na ntinye ego
Dika ngalaba Economic Intelligence Unit na World Bank siri kwuo, akuko mkpuru ego ndi Naijiria n’otu n’uba abiala site na $ 1707 kwa na 2005 rue $ 2926 na 2007
Onu ogugu n’uzo n’aho otu onye si na $ 692 puta na 2006 ruru $ 1,754 kwa onye na 2007
N’oge nrịba mmanụ nke afọ ndị 1970, Naịjirịa chịkọbara nnukwu ụgwọ iji kwado mgbake akụ na ụba, mana ka ọnụ ahịa mmanụ dara na 1980s, ọ na-esiri Naijiria ike ịkwụghachi ụgwọ ya, na-ebute nsogbu ụgwọ
mgbazinye ego
Ka ha na gọọmentị Naịjirịa kwurịtara okwu, n'ọnwa Ọktọba 2005 Naịjirịa na ndị Paris Club kwekọrịtara na Naịjirịa nwere ike ịkwụghachi ụgwọ ya na mbelata 60%
Naịjirịa jiri uru sitere na mmanụ ala kwụọ 40% fọdụrụnụ, na-ahapụ otu ijeri $ 115 kwa afọ iji nọrọ nso
Nigeria ghọrọ mba Africa mbụ kwụrụ ụgwọ ya ($ 30,000) na Paris Club na Eprel 2006
Akụ na ụba
Nigeria bụ mba 8th nke kacha emepụta mmanụ, na nke iri kachasị nwee mmanụ
Nigeria bụ onye otu OPEC
Mmanụ ala na-ekere òkè dị ukwuu na akụnụba Naijiria na-aza 40% nke Gross Domestic Product (GIO) na 80% nke mmefu gọọmentị
Naịjirịa bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na-eto ngwa ngwa n'ụwa niile, yana ụlọ ọrụ telecom dịka MTN, Etisalat, Zain na Globacom nwere ụlọ ọrụ kachasị ukwuu na kachasị na Nigeria
Naịjirịa nwere ngalaba ego mepụtara nke ọma, ya na ngwakọta ụlọ akụ na nke mba ofesi, ụlọ ọrụ ala na ụlọ, ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ala, ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa, ụlọ ọrụ nha na ụlọ akụ
Naịjirịa nwekwara ọtụtụ mineral ndị anaghị ekpocha ọkụ dịka gas, kol, bauxite, tantalite, ọla edo, poselin, iron ore, limestone, niobiomu, juice, and zinc
Ọ bụ ezie na akụnụba ụlọ a hiri nne, ọ nweghị ndị ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta akụ̀ iji wepụta ha
Ọrụ ugbo bụ isi iyi nke mgbanwe mba ofesi maka Nigeria
N’otu oge, Naịjirịa bụ mba kacha wee buru ọka, ahịhịa na mmanụ nkwụ na onye na-ebubata aki oyibo, oroma, ọka, ọka, sorghum, tubers na okpete
Ihe ruru pacenti iri isii n’ime ndị Naịjirịa na-arụ ọrụ ugbo, ma nwe ala dị ole na ole mana ọ nweghị
Naịjirịa nwere ụlọ ọrụ akwa na akwa akwa na Kano, Abeokuta, Onitsha na Lagos
Companieslọ ọrụ ụgbọ ala dịka Peugeot si France na Bedford si Britain nke bụzị akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ ala America, General Motors, t-shirt dị egwu, plastik na nri mkpọ

Nigeria bụ or Mba Afrika kacha nwee onu ogugu n'agbanyeghi na amaghi onu ogugu
Nationstù Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu kwuru na n’afọ 2009 ndị bi na ya bụ 154,729,000, nke 517% lụrụ di na nwunye ma 483% biri n'obodo mepere emepe na mmadụ nde 1675 nọ na mpaghara kilomita abụọ
Naịjirịa bụ mba asatọ ji ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ kacha elu n’ụwa niile
Atụmatụ na 2006 kwuru na ọnụọgụ ndị mmadụ 0-14 bụ 423%, na n'etiti afọ 15-65 bụ 546%
Onu ogugu omumu di elu karie onu ogugu ndi mmadu, na 404 na 169 na 1,000 mmadu obula
Nigeria nwere ihe dika agbụrụ 250 nwere asụsụ na ọdịbendị dịgasị iche
Ndi agbụrụ kacha ibu bụ Hausa / Fulani, Yoruba na Igbo nwere 68% nke ngụkọta ebe Edo, Ijaw, Kanuri, Ibibio, Ebira, Nupe na Tiv nwere 27% ebe ndị fọdụrụnụ bụ 7%

Nigeria Airways Ltd, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Nigeria Airways, bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu Naijiria
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na afọ 1958 mgbe agbasachara West African Airways Corporation (WAAC)
Ọ nwere aha West African Airways Corporation Nigeria (WAAC Nigeria) ruo 1971, mgbe a gbanwere aha ya na aha ọ nwere ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ na 2003
Gọọmentị Naịjirịa nwere ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ahụ (51%) ruo 1961, mgbe ọ mụbara òkè ya na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruo 100% ma mee ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ mba ahụ
N'oge nkewa, isi ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ dị na Airways House na Abuja

Ọrụ na-elekwasị anya na Murtala Muhammed International Airport ma na-eje ozi ma n'ime ụlọ ma na mba ụwa na-elekwasịrị anya na Odida anyanwu Afrika; netwọk ahụ nwekwara isi na Europe, North America na Saudi Arabia
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mba ọzọ na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ahụ, gụnyere British Airways, KLM na South African Airways
Nigeria Airways nwere ọganihu ya na mbido afọ 1980, obere oge tupu ọpụpụ nke otu KLM nke e goro ọrụ iji mee ka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ahụ rụọ ọrụ nke ọma ma baa uru
N'oge ahụ, ụgbọ mmiri ya nwere ihe dị ka ụgbọelu 30, mana ụgbọelu ahụ nọ afọ abụọ n'azụ na akaụntụ ya ruo n'ókè nke na a nwetara ụgbọelu maka ego

N'ịbụ onye nwe ma ọ bụ gbazite, ụgbọelu ahụ na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ elu dịgasị iche iche n'oge akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, gụnyere Vickers VC10, Airbus A310, Boeing 737 na 747 na McDonnell Douglas DC-10, nke ọ na-efe efe nke ikpeazụ e wuru

N'ịbụ ndị nlekọta na-ezighị ezi, nrụrụ aka, na ndị ọrụ karịrị akarị, n'oge mmechi ụgbọelu ahụ nwere ụgwọ ruru US $ 528,000,000 (nke ya na $ 777,768,452 na 2021), ndekọ nchekwa na-adịghị mma, na ndị na-arụ ọrụ ya nwere otu ụgbọelu na-efe n'ime ụlọ yana ụgbọelu abụọ a gbazitere na-arụkọ ọrụ na netwọk mba ụwa
Virgin Nigeria nọchiri anya Nigeria Airways, Arik Air weghara ụlọ ọrụ ala

Ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ malitere na August 23, 1958 (1958-08-23) () 51 n'okpuru aha West African Airways Corporation Nigeria Limited (WAAC Nigeria), nke a makwara dị ka Nigerian Airways, iji nọchie West African Airways Company (WAAC); aha 'WAAC' ka e jidere n'ihi ùgwù ụlọ ọrụ a nwetara na mbụ

Na mbido, onye na-ebu ụgbọelu ahụ bụ ụlọ ọrụ atọ nke gọọmentị Naijiria bụ onye isi na-ekere òkè (51%), na Elder Dempster Lines na British Overseas Airways Corporation (BOAC) nwere nkwụsi ike (32 2⁄3 na 16 1⁄3, n'otu n'otu) 51 WAAC Nigeria ketara ụfọdụ ụgbọelu nke WAAC nwere na mbụ

Boeing 377 Stratocruiser na-arụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ na-ejikọta London Heathrow na United United United United DAC Airways na WA3 ụgbọ elu, na United United Britain na WA3 na United United Kingdom, na WA3 Nkwekọrịta ahụ tụkwara anya na a ga-arụ ọrụ ụzọ ndị a na nkwekọrịta ọdọ mmiri, ebe otu ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu nwere ike inye tiketi maka ụgbọ elu nke ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ, na-ekerịta ego
N'April (), ụgbọ mmiri ahụ nwere otu de Havilland Dove, asatọ de Havillland Herons na asatọ Douglas DC-3s
Na mbido 1961, Naijiria ghọrọ naanị onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site n'ịzụta òkè nke BOAC na Elder Dempster; ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ahụ ghọrọ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ nke mba ahụ
E wepụrụ ụgbọ mmiri Heron niile n'ọrụ na Machị, na afọ 1961 ka ọ gosipụtara na ọ gaghị ekwe omume n'ụzọ akụ na ụba
N'ịbụ ndị e mere iji dochie ụgbọ mmiri DC-3, e nyere iwu ise Fokker Friendship 200s na ngwụcha afọ ahụ, yana nhọrọ a na-ewere na abụọ ọzọ
BOAC Comet 4 meghere ọrụ jet n'etiti Nigeria na London na 1 (); a na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ahụ na Nigeria Airways
Ndị enyi sonyeere ụgbọ mmiri ahụ n'etiti Jenụwarị na Mee 1963, ma tinye ha n'okporo ụzọ mpaghara, gụnyere ndị na-eje ozi Abidjan, Accra, Bathurst, Dakar, Freetown na Robertsfield
E dezigharịrị nkwekọrịta ahụ na BOAC ma bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ n'April nke otu afọ ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Juun, ndị enyi amalitela iji dochie DC-3s n'okporo ụzọ ndị na-aga Gambia, Ghana, Ivory Coast, Liberia, Senegal, Sierra Leone, na Leopoldville
Otú ọ dị, a ga-anọgide na-etinye ụdị ahụ na ọrụ ndị njem na ụzọ ụgbọ mmiri Lagos-Kano

BOAC mechara rụọ ọrụ Vickers VC-10 maka Nigeria Airways site na Eprel 1964 ruo mgbe e nwetara ụgbọ elu nke ụdị ahụ n'aka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu steeti Britain n'ọnwa October 1969 (1969-10) (); ụgbọelu ahụ mebiri n'ihe mberede na Nọvemba n'afọ ahụ
A malitere njikọ ikuku mbụ n'etiti Naịjirịa na United States na mbido October 1964 (1964-10) ()

A na-akpọ ya 'Operation Fantastic', ọ jikọtara Lagos na New York ma Pan Am na-eji Boeing 707s na Douglas DC-8s, mana nkwekọrịta dị n'etiti mba abụọ ahụ nyere Nigeria Airways ohere ire oche ole na ole na ụgbọ elu ndị a
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọrụ bụ 2,191 na March 1970 (1970-03) ()

N'oge a, ụgbọ mmiri ahụ nwere otu Piper Aztec, otu Douglas DC-3 na isii Fokker F27s na-arụ ọrụ na netwọk ụlọ na ụzọ mpaghara nke gbatịrị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, ruo Dakar, na-arụkọ ọrụ na nkwekọrịta ọdọ mmiri na Ghana Airways; ndepụta Europe nke ebe gụnyere Frankfurt, London, Madrid na Rome, ha niile na-eje ozi na VC10s nke BOAC

Na 22 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1971, a gbanwere aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Nigeria Airways 51 N'oge a, ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ jiri ịgbazite ụgbọelu dị ka ihe a na-emekarị Boeing 707s nke na-efe n'okporo ụzọ Lagos na-agbazite site na Laker Airways na Ethiopian Airlines ruo mgbe e tinyere Boeing 707-320C ọhụrụ n'ime ụgbọ mmiri ahụ ma tinye ya n'okporong ahụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1971, na Ọktoba n'afọ 1971 ka e nyere Boeing 737 737 site na Aer Lingus
E nyere iwu ọzọ 707-320 C na 1972, tinyere Boeing 737-200s abụọ
A gbazitere Boeing 707 site na Aer Lingus n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1972 maka itinye ya n'ọrụ karịsịa n'okporo ụzọ Lagos, yana inye ndị ọrụ na mmezi
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1972, a gbazitere Fokker F28 n'ụgbọ mmiri ahụ na nkwekọrịta ịgbazite ya na Fokker, ma mesịa nye iwu n'ụba nke ụdị a

Na ngwụcha afọ 1972, a bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta maka enyemaka njikwa na Trans World Airlines, na ụgbọelu America na-enye ndị ọkachamara na ngalaba njikwa, azụmahịa, na ego dị iche iche ruo afọ ise, mana ọ dịghị mgbe nkwekọrịta ahụ emere
Nigeria Airways natara Boeing 707 atọ na Febụwarị 1973; a na-etinye ha n'ọrụ na LagosęLondon ozugbo
E butere Boeing 737 abụọ, nke nwere ndebanye aha 5N-ANC na 5N-AND, na mbido afọ 1970
Na March 1975 (1975-03) () ndị ọrụ dị 2,400 siri ike na ụgbọ mmiri ahụ nwere Boeing 707-320C abụọ, Boeing 737-200 abụọ, Fokker F28 atọ, Fokner F27 ise, na otu Piper Aztec, ebe ise F28-2000s dị na iwu

Usoro netwọk n'oge a gụnyere ebe ndị dị n'ime obodo na-eje ozi site na Kano na Lagos, na ụzọ mba ụwa gaa Abidjan, Amsterdam, Accra, Bathurst, Beirut, Brussels, Dakar, Douala, Frankfurt, Freetown, London, Madrid, Monrovia, New York, Paris na Rome
N'ọnwa October 1976 (1976-10) (), ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ onye ahịa nke 83 maka Boeing 727, mgbe e nyere iwu maka Boeing 727-200s abụọ na Boeing 707-320C ọzọ; ọ nwetakwara Douglas DC-10-30
DC-10 a bụ ụgbọ elu nwere oche 300, nke na-arụ ọrụ n'etiti Naịjirịa na Saudi Arabia
N'oge a, ụgbọelu ahụ nwere 707s abụọ ọzọ
E nyere DC-10-30 nke abụọ iwu na mbido afọ 1977

Na 25 Eprel, na afọ 1977 otu F-27, 5N-AAW, nwere ihe mberede na Sokoto mgbe ọ gafere n'okporo ụzọ ụgbọ elu, na 1 Machị na afọ 1978 otu F-28 (5N-ANA) nwere ihe mberedo na nso Kano, na-egbu mmadụ 16 niile nọ n'ụgbọelu ahụ tinyere mmadụ abụọ ọzọ n'ala
E nyere iwu maka F28-4000s abụọ, nke ga-agbakwunye F28-2000s isii ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ nwere na njedebe 1978
A bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta yiri nke ya na TWA bịanyere aha na afọ 1972 na KLM na September 1979 (1979-09) (), oge a maka afọ abụọ
Ebumnuche ya bụ ịzụ ndị ọrụ Nigeria Airways na njikwa ụgbọ elu iji mee ka ụgbọ elu ahụ rụọ ọrụ nke ọma ma baa uru
A malitere ọrụ na Jeddah na afọ 1980

Ka ọ na-erule July 1980 (1980-07) (), ụgbọ mmiri ahụ nwere ụgbọ elu 26, kewara n'ime Boeing 707-320C atọ, Boeing 727-200 abụọ, Boeing 737-200 abụọ, DC-10-30 abụọ, F27-200 abụọ، F27-400Ms abụọ, F 27-600 anọ, F28-2000s isii, F28-4000s abụọ, na otu Aztec
A zụrụ DC-10 abụọ maka ego
Nigeria Airways ghọrọ onye ahịa nke iri anọ nke Airbus na afọ 1981, mgbe ọ nyere iwu maka Airbus A310-200 anọ
E nyere iwu Boeing 737-200 ọhụrụ anọ na mbido afọ 1981 maka US $ 65,000,000 (nke ya na $ 193,739,019 na 2021) gụnyere akụkụ ndị ọzọ, na ngwụcha afọ ahụ, e nyere iwu maka ụgbọ elu anọ ọzọ nke ụdị ahụ

N'afọ 1982, a gbazitere Boeing 747s site na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu Danish Scanair na SAS; e zigara ụgbọelu ahụ na ọrụ na United Kingdom, na-enye ohere iji DC-10 mee ihe na ụzọ ọhụrụ na Frankfurt, Paris, na Zurich

Ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ nwetara Boeing 737-200 ọhụrụ anọ na mbido afọ 1983 nke ga-anọchi ụgbọ elu a gbazitere n'otu ụdị ahụ; e nwetara ha na mgbazinye ego nke US $ 70 nde nke a haziri na nnukwu ụlọ akụ asaa
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1983, otu Fokker F28 (5N-ANF) dara mgbe ọ na-eru nso Enugu, na-azọrọ ndụ mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ n'ime mmadụ iri asaa na abụọ nọ n'ụgbọ ahụ
Mgbe ihe mberede a gasịrị, ụgbọelu ahụ kpebiri iwepụ ụgbọ mmiri Fokker ya n'ọrụ
Mgbagha ọchịchị nke ndị agha mere n'ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke afọ 1983 gbanwere usoro nke gọọmentị na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu A họpụtara Bernard Banfa dịka onye isi nchịkwa ma chụpụ ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọrụ KLM zụrụ
A na-etinye A310-200s nwere oche 225 n'ime ụgbọ mmiri na ngwụcha afọ 1984 na mmalite afọ 1985
Atọ n'ime ụgbọelu ndị a bu aha Rima River, River Ethiope na Lekki Peninsula

Ụgbọ mmiri ahụ dị 22 siri ike na March 1985 (1985-03) (), nke gụnyere DC-10-30s abụọ, Airbus A310s anọ, Boeing 707-320Cs atọ, Boeing 727-200s abụọ, Boeing 737-200s iri, na otu Boeing 737-200C; Boeing 737-200 abụọ dị na iwu na ụgbọelu ahụ nwere ndị ọrụ 9,096 n'oge a
Iwebata iwu nke International Monetary Fund, tinyere nrụrụ aka, nchịkwa na-ezighị ezi na ndị ọrụ karịrị akarị, dugara na mbelata nke Nigeria Airways site na afọ 1980 há
Ụgbọelu ahụ enwetala nnukwu ụgwọ nke karịrị ego ọ na-enweta site n'etiti afọ 1980, ruo n'ókè nke na e jidere ụgbọelu ma ọ bụ jide ya maka ụgwọ a na-akwụghị ụgwọ

International Air Transport Association (IATA) kwụsịtụrụ Nigeria Airways na mbido afọ 1987 site n'ụlọ nkwụsị (nke pụtara na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ahụ enweghị ike ịnye tiketi iji fe na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ so na IATA na mkparịta ụka) maka ụgwọ US $ 1,100,000
Na ngwụcha afọ 1987, ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ ji ụgwọ maka ihe dịka US $ 250,000,000, yana ego US $ 5,000,000 kwa ọnwa na mmefu nke ihe dịka US US $ 5,175,000 kwa ọnwa
Ọnọdụ a kpaliri ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ahụ ịbawanye ụgwọ ụgbọ elu ya na nke mba ụwa site na 100% na 20%, iji nweta ego iji belata ụkọ ahụ, mana usoro a belatara ndị njem

Ọ bụ ezie na e belatara ọrụ 1,000 na ngwụcha afọ 1986 na 1,700 n'ime afọ gara aga, Naịjirịa nyere ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ahụ iwu ka ọ belata (ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọrụ bụ 8,500 n'oge ahụ 500 maka ụgbọ elu ọ bụla dị n'ụgbọ mmiri ahụ, okpukpu abụọ nke nke nkezi mba ụwa) na ibelata ma ọ bụ kwụsị ụzọ ndị na-abaghị uru

N'afọ 1988, usoro mbelata ego mere ka a kwụsị ụgbọ elu gaa n'ọtụtụ ebe Afrịka, gụnyere Cotonou, Dakar, Douala, Kinshasa, Monrovia na Nairobi, yana ịnyefe ụfọdụ ụzọ na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu Okada Air; ụfọdụ n'ime ụzọ ndị a maliteghachiri otu afọ ka e mesịrị
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1988, ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ chụpụrụ ndị ọrụ 3,000, otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ndị ọrụ, na mgbalị iji mee ka ọrụ na-aga n'ihu
Na ngwụcha afọ 1980, ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ tụfuru nkwụnye ego ruru US $ 350,000 maka ịghara ịkwado iwu maka ATR-42s isii
Ụlọ ọrụ na-akwụ ụgwọ na Japan kwadoro ya, ụgbọelu ahụ kwụsịrị na DC-10 ikpeazụ e wuru; e nyere ụgbọelu ahụ na afọ 1989, ma dochie ụgbọelu nke otu ụdị ahụ furu efu n'ihe mberede afọ abụọ tupu mgbe ahụ
Site na ịkwụ ụgwọ nke 6,632 na Machị, na afọ 1990, ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ nwere ụgbọelu Airbus A310-200s atọ, Boeing 707-320Cs atọ, ụgbọelu Boeing 737-200s asatọ na DC-10-30s abụọ

A na-arụ ọrụ nnukwu netwọk ụlọ na-ejere steeti 19 nke Naijiria ozi, yana ụzọ ndị na-aga n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na West Afrika; ụgbọ elu ndị si Lagos gaa Amsterdam, Jeddah, London, New York na Rome, site na Kano gaa Amsterdam, Jedi, London na Rome, na site na Port Harcourt gaa London
Onye na-ebu ụgbọelu ahụ nwere nnukwu ihe mberede na 11 Julaị, na afọ 1991, mgbe mmadụ 261 niile nọ n'ụgbọ Douglas DC-8-61, ndebanye aha C-GMXQ, dara na nso Jeddah
N'afọ 1992, Nigeria Airways nwere Boeing 707 atọ e jidere na Europe, ọnụ ọgụgụ ụgbọ elu ahụ belatara 32% mgbe nkwụsị nke ọrụ na Conakry, Freetown na Robertsfield (Monrovia) kwụsịrị
A tụlere Privatisation na afọ 1993 site na atụmatụ nkewa Nigeria Airways na ụlọ ọrụ abụọ, otu na-ebu otu ụzọ na-arụ ọrụ ọhụrụ, nke a kpọrọ Nigeria Air nke ga-arụ ọrụ mba
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1994, e jidere ụgbọelu Airbus na ọdụ ụgbọ elu London Heathrow n'ihi ụgwọ ruru £ 100,000
Na 21 Disemba nke otu afọ ahụ, Boeing 707, ndebanye aha 5N-ABK, kụrụ na nso Hadejia n'ụgbọelu na-ebu ibu site na Jeddah, na-egbu atọ n'ime ndị ọrụ ise
Mbelata ndị ọrụ ọzọ gara n'ihu na ọkara mbụ nke afọ 1990, na Septemba 1995 ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ nwere ndị ọrụ 4,500
N'afọ 1997, UK Civil Aviation Authority mechiri ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ ịrụ ọrụ n'ókèala ya na-ekwu maka nchegbu nchekwa; na nzaghachi, gọmentị Naịjirịa mechiri British Airways ịrụ ọrụ na mba ahụ

E weghachiri ọrụ ahụ na afọ 1998 mgbe onye na-ebu ụgbọelu ahụ malitere ịkekọrịta koodu na British Airways, na-etinye Boeng 747-200 a gbazitere nke na-eyi uwe Nigeria Airways ma na-arụ ọrụ na ụzọ Lagos, London Heathrow na ndị ọrụ Bekee na Naijiria

Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ 1990, gọmentị Naijiria kpebiri na a ga-eme ka onye na-ebu ya bụrụ nke onwe ya site na ire 40% na 20% nye ndị mba ọzọ na ndị na-etinye ego n'ógbè ahụ, n'otu n'otu, ma debe òkè ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1999, gọọmentị Naijiria nyere International Finance Corporation (IFC) ọrụ iji nyere aka n'usoro nhazi na nkeonwe nke ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ahụ
N'etiti nhọrọ atọ, otu n'ime ha bụ iso nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu Europe; Air France, British Airways, Lufthansa, Swissair na Virgin Atlantic ka a tụlere
Nhọrọ ọzọ bụ iwepụ onye na-ebu ya
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2000, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọrụ ahụ bụ 4,516

N'oge a, otu Airbus A310-200, atọ Boeing 737-200 Advanced, otu Boeing 747-200B Combi na otu McDonnell Douglas DC-10-30 jere ozi na netwọk ụzọ nke gụnyere Abuja, Calabar, Douala, Dubai, Jeddah, Jos, Kaduna, Kano, Kinshasa, Lagos, Libreville, London, Maiduguri, Malabo, Port Harcourt, Sokoto na Yola
Ụgbọelu nke nwere ụgbọelu 32 na afo 1984[nb 2] jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ belata naanị ụgbọelu atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2000
United Kingdom kwuru nchegbu nchekwa ọzọ na afọ 2001 mgbe ọ jụrụ ikwe ka Nigeria Airways rụọ ọrụ n'ụzọ Lagos London, n'oge a gbasara Boeing 747 nke e goro site na Air Djibouti iji felie ụzọ ahụ
N'afọ ahụ, IFC si n'ọnọdụ ndụmọdụ ya pụọ na-ekwu na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na gọmentị achọghị ime ihe ndị dị mkpa ga-eme ka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ahụ na-adọrọ mmasị ndị nwere ike itinye ego

Ka oge na-aga, e nwere ebubo dị iche iche na-azọrọ na ndị ọchịchị Naijiria gara aga bụ ndị na-apụnara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ihe ma na-ejighị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mee ihe ngwa ngwa, ruo n'ókè nke na gọmentị malitere nyocha banyere ihe karịrị US $ 400 nde na-efu n'etiti afọ 1983 na afọ 1999

Emere na Febụwarị, na afọ 2001, njikọ aka n'etiti Nigeria Airways na South African Airways nke na-adabere na ụzọ Johannesburg na New York kwụsịrị site na ụgbọ njem South Africa na Machị, na afọ 2002 na-ekwu maka mbelata nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị njem na ụkọ nke US $ 4,900,000
Na Mee, na afọ 2003, mgbe Nigeria Airways nwere Boeing 737-200 dị ka naanị ụgbọ elu ya na-arụ ọrụ, gọmentị kpebiri ịghara ịdọrọ ego ọzọ n'ime ụgbọelu ahụ jupụtara kama iji kpochapụ ya
Mkpebi ahụ dabeere na arụmọrụ na-ebelata nke afọ 15 ikpeazụ nke ọrụ ụgbọelu na ụgwọ ụgbọelu ahụ
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị njem e buuru adala site na nde 21 na afọ 1985 ruo naanị 10,000 na nkeji iri na ise nke mbụ nke afọ 2003, ọ na-achịkwa naanị 6% na 1% nke ahịa ụlọ na nke mba ụwa, n'otu n'otu
Onye na-ebu ya ji ihe karịrị US $ 528 nde, n'agbanyeghị na gọmentị etinyela US $ 200 nde n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ime afọ iri gara aga nke ọrụ ya
Ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ kwụsịrị ọrụ na afọ 2003 ma kpochapụ ya otu afọ ka e mesịrị
Gọmentị Naịjirịa mechara soro Virgin Atlantic nwee nkwekọrịta iji chọta Virgin Nigeria, nke e bu n'uche ka ọ nọchie ya
Ọ bụ ezie na Virgin Nigeria nọchiri Nigeria Airways, ụlọ ọrụ ala nke Nigeria Airways a fụchiri emecha bụrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Arik Air na-amalite n'oge ahụ weghara
Nigeria Airways nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Airways House na Abuja n'oge nkewa 50 A kwapụrụ ya na Murtala Muhammed Airport n'etiti afọ 1999 na afọ 2000
Ihe ngosi ụgbọelu ahụ nwere ọkọlọtọ Naijiria nke nwere enyí na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ aha ya bụ Skypower n'etiti ya
N'oge mmechi, netwọk Nigeria Airways nwere ebe anọ dị n'ime ụlọ, ya bụ Abuja, Kano, Lagos na Port Harcourt
Netwọk mba ụwa nwere ụzọ ise, gaa Abidjan, Dubai, Jeddah, London na New York 51
Ụdị ụgbọ elu ndị a bụ nke Nigeria Airways na-arụ ọrụ n'oge akụkọ ihe mere eme ya
Aviation Safety Network dekọrọ ihe omume 16 maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ, asatọ n'ime ha kpatara ọnwụ
Ihe mberede kachasị njọ nke ụgbọelu ahụ mere na 11 Julaị, na afọ 1991, mgbe mmadụ 261 nwụrụ n'ihe mberede na King Abdulaziz International Airport
Ndepụta na-esonụ gụnyere ihe omume ndị kọrọ na ha nwụrụ, e nwere mkpuchi ụgbọelu ahụ, ma ọ bụ ha abụọ
Nigeria Cricket Federation (NCF) bụ òtù na-achịkwa egwuregwu cricket na Naịjirịa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya ugbu a dị na Lagos Steeti
NCF bụ onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na International Cricket Council (ICC) ma bụrụkwa onye otu ahụ kemgbe afọ 2002
Naịjirịa bụbu akụkụ nke West Africa Cricket Council, nke bụ onye otu ICC n'onwe ya
NCF bụkwa onye otu African Cricket Association
Na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, ndị nchịkwa nke ndị Britain bu ụzọ webata ma mee ka egwuregwu cricket na Naijiria bụrụ ihe a ma ama
E guzobere Nigeria Cricket Association (ndị mba ọzọ) na Nigeria Cricket League (ndị obodo) na 1932 na 1933 n'otu n'otu
N'afọ 1951, e meghere otu ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa jikọrọ aka na Lagos Steeti na njikọ ọ bụla na-ejigide njirimara ya
Afọ isii ka e mesịrị, n'afọ 1957, ndị mba ọzọ na ndị obodo ahụ jikọtara ọnụ iji guzobe Nigeria Cricket Association (NCA)
A gbanwere aha a ka ọ bụrụ Nigeria Cricket Federation (NCF) n'afọ 2006
N'afọ ndị 1960 NCF sonyere n'otu mmegharị, nke dugara n'ịmepụta otu mpaghara cricket, West Africa Cricket Federation (WACF), nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Naijiria
Ka e mesịrị, na 1976, WACF ghọrọ West Africa Cricket Conference (WACC)
E nyere Naịjirịa Associate Membership nke ICC n'afọ 2002
Netng (Nigerian Entertainment Today) makwaara dị ka NET ma ọ bụ The NETng bụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ntụrụndụ dị n'ịntanetị nke dabeere na Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ bụ isi mmalite nke akụkọ ntụrụndụ, ejiji na ụdị ndụ Africa
Netng hibere akụkụ nke NET Newspaper Limited (NNL) ruo 2019 mgbe ID Africa nwetara ya
Netgn bụ onye nhazi NECLive (Nigerian Entertainment Conference) na NET Honors
A maara Netng maka ịgbasa na ịkọ akụkọ ntụrụndụ pụrụ iche
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Netng bụ ihe mbụ kwusara akụkọ gbasara ọmụmụ ụmụaka Wizkid na Ice Prince
Na 2012, Netng kọrọ mkparịta ụka pụrụ iche banyere D'Banj na London na-enye nghọta zuru oke banyere ihe butere nkewa na-etiti Don Jazzy na D'banj (ndị na-arụkọ bu ọrụ na Mo' Hits Records )
Nigeria ICT Fest (NIF) bụ atụmatụ iji weta mmepe akụ na ụba na Naijiria site na iji teknụzụ ozi na nkwukọrịta (ICT)
Ebumnuche nke ihe omume ahụ bụ inyere Naịjirịa aka ijikọ ya na teknụzụ na-apụta
Nigeria ICT Fest na-eje ozi dị ka ikpo okwu maka atụmatụ ICT na Naijiria ma na-enye ohere maka netwọk gafee ókèala
Dị ka otu isiokwu dị na ụlọ ọrụ maka ụkpụrụ omume na ebe weebụsaịtị teknụzụ na-apụta, e mere mbipụta mbụ nke Nigeria ICT Fest na Disemba 2015 na Victoria Island, Lagos
Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị dị ka Aubrey de Grey, James Hughes, Ben Goertzel na Natasha Vita-More kwuru okwu n'ebe dị anya (site na Skype) na ihe omume ahụ
Aubrey de Grey kwuru okwu banyere Rejuvenation Biotechnology Ịgba nká na ọgwụ regenerative

Micah Redding kwuru okwu n'ụbọchị mbụ, Disemba 4 n'isiokwu a 'Christianity, Emerging Technologies, and the Christianity, Emerging Technologies, and the developing world — Nigeria's role in humanity's future' Ọ gbaghaara echiche ahụ na Ndị Kraịst ekwesịghị itinye aka na ọha mmadụ, ma dọọ aka na chọọchị kwesịrị iji teknụzụ mee ihe
Mira Kwak, onye na-eme nchọpụta na ọgụgụ isi Artificial si Seoul Korea kwuru n'ụbọchị nke 2, Disemba 5, 2015 banyere otu esi abụ mba na-eduga site na ICT
Ọ kwuru banyere ọdịbendị na otu esi egosipụta ọdịbendị Naijiria n'ụzọ dị mma nye ndị mba ụwa

Dị ka Ana Frunza, onye nchọpụta na LUMEN Research Center na Social & Humanistic Sciences, LUMEN research Center na Social and Humanistic Sciences kwupụtara mmekọrịta ha na Mascot Information and Technology Solutions (MITS), Nigeria, onye nhazi nke Nigeria ICT Fest 2015 na Nọvemba 30, 2015
Na mmekorita a, LUMEN Research Center na-akwado mbipụta nke akwụkwọ ndị na-aga n'ihu sitere na ihe omume sayensị Nigeria ICT Fest 2015
Ewepụtara ndị ọrụ mbata na ọpụpụ Naijiria (Nigeria Immigration Service) (NIS) na ndị uwe ojii Naijiria (NP) n'ọnwa Ọgọst, n'afọ 1958
N'oge ahụ ka a na-akpọ ya Ngalaba Immigrashọn ma nwee onyeisi a kpọrọ Chief Federal Immigration Officer (CFIO)

E hiwere ngalaba mbata na ọpụpụ site n'aka Act of Parliament (Cap 171, Laws of the Federation of Nigeria) n'ụbọchị mbụ nke ọnwa Ọgọst, n'afọ 1963 mgbe Alhaji Shehu Shagari bụ onye minista na-ahụ maka ihe dị n'ime (ọnọdụ a na-akpọzi Minista nke ime obodo)
Iwu mbụ na-achịkwa ọrụ mbata na ọpụpụ bụ Iwu mbata na ọpụpụ nke afọ 1963 nke emeziri n'afọ 2014 na ọzọ n'afọ 2015 (Iwu mbata na ọpụpụ, 2015)
E mezigharịrị ọrụ ahụ site n'afọ 1963 iji jikwaa mbugharị ọgbara ọhụrụ n'ụzọ kwekọrọ n'usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị zuru ụwa ọnụ, mpaghara na okpuru ọchịchị
NIS etinyela aka n'iji Ozi na Teknụzụ Nkwukọrịta ozi n'ọrụ ya gụnyere
Dị ka ngalaba nke abụọ nke Iwu mbata na ọpụpụ, 2015 nyere ikike, ọrụ ahụ na-ahụ maka
Ndị ọrụ mbata na ọpụpụ Naịjirịa nọ n'okpuru nduzi ndị a site na mmalite
Nigeria Info bụ netwọk nke ụlọ ọrụ redio na-ekwu okwu na Naịjirịa, na-agbasa ozi na 993 MHz na Lagos, 951 MHz na Abuja, na 923 MHz na Port Harcourt
N'ịbụ nke Info FM Nigeria Limited, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-agbasa akụkọ obodo na nke mba ụwa na ngwakọta nke okwu na egwuregwu, ka ọ na-ekwu maka ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a na nsogbu ndị dị na Naịjirịa
Nigeria Info malitere na Lagos n'afọ 2011 na Abuja na 30 Nọvemba afọ 2012
N'oge gara aga, netwọk ahụ gosipụtara ihe ngosi awa ise n'ụbọchị izu nke Adenike Oyetunde kwadoro
N'afọ 2021, ụlọ ọrụ Abuja, nke Femi D Amele na-elekọta, natara onyinye Press Freedom Award site na Nigeria Union of Journalists
N'afọ 2020, National Broadcasting Commission kwụrụ ụlọ ọrụ Nigeria Info's Lagos ụgwọ nde naira ise maka nkwupụta e mere n'otu n'ime mmemme ya nke a weere na ọ bụ okwu ịkpọasị
The Nigeria Internet Registration Association (NIRA) na-elekọta ngalaba dị elu nke koodu mba Naịjirịa,ng
Ndebanye aha nke aha ngalaba na-ahụ maka ndị na-edeba aha NIRA
Ọ na-eji ihe nlereanya Registry Cor Cor Corner Registrant na-arụ ọrụ na ijikwa ngalaba dị elu
Na mbụ, ọ bụ otu nzukọ nke ndị na-etinye aka na-eduzi, ndị na-emetụta ya nọ n'ime ndị na-ahụ maka Intanet nke Naịjirịa guzobere Njikọ Ndebanye aha Ịntanetị

E mechara nyefee ya na njikwa ugbu a ka ọ ghọrọ ihe dị mkpa maka akụ mba ka ụlọ ọrụ gọmentị na-ahazi, National Information Technology Development Agency na-ahụ maka nnyefe ahụ n'aha Gọmentị Federal nke Naịjirịa
Ọ ghọrọ onye Trustee Incorporated na Febụwarị, 9, na afọ 2007 ma ugbu a nwere ndị a dị ka Trustees Sir Chima Onyekwere (Chairman), Mrs
Ibukun Odusote (Sec), Dr
Chris Nwannenna, Prọfesọ (Mrs) Adenike Osofisan, Maazị Shina Badaru, Dr
Isaac Adeola Odeyemi, Yunusa Zakari Yaʹu, na Barrister Emmanuel Edet
Njikọ Ndebanye aha Ịntanetị nke Naịjirịa na-ahụ maka ọkwa kachasị elu Domainng yanamilng,comng,
schng,govng, 'ing, ,netng site na onye ndebanye aha ha
Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) bụ òtù nche anwụ maka òtù ọrụ na Naịjirịa

E bipụtara Nigerian Labour Congress na Disemba 1978, dị ka njikọta nke òtù anọ dị iche iche Nigeria Trade Union Congress (NTUC), Labour Unity Front (LUF), United Labour Congress (ULC) na Nigeria Workers' Council (NWC)

Otú ọ dị, Gọọmentị Ndị Agha Federal e guzobere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, nke Murtala Mohammed duziri, jụrụ ịnakwere nzukọ ọhụrụ ahụ, kama nke ahụ, guzobe Ụlọikpe Adebiyi iji nyochaa ọrụ nke òtù ọrụ na ndị isi ha
Ụlọikpe ahụ kọrọ n'afọ 1976 ma kwuo na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọrụ niile dị ugbu a gbasaa echiche Agha Nzuzo, dabere na ego sitere na njikọ mba ụwa, ma na-ejighị ego
E ji nke a mee ihe dị ka ihe ziri ezi iji machibido ụlọ ọrụ anọ ahụ iwu, ebe a họpụtara M
Abiodun dị ka onye nchịkwa nke òtù ọrụ

Ọ nabatara nguzobe nke otu ọhụrụ nke Naịjirịa Labour Congress, na ọnọdụ na e mezigharịrị ihe dị ka otu puku na narị ise na-arụ ọrụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe iri anọ na abụọ, tinyere ndị otu iri na itoolu na-anọchite anya ndị isi ọrụ
N'afọ 1978, e guzobere Nigeria Labour Congress, ya na ụlọ ọrụ 42 na-arụ ọrụ
Ọ ga-abụ naanị otu ndị ọrụ aka iwu kwadoro
Ndị ndu ya gụnyere ọtụtụ n'ime ndị isi sitere na ndị anọ bu ya ụzọ, ebe Wahab Goodluck ghọrọ onye isi oche ya

N'oge akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, esemokwu ya na ọchịchị ndị agha ugboro abụọ dugara n'ịgbasa akụkụ mba nke NLC, nke mbụ n'afọ 1988 n'okpuru ọchịchị ndị agha nke General Ibrahim Babangida na nke abụọ n'afọ 1994, n'okpuru usoro ọchịchị nke General Sani Abacha
N'afọ 1996, e jikọtara ndị mmekọ iri anọ na abụọ nke NLC banye ịrị abụọ na itoolu, site na Iwu nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu
N'okpuru ọchịchị ndị agha nke Naịjirịa, a na-ejide ndị isi ọrụ ugboro ugboro ma na-agbagwoju nzukọ ndị otu ọrụ anya anya anya
N'ịgbaso mgbanwe ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na mba ahụ, e wepụrụ ụfọdụ n'ime iwu ndị na-emegide ndị otu na Jenụwarị 1999
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, a họpụtara Adams Oshiomhole ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke nzukọ ahụ
Na mbido afọ 2000, esemokwu dị n'etiti gọọmentị na NLC rịrị elu n'ihi mmegide nke nzukọ ahụ na ọnụahịa mmanụ dị elu
Mmụba ọnụahịa ahụ bụ n'ihi mkpebi gọọmentị Olusegun Obasanjo mere iji belata enyemaka ego nke ukwuu ma wepụ iwu ịzụta na ire ya
NLC emeela ka ọtụtụ ọgbaghara na-eme mkpesa megide iwu ọnụahịa mmanụ ụgbọala nke ndị n'achi obodo
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2004, NLC nyere gọọmentị etiti iwu ka ha gbanwee mkpebi ahụ iji weghachite ụtụ isi mmanụ ụgbọala na-ese okwu ma ọ bụ chee mkpesa mba niile ihu
E mere egwu ahụ n'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na mkpebi ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Federal na esemokwu gara aga kwupụtara na nzukọ ahụ enweghị ikike iwu ịkpọ oku maka iwu ndị n'achi obodo
Mgbe a mara ọkwa atụmatụ ọgbaghara ahụ, NLC kwuru na e jidere Onye isi ala Adams Oshiomhole n'October 9, 2004 na ngagharị iwe na Nnamdi Azikiwe Airport

Dị ka nzukọ ahụ si kwuo, 'otu ìgwè ndị ọrụ nke State Security Services (SSS) nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ha karịrị iri na ise, ndị meriri ya, lụso ya ọgụ n'ala ma tinye ya n'ime ụgbọ ala Peugeot 504 na-echere, nke na-enweghị akara ikikere'

Ndị ọrụ nchekwa steeti kpọrọ nkwupụta ahụ 'akụkọ na-akpali akpali na nke na-ezighị ezi', na-ekwu na onye isi oche NLC nwere ' nghọtahie' na ndị ọrụ mpaghara, mana na e doziri okwu ahụ n'oge na-adịghị anya
Onye na-ekwuchitere onye isi ala kwuru na a kpọrọ Oshiomhole naanị maka 'kparịta ụka' n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu, ọ nweghị njide e jidere
N'afọ 2005, a gbanwere iwu ahụ iji kwe ka ndị otu ọrụ ndị ọzọ nweta nkwado gọọmentị, yana ikwe ka ndị otu ndị isi ọrụ sonye na NLC
N'afọ 2016, ihe dị ka ndị mmekọ iri abụọ na ise hapụrụ iji guzobe United Labour Congress, mana ha laghachiri na NLC n'afọ 2020
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ ahụ, ọ nwere ndị mmekọ iri anọ na atọ, nke na-anọchite anya ihe karịrị ndị otu nde anọ n'afọ 2016
Otu n'ime mkpesa kachasị ike nke NLC nwere ike ịchọta na Jenụwarị 2012 n'oge ọchịchị Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan

Onye isi ala na ndị otu akụ na ụba ya ekwuola na ịkwụ ụgwọ enyemaka mmanụ ụgbọala na-eme ka mba ahụ tụfuo ọtụtụ ijeri naira ma ọ ga-echekwa ihe dị ka '£ 42bn kwa afọ iji tinye ego na ụlọ nrụpụta na-adịghị arụ ọrụ nke mere ka Naịjirịa bubata mmanụ nke ya ozugbo a nụchara ya'
Onye isi ala kwuru na ndi n'achi obodo ya enweghịzi mmasị n'ịkwụ ụgwọ enyemaka mmanụ ụgbọala na ndị na-egosi mmanụ
Nke a ga-ebugharị ọnụahịa mmanụ ụgbọala nke a na-ere maka N65 a lita na enyemaka gụnyere gburugburu N141 nke na-egosi ihe karịrị otu narị pasent mmụba
Ndị ozi nọ na kọmitii ya kwadoro mkpọsa maka iwepụ enyemaka mmanụ ụgbọala ma bụrụkwa onye Ozi na-ahụ maka ego / minista na'ahụ maka akụ na ụba n'oge ahụ bụ Dr
Ngozi Okonjo Iweala
Gọọmentị mara ọkwa na a ga-ewepụ enyemaka mmanụ ụgbọala na Jenụwarị 2012 na ọkwa a anabataghị ya na Nzukọ Ndị Ọrụ Naịjirịa
Abdulwahed Omar, onye isi oche NLC n'oge ahụ mara gọọmentị aka na a ga-enwe ngagharị iwe zuru oke na Naịjirịa ma ọ bụrụ na ọ gaa n'ihu na atụmatụ ya iji wepụ mmanụ
NLC nwere ike ijikọ ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ na ndị otu obodo iji kwado ngagharị iwe ya
Ihe ịma aka a gosipụtara site n'omume mgbe gọọmentị gara n'ihu na iwepụ ụgwọ maka enyemaka mmanụ
Ka ọ na-erule 9 Jenụwarị 2012, nnukwu ngagharị iwe malitere gburugburu Naịjirịa na n'obodo ukwu gụnyere Lagos, Abuja, Port Harcourt na Kano
Ngagharị iwe ndị a mebiri akụ na ụba n'ihi na e nwere mmechi zuru oke nke ndị ọrụ dị iche iche nke mba ma ọ were ihe karịrị ụbọchị ọrụ ise
Nke a mere ka onye isi ala Jonathan mara ọkwa na TV na gọọmentị ga-akwado ọnụahịa mmanụ ụgbọala ma belata ya ruo ihe dị ka $ 275 (£ 180) kwa galọn
E mechara kwụsị ngagharị iwe ahụ mgbe gọọmentị etiti gbasịrị ya
Ngagharị iwe a bụ otu n'ime ngagharị iwe kachasị ike nke gọọmentị ndị nkịtị na Naịjirịa chere ihu ma gosipụta ike nke Nigerian Labour Congress
National Women Commission bụ ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke NLC
E mepụtara ya na 2003 iji mụbaa ntinye aka ụmụ nwanyị n'ihe omume nke njikọ ahụ
Malite n'afọ 1983, ọchịchọ maka nkwanye ùgwù maka ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ dugara n'ịmepụta ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị n'isi obodo steeti
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, alaka steeti nke NLC nwere kọmitii ụmụ nwanyị na onye isi oche nke kọmitii ahụ bụ onye otu na-akpaghị aka nke kansụl nchịkwa nke NLC steeti
Na mba, onye isi nke National Women Commission bụ osote onye isi oche nke NLCOnye isi oche nke National Women Commission bụ Comrade Rita Goyit
Akụkụ ụmụ nwanyị na-etinye aka na nnukwu ngagharị iwe na ngagharị iwe iji kwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị na megide ime ihe ike metụtara nwoke na nwanyị megide ụmụ nwanyị
Òtù ndị na-esonụ nwere mmekọ na NLC

E debanyere aha ụlọ ọrụ Nigeria Mortgage Refinance Company Plc (NMRC) na 24 Jụn 2013 dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụgwọ ọha na eze nke edebanyere aha na Securities & Exchange Commission (SEC) ma bụrụ nke Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) na-achịkwa dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ na-abụghị nke na-anabata ego na isi ọrụ nke ịkwụ ụgwọ ụgwọ
E guzobere NMRC iji dozie ego ego nke ụlọ obibi ma kwalite nnweta yana ọnụ ahịa ụlọ dị mma maka ndị Naijiria site n'inye ego dị ukwuu na ahịa ụlọ site na ụlọ obibi na ụlọ akụ azụmahịa

E debanyere aha ụlọ ọrụ Nigeria Mortgage Refinance Company (NMRC) dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụgwọ ọha na eze nke nwere ikikere inye ụlọ ọrụ na'ịgbazinye ego ohere ịnweta ego ogologo oge na ọnụego ọmụrụ nwa dị ọnụ ala, si otú ahụ na-eme ka ụlọ ọrụ ndị a nye ndị Naijiria, na ọnụego dị ogologo na ọnụego ọnụ ala
NMRC nwetara nkwenye na ụkpụrụ site na CBN na 20 Jụn 2013
E debanyere aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 24 Jụn 2013 dị ka Nigeria Mortgage Refinance Company Plc ma nye ha ikikere maka ọrụ na Febrụwarị 18, 2015
Nigeria Mortgage Refinance Company (NMRC) natara onyinye maka Ụlọ Akụ̀ Akụ̀ nke Afọ na mbipụta nke asatọ nke African Banker Awards nke emere na Kigali, Rwanda

Ụlọ ọrụ Nigeria Mortgage Refinance Company Plc (NMRC) nwere steeti 18 na Naịjirịa ebe ndị gọvanọ etinyela aka ịkwado atụmatụ NMRC site n'ịmepụta gburugburu ebe obibi maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-enyeghachi ego gụnyere Abia, Anambra, Bauchi, Bayelsa, Delta, Edo, Ekiti, Enugu, Gombe, Kaduna, Kano, Kwara, Lagos, Nasarawa, Ogun, Ondo na FCT
Ụlọ ọrụ Nigeria Mortgage Refinance Company Plc (NMRC) nwere ihe dị ka ụlọ akụ iri abụo na-agbazinye ego
Usoro Nkwado

Nzọụkwụ mbụ bụ maka onye na-agbazinye ego iji nweta ego mgbazinye ego site n'aka onye na-enye ego mgbazinye na-ekere òkè dabere na njirimara ntinye akwụkwọ nke NMRC setịpụrụ; na nzaghachi onye na-ebinye ego ga-enye ụgwọ mgbe niile nke onye isi ego ahụ tinyere ọmụrụ nwa
Onye na-agbazinye ego ga-enyekwa ihe nkwado n'ụdị ụgwọ ụlọ n'elu ihe onwunwe a ga-azụta
Nzọụkwụ nke abụọ bụ maka ndị na-agbazinye ego na-ekere òkè iji kwado ụgwọ ahụ na NMRC
NMRC ga-akwụghachi ụgwọ ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ ego
Onye na-agbazinye ego ga-enyekwa aka, n'aka nke ya, nye nchebe n'elu ụlọ ya maka nkwado nke NMRC
Nzọụkwụ nke atọ bụ maka NMRC iji nweta ego nke ya site na ịnweta ahịa isi obodo na ịnye bonds
Ọ ga-ewepụta bonds ụlọ ọrụ, nke na-adịghị agụnye ọ bụla gafere n'ihe ize ndụ akwụmụgwọ agbakwunyere na ụgwọ ụlọ
NMRC na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ogbugbo dị mfe n'etiti ndị na-agbazinye ego na ahịa isi obodo
Site n'iji nha ya na uru ego ya, NMRC ga-enwe ike ịnakọta ego na ọnụego dị ọnụ ala
Nke a sitere na ndị nwere òkè siri ike, isi ego siri ike, ezigbo akụ dị n'akwụkwọ ya na eziokwu ahụ bụ na CBN na SEC na-achịkwa NMRC
Ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa bụ ndị isi ndị mmanye iwu na ndị isi nchekwa na Naịjirịa
N'usoro iwu 1999 họpụtara dị ka ndị uwe ojii mba Nigeria nwere ikike pụrụiche na mba ahụ dum, dị ka nke 2016 nwere ikike ndị ọrụ ruru ihe dịka 371,800
Enwere atụmatụ ugbu a ịbawanye ndị agha ahụ ruo 650,000, na-agbakwunye ndị ọrụ ọhụrụ 280,000 na 370,000 dị ugbu a
Ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa bụ nnukwu ọgbakọ nwere iwu steeti iri atọ na isii gbakọtara n'ime mpaghara iri na asaa na ngalaba nhazi asatọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ onye isi ugbu a bụ IGP (Inspector General) Usman Alkali Baba
N'afọ 2020, ọ mere mgbanwe dị ukwuu
Eweputara ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa na 1820
N'afọ 1879, otu puku mmadụ na narị abụọ bụ ndị otu ndị agha na-ahụ maka ndị agha Hausa Constabulary
N'afọ 1896 ka e hiwere ndị uwe ojii Lagos
Ndị agha yiri nke ahụ, Niger Coast Constabulary, ka e hiwere na Calabar na 1894 n'okpuru ọchịchị Niger Coast Protectorate nke akpọpụtara ọhụrụ
N'ebe ugwu, Royal Niger Company hiwere Royal Niger Company Constabulary na 1888 na isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lokoja
Akwụkwọ iwu 1999 weputara ndị uwe ojii Naijiria (NP) ka ọ bụrụ ndị uwe ojii mba Naijiria nwere ikike pụrụiche na mba ahụ dum

Nkwadebe nke usoro iwu dịkwa, Otú ọ dị, maka ịmepụta alaka NPF dị iche iche 'na-eme akụkụ nke ndị agha nke Federation ma ọ bụ maka nchebe ha nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri, ụzọ mmiri, ụgbọ okporo ígwè na ọdụ ụgbọ elu' Otu n'ime alaka dị otú ahụ, ndị uwe ojii nchekwa Port, si n'ebe dị iche iche kọrọ na ha nwere ike na 1990 n'etiti 1,500 na 12,000
Nigeria Sexual Offender and Service Provider Database (NSOD) bụ ulo oru na edeba aha ndi mere ndakpo na ma n'edekwa aha ndi ha mejoro ma nyere ha aka

Ọ bụ akwụkwọ nke ulo nke na egbochi itu mgere mmadu nke akporo National Agency for the Prohibition of Trafficking in Persons n'olu bekee nke Gọọmenti etiti Naijiria bipụtara na Septemba 2019 iji dekọ ihe gbasara mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị na ileba anya n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị dara iwu na steeti iri ato n'isii dị na Naịjirịa
Ebe nchekwa data dị n'okpuru nlekọta nke National Agency for the Prohibition of Trafficking in Persons (NAPTIP)

E hibere nchekwa data n'okpuru iwu ime ihe ike megide mmadụ (VAPP) 2015 nke Onye isi ala Goodluck Ebele Jonathan bịanyere aka na ya n'iwu na egbochi itu mgbere mmadu nke akporoTrafficking in Persons (Prohibition) Enforcement and Administration Act (2003) n'olu bekee

Tupu e guzobe nchekwa data n'afọ 2019, e nwere naanị akwụkwọ ndekọ aha abụọ (abụọ) a ma ama gbasara ndakpo na Naịjirịa; Ndebanye aha mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị dị na Lagos steeti na akwụkwọ ojii na steeti Ekiti
Ihe ndekọ ahụ bụ ọdụ data abụọ; ndị omempụ ndakpo na-edebanye aha na aha onye na-eweta ọrụ
Ndebanye aha onye mejọrọ mmekọahụ nwere ozi gbasara ikpe nke mmebi iwu ma ọ bụ mmetọ nke akọpụtagoro, nke akpọbataragoro ma ọ bụ nke maragoro ikpe n'okpuru iwu ime ihe ike megide mmadụ (VAPP) 2015

Ebe nchekwa data onye omekome na onye na-enye ọrụ nwere ozi na steeti iri ato n'isii nke Naịjirịa ma nwee ike ị nweta ya ozugbo na webụsaịtị ụlọ ọrụ ebe enwere ike ịnweta ikpe ndị ọzọ dị iche iche site n'aka onye ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ chọrọ ozi ahụ

Onye na-ahụ maka ọrụ na-edebanye aha na-edobe nkọwa akara ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otụ, mkpakọrịta, ụlọ ọrụ, ebe obibi, ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ, ụlọ ndụmọdụ na ndị na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị na-ahụ maka inye aka nye ndị e metọrọ n'ụzọ mmekọahụ na ime ihe ike
Ntaramahụhụ maka ndakpo dị ka ekwuru na VAPP Act, 2015 gụnyere mkpọrọ ndụ, nnukwu ego na itinye aha ndị mejọrọ n'ime ndepụta ihere nke nwere ike ịnweta onye ọ bụla kwesịrị eme nyocha maka ezi ndu
Kemgbe mmalite ya, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ edekọwo ọganihu dị ịrịba ama na akwụkwọ nke ndị na-eme ihe ọjọọ na National Sexual and Service Provider Database
N'ọnwa Maachị afo 2022, onye isi nchịkwa umunwanyi, Womens Rights Advocates Research and Documentation Center, Dr
Abiola Akiyode-Afolabi kwadoro na ihe dị ka ikpe 602 nke ndakpo ka akọpụtala ma nyochaa ya na ụfọdụ ndị omempụ a mara ikpe ugbua na ndị na-enye ọrụ ọhụrụ ka edepụtara na akwụkwọ

N'ime mmepe ọzọ, Wale Fapohunda, onye ọka iwu steeti Ekiti na kọmishọna nke ikpe ziri ezi kwadoro na ebe ọ bụ na National Offender and Service Provider Database arụnyere ọrụ, ihe karịrị narị ise na iri asaa na atọ nke mmejọ ndakpo ka e dekọrọ site na ọdụ data
N'ọnwa Disemba 2021, onye isi NAPTIP, Dr Fatima Waziri-Azi kwuputara na mkpesa na emelitere ihe karịrị ikpe 573 na nchekwa data gụnyere ikpe, ikpe na-echere nyocha

N'ikwekọ na nchekwa data ahụ, onyeisi oche Lagos State House of Assembly nke ihe gbasara umunwanyi, ichu ubiam oso na mmeputa oru, Mojisolaoluwa Alli-Macaulay kwadoro na gọọmenti Legọs na-ewepụta akwụkwọ ego na ihe omume ga-eme ka a hụ n'edeputara iwu ọ bụla metụtara ndakpo ụmụ nwanyị nke ọma iji hụ na akpọpụtara aha ndị omempụ ahu ma menye ha ihere n'ihu
The Nigeria Standard bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria kwa ụbọchị nke gọọmentị steeti Plateau nwere, nke Benue-Plateau States Print Publication Cooperation na bipụta, nke isi ụlọ ọrụ dị na Jos
Gọọmentị Benue-Plateau malitere akwụkwọ akụkọ a n'afọ 1972 wee kwụsị ibipụta ya n'afọ 1986 ma emechaa na 1992, eweghachiri ya ọzọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ bụ otu n'ime ahịrị akụkọ kacha ochie na Nigeria nwere ihe karịrị afọ 40 hiwere

Steeti abụọ ahụ bụ Benue na Plateau steeti na-eme atụmatụ iweghachi akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ site n'iji ihe karịrị nde naira 400 e ji rụgharịa ya na inweta ụgbọ ala obibi akwụkwọ ma nweka ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị n'Abuja, Kaduna
AITEO Cup (nke bụbu Women Challenge Cup na Federations Cup) bụ asọmpi iko na Naijiria
Rivers Angels nke Port Harcourt enwetala ọtụtụ utu aha
A na-emekarị egwuregwu ikpeazụ na Teslim Balogun Stadium na Legọs Steeti
Na June 2017, Nigeria Football Federation mechara nwee nkwekọrịta afọ ise na AITEO Group maka ikike aha nke asọmpi ahụ
Nkwekọrịta ahụ ga-eme ka ndị nwetara mmeri na ndị nke abụọ nweta 10,000,000 na 5,000,000 kwa afọ ọbula
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2019, ndị Nasarawa Amazons meriri n'asọmpi Aiteo Cup nke abụọ ha, merie Rivers Angels na nke ikpeazụ
Nke a bụ ndepụta nke ndị mmeri na ndị na-agba ọsọ kemgbe mmalite
Ndị otu bobsled nke Naijiria ma ọ bụ ndị otu bobsleigh nke Naijiria, na-anọchite anya Naijiria na bobsledding
Seun Adigun malitere otu a na mbụ n'afọ 2016 di ka otu ụmụ nwanyị maka ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
N'afọ 2017, ha ruru eru ịbụ ndị Naijiria mbụ na Winter Olympics, na ndị Afrịka mbụ na bobsled na Winter Olympics
E guzobere otu mba mbụ n'afọ 2016 site n'aka Seun Adigun, na 2-woman bobsleigh
Ndị otu ahụ na-enweta ego n'onwe ha, na-enweghị nkwado ego site n'aka ndị ọchịchị Naijiria
Nchịkọta ego iji chụpụ ndị otu ahụ gosiri gọọmentị Naijiria na ọ dị ha mkpa iguzobe otu na-achịkwa maka bobsled, nke ha mere, Bobsled & Skeleton Federation of Nigeria (BSFN)
Mgbalị mbụ nke otu ahụ iru eru maka Winter Olympics, bụ na 2017, maka 2018 Winter Olympics na bobsledding, ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Ndị otu egwuregwu Olympic nke 2018 nwere onye ọkwọ ụgbọala Seun Adigun, na ndị na-agba ọsọ Ngozi Onwumere na Akuoma Omeoga
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2017, ndị otu ahụ zutere ụkpụrụ bụ isi iji sonye na iru eru
Ọ bụrụ na ndị otu ahụ ruru eru, nke a ga-anọchite anya mpụta mbụ nke Naịjirịa na Winter Olympics; na ndị otu Afrịka mbụ na bobsled
Ndị otu ahụ ruru eru maka Olimpik, ịbụ ndị nnọchi anya ya na Winter Games
Naịjirịa ghọrọ otu n'ime mba asatọ Afrịka a ga-anọchite anya na 2018 Winter Olympics
Onwumere bu ọkọlọtọ Naijiria na mmemme mmeghe nke 2018 Winter Olympics Parade of Nations, ma soro ndị otu ya abụọ, ya na onye Naijiria ibe ya Simidele Adeagbo, onye ruru eru maka ọkpụkpụ ụmụ nwanyị
Ndị otu ahụ mechara nke ikpeazụ n'etiti ndị otu iri abụọ na-asọmpi

Mgbe egwuregwu ahụ gasịrị, mmadụ atọ nọ n'òtù ahụ lara ezumike nká na bobsled, mana ha kwere nkwa ịzụlite egwuregwu ahụ na Naịjirịa, zụlite otu egwuregwu Naịjirị, ma zụlite egwuregwu oyi na Winter Olympics na Africa

Ndị otu ahụ rutere na Naịjirịa iji mee emume ahụmịhe Olimpik ha na Machị 2018, nke ndị otu ahịa BSFN, Temple Management Company (TMC), haziri, malite na Murtala Mohammed International Airport (MMIA) nke dị na Ikeja Lagos
Otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa na- anọchite anya Naịjirịa n'asọmpị bọọlụ mba ụwa
Ndị Nigeria Football Federation (NFF) na-achị, ha bụ ndị mmeri ugboro atọ n'Africa Cup of Nations, na aha ha kacha ọhụrụ na 2013
N'April 1994, ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nwetara ọkwa nke ise n'ọkwa FIFA, ọkwa kachasị elu nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Afrịka nwetara
N'ime akụkọ ihe mere eme, ndị otu ahụ tozuru oke isii n'ime iko mba ụwa asaa ikpeazụ FIFA (dị ka nke 2018), na-efu naanị mbipụta 2006 wee rute agba nke 16 ugboro atọA putara mbu na mbipụta 1994
Otu a na-anọchite anya FIFA na Confederation of African Football (CAF)
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị obodo ndị ọzọ na egwuregwu ndị na-akwadoghị kemgbe 1930s, Nigeria gbara egwuregwu gọọmentị mbụ na Ọktoba 1949, ebe ọ ka bụ obodo Britain
Ndị otu a gbara egwuregwu na-ekpo ọkụ n'England megide otu dị iche iche amateur gụnyere Bromley, Dulwich Hamlet, Bishop Auckland, na South Liverpool
Asọmpi Naijiria na Marine AFC na Rossett Park dọtara ndị nkiri puku isii, bụ ndekọ maka obere ala

Ndị otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị nke Naịjirịa, nke a makwaara dị ka D'Tigeress, na-anọchite anya Naịjirị na asọmpi basketball ụmụ nwanyị mba ụwa, ma na-achịkwa ya site na Nigeria Basketball Federation, òtù na-achị isi maka basketball na Naịjiria
Naijirịa nwere otu n'ime ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị kachasị nwee ọganihu na Kọntinent Afrịka, ịbụ ndị mmeri Afrịka ugbu a
Ha emeriela asọmpi Afrobasket nke ụmụ nwanyị ugboro atọ n'usoro
Ha meriri na 2017 na Bamako, Mali, 2019 na Dakar, Senegal na n'afọ 2021 na Yaounder, Cameroon
Ndị Naijirịa sonyere na 2004 Summer Olympics na basketball, otu n'ime ihe omume iri ndị otu mba ha ruru eru
Ndị otu basketball ụmụ nwanyị Naijirịa bụ otu n'ime ndị otu iri na abụọ na-asọmpi na ihe omume ahụ
Ha nwetara ọnọdụ ha site na asọmpi iru eru mpaghara wee kpọọ na Group A tinyere Australia, Brazil, Greece, Japan, na Russia
Ndị otu ahụ gara 015 na agba nke mbụ
N'egwuregwu nke 11/12, ha meriri Korea maka njedebe ikpeazụ nke 11 n'ime ìgwè 12
Site na mmeri a, ha ghọrọ otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka mbụ meriri egwuregwu na Olimpik
Mfon Udoka bụ onye na-ebute akara n'òtù ahụ na onye nke abụọ kachasị mma na asọmpi ahụ
Ndị otu egwuregwu Itoro Umoh-Coleman na Joanne Aluka gbara bọọlụ bọọlụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Hephzibah High School tupu ha agbakọọ bọọlụ maka Naijirịa
Naijirịa ruru eru maka 2006 FIBA World Championship site na mmeri 2005 FIBA Africa Championship for Women
E debere ha n'ìgwè C na China, Russia, na United States
Naijirịa erughị eru maka ịgafe na agba nke abụọ ma ndị nnọchi anya Afrịka ibe ha bụ Senegal meriri ha n'egwuregwu nke 15/16 site na akara nke 6664
Ihe ndekọ asọmpi ha bụ 0X5
Naijirịa sonyekwara na 2006 Commonwealth Games nke emere na Melbourne, Australia
Ndị otu ahụ gara FIBA Africa Championship for Women 2007; ihe omume iru eru maka ndị otu Afrịka na-anwa ime 2008 Summer Olympics
Naịjirịa ruru nkeji iri na ise nke 2007 FIBA African Championship tupu Mozambique emeri ya na 69o61
Ha meriri n'ọnọdụ nke ise site na imeri Cameroon 631050
Ndị otu ahụ erughị eru maka egwuregwu Olympic nke Beijing
Ndị otu Naijirịa enweghị mmeri n'egwuregwu otu n'oge 2007 All-Africa Games
Ha gara na ọkara ikpeazụ wee merie Mozambique 571046

Ndepụta maka Afrobasket ụmụ nwanyị nke 2021
Nke a bụ ndepụta nke ndị egwuregwu na ndị nkuzi gara aga, yana ndị egwuregwu ugbu a na-egwuri egwu na ndị otu gara aga, na afọ ha na otu ahụ gosipụtara site na ọkọlọtọ Naijiria n'okpuru otu afọ
Ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Naịjirịa, nke a na-akpọ Super Falcons, na-anọchite anya Naịjiria na bọọlụ bọọlụ ndị inyom nke mba ụwa ma na-achịkwa ya site na Nigeria Football Federation

Ndị otu ahụ bụ ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị kachasị nwee ọganihu n'Afrịka na-emeri ihe nrite iri na otu nke Women's Africa Cup of Nations, na aha ha kachasị ọhụrụ na 2018, mgbe ha meriri South Afrika na nke ikpeazụ
Ndị otu ahụ bụkwa naanị ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị si na Confederation of African Football ruru nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ na FIFA Women's World Cup na Football na Summer Olympics
Ha bụkwa otu n'ime ndị otu ole na ole n'ụwa ruru eru maka mbipụta o bụla nke FIFA Women's World Cup, na arụmọrụ ha kachasị mma na 1999 FIFA Women'S World Cup ebe ha ruru nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ
Ha meriri asọmpi asaa mbụ nke Afrịka ma n'ime afọ iri abụọ mbụ ha meriri naanị egwuregwu ise na asọmpi Afrịka

12 Disemba 2002 na Ghana na Warri, 3 June 2007 na Algeria, 12 Augustị 2007 na Ghana na asọmpi Olympic, 25 Nọvemba 2008 na Equatorial Guinea na ọkara nke asọmpi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Afrịka nke 2008 na Mee 2011 na Ghana na egwuregwu niile nke Afrịka
Super Falcons enwebeghị ike ichikwa karịa Africa n'ọgbọ egwuregwu ndị dị ka FIFA Women's World Cup ma ọ bụ Olympic Games
Ndị otu ahụ anọwo na World Cup ọ bụla kemgbe 1991, mana ha jisiri ike naanị otu ugboro iji mechie na asatọ kachasị elu
N'afọ 2003, Super Falcons ghọrọ nnukwu mmechuihu nke agba nke mbụ, na-emeghị otu goolu ma merie egwuregwu atọ niile nke egwuregu Group A
Ha mere nke ọma na 2007, na-adọta naanị otu n'ime egwuregwu Group B ha
Otu ọ dị, ha chere ìgwè ọnwụ ihu na 2003 na 2007, ha jikọtara oge abụọ ahụ na ike Asia na-arị elu North Korea, ike ọdịnala Europe Sweden, na ike ụmụ nwanyị nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na USA

Naịjirịa kwadoro asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka nke ugboro atọ n'afọ 2006 nke a kagburu n'ihi oke mgbawa nke ime ihe ike kpatara n'ime mpaghara Naịjiria, na-anọchi Gabon, nke e nyere ikike ịnabata na mbụ mana e mechara wepụ ya na-ekwu maka nsogbu ego, wee merie ya nke asaa n'usoro
Super Falcons nke Naijiria na Black Queens nke Ghana nọchitere anya Africa na China maka 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup
'Falconets' bụ ndị otu na-eto eto nke mba ahụ (U-20), nke rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma na 2006 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup nke emere na Russia mgbe ha meriri Finland 8-0 tupu Brazil eziga ha na Quarter-final
Ha bụ ndị nke abụọ na Germany na 2010 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
Naịjirịa gbakwara bọọlụ na 2014 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup nke e mere na Canada ma merie Germany na ngwụcha nke 0-1, Asisat Oshoala nwetara bọọlụ ọla edo na buutu ọla edo
'Flamingoes' bụ ndị otu cadet nke mba ahụ (U-17), nke ruru eru maka asọmpi U-17 World Cup New Zealand 2008
Naịjirịa ruru eru maka 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup ebe etinye ha na Group A na South Korea, Norway na ndị ọbịa France
A maara ótu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Naịjirịa ma ọ bụ kpọọ ya 'Super Falcons'
