Nkandu Phoebe Luo (amụrụ na 21 Disemba na afo 1951) bụ onye Zambia microbiologist na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa osote onye isi ala maka Patriotic Front na ntuli aka Augustbna afo 2021
Ọ bụ onye microbiologist onye jere ozi dị ka Onye isi nke Pathology na Microbiology na Mahadum Teaching Hospital na Lusaka ma mee nnyocha dị ukwuu banyere HIV / AIDS
A mụrụ Luo na Lubwa Mission Hospital na Chinsali na 21 Disemba na afo 1951
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị nkuzi ma Luo bụ otu n'ime ụmụ asatọ dị ndụ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị Roma na Dominican Convent
O nwere MSc na microbiology site na Mahadum Moscow State na MSc na PhD na immunology site na Маhadum Brunei Darussalam
Luo rụrụ ọrụ na Saint Mary's Hospital na London
Ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ na microbiology na immunology na Mahadum Zambia na afo 1993 ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi nke Pathology na Microbiology na Machịbụrụ nkuzi, Lusaka, Zambia
O bipụtara ọtụtụ akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ gbasara HIV / AIDS
A họpụtara Luo ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Movement for Multi-Party Democracy na mpaghara Mandevu na afo 1996

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote minista ahụike site na afo 1997 ruo na afo 1999 na minista ahụ ike na afo 1999, mana ya na ndị na-enye onyinye na ndị ọrụ ahụike nwere esemokwu ma wepụ ya n'ọkwa ahụ na Nọvemba na afo 1999 ma jiri David Mpamba dochie ya
Ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka njem na nkwukọrịta site na afo 1999 ruo na afo 2001 tupu ọ tụfuo oche ya na ntuli aka na afo 2001
Luo mepụtara netwọk nke ndị otu iri atọ na-akwado ọrịa AIDS ma guzobe otu na-enweghị uru Tasintha, nke na-achọ ịtọhapụ Zambia na ọrụ mmekọahụ azụmahịa na HIV / AIDS
O guzobere mmemme National AIDS Control, National Blood Transfusion Service na Prevention of Mother to Child transmission of HIV / AIDS program
A họpụtara Luo dị ka onye nnọchi anya Patriotic Front maka mpaghara Munali n'afọ 2011
Michael Sata họpụtara ya dị ka Mịnịsta nke Gọọmentị Obodo na Ụlọ, na-eje ozi site na afo 2011 ruo na afo 2014, wee bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ndị isi na ọdịnala site na afo 2014 ruo na afo 2015
Ọ bụ Edgar Lungu ṅụrụ Luo iyi dị ka Minista nke Mmekọahụ na Febụwarị na afo 2015
N'ọnwa Machị na afo 2016, a nabatara Luo dị ka onye isi oche nke Women Parliamentary caucus na nzukọ 134th Inter Parliamentary Union na Lusaka
N'ọnwa Septemba na afo 2016, ọ ghọrọ Minista agụmakwụkwọ dị elu nke Zambia
A họpụtara Luo dị ka minista na-ahụ maka ịkụ azụ na anụ ụlọ n'afọ 2019
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2019, o yiri egwu ịkagbu nkwekọrịta ya na Zambia Cooperative Federation (ZCF) maka iwu ogige ụlọ ọrụ ugbo na Chipata nke ruru ijeri otu
Luo bụ onye na-agba ọsọ maka Onye isi ala Lungu na ntuli aka Ọgọstụ na afo 2021 mgbe osote onye isi ala Inonge Wina kwupụtara mkpebi ya ịla ezumike nká
Luo bụ nne nke ụmụ abụọ na nne nne nke ụmụ anọ
Ọ na-eji oge ezumike ya na ndị ezinụlọ ya dị nso ma na-enyekwa ụmụ akwụkwọ okwu n'ịkwado okwu n'elu ikpo okwu dị iche iche na isiokwu dị iche iche

Nkanu East bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na steeti Enugu, Naijiria, na akuku Ebonyi steeti n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Amagunze
Obodo di na Nkanu East bu Akpawfu, Ugbakwa, Nkerefi, Mburubu, Nomeh Unateze, Nara Unateze, Owo, Ubahu, Amaechi Idodo, Ama Nkanu, Oruku, Amagunze and Ihuokpara
Ihuokpara, dịka otu n'ime obodo ndị a ma ama na Nkanu-East nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme oge ochie nke a na-apụghị ileghara anya mgbe Nkanu na ebe nile, a na-ekwu okwu n'Enugwu steeti
Obodo Akpawfu bụ ama maka omenala monwu (omaba), iku nkwu enu puru iche (akwuru Akpawfu), ụdị nkwụ niile ( mmanụ nkwụ, akị na cannel) na ọrụ ugbo
Nkerefi gbara mpaghara kansụl ahụ na obodo Ohaozara nke Ebonyi
Ndị obodo na-ekwu na ha bụ obodo kacha ukwuu site na oke ala na mpaghara kansụl
Ha bụ ndị a ma ama na osikapa na ugbo akpu
Kansụl ime obodo, nke e hibere na 1983 emebeghị ka mpaghara ahụ dị ukwuu n'ihe gbasara ihe eji enyere ndụ aka dịka ezigbo netwọkụ okporo ụzọ, ọkụ eletrik, ụlọ ọgwụ, ụlọ ọgbara ọhụrụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ
Nkanu Westi bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na steeti Enugu, Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'ime obodo Agbani
Ime ochichi obodo Nkanu West mebere nke Agbani, Akpugo, Akegbe Ugwu, Obuofia, Umueze, Obe, Amodu, Ozalla na Amurri
Ọ nwere mpaghara 225 km 2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 146,695 na ngụkọ 2006
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 402
Nkatọ bụ iwulite ikpe banyere àgwà ọjọọ ma ọ bụ nke ọma nke mmadụ ma ọ bụ ihe
Nkatọ nwere ike ịdị site na nkwupụta mberede ruo nzaghachi zuru ezu edere ede
Nkatọ na-adaba n'ọtụtụ ụdị na-agbakọta gụnyere 'echiche, omume, Nzipụta agwa, mmetụta uche, ntụziaka, maọbu nkọwa'
Nkatọ nwekwara ike irutu aka na nkwupụta nke enweghị nkwenye nke mmadụ ma ọ bụ ihe
Mgbe nkatọ nke ọdịdị a na-ewuli elu ọ nwere ike ime ka onye ọ bụla mara ọdịiche dị na nghọta ha ma nwee ike inye ụzọ dị iche iche maka imeziwanye
Nnyocha na-akwado echiche na iji nzaghachi na nkatọ na-ewuli elu na usoro mmụta nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu
Nkatọ vs
nkatọ Na French, German, ma ọ bụ Italian, ọ dịghị ihe dị iche n'etiti 'nkatọ' na 'nkatọ'
Okwu abụọ ahụ sụgharịrị dị ka nkatọ, Kritik, na nkatọ, n'otu n'otu

N'asụsụ Bekee, onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Gianni Vattimo na-atụ aro na a na-ejikarị nkatọ eme ihe iji gosipụta nkatọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ nkatọ nka ebe nkatọ na-ezo aka n'ihe odide zuru oke na nke miri emi dịka Kant's kritik maka ihe eji uche cheputa
Ihe ọzọ dị iche iche a na-eme mgbe ụfọdụ bụ na a naghị eme ka nkatọ bụrụ nke onwe onye maobụ ad hominem ma na-egosi ya n'ụzọ na-agba ume ịgbagha ma ọ bụ gbasaa echiche ndị egosiri
Ka o sina dị, ọdịiche ndị ahụ dị aghụghọ ma bụrụ ndị a na-ejighị n'aka
A na-eji okwu ahụ bụ 'brikbat' eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ iji pụta 'nkatọ na-adịghị mma, okwu na-adịghị obiọma ma ọ bụ nkwụsịtụ dị nkọ'
Okwu a malitere na narị afọ nke iri na asaa, nke sitere n'omume ịtụ brik dị ka mgbọ na onye a na-anabataghị
N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, dị ka nkatọ akwụkwọ na nkatọ nka, a na-eji okwu nkatọ eme ihe dị ka okwu na-anọpụ iche nke na-anọchite anya nyocha
Ụlọakwụkwọ nkato nakwa thiori nke nkato mmemme na-akụzi usoro nkatọ, nke a makwaara dị ka 'nkatọ'
Ma usoro ihe omume na ọmụmụ na-enwekarị ọrụ ọhụrụ na mgbakwunye na ederede oge ochie

UC Berkeley, CUNY, na Mahadum nke no na mgbago nke odida anyanw na-enye mmemme na kritik thiori, ebe ọtụtụ kọleji na mahadum ndị ọzọ na-enye usoro ma ọ bụ naanị ọmụmụ na agụmakwụkwọ maka kritik nakwa thiori maka kritik na mpaghara ndị ozo
Mpaghara ndị ọzọ gụnyere kritik maka egwuregwu ọsọ, kritik nke agụmakwụkwọ mba asia, kritik maka agụmakwụkwọ akwụkwọ maka ndị ojii, akwụkwọ kritik maka ndị nkwaru
Enwere ike ịchọta okwu 'nke dị oke egwu' na utu aha ọmụmụ gbasara isiokwu dịgasị iche iche, dịka okwu ahụ na-ezo aka na usoro ma ọ bụ ụzọ isi nweta ihe ọmụmụ
Ụfọdụ na-ekwu na ọmụmụ 'nkatọ' na-elekwasị anya n'echiche ma ọ bụ echiche ha, na-agbagwoju usoro nkatọ na nkatọ onwe onye anya
Mpụta nke ọmụmụ 'nnukwu' na echiche na-eme ka njikọ nke ndị edemede ụfọdụ na usoro ọhụrụ na ọzụzụ dịkwuo njọ
Tụkwasị na nke a, a na-ekewa usoro na ọzụzụ site na nyocha ma ọ bụ ọdịnala ọdịnala ma ọ bụ sayensị siri ike site na ikike ha maka njirimara n'echiche nke onye edemede
Onye nta akụkọ na onye edemede H
Mencken kwuru na 'nkatọ bụ obere ihe karịa alaka nke homiletics

Ha na-ekpe ọrụ nka ikpe, ọ bụghị site na nghọta na ezi obi ya, ọ bụghị maka ike na ịma mma nke echiche ya, ọ dịghị site na nkà na ụzụ nke onye na-ese ihe, ọ bụghị n'ihi ịdị ọhụrụ ya na obi ike ya, kama n'ụzọ dị mfe na naanị site na ortodoxy ya

Nkechi Akashili (amụrụ na 22 Febrụwarị 1990) bụ onye na-agba basketbọọlụ si Naijiria maka otu klọb ndị First Bank BC
na ndị otu na-anochitere Naijiria anya n'egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwaanyị
O sonyere na egwuregwu asọmpi nke 2017 Women's Afrobasket
Nkechi Francis Anayo-Iloputaife bụ onye obodo Naịjirịa, onye ụkọchukwu na onye mgbasa ozi ụka
Na afọ1985, ya na di ya, hibere Chọọchị Christian Victory
Ọ nọgidere na-abụ otu n’ime ndị isi ụka ahụ ruo mgbe e gburu di ya, onye bụ onye isi ụka ahụ
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na afọ 1995, ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta ọrụ niile na ụka ahụ
Ọ na etinye kwa aka na ọrụ enyemaka na ọrụ ebere
Ndị Ghana tụnyere ọrụ ya n'ọchịchị n'ụlọ ụka were si na ọnwere 'mmụọ onye ndu nke nwoke'
Na afọ 2014, ndị akwụkwọ akụkọ Nation kọwara ọchịchị ya na nhazi ụka dị ka ihe akaebe na 'ihe nwoke nwere ike ime, nwanyị nwekwara ike ime, ọbụlagodi mee karia mgbe ụfọdụ'
Tupu ezute di ya, Nkechi bụ onye okpukperechi Katọlik
Ọ lụrụ Harford Anayo Iloputaife ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na ọnwa February n'afọ 1995
O boro ebubo na gọọmentị nwere ike ịnwe ụfọdụ ihe ga-eme ka ọ nwụọ, n'ihi ọna ekwu okwu megide atumatu ndị n'ọchịchị na Nigeria n'oge ahụ

Ọ na-ele di ya nwụrụ anwụ anya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ya, na-akọwa ya dị ka 'onye nnọchi anya kachasị nso nke oyiyi Kraist n'ụdị mmadụ' na ajụjụ ọnụ Daily Sun ndị akwụkwọ akụkọ Kemgbe ọ nwụrụ, Nkechi abụrụla onye isi ụlọ ụka ahụ, bụ nke ọ gbara akaebe na di ya kwuputara ya dịka 'onye ọhụụ' na afọ 1985
Ka onye ntaakụkọ Daily Independent na-ajụ ya etu o siri nwee ike idu ụmụ nwoke ụka ya, Nkechi kọwara na ya '
na-eso ha emekọ ihe dịka nne na onye ndu ime mmụọ ha'
N’ikwu okwu banyere ụdị ejiji ya, Nkechi kọwara na ihe aha ya pụtara bụ “ịke ekịke na ịma mma”, ebe ọ na-akọwa ọdịdị ya dị ka nke “dị mfe ma dịkwa mma”

Na ịma olile anya ya-na ịlụ di ọzọ, onye nkwusa okwu ụka a dị ike ọrụ gwara ndị akwụkwọ akụkọ Daily Independent na mkparịta ụka ọzọ dị iche na 'Ee e, alụm di na nwunye adịghị n'arụmụka m ma ọlị, ihe gbasara njikọ alụm di agafeela, alụọla m Jesus
Naanị ihe m na-arịọ bụ ka amara ya baram uba maka ihe ndị ọzọ ọ tinye n’aka m ka m mee ma rịọkwa ya ka ọ gbaa m ume ka m nwee ike rụchaa ọfụma
O tinyela aka na onyinye nke ihe maka ụlọ akwụkwọ na ọrụ ebere ndị ọzọ

Nkechi Blessing Sunday bụ onye (amụrụ na ụbọchị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 1989)// (ege ntị) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, Onye nduzi ihe nkiri, na onye na-ede ihe nkiri, amụrụ ma zụlite na Surulere, Lagos Steeti O mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Omoge Lekki na 2015, na-eme onwe ya, n'akụkụ Yinka Quadri
N'afọ 2016, Omoge Lekki meriri MAYA Awards ma họpụta ya maka Mkpughe nke Afọ na Best of Nollywood Awards
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye nduzi na onye isi nchịkwa nke mmepụta ihe nkiri Nkechi, na NBS Foundation
Nkechi Blessing Sunday sitere n'otu n'ime obodo dị na mpaghara gọọmentị iri na asaa dị na Abia, steeti dị na mpaghara South East nke Naijiria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Olu Abiodun Nursery na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịm, Lagos na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Barachel Model College, Lagos
O mere diplọma ọnwa isii na nka ihe nkiri na Mahadum Lagos State, ma mụọ International Relations na Mahadim Houdegbe North American
N'afọ 2008, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos State, enyi ya 'Kemi Korede' chọpụtara mmasị Nkechi nwere maka ime ihe nkiri ma gosipụta ya na ihe nkiri ya 'Omo Bewaji'
Omo Bewaji ghọrọ obere ezumike maka ọrụ ya ma mee ka ya na Emeka Duru zute, onye nyere ya ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri Emem Isong; Through The Fire & Entanglement na 2009
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'afọ 2012, na-eduzi ọrụ na Kafila Omo Ibadan, mgbe ya na onye na-emepụta ihe, Temitope Bali na South Africa, zutere, onye nyere ya ọrụ na Kafil Omo Ibadan

Na ụbọchị mbụ na onwa Febụwarị 2017, The Nigeria Carnival USA, kpughere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya ya na mbipụta nke abụọ nke egwu, ọdịbendị na ihe ọchị nke Naịjirịa kwa afọ na United States of America
N'afọ 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Dora' na ihe nkiri mmụọ The Ghost and the Tout, nke nyekwara ya onyinye na 2018 City People Movie Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma n'afọ
N'afọ 2020, Nkechi Blessing so Sean Sean Jimoh kwado mbipụta 2020 nke African Entertainment Awards USA
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ nọ na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke Fate of Alakada dị ka onye Bisi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Tanwa Savage, The Cleanser, Omo Emi, na Ise Ori, yana ọrụ nkwado na Breaded Life, na Olori Amolegbe

Na ụbọchị iri n'ọnwa June 2021, Nkechi Blessing, kwadoro alụmdi na nwunye ya n'etiti ya, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ekiti, Falegan Opeyemi David, mgbe ọ kesara foto sitere na agbamakwụkwọ ha na ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya site na Instagram Story ya
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2021, nne ya 'Gloria Obasi Sunday' nwụrụ, mgbe ọ na-achọ ịmalite ihe nkiri ya na nnukwu ụlọ ihe nkiri Lagos
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, Nkechi Blessing dere na Instagram ya na ọ kwụsịrị mmekọrịta alụmdi na nwunye ya dị ọnwa iri na Falegan Opeyemi David

Nkechi Mbilitam (amụrụ ya na 5 Eprel n'afọ 1974) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ dika midfielder nke Naijiria women's national football team
O so na ndi otu FIFA World Cup nke 1991 ma soro kwa na FIFA World Cup nke 1995
Nkechi Justina Nwaogu, CON bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ, onye nchoputa na CEO Libra Investment
Ọ bụ onye isi oche kansụl ọchịchị gara aga na onye isi ọchịchị nke Mahadum nke Calabar
Senator Nkechi Nwaogu bu onye onye otu na-anọchite anya Osisioma Ngwa, Ugwunagbo na Obingwa Federal Constituency na Federal House of representatives si 2003/2007
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara ya dịka Senator na-anọchite anya Abia Central Senatorial District
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya ọzọ maka oge nke abụọ n'ọfịs
N'afọ 2016, Nwaogu kwuputara na ya bụ zi onye otu pati na-achị obodo All Progressives Congress (APC)
Nkechi Nwaogu bụ onye Senator ugboro abụọ na onye isi ochichi nke gara aga na nso Chancellor University of Calabar
Onye na-ahụ maka ego technocrat
Senator Nkechi Justina Nwaogu lụrụ Dr Roland Nwaogu nke ncheta di ngozi
Sinetọ Nkechi Nwaogu kwadoro onwe ya site n'agụmakwụkwọ ziri ezi ma n'ụlọ na mba ofesi
O nwetara Asambodo Ịhapụ Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Mbụ na 1967 na Aba Township School ma mesịa gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Immaculate Heart na 1975
N'ịkwado onwe ya maka ibu ọrụ ka ukwuu, ọ hapụrụ Naijiria gawa Lọndọn ebe ọ nwetara Diploma na Printing Management na London College of Printing, London
Ka ọ na-erule 1981, ọ nwetara nzere Post Graduate Degree na Management Studies (Major na Finance) site na Polytechnic nke South Bank London, bu zi Mahadum nke South London ugbua
N'ịbụ onye na-achọsi ike inwetakwu ihe ọmụma, onye omebe iwu a nwere mmasị gawa na Mahadum Brunel na Oxbridge Middlesex England ebe ọ nwetara Msc na Management (Major in Finance) na 1984
Ugbu o na achu a nzere Doctorate na nyocha amụma na njikwa ego
N'afọ 2018, o nwetara akara ugo mmụta doctorate na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Nigeria Nsukka
Sinetọ Nkechi Nwaogu kwadoro onwe ya site n'agụmakwụkwọ ziri ezi ma n'ụlọ na mba ofesi
O nwetara Asambodo Ịhapụ Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Mbụ na 1967 na Aba Township School ma mesịa gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Immaculate Heart na 1975
N'ịkwado onwe ya maka ibu ọrụ ka ukwuu, ọ hapụrụ Naijiria gawa Lọndọn ebe ọ nwetara Diploma na Printing Management na London College of Printing, London
Ka ọ na-erule 1981, ọ nwetara nzere Post Graduate Degree na Management Studies (Major in Finance) site na Polytechnic nke South Bank London, Mahadum Ugbu a nke South London
N'ịbụ onye na-achọsi ike inwetakwu ihe ọmụma, onye omebe iwu a nwere mmasị gara na Mahadum Brunel na Oxbridge Middlesex England ebe ọ nwetara Msc na Management (Major in Finance) na 1984
Ọ na-eme ugbu a nzere Doctorate na nyocha amụma na njikwa ego
N'afọ 2018, o nwetara akara ugo mmụta doctorate na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Nigeria Nsukka
O nwere ike iweghachi nrubeisi na iwu na usoro na ngalaba ego nke mba anyi
N'ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye isi oche, Kọmitii Senate na Gas Resources, ọ kwadoro maka nghọta ka ukwuu, nzaghachi na mmepe ngwa ngwa na ụlọ ọrụ gas nke mba anyi
Ọ bụbu onye omeiwu ECOWAS site n'afọ 2005 ruo taa ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke West African Region, African Parliamentarian Network Against Corruption, APNAC
O mere akara mbụ ya na ụwa ego ụlọ ọrụ na England site na 1979 ruo 1987
N'afọ 1987 Nwaogu kwagara Naijiria ka o mechaa otu afọ nke National Youth Service Corp

Nkechi Okoro Carroll bụ onye ode akwukwo, onye na emeputa ihe fim ma bụrụkwa onye na eso eme ihe nkiri
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke CW niile American
A mụrụ Carroll na New York, mana o biri n'ọtụtụ ebe dị iche iche mgbe ọ na-etolite, gụnyere Nigeria, Côte d'Ivoire, United States, na United Kingdom
Ndị mụrụ ya bụ ndị Naịjirịa jere United States maka ịgụ akwụkwọ kọleji mana ha kpebiri ịnọ na obodo ahụ
Nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu, mgbe Carroll dị afọ anọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Nigeria maka ọrụ nna ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, nne na nna Carroll kewara, ya na nne ya kwagara Côte d'Ivoire ka ha nọdu nso ụmụ nwanne nne ya
Mgbe ọ bi n'Africa, ọ na-ele ọtụtụ onyonyo, nke mere ka echiche ya banyere na ihe gbasara US
Kemgbe ọ bụ nwata, ọ chọrọ ịbụ onye edemede
E mechara ziga Carroll n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Oxford, England ọ wee malite ịrụ na Oxford Youth Theater
Carroll gara Mahadum Pennsylvania, ebe ọ natara asambodo BA na ndozi Akụnụba (Economics) na French na afọ 1998
N'oge ya na Penn, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Association Ndị Mmụta nke Pan Africa ma mee ihe ngosi na African American Arts Alliance
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka akụ na ụba na Federal Reserve ma rụọ ọrụ na obere ihe nkiri na oge mgbede mgbe ahụ
Ọ na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ
Carroll nwetara akara ugo mmụta na akụnụba mba ụwa na Mahadum New York
Na 2004, Carroll na di ya hapụrụ New York wee kwaga Los Angeles iji chụọ ebum n'che Carroll maka ibụ onye edemede maka ihe nkiri na Hollywood
Ọrụ izizi ya mbu bụ na The Finder
Mgbe ihe nkiri ahụ gwụchara mgbe otu oge gasịrị, Carroll sonyeere ndị edemede na ihe nkiri nyonyo Bones
Carroll rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka onye nduzi ọrụ na Rosewood na The Resident
Na Machị 2014, Carroll weputara otu akpọrọ Black Women Who Brunch nke putara ndị inyom na-eri nri ụtụtụ na nri ehihie na-anọkọ ọnụ
Lena Waithe na Erika L
Johnson sonyere kwa na ndị bidoro otu a
Ezubere otu a iji jikọta ndị edemede ojii nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri
Ndị otu a na-ezukọkarị n'ụlọ Carroll
Ha na-enye ndi otu ha ndụmọdụ na akụrụngwa maka inwete ọrụ edemede maka ihe nkiri
Onye nta akụkọ Hollywood dere akụkọ banyere ndị otu ahụ na afọ 2018
Na 2018, Carroll sonyeere ndị ọrụ All American mgbe ihe omume nke ha ji nene ma ihe nkiri ahụ agadaba gasịrị
Ya na Eprel Blair, Greg Berlanti, na Sarah Schechtern rụkọrọ ọrụ mgbe ahụ
N'ọnwa Ọktọba n'afọ 2018, Carroll weghaara ọnọdụ dị ka onye isi ọrụ ngosi nke ihe nkiri ahụ, nochie Blair mgbe Blair kwụsịrị n'ọchịchị n'ihi nsogbu diri ihe onwe ya
A hoputara Carroll maka onyinye onyonyo NAACP maka 'Ederede pụrụ iche na usoro ihe nkiri' maka ihe nkiri America niile 'Hussle & Motivate', mana n'ikpeazụ enwetaghị mmeri ahụ
Carroll lụrụ onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Jonathan A
Carroll
Di na nwunye ahụ zutere na nkenke n'oge na Mahadum Pennsylvania, mana ha amaghị onwe ha nke ọma
Na nwa Eprel n'afọ 2000, ha abụọ hụrụ otu enyi ha na-eme ihe nkiri na Soul Cafe na New York City
Otu onye ibe ha na Mahadum Pennsylvania nke aha ya bụ John Legend sokwa na ihe nmenme ahụ ma bụrụ onye meghe egwuregwu
Nkechi so onye ọzọ ga ebe, ma na obere oge ya na Jonathan malitere bụrụ eny, ma mecha lụọ
Ha nwere umu nwoke abuo ma biri na Los Angeles ugbu a
Carroll bụ Onye otu Kraịst
Ọ nọ na ụlọ agbakwunye na World Trade Center ebe ụgbọ elu ndị ahụ dara n'ụlọ elu ha na ụbọchị iri na otu na ọnwa nke Septemba n'afọ 2001
O ji ukwu wee gafee Brooklyn Bridge mgbe ndị mmadu na agba ọsọndu n'ụbọchị ahụ
Carroll na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ
Ihe ngosi onyonyo kachasị amasị ya bụ Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Nkechi Opara (amụrụ na ubochi iri na atọ na onwa Disemba afọ nari iri itoolu iri itoolu na ise) bụ onye Naijiria na-ebu ibu
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị 48 kilogram na 2014 Commonwealth Games ebe o ritere ọla nchara
Nkeiruka Onyejeocha (onye amụrụ na November 23, 1969) bụ otu onye na ndi ome iwu nke ala Naijiria nakwa otu onye na anọchite anya ndi Abia State nke Nigeria na Fedral Kọnstituensi
A mụrụ Onyejeocha na Isuochi na Abia steeti nke Naijiria
Onyejeocha na anọchita anya ndi Isuikwuato/Umunneochi Kọnstituensi

E bu ụzọ ghọpụta ya dika otu onye nnọchi anya na Federal House of Representatives na 2007, aghọpụtara ya ọzọ na 2015 Na National Assembly, Onyejeocha bụ onye isi oche nke ụmụ nwanyi na Paliyament nakwa onye isi oche nke House Committee na Aviation
Ȯra Abia (State nk'Chineke) bu state no n'ime Naigeria
Isị ya bu Umuahia, tomadi Aba bu ebe ahia ukwu ya no
Abia State nola n'afo Imo State ru 1991, mgbe ndi government coro ya guzie ya state
Ndi Igbo bi na ya na nke ukwu
Obu otu state n'iteghete meka ebe ana-kpo Mba Mmiri (Niger Delta)

Anambra Steeti bụ steeti Naijiria, nke dị na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke mba ahụ
E guzobere steeti ahụ na August 27, 1991
Steeti Anambra nwere ókèala Delta Steeti n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, steeti Imo n'ebe ndịda, steeti Enugu n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ na steeti Kogi n'ebe ugwu
Dị ka akụkọ ọnụ ọgụgụ nke afọ 2022 si kwuo, e nwere ihe karịrị nde mmadụ itoolu bi na steeti ahụ
E guzobere aha steeti ahụ na 1976 site na steeti East Central, a na-akpọ steeti ahụ aha Osimiri Omambala, osimiri nke na-agafe steeti ahụ
Anambra bụ aha Anglicized nke Omambala
Isi obodo steeti ahụ bụ Awka, obodo na-eto ngwa ngwa nke mụbara n'ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ site na ihe dịka 700,000 ruo ihe karịrị nde 6 n'etiti afọ 2006 na 2020
Obodo Onitsha, obodo ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri akụkọ ihe mere eme site n'oge tupu oge ọchịchị, ka bụ ebe azụmahịa dị mkpa n'ime steeti ahụ

A na-akpọ ya 'Ìhè nke Mba', Anambra Steeti bụ steeti nke asatọ kachasị nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na mba ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na arụrịta ụka siri ike megide ya dị ka Onitsha, mpaghara obodo ukwu kachasị ukwuu na nke kachasị nwee ọnụ ahịa mmadụ na 2020 site na Africapolis nke mere Onitsha mpaghara obodo ukwu nke abụọ kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa site na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ ma bụrụ nke atọ n'Africa

Ọzọkwa Dị ka 2019 Demographia World Urban Areas Onitsha si kwuo, Onitsha bụ obodo ukwu nke iri anọ na asaa kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa nke nwere ihe karịrị nde mmadụ asatọ Anambra bụ steeti nwere ọtụtụ mmadụ, n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ nke abụọ kacha nta n'ógbè ahụ

Ebe a maara ugbu a dị ka Anambra State abụwo ebe ọtụtụ mmepeanya dị kemgbe ọ dịkarịa ala narị afọ nke 9 AD, gụnyere alaeze oge ochie nke Nri, nke isi obodo ya bụ obodo akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Igbo-Ukwu n'ime steeti ahụ
Ndị bi na steeti Anambra bụ ndị Igbo, asụsụ Igbo na-eje ozi dị ka asụsụ a na-asụ na steeti ahụ dum
N'oge agha obodo Naijirịa (1967–1970), Anambra steeti so na mba ndị na-achị obodo Biafra nke ndị Igbo hiwere
N'oge agha ahụ, ụnwụ dara dara na steeti Anambra, nke kpagburu ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ
Taa, steeti Anambra bụ steeti mepere emepe nke ukwuu, ma nwee nnukwu ọganiihu n'ibelata ogo ịda ogbenye ya￼￼￼
Aha Anambra bụ njikọta nke Anam na alaka
Anam bụ otu agbụrụ dị na mpaghara Omambala na obodo ikpeazụ na-asụ asụsụ Igbo nke ndị Britain na-achị ala zutere mgbe ha na-aga Northern Nigeria site n'ofe mpaghara osimiri
Ha na-akọwakarị Anambra nke oge a dị ka 'alaka Anam' nye ndị ọrụ ibe ha n'ebe ugwu
Ihe kpatara Anam na ụfọdụ agbụrụ ndị agbata obi bụ Anambra LGA mgbe e kere steeti ahụ
Ọ bụ ugbu a Anambra-West LGA na Olumbanasa
Ọ nwere nnukwu ọrụ nka na ígwè, ọla kọpa, ọla kọpa na ite
Ndị a ekpughere usoro ọchịchị dị egwu nke Chukwu, bụ nke jisiri ike na mpaghara Anambra site na c
948 AD ruo 1911
N'obodo ụfọdụ, dị ka Ogidi na ndị ọzọ, ezinụlọ nwere ikike nketa nke ịbụ eze ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ
Great Britain ghọtara ụfọdụ n'ime ndị eze na ndị isi ọdịnala a na usoro ọchịchị ha na-apụtaghị ìhè nke Protectorate nke South Nigeria
Malite na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, ha họpụtara ụfọdụ ndị isi dị ka ndị isi Warrant, na-enye ha ikike ịnakọta ụtụ isi, n'etiti ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Anambra dị n'ógbè ndị Igbo na-achịkwa nke kewapụrụ dị ka akụkụ nke Biafra nwere onwe ya na 1967, na-esote esemokwu na-arịwanye elu na Northern Nigeria
N'oge agha Naijiria / Biafran (1967-1970), ndị injinia Biafra wuru ọdụ ụgbọ elu enyemaka n'obodo Uli / Amsterdam (koodu a na-akpọ 'Annabelle')
Ụgbọelu enyemaka dị oke egwu si na Sao Tome na ebe ndị ọzọ bu tọn nri na ọgwụ maka ndị Biafra nwere nsogbu
Uli/Amorka airstrip bụ ebe ndị ọkwọ ụgbọelu America dị ka Alex Nicoll, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ, butere tọn enyemaka nye ndị Biafra

N'ịbụ onye nhụjuanya na ọnụ ọgụgụ ọnwụ na-arị elu na Biafra n'ihi agụụ, yana mmekpa ahụ na-aga n'ihu nke ụgbọ elu enyemaka nke Nigeria Airforce, Carl Gustaf von Rosen gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye na-anya ụgbọ elu enyemaka Red Cross
O nyeere Biafra aka guzobe ụgbọ elu Minicoin ise Malmö MFI-9 guzo n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu Uga
Ọ kpọrọ ndị agha ikuku ya pere mpe mana dị irè 'Babies of Biafra' iji kwanyere ụmụ ọhụrụ nwụrụ n'agụụ n'ime Biafra
E kere Old Anambra State na 1976 site na akụkụ nke East Central State, isi obodo ya bụ Enugu
N'afọ 1991, nhazi nke Anambra kewara na steeti abụọ, Anambra na Enugu
Isi obodo Anambra bụ Awka

Isi ya bu Abakaliki, bukwa ama ukwu no ebe a
Dika Abia State, ebe enwetere ala kee ya, ndi Igbo bu ndi bi ebee na nnuku
Ekere ya na 1996, nwere ala bula na Enugu na Abia

Nkem-Nkum, ma ọ bụ Isibiri, bụ asụsụ Ekoid nke Naijiria
E nwere asụsụ olumba abụọ dị iche iche, Nkem (Nkim) na Nkum
Àtụ Ekoid languages
Nkem (nke a na-akpọ in-kem) bụ aha a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị Igbo nke obodo Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ ụdị dị mkpirikpi nke Nkemdilim, Nkemjika ma ọ bụ Nkemakonam ma ọ pụtara 'nke m' ma ọ bụ 'nke m'
Aha ahụ nwere ike ịpụta ndia
Nkem Akaraiwe (ka amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1996) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Naijiria maka First Bank na ndị otu mba Naịjirịa
O sonyere na 2018 FIBA Women's Basketball World Cup
Nkem Nwankwo (12 June 1936 ruo 12 June 2001) bụ onye ode akwụkwọ na onye ode abụ nke Naijiria
A mụrụ ya na Nawfia-Awka, obodo dị nso na obodo Igbo bụ Onitsha na Naịjịrịa, Nwankwo gara University College na Ịbadan, nweta akara nzere BA n'afọ 1962
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ọ nwetara ọrụ nkuzi na Ibadan Grammar School, tupu ọ gaa n'ihu ide akwụkwọ akụkọ magazin, gụnyere Drum na-arụ ọrụ na Nigerian Broadcasting Corporation
O dere ọtụtụ akụkọ maka ụmụaka bụ nke ebipụtara na 1963 dị ka Tales Out of School
O derekwara Tales out of School ọzọkwa na 1965
Dịka Onye edemede obere akụkọ na uri, Nwankwo nwetara nlenyere anya na akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ Danda na (1964), bụ nke e mere dịka egwu nke etinyere na 1966 World Festival of Negro Arts na Dakar, Senegal
N’oge agha obodo Nigeria Civil war Nwankwo rụrụ ọrụ na Biafra’s Arts Council
Na 1968, site na njiko aka nke ya na Samuel X
Ifekjika, o dere Biafra The Making of a Nation
Mgbe agha obodo gasịrị, ọ laghachiri Lagos wee rụọ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba, Daily Times
Ọrụ ndị sochirinụ gụnyere satire My Mercedes Is Bigger than Yours
N’afọ 1970 gawa, Nwankwo nwetara akara ugo mmụta Master na PhD
na Mahadum Indiana
O dekwara gbasara nrụrụ aka na Naịjirịa
Ọ nọrọ njedebe nke ndụ ya na United States wee kuzie na Mahadum Michigan State na Tennessee State University
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụra ya na Tennessee, site na nsogbu sitere na ọrịa obi nke ọ na-arịa kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ

Nkem Okeke bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa bụ osote Gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti site na 17 Machị 2014 ruo 17 Machị 2022 O bu ụzọ rụọ ọrụ dịka Kọmishọna Anambra Steeti maka atụmatụ akụ na ụba, nakwa ọzọ dịka Kọmishọna Anambra Steeti maka ọrụ na njem na nchịkwa nke Gọvanọ Peter Obi ma mesịa laghachi imikpu onwe ya na agụmakwụkwọ dịka onye nkuzi na onye isi ngalaba akụ na ụba na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe
A mụrụ Onye Ukwu a, Dr
Nkemakonam Chukwukaodinaka Okeke na Zaira na Jenụwarị 13, afọ 1960 n'ezinụlọ Chief Richard Nwachukwu Okeke na Chief Mrs
Dorothy Nwakaego Okeke nke Umuezu Awovu Village, Enugwu-Ukwu na Anambra Steeti
Ọ lụrụ Oriakụ
Oby Okeke ma chukwu jiri ụmụ ise gozie ha
Ọ gara Denis Memorial Grammar School (DMGS) Onitsha na St
Finbarr's College Akoka, Lagos ma mesịa banye na Mahadum Wisconsin, Madison USA n'afọ 1978, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Science (BSc) na Civil and Environmental Engineering n'afọ 1981

Ọchịchọ ya maka agụmakwụkwọ dị elu mere ya ka ọ banye na Mahadum Howard, Washington DC, USA ebe ọ nwetara MBA na Management n'afọ1983, na PhD na Economics (Monetary Economics) na otu Mahadum Howard, USA, n'afọ1992
Okeke enweela ọrụ ọkachamara a ma ama, nke malitere site na ọrụ dị ịrịba ama ọ rụrụ na ngalaba dị iche iche nke Fairfax County Government, Virginia, USA, dịka Injinia ma mesịa dịka Onye nyocha njikwa

Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 1994, wee sonye na ngalaba nkeonwe site na ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ, Renacs Engineering Nigeria Limited dịka onye isi oche, ruo n'afọ 2002 mgbe ọ banyere ọrụ ọha na eze, dabere na ọchịchọ ya inyekwu aka na mmepe nke Anambra Steeti na Naịjirịa n'ozuzu ya

Malite na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ, o nwere ọkwa dị iche iche na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, Awka nke gụnyere Lecture II, Faculty of Social Science, Economics Department (2002 - 2005), na Acting Head, Department of Economics (January - July 2006)

N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2007, ọ laghachiri na Ngalaba Economics nke Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe dịka onye nkuzi mbụ ruo n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2008, mgbe a kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi ukwu ma jee ozi dịka onye isi ngalaba na Septemba afọ 2009 na Mahadum

Okeke anọwo ogologo n'etiti ndị ọgbọ ya n'oge ọrụ ya na Mahadum na n'ọfịs dị iche iche, ọ nọwo, ọkachasị na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe ebe n'etiti ọkwa ndị ọzọ, ọ bụ onye otu, Kọmitii Mmepe Ngalaba (2005); Onye otu, Kọmitii Mmepe ngalaba (2005); Onye ndụmọdụ ndị ọrụ, Nigerian Economic Students Association (NESA) 2004 - 2005; Onye nkuzi oge, Enugu State University of Science and Technology (ESUT); Ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa (Executive Postgraduate Studies), Enugu (2003 - 2005); Onye isi oche, Kọmitii Ngalaba Accreditation Task Force (2007); Onye isi oche, Kọmitii Nyocha na onye ọrụ nyocha ngalaba (2007 - August 2009); Onye otu, Kọmitii Nzukọ ngalaba (2008 - 2009) na osote onye isi oche, Kọmitii Nzukọ na ememe (2009)

O dere ma ọ bụ soro dee akwụkwọ ndị a ma ama, ọ bụkwa onye otu ọtụtụ ndị ọkachamara, gụnyere Nigeria Economic Society (NES); Institute of Chartered Economists of Nigeria, ICEN (nke a maara dịka Institute of Certified Economists of Nigeria); Council for the Regulation of Engineering in Nigeria (COREN); na Nigeria Society of Engineers (NSE)
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara Dr
Okeke dịka Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka atụmatụ akụ na ụba na mmepe, ma jeekwa ozi n'otu Cabinet dịka Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ọrụ, ụlọ, na njem
A mara Dr
Okeke nke ọma maka mmetụta dị mma ya na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọ rụrụ ọrụ, di na nwunye na onyinye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya kwesịrị ịja mma

O jere ozi n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị na ọrụ mbụ ya dịka osote gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti kachasị uchu ma na-eme ememe site na Machị afọ 2014 ruo Machị afọ 2017, na-emejuputa iwu ya n'ụzọ okpukpe ya iji mee ka ọhụụ na ọrụ dị mma nke ọchịchị ugbu a
Ọ bụ onye isi oche iwu nke Kọmitii Mpaghara Steeti, na onye isi oche nke Christian na Muslim Pilgrims Welfare Boards
Onyinye ọgụgụ isi ya pụtara ìhè ma dị ịrịba ama, emeela ka a họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche ọtụtụ Kọmitii EXCO dịka Gọvanọ nyere ntụziaka
Ọ nọchitere anya Onye isi ya mgbe ụfọdụ na ọrụ dị iche iche nke Steeti, Mba na mba ụwa, n'ihi ya, ọ nọgidere na-enye aka na mmepe nke Steeti Anambra na ndị ya
Onye isi ya, Dr
Nkemakonam Okeke ghọrọ onye mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Anambra Steeti ka a họpụtara ya ọzọ dịka osote Gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti na ntuli aka Gubernatorial nke afọ 2017
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 2021, o si na All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) gaa na All Progressives Congress (APC)

Nkem Okocha bụ onye nwere nka ịchụnta ego na Naijiria bụ onye guzobere Mamamoni, ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta FinTech na-enye ụmụ nwanyị dara ogbenye n'ime obodo na obodo mepere emepe ikike aka ọrụ na mbinye ego
Ọ bụ onye mmeri na 2016 nke LEAP Africa Social Innovators Program (SIP) nke Union bank
Ọmụmụ na ntolite Okocha bụchaa na Lagos, Naịjirịa

Ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ ogo dị elu na Auchi Polytechnic ma mesịa gaa Lagos State University ebe ọ nwetara akara mmụta bachelo na Bankin na Finans wee nata asambodo nka ichụnta ego na Tony Elumelu Entrepreneurship Program, o nwekwara asambodo azụmaahịa na nka ịchụnta ego si mahadum dị na Northwest

Site na mgbalị nwanyị isi mkpe bụ nne ya iji zuo ezinụlọ ya, ọ tọrọ ntọala Mamamoni, ụlọ ọrụ na-elekọta mmadụ nke na-ekwu okwu banyere mgbanwe obodo site n'inye ụmụ nwanyị nkwado ka ha nwee obere azụmahịa
O nwere oke mmasị banyere iwepu ụmụ nwanyị na ogbenye ma ulo ọrụ ya choro ịbelata nsogbu nke ịda ogbenye na Naijịrịa
Kemgbe afọ 2013, ọ metụtala ma nye nkwado ihe karịrị ụmụnwaanyị puku anọ na ọtụtụ ime obodo na obodo mepere emepe ma-nyefee ihe karịrị otu narị obere ego mbinye
Tupu ọ malite ụlọ ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị ahịa n'ụlọ ọbá ego mgbe ahụ bụ Intercontinental Bank nke bụ Access Bank plc ugbu a
Ọ gara n'ihu ịghọ onye isi nchịkwa na Novine Koncept Ventures tupu ịmalite Mamamoni
Kpọpụta njehie Closing tag ụlọ ọrụ na-elekọta mmadụ nke na-ekwu okwu banyere mgbanwe obodo site n'inye ụmụ nwanyị nkwado ka ha nwee obere azụmahịa
O nwere oke mmasị banyere iwepu ụmụ nwanyị na ogbenye ma ulo ọrụ ya choro ịbelata nsogbu nke ịda ogbenye na Naijịrịa
Kemgbe afọ 2013, ọ metụtala ma nye nkwado ihe karịrị ụmụnwaanyị puku anọ na ọtụtụ ime obodo na obodo mepere emepe ma-nyefee ihe karịrị otu narị obere ego mbinye
Tupu ọ malite ụlọ ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị ahịa n'ụlọ ọbá ego mgbe ahụ bụ Intercontinental Bank nke bụ Access Bank plc ugbu a
Ọ gara n'ihu ịghọ onye isi nchịkwa na Novine Koncept Ventures tupu ịmalite Mamamoni

Nkem Owoh bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchịlisten (help·info) N'afọ 2008, O ritere ihe nrite African Movie Academy Award maka 'Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ọrụ ndu' maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Naijiria, 'Stronger than Pain'
A mụrụ Nkem Owoh na Enugu State, Nigeria
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị, ọ gara Mahadum Federal nke Ọrụ Ugbo, Abeokuta ma mụọ injinia
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na mahadum, Owoh malitere ime ihe nkiri na oyoyo na ihe nkiri dị iche iche
A makwara ya maka ịme egwu 'I Go Chop Your Dollar' banyere wayo ịkwụ ụgwọ
E gosipụtara abụ ahụ na ihe nkiri The Master nke Owoh na-eme ka onye aghụghọ
Kọmitii na-ahụ maka mpụ akụ na ụba na ego na Kọmitii mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa machibidoro abụ ahụ
N'afọ 2007, e jidere Owoh na Amsterdam, Netherlands (ógbèijlmermeer na Amsterdam Zuidoost borough) n'ihi nyocha ọnwa asaa nke ndị uwe ojii Dutch kpọrọ 'Operation Apollo'
E jidere Owoh mgbe ọ na-eme ihe ngosi egwu mgbe ndị uwe ojii wakporo ihe omume ahụ ma jide mmadụ 111 na-enyo enyo maka aghụghọ lọtrị na mmebi iwu nke mbata
E mechara tọhapụ Owoh
N'ọnwa Nọvemba nafọ 2009, a tọọrọ Owoh n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ndị tọọrọ ya chọrọ mgbapụta nde naira iri na ise
A tọhapụrụ Owoh mgbe ndị ezinụlọ ya kwụrụ ụgwọ mgbapụta nke nde naira 14
Nkemdilim Amelia Izuako bụ onye ọkikpe Naijiria
Kemgbe afọ 2009, ọ bụ otu n’ime ndị ọki ikpe atọ na United Nations Dispute Tribunal (UNDT)
Izuako natara asambodo iwu ya na Mahadum Ife
Ọ akụziola iwu na Mahadum Nnamdị Azikiwe yana n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Technical Institute nke Gambia
Izuako ghọrọ onye ọka ikpe n’afọ 1998 mgbe a họpụtara ya n’ụlọ ikpe nke steeti Anambra; e mechara họpụta ya n'ụlọ ikpe ukwu nke Naịjirịa, ebe ọ nọrọ ruo 2003
Site na 2004 rue 2006, o jere ozi dika oka ikpe na ulo ikpe ukwu na ulo ikpe mkpegharị nke Gambia
Na 2006, a họpụtara ya n'tolọikpe Kasị Elu nke Solomon Islands; ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ ikpe n'ụlọ ikpe nke Solomon Islands
na nke ọ bụla n'ime ikike ndị a, na dị ka onye ọka ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe nke ikike izugbe, ọ na-ahụ maka okwu gbasara ọrụ na njikwa iwu

Tupu ọkwaga na Solomon Islands, Justice Izuako rụrụ ọrụ ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ na ngalaba ikpe Naijiria, gụnyere iso n'ụlọ Ọrụ Mba Ndị Dị n’Otu na-ahụ Maka Ọgwụ na Mpụ na-arụkọ ọrụ iji tinye akwụkwọ ntuziaka gbasara ụkpụrụ omume gbasara ikpe maka ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria
N’afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ọkaikpe nke UNDT
Na UNDT, ọ nọ na Nairobi, Kenya
ụlọ ikpe a, nke dị na Nairobi, New York na Geneva, na-arụ ọrụ iji meziwanye usoro UN na-ahụ maka mkpesa ime na ikpe ịdọ aka ná ntị
Nkem onye hụtara onwe ya dika onye na-akwado ikike na mmepe umu nwaanyị nyere aka n’inye ndi nkuzi oka iwu na Solomon Islands wee nyere aka zulite ikike ha nwere ino n’onodu ulo ikpe di elu

N'èzí ụlọ ikpe ahụ, justice Izuako rụrụ ọrụ iji nyere aka na mmepe mmekọrịta ọha na eze site n'ịchịkọta ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'obodo ahụ ka ha hiwe Honiara Women's Initiative, nke na-amalite obere ọrụ maka ikike akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ
Obodo Nigeria

Nkemdilim Uwaje Begho bụ ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara teknụzụ ozi nwere ihe karịrị afọ 15 nke ahụmịhe ụlọ ọrụ na nnukwu akụ na ụba na-apụta na Africa nwere ebumnuche miri emi ma lekwasị anya n'ịchịkọta nkewa dijitalụ na ịgbanwe Africa site na itinye uru nke dijitalụ
Nkemjika Natalie Ezurike (amuru Maachị 19, 1992) bu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Canada
Ọ na-esonye egwu dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụmụ nwanyị Canada na klọb Israel ASA Tel Aviv
Amụrụ Ezurike na Halifax, Nova scotia, wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Sackville na Lower Sackville
Ezurike gara Mahadum Michigan ebe ọ gbara ndị Wolverines egwuregwu bọọlụ site na 2010 ruo 2013
Ndị Boston Breakers họpụtara Ezurike dika onye nke asatọ n'ozuzu na 2014 NWSL College Draft wee soro ndị otu ahụ binye aka nkwekọrịta nsonye na ya
Na Jenụwarị 14, 2016 ọ bịanyere aka nkwekọrịta nsonye na Vittsjö GIK na Damallsvenskan
Ezurike bịanyere aka nkwekọrịta nsonye na Mallbackens IF maka oge 2017
Ezurike mere mpụta mbụ ya maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụmụ nwanyị Canada na 2014
Akpọrọ ya aha na ndị otu Canada maka 2015 Pan American Games na Toronto

Nkewa nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ bụ ụdị nkewa nke ọnụ mmadụ
Ọ na-abụkarị site na nkwarụ ebe obibi
Nkewa nwere ike ịbụ ihe kpatara ike okike ma ọ bụ omume mmadụ, ọ bụ ezie na n'oge a, ọrụ mmadụ bụ ihe na-akpatakarị ya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị na-akpata nkewa bụ
Nkewa nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na-akpata ịda mbà n'obi, nke na-eduga na mbelata nke mgbanwe nke mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na ụdị ndị metụtara
Nke a na-ebelata ahụike nke ndị mmadụ n'ihi ọtụtụ ihe
Nke mbụ, inbreeding na-eme ka asọmpi na ndị ikwu, nke na-ebelata ahụike evolushọn nke ụdị ahụ

Nke abụọ, mbelata nke mgbanwe nke mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na-eme ka ohere dị ukwuu nwere ike igosipụta àgwà homozygous recessive na-egbu egbu; nke a na-ebelata nkezi nke ụmụ a na-amụpụta, na-ebepụ ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ
Mgbe ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị ntakịrị, mmetụta nke mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na-abawanye, nke na-eduga na obere na / ma ọ bụ nhazi nke alleles
N'aka nke ya, nke a na-eduga n'ịbawanye homozygosity, na-emetụta ahụ ike nke onye ọ bụla n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma
Enwere ike imebi arụmọrụ nke osisi site na nhọrọ na-adịchaghị mma nke na-ebute mmụkọ nke mmụgharị na-emebi emebi na obere mmadụ
Ebe ọ bụ na ndị nọ n'obere mmadụ nwere ike ịbụ ndị ikwu, ha na-enwekarị ike ịmụ nwa
Mbelata ahụ ike nwere ike ime na obere osisi n'ihi mmụkọ mmụkọ, mbelata ụdị mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa, yana mmụba ịmụba
Ka oge na-aga, ikike evolushọn na ikike nke ụdị iji mee mgbanwe na gburugburu ebe obibi na-agbanwe agbanwe, dị ka mgbanwe ihu igwe, na-ebelata
Mmụba kwa afọ (MAI) ma ọ bụ pụtara uto kwa afọ na-ezo aka na nkezi uto kwa afọ osisi ma ọ bụ nkwụ osisi egosipụtala/ nwetagoro ruo afọ akọwapụtara
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, osisi dị afọ 20 nke nwere ogwe 02 m3 nwere MAI nke 001 m3/afọ
A na-agbakọ MAI dị ka ebe = mmepụta n'oge
Maka osisi, a na-agbakọkarị ọnụ ọgụgụ ogwe (m3) kwa mpaghara (ha)

N'ihi na usoro uto nke oké ọhịa bụ sigmoidal, MAI na-amalite obere, na-abawanye na ọnụ ahịa kachasị elu ka osisi na-etolite, wee jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ na-ebelata ka oge ụfọdụ osisi na-eche asọmpi maka ìhè anyanwụ na osisi ndị okenye na-anwụ
[ihe odide 1]
N'ime nke a, Mai mgbe niile na-anọgide na-adị mma
MAI dị iche na oge kwa afọ increment (PAI) na PAI bụ uto maka otu afọ kpọmkwem ma ọ bụ ihe ọ bụla ọzọ kpọmkwem ogologo oge
Ebe MAI na PAI zutere bụ n'ebe kachasị elu MAI ma a na-akpọkarị ya afọ ntụgharị kacha mma
Nke a bụ afọ a ga-ewepụta osisi ma ọ bụ osisi ma ọ bụrụ na ebumnuche njikwa bụ iji bulie ihe ọkụkụ ogologo oge
A na-egosi ihe akaebe nke nkọwa a site na ịmata ọdịiche banyere , Husch, Miller, na Beers gosipụtara ya
Nkhensani Manganyi (nke a makwaara dị ka Nkhensani Nkosi) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ejiji na mba South Africa
N'afọ 2000, Manganyi malitere ụlọ ejiji Stoned Cherrie
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ hiwere nhiwe nwere ọkwa dị elu na South Africa maka iji ihe oyiyi nke ndị dike oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ dị ka ihe na-apụta ugboro ugboro na atụmatụ ya nke T-shirts na elu efe cutaway

Otu n'ime ụdị elu efe nwoke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ a maara nke ọma gosipụtara mkpuchi sitere na magazin Drum na ihu onye na-emegide agwa ịkpa ókè agbụrụ bụStephen Biko, nke ndị ọrụ nchekwa steeti gburu na 1977, onye ihu ya ka bụ ihe nnọchianya ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ike nke mmegide ịkpa oke agbụrụ
Ọrụ ya gụnyekwara ihe eji eme anya na ihe eji eme ihe
Ọ gaala gburugburu mba Afrịka dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ọdịiche dị n'ụdị ejiji Afrịka

Ihe oyiyi nke Manganyi, dị ka Nkhensani Nkosi, na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Johannesburg gụnyere n'akwụkwọ ahụ, 'Asụsụ nke Fashion Design' dị ka ihe atụ nke otu ndị na-emepụta ihe si emepụta nchịkọta ha
E gosipụtara ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ Nkosi na Fashion Institute of Technology dị ka akụkụ nke ngosi Black Fashion Designers site na ọnwa Disemba afọ 2016 ruo Mee afọ 2017
N'afọ 2003, Manganyi bụ onye ọka ikpe na South African run nke usoro telivishọn Popstars
O kwuru n'oge ahụ, sị 'N'oge gara aga, nkatọ nke (Pop Stars) nwere mmetụta siri ike nke America nwere ike ịdị mkpa, mana echere m na usoro ọhụrụ anyị enyerela aka ịgbanwe nke ahụ
Nkiru Balonwu bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye mmegide si na Lagos, Naijiria

A maara Nkiru maka echiche siri ike ya banyere ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ihe ngwọta maka nsogbu Africa ma bụrụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke African Women on Board, otu nọọrọ onwe ya, òtù ụmụ nwanyị Africa na-edu nke a na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite akụkọ iji kwalite eziokwu maka ụmụ nwanyị
na ụmụ agbọghọ ndị Africa
Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa na onye jikwaa onye mmekọ nke RDF Strategies, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ na-enye kwa ndụmọdụ gbasara nzikọrịta ozi atụmatụ yana ntinye aka nke ndị otu
N'afọ 2016, n'oge ọ nọ n'isi Spinlet, Balonwu pụtara na YNaija dịka otu n'ime 'Ụmụ nwanyị otu narị kacha akpali akpali na Naijiria'
N'October 2019, e nyere Balonwu ihe nrite 2020 Powerlist International site na Powerlist UK
Balonwu bụ ada ndị ọkaiwu abụọ nwere nzụlite na mgbanwe mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ikpe ziri ezi
Balonwu gụchara ma nweta nzere bachelọ nke iwu site n
na Mahadum Manchester
O nwetara akara ugo mmụtnkenMasters site u na University College London (UCL) wee nweta akara ugo mmụta doctorate na Mahadum California, Berkeley
Balonwu arụwo ọrụ n'ụdị dị iche iche gụnyere iwu, teknụzụ na nzikọrịta ozi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi na ngalaba iwu, Mahadum Lagos
Na 2014, Balonwu ghọrọ CEO nke Spinlet, ụlọọrụ na-ahụ maka nkesa egwu dijitalụ na Sub-Saharan Africa
N'oge ya dị ka CEO, Spinlet ghọrọ onye Naijiria mbụ jidere ọkwa nke onye njikwa koodu ndekọ ndekọ aha mba ụwa
(ISRC)

Na 2017, Balonwu tọrọ ntọala African Women on Board nke malitere na mba ụwa na Ford Foundation Center for Social Justice, New York, na 26 September 2019 n'oge United Nation's General Assembly (UNGA), na ebumnuche 'inye ndị inyom Africa olu na igbanwe otú e si aghọta ha”

N'afọ 2018, ndị otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa họpụtara Balonwu ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ, ka o tinye ụmụnwaanyị n'oge mgbasa ozi onyeisiala n'afọ 2019 nke onye bụbu osote onyeisiala na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Atiku Abubakar
A họpụtara ụlọọrụ ndụmọdụ nke Balonwu, RDF ka ọ zụlite echiche maka Lagos to the World (L2W), mgbasa ozi zuru ụwa ọnụ na 2018 site n'aka gọọmentị Lagos State iji chụba ego na mba ọzọ na steeti ahụ
Na 25 Ọktoba 2019, Balonwu nwetara ihe nrite mba ụwa nke Powerlist 2020
Ihe nrite ike nke ndị isi ojii bu ihe nrite na-agunye mmadụ otu narị ndị isi ojii kacha emetụta UK

Balonwu bụ onye natara ihe nrite mba ụwa, 'nke a na-enye onye nọ na mpụga UK, bụ onye a na-ewere dị ka onye na-agbanwe onwe ya dị ka onye na-eme mgbanwe, onye na-emepụta ihe ọhụrụ, onye na-akpali akpali na onye nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu' n'ịkwado ọrụ ya nke African Women on Board

Na March 2016, Media publication, YNaija, na mmekorita ya na Leading Ladies Africa họọrọ Balonwu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị otu nari kacha akpali akpali na Naijiria, nke a na-ewepụta kwa afọ nke na-egosi 'ụmụ nwanyị ndị na-ama ụma na-emetụta ụwa ha na obodo ha site n'ike na ike nke echiche ha na arụpụta ihe' Balonwu nwetara nsọpụrụ maka ọrụ ya na Spinlet na ihazi ghari eti esi ekesa ihe gbasara egwu'

N'afọ 2010, Balonwu bụ onye nnata nke Founder Region Fellowship, òtù na-enye onyinye nke na-elekwasị anya na 'imeziwanye ndụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ na mpaghara na n'ụwa nile site n'inye ndị inyom na-emekọrịta ihe n'ezie bu ndi ga-enwe gbanwe n'ụwa' Balonwu nwetara ihe nrite n'okpuru iwu na-elekwasị anya na iwu na sayensị nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ gbasara iwu dabere na nyocha ohere ndị ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Afrịka, 'Nollywood' na-enye ụmụ nwanyị dịka ihe na-akwalite mmepe akụ na ụba
E gosila Balonwu n'usoro dị iche iche gbasara isiokwu sitere na nha anya nwoke na nwanyị, teknụzụ, ihe ọhụrụ na ịzụ ahịa

Na mgbasa ozi a16z, nke VC fund Andreessen Horowitz malitere, Balonwu kwuru okwu banyere nkà na ụzụ na Africa, ebe ndị ọkà okwu ọbịa gara aga gụnyere onye egwuregwu NBA Andre Iguodala na Oprah Winfrey kwuburu okwu Harvard Business School's Dynamic Women in Business Conference na 2018 gosipụtara Nkiru Balonwu dị ka onye 'ụmụ nwanyị na bọọdụ'

Na Radio France Internationale (RFI) ọrụ redio ọha na eze France nwere nde mmadụ irí atọ na ise ma pụkụ narị isii na-ege ntị n'ụwa niile, Balonwu kwuru maka otu ọ ga-esi eme ka ụmụ nwanyị Africa na-eme nke ọma
A na-edepụta ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na ụlọọrụ Founder Institute, ihe mmalite nke mbụ n'ụwa
Edemede ya gụnyere
Balonwu nọ ọdụ na bọọdụ nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ
Nkiru Njoku bụ onye obodo Nigeria amụrụ na afọ 1980, ọ na ede ihe nkiri, ọ bụ kwa odee akwụkwọ na onye na emepụta ihe nkiri
Nkiru bụ onye isi edemede ihe nkiri a n'akpo Tinsel, nke ebidoro igosi na Nigeria n'afọ 2008 Ụgbụa, Njoku bụ onye isi na emeputa ihe nkiri nke a n'akpọ 'Project Fame West Africa'
Nkiru Nzegwu (amụrụ na March 22, 1954) bụ onye ọka ihe ọmụma, onye na-ese ihe, onye odee akwukwo, onye nleba anya na onye odee akwụkwọ nka
Ọ bụ ọkà mmụta a ma ama maka nchọcha na Mahadum steeti New York na Binghamton
N'ime mpaghara nka Dọkịnta Nzegwu nwere bụ ihe ịma mma nke Afrịka, ihe ọmụma, okwu gbasara ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka, ọmụmụ omenala dị iche iche na nka, na mbipụta dijitalụ
Ọ chịburu Onira Arts Afrịka gallery na Ottawa, Canada, bụrụkwa onye nrụpụta maka mmemme redio ama ama, olu ala Nigeria

Ọ natala ọtụtụ mkpakọrịta nchọcha na onyinye gụnyere ogo dị elu na ọgbakọ humanities nke ụlọ akwụkwọ gbasara anumanu nwoke na nwaanyị na mba Afrika na UCLA; ebe dị elu na nchọcha Getty; Òtù Mahadum Cornell Maka Mmekọrịta Ndị Mmadụ; SUNY nkwalite nchọcha mmekọrịta mmadụ na onyinye oru ngọ; Ụlọ ọrụ Smithsonian Institution Postdoctoral Fellowship; Mahadum Ottawa Merit Graduate Scholarship, na Nkà Mmụta Ọchịchị Federal nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na-aka ọrụ nke Nigerian Art - Kindred Spirits (1996), ihe nrite Emmy meriri Smithsonian akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ọ bụ onye otu n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ọkacha mara ma na-ekwukarị okwu na nkuzi gbasara ihe gbasara nsogbu nwoke na nwaanyị, nka na mbipụta
Ọ nọ na bọọdụ International Consortium for Alternative Academic Publishing [ICAAP]
Nkiru Doris 'NK' Okosieme (amụrụ n'6 Machị n'afọ 1972) bụ onye isi ndị otu egwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa (Super Falcons)

Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na asọmpi nke iko mba niile ndị FIFA ugboro anọ (1991, 1995, 1999 na 2003), ya na ọtụtụ asọmpi Iko nke Mba Ndị Afrịka na Summer Olympics nke afọ 2000
A na-akpọ Okosieme 'Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ' maka omume ya
Iji isi enye goolu ya bụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ ndị dị mkpa
Okosieme bu onye isi ndị Nigeria egwu bọọlu ụmụ nwanyị gara 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup mgbe ọ ka dị afọ iri na ụma
Ọ gwuri egwu bọọlu oge zuruezu nke bụ nkeji iri asatọ niile na egwu bọọlu atọ nke emeriri Nigeria
Na oge ahụ ọ nọ otu ndị SC Imo State club
Mgbe ọ jere1999 FIFA World Cup, Okosieme nọ otu nd egwuregwu bọọlu Rivers Angels
Tupu asọmpi ahụ o kwupụtara 'Anyị enweghịzị mgbagwoju anya iche na anyi bụ ndị ọbere mmadu'
Ọ nyere goolu atọ n'ime egwuruegwu anọ nke mere ka Naịjirịa ruo nkeji iri na ise na agba asọmpi ahụ
Brazil meriri haa ọkpu anọ asara nani atọ (4-3)
Okosieme nwere obi uto igwu egwu bọọlu na America nke ukwuu nke na o sonyere Charlotte Lady Eagles nke USL W-League wee debanye kwa aha na mahadum, ebe ọ gbara bọọlụ nke kọleji
W-league bụ ọkwa kachasị elu maka bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na US taa
N’afọ 2001, “NK” bụ onye nke abụọ kachasị nweta goolu na NCAA Div II
Ọ nweta nmeri dị ka Peach Belt Conference Player nke Afọ na oge ahụ na ndị otu egwu bọọlu ụmụ nwanyị na mpaghara niile maka afọ anọ
Ọ bụkwa onye enyere onyinye dị ka NSCAA niile-America
Okosieme sonyere ma tinye aka na 'Super Falcons' maka nmeri iko ụmụ nwanyị Africa, ugboro atọ n'afọ 1998, 2000 na 2002
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ Ndubuisi Okosieme bụkwa onye egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ofesi

Nkiru Olumide-Ojo bu nwa nwanyi onye Naijiria ode akwukwo, onye edemede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na'ekwu okwu mmepe na nnukwu ọrụ bekee nke nwere akụkọ banyere ọrụ ego, ọdụ ụgbọelu, nkwukọrịta na mpaghara ihe gbasara mmanụ esi n'okpuru ala egwu pụta
Nkiru Olumide-Ojo, onye toro na Port-Harcourt, Rivers State, nwere akara nzere nke Masters na Strategic Marketing Management si Mahadum Kingston, Surrey na London, UK
Ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ na nzere mbụ ya na Biological Science na Mahadum
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Nigeria [NIPR] na onye otu UK Chatered Institute of Marketing United Kingdom
Nkiru na - arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka Onye isi Executive, Regional Marketing na Communication nke Standard Bank Group, South Africa
Ọ rụọ ọrụ na CMC Connect Burson-Marsteller, Nigeria, Virgin Atlantic na Nigeria, Virgin Nigeria, Airtel, Forte oil, n'ebe C ọzọ di iche iche
N’ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2017, akwụkwọ Nkiru Olumide-Ojo dere akpọrọ The Pressure Cooker Lessons From A Woman at Work pụta site na aka pụta Narrative Landscape Press
C bụ nchịkọta nke edemede ya kwa izu ụka na akwụkwọ akụkọ Business Day (Nigeria), nke lekwasịrị anya n'okwu metụtara ụmụ nwanyị na ebe ọrụ ha
Akwụkwọ a dị peeji iri abụọ na itoolu ekewara na isi nke iteghete na-egosi atụmanya, ọghọm na nsogbu nke ụmụ nwanyị na enweta na ihụ ọrụ ha
Akwụkwọ ahụ na egosi 'nghọta dị omimi etu ụmụ nwanyị nwere ike isi nwee ọganiihu na ọrụ ha, ma na-elekwata ezi n'ụlọ ha ọfụma'

Onye na - akwado okwu ụmụ nwanyị, Nkiru bụ onye chikọtara ụlọ nke a na akpọ The Lighthouse Network nke bụ ihe na kwado mmepe na mmekọrịta ọha na eze nwere mmemme maka inyere umunwanyi aka, ọ kachasị iji nyere ụmụ nwanyị na etolite etolite aka ike na ọrụ nchụnta ego, ma na-akwadebekwa ụmụ agbọghọ site na inyere ha aka usoro ọmụmụ
Ọ bụ onye na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha
Nkiru emeriela ma nweta onyinye Best Corporate Brand Manager Award na 2017 Brands & Marketing Awards nke ndi otu Brand Journalists nke Nigeria (BJAN) haziri
N'afọ ahụ, asọpụrụ ya ka ọ bụrụ Leading Marketing Personality of the Year site n'aka Marketing Edge
A nabatara ya na 2008 na 2016 dị ka otu n'ime ndị bu- Leading Women in Marketing and Communication site na aka ndị Market World West Africa
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ndị Naijirịa nabatara site n'aka ndị Nigerians inDiasporas Professional (NIPRO) dị ka 'Top 40 Females under 40' nke ahụ bụ ụmụ nwanyị erubeghị afọ iri anọ ndị nọ n'isi
Ọ kọrọ na 'ọ na-anọdụ na bọọdụ nke òtù azụmahịa abụọ'
Ọ bụ onye osote onye isi nke abụọ nke Ndị mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa (Advertisers Association of NIgeria)
Nkiru lụrụ Olumide Ojo, ha abụọ nwere ụmụ abụọ
ịNkiru Sylvanus (amuru ya na Eprel, ụbọchị iri abụọ na mbụ n’afọ 1982) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo na Naijirịa
N'ime oge ọ na-eme ihe nkiri dị ka ọrụ ya, o so na ihe nkiri iri asaa

Ọ nweta kwa'ra nturu ugo dị ka nwata nwanyi na eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards Onwe ta ihe nturu ugo ọzọ dị ka obụzọ onye nwanyi kachasị mma na ime ihe nkiri na Africa Movie Academy Awards
A mụrụ Nkiru Sylvanus na Osisioma, Aba, obodo dị na Abia State
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekondịr na Ohabiam, ebe ọ nwetara asambodo akwụkwọ mbụ ya na Asambodo nke WAEC
Ọ gakwara mahadum sayensị na teknụzụ Enugu State, ebe ọ wetara asambodo BSc na Mass Communication
Ndi mgbasa ozi akwụkwọ Punch kọwara Nkiru Sylvanus dị ka onye aka ochie na ime ihe nkiri
Sylvanus malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, na 1999
O sonye n’ime ihe nkiri Nollywood karịrị iri asaa
A gosiputara ya ugboro abụọ (2017 & 2018) n'akwụkwọ The Guardian na Celebrities Who Made Headlines
N’afọ 2011, a gụnyere Sylvanus n’ụlọ ọrụ nke onye bụbu gọvanọ Imo steeti Rochas Okorocha dịka onye enyemaka ya pụrụ iche maka ihe banyere Legọs ma mesịa bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ ya na-ahụ maka ọhaneze

Sylvanus, onye bụ onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nye onye bụbu Gọvanọ nke Imo steeti, Rochas Okorocha na-ahụ maka Ọhaneze ka a tọọrọ na Disemba 15, 2012 na elekere 230pm dị ka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Nigeria nwere aha ọma siri kwu

Otu akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi Vanguard mere ka a mara na ndị na-jide ya chọrọ oge mgbapụta - otu narị nde naira nke bụ (na ọnụego mgbanwe) na 2012 nke ruru $ 640,000 (Nde narị isii na iri puku anọ US dollar) ka ndị jidere ya chọrọ ka ha wee hapụ ya
Ndị ụlọ mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa kwuru a tọhapụrụ Sylvanus n'aka ndị o tọọrọ na December 21, 2012 na elekere 10 30 nke abalị
Na 2014 Sylvanus lụrụ Stanley Duru
Mana ha kewa n’afọ 2019
Nkiruka Florence Nwakwe (amụrụ c
1994), nke a makwaara dị ka Nkiruka Nwakwe, bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ na onye na-agbachitere
O meriri na mpaghara na mba ụwa na-anọchite anya Naijirịa na asọmpi egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị
Nkiruka Florence Nwakwe malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ ọsọ na onye na-eme ihe mgbochi na Naijirịa ebe ọ na-asọmpi na asọmpi dị iche iche

O meriri nrite ọla edo ya kachasị asọmpi na 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Athletics na 200 mita ihe omume ma meekwa ihe nrite ọlaọcha na 4 × 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2012 World Junior Championships in Athleics in Athletic nke emere na Estadi Olímpic Lluís Companys na 13 na 14 Juulị, ọ sonyekwara na ndị otu African 4 × 400 m relay nke meriri nrọ ọlaọcha n'egwuregwu 2010 Summer Youth Games na Josephine Omaka si Nigeria, Izelle Neuhoff si South Africa na Bukola Ablokoogun ọzọ
Àtụ Footer Youth Olympic Champions Athletics 200m Girls

Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Nkongho, mà ọ bụ Upper Mbo, bụ asụsụ Bantu á na-amaghị nkè ọma nkè Cameroon
Ewezuga ịbụ Bantu, ọ nweghị ìhè jikọrọ yá ná asụsụ Mbo
Nkonya bụ asụsụ Guang nke ndị Nkonya na Biakoye District nke Oti Region nke Ghana na-asụ
Phonology na dictionary dị
Nkosana bu aha Afrika nyere
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Nkosana Makate (a mụrụ n'afọ 1977), bụ onye Saụt Afrịka nke tụpụtara echiche 'Biko Kpọọ M' na Vodacom
Ebumnuche ya gụnyere iziga ozi n'efu nye ndị ọrụ Vodacom ndị ọzọ iji rịọ ka ha kpọọ gị, ọ bụrụgodị na ị nweghị otuto zuru ezu iji mee nke ahụ
Nkosana Makate kọọrọ onye were ya n'ọrụ echiche ahụ, mana ọ dịghị mgbe ọ natara ụgwọ maka ya
O boro Vodacom ebubo ma merie ikpe ahụ megide ha mgbe agha afọ asatọ gasịrị
Vodacom malitere ọrụ Please Call Me n'afọ 2001
Ikpe nke afọ 2014 n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke South Gauteng kwadoro nkwupụta Makate na ọ malitere Please Call Me
Ọ jụkwara nkwupụta onye bụbu onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Alan Knott-Craig na ọ bịara na echiche nke ọrụ ozi

N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu chọpụtara megide Makate, na-ekwusi ike na Geissler enweghị ikike ikwe Makate nkwa ịkwụ ụgwọ dị otú ahụ nakwa na ụgwọ ahụ ga-agwụ (n'okwu iwu, e nyere iwu) n'ime afọ atọ
Makate gbara akwụkwọ maka ikpe ahụ, ma mesịa were ya gaa n'ụlọ ikpe iwu
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2016, onye ọka ikpe Chris Jafta hụrụ ihu ọma Makate na megide Vodacom
Nkosazana Clarice Dlamini-Zuma (née Dlamini; Amụrụ na 27 Jenụwarị 1949), mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya NDZ, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, dọkịta na onye bụbu onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Onye otu African National Congress (ANC) ogologo oge, ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Minista nke Gọọmentị Nkwado na Ihe Omenala ma bụrụ Chancellor nke Mahadum Limpopo
A mụrụ Dlamini-Zuma ma gụọ akwụkwọ na mpaghara Natal, ebe, dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, ọ banyere na Black Consciousness Movement site na South African Students' Organisation
N'agbata afọ 1976 na afọ 1990, ọ biri na mba ọzọ na mpụga South Africa, ọkachasị na United Kingdom na Swaziland, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ ahụike ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ANC
Kemgbe afọ 1994, Dlamini-Zuma jere ozi na kọmitii nke onye isi ala South Africa ọ bụla na-esote ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ bụ Minista nke Ahụike n'okpuru Onye isi ala Nelson Mandela, na Minista nke Mmekọrịta Mba Ọzọ ruo afọ iri n'okpuru ndị isi ala Thabo Mbeki na Onye isi ala Kgalema Motlanthe
N'oge nke mbụ nke Onye isi ala Jacob Zuma, ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị n'ime ụlọ, nke a na-ekwu na ọ na-agbanwe ngalaba na-adịghị arụ ọrụ

N'okpuru Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na Presidency maka atụmatụ, nlekota na nyocha, na-ahụ maka National Planning Commission, tupu ọ banye n'ọkwa ya ugbu a, ebe o nwere ọrụ a ma ama na esemokwu n'ịchịkwa mkpọchi South Africa n'oge ọrịa COVID-19

Ọ nọghị na gọọmentị South Africa n'etiti n'ọnwa Ọktọba 2012 ruo n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2017, mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke African Union Commission, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na-eduzi ma ọ bụ nzukọ ahụ ma ọ bụ onye bu ya ụzọ, Organisation of African Unity
Oge ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa ahụ bụkwa ihe arụmụka

Ọ bụ onye otu National Executive Committee nke ANC kemgbe mmalite afọ 1990, ọ mekwara mkpọsa ugboro abụọ na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma maka ọkwa ndị isi na pati ahụ n'afọ 2007, na Nzukọ Mba nke 52 nke ANC, Motlanthe meriri ya iji merie osote onye isi ala; ebe na Nzukọ nke 54 nke Mba n'afọ 2017, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka Ramaphosa, onye nọ ugbu a, tụfuo ọkwa onye isi ala nke ANC
Nkosinathi Phiwayinkosi Thamsanqa Nhleko, Onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Nathi Nhleko، Bụ onye bụbu Minista ndị uwe ojii South Africa
Nhleko jere ozi na nzuko omeiwu dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Ọrụ Ọha na Nchịkwa, onye isi oche nke African National Congress (ANC)
Tinyere onye isi ụtarị nke ANC, na onye otu Kọmitii Ọrụ Ikpe

Nkrumah Eljego Bonner (amụrụ na 23 Jenụwarị 1989) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu cricket na Jamaica nke na-eme cricket mba ụwa maka West Indies Onye na-agba bọọlụ na-agbagharị ụkwụ mgbe ụfọdụ na onye na-agba ọkpọ n'aka nri, Bonner mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na klas mbụ maka Jamaica megide Combined Campuses and Colleges na Febụwarị 2011
A họpụtara Bonner dị ka akụkụ nke ndị otu West Indies ịga njem England na 2011
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, a kpọrọ aha ya na ndị otu Jamaica maka asọmpi Super50 nke 2019 na 20
Na June 2020, Bonner kpọrọ aha na ndị otu West Indies' Test squad, maka usoro ha megide England
Ebubere usoro ule a ka ọ malite na Mee 2020, mana eweghachiri ya na Julaị 2020 n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19
Na Julaị 2020, akpọrọ aha ya na ndị otu Jamaica Tallawahs maka 2020 Caribbean Premier League
N'ọnwa Disemba 2020, a kpọrọ aha Bonner na West Indies' Test and One Day International (ODI) squads maka usoro ha megide Bangladesh
O mere ODI mbụ ya maka West Indies, megide Bangladesh, na 20 Jenụwarị 2021
O mere ule mbụ ya maka West Indies, megide Bangladesh, na 3 Febụwarị 2021
Na Mee 2021, e nyere Bonner nkwekọrịta etiti site na Cricket West Indies
Ọ gbara ọsọ 86 na egwuregwu mbụ ya, na-ejikọ 216-run na Kyle Mayers iji merie Bangladesh na egwuregwu ule mbụ site na wickets atọ
Ihe e ji mara cacao na-emezigharị bụ ihe ọkụkụ dị iche iche nke agroforestry bụ nke a na-akụ osisi cacao na ndò nke osisi ndị ọzọ na-eṅomi gburugburu oke ọhịa

A na-eji ụdị ihe ọkụkụ a eme ihe dị ka usoro iji weghachi oke ohia n'ebe ịta nri ehi gbahapụrụ agbahapụ na mpaghara ndị ọzọ nke ala ubi a na-akpachapụghị anyaN'ime nke ndị ọrụ ugbo nwere ike ịmepụta nri na ego ha na-enweta ma na-emegharị ọhịaA na-akọwa cacao regenerative site n'ubi agroforestry dị iche iche ebe a na-eto osisi koko na ndò nke osisi ndị ọzọ, na-eṅomi usoro okike ọhịa
Mgbanwe nke cocoa na-eme ka ọ dị ọhụrụ bụ mmeghachi omume megide osisi monoculture cacao, nke a na-emekarị kpatara mgbukpọ ọhịa n'ebe okpomọkụ [citation needed]
Nkwụghachi ụgwọ ihu igwe bụ usoro màkà ịhazigharị usoro okpomọkụ iji gosipụta ihu igwe dị n'èzí, na-eji njikwa nkwụghachi ụgwọ ihú ọma
Ọ bụrụ nà okpomọkụ dị n'èzí adaa, ọ ga-amụba okpomọkụ nkè ihe na-ekpo ọkụ (nkè a na-ahụkarị, mmiri ma ọ bụ ikuku) nà usoro okpomọkụ
Usoro ndị a na-ebelata ojiji mmanụ ụgbọala, karịsịa site n'ibu amụma màkà mkpà, na ịgbanwe okpomọkụ tupu mgbanwe na okpomọkụ dị n'ime
Usoro ahụ nwekwara ike ịghọta nzaghachi dị íchè íchè nke akụkụ dị íchè íchè dị na ihe onwunwe na ọnọdụ mpụga, ma kwụọ ụgwọ maka nke ahụ
Nchekwa ego ndị ọzọ nwèrè ike ịpụta site na usoro ahụ ịghọta ihe a tụrụ ányá ya, ma si otú a zere imebi ụlọ ọkụ eletrik nwere windo mepere emepe, dịka ọmụmaatụ
Nkwa Ụmụagbọghọ bụ egwu e jiri mara ndi Ezi-inya, Ezi-Nwachi Ndibe na Afikpo North n'Ebonyi Steeti
O bu Egwu si n’ịgba mgba pụta
O nwere onye wụ Dịnta na- agba ntà
Ọ banye n’ ime ọfịa, na ọ banyere n’ ime ọfịa ije gbaa nta
ọ na-ejebukwa eje agba ntà ma o nwere mgbọshi o banyere ime ọhịa ije gba nta, ọ fụzie enwe ka ha na-agbazi mgba n'ime ọfịa ahụ ọ na-ene ha
Ha amahọdi na ọ na-ene ha, kwusizie ịgba nta ọ galị ịgba na- ene ha, negodezie ha, lọtazie be ya
Ka ọ bataziru beya, Ọ kpọro ụmụnwokeịa na abọ bia na-egosizi ha ihe ọ fụgasara enwe a na-eme n’ ime ọfịa
Megidezia, otu a ka eshizi bido ịgba mgba a ana-emezi
Emezie, ụmụokorobia abụọ pụtazie oge ịgba mgba, ha pụtazie, onye a puta, onye apụta, ha bịazie ịgba mgba, ofu onye ga amatu ibe ya n’ àlà
Ọdazie, onye ebee onye nwoke nke tụrụ nke matuzii nke a n’ala
Apụtazie amụrụzie shi ayi na onye shí n’ obodo anyị ma ọbụ na compoundụ anyị atụgonu mmadụ n’ ala
Ụmụagbọgọ zi shíkwa na ebe a onye a bi agbapụtazie na ogo ma o bu ama
Apụtazie ebe ahụ biazie na-agbazi egwu na nwanne ha tuziri mmadụ, Ebe a ka Nkwa Ụmụagbọhọ si bidozie enwerezie nwayọ nwayọ na-emezi ya ruo taa
Mgbe emechizere, alụchaziri agha na 1970, lọtazie, otu nwoke a na akpo Vincent Omerenwachi ma akpokwa ya a Omerasigo n’ Afikpo niile, biaziri jiri nwanyọ na-akuziziri ndị nwoke na ndị nwanyị
A na-akuziziri ụmụnwoke ka esi akụụ nkwa, maka ọ wụ ofu soso ofu ka a na-eme
A gbachahala nke ahụ, emekwaa, ebidokwa n’ íshí
O bu nwoke a jizi nwayọ na-ewebatazi ihe dịgasị iche iche
O bu egwu ndị obodo a na-agba na ihe a na-akpọ n’ ishi ogo n’ ishi ogo
Ọ ruo mgbe a na-agba mgba, ndeee ndị ibe, ha ga-agba, ndi amaizu agbaa, ndị ọzọ a na-agba nke hà nwa
Ha gbachazie ndị obodo a bịakwa gbá nke ha
Emegide ozu ọnụ, ọwụrụ na-agbasigo mgba
Ọ wụ nde Ụmụagbọghọ na agba ya
ọwụghị ụdị nde lugoro dị bu ndi mama na-agba
